Content: I have ordered with Entripy several times and will continue to do so because of the excellent service  and product I have nothing but great things to say about entripys service and product What tops it off is what they do for the community The  torontostrong t shirts for supporting the Toronto community after the tragedy was amazing A great company can have excellent service and products But an outstanding company can have the same and make an impact in the community This is what puts entripy above the rest I highly reccomend Entripy for any apparel

Name: A162
Content: Another great experience with Entripy I ordered our Tournment merchadise through Entripy The Sales Representative was great to work with The merchadise turned out great The colors were just as expected and the logo designs both the screen prininting on the t shirts and the embroidery on the hats came out perfect And I received my order earlier than expected Will definately be using Entripy again And again

Name: A163
Content: I own a wedding photo and cinema company in Toronto and came across Entripys flyer in the mail I worked with Natalie from the office and she was able to show me sample items in their showroom I have placed many orders through them and always love the quality and look of their clothing I will use them for sure in the future I have also recommended them to my family and friends

Name: A164
Content: I was looking for a rush order and they were the only ones that had it  For and Extra  200 I was suppose to be done and shipped on July 31st  as per website I Paid the extra for rush and on Monday they proofed the digital copy but there were some minor changes  I called them to try to expedite 3 times in 1 day to finish the proof but it was done  til the end of Monday the 29th  I told them if I can get it before I leave on Friday  the shirts were needed on a Friday  to make the ferry I also said that if I cant be done  I dont want it anymore  cause I wouldnt make the event at that time the scheduled completion date was Aug 1st Thursday I paid for the UPS saver shipping  the fastest they had  arrived after I left on Friday Main thing was the Proof took 3h 5h  per minor adjustment  minor as in adjust the size of the logo by a bit

Name: A165
Content:
We have been using Entripy for a number of years now for many of our T shirt and hoody needs Our rep Kiran has always been great to deal with and is huge reason we continue to work with Entripy for our school designs 
Entripy are always responsive with short turnaround on their digital proofs so I know exactly what the end product will look like Excellent quality  price and customer service The Michener Institute

Name: A166
Content: Jas and his team are great to work with They try hard to meet the needs of their clients I often have a modest budget to work with and we always find a product to fit my needs and price point The staff Kim et al are helpful and efficient  friendly and easy to work with The end product is always great and the process to get to it is smooth Thanks for the help on our last order I look forward to working with you again

Name: A167
Content: I ordered some promotional t shirts and chose the digital printing option When they arrived  I was disappointed to see that the printing was more like a heavy plastic transfer than a print directly on the shirt I have had shirts digitally printed in the past by CafePress and VistaPrint  and they both came out nicely  with the ink directly on the fabric  so that you cannot feel the design and the shirts drape nicely  With the heavy plastic design  the shirts did not drape naturally  and the design area wrinkled in an ugly folded kind of way Also  my design had been given a white outline around all parts  which made it look different than I had intended I requested a reprint on a heavier t shirt  hoping that the difference in thickness between the fabric and transfer would be less noticeable  or if that wasnt possible  a refund Entripy replied that they did not give refunds on customized clothing  and that a digital print on a heavier shirt would be the same as the ones I had received Their suggested solution? That I order a new set of shirts  silk screened  at a one time 15 discount off of that order Apparently their way of making amends to an unsatisfied customer is to try to sell them more product I let them know that this was unacceptable  and have yet to hear back from them 9 days later Seems their new tactic is to ignore me I cannot in any way recommend this company to anyone Next time I will go with VistaPrint  Ive also used VistaPrint for printing business cards  postcards  etc  and when I ran into problems a few times  they simply reprinted my order correctly in a timely fashion at no charge  with no hoops to jump through

Name: A168
Content: Horrible job  poor quality NEVER ready when promised Wasted my time driving hours away twice They havent managed to get the order correct no matter how many back and forths we have done We gave them exact measurements multiple times and the second batch was missing items and items arrived burned by the press This has been a waste of 5 plus weeks plus putting our business very far behind Unreliable and poor quality I wanted to invest in local but this isnt the right place to get it done correctly

Name: A169
Content: Placed an order for 45 shirts Simple  2 colour design Over a dozen of the shirts were printed crooked or off centre Printer lines visible on some other shirts And the first shirt I washed cold water  hang dried faded and looked like it was 6 months old in one day Ive purchased shirts from dudes working out of their basement that look better than these Very disappointed and will be taking future business elsewhere

Name: A170
Content: Dealt with them more than a few times While their prices can be higher than some other places  communication is good Dont expect small shop help  everything costs at Entripy Would def use them again for largers tshirt orders

Name: A171
Content: I have finally found a uniform company that provides exceptional service  great product selection  great prices and best of all  quick turnaround I highly recommend Entripy  no matter how many or few items you need  Entripy is the place to order from

Name: A172
Content: Ordered a jacket online to surprise my husband with a branded piece of merchandise for a company he has started Process was simple  easy and efficient The jacket looked awesome and he was super happy

Name: A173
Content: Would never order from this place again We ordered team hoodies and they forced us to change the colours and designs several times because they ran out of supplies They rarely responded to our emails and we had to hunt them down to get our sweaters done The season ended before we even got the final product

Name: A174
Content: Terrible quality of printing The lettering is so faded you think its ten years old and been in the washer and dryer 1000 times on high heat

Name: A175
Content: I was in a pinch to buy a bunch of shirts for a summer camp and I was thankful for their two rush options Really easy process and really easy to work with Sujeet was the first person I contacted and clearly explained the process Everything worked out and the shirts were great Thank you

Content: I have contacted Entripy for both personal and business use The customer service was phenomenal every time They respond quickly with accurate information and the turnaround time for products was short I would definitely use them again

Content: Great website and easy to use custom design feature Prices are great  service is quick and shipping is fairly priced The reason I gave 4/5 is because very small details  like fine lines  do not print well

Content: When we needed a supplier to help us put together school supplies for underserved kids in our region  Entripy was our first call Entripy stepped up immediately and enthusiastically and provided us with quality backpacks at a great price and with quick turnaround time Now 100 kids in Peel Region have back to school supplies and we have Entripy to thank

Content: All in all  a good experience Some mistakes on my end and some oversight on their end when this didnt completely implement my documented change requests the first time but got it correct the 2nd request T Shirts are great  The website was a bit misleading with older details still on the page with newer updates the whole page needs to be updated to reflect an adjusted order Change of personalizations

Name: A201
Content: We are a very small business that is trying to re brand and expand our customer base  so improving our image in direct interactions with customers is important to us We decided to get some embroidered shirts for use at conferences and trade shows  and ultimately chose Entripy for the variety and quality of the garments they offered The website was very easy to use  and after placing our order we were contacted promptly by a representative who converted our logo image to embroidery including making some colour changes to ensure that certain elements stood out better on different coloured shirts and provided proofs We are pleased to say that the finished product is exactly as shown in the proofs  and the quality of the garments and embroidery is excellent  especially for the price we paid We are very pleased and will certainly use Entripy again as we continue to grow our business

Content: I was given a volunteer job to do which I thought may end up with 25 shirts being ordered It ended up to be 200 t shirts and hoodies I looked on websites to find a supplier to do this order and chose Entripy Firstly because it was a Canadian Company  and was in Oakville  Ontario My connection with Entripy from the start was amazing We started with the logo  then the number of pieces  then the pricing  the colours the order input by Entripy  my approval  then the shipping of the product All this went very smoothly considering it was a first time for me doing this They were so very patient with me and what I was trying to do When the product was received it exceeded my expectations There has been so much great feedback on the quality of the product and the placement and boldness of our logo I would definitely recommend Entripy to anyone who is looking for good service and quality product

Content: I went into the shop to make sure this is legit after seeing some bad reviews I spoke with the owner Greg who seemed like a nice guy so I took a chance on them and ordered 50 T Shirts for my company  Also  the prices were not inflated like other places I called One I placed the order and paid  Greg came back with a suggestion for a different colored red which I said ok too and I am glad I did because the shirts look great  better than what initially expected They delivered everything within less than 10 days which is what they promised Thanks alot to all the guys at E Tshirts  I am really happy with my company shirts  you did great job and really came through for me on the short timeline

Content: During my online ordering  I completely blundered So  I linked with the sales staff who speedily fixed the errors I made This order for both my son and myself was very extraordinary The team emailed me with a quick response confirming all was in place I got happy that you would help me and work on my purchase How could I not possibly be more contented with the service and following product? My order for the custom design hood for my son and my tshirts was perfect I got precisely satisfied with the quality of the fabric and the designs Gregs team handles customers with high esteem And also facilitating the finishing point of the buying This was just my best and greatly valued order for someone beginning out in online business As always all the time dependable  competent  and professional Kudos to the Distinct service  unmatched charges  and the quick delivery I Would without a doubt purchase another time

Content: whatever honest review me or you leaves here is gonna be covered by a nice comment from the owner defending his janky services my friend ordered hats & it took over a month for him to get news on the order and around another month for him to receive an incomplete order he told him it would take around 12 days he basically took his order and told him they would start it next but then proceeded to do an order of 300 hats for someone else he didnt hold his word it might of only been a verbal agreement but  playing with your customers like this cannot go unnoticed the lack of professionalism was never acknowledged & a discount wouldve been considered good customer service but  the owner clearly doesnt care all that much about his customers i was a client myself multiple times over the years to print t shirts with DTG and  i had issues with them everytime

Name: A301
Content: Hey there This is my favourite company so far I have been ordering t shirts from this company for a month now and they have never made any bad delivery Their deliveries are always on time Their fabric is also of best quality and this makes their t shirts comfortable They also offer good and relevant suggestions on designs making shopping fun and easier A fee weeks ago  I introduced my friend to this site and she loved this site so much She just called me today to tell me that she had ordered eight t shirts which she is planning to wear them when she joins campus Etshirt is such a great company which everyone should know about If you know anyone who needs t shirts of any design just tell them of Etshirt  I promise you that he or she will not regret the decision of shopping here

Content: I love Etshirt store They are the best Right after I discovered this store  I ordered one T shirt every couple of days I have a collection of T shirts with my favorite memes thanks to this store Every time I find some new meme I send them an e mail and after 4 8 business days I get a new T shirt The Digital Printing is amazing  its astonishing how great it looks I also use Etshirt store to order hats that match my T shirt Whenever I meet with friends they always notice my apparel  it cant be missed I like to express myself through printed T shirts and hats  its a lot of fun I think everyone should try it  its a nice conversation starter It shows who you are as a person  what you like  and what is your sense of humor   it allows to meet people that fit into your world I am very happy that I discovered Etshirt store  maybe I will become the customer of the year D

Content: Etshirt thanks for making my day You guys are the bomb I ordered 24 custom made hats for me and my friends to rock to church and etshirt did way more than I expected Their delivery and payment method was so less stressful and wonderful I got exactly what I wanted at a fair price The quality was something I had never seen before With the price being cheap and affordable  I expected hats of probably a lesser quality But honestly what I got really exceeded my imagination and I was really happy When I delivered that of my friends to them  they were all speechless and decided that we need to order more as soon as possible These hats are the best anyone could ever have Etshirt thanks for making me add this beautiful hat to my collection It was an amazing experience and I look forward to contacting you guys again

Content: My journey with Etshirt store began with a phone order  which was very convenient for me I always liked to make orders with a phone  someone asks you questions and writes down all the necessary information Then  I just e mailed the pictures I wanted on my T shirts  and the order was complete I paid for expediting the process  and I got my T shirts in 3 days I needed the T shirts fast because of an upcoming event  so I was grateful for the rush option What also made me happy  was that I was able to choose my favorite T shirt brand  Etshirt store has a variety of brands to choose from Before making the purchase  I checked that the firm exists since 2004  which made me think that the order will be handled without any problems  as the firm exists for a long time Thats what exactly happened  and what made me write this review I will be definitely coming back to Etshirt store

Name: A309
Content: Wanted to buy a Birthday Present for my wife I wanted to present her something unique so i looked into their web page and was really enthralled with their DTG printing so I booked an order of a casual T shirt having a bunny printed on it It was my first experience with ET shirts I was curious but at the sometime was quite worried that what if it all turns out to be a bad experience But fortunately Im really glad to share my experience with you guys Firstly and most importantly Fiber quality is amazing it have this smoothie fabric feeling plus with an amazing color and then not to forget their remarkable expertise on Direct to Garment printing is amazing They have these totally cool designs with them Most importantly I was worried about how this bunny would look but it turns out to be pretty amazing experience as it looked so real and cool  Im highly impressed with their Printing skills The best thing about their garments are that they are selling it on much cheaper rates which are totally affordable  their delivery was on time Plus they dont charge you any extra cash Cant stop myself from ordering another ET shirts I really want to thank you guys as you made my day really special Thanks

Content: I saw some group perform in such fashioned tees while on one of the stops on my last tour to Montreal The printed message was clear and got me beyond words Such an excellent performance with well designed outfits I had to think on how to have similar t shirts as soon as I saw it I quickly searched for the store to place an order and I found it beautiful I described what I wanted At first I thought the logo wont come out as expected The delivery was made quick And Yay the colors were brilliant and clear to attract attention and good wishes The logo was large enough  and clear  placed exactly in the front middle I got more in high spirits to have the t shirt to remember the trip Thank God to the only moment I got honored to watch the band perform Etshirt is among my best tees shop and purchasing with them is the finest thing The colors are great for anyone to wear The t shirts have amazing designs and high quality The prices are well worth considering the cost  you need to buy here The quick arrival and understanding my needs Whats not to like?

Content: In our high school in Montreal  we have different types of people As a group of 7 close friends  we wanted to distinguish ourselves from the rest of the school We had many different ideas  but one stuck with us and we executed it The idea was to buy custom made T shirts   thats why we found Etshirt store At first  we tried out one pattern with Digital Printing After seeing that the product was nice and we got exactly what we paid for  we started making orders every other week We always order a similar message on our T shirts  but in a different setting  different style or form That way we look different  but we are connected I am thankful to the Etshirt store for enabling us to do that And its awesome that a customer can speed up the process paying a little extra  and get his original T shirt in up to four business days When an unexpected party appears on the horizon  you definitely want to use that option

Content: Good Work  Fast Response times  awsesome product User friendly web site which offered me a ton of options That is key for me because I am not very tech aware  User experience was step by step  easy to understand The use of the grid on the shirt when I got to the design stage made it so easy to know that I designed is what I was going to get Thank you Great experience from start to finish BEST SERVICE IVE EVER HAD Im stunned  the customer service that I was given by the team at etshirt was like no other There were issues on the arrival time of my product  and I was given calls daily  personally called by the manager apologizing just to make sure I was happy and okay with everything Above and beyond any service Ive ever had Will be buying from them again  the quality is very good and crazy fast shipping 10/10

Content:

Content: Etshirts thanks for always making me stand out This would be my second purchase and you guys have never failed to deliver You all are so amazing; your t shirts are of the best quality and are always unique I recently had a birthday party to attend with my best friend and we really wanted to wear matching t shirts I told her about etshirts and after going through the website she agreed to us ordering and insisted she did the shopping herself It was really amazing how cool the customer service was  they responded to her every queries with so much patience and politeness Honestly you all just won an extra shopper for life Our t shirts arrived 1day before the due date and I must say I got exactly what I ordered The colors were matching  the sizes perfect Etshirts gives you exactly what you see Thanks a lot It was a wonderful experience

Content: I decided to post my experience here with etshirt because it was indeed a great one and I look forward to purchasing more items from them I have always known about the website but never used them until last week and I must confess it was the best online deal I have ever done  and I regret not trying them sooner I needed a creative and flashy outfit for my music band  and I wanted something affordable and of great quality After much thinking  I decided to search through etshirt website  and I saw spectacular designs that appealed a lot to me I ordered for exactly 50 pieces and in different sizes And everything was processed smoothly and on time as well Three days after my package arrived  and it was exactly as I ordered  all the sizes perfect for each band member Thanks etshirt for not disappointing

Content: I personally recommend Etshirts to anyone who intends to order custom shirts for your brand I just got my custom shirts for I and my fiance from etshirts I was amazed at how fast they were able to print the shirts and send them across to me in less than 3 days I read about etshirts on the internet  saw the reviews  and then thought to myself that this people must really do professional jobs Truly  looking at the 2 custom t shirts I got for me and my fiancae  I love the professional touch they put into the design and graphics  as well as the quality of the shirt The quality is so good that i can say that the cost I paid my shirt was cheap  compared to the high quality I got Etshirts is just the best in terms of price and quality

Name: A341
Content: My first encounter with the Etshirt store was in an urgent matter I had to buy a T shirt for an office party The date of the party was coming up soon  so I rushed the delivery  and got the T shirt in 2 days The T shirt was a hit  everyone loved it  my co workers still reminisce about the printed image  Etshirt offers a plethora of t shirt brands to choose from  which allowed me to pick my favorite one   Nike On the Etshirt website  you can order a t shirt by phone  by e mail  or you can use a Creator Tool to specify what you have in mind the tool is very helpful At work  we ordered a funny poster from Etshirt It came in vivid colors  and looks exactly as we wanted It makes us smile every time we look at it It became a business card for our team at our firm We will probably order another one soon For our co workers birthday  we ordered a T shirt with his favorite scene from Star Wars He liked the idea of Digital Printing so much  that he became a regular customer at Etshirt I recommend all of you to have a little fun and print customized T shirts at Etshirt

Content: I recently started operating a small hotel and we then had the need to get our towels  duvets  face towels and souvenir shirts branded in our hotels name and logo I searched for the best company to handle the contract The order we had was so much 150 duvets  1500 shirts  150 blankets and 600 towels and face towels  that we could not afford to have just anybody do the job for us We got in contact with etshirts in Montreal  placed our order We initially thought they would take long  like 3 weeks or more because of the quantity of the job  but in 10 days they delivered my job I was so impressed that I had to inquire into the company  and found out that they had great staffing and operated on an industrial scale That was why they delivered my package on time and also at a very cheap price

Content: Etshirt  I just wanted to say a big THANK YOU you have made me very happy on my wedding anniversary The order that I placed with you arrived quicker than I expected and the clothes fitted like a glove I will definitely be shopping with you again and shall be telling all of my curvy friends about you Etshirt range of clothes is excellent and fab value for money no more blood sweat and tears on the high street

Content: I am encouraging everyone to use this website Etshirt has alot of offers which anyone can enjoy Their interface is also easy to use and user friendly Their customer care is very responsive and helpfull They give maximum support to clients I received my t shirt today in the best condition Their t shirts are of great fabric and they dont fade during washing hence you can wash the t shirt many times and wear it and it will still look as good as new Try Etshirt today It is the best t shirt company ever

Content: I wear a suit to work every day As you can imagine  after a couple of months of wearing similar clothes to work every day it became mundane Thats why I started searching for printed T shirts  and eventually  I found Etshirt store I wanted not only a change of clothes after work  but I wanted to become an individual  different from others I wanted to be able to put on an outfit that would distinguish me from the herd My wish was to be recognized for my sense of humor  my favorite quotes  and admired TV show characters I was able to achieve all of the above thanks to Etshirt store Screen printing  embroidery  and digital printing   I have used all of the services available and I was pleased with the delivered attire I would definitely recommend Etshirt store as it enables a person to become recognizable Its always fun to walk through the streets and show who you are just by the way you are dressed That was exactly what I needed after many hours a week of being dressed like everyone else at my job;

Name: A348
Content: I run a small firm in Quebec  theres thirty of us We work in the accounting business As you can imagine  we spend most of our time in front of a computer Etshirt store was the answer to our monotony at the office I began to order T shirts for the whole company every month Every employee can decide what will be on their T shirt  and we have casual Fridays so that wearing this T shirt would be possible at work Those T shirts are supposed to loosen up our workers and boost morale It allows our workers to express themselves and show something intimate about their lives to their peers I am very happy that I discovered Etshirt store  the T shirts made us smile many times We have a tradition now  that every time someone has a birthday  the firm buys this person a T shirt  and their team chooses what on that T shirt will be printed The printed image/slogan has to be about what the team values about that co worker because we practice gratitude at our firm  I wanted to thank Etshirt store for enabling us to do that

Content: Hey everyone I really am so happy today  my coffee shop was just launched today with the custom order coffee mugs I purchased from etshirt One thing I must say is that this company deals with almost everything there is and they are the best After series of disappointed by so many online companies who couldnt deliver the exact specifications I needed  etshirts came to the rescue in the twinkle of an eye Etshirts is actually the best bet anyone could have I came across their website by chance; I needed an alternative solution as soon as possible After thorough search I landed on their site and it was really like a divine breakthrough At a point I was confused on what to pick  lol  after I made a choice then the customer support put me through the whole payment process and I got my package two days later  and exactly what I ordered

Content: I play in a band  we are based in Toronto We used Etshirt store for the first time a couple of years ago   we bought T shirts for one of our concerts We liked it some much that it became a standard for us to print different T shirts for every concert Those T shirts enabled us to send a message  while we were playing  about what we thought of current events that were happening in our industry and our genre of music We became recognizable because of our opinionated T shirts Our band would like to thank Etshirt for enabling us to express ourselves  and for being so quick with the delivery sometimes we had a new idea for a T shirt shortly before a concert  and Etshirt store always came through   we used the rush option for speedy delivery  Placing orders at Etshirt store became part of our routine There was no concert where we wouldnt have new T shirts We love the possibility to express what is on our mind with a short line  a brief T shirt communiqu that everyone will understand

Name: A446
Content: There are a lot of artisan brands that print on tops  caps  hoodies  tote bags and all of that  but when you talk of ETshirt you are talking about a whole different brand entirely with qualities that stand out and maybe is the sole reason why customers like me patronize ETshirt and will continue to patronize for years to come Their methods of printing that uses DTG printing  sublimation and embroidery stands out and stands the test of time which makes me wonder why the prices are so low and affordable for work that good  I mean  3 19 for printing on a plain white shirt is the cheapest Ive ever seen and probably the cheapest we may ever get to see So which begs your question why do I want the rest of the world to patronize the ETshirt brand? Simple  because I feel good work must always be appreciated

Name: A558
Content: Our community organization Center Multi ressources de Lachine had a bad experience We had ordered promotional T shirts and jackets for an event Lots of unreturned emails  unanswered voicemails and calls The validated order was finally canceled by the company at the last moment We had left a first comment  under the account of one of our employees A representative of the company went to our offices  indicating that he wanted to meet the employee without informing us in advance of his arrival We wonder how this representative found the employees work address Our management received the representative He asked that the employee withdraw the comment but was in favor of leaving a comment on behalf of the organization The representative asked that they be given a chance for future collaboration As requested  we removed the first comment in the name of the employee and we reiterate our disappointment  given that we asked her to identify herself the representative did not have a business card and when we asked for explanations about the order  he told us that the manager of ETshirt  on the move in Italy  could not receive either the internet or the telephone In short  it seemed complicated It is for this reason  dear Mathieu from ETshirt  that our relationship is not a guarantee of quality Thus we leave the comment on behalf of the organization

Content:
I purchased my first custom t shirt from FBT last week and Im very happy with the result the design and overall look is precisely what I expected As a result  Ill definitely be back 

My only suggestion is for FBT to consider using shirts that are  say  80 percent cotton / 20 percent polyester That mix is less prone to shrinkage than 100 percent cotton and may also result in somewhat less colour fading for dark coloured shirts  especially black shirts

Name: A821
Content:
TLDR version stop reading this review and go to the store to get your tshirt made by this team No negatives

Full review had an order come in from a supplier on Amazon for a one off custom t shirt It was a grey shirt with black block letters; pretty easy ask When it arrived  a couple letters were randomly missing in the string of text and one letter was also damaged  and not fully printed 

Went into the store and 1 amazing customer service  including great conversation 2 they saw the issue and under 5 minutes had the solution and already printed onto the t shirt they have customer facing monitors so you can see them doodling up your request; was a great feature 3 smiling customer

I have had bulk orders made or other custom jobs in the past This was the cleanest  easiest  and best experience hands down 

conclusion I may need to figure out how to need more custom t shirts made just to go back and watch a fully vetted shop work from beginning to end
Type: Freshly Baked Tees Custom Printed Tshirts

Name: A928
Content:
I started getting shirts made when Joe first opened the Yonge and Maitland location So  when I joined the Collective of my softball league and we were looking to get shirts made for our members  I thought of Joe almost immediately 

After meeting with Joe  I realised that asking him to print the shirts was the right decision That was last season And  this season we asked Joe to print our shirts again In fact  there is no reason for us to use another printer as long as Joe is in business 

No matter if I am asking Joe and his staff to do a personal order or one for the league  they are always courteous and friendly And  Joe was helpful when choosing the right shirts for our members They are unbelievably quick especially with large orders and their prices are more than reasonable And  our members love the shirts They are soft and lightweight  which is perfect for playing softball on a hot summer afternoon 

When I need to get a shirt printed  its easy for me because there is no decision to make I just go to Joe
Type: Freshly Baked Tees Custom Printed Tshirts

Name: A966
Content:
Original rating 3 stars  Easy to work with them and quick service Note that online prices are lower than in store If I were to order again I would do the following  request that all t shirts are the same exact style and that they are all printed on the same printer In my order of 18 shirts I received three different versions of the womens shirts  one not particularly high quality and slightly different sizing Half of the shirts were bright  glossy colours and the other half were like faded concert tees Since I was ordering for specific people that wouldnt be comparing shirts this was acceptable for me but it was wasnt ideal These two issues were not annoying enough to ask for reprints Given that Freshly Baked Tees were the cheapest custom tees I could find and they met the deadline I would consider ordering from them again but I would be more specific in any future orders Also note that the sizes fit VERY small  make sure you review the measurements provided 
Updated to 2 stars  worked with them again Dec 2022 Very frustrating experience They lost my order and wouldnt help me when I dropped off my shirts to be printed learned my lesson from last time and bought my own shirts  They are very polite people and nice but organization is not their strong suit I did another order at T Shirt Guys and they were amazing
Type: Freshly Baked Tees Custom Printed Tshirts

Name: A967
Content: We had a memorable and outstanding customer service experience with everyone at Fresh Baked Tees Tom at the Yonge Street store explained the process Then we went to the Queen Street store which was conveniently located on Queen West just east of Portland Sean was kind  patient  helpful and excellent at putting together exactly what we wanted He translated our vision onto the T shirt and was committed to delivering a high quality product He kept checking with us at every step of the process that we understood and that we were satisfied with the final product He did a terrific job This company really believes in making the customer happy and delivering a customized product The T shirt is the best quality as is the production of the image The silk screening is topnotch Thank you We will definitely be returning for more T shirts
Type: Freshly Baked Tees Custom Printed Tshirts

Name: A968
Content: Freshly Baked Tees did a great job with a photo transfer on a T  especially advising me not to choose a color T shirt as it might not give me the best result Thanks for that and I highly recommend
Type: Freshly Baked Tees Custom Printed Tshirts

Name: A969
Content: This is a super fun idea for families For next level get togethers Hockey games  races A great way to cheer on The service was polite  quick and very helpful We will definitely order again
Type: Freshly Baked Tees Custom Printed Tshirts

Name: A970
Content:
Dyslexia BC has used GetBold a few times now to print some of our T Shirts with our Tortoise & Hare Logo Get Bold and the customer service from Andrew Cairns were amazing
The service was fast  helpful and patient We needed to talk on the phone a lot; some of the other printing companies in Vancouver do not want to spend any time on the phone explaining things Thank you Andrew for such great service

Name: A971
Content: Getbold is our go to for embroidery Great prices  amazing results  and phenomenal customer service , Kaiya is so quick to reply to our embroidery request every single time

Name: A972
Content: Our shop has ordered from GetBold on many occasions now They are always fast  efficient and deliver product that is exactly the quality advertised Ive yet to have any issues ordering  and they are always speedy to send updates and proofs I will absolutely be ordering from them again

Name: A973
Content: This is our third order with GetBold  and we are always super happy with the excellent customer service from Corby He was happy to show sample products prior to order and was always prompt to deal with my many questions The delivered t shirts were high quality and really competitively priced Would highly recommend

Name: A974
Content:
This is by far the most extensive tshirt printing company available in the lower mainland and definitely North Vancouver Their staff members are pleasant to deal with  competent and readily available Their willingness to provide me with swift image file modifications  suggestions  and concise estimates without any hesitance made the tshirt printing company process easy and less of a headache I expected Their website is well optimized  with extensive content that thoroughly lists their products available  and gives you options to customize and generate your own estimates which I found very convenient I appreciate all the work theyve done and give them a bonus star for getting my project done a week ahead of schedule In terms of quality these guys deliver 
Big thanks to Andrew for taking lead on my project and his patience with me Pricing was very reasonable and transparent

Name: A975
Content: Get Bold was super helpful and efficient in helping our NGO create t shirts for our international team They were available to chat online which was a wonderful way to help me through the process of selecting our merchandise and customizing it Thank you for your great work

Name: A976
Content: GetBold has been helping our company with promo merch for years and the service cant be beat Fast service  easy to use website and super helpful live chat options are my favourite things about working with them Lots of options for product depending on your price point

Name: A977
Content: Excellent detail  order was done perfect and the wait time was minimal Cant Recommend another march shop Ronnie is fast and efficient

Name: A978
Content: GetBold was absolutely fantastic to work with I am so happy with how this unfolded from beginning to today when we got them and cant wait for 2 weeks from now when we give them to staff & students They were so quick to respond  so helpful  & completely understood our vision Order to delivery of 450 custom designed shirts was 3 weeks They are a nice fabric and the print is super clear Very  very happy and will order with them again

Name: A979
Content:
I have nothing but good things to say about GetBold All of the staff  especially Andrew  have been fantastic to work with Communication has been prompt  they have been patient with my sometimes constant questions and changes  and they have gone above and beyond with a couple of special requests They have been early on every timeline and the quality of product is exactly what we hoped for 

We plan to continue to use GetBold for all of our apparel needs in the future and will recommend them to other chapters within our charity organization Our experience has been exceptional

Name: A980
Content: The Customer Service was amazing They walked me through the whole process The prices were also more than reasonable I would reccomend this company to anyone

Name: A981
Content: GetBold was super easy to work with Phone and email communications were quick  team members were super helpful  and ordering was a breeze  plus a crazy fast turnaround time My order looks amazing and Ill definitely be using them again next time I need screen printing Would definitely recommend

Name: A982
Content: Fantastic service and merchandise From start to finish my experience with the GetBold team was both professional and friendly Making class sweatshirts  they helped with the design process & provided an easy to use online store Our final product was delivered ahead of schedule & individually labeled I had many questions & adjustments during my ordering process and was always treated with patience & in a very timely manner Highly recommend

Name: A983
Content: We ordered shirts for our kids leaders and they turned out even better than I hoped The quality is amazing The price is great and the process  communication and service was wonderful I highly recommend

Content: As newbie to the process of ordering embroidered garments  the staff at GetBold were most helpful and courteous Andrew particularly held our hands through the process and completed the project in record time Thank you so much GetBold

Name: A985
Content: Yknow what  this my second order with GetBold The service is good meaning they have good and quick communication via phone/email and friendly They have a good turn around time and are honest Their turn around time is accurate and I am happy with the quality of their work I would recommend these guys to everyone They also offer shipping which is a huge plus

Content: DRC Mechanical Ltd have been using GetBold for 5 years now  we have purchased t shirts  sweaters  fleece jackets and now hats We have used them for both embroidered and printed artwork  and never had any issues Service is always fast and the garments are great quality We still highly recommend these guys

Name: A987
Content: We really appreciate the work of GetBold put in on our jerseys The players love them and we always get compliments on how they look I am very satisfied with my purchase But I have to say the choices of jerseys are so limited I think I would prefer Fcustom  they are professional jersey manufacturers

Content: This is our third order with Get Bold and have been very satisfied with the service and quality of the product thank you to our representative Corby Holmes

Name: A989
Content: Niko of GetBold did a great job in the Tshirt design & printing very professionally done Order came on time to meet our distribution of shirts to church members Well have a repeat order in the days ahead Highly recommendable Blessings to GetBold

Name: A990
Content: Incredible service We had a last minute rush order and they went above and beyond to fulfil our order Our event will definitely continue doing business with them 10/10 will order again

Name: A991
Content: GetBold were so easy to deal with  from getting a quote to tweaking our design and placing the order They turned our order around so much quicker than anticipated as well We picked up our shirts today and they look awesome The printing is super crisp  couldnt be happier

Name: A992
Content:
During a time where it has become more and more challenging to get orders filled swiftly with consistent quality  great prices  quick turn around and as a smaller business; the opportunity to have minimal orders I was absolutely blown away from start to finish with how well these guys fulfilled our order s  i spent the day putting out requests across BC and Get Bold knocked everyone else out of the water with their quote 
I will be sharing this gem with many
Thanks guys for keeping it real for smaller business trying to make it out there And more so thank you for staying true to your word and remaining transparent
WELL DONE

Name: A993
Content: Have used GetBold a few times for my business and they have always been an absolute pleasure to deal with Fast and efficient  the designers get back to me super quick and the product arrives just as it should Amazing quality  pricing  customer service and overall experience They are my forever merch peoples

Name: A994
Content: GetBold did an awesome job with printing our company logo on face masks We wanted to get the different shades of green reflected on the logo  and I must say I am very impressed with the result The process overall was very quick Rob called me 15 minutes after I placed my request to finalize the details I can highly recommend GetBold

Name: A995
Content: Kaiya was my sales person and TOTALLY helpful I was going back and forth with my design  her patience and expertise was TOP notch I will totally be ordering more merch from GetBold

Name: A996
Content: Hands down great service Big Thank you to Kaiya for all her help with our large order placement Very clear instructions on the website with very competitive prices Everything turned out great

Name: A997
Content: Get Bold is Good Guy Supplys go to for the best merchandise  the best customer service and the most up to date processes We have manufactured literal thousands of garments  hats and other goods with them and they never disappoint Fast turn arounds and excellent service Thank you Get Bold for being a company we can always count on

Name: A998
Content: Excellent Customer Service from Corby Holmes from start to finish He was very prompt in responding to enquiries and dealing with requests He was also early on the expected delivery date Competitively priced too Would highly recommend

Name: A999
Content: Rob and Kaiya were so easy to work with  and were extremely quick to help us with our order I wanted to come in and take a look at the products before we made our order  and they were very accommodating Great prices  fast production  and super nice people Appreciate you guys a ton

Name: A1000
Content: So many companies doing similar work  but I chose Get Bold for their extremely quick response time and courteous service Rob answered all my questions I had a lot and made the process easy Original mock ups and all the edits were also done very quickly within hours in my case  and the job was completed as projected Ill be a returning customer for sure

Name: A1001
Content: We have used GET BOLD to supply t shirts for our Plumbing & Heating company for over 5 years now They have our design on file and know what we want You will not find a company with who can provide a better customer service than these guys Highly recommend using GET BOLD

Name: A1002
Content: After a recommendation from their production team to use a different style hat  we picked up our team hats ahead of schedule today So stoked to wear these this weekend Great price  solid product Thanks GetBold  will use again

Name: A1003
Content: Excellent customer service  prompt responses  and easy to order This is the place for schools to order their apparel from Thank you so much for your help  Kaiya

Name: A1004
Content: We love GetBold They offer quality products and provide them on time with fast and competitive quotes Customer service is A++ Why would I would go anywhere else?

Name: A1005
Content: I run a small landscape company and have placed orders the past two seasons Ive been extremely impressed with how easy the process has been both times Their website is fantastic and allows you to do a number of quotes to find the best fit for your budget and needs The shirts  and hoodies came out very clean The embroidered hats were awesome Will continue to use them for future company workwear needs

Name: A1006
Content: I dealt with Andrew  EXTREMELY helpful  always got back very quickly with my million questions  even offered suggestions and new designs for my items Very well priced  and turn around time was wayyyyyy faster than I expected If I ever need to place another order  I would 100 use Getbold again

Name: A1007
Content: Had a great experience with Get Bold Rob was very helpful and delivered great customer service The product was made and delivered very quickly I will definitely be using Get Bold again for my next custom order

Name: A1008
Content: Just got 50 t shirts printed here The customer service is top notch and the prints were high quality

Name: A1009
Content: Ive gone with GetBOLD twice now for merch ordering Im a musician and theyve been incredible to work with Timely  professional  amazing quality garments and the rates are always fair The  no shipping fee is an added bonus that means a lot to indie business owners like me If you need awesome merch at great prices with no nonsense then these are your dudes

Name: A1010
Content:
We love working with Get Bold Rob and the team are great and help us bring our designs to reality The quality of product and service is unmatched We love supporting a local business too 

Every garment they produce becomes a tool to help promote our brand and business

Name: A1011
Content: Awesome service and excellent products My first time ordering a company t shirt and Rob walked me through the entire process  helped with suggestions on materials for my fitness company as well as logo placement  item color  modifications  etc These guys are professionals and they know what they are doing They walk you through each step I called 4 other companies prior to calling GetBold and those other companies did not help me at all just wanted my money Glad I went with GetBold Customer service matters and it backed by quality products

Name: A1012
Content: They were super accommodating to my last minute request Quick and great service Thank you

Name: A1013
Content: I had a great experience with GetBold  customer service was excellent It took only one week from the time I ordered to the time my shirts arrived at my door The end product was extremely well done and exactly what I was looking for

Name: A1014
Content: Andrew was really on top of our large  time sensitive summer camp order he headed off potential supply issues before they became a problem  kept good communication and made good suggestions with our artwork We will definitely use GetBold next summer

Name: A1015
Content:
Getbold has amazing service I recently ordered a sweater design with them for the first time  and not only did it come out cheaper than I expected/other competitors  they also responded to any questions  and the quote I had very quickly

They also did excellent work when I asked if they could match colors for me The sweaters I ordered even came way ahead of schedule  and shipped to my address within 7 days of my order 

Very quick turnaround  excellent and prompt customer service  and high quality  Ill definitely be ordering with GetBold in the near future

Name: A1016
Content: Andrew and the team at GetBold were awesome We were in a jam  and they turned around a quick screen print order for us  so that we had merch to sell at our concert when we landed in Vancouver Huge thanks to the team

Name: A1017
Content: Quick  reliable  great quality and excellent communication Rob and the team at GetBold worked quickly to get my order complete They are so good that Ive ordered from them twice

Name: A1018
Content: They were very helpful  patient and quick The t shirts turned out to be beautiful

Name: A1019
Content: The guys at GetBold are extremely responsive and helpful in regards to the questions I had about ordering and design Not only is their customer service excellent  but they were also able to print and ship my order within a week span  just in time for our event Its also great that they support the community and were generous enough to sponsor our student organizations event This is very much appreciated Overall  I am very happy with their service and product  and will definitely be ordering from them again for any custom designs

Name: A1020
Content:
I own Jays and Arrows Tattoo in Kelowna
best customer service Even on there busy season I got my product a week faster than anticipated five star all the way

Name: A1021
Content: Great  service Great product Really fast turn around and unique ball caps that get lots of compliments

Name: A1022
Content: Always a great ordering experience and so quick love to support a Canadian company

Name: A1023
Content: Andrew was so so helpful from the minute that we contacted them until the day of delivery We are very impressed with excellent customer service that we were provided They worked with our design ideas  ensured every detail was perfect and the execution time was amazing We were confident in the product we chose as we were provided samples to borrow and mull over prior to submitting our order I highly recommend this awesome local company Thanks again Andrew

Name: A1024
Content: We used GetBold to purchase custom shirts for our incredible volunteer team which just keeps growing and now we need to order more Quick  good response time and quality product choices

Name: A1025
Content: Excellent quality  amazing service Ive used Get Bold several times over the last few years for clients  but this was the first time Ive used them for my own business The run was their minimum 15 pieces and I had a tight deadline Their online customer service was great  and their phone service was great They printed and shipped to me well within my deadline  and the print quality is the best Ive seen My only slight disappointment was that I feel the shirts fit a little smaller than the sizing guide Next order I will probably choose the next size up for a lot of my selection Other than that  I couldnt recommend enough and I will most definitely be using again Thank you

Name: A1026
Content: Absolutely awesome GetBold are true professionals  they provided me with great solution for my design Whole process from order to delivery took just couple days and result was exactly what I wanted  high quality print

Name: A1027
Content: Andrew  our customer service rep  is honest  knowledgable and really helpful He responds quickly and with complete information and his recommendations are good We are happy with the products we receive and with his great customer service

Name: A1028
Content: Great quality shirts and excellent customer service Andrew is a gem and worked with me to create a design for my band and match colours Our order wasnt that big 24 shirts  so I really appreciate all the time that he and the company took to work with us The turnaround was really fast two It only took about 2 or 3 days from when I paid until they showed at my door this morning A++ would recommend again

Name: A1029
Content: Rob at GetBold was easy and pleasant to work with He was attentive to details and even printed a test run to determine what we were doing was going to work Highly Recommend GetBold

Name: A1030
Content: These guys and gals are awesome They have supplied a few uniform items for our company now Their turnaround time is so fast much faster than any other company out there Their prices are pretty unbeatable too Niko went out of his way to reach out to a supplier that they work with for hats that werent typically in stock at GetBold and we were able to receive them in less than a week with embroidery Awesome customer service These people really care

Name: A1031
Content: We had an excellent experience with our first time ordering shirts from GetBold The customer service was great  the prices are great  and the ordered is processed and shipped very quickly; we had our shirts in less than week after placing our order There was some hiccups on our design and the graphic designer that was helping us was really patient and helpful; he was really responsive to our questions and suggestions We will definitely be ordering from GetBold for our next batch of shirts

Name: A1032
Content: Fantastic service and quality products resulting in a great experience I provided Rob the idea for our special run T Shirts and in less than 1 day he had a proposed shirt with pricing provided The shirt was exactly what I was looking This is such a painless process with GetBold and the cost was very reasonable Thanks guys look forward to using you often

Name: A1033
Content:
Easy to work with  very helpful Quality of the items Ive ordered is great Fast turnover and shipping as well Will definitely continue to order from GetBold in the future 

UPDATE I cant add more stars  but I did want to add that I needed more product quickly  and these guys delivered Really happy with both the quality of the items and the customer service they offer

Name: A1034
Content: 100 Fantastic experience with GetBold printing This was the first time wed ordered band t shirts and after leafing through several websites and visiting local shops  GetBold definitely had the best rates we could find for what we wanted The process of designing and ordering the t shirts was a breeze  and after a quick and amicable chat on the phone our t shirt order was placed and the printing began What a surprise it was to receive the t shirts only two days after shipping  and the quality was top notch Weve worn and washed our t shirts several times since then and they still look as good as new Thank you so much for your service  well be sure to order from you again in the future

Name: A1035
Content: GetBold is great We recently ordered some toques for clients this winter and they turned out awesome Customer service was very quick to respond with our initial inquiry and throughout the entire process of making our order They sent us multiple design ideas and options to go with each and always answered any questions we had Very happy with the whole process and the product Thanks GetBold

Name: A1036
Content:
Exceptional service 

Twice Ive done rush orders with them and both times they followed through and even exceeded expectations The second time I had a rush order they even delivered early Communication is also prompt and clear 

If youre not familiar with the process of printing on shirts theyre more than happy to offer their knowledge and expertise Which for me  where I am largely uninformed about shirt printing I found undoubtedly valuable and appreciated 

Not only are they quick at turnarounds and offer great advice the product itself they deliver is great as well The shirts they offer for their shirts are durable but comfortable and the graphics hold up after a lot of sweat and multiple washes 

Pricing is fair and reasonable In fact our second run with only two colours was cheaper than anticipated which was a pleasant surprise 

There also is a really cute corgi in the office which is like come on dawg you gotta work with them now 

Highly recommended

Name: A1037
Content: Were so glad we found GetBold Were very happy with the quality of the prints and the quality of the service Love the fast turn around and every emails were replied almost immediately Nico were very helpful in getting my t shirts exactly as I wanted it Even when I found a manufacture defects on one of the t shirt  Rob immediately helped me to get it refunded with no hassle I will gladly go back to GetBold for my future t shirt designs Great quality  wonderful staff  highly recommended

Name: A1038
Content: Get Bold has always been fantastic to work with They go over and above to meet my unique needs and have excellent customer service Their ability to turn things around quickly has been invaluable and I am continually impressed with how they are able to take the limited/abstract direction I give them and turn it into a really great product They have excellent prices and deliver a quality product in a timely manner

Name: A1039
Content:
Awesome service  extremely efficient and theyre very good at what they do Andrew really took the time out to make sure everything worked out and kept me well updated during the process Thank you Bold  

Another update 
I only ever order with BOLD because they honestly give the best customer service and great quality with quick turnaround time Arguably the best company to go to in Vancouver for your printing needs

Name: A1040
Content:
Great communication  easy process  and fast turnaround times for a fair price Ive tried using several custom printing companies around Vancouver  and this one has been my favourite experience so far  so Ill definitely be coming back

I was looking to print on black t shirts  and I needed to change my size quantities a few times throughout the process The staff were very friendly and helpful  and the process was smoother than I could have imagined

Name: A1041
Content: For the past n years  where n  1 and < idk  the computing science student society at SFU has been ordering shirts for our annual frosh event from getBold And not once have we been disappointed The shirts from getBold are the best Super high quality fabric at ridiculously affordable and fair pricing The staff are amazing as well They reach out whenever they need clarification on things because they simply refuse to allow anyone to have a bad experience Any time I had any questions I could call or email and I would always have a response within minutes They are the best printing company Ive ever had the pleasure of working with I know for sure that the SFU CSSS will continue use getBold as our go to for all our printing needs 10/10 always recommend

Name: A1042
Content: We got our band shirts done through GetBold and we couldnt be happier with the end result Andrew Cairns gave us a bunch of different logo options to choose from and styles of shirts to put them on The hardest part was choosing between the different designs because they were all so good Once the final decision was made the shirts were shipped in record time They were here in about 3 or 4 days Theyre selling good at our shows and people are very impressed with the quality of the design and the shirts theyre printed on We will definitely work with GetBold and Andrew again for future merchandise Great product for a great price I highly recommend

Name: A1043
Content: Amazing service and quality I place a large screen print and embroidery order for the company I work for The ordering process was simple My reps Rob and Andrew were very quick to response and make my rushed deadline possible We received our product before the estimated date of shipping and our apparel felt and looked fantastic I will be using their services exclusively from now on

Name: A1044
Content: We just started a new company and Andrew at Get Bold made it really easy for us He answered emails instantly and sent mock ups and quotes right away The order came in sooner then we thought Will be ordering more staff supplies soon Thanks for the great service

Name: A1045
Content: This was our first year ordering t shirts for our summer camps GetBold did a fantastic job on the printing  beautiful rich colours Our campers and their parents were all thrilled with how the shirts looked The communication from their team was prompt and they delivered the shirt ahead of deadline Thanks everyone

Name: A1046
Content: Were nothing but satisfied with GetBold Theyre absolutely fantastic to work with  great communication  quick turnaround times  seamless processes We got embroidery work done and they turned out even better than expected  and then some You cant go wrong with GetBold We will be back for more

Name: A1047
Content: Weve been ordering shirts from Get Bold for several years and will continue to do so as we always receive such great service and are never disappointed with the product The selection they have is wonderful and the instructions for ordering make things easy Plus  everyone who works there is keen to assist with any additional speed bumps or questions you may have along the way Ive already recommended them to a friend who also manages a small business

Name: A1048
Content: They are easy to work with and get orders done fast We have used them for a lot of merch and never have any complaints Highly recommend

Name: A1049
Content:
Ive dealt with Bold Merchandise for a couple of years and use them to design and print graphics for Marketing our business I have been very happy with the service  the quality of their products  price and lead time for every order THey are easy to deal with and professional 

With their help we were able to bring our marketing concept to life and have developed a T shirt that advertises our business AND generates revenue at the same time We now have customers coming in every week just to by our T shirts helping us to dramatically reduce the net cost of our promotional products budget every year No More pens or golf balls 

Jody Bell  Osborne Propellers  North Vancouver BC

Name: A1050
Content: The very best We love all they do for us Great customer service and help

Name: A1051
Content: We have worked with GetBold for a few years now and their team has been great to work with  so accommodating  and very friendly We highly recommend them

Name: A1052
Content: Staff were excellent in helping us match the shirt type and the logo design to an existing shirt we had Service was very professional  quick  and was a great price Over 120 shirts were made and delivered when promised  and we had great communication throughout the process with the team at GetBold We look forward to ordering again in the future

Name: A1053
Content: Andrew was absolutely wonderful to work with Within the same day  he was able to get our shirt graphics and design out and I approved them and immediately he told me when they would arrive The team at getbold is super quick The shirts are comfortable and great I would definitely recommend them if anyone is looking to get some custom shirts

Name: A1054
Content: Our company has been ordering from GetBold for a number of years now but this year is my first time dealing with GetBold since I recently joined my company Ive read a lot of great reviews from other clients so my expectations were high We had a bit of a sizing issue with our initial order but the staff at GetBold was super helpful and was able to help me get what I needed in time for our event We will definitely order from them again in the future

Name: A1055
Content: I ordered a set of custom shirts for a sports team The finished product was fantastic Service was super friendly with quick and detailed replies to my email inquiries The time it took to print and mail out the shirts was surprisingly fast Also as you can seen on the website  the company offers an impressively large variety of shirt types/fit/quality My one minor criticism is that the minimum order quantity 15 units is a bit high  i would have welcomed the option of paying a bit more per shirt at a smaller quantity Overall i am very satisfied with my order and will definitely return for future custom printing

Name: A1056
Content: The kids TV show I work on has ordered from GetBold for over 4 years now The staff is super friendly and were very helpful during the process Thank you for your awesome service

Name: A1057
Content: Rob was an excellent rep Although we ordered our t shirts late into the camp season  they made an exception for us Even though the expected processing time was supposed to be three weeks  they promised to get it done in less than a week and had the order ready to be picked up within five days Would definitely recommend because of the customer service and am happy with the finished product

Name: A1058
Content: We LOVE GetBold This is our third year printing festival t shirts with them  and the quality is far superior to other companies weve used They have terrific customer service  friendly staff  and they were able to accommodate our short turnaround time Thanks again

Name: A1059
Content: This is our second time ordering from GetBold I initially called and spoke with a lady about getting a quote She was so helpful and guided me through their website in the most patient and polite way We ended up ordering some t shirts from Andrew  he was fantastic We sent in a our artwork and got proofs back the same day Very quick turn around

Name: A1060
Content: Ive dealt with a handful of printing companies  but none of them gave me the quality I needed Ive had off center designs and loose embroidery  but with GetBold I always get a perfect product and they have amazing prices Plus they have a very quick turnaround time  and free shipping My advice is to not even bother looking around for a good screen printer  just use GetBold and you wont be disappointed

Name: A1061
Content: I was referred to Get Bold my people in my social circle that also have business they needed uniforms for They come highly recommended and I know why Great Service  fast response Great Product I Recommend Get Bold for sure

Name: A1062
Content:
For my role with the Allard Law Students Society  I got in touch with GetBold to get T shirts made for one of our biggest annual events They were immediately responsive  were willing to help us make any adjustments we needed  and were extremely helpful in making sure we got our shirts as quickly as possible without any issues in quality We received nothing but compliments around the shirts and we are looking to make them our go to company for all the events we need 

Long story short  they were amazing to work with  provided fairer prices than many other companies we could find  and went above and beyond for us

Name: A1063
Content: Get BOLD has been above and beyond helpful and we have tip toed into the Merch world I had no experience with designing clothes  colours or options and Rob has been great with expert advice throughout the process People love our new clothes and what the team is able to do with an embroidery machine is next level

Name: A1064
Content:
Ordering was easy  Andrew helped us with the design 
Printed nicely  delivered in timely fashion 
Could not be happier Such a great service
Thank you all for your great work

Name: A1065
Content: We will definitely be working with GetBold again in the future I I found the website easy to use  and was able to have a quick chat online with a service member to answer questions leading up to my order After placing my order  both times that I called the office everyone was pleasant and helped me troubleshoot with patience and care Living in a remote area in Northern Canada can make ordering merchandise difficult and expensive but with GetBold it was easy Thanks to the team

Name: A1066
Content: Our experience with GetBold was fantastic We went to their onsite location to look at the products and the employee who helped us was very friendly and knew his stuff Right after the meeting  we ordered our items  and the process went very smoothly Everything looked great and we were very happy with the quality  the help we received  and the overall process We will definitely work with GetBold again

Name: A1067
Content: Working with Get Bold to produce a new line of promotional shirts and tote bags for a small business was incredibly pleasant Their website is simple  fast  efficient and every staff member I engaged with was equally fast and efficient and not to mention very sweet specifically Mia and Rob  shout out to those two  I would 100 work with this company again and again and again  they went above and beyond to deliver great products cheaply and smoothly A++

Name: A1068
Content: This is the third summer in a row that I have ordered custom shirts through GetBold I appreciate their amazing customer service  their quick replies to my emails  and their quick turn around time on a fairly complex order  5 working days WOW Ive ordered 2 different kinds of t shirts from them and both were well received by people I had tried other companies before them and always ran into difficulties I will only be ordering my custom shirts through GetBold from now on

Name: A1069
Content: Placed my order online  within 24 hours i was emailed a proof of my design We went back and forth a couple times making small changes until i was completely satisfied with the product Shipping was quick and shirts came out perfect Thanks GetBold

Name: A1070
Content: Great customer service It was my first time ordering merchandise shirts and hats for West Coast Express 69 podcast so I was completely clueless and unsure of what exactly I wanted GetBold helped me out right away They got back to me immediately with all my changes and were incredibly helpful through out the whole process  not to mention I received my whole order within a week I would definitely order again and recommend their services

Name: A1071
Content: Outstanding service I ordered several hundred items for an annual community gathering and then by popular demand ordered a re run The quality on all counts surpassed my expectations The timing and delivery of both runs was completed ahead of schedule I cant thank Ronnie Steven and the team at Get Bold enough and will be recommending their services to everyone Thanks again

Name: A1072
Content:
We needed help fast when another printing company in Vancouver Coastal Reign dropped the ball on our project and wasted our time Andrew helped us with a great design and layout within a few hours Our international project was finishing up early and time was of the essence to get 100 caps printed The hats were printed a few days early  and everyone on our project loved them

Sincere thanks guys for bailing us out

Name: A1073
Content: I have had several t shirts produced here  they respond quickly  help with design  have sent me large orders within 1 week and everything is exactly as ordered Their website is easy to navigate and super helpful to estimate costs as you add styles and shirts The ability to order different t shirt styles and companies with the same design is a huge help Would highly recommend this company

Name: A1074
Content: Weve ordered a few different shirts from Get Bold and we love them They are very accommodating and quick to lend a hand with anything that we may need They recommended 50 reduced white for a more vintage looking t shirt and we were very happy with the results We look forward to working with them again in the future

Name: A1075
Content: Excellent work guys I had 3 days to have an order of 20 t shirts filled for a client Not only did they get them done  I got them a day early including the shipping time These guys are incredible and their product is excellent I will use GetBold again no questions asked

Name: A1076
Content: Get Bold is simply the best I was recommended Get Bold by a friend that has used them for the last 5 years for printing for their Crossfit gym They raved about the quality and customer service and boy were they right I have ordered 3 separate orders from Get Bold in the last few months and I cant say enough great things about them They have been extremely great with communication  customer service and my Hoodies are amazing I tell everyone about this place and if you are looking for somewhere to have your designs printed  look no further Their range of products and expertise cannot be outdone

Name: A1077
Content: Excellent service & results We ordered wicking type shirts for Apex Marine Services Ltd  my husbands marine service business We couldnt be happier with Andrew & Get Bold design service & response time And the shirts look great We are getting compliments already

Name: A1078
Content: Great experience with GetBold Helpful customer service and straightforward ordering process T shirts arrived before our due date and were exactly what we were after Highly recommended

Name: A1079
Content:
I have always had great service and an amazing experience with Get Bold Kaiya is very accommodating and helpful when it comes to altering any design I appreciate the customer service and how quickly they respond at Get Bold

I will be ordering again

Name: A1080
Content: I absolutely love everything about this company I deal with Rob and He is always patient and accommodating with my MANY questions lol I have been back now for a few different orders and am always pleased I chose Get Bold after reading previous Google reviews and I was not disappointed Their customer service was great and product result even better Thanks so much guys Repeat customer for sure

Name: A1081
Content:
Excellent service Being my first time ever to order T Shirt printing  Chris was most helpful and order was completed as promised If I have to need T Shirt printing service in the near future  Get Bold for sure Highly recommended 

Oct 25  2018
This is my second time to order T Shirt printing and I did it online and it was done easily  same as ordering in person Rob responded and sent the layout rather fast The shirts were done on time as requested Job well done

Name: A1082
Content:
I have been using Get Bold for about four months now for a retail clothing business I created The customer service is amazing  the staff is even more amazing  the quality is beyond impeccable and I could not ever imagine going with a different printer to have my merchandise brought to life 

I place orders 1 2 times a month and will continue to go through these folks for the rest of my and their life Outstanding work

Name: A1083
Content: Get Bold has great customer service I had a lot of questions about ordering custom shirts for my UBC club They sent us a few sample shirts so we could create promotional material and then we returned them so they can be used as part of our order They went above and beyond They communicated effectively by clearly explaining how the process works

Name: A1084
Content:
Fantastic
I made an error and thought I had the shirts I needed Unfortunately that wasnt the case I was promised my 400 shirts by Wednesday and received them on Monday  2 whole days early I was impressed  very impressed 
GetBold has a well organized showroom which allowed me to get new ideas for future printing that I would like to do with them 
I print shirts for both customers and staff and have always had positive experiences with GetBold I will continue to bring my business here  especially as they provide quick service when I make a mistake

Name: A1085
Content:
I have been working with Joey for the past week on two separate t shirt orders He has been extremely responsive  upbeat  happy  quick and pleasant to deal with We were able to get through the whole process of design  selection  ordering and receiving the shirts in a minimal amount of time Your company prices are very competitive but it is the service which really differentiates you 

Thanks to everyone at Bold Merchandise for putting together our shirts

Name: A1086
