Content: Ive been dealing with these guys for years Always excellent service always quick turnaround Great prices too and quality shirts They also did some graphic design work for my company which was excellent and very affordable Definitely recommended five stars

Name: A1087
Content: A Repeat Customer This is my third experience with Get Bold As usual they were extremely efficient from getting my mock ups  making changes multiple times all the way to fulfilling the order The products came as expected and were processed very quickly Upon pick up they brought my order out to the car Overall a 5 star experience again with Get Bold Highly recommend

Name: A1088
Content: I believe this is the 4th time I have ordered from Getbold and I have been happy Everytime Kaiya is very helpful with quotes and general communication about any orders I have had

Name: A1089
Content: We have ordered several batches of shirts from Bold What I was most impressed with recently is the attention given to customer service We had a small problem with one batch of shirts  and Bold has quickly rectified the problem and compensated us  in addition to being extremely quick about having the shirts delivered before our deadline All of this while Bold was in the middle of a major move  but we did not get forgotten or pushed aside The shirts look awesome we will be wearing some in this weekends Sun Run and we are satisfied customers who will return Thank you

Name: A1090
Content: Excellent  very very prompt service I was looking into a large order from GetBold and was trying to find the best options for our organizations budget and stylistic preferences GetBolds representative was thorough  detailed  and extremely organized in their presentation of all our options and went above and beyond to offer us selections that totally fit our criteria but we didnt know were options Highly  highly recommend

Name: A1091
Content: After many different prints over the past 7 years and over 500 t shirts created by GetBold  I am a fan The customer service and quality products are first class I still have a t shirt from 7 years ago and can still happily wear it GetBold is a great choice ~ Glen

Name: A1092
Content: Thanks so much GetBold We had three different types of shirts printed and they turned out fantastic I just handed them a logo and they new the perfect size/placement on each shirt to make it look just right Everything was high quality and the prints are crisp and vibrant Even with a small order we had great personal service the whole way through Thanks to Kaiya for sticking with us and making sure they came out right

Name: A1093
Content: Fast  reliable and overall amazing to work with This is the third time our school has used GetBold for spirit wear and we will continue in the future Our rep was helpful and responded same day for all of our questions Big thanks to Kaiya from GetBold Highly recommend

Name: A1094
Content: GetBold has offers an incredible service Their support is always extremely helpful  and even modified a design of mine to add text when I forgot to add it Their tracking and shipping is also very robust  and my orders always arrive before the agreed upon time All in all  I would strongly recommend GetBold for all apparel needs

Name: A1095
Content: GetBold were helpful and friendly  and their online quote system was easy to use and allowed us to consider many options before placing our order Thank you again for excellent service and great t shirts

Name: A1096
Content: From start to finish  GetBold was a breath of fresh air Ive worked with 2 shops in the past where I ALWAYS had knots in my stomach when going to get my orders because it was basically guaranteed theyd make some sort of sloppy error I had the same knots in my stomach when going to pick up my order from GetBold for the first time When I opened the boxes  I was delighted to discover that everything was TOP KNOTCH The quality  printing  placement  sizing  garments  not one single error How could this be? I thought the price you pay for screen printing was just expecting something to go wrong? Nope  I just had to find the diamond in the rough GetBold underpromised and overdelivered with turn around time  too  which is something I really admired And customer service with Kaiya was super helpful and crazy efficient I am grateful to have found these guys and will be using them indefinitely

Name: A1097
Content: Ive used GetBold five times now over the last several years School store printing and tshirts for large groups Easy communication  efficient processes  and no surprises Great service  great integrity I highly recommend this business

Name: A1098
Content: GetBold is fantastic Kaiya was on par and she knew exactly what we wanted and she delivered Her performance was the best  she kept us up to date on production and delivery She sent us mock ups until we were satisfied I would highly recommend GetBold and I do tell other people about GetBold whenever I am approached about my jacket and shirt Homalco Tours is 100 Satisfied

Name: A1099
Content:
I really appreciated their customer service and desire to get it right They confirmed and made sure the shirts were the way I wanted them and after that  the process went by so fast It felt like the shirts were here the next day

Really awesome quality  competitive pricing  and great customer service as Ive already mentioned

Thanks GetBold

Name: A1100
Content:
We are currently expanding and we need more uniforms sweat shirts  hats and hoodies 
There min order is 12 for anything We wanted to order at least 35 50 items and purchase the garments from them and have them print our company logos We had two higher quality sweaters that they do not carry our request was to have them embroider the two sweaters that they did not provide or sell They told us to come in and when we arrived they said they actually wouldnt want to embroider two sweaters if we did not purchase them there They wasted our time and we took our business else where From a business standpoint it made no sense at all for them to miss out on making a few thousand dollars and inquiring a new customer that would do more business in the future I thought management is poor and simple minded as well as the owner Very unaccommodating

Name: A1101
Content: My company has been ordering from GetBold quite frequently lately and have experienced great customer service every time They keep you informed throughout the whole ordering process  will answer any questions you have and every finished product has looked great They have also helped us out with some quick turn around times which has been super helpful

Name: A1102
Content: GetBold has been making our youth robotics teams t shirts for the past 6 years Though were located in Calgary  its well worth going through them as opposed to local providers the merchandise looks great and lasts through many years of use  their pricing is very competitive  and they have fantastic customer service Rare miscommunications are resolved immediately  and they really work with you to get you what you need  when you want it I highly recommend GetBold

Name: A1103
Content:
Placed another small order which again was handled most efficiently
and quickly Excellent attention to detail and true customer service 

New order and again great service  work done quickly and well Will definitely go back to them again 
Great service  great work  great pricing  what more could one want

Again Getbold came through with speedy and efficient work for me Not a large order but they got it done perfectly once more

Name: A1104
Content: The reason I chose Get Bold was because I read the reviews first They definitely lived up to my expectations Ive order custom shirts for the second time now from Rob  and I have been very impressed with the quality of the shirts  the customer service  the assistance in choosing the colors  the speediness of the order and the free shipping I never thought I could get my shirts so fast I wont order custom clothing from anywhere else Thanks Rob

Name: A1105
Content: Excellent Service Andrew and the team at GetBold are great to work with Andrew provided suggestions to improve the look of our logo on our technicians uniforms and the results made for a better visual impact of our logo Our orders were ready before the expected date and the quality of the embroidery was great GetBold will definitely be our go to for future orders

Name: A1106
Content: Seriously the best t shirt company weve ever worked with They do tons of other stuff to But honestly  the whole team at Get Bold is top notch and always just a call away if need be One of the few companies that I can say holds a high value for excellence when it comes to all they do

Name: A1107
Content: Did our first t shirt order ever with GetBold They turned out amazing Very easy ordering process and straight forward pricing Thank you Andrew for all your help Will definitely be ordering again in the future

Name: A1108
Content: I was very impressed with the quality and speed and cost of GET BOLDs work Not only did i receive a quality product but it was processed within a week and at my door Prices are very reasonable and their website is probably one of the most user friendly Build your own systems Ive ever encountered Keep up the good work guys

Name: A1109
Content: This is my second time ordering from them  and they never disappoint The customer service is fast and nice as always They even gave me a professional advice on my tote bag printing so the result could be better My team loves all the items I got from here crewneck  hoodies  tote bags and ball caps Thank you Rob

Name: A1110
Content: As a long time customer of GetGold  I can say the quality of garments  printing and design ideas are the best anywhere Great guys with quick turnaround even when schedules are tight  these guys are the best Super service & great pricing  too

Name: A1111
Content: Great experience I needed a rush order of branded t shirts for a huge conference and the team at GetBold was extremely helpful in sorting this out I first reached out via their chat system on their website  then followed up by email Big shout out to Kaiya for being very patient as I frantically placed my order Great service

Name: A1112
Content: After calling several printing companies in the greater Vancouver area and being met with unanswered emails and a bit of attitude  we found BOLD The process and requests we had for our shirts was a bit complex  and Bold was happy to work with us with a smile through every turn and wayward question we had We also had a very tight deadline that they were more than happy to help us meet The pricing structure on the website really helped us figure out our finances  and their cost spreadsheets are crystal clear And the shirts? Stunning High quality material  and not those tacky too short shirts that many other places seem to provide Working with this company has likely been my best customer service experience in the last year No joke Thanks again Bold Im recommending you to everyone

Name: A1113
Content: Rob  Kia  Chris and the rest of the Get Bold team were absolutely great They were very accommodating  listened to what we wanted  gave us their best options for our needs and delivered great custom shirts and totes earlier than expected Go with team Get Bold and you will get top shelf service and product for a excellent rate

Name: A1114
Content: Excellent quality and service GetBold has delivered their products with 100 accuracy every time Great communication and friendly service

Name: A1115
Content: Our company got a large number of shirts printed for an event and looked everywhere for someone that knew what they were doing  printed on nice shirts  and made a high quality print We found Bold and once we saw their samples  we were in love Their quality is shown in the softest of discharge prints to the boldness of their regular ones The prices were far below any other quote and the result was astounding We will absolutely buy from again  as they were courteous and willing to help with design tips and very patient where we needed them to be Best shirt printer in Vancouver hands down

Name: A1116
Content: I was extremely impressed with Get Bold From fast and friendly service to a great quality product We received our shirts and tanks earlier than expected and were thrilled with how they turned out We will definitely go back

Name: A1117
Content: Choosing Get Bold is a no brainer  they are so much easier to work with than any other company I have printed shirts with Wow they respond instantly to phone or live chat and their website has a instant quote tool so you can modify your cart a million times before you order They are faster than competitors print in 4 to 6 days instead of 10 and the final product was exactly what I asked for I would give them more than 5 stars if I could

Name: A1118
Content: GetBold are the greatest As a long time customer  usually late with my ordering  in need of short turnaround times  Andrew  Ron & the whole team always deliver With top quality materials & graphics  they even design & update as part of their superb services And the prices are good as it gets Youll be glad to get with GetBold

Name: A1119
Content: We love our t shirts and they were quick  easy to deal with and professional the whole way through I recommend Get Bold to anyone looking for quality printed shirts for any occasion or company Thank you so much

Name: A1120
Content: The guys at Get Bold truely go above and beyond I have experienced both screen printing and embroidery services and both are top notch and super fast I would highly recommend get bold for quality products and superb customer service

Name: A1121
Content: Ordering for the first time  but my company has been ordering with them for a while Personally  Ive had a great experience with this company through interacting with Mia The mocks ups have been speedy and precise Shes been knowledgeable in answering all my questions about changes and their affects on quality  longevity  and looks I will order from them again

Name: A1122
Content: Great service with tons of options Get Bold has really helpful  friendly staff and always gets the project done before the deadline anytime Ive used their services The prices are very competitive People always ask where do you get your merch done? I always send them here If it aint GET BOLD  it can get lost

Name: A1123
Content:
I had the pleasure of being informed of Get Bold by Niko an employee of theirs who did all my graphic design work for me 
They were really helpful and professional in there approach to my needs as a small business  there turnaround time on everything from start to finish was OUTSTANDING and very affordable 
I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM and will not hesitate to use them again in the future 

Thank you GetBold

Kevin Gee

Name: A1124
Content: My youth group decided Tuesday night we were going to make tshirts for the following week We ordered through GetBold on Wednesday morning and were able to get our product by Tuesday that next week The staff were very easy to work with and quick to respond Highly recommend

Name: A1125
Content: As a high school teacher  and supervisor of several student led groups  I make all of our bulk clothing orders through GetBold We have purchased jerseys  hoodies  and t shirts and are never disappointed I highly recommend this company

Name: A1126
Content: Get Bold provides awesome and quick customer service The representative I worked with was professional and very helpful They work hard to make sure you are getting what you want and provide many options to make sure you get that I have used Get Bold multiple times for larger orders and they have delivered to our satisfaction every time

Name: A1127
Content:
The online ordering system is quite easy to do but we had a special request with our order that the staff accommodated to very easily They reply quickly to all emails and answer all phone calls  which is very important to me The package arrived at my door and on time
I would highly recommend GetBold for anyone who needs custom printing for their business Will use again in the futrue

Name: A1128
Content:
Amazing Quality and Customer Service This team is Pro Series
We did a run of Toques  I sent in a photo of the style we were looking for and they quickly matched and did a mock up of what it would look like Everyone was thrilled with the quality and they made it in our quick turn around Already placed another order for hats now
Highly recommend

Name: A1129
Content: Just ordered a large amount of tank tops  not only did they give us the best price by far then any of the other companies  their customer service went above and beyond Joey was so helpful  did an AMAZING job on our graphic design  and was very prompt with returning emails Will we be using BOLD again? Definitely

Name: A1130
Content: Have ordered from them twice before and they never disappoint Customer service is prompt and lovely as well

Name: A1131
Content: We love working with GetBold This is our second time using them The process was absolutely seamless The product looked fabulous and shipped sooner than expected THANK YOU

Name: A1132
Content:
whole heartly non bias review  these guys are absolutely amazing Their whole team took care of every detail we asked for without hassle When I gave them a deadline they beat it with flying colors 

Upon asking 3 other tshirt companies all others said they have to charge me a rush fee  and a few other weird fees These guys are legitimate and worth every penny Will definitely be working with them again as our organization is huge and we always need swag Thanks Andrew and team for making my job so seamless and easy 100 professional and completely dedication to doing a good job These guys just gained so much business with us because Finally found a company thats honest  and willing to create a good relationship with their clients

Name: A1133
Content: We really appreciate the quality that GetBold offers and the team there is always helpful The turn around for print/embroidery orders are quick Highly recommend them

Name: A1134
Content:
When it comes to getting T shirts printed look no further The crew at GetBold are friendly  reliable and most of all they have such a quick turnaround on jobs Theyve gotten me out of a bind on a few occasions Use them  you wont regret it

Cant recommend them highly enough 10/10

Name: A1135
Content:
GetBold delivered a great customer service 
My first order ever  hat with logo 
had no idea how to build it 20 hats but Andrew took good care of me 
Order delivered two days before the due date 
Thank you very much  and see you on the next business 
Roberto

Name: A1136
Content: Love the customer service Prices are reasonable Quality is fabulous Will be a return customer

Name: A1137
Content: Get Bold made my custom t shirts very quickly The chat feature was very helpful  as well as incredibly accurate in terms of cost Rob was amazing and got back to me quickly and was very polite and thorough I will absolutely order from Get Bold again

Name: A1138
Content: I have used Get Bold two times for event t shirts at my university  and I am always impressed with their friendly customer service  quick turnaround time  and impeccable print quality Big thanks to Kaiya for tweaking my artwork free of charge and ensuring I would receive my order on time I highly recommend Get Bold for t shirt printing

Name: A1139
Content: Ive worked with GetBold numerous times over the last 3 years and each time Ive had a great experience Ive worked with a number of different reps though mostly Andrew  hes awesome and found them all great to work with Id highly recommend looking into them for any clothing printing needs

Name: A1140
Content: Rob and the crew at GetBold were so accommodating to my last minute  rush order They even spent extra time to ensure the accuracy of the logo colours for our business The end product turned out perfect Great customer service

Name: A1141
Content: GetBold is the model of professionalism  making every experience with them a pleasure The ease with which I am able to get exactly what I want in good time  with great quality  and great prices  makes this company my only choice There is no reason to look elsewhere for your T Shirt printing needs

Name: A1142
Content: I couldnt have asked for better service They were very welcoming even though I just walked into their office unannounced and uninformed  and they help guide me on the various options I had when starting out my t shirt brand They went over and above to help me get what I needed  and their prices were extremely reasonable compared to all the other t shirt printing companies out there Andrew even helped tweak my design a bit to convert the file into a vector file to avoid image stretching  which I was extremely grateful for Will definitely be using these guys for future prints and projects

Name: A1143
Content:
We have just recieved our t shirts  they are just perfect 
Excellent quality with very good price 
Before we place our order  we checked reviews and majority of the customers are happy with quality and the service 
l have already shared the your company details with my colleaques
Thank you

Name: A1144
Content: Rob and the team at GetBold were fast and always followed up to clarify anything on my side We ordered over 100 shirts of various styles  sizes  colours  and prints and they had no difficulties working with us

Name: A1145
Content: Really great customer service from Rob I needed some toques embroidered within 5 days He help me alter the original design so that it would look good on the toque  and gave me progress updates The toques were high quality  looked great  and came a day before I needed them

Name: A1146
Content: I thought we would try a different company this year Found GetBold using Google From the get go  GetBold provided excellent help online about our front and back designs and about what was necessary to make our delivery date The website made ordering a variety of colors and shirt styles easy Follow up via email and telephone was fantastic and helped to make sure that the order was accurately placed They promised a delivery by the 10th and we received on the morning of the 5th In more than 20 years of doing summer session shirts  this is the FIRST time shirts arrived well before the promised delivery date A great website  great follow up contact  and solid follow through to delivery Definitely doing business with GetBold again

Name: A1147
Content: Ive ordered from Getbold twice and received exceptional service both times Our sweaters turned out great and they are always very quick to reply to my emails Highly recommended

Name: A1148
Content:
My family and I have ordered from this company for a few years  and have been super happy with all of their products We have ordered a variety of different pieces  from running shirts  baseball jerseys to birthday celebration shirts
Very happy with their customer and speedy service  and cant wait to work with them again on our next design

Name: A1149
Content: I was told great things about GetBold so I placed an order for our summer camp shirts and they were great to work with All questions got answered  emails responded to extremely quick  and the order is already almost done Looking forward to seeing the products when they get here

Name: A1150
Content: We have been ordering our custom merchandise for the last three years and we always receive excellent customer service  quality products and quick turnaround time Thats why we keep coming back

Name: A1151
Content: I ordered embroidered hoodies from them and they look GORGEOUS My logo was to be embroidered in a colour that matches the hoodie  and I was nervous about it But it turned out so beautiful I would definitely recommend them Their customer service is really nice too They answer any questions and they are fast at response

Name: A1152
Content: We ordered a massive amount of tshirts and hoodies  all with different sizes and different designs Not only was the quality of the merchandise and the screen printing fantastic  but their customer service went above and beyond They provided suggestions on the printing size and process to increase that sellability of our items that went well beyond what was necessary Their art department is knowledgeable and friendly  and was very easy to work with We will now be getting all of our screen printing done for our yearly events from Bold from now on

Name: A1153
Content: Joey and the whole team was great I changed products and ink colours a couple times and Joey without complaint gave me more than 1 mock up and order form I placed an order on a Thursday  added an item on the Friday  and then received it Tuesday morning Soo fast I like that their is a website chat option The shirts looked great and was pretty good price

Name: A1154
Content: Our caps were ready sooner than we expected and they are first rate Very happy with the whole order process and final product too

Name: A1155
Content: The customer service was incredible I had no idea what I was doing  and they walked me through every step with the Live chat  and follow up emails They helped me choose the proper colours and placement and they were shipped out the immediately after they were printed Great shirts at a price you couldnt beat Thanks guys

Name: A1156
Content: Loved my experience with GetBold Customer service was fantastic  everyone was friendly  available and very helpful They took time to walk me through online ordering and were very thorough They were so accommodating and helped me out when I really needed some more staff t shirts fast Thanks GetBold

Name: A1157
Content:
I have been working with Bold for two years now and it has been nothing but great things I am based out of Winnipeg yet I seek to have these guys work on my projects 
 They are always willing to try new things  tackle difficult work and always in a timely manner When I started out they took time out of  what is more than likely always a busy day  to answer some questions and go over the printing process I would recommend these guys to anyone and everyone Top notch staff with top notch product

Name: A1158
Content: The guys at Get Bold are fast  efficient  informative and very professional We have had huge success with our clothing from Get Bold and love everything We have switched over to Get Bold for all our clothing orders Great team  great company  great product  great service Thanks for everything

Name: A1159
Content: Once again these cease to amaze fast and great design team This will not be our last  more orders to follow Thanx again guys  Just had another great interaction with the team at Bold Had my shirts ordered and done in 2 days Fantastic work and will definitely be back for more orders Thanks again Guys you are a great outfit Great Staff fast turn around time  this company is truly 5 star class all the way We have ordered from them over 7 times now Thank you sooo much guys

Name: A1160
Content: Very prompt response I ordered plain shirts only without custom print and GetBold provided This is excellent customer service Highly recommended

Name: A1161
Content: We placed an order for T shirts for our choir  but unfortunately there was a problem with the ladies sizes be very careful when ordering; the junior sizes are extremely small which was discovered when we received the order We then went back to Bold and they provided a timely and very satisfactory solution The images look absolutely beautiful and everyone is happy with the results

Name: A1162
Content: Love these people Ive used them many times for my business and the end product is always amazing The customer service is awesome  the product range is good and they are so helpful in fixing small issues with design I would highly recommend Bold to anyone thinking of getting merchandise for their businesses or events

Name: A1163
Content: We had ordered shirts  jackets and hats 3 years ago and they are all still in use today We called a few dats ago short notice for a few new ones for a home show and they quickly got the order approved and done with no hassles Great service

Name: A1164
Content: Great service I ordered uniforms for my softball team Reasonable price  great product  and fast delivery I made my order with a tight schedule and it was done in time We have now played couple games with the uniforms and everyone loves Its light and comfy  and looks great

Name: A1165
Content: Both Andrew and Joey were great right from initial contact We received our quote quickly  and they made the process of ordering shirts very easy They were able to get our order ready before we needed it And  the shirts look fantastic Thanks guys

Name: A1166
Content: I continue to enjoy their great service Fast and reliable  theyve yet to let me down Everyone at Bold is so helpful Ive been using them for the past three years and have been so impressed with how quick the service is and how excellent the product turns out Its also really well priced I cant recommend them enough

Name: A1167
Content: GetBold is always amazing to work with Such friendly staff  really helpful in navigating designs/shirts Weve used them multiple times and had a great experience every time

Name: A1168
Content: We were pressed for time and needed our T shirt order within 3 business days GetBold and Rob were very accommodating The T shirts came in at a great price and finished within the timeframe and looked amazing Will definitely be returning for future projects

Name: A1169
Content: Edit2 Recently placed another order and cant say enough good things I was in a rush to get shirts printed and they arrived at my door barely 1 week after I placed the order We went through a couple of mockups as well in the process and everything went extremely smoothly Edit1 I placed another order through GetBold in March for a beanie as well as a patch The beanie came out great with lots of detail and strong embriodery and the patch is also virtually perfect and is perfect for the bundle that we are including them in Im never in doubt when ordering from these guys  everything has been great so far An excellent place to get t shirts  hoodies  and toques The online quote calculator and the ease in which you can communicate with someone to ask questions make this a great manufacturing plant to deal with for your merch The free shipping within Canada is another excellent bonus A+

Name: A1170
Content: Easy to work with Im no designer  and GetBold was very patient with my amateur graphic abilities  working with me to get the design and layout I wanted Production and shipping was fast  quality was good Would definitely use again

Name: A1171
Content: For the past 12 plus years our summer has ordered all our camp shirts from GetBold and we absolutely love the quality of the product  the personable service and of course the speedy delivery of the orders we place even when they are large Thanks GetBold for all the work you do and for us in making our campers and staff look good

Name: A1172
Content: Kaiya was very kind and patience in helping us create a great design for our new team merchandise Thank you so much I will contact you again next time I need to order merchandise

Name: A1173
Content: Posted in 2017 First  my questions were promptly answered on the website chat feature When I put my order in the mock up proof was sent efficiently and was just what we wanted Third  the order was done ahead of schedule So pleased Edit Posted in 2019 Still ordering from GetBold They are so prompt and the new ONLINE STORES for students to order online for a school order is THE BEST Easy and efficient

Name: A1174
Content: My experience with GetBold was amazing I had a rush order  to which they delivered far ahead of time  the quality of service was professional  friendly and outstanding in fact I will definitely use them again Highly recommend

Name: A1175
Content: These guys are quick The online process is straight forward  and the approval process made it super clear as to how the T shirts were going to come out Amazing turn out

Name: A1176
Content:
As a person completely inexperienced with custom ordering  they were really supportive and made sure everything was exactly the way I wanted I looked around for a really long time for a company that will do what I want at an affordable price Prior to ordering  I emailed with questions and they responded with detailed answers 
On they day my shirts were printed  they called to ask about a very small printing complication I was amazed by their attention to detail My ordering process was not the smoothest as I made many changes along the way but they patiently changed my order every single time My shirts came out wonderfully and my team is ecstatic about wearing them Im definitely going to go to them again for my future projects

Name: A1177
Content: Thank you Rob for making the process so easy The website is very user friendly but what really stood out to me was the customer service we received when I called with questions The order was filled quickly and products are great quality Would highly recommend GetBold

Name: A1178
Content: Excellent service and amazing quality  we tried a few other companies  but none had same level of professionalism Every order weve made with BOLD has been on time  on budget  and exactly what we asked for Theyre also great at providing help and advice with selecting colours and sizes Highly recommend

Name: A1179
Content: 1st review June/2016 We have an annual staff appreciation BBQ and produce T shirts for the staff each year for this event This is our 11th year  but the first year we have used GetBold We are extremely happy with the whole experience; from the initial order  pricing very competitive  consultation  design  picking a good quality T shirt  through the production and delivery of the shirts Our order was 131 shirts Matt and Rob  the two staff I dealt with  were great The shirts turned out great  everyone loved them We will definitely use GetBold next year July/2020 Update This is the 5th year we have used GetBold for our staff BBQ T shirts With COVID social distancing rules in place  we couldnt have the actual BBQ  but everyone still wanted the T shirts Getbold I dealt with Andrew and Rob came through as they always do; we are completely satisfied with their pricing  service and quality and will continue to use them

Name: A1180
Content: Super simple  Super service  Super fast They have a huge selection of apparel Ordered some fleece zip ups and tees with embroidery and i couldnt be happier with their work Will definitely use them again

Name: A1181
Content: Great experience with GET BOLD They were fast  friendly and very accommodating We love our summer staff shirts and look forward to doing business with them in the future Rob helped us and he was amazing and so efficient

Name: A1182
Content: We ordered some nice embroidered shirts as well as screen printed T shirts  and I could not be more impressed with BOLD The shirts look amazing  the price was incredible  the service was top notch  and not only did they hit our deadline but offered to ship it for free Highly recommended

Name: A1183
Content: Always great service and the printing is top notch They get back to you fast and get your ordering happening quick which you need if you do a pre order Delivered to your door I shop around too I appreciate it GetBold Rock on

Name: A1184
Content: We place large orders from Bold at least a few times a year They consistently deliver high quality products with a very fast turnaround I am constantly surprised how easy it is to work with them

Name: A1185
Content: Fantastic service at Bold Variety and quality of product is great Ordered 100 shirts on website and had them printed and shipped to us in under a week Free shipping too Will definately do business again

Name: A1186
Content: Ive been doing the majority of my designs and printing with Bold Merchandise for almost 5 years Their customer service and quality are alway top notch and consistent Whether you are ordering 20 or 2000 shirts they are your guys

Name: A1187
Content: Great print job on a very small  quick turnaround order for a team event Walked into the office and was immediately assisted from start to finish Ronnie even recommended adding a few extra shirts for better pricing and we needed them Great service from all the staff and will definitely use them again

Name: A1188
Content: I always use Get Bold when I need t shirts printed They are consistently excellent The team is friendly  accurate  fast and the pricing is great I can only recommend them

Name: A1189
Content: We have been working with the folks at Bold for about 10 years; supplying our Camp Evergreen kids camp shirts Every year they have consistently met or exceeded our expectations  with design assistants to improve the overall look and help keep costs down  and to meet fast turnaround to meet our deadline Every one of the staff we have worked with deliver great customer service Many Thanks  Camp Evergreen

Name: A1190
Content: We have been dealing with the folks at Get Bold for the past 7 or so years for all of our t shirt printing needs Their customer service is excellent and they deliver all products on time and we have never had them make a mistake in sizes or quantity

Name: A1191
Content: Once again amazing service from GetBold Quick and responsive  and even helped make a few last minute adjustments to our artwork to make it better If you are a church / business / sports team who needs shirts  these guys are legends

Name: A1192
Content: The Gambier community centre has been using getbold for a very long time We are impressed at the excellent prices  great designs and the wonderful products Even though our orders are often as small as 25 aprons or tote bags  for example  the level of service is just as consistent as if we were a large company Every year at our summer fair  islanders are waiting to see what is new Thanks to Matt  Rob and all the staff for a job well done Louise Potter

Name: A1193
Content: I ordered only 10 t shirts of various models and sizes They arrived in four days  the quality is great Will come back with more orders Pleasure to deal with a well managed business

Name: A1194
Content: This company was amazing to work with Communication was fast and effective  they got their proofs to me extremely fast  and 100 piece order was shipped out very quickly Could not be happier I look forward to working with them again very soon

Name: A1195
Content: Weve ordered quite a few times at GetBold and keep coming back Their service is prompt  hassle free and precise The turnaround time is amazing and the price is good Thanks again

Name: A1196
Content: Amazing customer service We used them for Deep Cove Daze T shirts and in the chaos of organizing a festival they were very helpful Andrew was great and made sure that all our graphics and logos were good quality and would be visible when printed

Name: A1197
Content: Always a pleasure working with GetBold for custom items Quick service  access to samples  always happy to do modifications to ensure the design is exactly what were looking for I highly recommend

Name: A1198
Content: As a working artist the reproduction on my art on shirts is the same as showing the original art My shirts ship all over the world  Its my name and reputation on the shirts The team at Get Bold make me look like a star From start to finish they care Great attention to detail  superior graphic design skills  Huge product selection  professional press operators  great follow up and they have never said no to a request Staff were attentive and knowledgeable  They are amazing I would recommend Get Bold to any client large or small  Ron Steven the Artist Rogest

Name: A1199
Content: Rob and the team were so great to work with They let us try on all of the options and even gave us tips on what we should and shouldnt get Everyone is so friendly and the service was very quick We look forward to making our next order with GetBold

Name: A1200
Content: We had a large order and a tight deadline and GetBold really made the effort to get us what we needed Very helpful staff  quick turnaround  and great looking t shirts Very satisfied

Name: A1201
Content: Wow  these shirts are awesome Our huge design turned out perfectly placed and printed on the shirts The kids love them Easy to work with I submitted my design as a high resolution jpg no problem  quick turnaround  free shipping Weve got our new shirt company

Name: A1202
Content: We have come to this company for many  many years at our day camps program They always provide exceptional customer service  theyre great problem solvers  and can complete quality orders in a quick amount of time A really easy process to submit the tshirts with specifications as well

Name: A1203
Content: Get bold has been extremely helpful they just finished making jerseys and hats for my softball team Andrew made sure to take care of me and make me happy and accommodated my every need would definitely recommend using getbold for your company or sport teams I just picked up my jerseys and hats and they look absolutely amazing they did a really good job their was one little spot on 1 shirt and their shipping me a new one they really take care of their customers and care about your opinion I will use getbold for all my needs

Name: A1204
Content: I am so impressed with Get Bold Everyone was very friendly and helpful Kaiya answered all my questions and helped me make the decisions They had my order ready 4 days early The shirts look fantastic and are exactly what we wanted Thanks Kaiya

Name: A1205
Content: Well done Just opened my boxes of shirts and jackets and they turned out fantastic Thanks so much  they will be a hit at the conference This is the second time weve used BOLD and are just as pleased as the first time with their service  cost and turn around time I highly recommend

Name: A1206
Content: The incredibly fast and helpful customer service really makes Bold stand out On a complicated oversized print  the crew at Bold double and triple checked everything and even provided a couple of suggestions that made the final print much better Ive been using a variety of printers in the Vancouver area and Im 110 satisfied with Bold Ill definitely be doing more shirts with them

Name: A1207
Content: GetBold did it again Rob and his team have proven themselves as capable suppliers for my improv group  The Fidgets  as we launch our tour of western Canada in the winter of 2019 Great advice  excellent results  amazing prices and free shipping Almost too good to be true

Name: A1208
Content: The t shirts we ordered turned out great Customer service responded to our order very quickly and we were able to get the t shirts in time for the beginning of the school semester We will definitely order again

Name: A1209
Content: We had some softball jerseys done up for our corporate team We literally waited until the last minute  however Get Bold did these up for us so fast The quick turn around time and great customer service is very much appreciated

Name: A1210
Content: Excellent  prompt  and friendly service The staff even helps to adjust your designs to improve them  and suggest changes as needed Reasonable pricing  and fast delivery too So happy we found this company as a resource for our companys promotional t shirts

Name: A1211
Content: The quality and communication of BOLD cant be beat  I was so impressed with the help  communication  and attentiveness the entire way through our shirt order They continually impress with their service and quality I cant wait to order more shirts through them

Name: A1212
Content: GetBold is much more than meets the eye Ive been using them exclusively since I first tried them They offer the usual services that other printers offer  but what sets them apart is their human touch Whenever Ive needed a specific shirt  hat  or sweater  theyve sourced it for me If they can get it  they will I often go to them for products not even on their website  and they do a killer job every single time Theyll help you colour match  size  and anything else you may need Now if only they did sublimation  Id never have to print anywhere else

Name: A1213
Content: Fantastic quality  professionalism with great service Always happy to give me suggestions on how to improve my image before printing to get the best quality in the job Been using Bold Merchandise for over 5 years now for various TV/Film projects in Vancouver for on camera costumes including Nickelodeon TV movies Best Player  Fairly Odd Parents  Rags and Dirctvs new series Rogue Highly recommend them

Name: A1214
Content: Ive only had great experiences with GetBold over the years that we have used them at Quest University Canada for a range of products for our bookstore  student leadership  and admissions initiatives Great quality  amazing customer service  no fuss all around awesome

Name: A1215
Content: The team at GetBold were an absolute joy to work with From early design stages to landed on our doorstep  this process could not have been easier  Wild Timber Woodworks will definitely be repeat a customer

Name: A1216
Content: Thoroughly recommend GetBold We selected them a couple of years ago for our company t shirts and hats; the merch is great quality and the service reliable  fast and friendly

Name: A1217
Content: Amazing speed  efficiency and outstanding customer service from Matt and Kaiya for our shirt order Thank you again  and we will definitely keep you in mind for any events we may have in the future Eden Park and Tilford Save On Foods

Name: A1218
Content: BOLD saved the day with a rush order and excellent customer service With so many screen printing companies out there  they work hard to make sure you dont ever need to go to their competition Without hesitation  I would re order from BOLD  and recommend you do the same

Name: A1219
Content: Second time using GetBold to print t shirts/longsleeves for a team Excellent service  product looks amazing Would definitely recommend especially if youre looking to order the same design on different clothing articles

Name: A1220
Content: Our design was exactly how I wanted it to look like and the color was exactly like it is shown online Everyone was very satisfied with their hoodie and crewneck The quality of the material is very good for the price and the sizes were quite exact The customer service was exemplary; Mr Andrew Cairns was very patient in taking our order The only issues were that some colors werent available and one of the hoodies came in with multiple holes However  those were only minor problems Thank you  GetBold

Name: A1221
Content: BOLD is the best company to deal with for printed t shirts and other apparel Their staff are knowledgeable and down to earth and always have great ideas on how to make your project stand out Their turnaround times are fantastic as well I tell everyone who needs t shirts printed to get in touch with BOLD

Name: A1222
Content: Get bold is great This is the third time I order from them Their website is easy to navigate when creating your product  their great communicators  and your product arrives at a pretty quickly Thanks

Name: A1223
Content: Really great company to work with We had a couple false starts with our t shirts and they were patient and professional through to whole process Once we finalized our design and hit go they had them completed in a very short time frame Finished product looks great

Name: A1224
Content: Thanks so much again We work with this company since a couple of years Our team was happily surprised with the new season shirts for 2017 Our guests keep buying of the Staff shirts so we have to order more Great professional service and communication Thanks

Name: A1225
Content: Best shop in the Lower Mainland for garment printing Rob was very helpful and accommodating  as always Shirts were printed well and our team was very happy with the results Thanks BOLD Merchandise  well be back

Name: A1226
Content: We went through GetBold to order 80 school hoodies since they said they could do tackle twill for us it took quite a long time to get exactly what we wanted in terms of the design  but when we got the shipment  it came out looking better than expected The only downside is that we were told that printing wouldnt be legible in white ink at the size we had it at  so we used light grey  but it was very legible so we probably could have gone with white

Name: A1227
Content: I will ALWAYS use GetBold I tend to order on short notice and they never miss a deadline  I always have my order on time They are a delight to work with and their product is high quality I wont go anywhere else

Name: A1228
Content: First time using this company and I am very impressed Easy website to navigate through  and the turn around time is really fast Will definitely use GetBold again BTW  our hockey team loved the toques

Name: A1229
Content: We have been ordering silk screened T shirts and Tank tops from GetBold for the last 4 years and have been extremely satisfied with their customer service  pricing and quick turn around time I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for custom t shirt printing and embroidery

Content: I ordered some lab coats Professional service Good Quality Totally recommend them for any printing and embroidery services Thanks GetBold Team

Name: A1231
Content: Great experience working with GetBold Andrew was very professional and quick to reply to all my emails and questions The whole process went by very smoothly and any concerns I had were quickly answered and solved by the staff at GetBold Would definitely recommend them and planning to return next time

Content: I called up Ronnie with an emergency order at GetBold to get 500 Day Camp shirts for kids aged 6 12 yrs old GetBold were able to do the order in 6 days  at a great price too The staff at this place truly went the extra mile  having to do a couple of over night shifts to complete the order

Name: A1233
Content: GetBOLD is a great company to work with Fast and friendly communication and great products I have worked with them for a couple of years with different businesses and the quality and service is always 100

Name: A1234
Content: Great products and even better customer service Quick turnaround to both order and ship and it came exactly as requested Second time ordering and it wont be the last

Content: Absolutely excellent service and product I loved my final product and received earlier than expected I would recommend Get Bold for any of your printing needs

Content: We ordered T shirts for Brookswood Churchs serve team They were fast and yet patient as we worked through the design and shirt choices to get exactly what we wanted Thank you GetBold

Name: A1241
Content: These fine people helped me out in a huge way  after contacting them with less then 5 days before I left for a wedding they designed  priced and printed our bachelor party shirts quickly and on time They even designed the whole thing for us when we had no idea of what we wanted I will definitely be referring anyone who needs a custom tshirt designed and printed to Bold Merchandise they truly are professionals

Name: A1242
Content: My experience with GetBold was awesome We got t shirts made there for our summer camp and did they ever turn out awesome Thanks to everyone at GetBold for such great service and even better product

Name: A1243
Content: Thanks Matt and Bold Merchandise for doing the Mackenzie Elementary t shirts in Vancouver again this year  your pricing was great and the kids love the hoodies and t shirts  they look fantastic What a great way to show our school spirit I will order again from you again will be our 3rd year  Great t shirt and hoodie printing in Vancouver Updated Dec 2013 Andrew totally rocks  and helped me design great American Apparel team jackets for our coaching staff And he got me a sweet deal on some team shirts for the kids Great service  and theyre always thinking of how to improve your design  and save you money on cost effective order sizes

Name: A1244
Content:
Absolutely fantastic customer service

I walked in during the summer to inquire about ordering hoodies for the Grade 7 Grads at Boundary Elementary Rob  Andrew and Joey walked me through the whole process They came up with a design that was unique to our school as well as a stock one for the kids that wanted it The kids were thrilled The quality and price of the hoodies was better than going through the regular school hoodie companies I also couldnt believe how fast they were I will go back there next year

Name: A1245
Content: We have ordered multiple times from GetBold; t shirts  hoodies  ball caps and toques The customer service  turnaround time and quality has always been outstanding

J Duncan  The DuncanAfrica Society

Content: I have been dealing with GetBold for many years and they are by far the best company for printing T Shirts They are fast  efficient  and the customer service is impeccable I recommend using this company

Content: Have been ordering uniforms from GetBOLD for a couple of years now I have a staff of approximately 160 and have been serviced above and beyond by Rob Danyluk and the GetBOLD team They are professional  friendly and have a very quick product turn around time Couldnt be happier

Because these guys are 120 I met up with Rob and he was patient and gave me tons of info and Andrew set the art work to print my hoodies I had the basic design but Andrew taught me how to make it even better Everything turned out exactly as I had imagined AND they even shipped me the product Amazing product  amazing service and most importantly  amazing people I mean come on they do the Southsiders gear I was sold when I saw that Will be back for more hoodies in the next month

Content: GetBold is very fast  efficient and accommodating Weve gone to GetBold a couple times now and we look forward to working with them in the future as well We are very happy with their overall selection and the final product Thank you  GetBold

Content: Amazing customer service  unbelievable stock  great company to use

Name: A1288
Content:
GetBold did a really fabulous job AND they were quick and affordable They were able to turn around a batch of shirts in less than three days There was a slight error on the first batch of shirts we printed with them no fault of theirs  but they handled the concern with professionalism and expedition Kaiya and Andrew both helped us tremendously and were able to get us exactly what we needed in a very quick timeframe To begin with  they provide you with a thorough mock up and are diligent with the details From start to finish  they handle your needs with care 

We chose GetBold after an incredibly negative experience with another t shirt printing company Suffice it to say  we will only use GetBold moving forward Highly recommended Make sure you use them for your print or embroidery needs You wont regret it

Name: A1289
Content: GetBold have completed numerous projects for our school and the finished products are always perfect Weve ordered hats  toques  hoodies  t shirts  trucker hats and love them all

Name: A1290
Content: Great service These guys went above and beyond in helping us with our artwork for our T Shirt order The finished shirts are amazing Well be back for more

Name: A1292
Content: Kaiya was fantastic and helpful Very prompt service

Content: I was able to take 33 Grade Seven students to Get Bold to print their Grade Seven Hoodies It was an amazing experience and the students were able to learn about the process Thanks so much Matt for accommodating us and to your amazing staff for their patience

Content: Amazing  friendly staff and unbelievably fast service They were very helpful and accommodating to adjustments I needed to make as well as follow up orders that I needed to put in with some urgency Wouldnt go anywhere else for ordering T shirts

Name: A1300
Content: Great Service We love our new hats and shirts GetBold always stays in contact throughout the process We will defiantly be using them next time

Name: A1301
Content: Always super pleased with the work GetBold does  especially the quality of print/embroidery

Name: A1302
Content: These guys are awesome Our Shop Pinz Tattoo have used them a few times  but my latest experience was over the top I used a printer where I live in the interior for a couple jobs trying to keep my support of live local  buy local going My printer left me in the lurch  dropping the ball and leaving me without shirts before a major tattoo convention I phoned Joe and he said lets go Then Andrew grabbed the ball and ran talking with me by e mail after business hours  grabbing my shirt order in the morning  printing and shipping the SAME day Now Im sure this isnt the norm  especially the Friday of Thanksgiving weekend  but these guys came through bigtime After reading the other glowing reviews on this plus page says it all Thanks so much Andrew  you rule GET BOLD

Name: A1303
Content: Our company uses GetBold about 4 times a year and they have been a great partner to work with every time Quick  efficient  friendly and fair prices

Name: A1304
Content: Second time ordering with them and it was great They are very friendly I love that they send a mock up ahead of time  they delivered my orders on time  and the orders were done just as expected Nice work

Amazing service Great quality

Their knowledge of the industry is beyond pro and they are always able to make my twisted dreams for a shirt design come true Not matter how obscure or how unorganized the idea is these guys will make it come to life True masters of any art form are always amazing to watch but these guys well thats just an entire new level

Content: This place is a hidden gem I was looking for a place where I could get some thing printed on a tote bag and they had everything They have different sizes of tote bags with different colours So I chose blue since it looked better with the design I wanted to get printed Nick really helped me understand the process of printing and suggested DTF method would be great for tote bag It turned out great and It was a quick process They did it within 30 minutes I would totally recommend this place Since with holidays coming up  this place is definitely my go to in the near future Probably next time I would go for a mug or may be an embroidery

Content: A math mug I got this customized mug with a bunch of math equations on it and it came out great I wanted to get my friend whos graduating a bit of a unique gift and I immediately saw an opportunity in InstaCustoms As you can see  the printing quality is very refined Much sharper than expected in fact It was as if I was reading a math paper p Thanks InstaCustoms

Content: I have printed out a second batch of shirts here  and had a mild issue with the print quality on a couple of them it was immediately fixed  shipped and they look amazing this place is my  1 go to for printing out shirts with my own custom designs of my comic characters Amazing service  and equally awesome quality

Name: A1643
Content:
I was referred here by a friend 
I was told to talk to Nick and that I wouldnt regret it Hes useful  helpful  usually can figure out what the customer wants and executes perfectly 
With a recommendation like that I figured that Id have nothing to lose  so I gave it shot
Funny thing is the referral didnt do instacustoms justice 
They went above and beyond More helpful than expected

I reached out to them in order to get an idea of pricing for t shirts for our hockey team
The teams been having a rough year  but  theyre a great bunch of kids so the coaches figured wed get them something nice 

We decided to make a fun thing out of it and put the kids nicknames and numbers on the back and a team name on the front

Even though we were a little particular with the fonts and the sizes ranged from xs to 4x  Nick and his team obliged Alison was fantastic  so helpful and cheery  a joy to work with She had the fonts figured out in no time 

Not only that  the order was completed early  2 days before the promised delivery date 

Finally the price  we had set a budget and instacustoms came through with flying colors

I cannot say enough good things about this place  to the point where I am going to start bringing my business business here

I dont refer many places but this is one place that gets my seal of approval

See below for a sample of their work

Content: Great place for getting custom prints done Needed a personalized graduation gift for a friend urgently I looked at the Rush Order options and chose a mug with personalized message written on it included a message on 1 side A HUGE number of fonts were available I could put the message almost anywhere on the cup  with any font size i wanted  with any color and also include any photo i wanted  I placed the order at 4 30pm and got an email saying the mug is ready by 6 30pm The quality of the printing was excellent

Content: For years  I tried so hard to find a long sleeve top that had a design that referenced my favourite TV show And then  after visiting InstaCustoms  I realized that I could just design the shirt myself The customer service is second to none; Nick and his team answered every question I had with an understanding smile More than that  they created a gorgeous final product that Ive absolutely fallen in love with Im very proud to say that this is now my favourite top

Content: Ive always seen this store even when it wasnt renovated yet and its a place I hoped to purchase in one day Last week  I did and Im very happy of how it turned out as well as the services there Staffs are very welcoming I love the fact that their prices depends on the quantity purchase because in other stores its expensive for nothing I would highly recommend and go back here Very satisfied

Name: A1688
Content: I was very impressed by this stores high rating for the amount of reviews it has  and I can confirm that it is very well deserved I went in with a PNG file on a USB stick around 11am on a Saturday  hoping to get a custom mug made for a friends birthday the same evening They told me it would be ready in 20 30m  so I had a coffee and came back When I returned  the mug had printed with a couple of issues One of the colours wasnt showing up at all  and the image itself came out looking very compressed The staff were super friendly and helpful  however  and we spent a little bit of time troubleshooting together on Photoshop I had designed the image to be printed myself  After that  they spent about half an hour tinkering with their printer to figure out why the colour wasnt coming through for me In the end  they were able to solve the issue  and they even went through 3 mugs for me until it was just right I would have felt bad  but they were so kind and assured me that it wasnt a problem at all I left with a nice product printed in great quality with all the right colours  and even with the issues that we encountered  the entire process only took about an hour Quality product  reasonable prices  wonderful service

Name: A1697
Content: The service and price do not match the quality of goods Let me elaborate I walked in to get a logo printed on a polo for our company The logo print and shirt cost 45  + tax you can find online for 10  if you are willing to wait 3 4 days shipping with better quality shirts  The logo was too much on the left pectoral section of the shirt that it would fall into the crease of the armpit The manager/owner agreed to redo the shirt at zero cost and on a medium shirt instead of small At the same time  I brought in two shirts of my own to have the same logo printed Mid way through printing the logo on the two shirts I provide  the manger tells one of his clerks that they need to make me sign a form consenting that if the material is not 50 cotton/50 polyester they can not guaranty the quality of the print  and that the merchant can no be held responsible I do not sign the form  the clerk messes up one of the logo confesses its their wrong doing but informs me Ive consented even though I did not sign the form  I get home to find out the logo printed on the medium shirt they have redone has the same issue  the logo is too much on the left instead of being 1 inch from the button line as requested  I am confused on the lack of standardization and know how for a company whos clerks do the same work everyday Will gladly change review if they agree to remaking logo

Name: A1831
Content: I arrived at the store yesterday afternoon to have a Christmas present made for someone close to me It was a zipper hoodie with a small print on the front and a large one on the back I placed my order then went to eat something I came back and was told that there was an mistake made and it was being corrected That was fine mistakes are human Then I was asked if I wanted a white border around the back print I gladly accepted But then when I was shown the finished product  the white border was an irregularly broken white line around the back logo It doesnt look good One employee offered me a T shirt as compensation No replacement hoodie was offered I refused the T shirt since I had to make it home and travel many hours to see some family before Christmas I could have mailed the hoodie to my loved one after Christmas once the replacement was ready Thats my issue I paid 75  for something I was completely dissatisfied with and I was offered something that was worth half of what I paid The staff was polite and courteous  but Im very frustrated and wont return there

Name: A1843
Content: I ordered online and wantet it delivered to my house because I have a pretty busy schedule My order was missing letters When I emailed them  they were really quick in replying  however  I had to go to the store to have it sort it out At first  they decided to keep my orders to re sell it for 5   but they ended up giving it to me which I am grateful because it was supposed to be an inclusive personal design They had to redo all my 2 orders  so I ended up having to come back again The employee didnt wear mask He made another mistake and this time  told me he has to re sell it When  he had asked me if everything was okay  I looked at the print and found that it was crooked and so I told him But he said that because I was right next to him  I should have told him before pressing I mean I know that they just waste 3 hoodies because of print error  but it is not my job to tell them if it is well align or not  Anyhow  I am a bit disappointed on how this all went maybe I was really unlucky

Content: All I can say is wow Absolutely unbelievable service I called from Alberta on Friday night just as they were closing Not only did they stay open to complete the order they also delivered it later that night It was a perfect 80th birthday surprise Thank you so much

Name: A1855
Content: STAY AWAY FROM THIS BUSINESS Ive never ever write down negative reviews but I had this on my mind for too long First of all the idea of shirt printing is very nice and simple but Instacustoms is not a destination for that  they will take away all the pleasure and happiness behind this concept and give you a hectic experience Ive witnessed numerous gimmick and unsatisfied clients in this store but always kept silence about it Ive done hundreds of shirt and spent thousand of dollars with this company and I still had a disgusting customer service from time to another Ive been working in the printing industry my entire life The quality of instacustoms is great but the staff often remains unqualified due to poor and inadequate training I wouldnt blame the staff at all because they are very sweet  polite and simply do their job The lack of training is probably due to the high rotation of employees occurring because of the heinous administration I would blame the sickening owner of this business Hes characterized as a poorly raised  rude and disrespectful person He does not care about you nor your product and will make you go away to save a buck *** ps look at my pictures attached***

Name: A1856
Content: I had a great experience with the staff here  when the design I submitted couldnt be printed exactly how I wanted it  Alison and Nick were able to come up with a great alternative solution They took extra care to make sure I was happy with the final product before printing multiples The order was ready that day and my whole team was so happy to receive their shirts Thank you

Content: Normally I dont write reviews Instacustoms are the best in the market Dealing with them was very easy and service was 911  even better They did mugs for my 3 kids in 30 minutes and delivered to my office It was just as simple as sending them email with pictures and is done No back & forth about pictures formats  file size etc etc Hassle free experience Today I am doing more mugs for my daughters friend  Guess what on Sunday morning I have sent them the email and got a message at 11 am thats is Ready They are not only fast but Quality of their work is amazing I wish them prosperity and Growth

Name: A1896
Content: Really bad experience with these guys They quoted me a price for a big quantity of mugs for my business When time to place the order  the owner started to ignore my calls and text messages He had the audacity to block me instead of being professional and answer my calls I knew he blocked me because when I tried calling with a different phone he answered and told me not to call him anymore and to call the store When I called the store  the other owner told me they cant honour the original quote they provided  even though I have it in writing This screws up all my plans and promises I made my clients Stay away from these guys VERY UNPROFESSIONAL

Content: The store is very nice  you have the possibility to choose a variety of items compared to other custom stores The quality of the print is nicer Its much fancier than just the transfer paper other custom stores offer Honestly the service is great and the online service is fast and easy to do You can choose designs on your own and bring them to life I loved ittt

Name: A1916
Content: The experience was amazing  I came looking for a price and I left with a few items thanks to the great service and the help I got from Ruth She was amazing and makes me want to comeback and use InstaCustoms for all the orders for my business

Name: A1917
Content: Dont be fooled by the ratings and reviews You can go check the place out yourself but dont go just because the ratings are high This place has a really good rating so I called to get some information I spoke with Nick  asked him several questions and was told to go check the website for all my questions To be honest  this is a very disappointing service If a customer walks into the store and asks some questions  would you tell him to go check on the website? Being busy with a lot of customer does not justify your inability to answer simple questions over the phone You could very well explain your situation such as I would love to answer your questions but I am currently really busy with other customers  so it would be best to look for these information on our website instead of Hey sir  go check our website All I am trying to convey is that the service I received was far from what the reviews say Maybe I wouldve gotten a better response if someone else answered the phone instead and you wouldve had an extra customer

Content: Had a great experience at InstaCustoms The price was right and the quality of service made it quick and simple to get everything we needed Big thanks to Nick

Name: A1935
Content: The manager of this place is one rude and extremely uncooperative individual You would think a customized printing place would be willing to help you get you your order done just right but the owner/manager wasnt even willing to change the colour of a text before printing The staff is willing to help and is polite but the manager is a frustrated old man ready to snap at anyone who walks in Very disappointed in their service For the price they charge  their service is hopelessly bad If you are looking to have an unpleasant experience with your custom printing project then by all means go to Instacustoms

Name: A1936
Content: They do anything you want on a shirt that you can bring yourself Just amazing Great job

Name: A1937
Content: First time coming in to InstaCustoms  Great experience I walked in and was immediately greeted and assisted by  She explained the process and showed me where to find what I was looking for We went through the font choosing process together and that was it Definitely recommend InstaCustoms for any custom clothing/accessories you need

Name: A1938
Content: Yes  their service is fast  but the result might also show that the job was done fast The employee scratched some colour off the decal for my t shirt and just asked me whether it mattered if she cut the part where the scratch was off since they had to print a new one  she didnt ask if I wanted it bigger as I thought the first one could have been slightly bigger then  they cut the design very fast  some white is showing on the side of the decal  and it was not printed completely straight for that price  I may well buy my own transfers and DIY them instead next time also  make sure your design is the right size and colour because they dont recalibrate before printing Also  the staff could be friendlier and their music is so annoyingly loud  we almost cant hear each other

Name: A1939
Content: great customer service really professional  quick service great quality  so happy Thank you Nhu  she was so helpful and professional

Name: A1940
Content: Very good customer service Noemie is super friendly and understood right away what I was looking for I was in and out within 5 minutes and a great shirt Thank you very much

Content: Wouldnt recommend My experience with the company was in general a huge waste of time The quality of the product is okay  however I believe that we have evolved into a society where the quality of the product is not everything and the experience of the client is also very crucial On the website the company claims to be   the only apparel print shop that is specialized and ready for all [our] last minute emergency orders However  the company were not able to provide me with my order as we were in holiday season and the due date of the order was too tight for them even if they claim to specialize in same day orders When trying to give them more time for the order the problem shifted to not enough profit This explains my rating and my poor experience with them

Content: I visited Instacustom a few months ago in order to create samples for a company I am trying to start My first experience with the company was good in general and the product they provided us was interesting As we were satisfied with the sample we adapted our designs and returned to make new samples of the final product  which was also nice  but quite expensive to be honest as I am a student When ordering the official product in larger quantity my experience got a lot less pleasant After putting over 500  in their product for tests  the designs were now considered complex  the prints were now considered oversized and too time consuming for them In other words  I wasted a lot of time and capital Also  I was kind of surprised as they claim to be able to  put whatever you want onto whatever your heart desires We accept all types of orders so dont be shy There is no order that is too big or too small  Therefore  I was disappointed with my experience with them

Name: A2203
Content:
Please avoid this place at all costs The manager just tried to hit me I actually cant believe this happened I brought a couple shirts I needed to print that I bought at Costco and they screwed one the printing was noticeable disaligned and after trying to fix it  the shirt burned in some parts  They offered to give me a t shirt but I needed a shirt which they dont sell When I told them I needed the shirt replaced somehow  the manager came in and started yelling that the burning was some chemicals on the shirt and that the whole problem would be solved when I wash the shirt He then lost his mind He threw the shirts at me  punched the table and started calling me offensive names and actually came from behind the counter to hit me I then got scared and went to the exit Some people passing by where intrigued about what was happening and I just started telling them what just happened Then I look back and see the guy just coming back at me again  actually chasing me It was until I got into the metro that the guy went back to the store  always yelling at me and insulting at me 

I am more impressed than angry at this point How come a customer facing store is able to survive with such an aggressive manager?

Awful experience  dont wish it to anyone
