Name: A2727
Content:
This is a fun and eclectic store full of unexpected and unique items 

The store is packed  yet organized in a comfortable view The store is well lit which conveys cleanliness Staff are friendly but not intrusive 

One area of interest is their on site embroidery service There is a staff member at this area at all times 

What an awesome addition to Granville Islands atmosphere

Name: A2728
Content: If you like stuff and things  this place is for you Shirts  hats  socks  nick nacks  mugs  books It is a decent sized store with easy access and lots of paid parking outside Prices are fair even though its located in a tourist spot Even if you dont buy something  youll have fun looking around

Name: A2729
Content:
Great gift shop at Granville Island that sells an assortment of knick knacks  gifts  t shirts and items from popular TV shows and media 

There is also a customized engraving and stitching service that can make your gifts more special located at the back This service does require a reservation ahead of time

Name: A2730
Content: My company had a number of jackets embroidered by Make on Friday and I must say they did a great job Megan helped design our logo into an embroidery file and worked with us to get a great look We look forward to working with the Make team again soon

Name: A2731
Content: I like the quality of their T shirts and their customer service is above and beyond Ive made 3 sets of gifts with them For this last project which I did online  they found and sent me a proof to approve with a better  higher resolution of the image I was using And when I picked it up  the shirt looked great but the t shirt sizing ran small the gift I was making would not fit my sister  The manager helped me find a better size and reprinted for me no charge

Name: A2732
Content: Wow I just printed a shirt with Make online and had specific instructions/time frame I needed it for and the customer service was AMAZING Such an incredible team So very very helpful This is my first experience with Make but I will definitely be a repeat customer Thank you Make You guys rock

Name: A2733
Content: Ordered some custom gifts for Christmas last year and they went over very well They also have a lovely shop and tons of funky local gifts and things Only complaint is that my order took longer than expected and nobody called to say when it was ready Im sure it was an accidental oversight

Name: A2734
Content:
This place is amazing I needed some shirts printed super quickly and they did it the same day  I even needed to adjust the order and they accommodated me I cannot say enough about how friendly the staff is and how great they did
Thank you MAKE

Name: A2735
Content:
This place should be better known 

MAKE is a great option for when you want to give a personalized gift  or put your design on a standard household item You could buy a generic item from the internet  or just make your own for a similar price

Name: A2736
Content: We love this store So many amazing gifts Always great customer service We bought some t shirts and books

Name: A2737
Content:
A very well organized and bright store They carry clothing items  mugs  kitchen ware  jewellery and fun things

We had a great time looking around and picking out things we liked I especially liked their jewellery collection There were quite a few pieces I liked and their pricing is reasonable compared to some of the other stores

So if youre in this area  Id recommend checking this store out

Name: A2738
Content:
Expensive and incompetent staff I do not recommend this place for embroidery 

Placed an order for embroidery of 3 Christmas stockings and it was a negative and frustrating experience Got my stockings back without embroidery and a brown spot on the cuff 

After taking 10 minutes to place a straightforward order which somehow required 3 different staff members to chime in and me repeating myself multiple times  I paid the whopping  80 I was quoted  24 in the email it the gal didnt clarify that the fee was PER stocking Then I was asked to sign a waiver that absolves MAKE if they somehow screw up the project not exactly a vote of confidence 

Im told my order will take 14 days  not the 5 7 days that I was told via email 12 hours earlier I shake off it off  sign the form because I dont have time to look at other places 

The next day I receive an email without an apology I might add that they cant embroider the stockings and that I can come pick them up

**What should have happened The staff should have inspected the stockings on my first visit to determine if the project was feasible 

Three people gathered around the counter and not one person could do the intake professionally  A waste of my time  no embroidered stockings and a lot of unnecessary frustration 

Upon pick up  I had a similar experience  No less than FOUR people  One to initially talk to me  one to find the Xmas stockings  one to refund what I paid  and a 4th person to come talk to me to ask  does this require any further resolution? I could not believe she said that  No one was contrite or felt bad about the inconvenience or hassle The ambivalence was a turn off I get to the car  notice a brown spot that was not previously on any of the stockings Do not embroider here 

MY COMMENT TO OWNERS REPLY POSTED DEC 2/2022 

Im not entirely clear on what MAKE Vancouver means by setting the record straight My account is accurate and honest and already corroborated by MAKE staff in writing  which Ive pasted below Contrary to your reply  your team already acknowledged via email that they dropped the ball and were 100 at fault 

Following are the emails from your team  admitting MAKEs error pasted below 

MAKE Vancouver Email Responses  Nov 29/2022 

 1 
Hi Maria 

Yes 100 we should have spotted this issue and we recognise the inconvenience of having to come back to the shop to collect the incomplete order 

 2 
After reviewing your stockings with our production team & management we have identified some issues that were overlooked by the team yesterday when you were in As you know our main talking point was getting the sizing correct for you so I think this is why this happened The issue is because of the way the stocking is sewn we can not embroider it to the standards we usually would As a work around we did look at embroidering it differently but the metallic detailing on the stocking would affect the embroidery quality which we are not comfortable with 

So unfortunately we will not be able to continue on with this order for you We would be concerned that the end product would not be up to our standards and embroidering the stockings could lead to damaging them 

We will obviously refund you the full amount  80 64 when you come to collect them 
Megan 
Embroidery Coordinator

***MAKE Pls dont change the story to say I was confused  didnt understand  or that you were helping me  when it was the other way around I offered several solutions including abbreviated names  printing the names on paper to confirm fit  staying until your team was sure  and asking your team what they needed to fulfill the order Your team  all 3  said they were too busy to confirm the size and fit  yet they were all just standing there Its very unfortunate that you are deflecting and cant simply apologize 

Moreover  you did not do me a favour to accommodate an early pickup Rather  I upheld you to your original promise of a 5 7 day turn around stated via email 2x It takes about 5 7 days to complete stocking orders

Name: A2739
Content: I had a custom printed t shirt with them recently Their print out very fast  and fast respond in email and good services

Name: A2740
Content: I just want to say how amazing my first experience with you has been The website was very easy for me to use to create a custom product I made these shirts for my best friends bachelor party and they turned out perfectly As well I was extremely impressed with the speed of production and delivery I ordered them and received them 3 days later Fantastic service  great quality and very reasonable pricing I will absolutely be shopping with you again and will recommend your company to my friends

Name: A2741
Content:
We went to this store on our last day in Vancouver Their products were reasonably priced and tons of souvenirs to choose from My daughters bought their Adrian Klis bags at the Capilano Suspension Bridge gift shop and I found mine in this shop I was so happy to have found that they have the crossbody bag that suited my style The owner or so we assumed was very friendly and was chatting with customers  he complimented my choice of Adrian Klis bag and showed us his own wallet and how the leather will turn out after a few years I have read that bison leather develops a nice patina over time which makes each purse or wallet unique  and its so interesting how smooth and nice his wallet turned out 
I have been using the bag eversince  I love it and I love the smell of leather Honestly  I never thought leather could smell so good We probably would have bought more items if we were not travelling with carryon only I highly recommend to visit their store if you go to Granville Island  you would not leave the place with an empty hand

Name: A2742
Content: We are SO happy with how our company branded bottles turned out The team at MAKE is excellent and they really came through for us on this order We highly recommend choosing this friendly and helpful local shop for your next company branded merch order Thank you very much  MAKE

Name: A2743
Content:
*Edit* I was reached out to by the MAKE staff and had a nice phone call with someone who I assume is the owner She told me that the issue I had with the custom work was unavoidable as the material used in the process could only be as dark as it was and could not be made lighter She also offered to help me replace the wallet with a different one for a discount if my sister did not like it Therefore I would like to ammend my review and score with this new information I would like to once again extoll the virtues of MAKEs wonderful staff *Edit*

If I wrote this review after my first visit there I would give them 5/5 stars for their fantastic help and patience regarding my order I went there just a week before Christmas and even though it was clearly very busy and late in the day I was able to find a perfect wallet for my sister  as well as work with their embroidery department in finding a custom image for it to be special 

Unfortunately  after picking up the wallet and giving it a look I realized that the thread that they used to write her name down was the same colour as the wallet itself  making it almost impossible to see unless you look closely I am not criticizing their work  the shape and size are exactly what I was looking for  but I wish I could actually read the text 

I realized that it was messed up as soon as I took a close look at it There is not enough time I think between now and Christmas to have them fix the issue so I suppose I will be wrapping it as is for her present My only wish is that they had perhaps called/left a message letting me know about the issue with the black wallet/black thread I gave them my number when I dropped the wallet off at the embroidery department so it would not have been hard for them to give me a quick call/text asking me if I wanted to switch from black to white thread  or something like that 

Like I said this review has nothing to do with the service and actual product I still think the wallet looks nice at least I hope my sister will think so and the employees at the store were incredibly nice I have attached some photos to this review in order to show off my complaint In order to be as fair as I can be I have taken them in my lightbox so that they can be seen easier

Name: A2744
Content: What a great store and idea Very impressed with the staff who are ready to help you create The service is remarkable with lots of supplies

Name: A2745
Content: This was probably our favorite store on Granville Island Lots of cool stuff and unique apparel Cool vibe too Staff is very nice and helpful

Name: A2746
Content: Such a cool store An amazing variety of items from creatives and some very funny products in there as well Sure to get you some Christmas gifts off your list

Name: A2747
Content: MAKE  in Granville Island  has become a destination for anyone interested in original decorating ideas  and if you are a tourist visiting the area  Canadiana & souvenirs That said  MAKE is a one stop shop for your business & personal promotional materials Bring your corporate logo or idea  they can get it embroidered on baseball hats  t shirts  hoodies  or other articles Complementary to this  they provide printing services business cards  brochures and a long etc  Stop by  theres plenty of originality here

Name: A2748
Content: Excellent service Ive created custom gifts two years in a row here and I have been thrilled with the finished products both times The staff  especially those that have worked on my embroidered items  are fantastic  going the extra mile to create gifts that are really special I will definitely use them again in the future

Name: A2749
Content:
Cool place to get custom designs printed that doesnt have to be a bulk order  Their customer service is responsive and friendly  but I had a small issue with my custom order of tea towels Went to pick up an order placed online  and one of the towels had these black lines on the inside  very glaring against the white if it was opened up I asked if it would come off in the washer and they werent sure  so said theyd re print and it would be ready in a few days I had to make a second 30+ minute trip out to pick up the re print as mailing it to me would have cost money I wasnt thrilled about the additional trip  but the towels and coasters themselves turned out nice and are of decent quality

Just wish there was a bit more quality control in checking the towels before telling customers their order is ready for pick up in case there are ink issues  I had even emailed for pictures ahead of time  which they kindly sent  but just of the design and not the whole towel Would still recommend for custom items

Name: A2750
Content: I love visiting this store whenever we come by to Granville island  full of creative items

Name: A2751
Content: I placed my order yesterday afternoon and got an email this morning to pick up my order super fast When I went into the store  the layout was really efficient with many products displayed which you can use to print The quality of the printing was great as the colours were very vibrant Highly recommend for digital artists looking to design merch

Name: A2752
Content: Great gift shop packed to the gills with gifts for everyone in the family Lots of funny stuff  clothing  unique gift ideas and pop culture merch I wish I could go back so I could take a longer look Happy friendly staff and a bright atmosphere Make sure to stop in next time youre shopping on Granville Island

Name: A2753
Content: The cutest shop with fantastic employees I needed some embroidery done on a denim jacket I own We had a lot of back and forth as I changed my mind about placement I never felt I was being inconvenient or asking too much Our final design is amazing One of the best parts is they keep your embroidery digitized files forever  so you can keep adding them to things as you want down the road They do no minimum quantity orders as well as production scales I cant sing their praises enough tbh and cant wait to embark on other projects

Name: A2754
Content:
Lots of fun gift ideas 
Also a great place to print shirts or get custom embroidery 
A while back I got large patches for my toddlers friends that said east van tykes for some jean vests

Name: A2755
Content: I used to get great service last year  however  the new girl that works in the embroidery payed no attention to my requests When I came in for a refund  I got charged twice on my debit card What else can go wrong here I will take my money somewhere else

Name: A2756
Content: I cant in good conscience give the store 5 stars Basically dont order from here if you need something done within a week First sale person lost my order  second sales person lost my package Talk to the manager and they were able to get my mask in time for Halloween  but it took 3 people to get it right The mask I order looked better then expected and was of good quality Will be ordering again soon but hopefully with better results

Name: A2757
Content:
10/10 shop at this local business Not only are their goods curated with love  adventure 
and style  their customer service is impeccable 100 must stop in if your in the area I cant wait to come back

Name: A2758
Content:
BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I received a call and email and the staff were lovely They may be having a problem with their phone system and really resolved this order I will be purchasing from them again

RESOLVED Designed a beautiful sweater but there was a large darker square of the treatment used to make the design that is not going away after washing the sweater 
I cant seem to get a hold of Make over the phone I tried taking the sweater back but was assured the sweaters shaded box would go away after washing the sweater per the instructions but this is not the case Does any one have any advice on how to get ride of the treatment square?

Name: A2759
Content:
Fantastic customer service I place an order in a rush and they have exceeding my expectations Spoke with two different staff for assistance and both are extraordinary 
The matching father and son custom t shirt turns out absolutely perfect It is a gift and he loves it 
I would definitely be back for more custom products 

Thank you MAKE team

Name: A2760
Content: I placed an order in store for the embroidery the 20th of october i was told it would ready today the 1st of nov after 2pm When i came to pick up the order was not ready because the font size was far much bigger that what asked And accirding to the lady i spoke to they were unable to make it that size Nobody contacted me despite the fact that i left my details I had a refund Anyway the birthday gift is now a failure I do not it recommend

Name: A2761
Content: Crazy  creative stuff from wall to wall Very friendly staff For a small store  you could spend a while here

Name: A2762
Content: I highly recommend going through Make to get your custom clothing I primarily dealt with Alejandra  who was absolutely wonderful to deal with The process was so easy  and communication was clear and fast something many other companies struggled with  My custom hats were done and shipped so quickly  and they look amazing I will be ordering more items through them in the future

Name: A2763
Content: I was really just dropping in to pickup some t shirts I had ordered from Ole but spent a few minutes wandering around the store They have an assortment of odds and ends Fun to look at everything I should have said  there is a great selection of odds and ends and some really great and different items plus clothing Plus  as busy as the store was  a very pleasant sales associate helped me with my pickup

Name: A2764
Content: Friendly Helpful staffing Even when busy  staff will find you to be sure you find what you are looking for A welcoming atmosphere My daughter and I experienced on our first visit two years ago This always interesting shop maintains a must drop by while visiting Granville Island almost every visit there The variety of stock is amazing while staff is a main portion of our wanting to visit time and again Take care of your selfs staffers during this troubling time and see you soon

Name: A2765
Content:
Make provides excellent Customer Service I arrived with towels to be embroidered with names and logos Baby presents  Holiday presents  and present for newborn twin girls The staff at Make have so much patience and are so knowledgeable They worked with me with the colours of thread  offering suggestions and spent time to discuss the many logos available in their book How tall will they be? Should it be placed here on the towel  or maybe here? No question was too big or too small 
By mistake  the colours on one of the towels was placed wrong 
Courtney  the Manager phoned me to apologize and offer to correct the error 
I continue to order embroidery work from Make 
The recipients of the gifts from Make are always pleased 
Try their work You will be pleased with the Customer Service and the finished product 
Make is my  go to place for that unique  personable item

Name: A2766
Content:
I ordered a special T shirt for my wife I looked at her clothes at home and they were mostly size S with a few Ms The person at the store said that I should go with an M because they were a bit undersized 

My wife opened the box on Christmas day and gasped She said this must be a childs size even though the tag said Ladies medium We returned to the store with one of her medium T shirts that was noticeably much larger We were very happy with their customer service  they acknowledged that sometimes the label doesnt accurately reflect real world sizes The promptly made us another T shirt It is size XL and its a nice fit 

We are so happy that the staff handled it as they did Excellent customer service

Name: A2767
Content: I recently gave a low review as a result of an email not being answered The day after the manager emailed me personally to apologize for the lack of response Her and the team went out of their way to not only make sure to design my shirt for me  but also offered to make it for me free of charge I felt a little guilty accepting the offer but I appreciate that they did all this for me and went way above and beyond what they had to do They had it done for me in less than an hour and the workmanship was perfect It was like they knew what I wanted more than I did Ive had them design various items for me in the past and have never been anything but 100 percent happy with the quality of work I will continue to go here and would reccomend them to anyone looking for custom t shirts and anything else of the sort

Name: A2768
Content: Working with the team at MAKE was such a great experience I made a bulk order of custom masks for members within my organization  and they were so great to work with The turn around time was super speedy and the communication was excellent Not to mention  the masks were beautiful Would definitely recommend and will use again Thanks MAKE

Name: A2769
Content: Very fun items  found some nice cheap stuff ar clearance bins too

Name: A2770
Content: I had a new dad with a birthday emergency and Make came through They printed a very sweet photo of dad and baby on a T shirt and a mug in four hours FOUR HOURS Im sure that is not always possible  but I am so grateful for their cheerful speedy service Thank you Phaedra

Name: A2771
Content: If I could give 6 stars  I would Terrific customer experience at Make  including fast email responses to my queries  next day scheduled appointment  and efficient and friendly service from 4 different staff members that yielded two great products one embroidered  one printed  Couldnt be happier with my shopping experience Thanks much  Make

Name: A2772
Content: Went here for the first time today to get some custom buttons made Fiona was very quick to assist me  and was really nice to have some casual small talk with while she made them up for me I felt very comfortable browsing around  a very casual calm atmosphere and I never felt like I was pushed or pressured into buying anything The very reasonable prices only about 8 dollars for four buttons and the very genuine  warm and casual customer service I received here today will ensure that I will definitely be back

Name: A2773
Content: I love this store so much Whether youre visiting Vancouver or have lived here for a while  this store contains some great novelty items and creative fun and strange gifts for those you care for If you have never been Id go check it out at least once You can also create custom T shirts for like 30 or 40 dollars Theyre pretty good quality too While youre at it  I also really liked the Front & Companys novelty shop on Main Street Ive bought lots of gifts for friends from both locations

Name: A2774
Content: If your a tourist  this is a great spot to buy souvenirs and fairly priced

Name: A2775
Content:
Love the gals from the printing department at Make My father in law is running the BMO Marathon so I had some Team Tim T shirts made for the family who will be at the finish line Now I am not the most creative person in the world  so I had some help from the girls in the store to pick a really awesome font and design In the end  they helped me design shirts that looked super cool and way better than any regular shirt that Ive seen in other printing places The choice of fonts and types of shirts available are what made the big difference Not only did the shirts turn out great  but they were also done within 15 minutes When I said that my parking time would be up soon  the girls who were helping me with the order understood and were able to do the three shirts on the spot for me I was so thankful
Great store  great staff  and great printing Cant wait to do my next order Definitely recommend

Name: A2776
Content: Special thanks to Yasir for the speedy turnaround & help w my custom laser engraved notebook I love the diverse selection of brands and friendly staff  thanks to Yasir  Meg  & Nicole for a great experience

Name: A2777
Content: Spent the day at Granville Island and walked into the Make store We spent over an hour there looking at all their neat and different merchandise Customer Service Representative Hannah gave my friend and I excellent customer service  and I felt like we had made a new friend by the time we left the store with our purchases Highly recommend and stop by say hi to my new friend Hannah

Name: A2778
Content:
Prices are competitive and people are super nice in store and over the phone 
Brilliant customer service they helped with the online ordering which included finding  sizing and uploading an image This made me place a quick  local custom order instead of looking at ordering existing stock with questionable fit and availability from someplace else 
Placing the order was straightforward  item was delivered exacly as ordered and on time in just 3 days

Name: A2779
Content: This store is really cool It has a little bit of everything  but its a bit expensive They have some really cool accessories for yourself and your house Books  bags  shirts  sweaters  mugs  notebooks  cutting boards they have it all I definitely recommend coming here if you are at Granville Island

Name: A2780
Content:
This shop is the place to be on Granville Island

There is something for literally anyone  buying presents for relatives and friends here is so easy  even if theyre really fussy  you can get almost anything personalised  so why not?
The staff are always smiling and welcoming  informative and also put you at ease in case youre doing any last minute gift shopping too I had a t shirt made at the Mighty Prints station at the back in which I could pick 100s of options  or bring in my own photos/ designs too I had this amazing yawning cat done with a strawberry patterned background  the colours are crazy vivid and I have washed it quite a few times now  no difference whatsoever to the shirt I cant wait to create another shirt in store and also bring my mum a hilarious tea towel as a souvenir thats a unique design from the creators in store 

Over all a wonderful experience and would recommend for anyone to pay a visit too  really fun and interactive 
Thanks Make

Name: A2781
Content: The mighty printing on customing garment item is a smart idea And it works most of the time What I mean is that some times there will be a lot of unprinted areas because of some folded areas on the shirt But the result of the printing looks nice I love using their customizing functions Im still exploring

Name: A2782
Content: Excellent custom printing services and really great  knowledgeable staff Have had around a dozen short run projects printed here on shirts  journals  etc and am always happy with the results Being located on Granville Island I initially presumed services would be more tourist centric but they offer a range of printing options I havent found anywhere else Turn around times have also been great Will keep coming back

Name: A2783
Content: They helped me out with custom work and were super helpful

Name: A2784
Content: Been going to MAKE for the past 4 years and its so easy to get lost in all of the unique items they have From clothing to jewelry to fun conversational pieces  its definitely a go to place for gifts and items to have at home Wish they had a location in Toronto

Name: A2785
Content: T Shirts are hilarious and if the color or size doesnt suit you  theyll print you a new one in a couple of minutes Lots of other cool stuff to buy  sold to you by a fun staff Always worth a visit

Name: A2786
Content: This is a fun store with lots of unique and custom gifts Lots of fun pop culture items

Name: A2787
Content: I am replacing my original review with this because Floor Manager Courtney took the time to personally contact me to rectify the issue I had She showed excellent customer service  acknowledgment  and professionalism That means a lot to me Very much appreciated Thank you

Name: A2788
Content: Always one of my favourite stores to visit when in the area So many fun products by artists worth supporting

Name: A2789
Content: I hadnt been here in a long time and decided to stop in and I felt really uncomfortable The message that a lot of their products are conveying is extremely divisive and I dont think thats what we need right now

Name: A2790
Content: Unique and hand merchandise available that would make a great gift for someone They also have some sustainable/recycled material products with some purchases resulting in trees being planted Very cool store

Name: A2791
Content: I recently had occasion to use Make Vancouvers embroidery services for some corporate work From initial contact via email  to in person consultation and test sew out  the team there were wonderful The final product was beautifully done and really had dimension I highly recommend you check them out Make Vancouver is so much more than embroidery  and its worth a visit to this very unique store and all they have to offer

Name: A2792
Content:
The staff here is great even when they are swamped 

There is always something to spend money on and its fun to window shop 

Have made some great t shirts here and found countless gifts 

Parking at Granville Island is not always easy but if you can be patient you will find a spot

Name: A2793
Content: MAKE came in first place when I needed custom embroidered polo shirts in time for a conference Working on a tight timeline and I only need a few shirts 2 3  no one else in Vancouver would work with me due to limited time and qty The whole process from start to finish was smooth Yvonne and team in the embroidery department worked with me to ensure I liked the mock up and got these done in time The quality and care is top notch Also  bonus that they are open on the weekend Thanks

Name: A2794
Content: Just tried this company this year and have been thoroughly impressed The customer service is top notch  something you dont see nowadays I will always recommend this company Thank you MAKE Vancouver

Name: A2795
Content: Beautiful place Fantastic job and top notch quality

Name: A2796
Content: Had worked overtime to place a big order did not receive any updates so we assumed all was good  then we went out of town and our bank flagged a large transaction so cheque was blocked which our banker can confirm We came back only to find Stacy Nicole Hall the Business Owner wrote on our consignment business page and google review an awful unprofessional review without even resolving the matter with us This is completely unprofessional and a bad case of slander as the order had NOTHING to do with our consignment business She had disclosed private information on her disgusting review as well which is beyond comprehension from a business perspective We also never received an email from them regarding this matter so we were absolutely NOT aware that there was even a problem with our order We sent an email the day we returned after hearing msgs from our bank regarding a suspicious large transaction that needed our verification which we failed to verify on time so we immediately advised them that we will be coming in to pay in person yet she went out of her way to write us a very rude and awful review Great customer service skills and what a way to problem solve Very very disappointed I would not order from them if youre a business  looks like they have zero patience and would go out of their way to slander your business We had expressed the importance of this order and the deadline we were working with so we were NOT by any means avoiding or not paying for the order It was simply lack of communication due to bad reception out of the country The staff we worked with for the order were good but definitely not impressed with the owner Do I have to worry about my copyrights to our print order too? Wheres good old customer service? Shame on you Stacy Hall Stacy Nicole we have email records see photo of your HR Manager Katy King apologizing on your behalf along with all your staff that were shocked of how you handled this matter  on the email it clearly stated that you will remove all posts regarding my business and you had left the google review posted for 2 months We had paid our balance the next day we came back to town and you failed to keep your word Remove your google post or legal action will be taken

Name: A2797
Content:
Still the best tourist place 
Nice public market  and nice show as well

Name: A2798
Content: This place is and always has been fantastically run Been getting hats  shirts etc embroidered for years hear and have never had anything resembling an issue Staff is always friendly and happy If you need anything done this is the place to go

Name: A2799
Content: Fantastic company  fantastic staff Amazing Lauren especially was exceptional and I would recommend this company for their professionalism  their concern and remarkable ability to forfil your needs in everything they do 5 stars is not enough rating for my thoughts on this company Keep up the great work And again very special thanks to Lauren

Name: A2800
Content: Loved the difference in this store Imaginative T shirt images and motiffs I particularly liked the Canada provinces explanations A two hour wait for a motiff was too long for me though and as I live in Europe I did not expect it to be shipped Staff were helpful and pleasant

Name: A2801
Content:
First  they were open when I needed them to be  on BC day  a stat holiday Then they were incredibly helpful  professional  and expedious Lastly  when I had trouble  their customer service was amazing Lauren is an angel  Rebecca is fantastic  the gentleman at the counter was a joy  and clearly whoever is doing the hiring is great at their job 

A friend recommended them to me and I will recommend them further

Name: A2802
Content: I was really happy with the T shirts and tote bags I had printed at MAKE for my business  Eves Crackers Quality printing and a lovely  helpful staff Great turnaround time as well

Name: A2803
Content: We thought it was great Has the standard lineup of Fred and kikkerland  but I love that you can get quirky vancouver related items Especially love the make your own t shirt and button stations Super nice and helpful staff on top of that Check this place out

Name: A2804
Content: We drove directly to visit this shop  but were disappointed It is almost nothing to buy We liked two T shirts only Nothing special and extraordinary which I could buy no matter the price Moreover the shop is small and have very limited variety of products Nearby shops have better assortment

Name: A2805
Content: Good quality of design and fabric

Name: A2806
Content:
Do not go to this store for engraving  their level of expertise and customer service is severely lacking After purchasing a ceramic mug expressly for the purpose of having it engraved  and upon the recommendation of one of their employees  another worker disputed their own engraving capabilities  and sent me away 

Im now left with an expensive mug that cannot be returned  and an overall bad experience of this shop There is an apparent disconnect among their workers regarding the know how of their own services

Name: A2807
Content: Doesnt even rate a star Extremely  extremely disappointing customer service Did a custom order online  received email confirming order was being fulfilled and even given a tracking number for expedited shipping After a week I tried to track my order  but there was no movement on my package Communicated with Make and found out my order had not even been started Asked them not to ship it Said I would come in and pick it up as I wouldnt receive it in time Drove in from Abbotsford and spent over two hours in rush hour traffic only to find out they had shipped it earlier that day It was Friday  I needed it for Sunday Was to be used at my mums 75th birthday party 75 Thats a big deal Was severely disappointed that they didnt even care how badly they had let me down Didnt even get an apology from the manager

Name: A2808
Content: Ordered three items one mask  two shirts and was very impressed by the quality of each

Name: A2809
Content: MAKE always has the coolest gifts  from the typical novelty ice cube trays to the seam to seam all over print custom t shirts Its one of those stores that are a must visit everytime  even if its just to aggressively browse their selection

Name: A2810
Content: I needed to get a sweatshirt printed for the next day and MAKE just did the trick I placed my order in the evening and it was ready for pick up the next morning Quality is amazing too this is definitely my new go to place for custom garment printing Thanks MAKE

Name: A2811
Content: This is such a cool and unique store that has something for everyone I especially like it for those hard to buy for people The staff are super helpful with gift suggestions if you are stuck

Name: A2812
Content: Great service and support for my custom shirts Be aware though  that the shirt sizes run pretty small

Name: A2813
Content: I always get fantastic service from the MAKE team whether its a custom order  online purchase  or a question over the phone  they are quick  efficient and knowledgeable On my go to list for great gifts

Name: A2814
Content:
I really love the service at Make and the quality of the work done each time I go What amazed me even more was the one time they actually made a mistake Why? Simply because they looked into the issue  found the error  fixed it  and then went the extra mile to make sure that I was a pleased customer 

What more can one ask? A business that stands by its work and cares about customer satisfaction Wow What a concept Well done  Make Vancouver

Name: A2815
Content: So many cool products in this store I could have spent a couple of hours Store staff are great  knowledgeable and friendly Go see Charise for some on point product advice and more importantly some life guidance  like Arnold  Ill be bach

Name: A2816
Content:
Wonderful  friendly staff
I had a custom face mask done  and it was very quick from the time of ordering until when it was completed  great job  too

Name: A2817
Content: They have cool gifts and special Vancouver themed tshirts and cool hats They can custom embroider or screen print too Great staff  everyone is super friendly and helpful

Name: A2818
Content: If youre a designer and you want to make one off t shirts  hoodies  flasks  cutting boards etc this place is for you Its pricey though like getting a print job of one anywhere its to be expected other than the fact that their business is based on serving a clientele of single print jobs

Name: A2819
Content: Service was fast and merchandise was hilarious Didnt end up trying the maker side of the store  but it looked super interesting I ended up buying 3 pairs of socks

Name: A2820
Content: Really good store to make custom gifts Staff really friendly One of my favorite store at Granville Island

Name: A2821
Content: Its ok Not as good as I remember  catering more to tourist than creators trying to prototype an idea The staff was friendly but thats the only reason they get 3 stars Its called MAKE not MADE

Name: A2822
Content: Got a shirt custom printed and Im pretty happy with it Some of the colours arent very bright but I guess I should have guessed that with a shirt fabric choice  just wasnt expecting it Still a nice product overall though

Name: A2823
Content: Great store with a lot of cool stuff Staff are great Fast turnaround on custom stuff A must see store if youre on Granville Island

Name: A2824
Content: Seriously amazing Phaedra was so helpful and so fast helping me make my t shirts I was blown away by how sweet and helpful all the staff were in the whole store

Name: A2825
Content: Staff are polite enough  however after spending a lengthy phone call confirming what I needed to bring  I was told upon arrival that I need to email them the image instead of having it on a USB NO solution was given other than I have to go home and email it despite having everything they needed on the USB The most the staff could do was look at each other blankly Would have given them one star if were not for the polka dot dress one of them was was wearing Do not serve cheese on toast

Name: A2826
Content: Fun store Low quality product Good for gag gifts though

Name: A2827
Content: I had a great time making birthday presents for the young ones in my life Ross helped me design some tote bags and I couldnt be happier

Name: A2828
Content:
I had an image digitally printed on the back of some coveralls They did a terrible job  with a crease running through the graphic and several circular impression from the buttons on the other side of the coverall 
I could have accepted the poor quality to some extent if they had demonstrated some remorse  but they also failed on customer service The first approach was to try and convince me that it looked used I agree and thus better I disagree  The best they could offer was that next time I come in I could talk to the manager and theyd see if they could do something for my next order Thats fantastic  but why would I ever go back to MAKE?

Name: A2829
Content: Its a cool store with very neat curios and novelty items Definitely worth checking out Oh and they also do custom printing on items of clothing

Name: A2830
Content: Had one issue but was resolved accordingly with great customer service Courtney went above and beyond what I had expected and displayed sincere integrity Thanks MAKE

Name: A2831
Content: In this store you can find so many original stuffs Even if its a bit expensive  its the perfect place to find a gift 4/5 because I definitely dont recommend the t shirt printing service

Name: A2832
Content: Lovely space with amazing options

Name: A2833
Content: We ordered custom print mugs from Make Fantastic product  fantastic customer service Will definitely look to them first in the future

Name: A2834
Content: We have been getting our uniforms embroidered at Make since we started our company We love your shop and staff

Name: A2835
Content:
Great support  quick to answer E mail
Had to repeat myself over E mail a couple of time and also they didnt communicate with me about the sizing on the T shirt  which ended up costing me 2 prints instead of one 
Still  I would go back and next time go to them and clarify in person how I want the print

Name: A2836
Content: Ive used the custom printing service several times and the service and quality of items Ive recieved has been HOT FIRE I will continue to be a regular customer

Name: A2837
Content:
Needed custom t shirts
Printed and was impressed with service and quality Would recommend

Name: A2838
Content: Filled with interesting things and giftables Varying price range from sub 5 dollars to over 150 When Im in Granville island I always like to poke in to see whats new

Name: A2839
Content: Awesome Experience  super helpful staff and best prices I could find for a custom made shirts Overall would highly recommend

Name: A2840
Content: LOVE this place |Makes gift giving so fun and artistic  you can literally go nuts in here The staff are so professional and fun as well

Name: A2841
Content: A lot of quirky and fun stuff You can customization clothing here as well If youre in Grandville Island  definitely stop by just to browse the funny T shirts

Name: A2842
Content: Wide array of gifts Tentree selection in the back

Name: A2843
Content: One of my favourite stores in Granville I could spend hours here browsing all of the fun  unique merchandise

Name: A2844
Content: MAKE Vancouver has given me incredible customer service  and the mask I ordered looks fantastic I definitely recommend this business

Name: A2845
Content: Kind & knowledgeable service  quality products  reasonable prices and excellent workmanship Highly recommend  will definitely collaborate with MAKE again soon

Name: A2846
Content: MAKE is a must see at Granville Island Always come out with a laugh or inspiration for creative ideas Very kid friendly  with clothing  designer items and gizmos for all ages

Name: A2847
Content: Staff are super friendly and knowledgeable I was waiting in line at the back of the store one day to place a hat s order and a staff member saw that I had been waiting about a few minutes  even when I wasnt supposed to be helped I was asked if I needed help

Name: A2848
Content: Thee best shop on the island  top notch things to look at and better yet buy Must stop here everytime Im in the area

Name: A2849
Content: A true gem in vancouver awesome designs of tshirts  bags  accessories  and fun products Oh  and you can actually request a tshirt design Pay them a visit

Name: A2850
Content: Cool creative options for t shirts or hats and lots of fun novelty items as well Definitely a must stop when visiting Granville Island

Name: A2851
Content:
Staff are friendly and helpful 
You can find tentrees products here 
Lovely gifts and crafts

Name: A2852
Content: One of the more unique stores in the city Lots of fun items that would be great gifts and the can customize many different types of things

Name: A2853
Content: Fun gift and novelty store that has friendly staff and hip vibe You can get lots of custom embroideries or prints too

Name: A2854
Content: Really interesting store Not your regular tourist shop You can design your own tshirts

Name: A2855
Content: Awesome shop Fun staff  unique Vancouver products  reasonable pricing Supports local contributors

Name: A2856
Content: Awesome/unique nicknacks for my clients & top notch customized merchandise with primo customer service  a Granville Island staple  highly recommend

Name: A2857
Content: Great place for gifts/souvenirs albeit somewhat pricey Our guests went home with arms full

Name: A2858
Content: Interesting place to visit if you are passing by Lots of cool knick knacks to admire Great for quick and easy gifts

Name: A2859
Content: Firstly  this place is illegally not accepting cash And its like government propaganda with all the vaccine pushing

Name: A2860
Content: Amazing job Thank you Phaedra and staff The T shirt we have ordered is lovely

Name: A2861
Content: Highly reccomend the leather notebook engraving for graphic designers  1 EPS file and a couple of hours later I had some amazing looking designed notepads

Name: A2862
Content: Just love all the wacky/hip/edgy stiff you can get This store made my room like 45 better

Name: A2863
Content: Cute shop with a lot of unique products Love stopping in here when we are in town

Name: A2864
Content: Cool staff Nice clothes and gadgets selection You can make your own t shirt too

Name: A2865
Content: Such a cool store  so many options for gifts Great Canadian souvenirs too

Name: A2866
Content: Interesting little place that you could spend ages in Has quite a few things that Ive seen in other place but still worth a look in Staff know what theyre doing too

Name: A2867
Content: What an excellent shop The tee shirts I bought will keep me going for a few years

Name: A2868
Content: Love the art community  variety of shops & market Its a nice way to spend a Sunday

Name: A2869
Content: The team at Make recently went out of their way to help me with a last minute request They were fantastic to work with  I highly recommend them

Name: A2870
Content: Great store  and cool products but customer service lacks sometimes

Name: A2871
Content: Awesome and unique gifts store  so many options and interesting things

Name: A2872
Content: customer service 11/10

Name: A2873

Content: As the name MAKE suggests  you can make your own original goods  such as embroidering your own logo on a baseball cap or transferring a childs drawing onto a cloth bag T shirts are usually printed in batches of 100  but at this shop  one print costs from  26 + T shirt fee you can bring your own  There are many unprinted T shirts  hoodies  and hats in the store  so you can choose your favorite size and design There are many goods designed by local artists  so if you are looking for a unique souvenir to remember Canada  this shop is definitely worth a visit

Content: They will lose your order at least once Some of the employees are rude and the store isnt very organized Bring in your shirt is a must cause their shirts arent breathable Quality of the work is good considering everything you have to go through If you can find another store that does this work  go there instead

Name: A2986
Content: Ordered 20 shirts to be printed  was a rushed order so I can understand a slight to moderate decrease in quality as well as an increased price What I do not understand is why almost all of the shirts ordered came stained Im not sure whether it is stained with bleach  or if the printing ink leaked off of the design and onto the fabric of the shirts  either way this is completely unacceptable for an almost  40/shirt order I strongly suggest going elsewhere for having your shirts printed  as this company will not only deliver low quality  but will also ruin your shirts in the process with stains

Name: A2987
Content: Very pleased with my order here  got 8 shirts and 4 sweaters for my business Quality House Cleaning everything matched up to exactly what we wanted Will definitely be buying more in the close future

Content: These guys recently closed their shop at merivale mall and  in my case  owe me  81 Unfortunately the owner isnt answering his personal cell phone leading me to believe ive been scammed Please avoid

Content: All around 5 stars for Maple Imprint Amazing customer service  great price  and the print came out exactly as we wanted it  it turned out to be a perfect birthday gift Will definitely come back

Content: Terrible imprint work Poor quality of service  did not find anything wrong with bad workmanship DO NOT WASTE TIME AND MONEY WITH THEM

Name: A2992
Content:
They are very friendly people and have excellent customer service

they are on time and very cheap price

Name: A2993
Content: I dealt with the owner Ratin Mustaeen he was so knowledgeable and creative I got 70 Jerseys for Basket ball event Service was great  very high quality  communication was very smooth Everything was done in the right time frame and he met my expectations I looked around the city and the prices i got at Mapleimprint was very fair I highly recommend for anyone i would rather meet someone in person and have connections rather than order online

Name: A2994
Content: Love this place came here to have clothing made for a tv series were making be coming back for a bunch more

Name: A2995
Content: have had great experience with Maple Imprint I must appreciate its printing quality and responsiveness in customer service I have dealt with Arif in the store He was very supportive and did everything to deliver what I want

Name: A2996
Content: Thank you for another successful project I am I am very much satisfied with the quality of its vinyl thank you thank you thank you

Name: A2997
Content: The best shop Quality products  on time  great staff  super printing The best results Dont hesitate  order from them

Name: A2998
Content: Quick and fast Excellent service I will come back

Name: A2999
Content:
I am so pleased with how my design has turned out; printed Thanks to Mapleimprint for making my design a pretty reality

I ordered a Gildan Crewneck sweatshirt  and it is so soft and cozy The screen print looks flawless and better than I had anticipated I havent washed the clothing yet but Im hoping the print holds up 

I am already in the process of completing my next order and cant wait to start designing more

Name: A3000
Content: Bought 2 sweaters  I later got an email saying they are out of stock so they offered another brand in the same colour I asked if the order could be canceled  called twice  and still am yet to get my refund

Name: A3001
Content: I ordered a sweater from Maple Imprint for myself and I was pleasantly surprised  my family and friends and I are all pumped about it You can customize whatever you want Make it look deadly on high quality apparel  Definitely going to order more

Name: A3002
Content:
Was surprised to get a custom t at a very affordable price 
The staff are very pleasant and are happy to help the customers in every possible way The design and quality of the fabric looks fantastic

Name: A3003
Content: If they mess up your order  dont expect them to care My item contained a large area with bright poppy red  and when it came out as a dark cherry  they acted like I should have known No apology  nor effort to fix the issue  despite voicing my displeasure Quality left much to be desired Poor communication Wont return Very disappointed

Name: A3004
Content:
First time ordering a custom hoodie  tried this company since the price was right and reviews seem ok  though the final product did not turn out as intended 

First  the design tool preview is not a good representation of what youre getting In fact  I dont think the person who makes the print even looks at the preview as mine was totally different I asked them to hold off until I change the image to help them fix their problem  but they went ahead and edited my image instead and printed it 

The final product was not bad  but not exactly as designed since the image was edited poorly to fix their problem I still ended up accepting the order since they put so much work into it But overall I found my experience to be too much of a hassle  so I would not recommend

Name: A3005
Content: Paying good money for lousy service I bought 5 shirts with prints and 1 shirt was done right

Name: A3006
Content:
I came into the store looking to pick up a sweater The worker was praying in the back room  as I stood waiting for 20 minutes I tried getting his attention but nothing 

Im so disappointed in the service At least he could have put a sign up to let people know he will back Never going there again

Name: A3007
Content: First time printing my own t shirt and the service was fantastic Waited a whole 10 minutes  Will certainly be coming back again

Name: A3018
Content: As a small business weve had an incredible experience working with Chris and the rest of the team at Ottawa Shirt Printing We just received our second order of merch for our gym Chelsea Athletica and were super stoked about how it all turned out We emailed them with our merch designs and they delivered exactly what we wanted on great quality sweaters  long sleeves and t shirts They always answer promptly and extra bonus is their free delivery in the Ottawa/Gatineau area

Name: A3019
Content: Chris was super helpful and awesome to work with We communicated several times to revise my design and ensure my hoodies and t shirts would be exactly what I was looking for They were delivered on time The quality of the shirts and hoodies we selected is amazing  and I couldnt be happier with how my logo screen printed turned out I would highly recommend

Name: A3020
Content:
I highly recommend Ottawa Shirt Printing We have used them several times for shirts  hoodies and toques and they have yet to disappoint Great quality  pricing and top notch customer service 

Keep it up guys A+

Name: A3021
Content: Im travelling to Spain to visit friends and I got this very last minute idea to bring them custom T shirts Ottawa Shirt Printing was incredible They printed and delivered the shirts directly to my front door within 3 business days  right in time for my flight The shirts look great and I cant wait to gift them to my friends

Name: A3022
Content: Ottawa Shirt Printing provided us excellent service in 2020 They printed golf shirts for our executives and staff for a charitable golfing event that exceeded our expectations Also  with a very short turn around time  they printed sweaters for all our staff as a thank you for their hard work and dedication I would not hesitate to recommend Ottawa Shirt Printing  they are professional  providing quick quotes; they are responsive  answering questions quickly and adjusting requirements quickly and with ease; and they provide good quality products with excellent value

Name: A3023
Content: I ordered some hats for a hockey team Ottawa Shirt Printing was very quick to respond while getting the order ready and delivered a great product ahead of schedule Im very happy to have dealt with them

Name: A3024
Content: Weve used Ottawa Shirt Printing for the past few years and we have nothing but glowing reviews for this company Chris and the team always provide timely and professional service We reached out to OSP in need of some merch for our student body Chris and the team promptly answered any questions we had and got everything done and delivered quicker than we expected

Name: A3025
Content:
The team at Ottawa Shirt Printing were fantastic to work with They made the ordering process easy and were great communicators My order was ready in a timely manner and delivered with care The shirts are super comfy and the printing was CRISP

Looking forward to working with these guys again

Name: A3026
Content: I absolutely loved Ottawa Shirt Printing  they communicated with my team throughout the whole process and helped develop the design The products turned out amazing and exceeded my expectations

Name: A3027
Content:
Ordered around 70 shirts with logos printed on chest  arm  and size tag Shirts came in looking great Owner responded quickly to any questions  and when there was a little mixup with the sizing of the shirts he threw in about 20 extra shirts for the trouble Would highly recommend 

Shirts ordered were Bella+Canvas in black and grey colours Super soft and comfortable

Name: A3028
Content: Amazing service  one philosophy of Ottawa Shirt Printing has  make the buyer whole Could not recommend them more If your looking for quality in product and service this is the number 1 company to work with

Name: A3029
Content: Chris did some work on my company t shirts Very impressed with the quality of work and communication You got my business for life

Name: A3030
Content: Chris and the team at Ottawa Shirt Printing were super helpful from start to finish They replied to emails within 48h  were very flexible during the design process  and their prices were super reasonable Also  the quality is fantastic We will definitely be ordering from Chris again

Name: A3031
Content: Very smooth experience from start to finish Chris was easy to communicate with by email I appreciate being able to accept the proof before confirming the order I received the shirts within a week even despite a big storm in Ottawa impacting their power source I love how the design turned out and the quality of the shirts are good

Name: A3032
Content: I have ordered shirts as a gift for my parents Great service from this amazing local company I have chosen them based on the good reviews and now I am leaving one Chris from Ottawa Shirt Printing has been amazing throughout the whole process  he even rushed the order and organized the delivery to my door even if my location was out of the delivery zone Thank for the professional service  you deserve the best Keep up the good work

Name: A3033
Content:
Amazing service  print and apparel quality We came to Chris on a couple of occasions for our company apparel needs He was quick to respond  provided detailed information and advised us on what would be the best solution  and the products were quickly printed and delivered to our door
Even better  when we ordered the second time around it was seamless since they still had all our info and graphics on file 
I would highly recommend Chris and his team for all your branded apparel needs

Name: A3034
Content: We placed a large order for our University Organization and everything was really well done The sweaters are great quality  at a very good price Additionally  the customer service was amazing They were very responsive and made sure we were more than happy We will definitely be ordering again

Name: A3035
Content: Just received my shipment from Ottawa Shirt Printing and I cant explain how amazing they look Ordered different t shirt sizes for my business and Kris did an amazing job helping me with the design and order Excellent quality definitely recommend Thank you Kris

Name: A3036
Content:
Ordering from Ottawa Shirt Printing was a great decision for my small business
This company was referred to me by a friend/fellow entrepreneur and I am so grateful that I always start with friends recommendations I asked about the company after buying some of the merchandise she had ordered and I loved the quality of the shirts  even several months after purchase   washing and wearing I knew this is where I wanted to start with my own order Affordable and local are two qualities that I cannot say no to

The shirts I ordered turned out beautifully and the company was friendly  accommodating and communicated with me throughout the duration of our transaction 
Dont hesitate to place your order with Ottawa Shirt Printing Im already working up my next order

Name: A3037
Content:
Contacted Ottawa Shirt Printing services for a couple Polos  which eventually turned into a few polos 

Shoutout to Chris for quickly answering questions which helped speed this order along 

From confirmation of the order to delivery  it was about 4 business days 

Highly highly recommend

Name: A3038
Content: They did a great job Collaborated and gave advice to help us with what we needed Really happy with the results  and well definitely be coming back

Name: A3039
Content: Chris and the team at Ottawa Shirt Printing did an excellent job at making sure that our custom shirt printing project was done just right  confirming with a proof and making any needed adjustments at my request They made sure that the shirts arrived in time for the requested deadline I would definitely recommend them and will be using them again in the future

Name: A3040
Content: Amazing service Quick to respond  patient  helpful  and friendly Pricing was good value Chris from orders & processing was fantastic to work with Quality was great  very happy with the order Looking forward to doing business with Ottawa Shirt Printing again

Name: A3041
Content: Fast and efficient service  we had our jerseys proofed  printed and delivered in under a week Only complaint would be difficulty getting someone over the phone but their response to emails was quick and the shirts turned out great

Name: A3042
Content: Fantastic overall experience Reached out to OSP in need of some shirts to sell as merch for my band on a couple upcoming shows Chris and the team promptly answered any questions I had and made me feel super comfortable They got everything done in a two week turnaround and we couldnt of been happier with the results

Name: A3043
Content: Had two designs printed for my band Fair rates and great quality Both shirts came out brilliantly  and were delivered to me on schedule Couldnt have asked for a better customer service experience I recommend OPS to everyone reading this You wont regret it

Name: A3044
Content: I reached out to Ottawa Shirt Printing for a large company order and was extremely impressed Our account manager Chris  was very helpful and quick despite the multiple changes I had made to the order I am very pleased with the product and would recommend them to anyone

Name: A3045
Content: I ordered t shirts and hoodies for my small business Chris was very quick to communicate  the quality of the shirt was better than anticipated and the turn around time and price were both quite good

Name: A3046
Content: We got two batches of t shirts and longsleeves made for our company and Chris was very communicative and helpful in fulfilling our order Both the shirt and screen print quality are great Will definitely order from here again

Name: A3047
Content: Really helpful throughout the process  we provided 2 shirt designs and they were able to make them work  at competitive pricing  resulting in beautiful shirts Not to mention they were able to deliver during these difficult COVID times Would definitely recommend their services

Name: A3048
Content: Great service  great products  and swag our team absolutely loved Chris and the team at Ottawa Shirt Printing were fantastic  and helped us to navigate with flexibility and friendliness Thanks for our awesome gear

Name: A3049
Content: Super quick response and turnaround time Chris was really helpful throughout the process and the quality of the shirts and prints are fantastic Highly recommend and will be ordering again

Name: A3050
Content: My experience with Ottawa Shirt Printing was perfect from beginning to end Chris is extremely professional  responsive  and honest I am so happy with my companys new sweaters Between design and delivery  they were completed so quickly and are excellent quality I highly recommend Ottawa Shirt Printing for all of your custom apparel needs

Name: A3051
Content:
I ordered a custom sweater for Christmas and the turnaround was amazing Quality of the shirt and the print is a great value and I received it way faster than I expected 

If youre looking for great quality custom shirts for a great price  Ottawa Shirt Printing is it

Name: A3052
Content: Fast and efficient service Chris was very quick to respond and very helpful with our order The price was better than the large online companies Definitely recommend for your t shirt needs

Name: A3053
Content: Ordered crewnecks and hoodies for our graudating class  and they exceeding our expectations and delivered them on time Was really impressed by the quality of the embroidery Would use them again

Name: A3054
Content: We used Ottawa Shirt Printing for our 2020 program swag order and found the service and quality of their products fantastic While there were a couple of small hiccups along the way mock ups had to be re done  one of the sweaters was accidentally not included in the delivery but still made it to us less than 24 hours later  and stock ran out before we could place our order for one of our style options  this was resolved by choosing a slightly more expensive but higher quality style option the orders representative was more than willing to quickly resolve any issues that we had  and helped to mitigate the effect of corrections We also are in love with the product quality and the clarity of the embroidery  and will likely use this company for future swag orders Well done

Name: A3055
Content: I ordered shirts for my rec league softball team The shirts were printed quickly and delivered within a couple of weeks I worked with Chris  who was really helpful and made sure that I was happy with the design

Name: A3056
Content: Ive used Ottawa Shirt Printing for all my merchandise and I am beyond happy Chris is extremely communicative and is very accommodating with all my needs I would and will recommend them for anything and everything they do in the future Would give 6 stars if I could

Name: A3057
Content: Recently placed an order  was delivered ahead of schedule right to my front door Product quality was excellent and everyone loved their shirts

Name: A3058
Content: Chris at Ottawa Shirt Printing was great to work with He had excellent communication throughout the entire process  had great recommendations for garments to use and delivered a quality product ahead of schedule 10/10 would work with Chris at Ottawa Shirt Printing again

Name: A3059
Content: Even after multiple order changes on our end  Ottawa Shirt Printing ensured the order was correct and on time The shirts are fantastic quality  and the logo looked great We cant wait to wear them at our family reunion I highly recommend this vendor if you are looking for great quality  speed and efficiency They always got back to me within the hour if I had an order change or a question  which was a huge help

Name: A3060
Content: My experience with Ottawa Shirt Printing was amazing They were responsible  had great suggestions for products and the items arrived earlier than expected Cant recommend them enough

Name: A3061
Content:
I ordered some T shirts and a few Sweat shirts for my business 
The sizes chosen were a true fit and the quality is amazing 
I gave them a few pictures to create a logo for me I was impressed 
I will recommend this company to many of my self employed friends 
Thank you for the great work and fast delivery 
Jesse Roy

Name: A3062
Content: If youre looking for good quality and a great price  look no further Our business recently bought 25+ plus shirts from Ottawa Shirt Printing  and our experience could not have been better They were polite  professional  and honest We recommend them over and over Thank you Ottawa Shirt Printing

Name: A3063
Content: I had a great experience with Ottawa Shirt Printing I needed t shirts printed within a tight timeline  and Chris was very helpful in answering all my questions and delivering my order earlier than expected I would definitely work with the shop again and recommend it to others

Name: A3064
Content: Very happy with the service I received from Ottawa Shirt Printing The Gildan soft shirt was exactly what I wanted  graphics and print was as expected Will be using them again for our next order My only caution is when selecting colour  make sure you get the exact colour you want The colour on the screen doesnt 100 match the colour you receive Overall  very satisfied

Name: A3065
Content: Awesome embroidered hats The black is very saturated & dark which looks great Our logo looks perfect A bit of a delay on the original delivery timeline but they rushed it out to make sure we had it in time

Name: A3066
Content: Great quality shirts not the kind that you fold three times and theyre still thin as paper  the artwork looks great and the customer service is outstanding Chris would go above and beyond to ensure everything is perfect I recommend this business to everyone who needs a custom made shirt and Ill definitely order from Ottawa Shirt Printing again

Name: A3067
Content: We ordered many custom t shirts for our Space Apps Ottawa event They were responsive  followed up with us to make sure they arrived in time for our event  and the design and quality are great Were very happy with our t shirts and the service

Name: A3068
Content: It is hard to just emphasize one attribute of this wonderful company that hands down completed a large and detailed order due to all the customizations and multiple communications with exceptional professionalism and competence I get incredible feedback regarding the orange shirts they made in several sizes and languages for our orange shirt fundraiser to advance Indigenous reconciliation in terms of the look and quality of the original print by Traditional Teacher and Artist Albert Dumont Chris was also relentlessly in actually finding me orange shirts despite huge demand and shortages everywhere Always calm and easy to communicate with even when I was sometimes a little stressed out Highly recommend if you are looking for any orders

Name: A3069
Content: ok  not only are the fast But i have worked with many T shirt printing and embroidery places this place is HANDS DOWN the best experience i have ever had Product is produced quickly  response time is timeless  and the work itself on the product is so professional Their selections are great and offer a mass variety of accessories and clothing it multiple styles/colours totally coming back

Name: A3070
Content: Highly recommend this company to anyone I received my order a week earlier than projected Everything was exactly as described and the pricing was very competitive Customer service was speedy and co operative Thank You Ottawa Shirt Printing

Name: A3071
Content: Needed some shirts for my business and they turned out great

Name: A3072
Content: Ottawa Shirt Printing did a great job getting our order of T Shirts ready for the Ottawa Regional Science Fair They communicated regularly with us to ensure that our artwork was correct and that the sizes and numbers were exactly what we needed for the event They even had our order delivered for us This was our first time ordering from Ottawa shirt Printing and I can see us continuing with their services next year

Name: A3073
Content:
Although I originally had a negative initial experience they reached out to me offering a solution with the intent to meet my needs They came through and provided me with a great product at a reasonable price and were committed to ensuring I was satisfied with the overall service I would like to recommend more transparent pricing  and in doing so they would likely stand out from their competitors as it seems no printing & embroidery business in Ottawa currently provides pricing estimates to their clients up front 
I appreciate the time Chris took to reach out to me and ensure I was happy with the results of their service I will come back to them for business in the future

Name: A3074
Content: We loved the t shirts They looked even better than we expected We are very pleased and would recommend Ottawa Shirt Printing to anyone A pleasant experience dealing with them and they delivered on time Give them a call and see for yourself

Content: Couldnt be happier with my experience with ottawa shirt printing They were extremely responsive and the quality of product blew us away we use them for all the merchandise for our store and are only ever going to be using them

Well the guys loved the shirts Thanks for the speedy custom order as well Amazing service and product

Name: A3078
Content: First time using Ottawa Shirt Printing and had a fantastic experience I ordered a small batch of 60 t shirts for my non profit organization and the team at Ottawa Shirt Printing gave some great advice on the colour of shirt I should print my logo on  the final product turned out looking a lot better than I had anticipated Prices are very competitive and will definitely use them again for my next purchase

Content: I shopped around for a quote before proceeding with my order for custom printed tote bags and Ottawa shirt printing offered me the best price Very happy with how the printing turned out and good quality tote bags I would recommend Ottawa shirt printing for custom printing of logos

Name: A3080
Content: I have had multiple orders done by Ottawa Shirt Printing Chris is quick to answer any questions and is happy to help Ive changed the orders each time between the payment and actual print They have never made a big deal of it and are happy to help

Name: A3081
Content:
Great customer service  quote and order done online and through email  made for a very convenient process Love how the t shirt turned out  great selection in shirt colours  would have given 5 stars if I knew they were made so huge I would have chosen a different size and now its too late  

**update** since my review  they offered to make me another shirt in the size that works better and I couldnt be happier with the customer service I was able to pick up the new shirt asap and they told me to keep the original as well I will recommend them to everyone

Name: A3082
Content:

Name: A3083
Content: Great service They were quick to turn around the graphic and the shirt order The shirts are bright and well printed They even changed my delivery address the day of because I was staying late at work I will definitely order with them again

Name: A3084
Content: This Spring was the second time I have gotten our company shirts printed through Ottawa Shirt Printing Super easy to deal with and the drop off of the finished shirts to my doorstep was a huge bonus The quality of the printing is by far the best I have seen I have tried a few other different print places but none of them held up to the sun and regular washing as well as these did Really great quality at a reasonable price

Name: A3085
Content:
It was great doing business with Ottawa Shirt Printing They were very quick to reply to my questions  the drafts they sent of the shirts were accurate and provided enough detail  and the final product was great Chris was extremely helpful in making sure we received our order in time on a tight deadline Definitely plan on ordering from them again in the future 

UPDATE 2021 Another order with Ottawa Shirt Print and am still just as pleased with the service

Content: Submitted a large order and got it within about two weeks Great quality t shirts and embroidered hats Also very responsive via email Will definitely order for them again

Name: A3092
Content: Great experience ordering from Ottawa Shirt Printing The shirts I ordered turned out great  above my expectations The order was completed faster than I expected I highly recommend this place

Name: A3093
Content: Had an amazing experience dealing with Ottawa Shirt Printing I needed a rush order of shirts for the groomsmen for a stag & doe Found the website on google  sent an email as it was after they closed To my surprise  the owner emailed me back that night We were able to figure out the details over email  and had the shirts in 2 days The quality of the shirts were better then I expected and the price was very reasonable I will be back for some bachelor party shirts  but will give you a few extra days notice this time

Content: We had a very good experience working with Ottawa Shirt Printing Chris was very responsive to our needs and even with a few glitches on the day of delivery came through in spades Would highly recommend
