Name: A3097
Content: Ive dealt with this company 10 times now EXCELLENT customer service  the prices are more then fair  quality of the shirts last exceptionally longer and the final product surpasses any other company Ive dealt with  If you need custom shirts I vouch for them Looking forward to dealing with them in the near future

Name: A3098
Content: Very happy with the print quality and they delivered my order ahead of schedule Not my first time looking for ottawa t shirt printing but the last place I was using closed so I switched to Ottawa Shirt Printing and am very happy with my new t shirt printer

Name: A3099
Content:
I recently had shirts made for my father in laws 60th birthday We ordered them on Saturday and they managed to have them ready by Tuesday evening which was considered a rush order  There was a mistake with how the shirts were printed there was no h on 60th birthday  so it read
60 t birthday  However  we brought it back to the place where we picked them up in Carlingwood mall and they fixed this within an hour  and were very apologetic 

Chris gave excellent customer service  he was responsive  patient and flexible We are pleased with how the shirts came in  even better than what we expected 

My only other comment would be that the womens V neck shirts fit on the smaller side In street clothes Im typically a XS or S  and I ordered a Medium which fit perfectly The mens crew neck shirts were true to size 

Overall  would highly recommend Great work

Name: A3100
Content: Ive ordered shirts and sweaters from this company with various designs and they delivered them flawlessly I am sure to look them up next time I have a shirt that needs to be printed in the Ottawa area

Name: A3101
Content: So easy to get a bulk order with custom colours we got 100 tshirts in two different colours with two different collar types  a single logo in a single colour  Tshirt material is nice and soft  delivery is on time and quite convenient Good quality  good service  good price I will return to Ottawa Shirt Printing for a third year next year

Name: A3102
Content:
This Shirt manufacturing company has amazed me time and time again The service offered here is unfindable anywhere in Ottawa in regards to this industry  they tallor to your every needs  even after hours I have ordered everything from team jerseys to personal clothings and have been satisfied with every purchase 

Would recommend to anyone 5/5

Name: A3103
Content: Our organization is satisfied with our custom T shirts printed by Ottawa Shirt Printing The shirts were printed with attention to detail  and the shipment was delivered within 24 hours of completion Thank you

Content:

My last order was responded to / quoted / customized / ordered / printed and delivered in less than 48 hours I had a personal deadline and it was met 

5 Stars

Name: A3222
Content: I was looking all over for a place to do a VERY short notice run of 35 shirts for a special event for my company Terry at Ottawa Custom Clothing was the only person who was willing to take on my order Even though the original artwork I sent him needed to be updated he still had my order complete and shipped in the appropriate time and I received them before the event with time to spare I am very pleased with my purchase and recommend this business  I will order again

Name: A3223
Content:
Initially good service but then no updates or notices when product was mailed out even after I emailed them for updates Package was missing a shirt and now they are not answering my emails or calls Do not order from them 

Update after posting this review I was contacted to fix the mistake by another employee I was hopeful at first but they are no longer answering emails asking for an update or refund its been a month since I heard from them  Dont shop here  not worth the effort to get what you paid for

Name: A3224
Content:
I put in a test order of  75 because of the negative reviews on Google Sure enough  I had a bad experience 

Their budget went into the website to give it a professional design and features but all other aspects of this company are poor to say the least 

Customer service is either unresponsive or evasive I didnt receive an e mail with tracking when the items shipped  they just shipped it Prior to that  Ive asked to do local pick up  was told yes  and they shipped it anyways They used a Purolator bag to ship through Canada Post not a big deal but rather strange 

I got the custom shirts and the quality is low compared to what youd get elsewhere 

Save yourself the trouble  I went through it so you dont have to Youre welcome

Name: A3225
Content:
Never answers their calls or emails 

Ended up being over 50  for two plain white t shirts with 1 logo on the front

Was supposed to come on Feb 3  ordered on january 18 we had to call them to remind them to ship it out It finally came on Feb 10th And they are the wrong sizes

Ridiculous

Name: A3226
Content: Client service is amazing Super friendly team  great product quality  and overall such an enjoyable company  Way better than ordering from big chain manufacturers  you get to actually work with real people If I could  Id give 6/5 stars

Name: A3227
Content:
Not a great experience Do not recommend 

Ordered placed mid June for 8 t shirts 4 adults  and 4 youths  At the time of order  I was given a July 1st estimate for shipping and my credit card was charged immediately On July 5th I reached out via email to Ottawa Custom Clothing inquiring on the status of our order and received no response Called on July 6th and reached someone on a cell phone who sounded like they were out for a walk Was told during that phone call that they werent at the office and couldnt help me and was told to email Order was then received on July 7th The adult shirts were ok but the ladies version of the t shirts were just the unisex  and not the correct sizes The youth shirts brand and colour was substituted so they do not match the adult shirts Ottawa Custom Clothing has not responded to emails or phone calls 

Ill chalk this one down as a loss and not use them again in the future

Name: A3228
Content:
*Updated Review after receiving order*

Order of 2 shirts finally arrived after nearly 2 months They are as described but I feel I missed how they are made when I placed the order I was expecting an embroidered logo  however they are simple iron ons that literally take 5 minutes to print and apply In that respect I am disappointed  but glad I have backup shirts for my VistaPrint ones 

Secondly  I was surprised that an Ottawa based company doesnt produce locally My order came from A Popular Company from Kazabazua  QC After trying to find info on this company  I found nothing Big red flag right there I get the whole 3rd party reselling but be transparent about this 

Lastly  I cannot excuse the complete lack of communication I phoned twice and spoke with Terry who was nice and all  but never followed up with me Customer service is extremely high importance so I hope theres improvement there 

All in all  Im fine with my  130 purchase but this place definitely needs to improve if they want to succeed further And I hope they do

Name: A3229
Content: The people who work here are amazing Diligent  they take pride in what they do Highly recommend this team over any big chain business

Name: A3230
Content:
I placed an order a month ago and they havent contacted me in any way except to send the receipt  and havent returned my emails or calls when the product was supposed to arrive 2 weeks ago I saw on their Facebook that they mentioned delays earlier in December  however the least they could do is to send an email to notify their customers currently waiting on orders that they may experience a delay 

EDIT The sweater I ordered did arrive a month or so after the expected delivery time While the quality was good  they still never returned my calls nor emails  and only reached out to me to take down my review

Name: A3231
Content: Im literally a broke college student I work two times a week making  15 an hour I cant work a lot because im in school right now Im taking art and i wanted one of my designs on a sweater so i ordered from this place Was suppose to get it March 2nd never got it emailed them and they told me it would be shipped out March 4th I ordered it in February It is not March 23rd and still nothing I emailed them twice about a refund and how i dont want the order now and nothing I literally have no money as it is i wanted the sweater and didnt get it now im out like  80 thanks a lot guys great service

Name: A3232
Content:
Ordered a custom tshirt in dry fit for working out Received it in standard cotton which made it not fit for purpose Emailed them to get it rectified and still no answer weeks later 
Printwell in future for me

Name: A3233
Content: Ordered 55 sweaters for my company in early Dec 2020 Received my delivery on time  and everything was there  with no errors The embroidery looked great I was happy to be supporting a local Ottawa company I admit I was a bit worried after hitting a full voicemail box a couple times  and when the sample sweater took longer than expected to come However  Terry always returned my calls thanks to caller ID as well as my emails He was knowledgeable when recommending products that matched my budget and features The Ottawa Custom Clothing team pulled it off brilliantly  thank you

Name: A3234
Content:
Placed an order in Nov Didnt arrive in time for the holidays All good  called in January and phone was answered Inquired about specific order Person on phone confirmed the number I called on and indicated theyd call me back No call back Called later that week and next week  no answer Left a message  no answer Emailed with a follow up  no answer Finally  I emailed telling that I would be canceling the order and leaving a review on line I received a response within a half an hour claiming that I seem to have a vendetta out for them 

EDIT expect angry emails post review??

Name: A3235
Content: I was very eager to get clothing printed for my new established business I found OCC on google Terry was very fast to answer after 9 00 pm Sent me a sample of what i wanted within two minutes and my order was placed right away My items were delivered promptly and by the time he had said All i can say is he met my expectations and beyond I appreciate it OCC

Name: A3236
Content: One month after the delivery date and my shirts never arrived  and there was no response to my emails or phone calls Im all for supporting small business  and understand that smaller operations can get overwhelmed That being said  they shouldnt be accepting peoples money  providing delivery dates  and then disappearing I had to dispute the charge with my credit card company  just a big waste of time

Name: A3237
Content: My single t shirt order is over a month post ordering and almost a month over the expected delivery date June 23rd  I have tried to inquire what is happening with my order through their website  through email  and by phone there voicemail is too full to even leave a message  without any response The customer service is poor If you read any of the other reviews which I regret not doing before ordering  you will notice many other reviews similar to mine current and older ones too  I am just frustrated that they have taken my money without the delivery of goods and zero communications about what is happening I hope to still see my product soon  but even still  I DO NOT RECOMMEND this company

Name: A3238
Content:
I placed my order through the website and this company was quick to email me back Communication was great and professional Because I ordered over 1000 shirts  hats  and hoodies  it took a few phone calls to iron out the details  but they were very patient with me 

From begining to end it was a positive experience Delivery was on time  and the price was pretty good Ottawa Custom Clothing will have my business again

Name: A3239
Content: As of today July 15th  2021 the order placed on March 31st  2021 has not been correctly fulfilled A mistake was made on the printing of the majority of the order and while trying to resolve the issue  this company has been almost impossible to contact The last email from the company was on May 25th  2021 when they cited the reason behind the slow communication was because they had a big order Im sorry but every order should be treated with the same respect  and our order was not insignificant I have tried calling and been met with a full voicemail They have our money and we have unwearable items due to a misprint I would take my business elsewhere  but they still have our money

Name: A3240
Content: I ordered 48 shirts from Ottawa Custom Clothing and they turned out beautifully The staff member who assisted me was very helpful and patient when I was placing my order The service was excellent I had a really good experience The price is very affordable as well I will be ordering more shirts in the near future for sure

Name: A3241
Content: Ordered a shirt a month ago Expected delivery October 22nd Didnt show up Called on the 28th Person said they were doing a delivery and would check on the order when they got back home No call back Email  no answer Check the status on my order number  page doesnt show up Called two other times  no answer  full mailbox Out  35 Local shops like this make Amazon look great Beware of this scam

Name: A3242
Content:
UPDATE I am STILL waiting for my missing T Shirts Currently August 16  2017  No one is answering my phone calls so I am going through my Visa to dispute the charge What a nightmare this experience has been

I am still waiting on T shirts from an order placed on May 30  2017 Currently July 21  2017  They sent some but miscounted and left out 28 shirts I have been trying to get the missing shirts for over a month They are impossible to get a hold of and unbelievably unorganized They told me the shirts have been shipped weeks ago but havent been able to tell me with what company or provide a tracking number Now they are no longer answering my emails or calls Worst customer service experience I have ever had I wish I had checked the reviews before using them because clearly I am not the only one who has been left out to dry by this terrible customer service I would not recommend this company to anyone

Name: A3243
Content: If I could give zero stars I would Placed my single shirt order over a month ago No shirt  no communication from OCC Sent email  no reply Call  no answer DONT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THESE CLOWNS

Name: A3244
Content: A M A Z I N G experience with Ottawa Custom Clothing Terry was extremely helpful  meticulous and patient with my order Had some challenges with other companies getting such a large order in on time  but Ottawa Custom Clothing really pulled through Great quality shirts Very pleased with this service

Name: A3245
Content: Terry  became very busy with the onset of Covid and received a crazy amount of orders After receiving poor reviews he corrected  provided refunds  and hired on staff to make sure they got back to customers in a timely fashion I would give them another shot for sure just because he reached back out to let me know of the changes

Name: A3246
Content:
My order was due last Friday  I have been trying to contact them by email and phone call and I have received no answer  now that I read the other reviews I guess this company is a scam  do not order from them  I wanted to support local but this is what I got for it What a disappointing experience 

Update I got an answer about my order  it wasnt placed yet  it was incomplete  due to back order they gave me the option to actually send it or refund the money and I didnt want to take the risk so I asked for a refund and I received it  so it is not a scam  just a company with delayed deliveries and bad customer service

Name: A3247
Content:
Throughout the span of a week I emailed twice and called twice and left a message but still no response on the order /

Edit After posting the review I got a call and discussed what was happening with the order We cleared things up and the guy on the phone was nice but the fact that ordering from the website is only for artwork or that theres 2 emails was still confusing

Name: A3248
Content: This is the third time I have bought T shirts for my company from Ottawa Custom Clothing Terry was extremely helpful  The t shirts were better then I expected and exactly what I wanted They were completed in a timely fashion and the professionalism was 2nd to none I will only buy my T shirts from Ottawa Custom Clothing GREAT JOB

Name: A3249
Content: Despite some minor delay in the communication and delivery of my item I am satisfied with the service A very kind gentleman made everything possible to catch up with the production of my order and delivered it in person to my address the same day That was a very positive experience

Name: A3250
Content: After a mild misunderstanding regarding the delivery date  I received my long sleeved shirt today  and I must say the print quality and the precise application of my final custom design are flawless  Thanks Terry for a great product

Name: A3251
Content:
Ive read the other reviews and Im honestly shocked with the way these people slander this company Our company started doing charity runs 2 years ago and have ordered shirts from OCC 3 times Large orders at that of 300+ shirts and not only did the owner go out of his way to make sure our order was correct he ended up hand delivering them to make sure they arrived for our event because of the postal strike 
Thanks OCC Keep up the good work and well be talking to you next summer

Name: A3252
Content: Had such a wonderful experience with Terry at Ottawa Custom Clothing I needed some t shirts printed for a fundraiser in my art business  in a short amount of time and Terry not only managed to print them  but he delivered them as well This level of customer service was very much appreciated And the t shirts turned out exactly as I had imagined Thank you for everything

Name: A3253
Content:
Worst customer service I have ever dealt with 
Emailed over 20 times and only replied once I left voice messages and still no reply 
Tried to cancel order but instead ignored all my 20 plus phone calls and 20 emails and just sent the shirts 
When they were delivered the shirts were the right size but i order three hoodies 2 large and 1 small They were delivered all medium So cant use them at all Tried to call to get it fixed and still no answer to calls or emails 
Will never do business again or recommend

Name: A3254
Content: I ordered a large batch of custom t shirts  3/4 baseball shirts  and baseball hats and am very happy with the finished products The quality of the shirts is great  the logos turned out really nice  and the colours are exactly what I expected Every time I had a question or sent an email  I received a detailed answer right away Its clear that the professionals at OCC take pride in what they do  I would definitely recommend them Great prices too

Name: A3255
Content: Great company  great quality on the t shirts and tanks  and amazing customer service for communication inbetween They met my deadline which was not alot of notice and the shirts arrived a week earlier than I anticipated  thank you thank you I will be ordering again in future  and recommend OCC Thank you so much for all your help Terry & your team

Name: A3256
Content:
Possibly one of the worst customer service experiences Ive ever had 

Ordered and paid for my shirts on June 21st  with a guarantee that they would be finished and delivered by the 30th 

I was then told that they wouldnt be delivered by then  but if I drove up to Wakefield  QC  I could get them the Saturday morning July 1st 

Drove up there About 45 mins one way to a very messy looking house with puppies that were left out in the rain all night  alcohol bottles and wine glasses all over the front area of the house A man came stumbling out shirtless  half asleep to tell me that they had been shipped out with Purolator on THURSDAY Two days before I drove up and no one could shoot me an email? Or give me a phone call?

After the weekend since they were closed I called Purolator to see where the package was They told me that someone from Ottawa Custom Clothing had called them that DAY and told them to return the boxes to the shop in Wakefield

After all of this trying to get ahold of someone again was a nightmare Multiple unanswered phone calls and texts 

When I finally did get a hold of the company days later I was told that no one could drive the shirts out to me and they would have to be sent via Purolator again I FINALLY received my shirts yesterday July 6th 6 days after the promised delivery date 

Nothing about this experience was professional or efficient I will never be using this service again and will be advising others in the Ottawa business community to stay far  far away

Name: A3257
Content: these guys have the worst customer service  they dont answer phone calls  they dont respond to voice mails  once you give them your money they stop caring they were also 3months late on some shirts I ordered and during those 3 months of me trying to get in touch with them they responded back to me once and made promises they did not keep I will not do busy with this company ever again

Name: A3258
Content: i asked for a marine blue shirt web sample and i received a green shirt with different prices and script that I asked Their web site has a do it yourself mode and the price is quite interesting but when you exchange by email the price is totally different i sent email back with no returns Thinking may be the person i dealt with was not right  i tried again using their info e mail adress  still no answer Ho  also i received an invoice before aprooval of the order weird way of doing business

Name: A3259
Content: I ordered 420 shirts and hoodies for my company and they were great Staff is friendly Ordering was a pleasant experience

Name: A3260
Content:
Worst experience ever
 took for ever to get an email reponse

 terrible customer experience  main problem communication

 when they got back to me they kept saying we are busy with other orders
 Do NOT negotiate price cause the owner will call you out that your nickel and diming him owners words 
 my shipping date arrived but I never recieved anything so I emailed him back and he said Im in the middle of the order and that it will take longer

Content: I used Presstime for my first ever crewneck order and Ricky and his team were amazing Kind  knowledgeable and so quick with responding to emails My order was super small but they treated me like gold The product turned out way better than I could have imagined and Im absolutely thrilled Thank you Ricky and team for holding my hand and delivering a top notch product <3 Narwhal Nest

Content: I recently got some enamel pins made by Presstime Design and it was a wonderful experience They were super prompt at getting back to me  very clear and informative  offered some great input on how to tweak my design for best results as a pin  and were generally very nice and friendly to work with The pins turned out amazing  there was a quick turnaround and delivery  and I will one hundred percent be doing business with them again in the future

Content: Hey guys Level 10 Local Guide here  10th Prestige Owner of the Iron Chef Critique Badge Welcomed and known in all provinces and across all states  here to bring you a review  done in my classic Lotus Style of typography because Presstime Design comes just in time to provide prints with no stress that look just sublime Located in the heart of the quaint Rose City  you wont be stressed or pressed for time when Presstime Design presses your precious designs Would give 10 Stars if I could  but google wont allow it Gonna email my google PR correspondent about it tomorrow to see what I can do

Content: I had over 50 ATC hoodie sweaters with our company logo supplied and printed from the courteous staff at Presstime Design & Screenprint We have ordered a lot of logoed clothing for our business in the past  and I can attest that our order was priced fairly  and delivered promptly My experience with Presstime Design & Screenprint was excellent and I will be returning to them for future orders

Name: A3379
Content: I run a small business  and as it grows i need affordable  flexible and quality solutions for all things merch But more importantly i need it to be Reliable  On time  looking the same  and high quality  every time And thats why a friend  and also small business owner  referred me to the gang presstimedesign and im glad he did Now  theyre the only ones ill deal with Consistently knocking it out of the park Its a relationship  that will grow along with the ups and downs of my small company

Name: A3380
Content: When they were in LA and they were a smaller company they used to be amazing Now they are too big to be bothered to have decent enough customer service to make things work smoothly The quality of the products is still pretty good  but every order that gets made has some sort of technical hang up now And it takes forever to get through the customer service chain to anyone who can actually help Two stars because I still do like the quality of their printing

Name: A3381
Content:
The first issue is the inferior quality of items and printing We used and ordered a wide range of shirts  hoodies  sweat pants  water bottles  phone cases  jackets  and dozens of more items over the last 9 months The product quality and printing were always inferior  faded and blurred even though their system assured the print quality and files were good 

The worst part has been dealing with them when multiple packages placed by various customers fail to arrive They do nothing to track or notify of these events and then absolutely refuse to assist in any way to help resolve the issue They refer you to a website that is in Chinese and proceeds to tell you that youre on your own from there since they have it marked that they sent it out 

After several customer complaints  we gave them the benefit of the doubt  but the same issue keeps reoccurring  and they refuse to help or support us It has been one problem after another  and they refuse to take any accountability for assisting the customer using their platform 

In addition to these major issues  they have a bunch of hidden fees and price increases that they do not inform you of so we were actually losing money on many items even AFTER we marker them up 5 10 

Again  we wanted and tried to make this service work and gave them more than enough chances to help us stay a customer If SERVICE and quality are essential to you and your customers  you should avoid using Printful by all means necessary

Name: A3382
Content:
Terrible Quality Control Their printing quality is bad for shirts  mugs and posters I received my samples only to be disappointed The shirts were printed poorly with no line definition Same thing with the mug  cheap and poorly imprinted The poster was also fiasco  it seems that they dont know how to use a plotter Not one product was produce properly 
Quality control should a priority for you company  so your clients can receive quality products If I received some of the products you sent me as a gift  I would be offended  it was that bad

Name: A3383
Content: Easy to create and so many products to choose from  plus free designs and fonts available with free integration to major ecommerce platforms They have great online chat support  so you can ask anything with fast response They provide so many professional mock ups ready for posting  takes the hassle out of making your own mock ups  I love it

Name: A3384
Content: I love the material You can wash it over 1000 times and it will never fade The design I decided to put on it is so vibrant  even though its just black and white I love this skirt so much It was also definitely true to size and fit me perfectly

Name: A3385
Content:
Gotta say the Printful yoga leggings are my most comfortable yoga leggings The printing quality is good and the design team is easy to work with As a textile designer by trade I wanted to make sure the colors reproduced true to my design The design team was very clear on what I needed to do The customer service team is AWESOME Very responsive
I plan to keep working with Printful for my online store

Name: A3386
Content:
After doing a ton research  Printful was the first company I tried for my online business Now  after spending many months building my website and creating lots of products I have a fully functioning store with hundreds of options on apparel and accessories In this time I have also looked into other companies and even tried a few  and I have come to the conclusion that Printful is the best option for someone like me that wants a full line of designs and products  but does not have capital to order inventory They also seem to be the only truly free option where they only make money from you if you sell products

Pros There are no hidden fees and they dont charge you to integrate with other sites  like your own website  Amazon  Etsy  etc Most of the products I have gotten have been really nice The print and color quality on the all over print products is really amazing Plus  every sample I have ordered looks just like the mock up  thats pretty unbelievable since they are print to order  then cut out  then sewn For the most part the product integration is really good You can design products on their mock up generator and they are automatically synced to your website or another selling platform One of the best things for me  since I am trying to grow my brand  is that they have the option for labels on many of the products They also allow for multiple image layers  this is HUGE  so I dont have to tailor multiple images for multiple products This also makes it possible to put specific size logos on products that do not have labels I have also found that their customer service is really good I have had problems with a couple orders and they have gotten back to me right away and rushed out replacements Also  they have lots of informational videos for when you are first starting out They also allow sellers to leave reviews and photos on all the products  this is very helpful when trying to decide what products to offer 

Cons As I said above  for the most part the product integration is really good  when it works  it works great But I have also had consistent problems with syncing I will create products and they will sync up with my website just fine  then the next day they are not synced any more Then I have to go in manually and re sync each size and variation manually  which takes quite some time This happens off and on so I do not know why its happening and their tech support has not been very helpful for this problem despite many chats and emails I have also had a few problems with the quality of a few of the products I have ordered 2 hoodies and even though the hoodie itself seems to be really nice quality  the zippers have been bad I have also changed some of my designs for regular print shirts since the DTG printing seems to be quite a bit softer and more fragile than screen printing Then  there are just some products that are cost prohibitive to sell even though they look very nice  like the towels 

Overall  for me  the positives far outweigh the negatives  mostly due to the extremely high quality of their all over print  rich vibrant colors So  I decided to go with 5 starts I had originally put 4 stars due to the cons I listed  but then I needed to weigh in the fact that the integration thing is a difficult intermittent problem and when compared to other companies  their tech support is probably better than most  at least there is one So  even though I have had some issues with the integration  once everything is synced  it works GREAT People make orders on my site and the order goes straight to Printful  then they make the product & ship it The majority of their products are great and if there is a problem with a product  they will make it right I highly recommend Printful

Name: A3387
Content: What a great printing company  especially for beginners into the world of merchandise creation There are plenty of tutorials and videos to help you get started and so far all the products have looked great I would like more product options however Printful does have a huge list of products and none of their logos on your materials But they could expand into other items  clothing  and features Over all This place has been amazing

Name: A3388
Content: 100 satisfied with the products delivered from Printful Honestly  everything was better then I couldve imagined itd be and was delivered in a timely manner I definitely recommend Printful for anyone looking to get started selling merchandise and looking to keep overhead costs down

Name: A3389
Content:
I ordered 2 swimsuits for my clients  worst one piece suit ever costly  long production time no insert section for the bra  no foam 

NOT AT ALL RECOMMENDED

Name: A3390
Content: Customer in picture is wearing size medium  and he is 511  slender built with average size shoulder  and size medium fits perfectly on the shoulder and chest area Plus  the length as you can view in the picture was perfect below the hip area Color/print was vivid; however  overall material quality could have been better because it was kinda cheap in quality  causing the lower hem to curl over

Name: A3391
Content: These Unisex Gildan sweatshirts are great I wear mine every day and the design has still stayed perfect and clear Very little wear and tear after many washes and heavy use for about two years or so My sweatshirts are my favorite products in my etsy shop Glorbin because of these sweatshirts Thanks guys

Name: A3392
Content: I ordered a single snap back truck hat I couldnt be more pleased It arrived a day earlier than expected and the quality is great I was concerned how smooth everything would look since my logo is a circle with all curves The embroidery is flawless Colors match exactly as shown on the website Most every other website out there the price was 2 3 times what this cost for a single unit Thanks again

Name: A3393
Content: The order delivery process was very nice and transparent The service is pretty good and the print quality was great it was a very good shopping experience and i am happy to order more individual printed products Only the delivery time is little long  but every product is handmade and is shipped from two companies in europe

Name: A3394
Content: Very pleased with the Baby Jersey Short Sleeve One Piece that I ordered for my great niece Good quality Looks just like the mock up Reasonable price Ordering was super easy Could not ask for a better experience

Content: Super impressed by the quality of these shirts and the designs I make the designs and they are able to ship to my customers SaharaShayDesigns Etsy com

Name: A3396
Content: I like printful because its very easy to use and has beautiful patterns and colors to use on my products I create for my company sophiuz Its easy to integrate to Etsy I recommend printful if you are starting a company or have an existing one

Name: A3397
Content: I use Printful for my print on demand source for my Etsy store Printful is a great resource and has great products to offer for your print on demand ideas Its easy to set up and the integration process with Etsy is seamless They handle all processing and shipping and are generally quick with orders So far  great company to work with They also have training and many other tools inside I hope to make name more sales with Printful

Content: I Love Printful They offer so many different high quality items for print on demand small business entrepreneurs Printful is proud of their services & they should be because they stand behind their items & their print & embroidery techniques My Print on demand items come out stunning & vibrant every single time Im beyond pleased but its my customers who truly matter They love what I offer & I couldnt do so without my partner Printful Custom Printing The level of support they give is superior The customer support cares about your success & happiness with their products and services Dont hesitate to do business with Printful You wont regret it

Name: A3399
Content: I have tried a few POD companies and Printful is now my go to The sample products are high quality and delivery is timely Just the type of quality and service I am looking to provide to my customers

Name: A3400
Content: Very good quality t shirt Ordered this as a trial product and am very happy with the results The material quality is very good Very nice soft cotton and comfortable to fit The print is very good but is to be seen how well it stands up to several washes throughout a year The size of the image could have been a bit bigger even though I used the full parameters given when I uploaded the design The design looks a bit lost on an XL size Tshirt Also I imagined the colours to be more vibrant but this is something I can most likely alter on future designs Overall Im very happy with the product

Content: Designed and ordered a design to print beach towel for one of my family members this upcoming Christmas  it was one of the best purchases Ive made I absolutely loved the size of it  how soft the top was and the nice towel feel at the bottom The print quality complimented my design greatly  it was rich and vibrant while still keeping all of my little details I loved it I cant wait to give it as a gift

Content: This company takes a hardcore ideological stand and discriminates against certain customers while green lighting others Cannot recommend

Name: A3414
Content: High quality T shirt prints My first order the prints were off center so I called in and they sent me a new order This order the print was too close to the collar how it appears online is EXACTLY how it is so make sure to space it exactly how you want it because they dont adjust it to make it look good on their own  Because of a miscommunication on that order they sent me another batch and this one was finally right Great customer service  it just wouldve been nice to get everything right the first time Nonetheless  I love Printful and think they do great work Highly Recommend¼

Name: A3415
Content: Awesome service Especially if you are looking to just print one shirt for yourself Custom designs are easy to use  prices are more than fair compared to other sites  and I cant believe how quick the shipping was Quality prints I will 100 order again

Name: A3416
Content:
Im a merchant who uses Printful as a printer and distributor Their materials and quality of prints are amazing I ordered a sample in the mail and it got to me two days early considering Im in CA while it was send from NC  I hope in the future Printful produce more goods such as sticker packs 

I just opened my Etsy store with Printfuls help  I look forward to doing plenty more business with them in the future

Name: A3417
Content: Customer service is excellent and the products are high quality I am especially a fan of the sublimation print and all over print clothing  I produce clothes that are not just for workout  and the templates enable me to create interesting designs using my own artwork I hope Printful will keep adding new products love the flared skirt  wishing for flared palazzo style pants

Name: A3418
Content:
Regardless of policy or lack thereof  it baffles me when any company doesnt seek to make something right with their customers In my case  I placed an order for a customer for some event specific shirts that shipped on time to arrive the day before the actual event  according to tracking They arrived well after the event and werent needed anymore They never arrived for what they were intended for and I at least expected a refund upon returning the items THAT ABSOLUTELY DIDNT HAPPEN In so many words  they basically told me  Whatever happens  happens after its left their hands Wont even accept a return Refunded me the shipping but stuck me with  280 and a bunch of shirts that cant even be resold I had to refund my customer  of course  but they were still made to look bad since they didnt have anything for the event So my companys integrity takes a huge hit Pockets take a  280 hit And theres a  20 refund for shipping to show for it 

Way to go Printful Customer Service Hell of a way to take care of your customers

Name: A3419
Content:
I am looking into using them for my on demand business I ordered 2 samples I love the coffee mug I ordered a t shirt I love the feel and the print quality I am concerned about the fit 

It took a week from date of order to delivery In theses times of immediate gratification and 2 day shipping  I am concerned about impatient customers 

More tests to run You still have my attention

Name: A3420
Content:
I use Printful for some small time dropshipping and selling some of my designs Theyre wonderfully helpful and print great quality Really  what more can you ask for?

When I first started  the prices were a little bit high  and I wasnt making a lot of profit  but since it was just something extra for me  I wasnt in there for the profits 

Since Ive stuck with them  their prices have gotten better as Im sure their processes and distribution get better Im happy to stay with them and continue to use their services 

I love their mock up service and cant wait to see what new features come out soon

Name: A3422
Content: Im not a huge fan of direct to garment printing  but they have more options that make up for the lack of base fabric color choices You can FULLY customize some of their bags  and they have   never seen anywhere else I can make a FULL SHIRT design  front and back  and have it produced rather than being limited to a 12x20 box on the front only Printing and shipping takes about 7 days total for the package to arrive at your door Not bad at all for designs that are unique and cost effective Plus you have the option to do manual  one time  runs of designs so I can offer custom items too

Name: A3423
Content: At this moment I am not very happy with the services that I am receiving from PrintFul I am learning things that are costing me a lot of money and these things are not clearly outlined in their terms and conditions I was promised an urgent order would be processed quickly as one time courtesy but that doesnt seem to be the case From a customer service stand point I am not satisfied but the quality of their products are nice

Name: A3424
Content: My first order was for a client of mine and there was an error on one of the shirts I contacted Printful and they had a replacement shipped out the next business day The customer received it in time and I couldnt be happier with the customer service I was worried at first because of the error  but they totally redeemed themselves with quick attention to my needs as a customer Highly recommended

Name: A3425
Content: Love the clothes I ordered Large selection of styles to fhoose from Great tools to use to create beautiful print clothes Definitely one of my favorite apps Looking forward to continuing doing business with printful

Name: A3426
Content: Im new to Print on Demand  but so far have had nothing but amazing experiences with Printful I will continue to use them for the majority of my products

Name: A3427
Content: Custom print hoodie arrived in New Zealand quite quickly The fabric quality was excellent as was the print quality of artwork on front and logo on reverse of garment I am now really happy to sell this item and others from Printful in my E Commerce store

Name: A3428
Content: Ive been working with Printful for a year and have had a great experience fulfilling over 100 orders Customer service is almost always available and I have had very limited issues  all of which were resolved timely and professionally Very happy with Printful

Name: A3429
Content: Ordered a couple samples for my shopify website and I an definately happy Thanks to the printful team I work in a facility myself that does this kind of stuff  eg Embroidery  DTG printing and other things Definately gives my ideas to pitch to higher management to help with production and professionalism in our products Ill say it again  Thank You Printful team

Name: A3430
Content:
This company takes WAY to long to create and ship merchandise You can never speak to a live person They route your orders to other countries for fulfillment which leaves your customers waiting for months to receive goods which is a horrible reflection of you and your business There are a lot of other drop ship companies out there do your research and choose wisely 

Today is June 2  2020 and I have a customer that is still waiting on a product from April 16  2020 I reach out to customer service via a chat Linda M and was told I need to give it another 25 days This is absolutely ridiculous Then Im told that my customer need to find the package that is coming from another country that Printful routed the production to

Name: A3431
Content: I must say  I like how they put things together I got my products packed and shipped pretty quick for such a small order  I definitely will be doing more business with the likes of Printful  they are the real deal

Name: A3432
Content: Using Printful to provide products for my clothing brand has been the greatest decision I have made in my young entrepreneur career I foresee my brand using the Printful service for a while Printful is a fair and convenient e commerce platform with an excellent lineup of product

Name: A3433
Content: This company has poor quality items as well as poor customer service After receiving over 30 poorly printed items and multiple back and forths with this company  with an agent giving an agreement over email that the items did indeed have a quality issue they deemed the items matched their expectations Which would mean that their expectations are very low since the quality is so bad GO WITH ANOTHER COMPANY THIS COMPANY WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY DO A BAD JOB AND OFFER 0 resolution

Name: A3434
Content: I have been with Printful for nearly 2 years and they are a great partner They have THE best customer service I can really recommend them

Name: A3435
Content:
I was working with Printful products during months  I was satisfied about the quality and the customer support I believed so much in this company that I decided to make them my main partner for my online business Ive created several designs  and uploaded around 200 articles 
So why this company deserve one star ?
Mainly because Printful doesnt know how to deal with technical issues Without any reasons  without any explanations all my Woocommerce store has been unsynchronised to my Printful store Result I lost all my work  with unique descriptions and arts When I ask at the Printful support some assistance the answer was simple  You need to do it again 
I wont upload all my products again  for me its Printful responsibility to guaranty the correct integration with Woocommerce  specially when theyre doing updates I dont want to be in the situation to have everything unsynchronised again because Printful plugin is not working properly with the Woocommerce update

Name: A3436
Content: Ive been working with Printful for less than a year  selling a few mugs and such on Etsy So far  its been a very positive experience  and I am looking forward to trying out more and more of their products in conjunction with my original designs

Name: A3437
Content: Printful is my go to DTG printer Their products and customer service are fantastic Definitely recommend

Name: A3438
Content: Ive made several shirts through Printful and each time the quality and price have impresssed me The website is easy to use  and the fact that I can order a product and know right off the bat how much it will cost is a big time saver Id highly recommend it

Name: A3439
Content: Not a good selection if looking to start your business using this company They do not always update out of stock items  leaving customers guessing why fulfillment is taking so long There integration with Zakeke is not well thought out They allow customers to place orders with images much too small and with non allowable content They do not inform the store of this  so again it seems as though there is a delay of fulfillment when there is actually no intent to fulfill Their product is cheap The shirt sizes run small and the print is not full Within a few washes it will bleed out

Name: A3440
Content: Absolutely do not use this company for bulk orders On November 26 I manually placed an order for my customer for 100 tote bags At the suggestion of customer service I opted for screen printing because my design was simple and the price would be less than DTG The total was  1297 or  1 389 72 after shipping I waited a week but there was no movement on the order I checked again and then I saw a restocking notice on the order I contacted customer service  but they assured me that since it was within the fulfillment window  I should not worry as the totes would be restocked soon I waited for another week  contacted customer service and again I was told not to worry I was nervous that my customer would not receive the bags in time so I paid extra for expedited shipping A day before the fulfillment window was up on Dec 13  I called and finally was  helped I was told that the totes were still out of stock and they were ordered to the fulfillment center on December 7 I placed my order on Nov 26  At that point I was in danger of losing a huge sale so I asked if they could switch my order to DTG bags were in stock in LA and have it printed and shipped ASAP since my customer needed them a week ago I would expect that since the extreme delay was not my fault  they would charge me the same amount as screen printing but instead they charged me the DTG rate of  1504 25 including shipping So because of Printfuls error I had to take money out of my small profit Their Etsy integration for single individual orders is great but do not use them for bulk orders and do not trust that their customer service decisions are in your best interest

Name: A3441
Content: As retailers what sets us apart from our competition is our quality  our price  and our service Printful understands this and recognizes that the bottom line is not everything and they always provide great quality and their service is almost always fantastic By the way Michael D whoever you are  you are the man and you epitomize the customer service of Printful Thank you

Name: A3442
Content: The shirt I ordered was exactly as I wanted A nice quality/weight material Not thin and see through like some So glad Printful offers the Bella and Canvas 3001 shirt

Name: A3443
Content: Printful Provides a decent service with many items to choose from Their website is very user friendly but they need to do some work on their All Over Sublimation Prints The printed areas around the seams of the shirt and underneath the armpits are very cheaply done In particular  the American Apparel Sublimation Shirt The prices on all products could be better And they could provide a much better variety of mockup images at higher resolutions The are very few mockup images available for many of the products  and the mockup images that you get from their mockup generator arent even large enough for Etsys minimum pixel width requirements If they really cared about selling their products they would spend more time on mockup images for those of us selling print on demand items All in all  they are not the worst company to in the POD game but they definitely need work

Name: A3444
Content: printful  I highly recommend this print on demand company as a new and just started online store they help me all the way and they fullfill the order fast so those who are planning to do online store PRINTFUL is highly recommended as your dropshipping company for printing thanks for the smooth ride

Name: A3445
Content: Received my first order This is a poster on matte paper Thank you I am very pleased with the quality The color rendition is excellent

Name: A3446
Content: Inconsistent quality and refusal to refund or replace My logo was perfect the first 2 orders  the 3rd order it arrived glossy and pixelated looking like a cheap iron on Customer service blamed my image which is the same image that is in my online library which was used for the 1st and 2nd order

Name: A3447
Content: Working as an independent artist along with running your own business can be a daunting task Printful helps me do much more than I could ever do on my own while empowering me as a creative to see what pieces are doing well along with saving me time and money by not having spend so much to keep large quantities of prints in stock Grateful for this service

Name: A3448
Content: Printful has given me some excellent ideas of ways to extend my product lines and share works I have created in a variety of formats / prints  with little or no administrative input from me after the the initial setup A very helpful service  especially since they provide fulfilment from within the EU

Name: A3449
Content: Excellent customer service  excellent product  excellent quality The most reasonably priced place for low cost screen printing and embroidery Wide and growing selection of products  industry standard design interface A good solution all around

Name: A3450
Content: Ive order 2 items and have never received either of them Its been weeks with no update I want refunds and to cancel my account You are not a  good company Who do I speak with? Immediately

Name: A3451
Content: Ive ordered from Reggaeton Apparel whos says theyre based out of here I have not received a tracking number  Ive not received any email back from the given support email If anyone here knows this brand please reach out to them and help resolve this

Name: A3452
Content:
Great shorts for any sport I use them personally for very hard squash matches  a sport that generates a ton of sweat 
Even at the end of a 90 minute session these shorts remain relatively dry 
Comfortable to wear and the fit is true to size 
Top class

Name: A3453
Content: wow I got my laptop sleeve and I am crazy about it I like it so much better than what I bought from Apple It has a custom photo  is neoprene and fuzzy fur on the inside with double zippers for ease of storage the case is like a diving suit for my lapple

Name: A3454
Content: Ive placed 3 orders so far and the selection  speed and quality has been fantastic I cant ask for more

Name: A3455
Content: Ive Printed Mens and Womens All Over Print Shirts  Canvas  Pillows  Phone Cases  Leggings  and everything has come out great Really incredible how they can print in RGB over CMYK Allows for the colors to POP

Name: A3456
Content: A small business owner who will never use Printful again Time is too short to have to call customer service mutliple times on behalf a small order of custom embrioderd hats It should be easy  thats why I chose to use an online printer for this project They have also outsourced some of their cusotmer sevrice to Europe which I find odd I will continue using CustomInk  UPrinting and Vistaprint over Printful

Name: A3457
Content: This is the best shirts ever Not only do i agree with that but all of my customers do It is great quality  and super soft I keep getting more and more comments on how great it is And when you have  8 000 in sales in 3 days  that proves it

Name: A3458
Content: Im working on taking my business elsewhere I dont know how they could get any worse They are great at printing my designs completely crooked or a completely wrong design  twice where it wasnt even my design they printed There is no quality control They also are great at inconsistency Sometimes they tell me X and other times they tell me Y Stay away before they hurt your business

Name: A3459
Content: Poor Customer Service My order was placed on hold and they never sent me an email I asked if I could pick up two shirts from the location  they said no I wouldnt recommend them to anyone They dont care about small business owners If youre in business  they will negatively impact good service to your customers

Name: A3460
Content: Please heed the warnings The quality control here is non existent I have had 10+ separate  documented issues that are egregious and inexcusable My brand has suffered terribly Customer service is TERRIBLE and never accepts responsibility Look elsewhere for quality and pricing

Name: A3461
Content: Not the best place to do business Theyll charge you double for orders or add fees on without you noticing Best practice is to keep track of everything Dont expect a refund when theyre in the wrong They charged me twice for a digitization fee
