Name: A3532
Content: This is my first time writing a comment  I didnt know it was possible  but to be honest  Im going to be very honest  I asked for a first fanny pack to see what the material was like and the truth is that I was amazed with the good material and good quality  very good stitching The prints are identical to the ones shown in the model  the truth is that I am super happy to be able to order fanny packs as I want with my own style  here I am attaching photos of my latest product  I hope they help you and you see everything that they can do

Name: A3533
Content: This service is a calamity The products are not of good quality

Name: A3534
Content: Perfect print and punctual delivery

Name: A3535
Content: Highly recommended  unique customer service and extreme quality

Name: A3536
Content:
I recently used Printwell for a bulk order of custom t shirts for my company and I couldnt be more pleased with the outcome The team was incredibly helpful and patient throughout the whole process  walking me through the different options and materials available 

The design process was seamless  the team understood my vision and was able to bring it to life with precision The final product exceeded my expectations  The printing was of high quality  and the shirts looked great The colors were vibrant and the details were spot on 

The turnaround time was also impressive  I received my order sooner than expected The packaging and delivery was done with care and attention to detail 

I highly recommend Printwell to anyone looking for custom apparel printing The team is professional  friendly and truly cares about their customers They went above and beyond to ensure my satisfaction and I will definitely be using their services again in the future 

Thank you  Mike & the entire team  for a job well done

Name: A3537
Content: Ive shopped here a lot  and been mostly pleased with the variety of products Ive printed onto  even though one of the workers expressed  explicitly his trans phobic views when I got a trans positive mug made for someone However  when I went to get some prints completed  they were cut off in a way that was interfering with the picture Not a big deal  as mistakes can happen  but when I asked to have them replaced  the replacement product was even worse  very washed out and with uneven borders Not happy I definitely wouldnt recommend coming here to get any pictures printed

Name: A3538
Content:
I want to commend Robin the entire printwell staff for their assistance to meet my needs over the past one year 
They have continually displayed high level and professionalism by thinking like the customer to ensure customers satisfaction 
Thank you for going above and beyond to deliver excellent service to me always 
Precious Edobor

Name: A3539
Content: I called in with a myriad of questions and Paul was patient with me Very honest and professional Went in to the store and he continued to help me with my failed designs and didnt try to sell me on anything I didnt need which happens all too often Thank you Paul

Name: A3540
Content: Once again  my Tulip Crush order came out top notch THANKS Printwell Paul Elizabeth and everyone else I keep returning not only for the quality & selection provided  but also because of the great customer service I receive every time I talk with them Look forward to elevating my growing business even further and expanding my custom swag offerings  as customers just love it KEEP UP THE AWESOME WORK

Name: A3541
Content: My order came out exactly as requested with a prompt turn around and great quality Excellent communication and client service made it a seamless process I will only be using printwell for my future printing needs and would highly recommend them to others

Name: A3542
Content:
Learn from me and just use Printwell  the first time I had placed a same day printing order at a large and familiar business depot Unfortunately  when I went to pick them up I was informed that despite the system allowing me to check out  they dont do same day jobs for my order They instead printed me what the could on the stop and everything was off The cuts were off  the colour was off  they were not to my standard

Enter the Printwell team I called them right away and sent them over my images They were amazing Customer service top notch  kept me updated on order progress and when I went to pick my items up merely a few hours after my pleading phone call the prints were PERFECT 

So learn from me  use Printwell and thanks team for saving my butt this weekend

Name: A3543
Content:
Very friendly and professional experience with Printwell We bought a custom puzzle they produced with our photos  its just like a real jigsaw puzzle Much higher quality than what was expected 

The custom photo mugs we bought there last year are also really holding up well  no fading or anything on the photos Much higher quality that you would get at Walmart photo studio

Name: A3544
Content: I was looking for the perfect gift for my husband and wanted a picture enlarged and wrapped on a canvas The team at Printwell did an amazing job and made the perfect addition for my husbands home office They were so responsive  the quality was amazing and turned around my order way faster than I thought I later found out that this is a family run  local business  I will absolutely be back

Name: A3545
Content: Printwell has taken care of my business cards  mugs and shirts for 2 years now I am always overjoyed with the turn out of my products and how professional they are They have always worked well with me and my indecisiveness and are meticulous in their work I would absolutely recommend them to anyone

Name: A3546
Content: I ordered some custom labels with our organizations branding to be applied to liquor bottles that we will use as going away gifts to executive staff Michael and his staff not only produced the labels to exact measurements  but were able to expertly adjust the graphic produced by our designer so it would would look better once printed Very fast and professional service throughout the entire process I will definitely be using Printwell again

Name: A3547
Content: We have been working with Mike at Printwell for many years now  the service and quality of the products have always been amazing Thank you Mike and team

Name: A3548
Content:
I had the pleasure of dealing with Michael and his co worker Im sorry I didnt catch his name and they were both incredibly helpful in ordering shirts and masks for my company My order was very reasonably priced and was finished in a timely manner Ive had nothing but compliments on the items Ive ordered  so thank you guys
Im looking forward to doing more future in the business with you

Name: A3549
Content:
Here is one business that I full heartedly support and recommend to everybody
Ive dealt with this Printwell store for many years now  got my printer there and continue getting ink refills Recently I added T shirt printing to my experience and it couldnt have been better The owners are friendly  very knowledgeable and kind And thats what makes me coming back
I wish them all the success  especially in these troubled times    I will be back

Name: A3550
Content:
Best custom printing provider in Canada Great customer service and a hassle free experience 
Would recommend them to anyone in the Ottawa area looking for custom printing of any sort

Name: A3551
Content: These are the only printers we now use Super responsive and the quality is unmatched They helped me out after another printer dropped the ball and I havent used anyone but printwell since Mike has customer service down to a science They wont let you down Thanks guy The Artery Community Roasters

Name: A3552
Content: Highly recommend Printwell for all your business and personal printing needs and wants  Their whole team is great and helpful These guys know what they are doing and talking about If you can think it  they can print it

Name: A3553
Content: WOW What a fabulous experience I had with these guys Firstly  my on line order came in really quickly I went to pick it up  and although the quality absolutely perfect  it was the wrong colour Totally my fault The two guys who were working not only offered to re do it  but let me keep the original piece WOW Thank you Printwell I will totally recommend these guys and will go back again without hesitation

Name: A3554
Content:
I had ten photocopies made of an ultrasound It was difficult job because the original copy was small  not not very good quality The result was amazing It was a very important job  that I wanted done and they exceeded my expectations 

They did such a great job  it looked better than the original Ive had many photocopies made around everywhere in the city and this was my first time with Printwell Custom Printing and they do by FAR the best job I look forward to working with them again 

The customer service was great too  they were smart  friendly and not too overly up tight or pushy or uncomfortable Great personalities

Name: A3555
Content: I went into Printwell to get some pictures printed for my daughters first communion Liz was there to help me and she did an amazing job Excellent Customer Service Picture turned out amazing I am so happy with the service and product that I received and I will definitely go back and recommend Printwell to all

Name: A3556
Content: Superior service and customer care I cant say enough about the staff at Printwell I needed uniforms for my team in a hurry and they were able to expedite service in 2 days The Printwell staff is extremely helpful and courteous Everyone on my team were beyond impressed and loved their uniforms Totally recommend  you wont be disappointed

Name: A3557
Content: Fast and friendly service I was surprised how quick they were I needed a last minute Halloween costume and they finished it earlier than expected and it turned out amazing Definitely recommend

Name: A3558
Content: My first time experience was absolutely Fantastic I walked in with a shirt that needed printing for Halloween they told me it would be done by Friday the latest a few hours later I get a call to come pick my shirt up because it was all finished I wont forget to mention that Elizabeth Jones who works there was the woman who assisted me she was extremely friendly and very helpful throughout the whole process of choosing print & color and she also suggested sparkles which was an excellent choice I will definately be back and would highly recommend this location they do awesome work 5 stars

Name: A3559
Content: Recently had the pleasure of dealing with Printwell for work We had some shirts and business cards printed The staff was very informative  accommodating and professional In all aspects of the process from the design to meeting a tight timeline I will use them again for the range of services that they offer Keep up the great service

Name: A3560
Content: DO NOT BUY anything here I bought a cartridge for a printer here recently and was sold an expired one by 9 months that does not work I was denied a refund in spite of a defective merchandise sold by them Worst customer service

Name: A3561
Content: I used to go to Staples but one day I tried Printwell on a whim and the customer service was the BEST Ive ever had  the work was amazingly done with great attention to detail I was blown away I love Printwell and now I dont go ANYWHERE else  they are fantastic for Xmas gifts or special occasions The owner knows me by name which is so rare and whenever I come in he greets me and makes me feel special I recommend Printwell to anyone and everyone

Name: A3562
Content: First time going to printwell and looking for a business that could provide me with high quality prints of art paintings i like for canvas for my new house I was very please with the result of the prints i received as well as the great customer service i received from the staff who worked with me to find the best quality images for the prints i wanted Printwell staff were very courteous in ensuring i would be satisfied with what i was buying and even went out of their way to help me bring the rather large canvases to my car Ill definitely bring more business to them as soon as my budget allows Anyhow very satisfied with printwell Thanks again to all the staff that helped me I was pleased with the product and it worth the cost for me

Name: A3563
Content: I ordered a sweater and jacket back at the beginning of may for my business I have been waiting over a month which I completely expected  It the problem is  I just got an email with a full refund the other day No explanation as to why they arent completing my order just a refund I have emailed them three times now and no one will answer me Ill just go elsewhere not a big deal however  I was on a deadline to get these and waited this long just for them to refund me without any explanation at all Super disappointed and pretty irritated that no one will answer my emails

Name: A3564
Content:
I have been a loyal customer of Printwell for many years They have produced flyers  postcards  posters  and other promotional material for me I purchased my last laser printer from them  and I have always been impressed with their prices  but more important the after service The team is knowledgeable and always very agreeable I even know many of them by name 

Many thanks Michael  Charles  Phil  Jenny  and the rest of the team Youve got my vote and my business

Name: A3565
Content: I have been coming here for over 10 years to get my printer cartridges filled Ive also had custom mugs and t shirts done here They always over deliver Highly recommend

Name: A3566
Content:
I am sooo happy that I found this place The staff are always so friendly 
I am recently getting married and they helped me make the most beautiful wedding invitations I really had no clue what I was doing  however the staff made me a beautiful design that I was so proud to use for my invite They also made my menus  table cards and seating charts Thank you Printwell for helping make my wedding day even more special Go Printwell

Name: A3567
Content: Thanks guys for all of your help With so many of us in charge I am sure dealing with us girls was like herding cats Your patience and the extra efforts taken to make us all happy was outstanding You truly made our experience using Printwell an amazing one We loved our shirts Thanks Elizabeth and Mike for all of your hard work

Name: A3568
Content: I found out about this place and decided to check it out when I needed my ink cartridges refilled Jenny and Mike are great people to work with to get the job done Really quick  I was done in 10 minutes And did I save?? Lots I noticed they do t shirt printing and I asked a couple of questions I ordered a shirt for my sisters bachelorette party I mentioned it was an emergency and I needed it done ASAP as the bachelorette party was the next day Yes  I waited until the last minute  The representative asked to see if we could do it quickly and the other team member nodded without second glance I appreciated that so much because I was screwed The shirt looked FANTASTIC It was pink and pretty and had beautiful font I would recommend Printwell to anyone who wants professional service and wants to support our local businesses

Name: A3569
Content: I purchased some refilled ink cartridges five days ago They were HP XL cartridges and I only got less than 30 pages of print before the first one ran out of ink I called for a replacement but was told I would have to wait in the car while they conducted a test They could not just give me a new cartridge in exchange The second cartridge is already indicating low ink I cannot recommend this company for their ink cartridges or their customer service despite their advertisement that their cartridges will work as well as or better than OEM cartridges and that they provide a 100 guarantee

Name: A3570
Content:
The whole staff at Printwell went over and beyond in giving us personalized service They would even take time to walk over to my store as I often worked alone and couldnt leave my store to go to theirs They were patient and understanding as we changed our minds frequently but continued to serve us with a smile 
Thanks so much

Name: A3571
Content:
Just Outstanding Service 

I gave them a call to get a quote for some shirt for the people at my work they were very polite and helped me until i have all the information i needed 

i decided to go in  and boy i wasnt disappointed they were very nice and helped me  got me my shirts The service is out of this world amazing and the price is so good and fair for there products and service If i could id give them a 10/10 but only lets me do a 5/5

Name: A3572
Content:
Have been getting Custom Shirts and Hoodies from Printwell ever since they offered them  better quality shirts and print than anywhere I have ever seen

They do one and two shirt orders for me at amazing prices  staff at the store helps with designs and art work at fractions of the cost of what I have paid before with other stores 

Need custom printing  then Printwell has got you covered I wear more custom shirts and sweaters than anything else thanks to theses guys

Name: A3573
Content: Absolutely amazing service Literally brought my vision to life Great quality pictures Great staff Overall amazing experience

Name: A3574
Content: I have been searching for a place to print my wedding invitations for months now and came across Printwell at St Laurent last week I went in and they had an amazing book full of examples  and since my wedding is a destination wedding  we were able to get invitations made that looked like a plane ticket Being able to customize it was easy and they turned out great Thank you so much for all the staff support I will be back to do Canvas after the honeymoon

Name: A3575
Content:
If you are looking to customize your gifts  Printwell is where you want to go They offer a quick turnaround time and the quality is excellent 
Their prices are also affordable It just makes sense to give your loved one customized gifts mugs  canvas  shirts  hats etc than generic gifts

Name: A3576
Content: Great customer service  quick turn around I went to get tank tops for a bachelor party Mike made the whole process easy and smooth  he was always very quick to respond and help with whatever I needed Mike also made the design process really easy and provided me with exactly what I wanted Great job Mike

Name: A3577
Content: Great customer service  While waiting in line i learned that the employees are able to speak English and French Which is fantastic Came in with some photos to print but wasnt sure about sizes The staff were able to help me choose the correct sizes and were quick to print them Would highly recommend

Name: A3578
Content: I had a backdrop banner rush order for a trade show  with poor files  as my graphics guy was out of town Mike and the helpful folks at Printwell made sure they were going to look great  helping me with the layouts and file conversions They saved our show by getting the job done fast and beyond my expectations Thanks again Printwell

Name: A3579
Content:
The service at Printwell is absolutely amazing I wanted some pictures printed of my baby boys and a tank top with a saying on it They did an outstanding job Very fast and efficient service too 
They really do print well

Name: A3580
Content: They really went out of their way for me I asked to have business cards & labels printed that morning because I was on a tight time constraint for a school assignment & they were able to get it to me by noon Firstly  they printed more than I had originally asked for in all the colours I asked for Secondly  they didnt even charge me the rush fee They really came through for me on such short notice & everything looked great Would highly recommend them

Name: A3581
Content: Stellar service Mike and his team have the customer always first Liz is fantastic  Andre is extremely helpful  Becca always accommodating and Paul just gets it done right everything Mike youve got a great shop I will always repeat business with your store Keep up the good work

Name: A3582
Content: What a fantastic store All the employees are extremely kind and are quick to help with any costumer need I came in looking for a T shirt for Christmas and they did a quick and exceptional job If you ever need a shirt or any printing done in general I recommend this store

Name: A3583
Content:
Amazing AmazingAmazing I say this 3 times because I was blown away with everything about this experience I called Monday morning to find out if I could get 2 Winter coats branded with my works logos in time for a conference in Toronto thursday morning All this with a very short turnaround time of 2days I explained my situation and was told that the job could be done  Other places gave me no sooner than 7 days  From the first call  first visit and pick up all the staff were nothing but great The outcome was the best part because I got Exactly what I wanted and it turned out to be even nicer than I expected Top notch location and staff Extremely satisfied and will definitely be returning in the near future

Thanks Printwell

Name: A3584
Content: The customer service at Printwell is OUTSTANDING I have been in the promotional product business for 30 plus years and have dealt with alot of suppliers and these guys go above and beyond to make sure orders are done correctly and on time There is no place else in Ottawa I will go to for my promo needs

Name: A3585
Content: Huge shout out to Andre and Paul They were busy and still fit in a custome print for me Amazing guys Extremely well done 3 thumbs up

Name: A3586
Content: Needed tickets and posters and these guys helped me out Great service and prices I shopped 5 printers before and they were by far the best deal around and quality was higher than expected Def recommend them and will return

Name: A3587
Content: Good turnaround and friendly staff  but the quality of my prints were disappointingly low considering how much I ended up having to pay for them Again  really great service and they did the best that they could  but dont go expecting professional grade prints

Name: A3588
Content:
Great service every step of the way 
I had a tight deadline for 11 shirts for a Bachlorette Party Ordered on Tuesday afternoon  picked up Thursday Great quality  great price 
Overall experience was fantastic

Kristine

Name: A3589
Content: I had T shirts made for our annual Cousins reunion this year  and we were all totally thrilled to wear them for the weekend Thank you to the Printwell team for making our weekend a lasting memory Pictures turned out great too

Name: A3590
Content: Printwell did a an exceptional job helping me with my family through the passing of a family member They were not only very supportive but got pictures and prints done for my family within a day as I needed it asap  would recommend Printwell to everyone as they care very much about their customers and they are a family business

Name: A3591
Content: I ordered five large prints 4ft x 4ft to fill a large wall at our business The prints came out in excellent quality The staff were helpful and made me feel confident in choosing them to assist with this project I would highly recommend Printwell in St Laurent mall

Name: A3592
Content:
Printwells staff was very welcoming and helpful at guiding me through
the process of designing a t shirt for a 4 year old starting school I was
given the choice of font  from a extensive selection printed on a chart  as well as a choice of colour The price was fair for the product that I was purchasing and they were able to deliver a finish product the same day I will definitely recommend Printwell  show off the t shirt  and use them again in the future

Name: A3593
Content:
Staff is very knowledgeable always able to answer questions
Andr has made me a few shirts now with my designs & he always makes sure that I love them before I leave Definitely will be back to print art prints i did not know they did that too

Name: A3594
Content: We are the Carleton University Dance Crew Printwell did an amazing job with our clubs hoodies We ordered over 30 pieces and they were all perfect Weve dealt with other printing companies before and had disappointments such as gold coloured writing turning out to be yellow on the finished product and extremely long wait times Fortunately  with Printwell  when they say gold  it was actually a gold coloured design Also  our hoodies came quickly The employees were all very friendly and helpful; we will definitely order from Printwell again

Name: A3595
Content:
Im very please with the Banner that was made for me and Business postcards Done in 24 hours and I was so happy that I cried of joy

Name: A3596
Content: My girlfriend and I were looking for photo mugs that wouldnt fade in the dishwasher We found Printwell and was so happy to find out and see that the 2 mugs we had made do not fade We use them everyday I would totally recommend Printwell and the friendly service

Name: A3597
Content: I just had some cards printed here and the quality was great The whole process was fast and they had my prints ready earlier than expected I would recommend them and use their services again

Content: My wife used printwell to print her programs and something went wrong and under all the stress she reared her ugly head in a bridezilla sort of way Printwell still went above and beyond to help her resolve the issue and treated her very well it meant so much to both of us printwells customer service is the best in the biz Strongly recommend using them for any printing needs

Content:

Content: Visited to make a few jerseys for my soccer team  met with an extremely helpful and intuitive team Shirts were done within a few days  and even got a discount on the order   would definitely recommend visiting Printwell for any custom design orders

Name: A3606
Content: Was personally helped by the owner Mike  who took it upon himself to scan hundreds of photos for my grandmothers funeral procession Mike further organized these photos on multiple flash drives  which he was able to neatly label i e name of grandmother; year of birth and death  All this was done within a day  and with exceptional customer service  courtesy  and genuine condolences

Name: A3607
Content: Ill never use this place again First they gave us the wrong pictures  so we had to go back to the mall Then  the pictures that we got were oddly green  the colors were way off I called to check that I could get more copies with the right colors Mike assured me it would be no problem When my husband went  the people there gave him a really hard time about it and were very rude They told him it would be a 30min wait He came back after 45min only to be told another 15 minutes twice If youre looking for a place to get your pictures printed  this isnt it

Name: A3608
Content: I get a quote online by emailing Printwell to print 25 custom polo shirts for our uOttawa club and was given a written price of  18 50 plus tax per shirt by Paul I go into the store at St Laurent Center 2 days later and the price changes to  27 99 This is the worst customer service  wasting my time and more importantly lying to me This company deserves below 1 star for misquoting customers

Name: A3609
Content: I have done a few things at this location and I am always very happy with the results Elizabeth was absolutely fantastic as was Jack They helped me figure everything out and I will most definitely be going back to have other things made

Name: A3610
Content: Exceptional I had some long sleeve shirts custom made for my husband here at Printwell Great service  friendly and the quality was exaclty as I had anticipated Im looking forward to doing more business with such a great company

Name: A3611
Content: While I was visiting Canada I wanted to support my home country of Russia by making a Custom Jersey for the Olympics Its really hard to find a place that will do this  but Printwell made it simple and fast and now I can proudly wear my countries jersey during the Olympics Thank you so much for the great service

Name: A3612
Content: Thank you Mike for screen printing t shirt for my husband during the Covid lockdown It looks fantastic and will forever remind us of our beloved Colby who crossed the Rainbow Bridge Heather

Name: A3615
Content: One of the staff was incredibly rude and impatient He made me feel unwelcome

Name: A3616
Content:
I would not go here if you need names and numbers printed on Jerseys You pay in advance  its expensive  and the quality of work is laughingly poor 

I picked up my jersey and instead of telling me Im sorry  but we made a mistake with your printing  and it looks like a blind man did it heres a discount  they just let me walk out of there with a smile on their face As soon as I saw it I could see that the name was on an angle by approx 1cm per 4 letters across the back You can image if you draw a line from one shoulder to the other that is not straight how stupid that looks Overall rating poor

Name: A3617
Content: The staff at printwell are awesome  They are very friendly and postive  They do the best job my son is ver happy with his hockey shirt  love this place for all your printing needs  Go there

Content: I brought a photo on a usb of my family to print I asked if it could be resized to 8x10 without changing the height/width ratios They looked at the file on their computer and confirmed they could I come back 30 mins later and they present the prints My brothers arm is cut off All the black is washed out redish I ask why and they say it must be the file I know this isnt the case  am a graphic designer I dont have time to argue as I am late for work  pay  20 for 4 worthless prints  leave  go else where the next day and have them reprinted perfectly It wasnt the file

Content: Great service and products We ordered embroidered hats  screenprinted shirts  and screenprinted totes and the quality is unmatched Joey is our account manager and he made the whole process so easy Our team is 100 remote so some custom swag really helps the team feel connected Our Real Thread swag was a huge hit Everyone kept commenting how soft the shirts were

Name: A3717
Content: I have been using Real Thread for many years now and I couldnt be happier with the quality and service they provide I love the automated platform that shows exactly what stage my order is in and in conjunction I get to deal with a live on staff rep to assist in questions  design  and ordering Everyone I have worked with is so kind and clearly loves their job A true indication as to the type of company this is and the leadership that runs it I love supporting small businesses especially Faith based companies Keep up the good work Real Thread and may God continue to bless you in all you do

Name: A3718
Content: Trey at Real Thread is the best print rep Ive ever worked with Hes collaborative  friendly  and responds lightning fast He also follows up just the right amount to help me keep on top of our companys apparel needs I recommend Real Thread to all of my friends  family  and colleagues

Name: A3719
Content: Just seriously the best Great 1 on 1 customer service  AMAZING web portal for your order and proof easy to pass on to folks to view  approve + pay for the cost of items  I also love the preview web app thing where you upload your artwork and position it Just *chefs kiss*

Name: A3720
Content: Ive been really impressed with this company Everyone I have interacted with has been professional  courteous and chipper Sounds like its a great company to work for  and I can see that through my ordering experience Looking forward to doing business with this company for a long time

Name: A3721
Content: Gaby has been super great and helpful with every order Ive placed Having an account manager that is responsive  helpful  and gives me options and works through orders with me is the reason I keep coming back to Real Thread vs shopping around at other places

Name: A3722
Content: This was my first time designing and ordering shirts for our company so I needed some hand holding I reached out to quite a few different places but chose to work with Real Thread because they were fast to respond  knowledgable and very friendly with a wide variety of beautiful items to choose from They made the entire process seamless and easy for me I had lots of questions and changes that were always addressed promptly and professionally Gaby was an absolute rockstar Thank you so much

Name: A3723
Content: Our AM was so responsive and collaborative He was able to help us get last minute gifts for our LGBTQ+ group before the holidays So appreciative and will definitely be using Real Thread as a vendor again

Name: A3724
Content: Trey was extremely receptive Quick to respond and super helpful and patient Their proof process was quick and easy to navigate and review your order Love their ink options as well Will definitely use them again

Name: A3725
Content: Trey was great He asked what our project deadline was and responded quickly to get the orders started He answered all our questions and sent us two quotes and mock ups pretty fast He also checked in to see if we had any questions My only minor feedback for improvement is that I had requested that my colleague be CCd in the emails but she was sometimes not CCd in his responses so I had to loop her back in a few times Other than that  great and friendly service

Name: A3726
Content: The process so far has really been exceptional Everything has been very clear and has run super smoothly Everyone Ive interacted with has been extremely helpful  pleasant  and professional And the mockups look great

Name: A3727
Content: They were so immensely helpful from start to finish Definitely will be going to them for all my future screen printed goods They made my job so much easier and our staff is so excited about their shirts

Name: A3728
Content: Gaby has been incredible to work with Great customer service We so appreciate your fulfillment team shipping these items as well

Name: A3729
Content: Your team was lovely in helping me put together my order They were patient  friendly  and quick They were able to put together multiple price estimates for me so that I could make the correct decision for my budget and shirt needs Thank you

Name: A3730
Content: Joey has been great to work with from day 1 a little over a year ago I really appreciate his response time on requests and accommodations He truly cares about the product were getting in making sure its exactly what were looking for Above all hes candid and straightforward Honest conversations build genuine relationships Looking forward to working with you guys for the long haul

Name: A3731
Content: Great communication and very fast service Receiving samples ahead of time made ti much easier to get approvals through my company The shirt and print quality are both great Looking forward to receiving our order

Name: A3732
Content: Very impressed with these guys Best price and quality for water based ink out of everything I found online My shirts turned out beautifully  arrived earlier than expected in December  no less and their customer service was just amazing My old computer was having some issues with online designer features and I emailed 4 or 5 companies for a quote Real Thread responded quickly  was very competitively priced for water based ink and was much nicer and way more helpful than those that did bother to respond Highly recommend

Name: A3733
Content: My experience with Real Thread was excellent Project manager was pleasant  helpful  and really cared about making sure that my teams vision for our project was carried out

Content: The quality of my customized pullover hoodie is on point Joey from Realthread guided me through every step He was patient  knowledgeable  and overall great to work with I highly recommend Realthread and will be working with them again soon

Name: A3760
Content:
Real Thread is a great company This is one of those companies that you find marketing on social media but there are real people on the other side of the screen

Their quality of print  service  and available options are among the higher quality material There arent many online and even local service that give you the option to print your tags or the kind of foil print Real Thread offers it and owns it 

Im starting up my merch line for my art page and their quality lines up exactly with the kind of quality I expect of my own art 

All of the work is done through mobile communication but the connection is real My service rep was very communicative and responded promptly every time 

I am more than happy with my product and my customers are impressed with me because of them

Name: A3761
Content: Joey was so awesome to work with He responded to emails with lightning speed and was very helpful

Content:
Joey was great to work with In the short time I talked with him we took care of my issue and he even took an interest in the small town I work in I have been following Real Thread as a former designer for a screen printer for years I think you are the best at what you do Keep it Real

***REVIEW UPDATE***
I never thought I would say this  but I look forward to getting promotional emails from Joey my account manager at Real Thread His emails are witty  fun  and funny They are joy to receive and keep my mind conscious of Real Thread without causing me to unsubscribe Keep those emails coming

Name: A3766
Content: We used Real Thread for the first time this past month and were extremely impressed with their customer service  user experience and t shirt quality It was an all round fantastic experience and we look forward to using them again in the future Shirt and printing quality is top notch and their product review and ordering process is seamless They make working with their team a breeze 10/10 recommend

What a great company I really appreciate the quality of conversations I have with the staff regarding my print orders Ive been a client for over a year now  and I consider myself lucky to have a print shop who can grow with my brand and make sure my shirts come out looking stunning
I have the pleasure of selling my shirts online  at community trade shows  and private events The positive and encouraging response I get really confirms that I am on the right track I owe a huge thank you to team Real Thread for being a part of this process 5/5
ORIGINAL 
Nicole was great I was a little sad about Rob leaving  I enjoyed him as well So far Ive had great account managers Thank You for helping me build my brand in our first year while coming out of a pandemic and supply shortages lol I hope we can continue to collaborate on future projects Id love to use RT for all my printing needs

Content: With an excellent user experience and awesome customer service  I have really enjoyed working with Real Thread Ive ordered from them several times in the last two years  and my team and I are always extremely pleased with the outcome My account manager Liv is always extremely helpful and very prompt I always love working with her

Name: A3800
Content: I had a great experience with Real Thread Especially my account manager Joey

Name: A3801
Content:
This has to be THE BEST company I have ever worked with in my lifetime Literally I had never heard of Real Thread until I went researching for a place to buy some face masks I needed 500 masks with logos for work and within a short turnaround time Liv G  at Real Thread and all her colleagues got us processed in a snap 

The proofs were made even BEFORE we sent over our logo  thats how on the ball they were Each email from my end was quickly responded to by Liv or her team and in such a super friendly but professional way We received our order in about two weeks  on the exact date they promised 
Liv followed up on things  checking to see if the masks were to our liking 

The entire process from start to finish with Real Thread was a wonderful experience If all companies ran like this one  I would be one happy shopper Actually  Im a little sad that I dont need anything else to buy yet from Real Thread 

Thank you  Real Thread  for offering great masks  employing fantastic representatives and making sure your customers are well cared for

Name: A3802
Content: I have ordered several times from real thread as they are facemasks are my favorite type where I can wear them around my neck when Im not using them Their print is good and does not fade After several washings Service is great

Name: A3803
Content: Emily was amazing at helping me get my order made up and the entire process was top notch

Content: Working with Joey Bordenga has been wonderful Smooth sailing every step of the way He is responsive  and helpful in tracking down what we need I never feel like I have to be the one to push the order or communication along Thanks Joey

Content: Customer service was great from the beginning I had questions about color changes and printing methods  which got answered in minutes Once I picked my apparel and put my order together I had my proof within 48 hours The prices are extremely reasonable and I will definitely be using real thread again

Content:

I also want to shout out Melanie who was fantastic at helping me get my order set up and answering my questions prior to placing the order 

Great team  great product Thanks Real Thread

Name: A3811
Content: Ive had the joy of making a few swag purchases with Real Thread for our company and Ive been impressed with every single interaction They are prompt  responsive  professional  and always go the extra mile Weve been working specifically with Joey Bordenga and appreciate his kindness and professionalism Im certain that I email him way too many times with a new question that our team has  and He always responds promptly Additionally  there was a small mistake on our previous order that we only realized many months later  and he was quick to address it Im literally looking for SWAG items that we can purchase just so we can use Real Thread again TRUST ME  You wont be disappointed

Name: A3812
Content: We had an amazing experience with you guys Melanie was the product specialist we first talked with and she was SO patient  we were constantly amazed by how she never got annoyed with us since we were first time creators  yet sooooo picky about what we wanted She went above and beyond in helping find us replacements to our original vision Thanks  Melanie Joey was great  too  he was super responsive and quick to honor a shipping rate we had previously been quoted at Everyone was so flexible and accommodating and we are so excited for our shirts Thanks  Real Thread  we will be back

Name: A3813
Content: Real Thread is awesome The team is extremely helpful and very quick to respond My entire experience was a pleasure  from Melanie to Joey Thank you I highly recommend them Cant wait to get my shirts

Name: A3814
Content: Awesome experience quick answers quick turn around Website was so easy to use Would highly recommend

Name: A3815
Content: I ordered cloth masks for the company I work for The website was easy to navigate and it was simple to design the mask As soon as I submitted my order they stayed in constant communication with me to let me know where we were at with the process at all times The rep was great to work with  very friendly and helpful We got our masks in the time frame we were told and we LOVE them They are great quality and super soft on your face Ive already recommended Real Thread to several people who have asked about our awesome masks and will definitely be using them again

Name: A3816
Content: Our experience with Real Thread has been nothing but amazing The entire process is quick and easy The quality of the hoodies and T shirts we ordered were fantastic The branding tag printing is definitely worth it if you are trying to take your brand to the next level The printing process that they use is by far the best that we have seen I appreciate that we were assigned a dedicated account manager who worked with us through the entire process Joey is GREAT hes definitely the type of individual that any business would benefit from having him as a team member We cant wait to start our next project with Real Thread

Name: A3817
Content:
First time user of this site Once I uploaded artwork to a t shirt and hit submit  I received an email from what will now be my new best friend to work with Joey 

Joey  is quick to respond and has a great positive interaction via email So happy to be working with him

When it comes to the website and being user friendly I have to say it was Flawless Simple  easy to understand  and love that I can visualize my shirts prior to ordering unlike the vendor Ive been using  So excited to be using this platform more in the future

Shout out to the Best CEO on the planet Dru is so kind and actually cares about his company and employees He contacted me directly after placing my first order to make sure I was happy with the way things went 

I have yet to receive the final product so unfortunately I am unable to share a photo of the results  but I have high hopes that the final product will blow it out of the park  just like these guys

Highly recommend this company

Thanks for all your hard work Team

~Nikki Taylor
Kailua Kona Hawaii

Name: A3818
Content:
THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU

For our 4th Annual Hackathon we knew we needed t shirts that went above and beyond We wanted gradients  front and back multi color printing  and our logo on the sleeve Definitely a tough order  but the cherry on top? We wanted them to glow under black lights  not something your everyday printer can do 

Well  Real Thread can 

Tiff and the team there are incredible helping us through the process and making sure everything was perfect including blacklight sensitive gradients  accommodating crazy last minute sponsor changes  and through it all getting us incredible  super soft  shirts for a great price I honestly cannot praise them enough 

No matter what your project is  if you need shirts  talk to Real Thread 

Youll be hearing from me again soon 

Grace L
Hertz Hackathon Committee Member 2018

Name: A3819
Content: Joey and everyone else at Real Thread have continued to be an awesome partnership to work with As we have hired new staff recently and have wanted to provide them with the new polos/jackets we just received  Joey was an excellent help in making that possible for us Thank you all so much for your excellent work

Name: A3837
Content: Your service is absolutely top flight I cant imagine a superior supplier service The site is clean  easy to navigate The range of add ons is perfect But the true excellence is once the procurement process starts Communications are quick and clear I love the ability to view the mockups and they were made QUICKLY Adjustments are easy to make and quickly  almost instantly applied And for me the ability to divide the payments into two was vital My only complaint is that you dont offer PUFF PRINTING haha Outstanding You have a great team I work for a major automotive manufacturer  Japanese  and I know a well organized company when I see one I look forward to working with you again soon A thousand thanks

Name: A3838
Content: This was our first try with Real Thread  and we purchased sample shirts before we place our larger bulk order One of their account managers  Joey  was working with us on our shirt styles and print options Joey was super patient with us through the whole process He offered good insight on things to consider not just for now  but the future regarding what we would like to accomplish He moved at our pace  and made himself available around our hectic schedule He did a good job  and we cant wait to see the shirts

Content: Rob was extremely helpful with putting this order together He was kind and patient with me Im okay with computers and the website interface is good but when I had troubles and preferred to just work on the phone with him or through email Rob was willing to work with me in such ways without making me feel like I was being a pain even though maybe I was Very professional and just great all around Thank you so much Im looking forward to getting our farm shirts and hopefully work together in the future with other designs

Content: Website is very attractive and user friendly I placed my order late last night  and had an email early this morning with an update from my account manager Joey  then had the mockup in my inbox and ready for approval within just a couple hours Finished up the approval and payment process  and should have my order within a week The level of communication and speed of the process so far has been exceptional  and I couldnt have asked for any better or easier way to order merchandise

Content: I cant say enough about Real Thread Our t shirts arrived faster than expected  were of superior quality and our staff looked great for photo day The customer service was incredibly personal and attentive I had every confidence from the start that Real Thread would be the company to work with

Content: This company is the best of the best Ive been working with them for months The products are fantastic and will exceed your expectations But thats really just the beginning From shirt selection  to print options to a true fulfillment center  they handle it all But their patience and customer service are above and beyond anything Ive ever experienced Thankfully I will be working with them for a long time to come and knowing that I can count on them 100 puts my mind at ease I could not rank a company higher

Name: A3858
Content: Joey  our customer rep is just outstanding to work with He always hits it out of the park with the design and he is always patient I typically ask him to change the design 100 times well maybe not 100 times but I ask for a lot of changes He is the best and Real Threads excellent service is a big reason why we continue to turn to Joey and his team for our shirt needs Thanks you

Name: A3859
Content: Melanie and Rob were on top of things immediately Both were very pleasant and answered all our questions Rob went through our professor making many unanticipated changes  such as the shirt color  etc with great speed and grace You all were highly recommended to us for ease to work with  and we also highly recommend you THANKS

Content: The contacts at Real Thread are so amazing to deal with  quoting is quick and easy and the approval and payment portal are SO user friendly We will be using you again

Content: Joey was extremely personable and helpful Even through my many edits and questions he was professional and made a point to care about my project Were in an interesting time in the world  so the excellent customer service goes a long ways Thank you  Joey & Real Thread

Content: Ive worked with them twice and I suspect I will work with them for many years to come My team shirt will likely always come through this company Great prices  great quality  great service  nothing but great things to say about this company I LOVE REAL THREAD and you will too once you try them

Name: A3863
Content: Ive ordered from Real Thread twice in the last year and a half and both orders came out great weve gotten lots of compliments on both shirts Because of the process they use to print  the ink feels so lightweight and doesnt feel heavy on the shirt Their employees are helpful  friendly  and knowledgeable Service is prompt and accurate I highly recommend Real Thread for any printing needs you have

Name: A3864
Content: Joey has been fantastic to work with He spent time helping me through all the details of ordering and printing and was super responsive and kind Its been such an easy process because of his excellent work

Name: A3865
Content: Very prompt with responses and great follow up I have had my eye on you guys for almost 7 years and wanting to launch my own brand with my kids involvement This is first step So excited and looking forward to possibly getting feedback and advice from your team when this thing takes off

Name: A3866
Content: Real Thread is best printer Ive worked with Over the years I have ordered many shirts for events at my church and I have tried many different printers  all of them local Each time there is a problem that leaves me looking for a new printer This time I did a google search and came across Real Thread Ive never ordered shirts from a company in another state before  but the reviews were so great that I decided to give them a try And Im glad I did I am not exaggerating at all when I say that they are by far better than any other printer I have ordered from I spoke with Rob via email and he was always super friendly and super fast The ordering process was really impressive I was able to view and modify my quote online as well as easily track the status of my order The shirts turned out exactly how I wanted And to top it all off  Real Thread gave me the cheapest quote of all the other vendors I quoted I did not experience one single problem or negative thing I plan to order all our printing from real thread from here on out

Name: A3867
Content: I had a ton of questions and they helped me with everything love the product was delivered not only on time but early will definitely be ordering from them again

Name: A3868
Content: Joey was wonderful to work with Super responsive and always friendly and professional Looking forward to working with him again in the future

Name: A3869
Content: My account manager  Bre  was amazing to work with Very responsive and helpful She made the process quick and seamless I will definitely use Real Thread again

Name: A3870
Content: I have used Real Thread to print several different t shirt designs for my small business in the last two years Each rep I have dealt with at Real Thread has been professional  pleasant to work with  and genuinely excited to help The quality of work Real Thread produces ensures that my customers are happy and that I will keep using them even though my business is many states away from their office Couldnt be happier with their work

Content: Our account manger Joey is great Hes very responsive and willing to work with us to meet our needs He makes it easy to do business with real thread

Name: A3873

Name: A3874
Content: Joey was great and the website UI is super I love the little tracking icons I feel very well taken care of Excited for my first order and what the future holds for my brand Thank you for making me feel seen and heard

Name: A3875
Content: We LOVE our new masks and so do our customers The design process was simple and our rep was extremely attentive Wonderful company to do business with Well definitely order again

Name: A3876
Content: Joey was wonderful  very helpful with my questions and very responsive

Name: A3877
Content: I absolutely love Real Thread I worked with Dru many years ago for my non profit and he always treated me great I now just put an order in for the creative company I run in Denver and their service was seamless The mock up capabilities on the website are awesome and they delivered ahead of time and everyone I dealt with was incredible I highly recommend the entire team at Real Thread

Name: A3878
Content: Their customer service is fantastic  and specifically  Melanie was a pleasure to work with We had to put a pause on our order in the Spring because of COVID  and she was very understanding and patient As soon as we were ready to approve and move into production again she responded right away and got things moving again The whole process was hastle free  easy  and enjoyable

Name: A3879
Content: Fantastic business model that meets our needs in this new world We are having our virtual event and working with our Account Rep Rob  ordering and getting realtime updates were extremely appreciated with our tight timelines while also staying flexible to our global teams changes Looking forward to seeing the product arrive in our colleagues hands

Name: A3880
Content:
Liv was quick to respond and seemed excited about the design 
These tees & hoodies are going to look awesome 
My questions were answered quickly and the mockups were sent back within 24 hours for approval Cant wait to see the actual shirts 

09 10 2020
I received my order today Very happy T shirts and Hoodies look awesome Liv kept in regular contact through the whole process from order to shipment and delivery She emailed me to let me know that the order had arrived before I even noticed it at my door myself I will definitely place more orders with Real Thread Its nice to find a company that you can tell loves their job and stands behind their product COVID has been a challenge for everyone however I find many companies these days use the pandemic as an excuse Slow response times and late deliveries have been constant issues that my company has been dealing with from our vendors Not true for Real Thread Good Job Guys

Name: A3881
Content: I cant say enough good things about Real Thread hands down  the best experience Ive had ordering t shirts Customer service was incredibly responsive  knowledgeable and super friendly Big shout out to Ashley Cruces for being such a joy to work with She expertly and patiently guided me through the entire ordering process and was always quick to respond when I had questions about printing processes  color choices and t shirt options I couldnt be more pleased with the shirts I received and seriously  I wouldnt even consider working with another company at this point Ashley and the team at Real thread are that good

Name: A3882
Content: Joey  our account manager was AMAZING to work with He answered all of our pesky questions  responded quickly and was just a real nice guy all around Definitely will be using Real Thread for all of our merch in the future

Name: A3883
Content: I have been ordering shirts from Real Thread for a few years and recently did a mask order Employees and clients love the look and quality of the materials and Real Thread has great customer service I had a pretty significant problem with one order because I used an email chain from a far older order to initiate a new order  which caused some confusion Even though it was certainly not entirely Real Threads fault that the order was incorrect they made it right  immediately  which doesnt happen very often anymore

Name: A3884
Content: I was recommended to Real Thread by a friend of mine when it came to figuring out where to go for t shirt designs After researching a variety of companies out there  Real Thread stood out to me the most From the quality  look  feel  personal touch  and everything Im nothing but satisfied Customer Service is phenomenal and one of the reps that helped me  Ashley  did an awesome job in helping me out in my order Highly recommend this to anyone wanting to branch out in any sort of graphic design tees

Name: A3885
Content: Joey called to made sure he knew exactly what I was wanting  and even put a rush on the mock up because the item I wanted to print on was low in stock Havent received my merch  yet  but have no doubt itll be exactly what Im expecting because their mock ups and descriptions are so detailed Ive had a lot of bad experiences with printing one particular over the zipper design  so it was a breath of fresh air when Joey took the time to go over ever possible printing limitation  and make sure I knew exactly what to expect

Name: A3886
Content: In my experience  everyone Ive talked to has been kind  professional  and quick Theyre even meeting deadlines others said they couldnt

Name: A3887
Content: Real Thread is my favorite custom shirt maker Their water based ink is fantastic; it gives the shirts a premium look and feel Their selection of product choices is very comprehensive But even better than all of that is their customer service They are committed to making your order right  and if anything does go wrong they go above and beyond to rectify the problem After working with a number of different custom shirt printers  I have settled on Real Thread as the best in the business

Name: A3888
Content: I had an amazing experience with this company Great people and the quality of the product was fantastic The apparel is so soft and I love how they use water based ink so it all feels like shirt The ways I was able to custom my order was awesome Highly recommend

Content: Joey was our account manager  he made the entire process feel seamless We are excited to have worked with him and Real Thread We look forward to working with them in the future

Content: Everyone we worked with was extremely helpful from the very beginning all the way through the entire process They didnt get annoyed with all of our questions and made us feel like we were their only customers Very appreciative of all of their help and cooperation

Content:
I ordered 150 shirts and found Real Thread to be very professional and they delivered a great quality product Rob  my rep  did an excellent job in communicating whenever I had a question and kept me updated on how far along my order was I will use Real Thread again in the future Thank you 

 Brian Davis
LOUDCollective com
Las Vegas  NV

Content: Overall great experience I did have some problems with the website which is why I directly called the company From there on I had consistent help from one of the account managers named Melanie who was extremely helpful and gave me exactly what I wanted Very communicative service and quick Will order again

Content: Liv is amazing and takes the initative which I love She needs a raise Shes highly communicative and takes the guess work out it for me Im super busy and she makes it easy for me to work with her Shes awesome Real Threads is running a strong  professional operation with quality merch I highly recommend

Name: A3897
Content: I used the online chat feature on their website to ask a few questions  which lead to placing an order the same day I used their two day Lightning Service because the client needed shirts ASAP  and everything was delivered on time and looked great    Id highly recommend Real Thread

Content: GREAT customer support Always patient with design tweaks Delivery is always as promised or earlier than promised Quality t shirts and the ink is soft  not the kind that sits on top of the shirt and flakes with washing Have worked with them for many years Super company Super product

Content:

Joey took the reigns after Melanie had qued up everything I wanted  and Joey seamlessly maintained my confidence and his correspondence was just as swift and helpful 
Usually when Ive dealt with two different employees at any business there is anxiety when a relationship that has been positive is passed off to the next employee 
Melanie and Joey were a great team and left me feeling that the Real thread community has a great thing going

Content: I would recommend real thread to anyone A member of their team personally emailed back and forth with me to ensure the best printing for our tank tops Were already designing our second shirt and cant wait to place another order Shipping was so fast and we received the shirts several days sooner than our originally projection

Content:
We just received a box of black cotton face masks with printed design and they really made great Im the manager of an IT team at a large New York City hospital and we wanted to have cotton masks with one of our corporate mottoes to use when were at patient facilities Theyll go over the surgical masks that they give us to wear on site Theyll will be much more stylish and help protect the surgical masks which are easily stained and damaged They also help us send a message to our patients we put them first 

These masks are very well made the materials are good and the sewing is well done The printing is excellent and the colors exactly right

Content: Real Thread is an amazing company and has allowed our small business to grow and actually profit during the pandemic Rob deserves a raise He makes things so easy and streamlined for us

Name: A3939
Content: Melanie helped me a lot with resizing the logo on my shirts I also love that I had the option to personalize t shirt tags and you guys have been the most professional company Ive worked with as far as my brand goes I will definitely be purchasing again

Content:
My company has been working with a local SF Bay Area screen printer for a couple years After awhile we realized the company was struggling and their customer service wasnt as great as wed wished for 

We found Real Thread online but was hesitant as wed be working with them from across the country Our hesitations were soon dismissed From their genuine/responsive customer service  quality prints  ordering process  supplementary services poly bagging  hem tag stitching  size stickers  etc  we couldnt be happier with their service Working with them has really made our product creation process SO much easier Cant recommend them enough I worked exclusively with Tiff  and could really tell that shes sincere with her correspondence and service

Name: A3941
Content: Hands down the best clothing print shop Ive ever worked with The quality and dedication to customer satisfaction is unmatched I started working with Real Thread right after they opened and have never looked back Highly recommended  best of the best

Content: Ive used Real Thread for several years now and I cannot imagine using anyone else Their staff is attentive  accommodating  and so easy to work with Their products are great to begin with and the end result is always professional and top notch Their discharge printing is so sharp  Ill never go back to regular screenprinting It keeps me coming back

Name: A3952
Content: Ive worked with several different t shirt companies and theyve all been great  but I never quite felt the magic until working with RealThread Kim was super helpful in helping me figure out how to get my design from 3 colors to 1 color; her correspondences and response time were top notch The ordering process was clear  and the digital mock ups were terrific The t shirts arrived on time and we were all stoked about the print quality Kudos to the RealThread team

Content: It was a quick and easy process to get my shirts I would highly recommend this company I had several questions and they were able to get back to me very quick I appreciate their staff Love my shirts too Turned out great

Name: A3954
Content: great website good information water based inks  clear pricing showed price tiers to help me decide on quantity  quick and smooth transaction transparency with representatives pictures  also CEO leaving his cell number is pretty unique

Name: A3955
Content: Joey was great and helped me at every step to make the ordering process smooth Cant wait to wear the finished product

Name: A3956
Content: I hadnt worked with Joey  he was helpful and when I asked about net 30 terms  the turn around was great He answered all my questions as needed

Name: A3957
Content: So Real Thread had a couple hiccups with my order at first  after 5 days past the estimated delivery date I sent an email to check the status of the order seeing that the order was still at the burning screen stage on their website  Im not sure what the details are of why it was stuck in this stage whether it human error or if they were overbooked and taking a while to get to it Either way they responded with haste and had my order moving again They gave me free next day shipping and Credit because of it  then they informed me some of the sweatshirts had defects and didnt pass QC giving me an option reprinting the sweatshirts or credit for it  sometimes when it rains it pours So with Hiccups you might be wondering why did I choose 5 stars still? Everyone and every company makes mistakes  regardless of how hard you try to manage them from happening  yet when they happen how you choose to handle them is where your business can rise or fall They definitely earned the 5 stars with their handling of the situation without me having to ask for anything extra because of the hiccups I will be more than happy to bring them my business even after my credit with them is spent Also the shirts and sweatshirts look phenomenal thank you Joey and Liv and the rest of the staff at RT for the awesome apparel and top notch customer service  Integrity Seamless Gutters

Name: A3958
Content: Love working with Gaby Shes so nice and helpful

Name: A3959
Content: Every experience Ive had with Real Thread has been great They did a marvelous job on t shirts for our program in fact  they are the most comfortable t shirts that I own and have heard the same thing from numerous people who have received one The screen printing and material looks just like new despite 60+ times wearing and washing them I recently purchased some masks with our company logo and they were affordable  comfortable  and well made I cannot recommend Real Thread highly enough They have competitive pricing  quick response time  fantastic design work  and high quality materials They are my  1 go to when Im considering promotional clothing  screen printing  or stitch work

Name: A3960
Content: Rob was AWESOME So pleased with my experience so far and will definitely continue ordering my small business apparel through Real Thread

Name: A3961
Content: I spent about a month looking at tshirt companies online during Covid 19 and picked these guys/gals due to their reviews and due to the fact they could print inside the neck tag Im glad I did They proactively realized they charged me too much and credited me over  300 Wow Id like to think I would have realized it but there is a reason why Real Thread has great reviews online

Name: A3962
Content: The quality of the t shirts was great and the customer service continues to be excellent Typically  custom printed t shirts are not this comfortable The t shirts purchased have gone a long way to encourage my sons fight against cancer The design was phenomenal

Name: A3994
Content:
I had the pleasure of working at Real Thread for a few months this summer and I can honestly say that they are 100 dedicated to making the best quality shirt on the market Everyone who works there is good at their job and is part of the reason the company thrives I saw time and time again how they were able to produce a product most other shops would be envious of 

I even had the pleasure of being a customer and receiving one of the best shirts Ive ever helped come up with Across the board  from how the sales reps handled it  to the design I asked to make  to the person mixing the inks and burning the screens  to one of their many talented screen printers  all the way to the finishing department where they were nicely tucked away in a brand new box with the quantity and a picture of my shirt on the box 

Ive worked in other print shops before and where they struggle  Real Thread does not Make Real Thread the first choice for your t shirt needs because you ABSOLUTLY will not regret it

Name: A4236
Content: Made about 20 shirts for a soon to be retired accountant Simple design  one color They turned out great Amazed at how fast they arrived Will be using them again to make shirts this summer Price was about the same as other sites but they carried performance American Apparel in the sizes that I needed 100 satisfied with the product

Name: A4237
Content: I gave these guys another chance and they fumbled  big time In one photo you can see the seems not properly stitched In the other  you can see the printed wording beginning to crumble The thing is  one of their staff called me and offered to refund the cost of the shirt and provide one for free I said thats cool When the new higher quality shirt arrived I was happy  until the wording started to come off after one wash  It embarrassed me  frankly All along the staff told me the quality of the shirts was not the companys responsibility  Tell that to Elon Musk about the batteries in his cars  Well  that leaves the writing on the shirts left  and  it sucks

Name: A4238
Content: UPDATE the company contacted me and offered to make it right Very rare today for a company to take responsibility for their mistake and credit their client Will absolutely use this company again and sing their praises great job This review is a few months in the making Ordered seven navy sweatshirts in December for our family vacation We were excited to get a family photo with everyone in navy and white nautical theme The order came in a timely fashion as I did pay extra for rush Well five of the sweatshirts were great  print was nice and material was just what we ordered  hence the two stars I took off stars for the mens 2XL sweatshirts Never were we told they would be completely different then the rest of the order  they were labeled navy but are really royal blue Additionally  they were for my 63 husband and son  they arent heavy  just tall so we bought the larger size to give ten length  and paid about  55 each yet they literally looked like they were wearing childrens sweatshirts because as well as the color being off  the material was cheaper and they were so short think crop top in length and in arms that the sweatshirts came up to their forearms We could have dealt with the color difference even though we wanted everyone matching  so we packed them to take with us for photos anyway as there was no time for new ones to be shipped before we left the country but the size disparity was ridiculous and just poor quality control for the amount of money spent Needless to say we didnt get a family photo because they wouldnt wear them Such a waste of money In this photo I made my son put it in just to show the color difference and how short the sleeves are Crazy

Name: A4239
Content: DO NOT order from this company we bought around 20 t shirt for our team and the color is completely different than what was shown on their website We ordered tan color and got yellow Such a waste of our money All the team is disappointed We contacted the company and they offered a discount of 20 off if we rebuy 20 new t shirt in another color Just so that we can waste more money on this company with poor costumer service Here is a picture of the difference

Name: A4240
Content: Absolutely outstanding customer service Super reasonable pricing  quick shipping and quality products I have used them for VARIOUS projects and will continue to AND their shirts made the front cover of our local paper

Name: A4241
Content: I had a custom t shirt order that was initially cancelled due to potential logo copyright infringement  which was understandable I sent a follow up email providing approval of my use of the logo  and then I followed up via RushOrderTees chat I was put in touch with Luke L and he handled my situation seamlessly He was professional  friendly  efficient  and communicated very clearly Bravo This has been my second order with them  and after a great customer service experience which is not as common as one would hope  it wont be my last order Thanks again

Name: A4242
Content: Okay so Im leaving 5 stars as I believe its well deserved I ordered 4 shirts so far just to test the waters on this company All 4 shirts are what I expected except that I had an issue with a 2 XL being disproportionate to the print size I called the company who is sending me the correct shirt and I feel confident at this point that this place is reputable Other than that Im very pleased with the quality and customer service

Name: A4243
Content: I had such a great experience ordering from RushOrderTees It was really cool to be able to create a custom design The website made it super intuitive so I could do it quickly  but I also enjoyed playing around with the design a bit Communication was great and my shipment came earlier than I expected which was a nice surprise I love the shirts we ordered and will definitely be ordering from RushOrderTees again

Name: A4244
Content: Luke L rocked my world on the RushOrderTees chat yesterday I had placed a very last minute order and he made sure the proofs got to me quick  the stock got there  and that it all got done and printed to be shipped out in time Ive used RushOrderTees at least a dozen times and its like magic If you call or chat online  their employees are friendly  competent and willing/able to push to meet a deadline Love it

Name: A4245
Content: I used Rush order tees to get shirts for our churches production team and they were fantastic Prices were a little bit cheaper than most other places I priced out After I placed the order  2 more people got back to me about ordering and I was able to add on to the order no problem They were very helpful a nice about it Also  the sweatshirt I had selected was out of stock and they upgraded me to another brand for free Also the entire process took about 2 weeks from when I ordered to when they came which is super fast in my opinion I just approved the proofs yesterday and they shipped that day and got here today Will definitely recommend them and use them again

Name: A4246
Content: Ive ordered from RushOrderTees three times now and will definitely continue to use them for my custom clothing My most recent order had a very intricate design  and I was not satisfied with the original shirts they sent me When I reached out to customer service  they responded immediately and didnt hesitate to make changes to the design to make me fully satisfied After numerous orders  things arent always perfect  but their responsiveness and willingness to make things right shows that this is a customer first company

Name: A4247
Content: RushOrderTees has been fantastic to work with I have had to contact customer service on different occasions for different orders and they are always polite and handle my issues/questions quickly and make everything a breeze Most recently I chatted with a customer service rep  Tianna W  she was awesome and diligent in getting my issue resolved I will continue to use RushOrderTees for years to come

Name: A4248
Content: I received my original order with a problem in printing and I got an immediate response from customer service and without hesitation were reprinting my order and shipping it out as soon as possible Outstanding service and refreshing how they took time to LISTEN to my needs Definitely will be my one and only choice going forward for my printing needs Thank you RushOrderTees

Name: A4249
Content: Awesome service  super user friendly  amazing variety and they probably have the most customizable clothing out of all the sites and services Ive used offering printing almost anywhere on the garment I was particularly having a hard time finding a company that was willing to let me order a single sample with full color prints going down the sleeves and these guys not only made it possible but waived the extra printing fee for the sleeves on the sample I ordered 5 stars  will absolutely be coming back when I have all the kinks worked out of my prototypes

Name: A4250
Content: I was really happy with the ordering process it was easy to use and had a lot of nice options The finished product was great I did have an issue with one of the sizes I received but I did not verify if it was my fault or the companys I got a youth XL when I needed an adult XL But the other three T shirts were perfect Either way  the company fixed the problem by getting another sent immediately I didnt even have to call and hassle with customer service  I just sent a quick email and thats all it took Absolutely happy with this company We will use there services again in the future

Name: A4251
