Content: When a shipment looked like it wasnt going to arrive in time for my event  I contacted them about my emergency situation They worked with me to resend the shirt through a faster means The shirt arrived as promised  looked exactly like I wanted  and was good quality A+

Name: A4252
Content: Every single contact with RushOrder Tees has been outstanding  and the product and turnaround were the same The customer service reps are second to none  and the manufacturing team must be the same because the 21 shirts of varying colors and designs were perfect Dont hesitate to consider their work They earned our deep respect and appreciation

Name: A4253
Content: Ive ordered a few shirts from them and the shirts look really good I have not had to send any back but I needed a issue resolved with customer service and they worked great with me They resolved my issue and the work looks good I will be ordering more shirts from them They are very easy to work with Thanks RushOrder Tees

Name: A4254
Content: I would recommend RushOrder Tees to everyone I love how helpful they are You wont believe how they went way over and beyond for me You cant find greater customer service than these guys Im a difficult shopper and its just unbelievable what they did for me If you are shopping with other companies  stop  I promise you these guys are the greatest out there Thank you so much

Name: A4255
Content: We are so pleased with this company We had a few sweatshirts out of our bulk order come in with odd pockets on the front  and after filing a claim  they urgently took care of our problem and are sending us replacements for the sweatshirts Their level of quality in product and customer service is unlike anything Ive ever seen Kaha Apparel is a HUGE fan of RushOrderTees

Name: A4256
Content: I could wear out the click button on five stars for these guys Been dealing with them for years and have always received stellar support on superior products The print is top notch quality I have shirts that were printed in 2013 and they still look great

Name: A4257
Content: Very responsive when I sent a chat in with a question to ease my nerves that there may be something wrong with my order as it has been in art review for days My order is still on schedule for the promised delivery time and almost ready for production Cant wait to receive my shirts

Name: A4258
Content:
I recently started to teach Kenpo Karate again and decided to reconstruct my logo  name Saber Strike Kenpo Karate and philosophy and decided to go all in with posters  business cards  flyers  banners patches etc I also chose to get T shirts with my logo on front and back with additional graphics on the sleeves too 

The first order had some issues with the ink quality  coloring and sleeve length issues for the adult smalls The youth large and youth XL sleeves were even longer than the adult small However  this was a manufacturing issue by Gildan G200 they were the ones that made the shirts Rush Order Tees just prints on them and cannot control the quality of the shirts which is why it is nice that they have a huge selection to pick from  I ended up using the Next Level Apparel for the do overs  I had 2 different t shirts made for the original order  everything identical between them except the back graphics Half of the order had mismatched colors from the front to back graphics and the ink began to wear off the other half of the order that seemed to be ok I sold some of the shirts I thought were ok and stopped when my clients reported back they were seeing the ink wear off the shirts after normal wear and a few washes 

These shirts were printed using the Direct to Garment method and looked great other than the already mentioned issues but I can completely understand that not everything always goes to plan in a manufacturing environment from working in a manufacturing environment myself Nothing to get upset about since this was my first time dealing with t shirts and it was obvious that something had happened with the quality of the ink or the process The fact that Rush Order Tees was not only willing to fix this order but wanted to do it as soon as they could displays a solid business ethic that others would do well to model in their corporations Quality the first time around is just as important as the company wanting to immediately correct and issue or oversight the 2nd time around  which still equates to an A+ in my book Nothing wrong with a do over especially when they do as promised or even better in my case

Either way Rush Order had Alyssa Seiders handle the issue for me She was great  understanding and really came through to ensure the reprinted shirts were even better than I expected My shirts had up to 8 colors which was complicated to begin with and when I requested for the screen print option over the Direct to Garment method they recommended I increase the quantity of the shirts in the order to better suit the production needs which I though was fair also coming from a production environment I trusted they would come through and they DEFINITELY did My students are excited to get their new shirts as well as the parents and many others that have been waiting to receive them I am already working on my next few waves of shirts and understand exactly what to ask for in the future when printing on darker colors as well as how to utilize the screen printing over the DTG method when ordering by large quantities 

Thank you Alyssa and to Dean Ridgeway as well who filled in a couple of times when Alyssa was on vacation or unavailable Great teamwork

Name: A4259
Content: Great quality shirts  clean/professional prints  VERY happy overall with the products The order came a little late though I am in remote Alaska  but Luke in customer service was very helpful in tracking down the wayward shipment and even offered to rush out a replacement order at no additional cost Great customer service  great product

Name: A4260
Content: If I would have known that nothing is their would never have purchased from them  Im told that size is not their responsibility but I bought the shirts from them  so I dont get it  Im happy I only ordered 2 to check quality Complete fail  and customer service has failed too

Name: A4261
Content: Just did an 55 shirt order for our company event and were specific on the shirt we want to print on Im so surprised by how easy it was for them to order a different shirt than the ones listed on the website Live chat agent is EXTREMELY FAST and easy to work with Almost too fast Also REAL person not ROBOT that or really good AI  maybe  who knows these days? Cant wait to see how the quality will be like but so far service has been exceptional

Name: A4262
Content: Just wanted to say this was probably one of the best examples of Customer Service I have experienced recently I had a small issue with an order and it was addressed and corrected in 1 day Luke L absolutely hit it out of the park I will not hesitate to do business with you again Top Notch

Name: A4263
Content: So far so good  customer service has been prompt and they waived my sleeve print fee on my first order as a courtesy Much appreciated I will update this review once I receive my order

Name: A4264
Content: Customized a set of shirts on their website with fair ease Surprisingly received the shirts several days before the estimated arrival time Only real gripes 1 One of the shirts had a minor printing error 2 No matter the different size shirt  the design on the front and back stayed the same size throughout Comparing the shirts next to each other  it just looks a little off 3 Several of the shirts interior stitching was unraveling Would probably use them again for my custom shirt needs though

Name: A4265
Content: I found RushOrderTees on a random internet search when i was trying to find a place to print a group tee shirt for my friends and i  first order came  i absolutely loved it  since placed multiple orders Colors are on point  quality is top notch and the service is always professional Worth the prices and i can assure you  the materials definitely last well 10/10 totally recommend

Name: A4266
Content: Rush Order Tees has been excellent with all my printings The shirts are high quality  customer service is great and items arrive quick Highly recommend

Name: A4267
Content: awesome customer service Super quick to respond to an inquiry about a change Shipping is exactly as they say  even their quick 2 day turn around Very happy with my experiences so far

Name: A4268
Content: Great place to get your TShirts The shirts are actually good soft  correct size  quality printing Any issues  they have very responsive online chat Highly recommend

Name: A4269
Content:
Let me start off by saying  this is an edit to my original review 

I ordered a Gildan brand t shirt but received a different brand The print work was great  just not the right shirt I called to inform them of the problem This was after 5pm central time The representative I spoke to was argumentative but I was told I would receive a call back Im not sure if its because of the Holidays but  the call back took a little longer than what I was told I will say  I was completely done with this company untill I spoke to a very understanding and friendly woman named Laura Laura is by definition of what customer service should be about Because of my conversation with her  I have decided to change my review I hope to do more business with them in the future 
2nd edit 
I have received my shirt and it looks great The print work is great  size and location is exactly where I wanted it to be Very pleased with work

Name: A4270
Content: I made a purchase from Rushorder Ts in September It did not go well I posted my experience online by writing reviews I immediately received a response from Them and they eventually made it right It did take finding the right CSR  but in the end the new t shirt I was sent was better quality  the correct size and they issued a partial refund

Name: A4271
Content: If I could leave these guys 10 starts I would First have to say  Jace  is an absolute pro and made sure everything was good to go I had an issue where USPS basically delivered my package in a way where it was easily stolen I needed the shirts for an event the next day I called Rush order about this  and they were able to print the shirts same day and I was able to pick them up Now Im sure this is not the norm  but customer service was absolutely amazing You speak to real human who is there to help you Cant recommend them enough

Name: A4272
Content: I love this place  I have been using them for almost 8 years with various shirts Luke L was very helpful in my most recent order and made a quick change for me They are so helpful and receptive

Name: A4273
Content: although they couldnt fulfill my order because I had a print size specification that was outside of their ability to complete  customer service and every employee i spoke with from start to finish were amazing humans  very kind  understanding  and communicative The next time I need something printed that is a little less weird than this request I will come here first

Name: A4274
Content: Rush order tees always and I mean always does a great job They meet deadlines and stand behind there products Ive been buying from the a couple years now and will continue to do so Thank you Rush Order Tees

Name: A4275
Content: Amazing Customer Service I received my order and was not pleased with the print job After contacting Customer Service  I received an email the next morning that my replacement order was in process and would be received within 7 10 business days

Name: A4276
Content: I wasnt happy with the way my order turned out the first time but RushOrder Tees made it right quickly They sent out a new tee and it was perfect Great Christmas gift

Name: A4277
Content: These guys are the worst Tried to have some DTG samples made before making a big order  thankfully I didnt First they altered my image I sent to something I didnt want at all and was completely unnecessary Not to mention they they tried to pull a fast one on me and send me some cheap iron on heat press vinyl Then they sent me another lot finally with DTG  but the image was wrong again but even different from the first and then just refunded me Awful experience

Name: A4278
Content: Every order I requested a custom detail they nail it They are quick to respond  kind  and amazing at what they do Theres a reason why people comeback; the service and quality are hands down the best around

Name: A4279
Content: Just received my order today Heres what I got so I can only speak for these 3 I picked up Jerzees Nublend Pullover Hoodie  A4 Moisture Wicking Long Sleeve Shirt and 3600 Next Level Apparel Crewneck T Shirt Im impressed by the fit and material of all three The fit is just as I expected and wanted The print job came out perfect  but the material and shirt quality are definitely what led me here to leave a review Also the colors Forest Green my favorite out of the bunch Royal Blue  Cool Blue and Burnt Orange really catch my eye and stand out Highly impressed right now Will order again

Name: A4280
Content: These guys impressed the heck outta me my customized hoodie came out better than I even came close to expecting Perfect placement everything is so HD and crisp the quality is top notch There so good I immediately ordered a 2nd You cant go wrong with RushOrderTees

Name: A4281
Content: Ordering custom shirts was super easy and much cheaper than other places Ive used online I havent got my shirt yet  so I cant comment on that yet  but so far my experience has been great

Name: A4282
Content:
My experience started with us ordering the tshirts that they told me were in stock and then no actually having them in stock and delaying production They then self approved our art and went on to print tshirts that were incorrect and quickly shipped to us even though i had contacted them to tell them we had no approved the art It takes forever for them to respond when theres an issue and in the end never solved it and we have been left with a bunch of tshirts that cant be used and no refund If youre just looking for some blah quality product rush order tees is for you They pretend its personalized service but its another bulk  low quality with little attention to detail tshirt making factory NEVER AGAIN 

Edited I see the owners response below Youre right We had communication since august because nothing was resolved  and once again  with your response here nothing is being resolved I will make sure to escalate this to management to make improvements going forward but  you still wont solve our issue nor refund our order Once more NEVER AGAIN

Name: A4283
Content: Pros  delivery came fast Cons Seems very cheaply made My pull over with the sleeve did not come out how i asked Out of the bag  the print is peeling off the shirt For how much you pay  this is not good

Name: A4284
Content: Luke L is amazing I submitting a chat with concern that my rush order will not make it in time He was very reassuring and thorough Give the guy a raise

Name: A4285
Content:
Ive heard great things about RushOrder Tees  and theyre as advertised as far as service relations I am still awaiting my order which should arrive around March  super pumped 
Thanks guys and gals

Name: A4286
Content: Our school is very happy with our RushedOrderTees orders High quality printing  quick shipping on large orders  and great customer service

Name: A4287
Content: Fantastic customer service Jace Miller was right to help us when a small detail slipped through the cracks on an order Couldnt ask for better service Shirt quality is Top Notch

Name: A4288
Content: Old school customer service is RARE these days especially with large companies Not with RUSHORDERTEES My order somehow ended up going to the wrong address Even though  we communicated via email to resolve the issue  Tianna Wisdom  handled the replacement order with such a personal touch & professionalism that  as I said  is RARE these days RUSHORDERTEES frequent my newsfeed and I can honestly say that so far they have lived up to their reputation with regards to service I eagerly await the arrival of my product

Name: A4289
Content: I had a few issues with Rush Order Tees related to print placement and consistency However  the customer service team I interacted with Alyssa  worked hard to correct the issue and meet my needs in a timely manner Thank you for your help

Name: A4290
Content: Every time I order from RushOrderTees  the quality is always outstanding If there is ever an issue with an order  the RushOrderTees staff is always quick to respond and they handle my request with the utmost care Highly recommended

Name: A4291
Content: OMG Customer Service Representative was extremely helpful and absolutely superb  which made the ordering process simple and easy Thank you for your assistance and I cannot wait to receive my products  firsttimecustomer

Name: A4292
Content: Had to get a few shirt printed for my unit do wear for PT They were kind enough to wave the sleeve printing fee for the US Flag Top notch service

Name: A4293
Content: Tianna did an excellent job quickly adjusting an error on my order She customer service  friendliness  and timeliness was unmatched Thank you Tianna

Name: A4294
Content: I was missing a tank top and some sizes ran small Tianna was so quick and helpful I am thankful I discovered this company and will recommend and use again

Name: A4295
Content:
Excellent work by Rush Order Tees I first designed a shirt with an error  upon seeing the error I made an immediate change However  there were a number of emails to complete the changes which I missed Most places would have made me pay for both the mistake and the fix 
Fortunately I had a great customer service member that guided me through the process and gracefully showed me where I made the mistake      Since it was a Christmas gift for my beautiful wife  I was prepared for the to bad pay anyways This is where I feel ROTs went way beyond customer service at a cost to them and not me  went ahead and sent the proper order  though against ROTs policy  they did it anyway ROTs isnt a company for anything free  especially if the customer makes the mistake  they did everything right I am more than thankful       and my beautiful wife loves her gift 

Thank you Rush Order Tees for going above and beyond Ill be happy to recommend this company as well as use ROTs for my next order

Name: A4296
Content: Friendly staff My order was perfect and arrived quickly The quality of work was excellent Thank you RushOrderTees

Name: A4297
Content: RushOrder customer service is spot on They work hard to make everything right  and they are incredibly responsive RushOrder has a huge catalog and really great graphics people who will make your ideas come to life

Name: A4298
Content: Ive ordered from them a few times now and I couldnt be more pleased Orders have always been correct and arrived on time Not much more I could possibly ask for

Name: A4299
Content: The process was simple and the program was easy to use I am also impressed with the communication and the speed from the company with changes and starting the production I will reorder

Name: A4300
Content: This companys customer service were wonderful They responded very quickly to my request and were able to create the order as I specifically wanted Great company and customer service

Name: A4301
Content: Amazing company Their prices are very reasonable  customer service is amazing  and the quality of products is better than I could imagine

Name: A4302
Content: Communicated with me about a problem on my end less than 24 hours after receiving order and are going to fix at no cost from me just emailed to let me know what was going on and that they have it covered Great Fast Response

Name: A4303
Content: The online design interface is outstanding More shirt options than you care to consider Transparent production process Text messages with shipping progress Product arrived ahead of schedule Everything was perfect except the order One t shirt was not the size I ordered A replacement was on its way before the end of the business Their response to their mistake created a loyal customer Aiming for 5 rating next time

Name: A4304
Content:
Ive ordered rush order for over 5 years now The website and staff are literally incredible and thats because they are so customer and service focused Around 98 of my orders are literally perfect  but our products for our business are very custom  so we expect an issue here and there as you would with a custom printing operation The important thing is that they ALWAYS fix it for us with reprints or future discounts  its never an issue 

When I need an order in a rush  they hit the deadline There was an issue during covid and there have been supply chain issues in the industry itself  so its understandable if something happens here and there  but if they say theyre going to deliver on time  they will deliver unlike most other companies that put me in the back of the line Delivering custom t shirts in 1 or 2 days its been a life saver

Name: A4305
Content: Rush order tees stands by their products They have amazing customer service They hadnt seen my specials instructions and there was a misprint They fixed it immediately and resent under deadline Love this company I will be recommending them to all of my friends

Name: A4306
Content: On Thursday morning I found out I needed 70 tee shirts of three different colors in four sizes each with our company logo printed on the front and back On Friday afternoon today at 2 56pm  UPS dropped them off at my office in California The quality is fantastic  even beyond what I was expecting Bonus points for the customer care team for being super patient and helpful in reassuring me they would make it in time each time I called Oh yeah  the website is super easy to use and extremely user friendly I may have only found their site yesterday  but I can tell you theyll be my go to for any custom printed clothes/hats/bags/etc from now on

Name: A4307
Content: Shirts arrived so quickly and were perfect Unfortunately after a first  very standard  wash all the link peeled off every shift we ordered I reached out to RushOrder to let me know and they immediately put an order in to get us a new round of shirts The new shirts arrived so quickly and they upgraded them to the next level of quality as well Very impressed with the shirts and the service

Name: A4308
Content: Their service was quick and professional My print unfortunately had an issue when it arrived I didnt expect anything to be done about it since mine was such a small order However  after reaching out to customer service  within 30 minutes they have already offered to send a reprint Really awesome customer service Highly recommend Any future prints I need  Ill place through RushOrderTees Thanks  guys

Name: A4309
Content: RushOrderTees has been fantastic to work with We have placed 4 orders with them within the last month and the quality and customer service has been fantastic One order didnt print the way wed hoped and they immediately responded to us and sent us out replacements Their customer service is the best Ive experienced Love this company Thank you

Name: A4310
Content: Excellent quality and remarkably simple UI Every member of the staff was abundantly helpful Special thanks to Jason Cao It was a pleasure doing business with rushordertees

Name: A4311
Content:
Horrible experience I had a rush order for 12 t shirts that was a last minute need I couldnt get them locally in time so ordered them from RushOrder 

I paid over  40 per shirt/ including shipping because I needed them in two days I gave myself an extra day  just to be safe I never received any messages from them through the process so I had to watch the website anxiously to see if they were coming on time 

They did not arrive on the day they were supposed to  but by the time my delivery person had come  it was too late to do anything that night I called first thing the next morning and one day before my event I was told they were printing that day and would be shipped I knew they could not get them across the country in that little time  the guy I spoke to asked me to please give him a chance to try something that might work He never called me back

I called again and got another representative  she told me they were still in printing and wouldnt be received until Monday almost 1 week after I ordered them That would be 2 days late and I would have nothing for my event I am left with less than 24 hours to come up with my own solution If I had one  I would have done it 4 days ago instead of ordering from them at such a high price

I was transferred to their Alyssa who offered to refund 50 of my order After  I explained my anger  she offered me a full refund and free shipping of the shirts Im not really sure what I am supposed to do with them now? I was impressed with Alyssa and she did her best to fix an unfixable situation At least if I get the shirts I will know that somebody at this company cares I will never order from them again and would suggest that you think carefully about what you will do if they dont live up to their promise Have a back up plan

Name: A4312
Content:
Unfortunately  Im super disappointed I was so excited to find a shop that could turn around my order so quickly BUT one thing they were very misleading about is that under the tag of every single t shirt they would be printing their large Rush Order Tees logo  without permission And when I initially ordered over the phone  I communicated to the rep that I was looking for tagless t shirts  wouldnt this be the time to mention your logo? He still went on to place my order and mentioned nothing about the branding that would literally make every single t shirt look tacky I work for a music artist and this is not even something we would sell to his fans Im just super disappointed that the rep was misleading about this 

The screenprinting is great It arrived on time  BUT so many other shops can provide both of these things  so I give one star for misleading your customers I find it very unprofessional Im sure there are many more customers who didnt expect your branding to be on products that we paid for 

I will update my review soon to explain how customer service handles this 

Update This update is long over due Customer service handled the situation like champs They replaced our entire order  suggesting we keep the misprints And to this day  the screen printing on these shirts is the best quality that weve come across Im not kidding Weve been also using Printful for our on demand orders printful quality has diminished over the last year sadly  Yesterday I found myself recommending RushOrder Tees because of how on point their quality in printing is  and of course the turn around time Our last order of black tees with white screenprint is bold and will last many many years  where as Printfuls quality wears after the 1st wash It was a little bit of a rough start with RushOrder BUT you cant beat the quality So thank you for that

Name: A4313
Content: The website lies about when your product will be shipped and printed Inaccurate tracking Doesnt matter how quickly art is approved they take forever to ship but they obviously have no intentions to be fast Super Overpriced shipping fees The chat doesnt work on the website  never connects you to an agent The email customer service is unhelpful and rude Itd be quicker to go into a mall and get custom clothes made then to shop here Update customer service got to me after leaving this review and my hoodie was printed and delivered today Wasnt the best quality printing for how long it took to arrive and how pretty basic the printing looks  also some of the image was not printed so it looks kind of like some of the image they forgot to print or was cut off Nevertheless I think it looks sort of distressed and I have no intentions to return I stand on my point of going into a mall  it will be def faster  better quality and cheaper They charge way too much money for a print job that looks like I did it with an at home printer and iron

Name: A4314
Content: Awesome quality screen printing and they all shipped in record time Logo and lettering turned out better than I had expected Very clear and crisp Highly recommend to anyone wanting to design some custom teeshirts Repeat customer for sure Thanks again

Name: A4315
Content:
I had fun putting together a custom shirt for a concert next week It arrived quickly  so I can rest easy that I received it in time The shirt is gorgeous  of quality products and extremely comfortable 

I had a small disappointment with the print of one letter It was not pressed flat  so it is a little funky I reached out to RushOrderTees  just to let them know  and they immediately responded with intent to send a replacement 

The replacement was not necessary in my case  but I can tell you to make your purchase with confidence 

Thank You RushOrderTees

Name: A4316
Content: I have been ordering swag from these guys for over a year Great service and fast turn around times Today I got an order in and some of the shirts were a different shade they immediately sent an email stating they were re making the entire batch and would have them out in 7 10 days I was super impressed

Name: A4317
Content: Ive ordered twice Once  the t shirts looked great  but after washing the letters on the back started to come off The second time was a disaster  shirts were printed that were completely illegible I was surprised to get these and no one bothered to call me to suggest that the shirt or ink color should be changed It was a big disappointment for the event

Name: A4318
Content: I did have a small issue with the print that was sent to me BUT they replied to my email about my concern almost immediately And made things right  without hesitation I have ordered several shirts from them in the past and will continue to use their service Thank You Rush Order Tees for making things right with no hassle

Name: A4319
Content: I ordered a hoodie and 3 business shirts They had a misspelled word on them I told RushOrderTees They sent out the misspelled hoodie and tees they arrived and I told them they were misspelled they were so polite to send me new hoodies and tees at NO extra charge And they let me keep the older hoodie and shirts I did ask if they wanted me to send back the older hoodie and shirt they said no Very great customer service and business well deserved Production is very quick for custom made orders as well

Name: A4320
Content:
20 shirts printed with a white Photoshop PNG Easy designer interface I got a little nervous waiting for the proof  but when it came  I got the shirts only 3 days later 4 days before their latest expected delivery date 

The shirts are awesome  and I cant wait to show them to their owners It came out to about  40/shirt with front/back one color designs for about 18 shirts Very worth it if you put in the effort for your designs

Name: A4321
Content: Will not show mock up until after you place an order and then tried to tell me this is an industry standard Its not Plenty of other companies show you a mockup before the order is placed Definitely will be ordering elsewhere

Name: A4322
Content: RushOrderTees always comes through Great quality  great designing system  great customer service

Name: A4323
Content: This company has made me change my mind 100  Initially we did have an issue with the product we received but Mr Josh Hannum went above and beyond to get us the T shirt we wanted from the beginning Thank you so much for taking the time to get this squared away for my classmates And we thank you

Name: A4324
Content: Man they made me and my boy the coldest jerseys We made our own basketball squads 25 years ago  we used to make jerseys out of white tees and markers  we finally hung up the sneakers a few years ago When I saw this site I knew I had to make it official and hang up our official jerseys on our walls as well

Name: A4325
Content: I needed my ordered RUSHED after I had already placed my order I reached out to the company via email and live chat Luke L was able to help me and provide great customer service

Name: A4326
Content: I use this company for our outreach tees they have great quality items Quality printing and they stand by their product I would wholeheartedly recommend

Name: A4327
Content: Excellent product Great price FAST DELIVERY TIMES Will definitely buy from them again The team is happy with the product

Name: A4328
Content: Ordered it and 2 days later realized I wanted a lastname down the arm  they answered my email within a day and were able to add it Awesome

Name: A4329
Content: Had a last min change  Luke took care of it Great customer service Cant wait to see how the hoodies turn out Website very easy to use

Name: A4330
Content: Perfect customer service I was able to receive help right away using the live chat option Tianna W was great and answered all my questions

Name: A4331
Content: I struggled to find a place without a minimum order so grateful I found this website They communicate quickly and make what you what WHEN you want Easy to work with

Name: A4332
Content: This is my 4th time receiving an order from rush order tees The first time  they totally butchered my design They put it in the completely wrong spot 2nd time  they got right  but the design almost completely faded within 5 washes The

Name: A4333
Content: I wont order from this company again Ordered a few t shirts and the company not only changed the brand if the t shirt I ordered  but printed it as direct to garmet  which was not specified anywhere The print was splotchy and dull They reprinted on the shirts I ordered  print looked great until I washed the shirts Wash in cold water and have never dried  they look more faded with each wash Total waste of money

Name: A4334
Content: Luke L was great in helping reschedule my order so it would arrive when convenient for me Painless and quick

Name: A4335
Content: Customer service was very nice & helpful  have yet to receive my order though Website was very easy to use  will update when I get it

Name: A4336
Content: ordered multiple shirts from rush order tees and they did a wonder job The one time I was not satisfied they sent me a new shirt no questions asked this company takes pride in their work with exceptional customer service

Name: A4337
Content: Great company to work with I had some last minute changes that were completely my fault and they were able to submit them asap I had a new proof in 15 minutes and they were off to be printed Its hard knowing which shirt is exactly what you want  even if you order some samples There are a lot of choices Almost too many  but working with customer service we were able to  almost to a tee  match fabric which a local company uses for their t shirts that we love Cant wait for the next order

Name: A4338
Content: Anytime I ever need customer service  I know its only going to be a few short minutes and the problem is ALWAYS taken care of Love this company  our school will never go through anyone else

Name: A4339
Content: My jacket was made and shipped to my very fast I was not happy with the placement of my front logo  when I designed the jacket I had asked them to check to see if it was in proper position Hard to tell online Well its too low They are now sending me a new one Great customer service will be buying more stuff from them Mike f

Name: A4340
Content: I just had an online chat with Luke L He took care of my request promptly and professionally Service like this will keep us coming back

Name: A4341
Content: Very nice  courteous and professional people I love ordering designs i make in my spare time for myself from them

Name: A4342
Content: I was procrastinating on ordering shirts for our vending event I placed my order and selected delivery date a few days prior to event hoping the order would arrive It arrived on the date specified and the product was great Even had time to wash the shirts before the event Thank you so much from Sheldon Woodworking and Fine Crafts

Name: A4343
Content: Tiana was so helpful when I was having trouble uploading my artwork I really appreciate the customer support RushOrderTees provides

Name: A4344
Content:
Totally satisfied with the speedy response I received to a concern I had with my order My original item  while well done  was not a match to the proof I submitted The support team a dressed my concerns promptly and with great professionalism 

Thank you rushordertees I will definitely recon end you to other and will not hesitate ordering again for myself in the future

Name: A4345
Content: We ordered several work T shirts from Rush Order tees They were the last piece of the puzzle and were meant to really tie everyone together Making everyone look the same Professional and uniform The shirts even though I received an email about them being delayed arrived very quickly and the entire order process including designing the shirts was very easy to do The shirts looked perfect when they arrived and we were stylin and profylin Unfortunately not 7 months later the logo  company name and phone number were fading I mean completely on a couple  mostly on another couple it was enough to make me reach out to the company just to mention it I really didnt expect much and truthfully I dont know the life expectancy for this type of shirt Maybe it was only 2 months and these shirts lasted an incredible amount of time Not so One email describing my problem and Rush Order Tees was all over it Without hesitation they are reprinting and resending out my entire order BOOM this is how companies should do business When Rush Order Tees says Great Product Great Service & Great People in their logo well its the truth These people arent working in some sweatshop in Bangladesh I dont think they are here helping their customers design great looking stuff and backing their product all the way to the bank FUSH ORDER TEES you have a customer for life Thank you so much

Name: A4346
Content: Super easy process  Fast response time  received on time and Product looks great Would recommend and will use again

Name: A4347
Content: They gave me a courtesy waiver for additional fees on one of my order Really easy to work with and priced right Thank you

Name: A4348
Content:
UPDATE They followed up and initially refunded the rush shipping fee When we missed our deadline for the project  they refunded the remaining balance When the shirts did arrive  the print quality was very good  as was the shirt quality Next Level  Despite my initial frustration  I do feel they made an earnest effort to correct the situation  so Ive updated my initial 1 star review accordingly 

  

We paid  70 for the fastest rush shipping option on a very time sensitive job and the ability to hit the deadline was the entire reason for using Rush Order Tees  The delivery date specified during the ordering process was 9/14 After checkout  they quietly changed the delivery date to 9/16 Now we have a few hundred dollars of useless shirts  plus a pointless rush shipping fee

Name: A4349
Content: Shirt Order arrived with a couple of issues ROT Custom T Shirts & Apparel was made aware of it and they were able to quickly and efficiently correct the order at no extra cost Very Satisfied and would recommend their company Great work and customer service

Name: A4350
Content: Thank you so much  Tianna  for your help getting my order right You are very polite  professional  and helpful I appreciate all you did

Name: A4351
Content: Great quality tshirts  quick delivery  even better customer service Allison was great We were initially unhappy with the first set of shirts and they immediately sent another set of edited shirts for free The new set was perfect and just in time for the event Allison made sure to have them shipped on time

Name: A4352
Content:
I got tank tops for my bachelor party week and they came out great We used graphics the company already had to create our own design online The quality of the shirts and design are impressive My buddies and I still wear these shirts to the beach and gym The price is great and I definitely recommend using rushordertees Our order came in quick too  with free shipping 

Updates 6 years later Still wearing these shirts and the graphics have not faded from wash

Name: A4353
Content: Ordered shirts for our trade show paid for overnight shipping did not receive Were supposed to ship to our destination and somehow didnt even get out of production Service rep didnt even care said we will see about a refund Awful service

Name: A4354
Content: I screwed up my order but they fixed it in time and got it to us just in time My son is excited to wear it to school once before we hit the road to Rachel Come on lets play Thanks guys

Name: A4355
Content: One of the most simple and most helpful custom t shirt websites and companies out there 10 stars if it was an option

Name: A4356
Content: My order arrived and half of the shirts were misprinted The ones that were printed correctly were perfect I emailed them to report the issue and they got back to me within seconds and submitted a reprint order with no questions asked I appreciate the excellent customer service and will definitely use them again in the future

Name: A4357
Content: Great quality  Service   options  product and especially the people  thanks to John working out and helping with design  style  color fabric shirt  Sweater  long/Short sleeve  Golf shirt etc  Would advise to give this company & their reputation a Shot Worth every second & Cent

Name: A4358
Content: Ordered 1 tank top for my boyfriend that I customized the front and back of My order came 3 days earlier then planned standard shipping unfortunately they sent a t shirt instead of a tank top  I called the customer service number and the gentlemen I spoke with could not have been nicer or more accommodating I explained my issue and he let me know they would ship out a new shirt tank top with my customizations ASAP and apologized for the mix up Also let me keep the original T shirt which was so nice of them The prints came out amazing on the shirt as well Great quality and great customer service Will definitely be recommending and using this company in the future

Name: A4359
Content: Excellent customer service We have used several in person and online printing services for apparel This was easy to order and the rush order was on delivered on time Would use this service again

Name: A4360
Content: I do NOT recommend Rush order tees to anyone Not only did it take over 45 days to receive my shirts  when they finally did come they looked like trash The shirt on the right is from Uber Prints I received it in about 10 days The shirt on the left is from Rush order tees Why would Rush order tees even mail out shirts that look like this Complete trash

Name: A4361
Content: They did not charge me an extra fee for special printing Greatly appreciate this

Name: A4362
Content: Remarkable  Excellent  Marvelous  Fantastic  Great  Awesome  Wonderful  Amazing  Impressive  Spectacular  Outstanding  Stunning  Incredible  Extraordinary  Phenomenal  Just a few words that describe RushOrderTees

Name: A4363
Content: Although I had issues with my order I was helped out greatly by the customer service Thank you for a great product the t shirts came out great and I plan on working with this company in the future I recommend them for their great prices and quality product The website also has a great customization option

Name: A4364
Content: Luke was extremely helpful and gathered the information I needed fast Explained the reasoning as well Great asset to your company

Name: A4365
Content: RushOrder Tees done a great job on our T shirts They were fast and efficient when it come down to the whole order I will definitely be ordering shirts again for my business

Name: A4366
Content: This was very easy to use and communication is great cant wait to see how my order turns out

Name: A4367
Content: My husband celebrated his 50th birthday in early May this year and I had planned a surprise party for him to celebrate with all our friends during our Outer Banks vacation in mid May About 2 weeks before we were set to leave I got the bright idea to order shirts for everyone for the celebration I kept telling myself I wished Id thought of the idea sooner  but I would somehow make it work Thanks to Josh and Nathan at Rush Order Tees the surprise went off without any issues or glitches and everyone loved their shirts They helped me get my order placed AND rushed the delivery so I would receive them before we departed for North Carolina I cant say enough about how great this experience was Their customer service and products are top notch Thank you so much guys

Name: A4368
Content: We placed an order for 100 t shirts with RushOrderTees About 15 of these we needed rushed They created two separate orders  but gave us the bulk rate for the smaller order as well They even helped us with larger sizes 3X and 5X  T shirts arrived when expected and were of excellent quality Gildan  We were so impressed  we placed another order soon after for a different design Again  delivered when expected and  again  excellent quality We were missing one t shirt They responded immediately to the email I sent them and are rushing the missing t shirt to us Overall  a great company to work with with fast response times  on time shipping and a great product

Name: A4369
Content:
I ordered a hoodie that was 60 dollars  but I liked the design I had made so I ordered despite the price The day the order was marked as delivered I was excited but the package wasnt anywhere to be found I called customer service and they told me they could reprint my hoodie on a different brand of hoodie I didnt want that and requested a refund and was told its not an option for the representative I asked if there would be an issue if I disputed it with my bank and the agent said  we have proof of delivery so we would dispute it Unbelievable robbery of my money and rude customer service 

edit dont think just because they responded to my review they solved my problem all they did was once again offer me the same design in a different color will not be using their services again  and i strongly advice you to not as well as they can literally steal your money

Name: A4370
Content:
Spent almost  200 on 1 hoodie and 3 shirts and all the shirts were horribly done Its almost as if they take the name of the brand RUSHordertees literally and they rush everything to the point where it comes out horrible The logo i wanted on the garments were so low they were pretty much printed on the stomach area of the shirts and hoodie instead of the middle chest area and the logo i wanted on them were crooked and the garments were just completely unwearable On top of that i ordered a medium hoodie and recieved an XL instead They are reprinting them so when i have the repirints i will update this with how they come out This isnt the first order i had like this from this company Seem they need to take more pride in their work instead of literally rushing everything And maybe check the work before just packing it up and shipping it out like its all good People are spending a lot of money on this stuff 

Update I got my reprints and they came in absolutely perfect just the way i was expecting them to the first time I will soon be making a bigger order and i just wanted to make sure they were going to be perfect before putting that order in RushOrderTees customer servicr is on point Thank you guys

Name: A4371
Content: This was my first time ordering custom shirts  and the staff made it relatively seamless Although there was an issue with the initial design I wanted due to restrictions of printing area  the staff did their best to accommodate and help with suggestions I had very minor issues with the shirts delivered  having only 3 out of 65 that werent quite right They offered to correct and send out new ones ASAP Very great team they have and reliably quick with timeframes Will definitely be returning in the future

Name: A4372
Content: Drop ship company portraying to print themselves Bulk order of t shirts showed up partially blank from heat press missed stamps Customer service  Is beyond rude and does not speak to clients in a professional manner I hardly ever if almost not at all give one stars on Google maps but these guys are definitely not worth the price to products they require Furthermore they stay at the top of google for paid advertising not because of great customer reviews

Name: A4373
Content: Rush order is the Best I have placed many orders with them for our HVAC company Shirts are made well and arrive quickly Customer service is amazing They definitely take pride in their work If you are not satisfied with something  they quickly remedy the problem Amazing Company I cant say enough good things Thanks for the work you do  and treating your customers so well

Name: A4374
Content: One of the best customer service experiences i have had The agents always answer my questions in a timely matter and help me with all of my questions

Name: A4375
Content: Needed some tees before a trip with my college friends USPS lost the package and I was in danger of not having my shirts for the trip Rush Order Tees printed my shirts that day and offered to ship them overnight which would have solved the issue I am luckily located near their office so we were able to arrange local pick up which was super convenient for me The shirts were amazing quality and exactly what I ordered Al my friends loved them 10/10 would recommend and will be buying again

Name: A4376
Content: Artwork started peeling off after one wash Email them  attached photos of shirts Week later i received new shirts Fair

Name: A4377
Content: Ive used ROT several times The shirts always look great Also  their customer service is terrific

Name: A4378
Content: Exceptional customer care; they went further than above and beyond to address my concern Products are very fairly priced and the workmanship in the customization is extremely well executed We will return for further business to say the least HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Name: A4379
Content: I ordered 3 shirts with a digital art print that I had created The shirts were printed slightly higher to the neckline than I would have liked Yet  when I expressed my dislike of the placement  RushOrder Tees got right on changing the placement and sending me new shirts that fit what I had expected The customer service was great when dealing with the replacement t shirts and there was no kickback from the company Great experience

Name: A4380
Content: My first order with them last year was delivery coming before expected This last order I was mislead twice when I called in to question the timeline Both times I called because it was close to delivery date but I was not given a shipping number yet I was told order was on schedule a few days after the were supposed to be delivered I emailed customer service and was I told they looked into it and they are behind It would be completed and shipped sometime next week I only wish they were upfront about being behind schedule from the beginning and I could have made other arrangements I do not recommend using them anymore as I did after the first order last year Going to try somewhere local next time

Name: A4381
Content: Thanks Luke for all the help on confirming the order Much appreciated Its my 2nd year ordering  super excited

Name: A4382
Content: Originally  I placed an order for a garment that  it turned out  wouldnt arrive in time for Christmas supply chain 2021   customer service reached out to me and walked me through replacement options AND made sure Id get the sweatshirts in time for Christmas I honestly like the replacement option they suggested even better than what I originally chose I will 100 order from them again The sweatshirts are beautiful  and the customer service is seriously unparalleled

Name: A4383
Content:
I love what they made for me The quality is great 
During the process of making my order  Ive bothered them with so many questions and they were open to helping me out every single time 
Their staff is very kind and very helpful 
Loved working with this place

Name: A4384
Content: Ordered my first t shirt from rushordertees I was actually able to talk to someone to help me with the order I wanted a t shirt that was not clingy but didnt wrinkle The guy was super nice and picked out the perfect shirt The order came a week early but unfortunately the logo I picked was to high on the back of the shirt I sent an email explaining the situation and they are rectifying the problem and sending me a free t shirt sometimes problems happen when ordering custom items I am super happy so far with rushordertees for doing everything possible to resolve the issue If the shirt arrives corrected I will defiantly order from them again

Name: A4385
Content:
I ordered a set of embordered polos At first the order was delayed and I received zero communication about it  and it was difficult to get a straight answer However when the polos did arrive  they were atrocious You couldnt read the logo  several had loose threads  and some didnt even have a completed logo They were unusable  and because they arrived late I couldnt rush a new order to fix them before the date I needed I eventually go a re order for free and those came out a lot better  still messy and not quite up to par but better and I can actually use them 

However  their customer service was far and away the best I have ever worked with Everyone I spoke to was supper accommodating and helpful and they worked really hard to make sure my re order was done correctly The only reason they are getting 3 stars is because the customer service was amazing I wont necessarily get something embroidered from them again  but I might consider them for an easier  less important job in the future

Name: A4386
Content: I ordered two different styles of shirts The overall quality of the shirt was good  but the printing was offset so it looked like it had been double printed Polos were supposed to have embordering instead of ink Called the customer service and explained to them the situation and with out argument they responded with an email explaining the situation would be handled ASAP I run a company and know how orders get mixed up and issues occur but the customer service and response is what makes a company stand out So far Im beyond happy with the response from the team and cant wait to see the new shirts with proper lettering I will give a follow up on the condition of the new polos Thank you for the great customer service RushOrderTees

Name: A4387
Content: Initial ordering was easy and I was able to customize the shirt just the way I wanted in a very short time Delivery was made on an expedited basis within the time promised One of the shirts I ordered had a small mistake I called the 800 number which was promptly answered and the service agent took care of the issue on the spot with no charge to me She was very polite and professional and was able to immediately confirm the mistake and correct it Great customer service and great product quality  the shirts turned out just like I envisioned them

Name: A4388
Content: Rush Order Tees was a super easy process from start to finish If you want great communication and customer service  Rush Order Tees is rather amazing My order was designed and shipped promptly The quality of shirts were exactly as described and the print was exactly as pictured in the design process and design approval stage 2 of my shirts had minor defects mainly due to the color of the shirt itself bleeding through the design a bit  but within minutes of reaching out  and I mean minutes  they were already on top of making it right and printing me two more This company is an absolute pleasure to do business with 5 stars all day

Name: A4389
Content: I recently placed a small order with Rush Order Tees I found the design process and the order process to be user friendly and quick The communication from the company was awesome and the speed in which they printed my shirts and shipped them was fast Part of my order wasnt to my satisfaction as the coloring was not accurate I quickly notified R O T and they quickly sent me a replacement Overall  I am very happy with their service and would do business again

Name: A4390
Content: 15 shirts with defective logo front and back  bleeding adhesive or something company wont replace because its two years old they blame the storage conditions  but not all the shirts are defective but the problem is its a small order  over half the stock ordered in advance gone bad  sitting in the box  or sent that way  and company REFUSES to correct claiming no liability Doesnt even offer an option just a hard no and a tone of voice that expected a confrontation  doesnt reference a policy or contract clause Just no Almost as if they are aware of this??? but i digress  its only 15 shirts i paid for them i dont care how long ago they arent usable do the right thing

Name: A4391
Content: Great customer service I run an electric company and ordered shirts with my logo on it that came out better than expected  Unfortunately t shirts are not very true to size I recommend going up a size in adult sizes I emailed them about my issue with the sizing and they mailed out a new set of shirts the very next day  very fast shipping Definitely recommend this place will be ordering more in the future through them

Name: A4392
Content: This company has been a pleasure to deal with My first order came perfectly with no issues The second one I received with an error on the graphic in the back I contacted them immediately and are fixing and replacing the shirts Great customer service

Name: A4393
Content: Ordered shirts for my teams and am happy with the selection and service provided by Luke L

Name: A4394
Content: I had a problem with the printing coming off during second washing cycle I sent an email with pictures and they immediately sent an entire new order 10 shirts  From the design help  to the constant order updates  to the prompt incredible service  all has been excellent I will never use a different company  they have at least one lifetime customer

Name: A4395
Content: I ordered three logo tshirts printed front and back  although the front logo was slightly tilted and not perfect  Im giving them a 5 star review for immediately responding to my email  after normal business hours and confirming the reprint and delivery date of three new shirts

Name: A4396
Content:
Update upon reading my review below  a customer support rep reached out and gave me a full refund  which I do appreciate given the poor communication combined with my original order arriving on time but not being correctly printed and therefore unusable Ultimately  my reprinted order did not arrive in time for event  as mentioned below  so the refund here was the appropriate resolution 

Rush Order Tees processed and printed an order incorrectly without letting me know thered be a change to the design I submitted I paid nearly double for my order for rush shipping to ensure delivery for an event I had on 11/12 The shirts arrived in time  but were not correct and therefore I could not use them ROTs customer support apologized and said theyd reprint the order  but knowing the order would arrive after my event  I let them know this was not the desired resolution since the reprinted shirts would be of no value given their late arrival ROTs team stopped responding to me and sent the order anyway The reprinted order was correct  but came too late This approach is very poor customer service  especially since its clear the mistake was on ROTs end  since they were able to re print the design correctly the second time around Why couldnt they have done this the first time  or reached out to let me know if there was some issue? Why did they ignore me when I politely requested a refund since a re print would arrive too late? I wont be using this companys service again Their approach to customer service and error resolution leaves much to be desired

Name: A4397
Content: worst experience ever Payed  50 for a single shirt  the original shirt did not ever arrive usps says it was never picked up from them but they said it was when I called to cancel order  At that point we still had 5 days until the event so they convinced me to let them replace the order so i did Howerver  the second ordered shirt did not arrive in time for the event i needed it for When it did arrive a day after the event it was on a totally different t shirt than i had originally ordered and it had a misprint on the front a big white dot that was not connected to anything a simple quality control before it left the facility would have caught this Bottom line there are some other options out there for fast low minimum screen printing and I would use them over rush order ts

Name: A4398
Content: I received my shirt very fast Once I got it the color was lighter then I had hoped it would be I sent an email and they are sending a replacement I find customer service is what really matters to me now and I was happy to hear back from them so soon

Name: A4399
Content: Really easy order process Reasonable prices Cant wait to actually get the sweatshirt

Name: A4400
Content: Had a little miss print customer support got back to me within a couple hours and are sending me new shirts

Name: A4401
Content: They were good shirts until I ran them through a washer machine and dryer machine 2 times than the print on the back started to fade away a lot Recieved new shirts and they work great now Good Customer Service and fast Delivery of the package

Name: A4402
Content: I ordered ten shirts for my business The shirts arrived early The material of the shirts was very soft and looked to be extremely comfortable The sizing was perfect Unfortunately  my business name and logo on the front of my shirts was much too small I contacted RushOrder Tees and explained that  overall  the shirts appeared to be pretty much what I wanted however  my business logo and name on the front was much too small Within hours RushOrder Tees contacted me and advised me that they were sorry that the order wasnt to standard and were going to send me replacements This is exactly what good businesses do The fast response to this issue will keep me dealing with RushOrder Tees from this point forward

Name: A4403
Content:
Very poor service and misleading 

I was initially glad to have found RushOrderTees after contacting their Online Chat that confirmed delivery could be made for customized T shirts to arrive on Oct 28th if I placed the order before 7 pm Eastern time on Oct 22nd 

However  at 4 pm on the same day Oct 22nd  when finalizing the order  I was then informed that they could not abide by the agreed date and would actually need 4 extra days to deliver the T shirts Nov 1st 

After raising my concerns to the sales and customer services via email  all they would reply was that I could placing an order online or by calling them without addressing or even acknowledging any of the concerns Very unhelpful and not at all useful 

The whole experience has been extremely misleading  especially having being told very different information as well as their website stating that same day turnaround would be possible and that they advertise that they could delivery in 4 business days None of the advertised information or agreed delivery date has turned out to be true

Name: A4404
Content: I ordered 12 custom printed t shirts for a golf weekend weve been doing for over 20 years After I ordered  I confirmed with a sales rep via e mail that I would receive a proof of my shirt before it was printed I did not I instead received an e mail that theyd already been shipped I reached out to them  and they said Id indicated in my order that I didnt need to see a proof  and assured me the printing would be of the highest quality When I received the shirts  the printing was indeed great  but just on the WRONG SHIRT I reached back out to let them know I received the wrong shirt  and they assured me they would reprint and send replacements ASAP After a few days  I received another e mail that stated they didnt have the shirt in stock white XL Hanes Beefy t  really?  and that they would simply refund me  60 for my trouble The shirts they sent were less expensive  so essentially  I just paid for what I received  even though it was wrong There was no indication on the site  and still isnt  that Hanes Beefy ts are unavailable Just gives the impression they didnt want the expense of owning up to their mistake Very disappointing

Name: A4405
Content: Nothing but good things to say about them I own and operate a small home restoration business  everything from the design process to the final product was smoothe and efficient I had a deadline for a recent order and due to unforeseen issues the product was delayed Their customer service was friendly and efficient and took care of me  offering a refund and still delivering the product as a sign of good faith I will continue to use their services as theyre professional  and handle situations properly with the customer in mind  from one business to another I highly recommend them

Name: A4406
Content: Received my order on August 3  2021  but it was not quite what I ordered The image and lettering were in white and should have been black I called customer support and spoke with Tyler who was very polite and efficient He is rectifying the situation and I should receive the correct shirts Thank you for your great customer assistance

Name: A4407
Content: I have recently started a non profit organization Pier22 Fishing with my buddies and we needed a place to order product from I have been working with RushOrderTees for about 3 weeks The service they provide is unreal They offer great products but what really makes this company amazing is the customer service they provide They are quick to respond  help you with your design and offer solutions for you When there is an issue with your order they are quick to fix it Ive never had customer service like this before When they say real people unreal service its 100 spot on

Name: A4408
Content: This company has excellent customer service I spoke to a representative Angel on the phone to discuss the possibility of creating 2 shirts that I could pick up the very next day  and he worked with me to get the entire thing done in an impressive timely fashion In less than 24 hours I went from having a shirt idea to having the two shirts printed and in my hands The shirts are good quality and as I said the customer service is really excellent  all of the 3 people I spoke to were extremely responsive and knowledgable  and went above and beyond to get my task done Highly recommend using this company for your t shirt orders

Name: A4409
Content: Great quality and great customer service Tianna W helped me update my order seamlessly

Name: A4410
Content: Their customer service is 5 stars but as far as making the product look the way I designed it  it would equate 3 stars I have ordered from them twice now and the first initial shipment has always had some type of issue The first time I ordered  they gave me the wrong size and wrong brand and the print in the front was incorrectly placed However  they are very quick to reply to my email and fix this issue by sending me a new one The replacement hoodie was exactly correct to what I had initially designed The second time I ordered  the only issue I had was that the print in the front was place in the center of the chest rather than the left as I had designed Again  they were quick to reply and informed me that they would send a new one Overall  I would give them a 4 stars They put forth a good effort and if there is ever any issue they respond immediately and fix the problem I would recommend this to people who have patience They take a bit to process the order and print/make the product  it does take a bit of time In addition  if there is an issue with the product  it will take more time for them to send out a new one to replace the faulty one Worth a shot though

Name: A4411
Content: Super helpful and professional Couldnt be happier with the ordering process and communication

Name: A4412
Content: Luke was absolutely amazing helping me get my order handled in a timely manner

Name: A4413
Content: RushOrder Tees has such great  attentive customer service  I highly recommend

Name: A4414
Content: RushOrderTees saved us We needed 30 shirts by Saturday and they actually promised them by Wednesday less than a week after ordering They arrived on Tuesday and were beautiful Thanks

Name: A4415
Content: 5 star service hands down I ordered shirts for my business and a few weeks later had letters falling off from the wash Called and without hesitation they upgraded the level of material and sent out a fresh batch Jace Miller was awesome Much appreciated and will 100 use this company again

Name: A4416
Content: Received the wrong product Was a little frustrated after spending so much money only to receive the wrong shirts But Ive been notified that a replacement is being sent out with my original intended product choice Rushordertees is great for any print on demand needs you may have Amazing customer service Nice they have no minimum order quantity Thanks Rushordertees

Name: A4417
Content: This is the second time our company has used this service We had an issue  and the customer service level is honestly the best customer service Great job to everyone at Rush order Much appreciated You have a returning customer

Name: A4418
Content: My t shirt came as ordered Very happy  but after the first wash some of the letters started peeling before I even got the chance to wear it even once So I contacted RushOrderTees  and they immediately sent me a replacement No questions asked That is great customer service Thanks

Name: A4419
Content: I ordered a single custom screen printed garment from RushOrderTees; this was my first ever experience with this company I purchased from them because they offered a wide selection of products and the design interface was super easy to navigate When the order arrived a week earlier than they had promised the graphic had been printed in the wrong place I emailed the company to alert them to the error and within a few hours they had not only responded to express their disappointment in and offer their apologies for the snafu but also to tell me theyd made the correction AND had already begun the process of re printing the job    for FREE How could I ever do business with anyone else? 100 satisfied

Name: A4420
Content:
RushOrderTees is AWESOME I asked favors of their team twice during the process  and they beyond stepped up to the bat both times to meet my specific needs I am filled with gratitude To see why the shirt they made is so important to me  go to Instagram on July 29 and look at posts by gal0tgo I cannot rave about RushOrderTees enough  from ease of creating my order  placing my order  fair pricing  working with members of their customer service team  turnaround time  to finished product They earned 5++++ stars with me

Keep up the stellar job  RushOrderTees

Name: A4421
Content:
This site is great They make sure to get your order to you on time and work with you throughout the entire process 

I was able to chat and confirm our original design would be suitable After sign off I submitted for proofs They were not exactly as we expected  but they were able to rectify within 24 hrs and still get us our shirts on the day we were meant to receive them They came out perfectly and the shirt is great quality

Name: A4422
Content: Best customer experience ever I came across this place when looking for a last minute custom T shirt printing option for my sons birthday Website was easy to use  and I got immediate responses to all my questions over email The order arrived as promised  however  a package thief stole the package right from my door I filed a police report  but was devastated since I didnt expect to have the order re fulfilled within 2 days in time for the party  I contacted RushOrderTees and they immediately came to the rescue They saved our party and made a lifelong customer Everyone loved the shirts  and wore them to school the next day I washed these shirts  and they still look great  highly  highly recommend Would give this 6* if I could

Name: A4423
Content: Art approval takes weeks? WHAT? go to 4imprint and get your art approval same day and your shirts QUICK Dont know why I strayed but I learned my lesson Good luck getting what you want in a reasonably fast manor

Name: A4424
Content: RushOrder Tees was very accommodating and easy to work with They did a great job helping us design t shirts for our company Definitely would recommend this company and will use again in the near future

Name: A4425
Content: I had a large complex order and RushOrderTees delivered over and above expectations They put everything in the cart for me  applied the promo codes  held the order while I changed quantities & graphics  and provided outstanding customer service Michaela & Gigi were both amazing when I had issues and changes  fixed everything without any pushback at all I order a significant amount of spirit wear from a variety of online and physical vendors and RushOrderTees far exceeded the other vendors I use The quality of the products was superb  everything arrived when they said it would  and they were extremely responsive I highly recommend this company  they do a great job all around

Name: A4426
Content: Really great experience on the website and with their customer support on the live chat Very helpful  seamless and fast

Name: A4427
Content: I placed an order just to try out this company with some basic work t shirts for my Mobile Auto Repair Business My order arrived about a week sooner then expected The online design process was pretty simple My only problem was when i opened my package and started looking at the shirts  I found 2 of them to have what looked like a crease from them folding them but upon trying to get it unstuck it started peeling the logo I reached out and they handled the problem very quickly and will be sending me a new order to solve my problem I get it this place is very busy and may have just folded the tees a little too soon as to why the silk screen stuck to itself But the problem was addressed and overall I am happy with the quality of shirts and also the customer service Highly recommended if your looking to have shirts made for any business or event Thanks Rushordertees i now look official with my new company shirts

Name: A4428
Content: First time ordering  arrived on time and design was amazing Colors got mixed up but their customer service is second to none and re shipped replacements to make my experience the best possible Definitely will recommend and order again 5 star items  shipping  and customer service

Name: A4429
Content: Its the poor and unprofessional customer service for me Its Mike who could not offer any concrete information on where my order is and could only blame me for choosing free shipping for my  200 00 plus order and blame their delivery partner while not confirming the shirts have even shipped Makes me think theyre way behind on production and nothing has shipped at all Im not used to calling any professional business with an issue and being met with such lack of accountability AND lack of being solution oriented AND no apology Just finger pointing and no real update on an order ppaced over three weeks ago Being I and the company are in the same city  I would have taken an offer to pick up my order But you cant pick up whats not produced

Name: A4430
Content: I had a t shirt shipped to me that had some stains from the printing on it Within minutes of notifying them they started the process of making and sending me a new one It arrived within days This is the best customer service I have ever experienced Plus the products they put out are done extremely well and on high quality shirts

Name: A4431
Content: Received my product and quality of Tshirts and print was awesome  just an issue with placement I sent an email and the same day they advised me they are resending out the order to satisfy my issue truly amazing customer service which is everything when dealing with companies Thank you

Name: A4432
Content:
I made a custom T shirt order in plenty of time to receive my order for a specific event After approving my design I was given the delivery date The date came and went but my shirts never showed up I contacted customer support and was given an updated delivery date a week later  The second date also came and went but no order was delivered I also never received any updated information The event has now passed I am demanding a full refund Rush Order Tees should be called You Might Get Your Order IF We Feel Like It I am extremely disappointed with this company 

UPDATE My initial 1 star review has been updates to 3 stars The event I needed the shirts for has already passed After the event passed I contacted the company to cancel my order and get a refund The customer service people were very nice They cancelled my order and I received a full refund I was also contacted by the V P of sales Josh Hannum who apologized for my order not being ready in time He fulfilled my order at no cost to me The shirts arrived today and are wonderful If I could have received the shirts when I needed them I would have given 5 stars By sending the order  even after I cancelled it  you showed me you do care about the customers Thank you

Name: A4433
Content:
UPDATE I must upgrade my experience from a 4 star rating to a 5 star rating due to the efforts of Michael and Alyssa with RushOrderTees They promptly addressed the paint residue issue I had by replacing the shirts that had the residue on them I also mentioned to Alyssa that I actually needed to add a shirt to my order because I had miscounted the number of shirts I needed and she gave me the additional shirt free of charge this company is top notch They went above and beyond to ensure my experience was the best experience possible They deserve 6 stars I highly recommend using them for your custom t shirt needs

Everything about my experience ordering with RushOrderTees was a 5 star experience except the skill with which the shirts were printed At least 3 of the 13 shirts I ordered had paint residue on the back side I had nothing printed on the back of the shirts My order definitely qualified as a RUSH order so I am assuming that may be the reason for the sloppiness on a few of the shirts

Name: A4434
Content: This company has provided some of the best customer service ive experienced in my life Their was an error with my order that resulted in me receiving the wrong shirts as the ones i ordered were discontinued The whole process involved with correcting this error was painless and very professional All of the customer service representatives i interacted with were pleasant and helpful and the wait time was exceptionally low My experience with Rush Order Tees customer service was exceptional and i will absolutely order from them again

Name: A4435
