Content: First and foremost I want to say thank you Evette She helped me fix an order that did not come as I had planned Everything was replaced free of charge by Rushordertees and she made the entire experience pain free She is the BEST Thank Rushorder for having her on staff

Name: A4436
Content: Edited I had a bit of a bumpy experience at first  but when things got escalated  RushOrderTees made sure to correct the order  checking in along the way to make sure it was right

Name: A4437
Content: Order was received with errors  on the companys part I called and they will fix it and reship They make their returns/exchanges super easy The only thing was that the customer service guy was a jerk  but thats understandable I guess

Name: A4438
Content: This is my second time using RushOrder Tees and Im so happy with our shirts There was a small mistake on my order  but their customer service was amazing and quickly fixed the problem and sent out new shirts immediately I highly recommend

Name: A4439
Content: My order arrived not as ordered  with some sizes overshipped and another under shipped I have been assured by email that the short shipped shirts will be sent as soon as the run can be completed I trust this process will solve the problem  then Id give the 5 stars

Name: A4440
Content: I ordered t shirts and even though there was an error in color  the quality of the shirts and the printing was top rate Customer service was very quick in resolving the problem and they have made a happy customer out of me Definitely will be placing orders with them in the future

Name: A4441
Content: The ordering process is easy I was able to place my order by uploading an image from my Google drive  it arrived within about 10 days maybe less  The colors were not vibrant and the image was faded I was disappointed so I called the customer service number provided in the email and easily reached a real person It was difficult to hear her  but I explained my situation  and she had pulled up my order immediately and said they would send me out a new one at no cost The situation was handled easily Im looking forward to receiving my order Hoping its brightly colored and vibrant this time

Name: A4442
Content: Made an order for our company and the shirts look great and we received them very quickly The sizing ran a little small for some of our guys but Rush order made it right They are Awesome Thank you  and I definitely recommend this company

Name: A4443
Content: After choosing rushordertees for the best pricing  availability and shipping times I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of my shirts ordered 30 baseball ts and very responsive customer care

Name: A4444
Content: Outstanding customer service I had an issue with how my design was printed on the final product  and after reaching out I had a response back from them within a few hours to replace it for me The quality of the printing is fantastic  and it arrived sooner than expected I cant wait to buy another custom shirt

Name: A4445
Content: Thank you to Luke for looking in to my question and giving me a quick answer I cant wait to see the finished product

Name: A4446
Content: Design and selection were very easy using the website tools Rush delivery rates were also quite reasonable With a little glitch on the order  customer service was fast and fixed the issue entirely with no hassle or extra charges Will use again for sure

Name: A4447
Content: We appreciate all the extra help You guys made it happen for us so quickly and against the odds Thanks Luke L especially

Name: A4448
Content: I am VERY upset and they are not answering a phone Everything is so impersonal and automated I was shipped the wrong thing and they auto answer is to reprint I dont need a reprint of this  I need someone to here you printed it wrong I had 2 designs 2 should have been of 1 and the other should be just 1 shirt I received 3 shirts of the first design Secondly  I had placed another order for nearly 200 shirts and I am now really concerned they will be wrong Terrible Customer Service

Name: A4449
Content: RushOrderTees is the absolute coolest company to deal with They make everything you can think of and their turn around time is lightning fast Ive had several orders with them already and I will always highly recommend them to everyone Thanks and keep up the AMAZING work

Name: A4450
Content: Do NOT  I Repeat  Do Not use this company I have used this company twice for the Merch at my Performing Arts school The first time we spent around  250 When the merch arrived it was extremely cheap quality and the designs were wrong However we tried this company a second time Silly us We spent around  1600 for hoodies and sweatpants Not a huge order for the high price When the merch arrived 90 of it was damaged Not considering the extremely cheap material of both the hoodies and the pants  but the pockets to the hoodies were all hanging off  the stitching was terribly done  there were strings and tattered parts  the pressed logos were peeling  most of the hoodie pockets had small holes AND we were missing items  ¦  We attempted several times to communicate with this extremely unprofessional company Not only were we treated as if it was our fault the order had so many flaws  but they refused to take the full order back and return our money They also refused to send us the missing merch we paid for or to replace all of the damaged merch We sent in photos but were told that wasnt good enough to prove the damage I lost money on this order Not only that but Ive had to return money to families that purchased merch and after ONE WASH  had to contact me because the hoodie pockets came right off the hoodies Not only is their product cheap  overpriced and damaged but their customer service is enough to make us never return Waste of money and time

Name: A4451
Content: had a issue with arrival date  ROCKSTAR Luke saved my bacon You have my business 4 life

Name: A4452
Content: I highly recommend this company I ordered 66 shirts for my family reunion and It was a pleasant experience from beginning to end Michael who I worked with was very responsive and patient with me I had an issue with one of my shirts and my issue was quickly resolved without hesitation by The customer service agent If you need shirts quickly and for a very reasonable price  please use this company You wont be disappointed

Name: A4453
Content: Waived my sleeve design fee Will use them again for my other friends Thank you

Name: A4454
Content: Incredible service There was a misprint and they sent me the fixed version of my shirts with in the time frame that I needed them Barely had to wait a day for their response to my concern Great company Great people

Name: A4455
Content: Im very pleased The print on the front was a little more faded than I expected and the black lettering on one shirt had a yellowing effect around the letters  that said  the follow through with this company was painless and they have offered to replace the shirts GREAT customer service and it was very easy They stand behind their work

Name: A4456
Content: Thanks for getting the shirts for our team ready so quickly Everyone loved them My only complaint would be that my wifes shirt had a hole in the sleeve

Name: A4457
Content: After my initial order went wrong and not being able to speak to customer service  I was contacted by Heather who was soo nice and apologetic Heather did everything to try and right the wrongs Heather stayed in contact with me throughout the process I received a new order and they were better than the first Overall  I am satisfied with my new order  all thanks to Heather

Name: A4458
Content: I ordered from RushOrderTees for my class graduation t shirts and they turned out amazing The quality was top class  not your typical marketing t shirt We were running against a hard deadline and the sales rep who helped me place the order was super understanding when i called back in to update sizing after i placed my order  customer service was fantastic i received my shirt 3 days before the expected delivery date and was amazed after many failed attempts contacting other companies  RushOrderTees really made it work my entire class went crazy over the shirts were already planning to order more for our summer camps and even some for family reunions thanks so much Justin and Jess you were AMAZING

Name: A4459
Content: Had a small issue  and customer service went above and beyond to fix  will be ordering more shirts in the future

Name: A4460
Content: Recently ordered t shirts for the club Im in Designing the shirts was easy and the shipping was on time The graphics look good  only problem was the front logo was centered instead of top left corner I called the 800 number and they were glad to help I will have new shirts within the week on the house Will definitely be using them again if I need more shirts

Name: A4461
Content:
I put an order in 8 days before I needed it yes  poor planning on my part but thats why I went with RUSH ORDER TEES The soonest I could get it was 7 days later  1 day before the event I was hosting 2 days before the shirts were to arrive  I got an update from the delivery system saying I wouldnt have my shirts until 2 days later than I paid for which was after the event  I called and the woman on the phone told me it was UPS fault and not theirs  but that they would remedy the situation by doing the order  that day in their shop  and overnight it to me to get it to me by 12pm Saturday I was thrilled with the customer service 

BUT  Saturday at 12 came and went  and I was literally waiting at my house just for the shirts to arrive before I left for my event No shirts came I called and asked where they were and customer service told me Oh yeh  it looks like we werent actually able to get them printed in time Sorry Thats it They refunded me  which is fine  but I would have paid DOUBLE to have them in the time frame they were guaranteed And once this rush order wasnt going to be possible  had the company let me know then I could have made alternative plans 

Long story short  if you need a rush order and are hoping using RushOrderTees will be your saving grace  look elsewhere

Name: A4462
Content: Excellent  fast service Decided to order shirts for an event at the last minute Rush Order Tees delivered custom shirts matching mens and womens sizes

Name: A4463
Content: I ordered my first hoody to start my clothing line advertisement and the pics were way smaller and not placed where i designed them at on the website but they are going to fix it and send me a REPLACEMENT hoodie they are very attentive and professional DEFINITELY will be shopping with them in the NEAR FUTURE

Name: A4464
Content: Tianna W was so helpful in making sure my order was correct and that I was satisfied

Name: A4465
Content: There was an initial quality problem with the graphics  which  to be fair  are intricate They have remedied the problem and much to our staisfaction  were prompt in addressing it We commend the support system at RushOrderTees and their professional response

Name: A4466
Content: Love their products Creating custom shirts etc is so easy And the one time there was an issue they took care of it right away and sent me a replacement for the incorrect item I plan to order more in the future

Name: A4467
Content: Most definitely a 5 star experience with this company  the print turned out perfect  it is great quality transfer  thicker stuff rather then thin quick wash off transfer Also the order came extremely quick  which I was surprised considering it was such a large order and the colour showed perfectly on all different shades of hoodies to we will definitely be ordering from Rush Order Tees again  Thank you

Name: A4468
Content: I have ordered four times now from Rush Order Tees The first three times  they knocked it out of the park with their quality and delivery speed This last order had a couple of small issues with the print quality When Rush Order Tees found out about these issues  they informed me that they are replacing my order Wow now thats customer service I cannot speak highly enough about the character  quality and service of this company I would highly recommend them to anyone wanting top notch service and quality

Name: A4469
Content: They are amazing I will forever order all of my custom orders from them Ive made two different orders and have been beyond satisfied with both The first came in flawless and although the second came in with a few mess ups  the issue was quickly addressed and resolved They are extremely responsive and helpful and move quickly to get you what you need when you need it

Name: A4470
Content: My first order had a couple issues with the graphic  and they immediately reached out and told me another shipment was on the way Customer service was amazing and the print looks great Highly recommend them

Name: A4471
Content: My order arrived with the wrong color  they sent a re order and it arrived a second time with the wrong color again I was unable to have t shirts for the event I needed them for Super disappointed Would not use them again

Name: A4472
Content: My sweatshirt arrived quickly and looked great except for two small stains on the front I emailed rushordertees and they immediately replied and said they would send a new product without the stains I am very impressed

Name: A4473
Content: I ordered my 12 company shirts from Rush Order Tees Half of them were great  even better than I had hoped  but the other half were black ink printed on a black shirt  so the designs didnt show up I could see the logo and words while I was designing  so I figured the shirts were not a solid black and the ink would be visible  but they were not I also designed a hoodie  and the logo was printed in the wrong spot I contacted customer service and they were happy to help Theyre sending me new shirts with a different ink ASAP They are also sending me a new hoodie with the logo in the right spot I appreciate them being willing to work through my issues  and I do plan on using them again in the future

Name: A4474
Content: Best customer service in the world Had a minor discrepancy with my order and I offered to pay for them to re do the shirts They immediately redid them to my specifications and sent them out  no questions asked  no charge Great people here Many Thanx

Name: A4475
Content:
PROS The website is sharp; the custom t shirt designer is functional; the ordering process was relatively painless 

Cons The printing was sub par; the base and the ink were too thin and the result was the logos look worn out and faded which was not the intent or the design 

Worse  the logo designs use a considerable amount of navy blue and they are on a medium to dark grey shirt With the poor printing  the logos are barely visible 

The printers completely disregarded my custom layout and just printed the logos directly in the center of the shirt at the wrong scale There was no attempt at all to position the logos as laid out in the custom design or to scale them as laid out 

To the best of my knowledge  I never received any kind of review notification I received email notification of my order and shipping confirmation In the shipping confirmation  that was the first time I could review the t shirts On the order  there was a note saying that they followed the custom design So I assumed they actually did However  when I got the t shirts  it was clear they did not 

SUMMARY Currently very disappointed with what was delivered I emailed them and let them know how disappointed I was I havent received a reply yet 

Overall  the t shirts are honestly unusable for the purpose I ordered them for The design is barely legible 

UPDATE 28 AUG 2020 A special thank you to Alyssa for getting back to me and trying to work out the situation

First  a correction on the custom layout issue; when I was reviewing my custom layout after emailing RushOrderTees about the issues with the shirts  I realized there was white text on the layout image that clearly said that the design was outside the print boundaries they could print 

I didnt notice it when making my order So that was clearly my user error 

While the layout issue was originally my fault  I do think that either the websites custom designer or the printers themselves should have caught that the layout was outside of the print boundary and verified the print before proceeding 

If either had occurred  I wouldnt have ordered the t shirts when I realized I couldnt print them using the layout I wanted 

On the printing itself  that remained a quality control issue The ink was simply too faded Im not sure if it was a base issue or that my print would have required more applications Regardless  despite the layout issue  I wouldnt have been happy with the shirts provided 

Customer service Alyssa were really great; she went above and beyond to try to correct the situation and I really appreciate that They offered a reprint  but due to the layout restrictions I cant take them up on that offer 

In the end  while I was disappointed with the product  RushOrderTees did do their absolute best to try to correct the issue and that goes a long way in my book 

If my print was more conventional and the layout wasnt an issue  I am certain that even if there were print errors  RushOrderTees would have stepped up and corrected them in a timely manner 

I have changed my rating to reflect the level of customer service I received in this situation

Name: A4476
Content: I chose RushOrder because they had a great selection of stylish shirts and colors Unfortunately the printing process is unreliable Some are great and have withstood multiple washes and some peal off They nicely replaced the first batch that did this But now another one has pealed off Its too bad

Name: A4477
Content: We had our business tees and hoodies printed by RushOrderTees The long sleeve tees  hoodies and sweatshirts are gorgeous We had a little issue and had to have a couple of items reprinted  but RushOrderTees got back to me right away and solved the problem I would recommend RushOrderTees to anyone for any type of printed marketing/team apparel

Name: A4478
Content: I ordered a shirt that had a flaw on it Customer service got back to me as soon as possible  and we were able to come to an agreement I enjoy dealing with Rush Order Tees  as they are respectful  professional  and courteous I will continue to do business with them for many years to come

Name: A4479
Content: Great customer service  low minimums

Name: A4480
Content: Steven Cruz  came in clutch I had an order and a member of my party didnt want a shirt and got shirt envy when it was delivered Today he shipped a shirt for Saturday on super late notice A life saver  thank you Steven

Name: A4481
Content: This was possibly one of the best customer experiences Ive ever had First off  designing a ordering hoodies were so simple and easy to do It took me 15 minutes to completely design and order it The main reason for me giving a 5 star review though is the customer service When I made my order  I forgot to order one hoodie I messaged them about it and within 10 minutes it was already added Also  when I received the package  the hoodies were designed really well and with incredible quality  however  I received the wrong material hoodie I just thought  Oh well  guess Ill just stick with these ones  but they replaced them the moment they found out about the mistake with no extra charge Overall  the customer service is 10/10 and I would gladly order from them again

Name: A4482
Content: I needed some T shirts to commemorate a get together and after browsing various websites  decided to order from Rush Order Tees Definitely the best decision I could have made It was easy to design the shirts on the website  and when I had questions about ordering  they were answered promptly When the shirts arrived  I was impressed by their quality I will definitely be using Rush Order Tees in the future  and the friends I ordered shirts for will also be using them for their needs If you have any doubts about using Rush Order Tees  have no fear  this is the company to go with

Name: A4483
Content: Excellent shipping speed and the final product is always great Have placed multiple orders here Customer service is excellent as well

Name: A4484
Content: While my order did not make it for the Christmas rush  that was due to the overwhelming pressure on the US Postal system One of the shirts was not printed correctly Rush Order agent Dana  very quickly got back to me and ordered a reprint of the shirt no questions asked The replacement shirt arrived very quickly and to my complete satisfaction Thank you for making it right

Name: A4485
Content:
STARTED AS A 1 STAR REVIEW BUT CHANGED TO A 5 STAR

Initially  I called to Rush Order Tees to discuss my order and Steve was about as rude  short  curt and coy as a pathetic customer service rep can be 

I had issues with the order and the graphics but Steve  the customer service rep  was not helpful at all and totally dismissive 

UPDATE AFTER I RECEIVED A PERSONAL CALL FROM ALYSSA THE CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE MANAGER LESS THAN 24 HOURS LATER TO RESOLVE THIS ISSUE WITH AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE  I CHANGED MY REVIEW TO A 5 STAR 

ALYSSA IS AWESOME AND A GREAT REPRESENTATIVE OF OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE

Name: A4486
Content: Ordered tees for my moms memorial golf outing that turned into a bowling event due to weather Website was easy to use  shirts turned out great and very fast Came a day earlier than promised I think

Name: A4487
Content:
They did a great job on my print lay out  really liked my Ts did front and back Had a little problem with shipping  did not receive an informative e mail on actual delivery  or pickup by USPS and could not track 
However  because of late delivery  they re processed my order They  really didnt have to do that  its great to know theyll go the extra mile to make things right  and the product was perfect  I will continue to be a customer of RUSHORDERTEES  Thomas

Name: A4488
Content:
Today I received an email that put a smile on my face; the email was from RushOrderTees [The Back Story] After carefully inspecting my order of Tees; I noticed my proprietary design was positioned in the wrong area of the shirts 

I reached out to the RushOrderTees com team to express my concern; theyve advised me that they will correct the mishap and resend the Tees prior to my Ribbon Cutting ceremony on July 21  2021

When that commitment is fulfilled; I complete another post showcasing the Tees and the Ribbon Cutting ceremony 

 ThankyouRushOrderTees com

Name: A4489
Content: They understands customer service  10/10 service  will be using again

Name: A4490
Content: Great work even after a misspelling Made the correction and sent replacement tees at no cost to me All shirts got here on time including replacement tees got here before Christmas 5 stars great job

Name: A4491
Content: Rush order tees is fantastic I ordered about 120 shirts for a HS band trip We ordered some youth sizes too The design process was super easy and the instant messages were very helpful The tees came in within 2 weeks as promised and the order was completely correct and at a great price The Tees were true to size and comfortable Every step of the process was perfect Everyone I spoke with and messaged was super helpful I will absolutely be ordering from them again

Name: A4492
Content: Great experience and easy ordering process Pricing was extremely competitive

Name: A4493
Content: Rush order tee was the place I went to for making my employees shirts In the past quality of the print and shirts were great My last order was Terrible The shirts were of the same quality but the prints were of poor quality I complained to rush order tee of the substandard and was told that the move was a result of greener printing The print look like something I did with my home clothes iron Rush order tee did try to resolve it by sending me another shirt  but the print was still the same Rush order tee  it was great doing business with you in the past  but unfortunately I have to move on

Name: A4494
Content: Ordered a couple of shirts from these guys and for some reason  the order was lost in transit I contacted RushOrderTees and they had a new set of prints and the order arrived the next day Will DEFINITELY order from you again THANK YOU

Name: A4495
Content:
I had a small order of 13 tee shirts for a construction mission for our church From the very beginning  the experience with Rush Order Tees was great Their website was super easy to use  and the choice of fonts and artwork made designing the tee shirts a lot of fun 
Once I placed my order  I had a customer service rep who contacted me to let me know the shirts were being processed and would be shipped shortly And then I got an email stating that our shirts were on the way I was promised a delivery date  and Rush Order beat it by a whole day
Overall  I was impressed with the website  the attitude that even my small order was important  and the service The final product  our tee shirts  are awesome I will definitely use Rush Order again And I will recommend it to the others in my church who order tee shirts

Name: A4496
Content: I am delighted to post this review for RushOrderTees Having experience as a marketing pro  I design my own logos etc R O T s faithfully reproduced my design in a timely manner on an excellent quality tee shirt and delivered on time Further  the made the re order process seamless and easy with prompt real time customer service responses This is a standout operation in the buyer beware internet landscape

Name: A4497
Content: I am giving a 5 star review for their professional courtesies I had a situation and they took care of it wholeheartedly In the midst of the pandemic I ordered a t shirt and the company is strictly mandated on getting their orders on deadline  which mine did not I called the company and noted that it is understanding given the circumstances and they gave me a full refund While they did not complete the order on schedule I had a film to shoot and was lucky enough to get one done locally  I was still able to get customer satisfaction

Name: A4498
Content: Rush Order Tees was awesome I was able to order quickly and receive a proof before printing I even increased my order and all shirts arrived on time without any issues with increasing my order and changing my template a few times Even when I called they were very helpful I would definitely recommend and order from them again These shirts were for my destination wedding

Name: A4499
Content: Order arrived quickly One of the items came in with blurry graphics I sent an email later in the evening and received a reply shortly after indicating that they would send a replacement ASAP That will be great customer service

Name: A4500
Content: Outstanding to work with  very fast  and excellent quality

Name: A4501
Content: Placed two orders with this company for two sets of tees with two different logos The quality of both orders was awful One didnt use enough ink so the color of the shirt bled through the logo leaving it looking bleached out With the other order the logo printed blurry They may be rushed but it shows in the quality I will never use this company again

Name: A4502
Content: I ordered 10 tshirts and all 10 faded after one wash The print on the shirts faded as well as the color of the shirts I reported the issue to rush order tees and received a quick reply back saying they would take care of the problem but they never did

Name: A4503
Content: Ordered a sweatshirt for my niece on rush delivery It came on time but had stains all over it as if someone had dirty hands covered in ketchup and then folded it Ive never seen anything like it Called customer service  spoke with a guy who said they would alert customer care and be in touch Never heard anything else Spent a total of  85 for one sweatshirt because of how much my niece would have loved it and I wanted to have it in time for her birthday Very disappointed and would never recommend this company

Name: A4504
Content: I love RushOrderTees Especially because of their great service I have done at least 6 7 mass orders with these guys and the shipping + quality has always been good There were a few times when some products had been damaged  but the service center was quick to reply and send out the same new products right away

Name: A4505
Content: My hoodies arrived  looked good but after the first wash my images deteriorated I contacted Rush and they are sending me replacement hoodies Ill let yall know how the replacements performed once I receive them

Name: A4506
Content: Amazing customer service My print was much lighter than I was hoping for and they were quick to make it right Fast response time and easy to work with I would recommend this company

Name: A4507
Content: Can I give you six stars? This is the second time weve used you for what I consider to be a complicated order and the shirts were perfect Thanks for helping us create an emotional and meaningful moment for our students and staff

Name: A4508
Content: I had a minor issue with my order and the customer service responded very quickly and seamlessly resolved the issue I spoke with Alyssa and she was a joy to talk to and she helped me every step of the process She deserves a raise

Name: A4509
Content: I was in a pinch to get a large batch of shirts printed and friend recommended RushOrder and boy did they live up to there name Not only did I get the shirts in time but everyone RAVED about how comfortable the shirts were Not your normal heavy  itching and uncomfortable t shirt you normally get when order a large batch of custom shirts I will definitely be ordering from here again when I need custom tees and would recommend them to anyone Great product  great service and amazing turn around

Name: A4510
Content: I cannot even begin to explain how wonderful this company is Quality and customer service is incredible My grandson is wearing my sons school t shirt and I wanted to make one to fit my son I sent the design to rush order tees I was sent a proof to examine for color and positioning of the image and at first the color was off It was immediately fixed to match perfectly I then received my shirt and it was somehow discolored Without question  they had me reorder another one I have not gotten it yet  but am sure that it will be perfect I have spoken to and e mailed them and each time the person I communicated with was amazing Without a doubt I will recommend them Thank you Rush Order Tees

Name: A4511
Content: My t shirt came out great And while the sweatshirt was no quite right at first  all I had to do was let Rush Order Tees know and they were right on it Just received my new sweatshirt in the mail and it is literally perfect Thank you so much Rush Order So happy yall have helped me bring my sweatshirt idea perfectly to life

Name: A4512
Content: RushOrderTees is very easy to use  various options and customer service is outstanding Had one detail wrong on an item and they are correcting & replacing it right away Pleased with how my items came out  placed another order in already

Name: A4513
Content: This company is incredible Amazing sales team and super helpful They helped me make our shirts perfect and got them to us in a crazy fast time My team is a military softball team and we are overjoyed with this product and quality of service 10/10 would recommend to anyone and am looking forward to doing work with them again in the future

Name: A4514
Content: Not only was the ordering process painless  but when the shirts arrived a different color than ordered  I received an immediate reply and the order was corrected without any difficulty A level of customer service unheard of in the printing world

Name: A4515
Content: Put it a large business order they did a amazing job and we had 1 little sizing problem and they fixed the issue and went above and beyond to make it right we def will be doing business with them in the future and we highly recommend them And not to forget the fast order shipping

Name: A4516
Content:
My first experience with this company has been OUTSTANDING I really didnt have a real issue  just an inquiry 
Much to my surprise they are redoing the printing on my shirt at no cost 
WOW I have just discovered a new source for birthday and Christmas presents Im telling all my friends and clients 
Best 
Jeffrey Page

Name: A4517
Content: GREAT experience I ordered 10 t shirts for my sisters bachelorette and they came out amazing The design tools were awesome so you can see what everything looks like before ordering  customer service was very helpful and responsive when I had changes  and the shirts came super fast They look amazing and everything is high quality My sister loved them so much  were ordering a few more THANK YOU RUSH ORDER TEES

Name: A4518
Content: The website was easy to use to design and order my T shirts  but it took me a little while to finally decide to go ahead and buy it When it was time  I needed a little help and rep that I was instant messaging with was very helpful  quick  and efficient They even gave me a special discount that helped offset the cost of rush delivery I needed it since it took me so long to decide to buy the order It wasnt a huge but lots of companies only do bulk orders I got the order on time and they look great Great job Rush Order Tees Id recommend you to everyone that needs to order T shirts

Name: A4519
Content: Customer service was super quick to respond and correct an issue with my order

Name: A4520
Content: I will continue to use RushOrder Tees  there customer service and response time to my inquires was minutes I would recommend designing your product then connecting on chat with rep to ensure your colors will work with the substrate you have chosen 1 & Done

Name: A4521
Content:
I am so impressed by the professionalism and attentiveness of this business I recently placed a fairly small order for custom kids t shirts There was an issue with the order at first and they really went out of their way to make sure that it was corrected and that I received the final product on time  despite a nearly impossible deadline and a few unexpected requests for changes along the way The t shirts look fabulous and the kids were super excited The company really is incredible I will never even consider anyone else for custom orders in the future 

Just note  that if you are planning to order kids t shirts  the sizes run pretty big

Name: A4522
Content: RushOrderTees has consistently provided fast and reliable service for TLL Sports LLC merchandise Our company does tons of live events and marketing throughout the Philadelphia area and whenever t shirts are needed  RushOrderTees is the only company we call No matter the order size  from a 10 piece order to a 300 piece order  the RushOrderTees website makes it easy for us to place orders and reorder with a few clicks of a button They will have our business for life

Name: A4523
Content: Its not always the regret one should hold onto  but the thought and action to create a new experience I say this because my initial order was completely wrong  nevertheless the RushOrderTees team listened  felt and comprehended my concern; then they took action I never felt alone or misunderstood in the process of amending my order  they even made sure I didnt have to return anything as they took accountability I later got my original order with design suggestions from the team that totally worked out I appreciate the care and responsibility this brand took  and I shall return for further business

Name: A4524
Content: The ordering and delivery were outstanding The customer service representatives were courteous and helpful The only issue that I had was that I received a size 5x shirt that I didnt order and one of the other shirts had a big blue stain on it I informed the company and they assured me that the problem would be rectified The problem was never addressed

Name: A4525
Content: Got good rates for 2 days print for 66 Polo shirts Customer support was good and courteous Two things I was not happy 1 They could not provide gradient finish to our logo Seems like they cant desig/print gradients well Had to do 4 reviews to get it right and the end result came close but not exactly the way our logo is 2 The embroidery came out in a lavender color whereas the design that we approved was dark blue

Name: A4526
Content: I will be a faithful customer Thank you so much God Bless

Name: A4527
Content: 10/10 experience The customer service is tremendous This company is far more affordable than competitors and much more responsive and attentive Justyne helped me adjust my design and find the cheapest style possible as I was on a tight budget my product shipped within one week of ordering Thanks so much Will order again

Name: A4528
Content:
The relationship of this company with the client is really to be appreciated and admired A correct and not at all bureaucratic communication The result  timely solution of the clients request A business that is in coherence with the requirements of other businesses 
Thank you RushOrderTees

Name: A4529
Content: I enjoyed using their website  the staff was very friendly and helpful and the t shirts were awesome The shirts got rave reviews from all of my VBS staff and Crew Members My only issue was getting the site to add my order to my cart I had to use the real time chat to have one of Rush Order Tees staff to add it to the system  but other than that I was very pleased with my experience and will definitely use again when in need of t shirts Have also recommended it to several people Also paid for expedited shipping and it arrived 3 days earlier than expected AWESOME

Name: A4530
Content: Nice work  responsive customer service If you specifically want DTG printing  be sure to specify that exact method in your communication

Name: A4531
Content: Recently place an order for ts and tanks for and event this summer My staff was very happy with the final product Production time was excellent Communication was excellent Material was of great quality Soft and comfortable I did order their more expensive line Logo came out perfect I have not washed But  I am expecting no issues Site may take a little getting use too But  once you do its quite easy I will absolutely order again from Rush Order

Name: A4532
Content: I am extremely impressed with my order I ordered 2 zip up hoodies with custom logos They are perfect Not to mention I got them 3 days early Great company to order from I highly recommend

Name: A4533
Content:
I am crying as I type this review After leaving a review about my initial customer experience  Alyssa not only commented back on my review on 2 platforms and provided me with a way to get in contact with her directly  but she also GAVE ME A CALL WITHIN LESS THAN 24 HOURS Wow

I cannot explain how wonderful of an experience this has turned out to be This company has gone completely above and beyond what I could have ever imagined for customer support and ensuring that i would be able to get my order before the holiday even with the holiday rush and COVID delays 

I ABSOLUTELY CANNOT EXPLAIN HOW INCREDIBLE THIS EXPERIENCE HAS TURNED OUT TO BE I cant say it enough I will be telling everyone I can how wonderful and caring this company is for their customers and small business alike 

I will be buying again Thank you so much Rush Order Tees

Name: A4534
Content: I needed a small order of shirts 6 in a 2 week window  and came across Rush Order Tees Their website design software was straight forward and easy to setup a design with our existing logos/images We went with a left chest logo and a

Name: A4535
Content: This company is awesome The shirts are great quality  soft and the printing comes out really well The web design studio is easy to use I had an issue with a t shirt; it arrived and the color of the letters was darker than I expected They fixed the problem with speed and ease  no hassle EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE

Name: A4536
Content: My order arrived with the incorrect color of shirt and quote missing on the back To solve the problem  my order was promised to be replaced and I was allowed to adjust my numbers and sizes to accommodate new players added I was also allowed to keep the incorrect shirts at no additional charge so that my players would have uniforms for the upcoming match Thank you for being solution oriented

Name: A4537
Content: Terrific experience Easy to use online tools for creating your custom shirts  with lots of color  placement  and shirt type options Clear pricing Was contacted by a staff member to make a useful suggestion about my order  and was able to review things BEFORE the shirts were made Everything shipped on time and looked great when I received it  and I got all the correct sizes Perfect experience and I will buy from them again

Name: A4538
Content: I ordered t shirts for an large event  and they came out amazing I wish i ordered more honestly The people at rush order tees were great at communicating with me  and we spoke on the phone a few times to get the design exactly right The t shirts came in on time I would 100 use them again

Name: A4539
Content: I needed custom T shirts by Friday and ordered on a Wednesday at 3pm local time 2 days earlier  They were delivered on Friday and were perfect This company is amazing and they were incredibly nice and helpful from my first interaction until getting the product to my door less than 48 hours later I will NEVER go elsewhere for something like this Above and beyond service Thank you

Name: A4540
Content: Had multiple orders with RushOrderTees and they provided great work One order came w/ an error  called them and had replacements fast and easy Great customer service We will definitely use them again

Name: A4541
Content: Rush Order Tees is a great company and I will definitely use them again if needed It was very easy to design the shirt I wanted  and offered many shipping options There is also the option to choose if you want a proof before printing They also let me know that I should choose a different type of shirt based on my design for the best over all product Very helpful

Name: A4542
Content: I gave them 3 stars because they originally got my first order wrong However they did send a whole new order which made up for the loss and I greatly appreciate them for doing that Id probably use them again in the future

Name: A4543
Content: We placed a group order for Christmas parade shirts and they turned out beautifully The shirts arrived very fast like 2 weeks early  which was a wonderful surprise I LOVE that we were able to completely design our own shirts We will definitely use Rush Order Tees again next year for our shirts

Name: A4544
Content: As a church  we order a lot of t shirts and other products online I found the customer service to be outstanding It is not too often these days that you encounter an online vendor that cares so much about customer satisfaction My rep made my first experience very fast andeasy to understand The product arrived within the week and everyone was very  very happy with the final outcome I cannot say enough about the level of service we received at Rush Order Tees We will definitely be repeat customers

Name: A4545
Content: Quick to rectify any issues  very satisfied with the overall quality of both the shirts and designs printed on them

Name: A4546
Content: The online customer service rep that I chatted with was extremely helpful and courteous He made my ordering experience quick and easy My products arrived exactly as scheduled and our T Shirt looked amazing I have and will continue to recommend Rush Order Tees Thank you

Name: A4547
Content: We had a large last minute order for a client graphic designer here  and Rush Order Tees went above and beyond to make sure everything was exactly what we needed The shirts arrived on time  quality was great  and it would be hard to beat the price Our client was very pleased  well definitely use them for future shirt orders

Name: A4548
Content: RushOrderTees was extremely helpful during my ordering process They provided excellent customer service and responsiveness following multiple design iterations Highly recommend for homemade tee designs

Name: A4549
Content: AMAZING customer service chat was great They really helped me get what I needed and fast Was ordering shirts for a Homecoming event for my fathers high school alumni The shirts turned out so good People loved them The price was great as well

Name: A4550
Content: After submitting my order I received an email a day or two later asking for final review of the artwork and order itself I noticed there was a color discrepancy in the shirt i ordered and asked to change it I was told id be charged a restocking fee for the old shirts If they are not going to enable editing easily there then shouldnt be an option for review of order Overall the shirts were nice quality but service after they got the money seemed to fall short

Name: A4551
Content:
Great experience working with Rush Order Tees It was Tuesday at noon and we needed quality shirts by Thursday evening I called  admitted I didnt even have the artwork finished  and asked if there was any way I could get art to them by 5 and still get tees by Thursday Of course

My proof was in my inbox Wednesday morning  and my shirts were in by 3 pm Thursday Rush shipping is hefty  and they arent totally clear about it on the front end  but I expected there would be a substantial cost there 

The shirts are great quality  exactly what I ordered and exactly the colors we ordered The print is high quality  no ghosting  no crooked prints  and totally covers the color of the shirt I have already recommended Rush Order Tees and will use them again

Name: A4552
Content:
Outstanding Group to work with From the Art Work review  to the cost  to the on time actually 2 days early delivery
Very professional and amazing staff to work with I will use them for all of my future needs
Thank you Rush Order Tee Team Great Job

Name: A4553
Content: Had a great experience Fun design prosses and Extremely helpful customer service Very quick response when I had questions Ill definitely use them for future needs If youre looking for a good quality product quickly give them a try

Name: A4554
Content: We have been very satisfied with ROT Their quality  commitment to excellence  product price and quality  and shipping speed are very good Weve only had one minor problem  among our many orders with them  and their customer service is excellent and speedy They are currently our sole source for custom apparel  James

Name: A4555
Content: Although I was sent a replacement  along with a full refund I still cannot give any more than 2 stars The great customer service still doesnt outweigh the quality they provide The original hoodie and shirt was HORENDOUS and came falling apart faded immediately after washing ONE TIME  same with replacement I was offered a full refund and replacement so I can see what their quality really is well  if the replacement was supposed to show anything better  IT DIDNT PLEASE do your research better I used them based on reviews but it seems they ask for 5 star reviews after they refund you and replace expecting everyone to just be satisfied bc they got their money back in turn for a 5 star review but Im speaking the truth and will not give a good review just because I was asked to The only reason I gave a second star is because their customer service IS very nice and willing to satisfy their customers  but this customer isnt satisfied and the quality I received is quite embarrassing

Name: A4556
Content: I had a fan from Australia call and complain the the shirt did not fit I called Rush Order Tees and asked to place another order for 1 unit and was willing to pay for it but they said they would replace it FREE This is fantastic customer service I will use these people going forward for all our needs When a fan sends you a message you have to respond positively Rush order Tees made this a win win situation for us and the fan and in the long run for them as I will do everything I can to drive business their way with my other clients and friends

Name: A4557
Content: My review for Rush Order Tees is mixed and corrected from my initial 1 star Overall  the items were received that were for a special event for my daughter and she is pleased The initial communication we had with a few different people was rude and inconsistent but Alyssa in service got on top of the issue after the fact and went above and beyond to fix the issue Since this is our first time ordering from them  I will reserve overall judgement but I would suggest giving them a try if you find something you like

Name: A4558
Content: Expensive but SO WORTH IT Needed LAST MINUTE custom tees for a tournament and we were blown away Awesome process designing and updates over the entire process Highly recommend

Name: A4559
Content: Loved this place I will be back often  Super fast delivery  rush order shipping fees are the most reasonable Ive seen  the quality of the shirts exceeded my expectations and they looked amazing We got TONS of compliments on these shirts  Ive referred them to everyone who asks about our shirts  Bonus  they had some mistake shirts that they threw into our order as well so we got a couple extra free shirts in our order Thanks for a great shirt

Name: A4560
Content: I could not be happier with the service and quality that I received from Rush order Tees It was a last minute decision to order tees as a birthday surprise Needless to say  the associate that helped me on the phone  Julie C was quick  friendly  and above all  got me exactly what I wanted Plus  she gave some helpful advice about making sure I received my order on time allow for a buffer day in case there was a problem with the shipping company  which there wasnt All in all  my order arrived exactly as it should  the follow up by the company was appreciated  and I will definitely use Rush Order Tees again

Name: A4561
Content: I placed a huge order of T shirts to support our seniors at our high school with Rush order tees Evan took care of everything and the order was shipped in just a few days Everything was perfect and the T shirts look great The prices were amazing also Thank you so much for making our high school seniors smile during this difficult time

Name: A4562
Content: I loved the ability to Chat Live with a Customer Service Rep My Rep was able to answer all questions and was able to get us a discount I accidently disconnected from the Live Chat and when I logged back in I was immediately redirected to the Rep I had been working with I was able to create our Design with ease The sweatshirts came out great Turn around time was quick Very Pleased with product and service

Name: A4563
Content: Ive now placed 3 orders with Rushordertees and I have been so happy with the results My shirts came fast and correct and really high quality You cant beat their prices for what you are getting and I love that I can do small batch orders I will definitely be a repeat customer for years to come

Name: A4564
Content: Easy to create my own t shirt by uploading my logo Delivered in 2 days as I ordered  all sizes perfect and the printing first rate Appreciated the fact that T shirt sizes included Womens as well as Youth and Mens And when 3 t shirts arrived for printing with pockets  they called me immediately to let me know of the error in the order they received and gave me 2 excellent options as a work around I could not be happier

Name: A4565
Content: What a fantastic experience My design needed work but their design staff helped and made the design a club classic All the back and forth and they still made the deadline Everyone thinks I did a great job but the truth is Rush Order Tees made me look great I talked with four representatives and every one of them had great customer service skills

Name: A4566
Content:
I ordered a shirt on May 23rd for a Fathers Day gift and I havent received my shirt yet Fathers Day is tomorrow  so I have to go buy another gift  when this company suppose to have my shirt delivered before tomorrow There is never any up to date tracking and when you email them  they just apologize for the delay If you need anything in a timely manner  please order elsewhere

UPDATE As of today Fathers Day this company has refunded my money  and told me  that they will send out another shirt FREE of charge Still no shirt so we shall see if they stick to their word

Name: A4567
Content: Super courteous staff online when reaching out about an order Luke L coming in big with some help

Name: A4568
Content: Had a bad experience with a customer service rep Within 40 minutes of posting about my experience I got a call from the VP of Sales Josh He was super understanding of my situation  took full responsibility for the sales rep and apologized  and then did everything he could to make it right I really appreciate Josh reaching out and then bringing in a few other higher ups to resolve the issue Left at 4 stars cause I havent got the t shirts yet  but will update the review once theyre delivered

Name: A4569
Content: I had to place a t shirt order with only a couple of weeks turnaround from when I received the artwork The Rush Order Tees website is super easy to use I had never ordered shirts before  prices were great  mens and ladies sizes were a big plus  and the staff are very prompt and responsive from the time you click Submit Totally painless experience  and the shirts came out great

Name: A4570
Content: Their website claims  Our goal isnt just customer satisfaction  its customer joy I believe that My rush order was on time  done right and high quality Their design tools were super easy to use They kept me informed every step of the way and even helped me make a change to my order when I realized it wasnt exactly right my fault  not theirs  A great experience I would definitely recommend them and use them again

Name: A4571
Content:
Very pleased with the t shirts I ordered for my company The quality/weight of the t shirt and the fit were both great After this initial small order  well be ordering quite a few more 
I found the web site easy and straight forward to use and my order arrived ahead of quoted delivery time

Name: A4572
Content: Great Product bust most importantly GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE I had a large order arrived with a minor mistake and they were so fast in getting it fixed A breathe of fresh air for sure knowing I have had bad luck with a different company in the past My business will definitely stay with this business Thanks a ton again for going the extra mile to fix a minor issue MAHALO

Name: A4573
Content:
We needed shirts with an incredibly short turn around time and all local businesses and our normal vendors were unable to fulfill the request I found Rush Order Tees through a Google search and they were the only company that even agreed to our project based on the due date 

It was a tall order due to the nature of our request and constant changes  but Francis was incredible to work with and handled each change and request very professionally The shirts arrived right on time and the quality was impressive Thick shirts and the printing is nice  not the type to peel right off 

Thank you Rush Order Tees You made it look easy when I know it wasnt

Name: A4574
Content:
Wow wow wow these guys rock Gigi  Bria  thanks

I ordered a single hoodie with printed vinyl to use for advertising during an upcoming trip The first sweatshirt that arrived was disappointing The hoodie itself seemed to be of great quality  but the black ink faded quite a bit from the first gentle wash And the large fit more like an XL+ 

I contacted them and  without hesitation  they reordered a medium and ask the production team to ensure the print was fully cured to hopefully not fade as the previous one did They are even rushing the shipping so itll arrive in time for my trip That  folks  is the sign of an outstanding business 

If this replacement is what I hope and if it arrives before I leave as promised  Im going to be one extremely satisfied customer Already  theyve impressed me with the way they have run everything up to this point Mistakes happen Its how those errors are addressed that separates the professionals from the amateurs These guys are pros

Name: A4575
Content: Great quality and prompt service Everyone loved their kalu shirts

Name: A4576
Content: The team at Rush Order Tees helped me navigate the design process Extremely patient  knowledgeable  and efficient Thanks Mike I am excited to receive your products

Name: A4577
Content: Bria assisted me with my order She was knowledgeable  friendly and helpful I received my order the next day  and the price was not astronomical One of my students who received a shirt said that she is going to sleep in it because its one of the softest t shirts that shes ever worn Quality product and customer service Thank you Rushordertees

Name: A4578
Content: Super easy to design and create what I needed The products were delivered four days earlier than expected We had a minor problem  but the customer service was so friendly and sorted out are issues with amazing speed I cannot wait to receive our next order and we do plan to use them again

Name: A4579
Content: Great customer service I had to change the ratio of t shirts and they were happy to adjust my order Ordered my shirts on Monday and although I asked for a Friday guarantee  I received them Thursday night Overall  very happy with the product start to finish

Name: A4580
Content: Thank you so much Rush Order Tees I had ordered a T shirt and there was a design issue one of the times I ordered it  but when I talked to a service representative they were able to get this issue resolved and reprinted Im glad that they were able to help me immediately

Name: A4581
Content: Amazing company Order came in quick and exactly as I designed it The staff is super friendly too Will definitely be using them again

Name: A4582
Content: I ordered a customized tshirt for my department and Kevin was helpful from the very beginning He matched a competitors price and was able to deliver the shirts in a very tight time frame In fact  they arrived a day earlier than expected The color is true to the proof and the print is strong enough to withstand washing Would definitely order from Rush Order Tees again

Name: A4583
Content: Awesome shirts and great process to make sure you approve your design The customer service this company has is out of this world They treated me with professionalism that can only come from a company that cares about every customer Thank you Gigi and the whole team

Name: A4584
Content: I needed shirts in a hurry for an event but I didnt have a graphic designer friend to help me with the designs and I couldnt wait 2 weeks for the shirts to be screen printed and shipped I called Rush Order Tees  they were super friendly and assured me that the shirts would be done and shipped across the US in time for everyone to have their custom t shirts at the party Their team designed what I asked them to design  for free  and the shirts came out awesome The price was amazingly competitive and the shipping was FREE I loved ordering from this company and will do it again next time I need shirts or hoodies or something  looks like they have a good selection of products Id recommend them to everyone

Name: A4585
Content:
When reading about this company on their website  I thought it was perfect 
After beginning  I found that instead of designers  they were people who could pull clip art and letter together quickly I read the whole website and never found what the charge would be for help It was very expensive When I finished  I asked the person working with me if I would get the discount at the top of the site He assured me I would So I accepted the mediocre shirts and went to checkout At checkout there was no discount so I got back on chat At this time the rep told me it was included no additional There sure needs to be improvement on the website and in the communication If I ever use them again which is doubtful  I will sure do my own clip art and letters They did ship promptly and they came as promised

Name: A4586
Content: Horrible experience dealing with RushOrderTees com While the customer service reps were nice  they still sent me incorrectly printed t shirts for 3 orders in a row This included working with them in between each order to try and fix the issue which was a simple logo placement location issue

Name: A4587
Content: Great t shirt collection  fast service and helpful customer service

Name: A4588
Content:
Please read the updates as well 

The shirts came out nice except one bled I sent communication to the customer

Name: A4589
Content: Hands down best tee shirt company around From reasonable prices to outstanding customer service I could not be happier I order shirts for a walk and the design process was so simple Free shipping also and added bonus But most importantly my shirts looked great I was even able to add a shirt few days before they shipped with no issues Also once we recieved our shirts all fit as promised however we did need to call in to customer service one persons at no fault to rush order tees order a size that was a lil snug Once again to my delight rushordertees took care of the issue above and beyond what I expected I will only order my shirts from here for now on

Name: A4590
Content: Their service is phenomenal  and they took care of me when I had a problem and dealt with it super fast and caring I loved the way the print came up and even with Covid 19 going on they kept me up to date on my order I will be ordering again  side note recommend going up a size or 2 for a little more space  especially if your on the bigger size Certain shirt and clothing brands provided will fit tight or a little snug if your not famliar with that brand like Gildan  or Triple A Overall great experience

Name: A4591
Content: I came up with the idea for the class t shirt literally 24 hours before it was needed From the first online chat for ordering to the onetime delivery  the service was outstanding Maybe the nicest surprise was the quality of the product  but design and materials Would absolutely recommend this site for all custom t shirt needs  especially if you are in a rush

Name: A4592
Content:
I was waiting for another vendor to print my shirts and when that fell through I was in a panic to find another company to do the shirts in time It is with GREAT confidence that I recommend Rush Order Tees  they confirmed the artwork  printed the shirts and delivered them on time with a quality shirt that everyone was pleased with I again want to thank them for making my event a success 

Quality printing from the 3XL to the Youth Medium that were ordered

Name: A4593
Content: A sizing issue with first order Company rectified the problem If I could give them 6 stars I would Great quality and good work My new favorite hoodie

Name: A4594
Content: Received our sweatshirts with misplacement of logo and missing phone number They reviewed and are replacing them with no hesitation 5 star for their customer service and how well they work with you

Name: A4595
Content: Rushed order for a trade show coming up for the crew to wear and items arrived defective Logo I had printed came out half way Now I need to find a place local  go out of my way and spend more money to get it done before this coming Monday Very upset with the results and hope they make it right asap Would consider re ordering from them if I was ensured the quality check would be there Sweater and Shirt material is great  but they let me down with the print

Name: A4596
Content:
Great experience with them They help you make sure your design looks perfect or can help you with a design altogether 

If you need your order faster than whats provided in check out  just chat message them 

Its truly the most well priced  pleasant experience you could have in designing t shirts

Name: A4597
Content: Super prompt  and very pleasant to deal with I only order custom shirts from here now  and its very easy to get answers or issues fixed Ive only had 1 minor error out of 8+ large orders

Name: A4598
Content: I designed and ordered t shirts for our Boat Club fishing contest and was happy of how easy it was to do They did a great job making sure everything I put on the t shirts looked their best I was 100 satisfied as was all the participants in the tournament We will be coming back for next years tournament A+ highly recommended

Name: A4599
Content: The Rush Order Tees Crew was excellent in both service and quality of product They were more than willing to work with me and my request and I really felt they bent over backwards for me to get my shirts exactly as I requested 5 Stars and I would give them 6 stars if it was available A great experience all around  communication  service  product and time lines  all spot on

Name: A4600
Content: Theyre sending us a whole new order  because our shirts werent the same quality as our last couple of orders I called customer service  and not even an hr later we received an email stating that they were replacing our order

Name: A4601
Content: Rush Order Tees is a great company The prices are fair and competitive  and the customer service is top notch I have ordered 2 different sets of shirts in the last 6 months and the shirts and sweatshirts have been great quality items I wont go anywhere else when I need shirts in the future

Name: A4602
Content: My entire experience with Rush Order Tees was incredible My daughter needed t shirts for her softball team to wear for scrimmages We ordered the t shirts Wednesday night and received them on Saturday morning When we told them we needed them for Monday they did not hesitate in saying they could get the order done and delivered Everyone was so nice from the very first chat room for questions  to designing the t shirt  to working with Ian to get the price and the very quick turnaround for the proofs I would highly recommend Rush Order Tees to anyone who asks Thank you

Name: A4603
Content: I ordered a t shirt with a special logo for my son for Easter I was told multiple times through email that it was guaranteed arrival by April 10th well April 10th came and went and I didnt receive anything I called and the customer service rep was rude and said they couldnt guarantee delivery because ups is prioritizing shipments I can understand that but dont guarantee a date if you arent able to fulfill it by that date I paid and extra 17 99 for shipping to get here in time Their website status said it was still being processed and the rep said it was shipped  so which one was it? I wouldnt have purchased the shirt for a total of  40 00 if I knew it wouldnt be here in time for the event it was purchased for I asked for a refund since I dont have the shirt and it wasent sent yet and I was told that they would only refund shipping very disappointed and will not shop with them again

Name: A4604
Content: Love Rush Order Tees They made absolute AMAZING tank tops for my sorority for our recruitment event They were so helpful during the entire process and even with the specific details we wanted The artists design for the shirt were so much more than we wanted it was above and beyond what we thought it would be Would definitely recommend

Name: A4605
Content: I have nothing but good things to say about this company Fast  accommodating  very knowledgeable staff  and importantly  Matt made certain that I was ordering exactly what I wanted We needed a few shirts in time for a short notice interview with the local news station for our business and turned to Rush Order Tees since there wasnt a  single  local embroider who could take our work in less than a weeks time Id highly recommend Rush Order Tees to anyone and well certainly be back to order more shirts for our company

Name: A4606
Content: I love my t shirts The website was easy to use I designed great t shirts for my Girl Scout troop Customer service was great too I received awesome shirts at a good price ahead of schedule Very pleased

Name: A4607
Content: I was shocked at how fast they confirmed my order on such short notice They were so personable and the email was not automated to confirm my tshirt order it was from an actual person who emailed me back immediately Will for sure use again Their tshirt quality is great and the design transferred perfectly

Name: A4608
Content: What a wonderful site It was so easy to design the sweat pants Then I get an email to confirm what I designed was correct after it was checked over by their staff The pants were received very quickly in time for our travelling to visit family they were given as gifts Everyone loved them I will definitely be back Thank you very much

Name: A4609
Content: Rush Order Tees delivered my order 4 days ahead of schedule They called me and made sure my Tees were perfect They even made my design better My students loved the quality of the shirt I will use Rush Order Tees again Thanks you guys I wish I could give you a tip

Name: A4610
Content:
Amazing They got custom printed t shirts to me in three days  even after I made changes to the proof A rep personally called me and worked with me through out the process The price was very competitive and their t shirt Builder cannot be beat 
Thank you  it was a perfect Fathers Day gift  at the last minute no less

Name: A4611
Content: I had a fantastic experience with Rush Order Tees Design was easy and I was contacted immediately to resolve one small issue in my design The shirts arrived several days before the estimated date of arrival and they looked great

Name: A4612
Content: Rush order tees thrive for customer satisfaction I am beyond pleased and very satisfied with customer care I cannot wait to receive my shirts

Name: A4613
Content: Easy to order  accurate  prompt delivery and fair priced The ONLY reason we are not giving 5 stars is although the product aprons was very nice looking  the fabric was quite thin  not as heavy as we were anticipating We would likely use them for future purchases when we have more time and to perhaps ask for a sample of fabric

Name: A4614
Content: I ordered a sweatshirt with rush order tees and it had what looked like a water stain but wouldnt wash out I contacted them  they answered  and a replacement sweatshirt is already on its way Great customer service

Name: A4615
Content: This was the best custom shirt company I have ever dealt with They called me personally a couple of times to make sure my order was correct  and even suggested replacements at no cost for better quality The had the lowest price and by far the best customer experience Ive dealt with for personal online orders There were no surprises

Name: A4616
Content: Their website was easy to use and very clear Awesome customer service  responded quickly and worked with me on making a final proof They even made a new font to work with my design Usually have some kind of discount going on Fast shipping and great about keeping you up to date on your order Will definitely use again

Name: A4617
Content: I ordered a set of t shirts printed on both sides recently I designed my t shirts online  went through an easy ordering process  and received my order promptly T shirts look great  sizes were true  printing quality was fantastic I will be a happy repeat customer

Name: A4618
Content: I had an issue with the screen print on the shirts I had ordered a few months ago  and without hesitation after reaching out they are shipping replacements Amazing customer service

Name: A4619
Content: Not only did I receive my orders in a timely manner  but the quality of the printing and t shirts is amazing

Name: A4620
Content: I used the design builder on the website they have and it was VERY easy At first i only needed 2 t shirts  but after seeing how much cheaper it was to buy more the 3 i was very amazed I ended up buying 5 shirts and 2 hoodies for a great price I was able to call them and Josh helped with sizing and fitting compared to items i already owned  he spent his time making sure my order was correct and sizing was perfect The items came in yesterday and when i opened the box I saw my new company shirts  front was VERY CLEAR and great printing  the back of the items even better  thick ink and ready for a long term usage The t shirt alone was a very high commercial grade material They will get my business in the future for many years to come

Name: A4621
Content: I recently purchased t shirts from RushOrderTees My experience was stellar from beginning to end I had many questions which resulted in my making multiple phone calls and sending multiple emails Each phone call and email were met with a prompt  professional and friendly reply In addition  each request was fulfilled I will definitely be using this company again and will recommend them to others

Name: A4622
Content: I did not have a good experience with Rush Order Tees Although the shirts looked great  I was not given the correct quantity of each size This was extremely unfortunate due to the fact these were needed for an event the day after they arrived so I did not have time to order additional sizes I wished I had a better experience because they did a good job in terms of the shirts

Name: A4623
Content: Our family reunion Ts arrived FAST and they look just as I had designed them  theyre awesome Quality cotton material; sizing runs roomy; vintage print looks fantastic Very pleased and will order again from them

Name: A4624
Content: Amazing Great price and quick turnaround There was an error my order that the team worked around the clock to make right and ensure my order was on time for a big company event I was so uneasy and my customer care rep Jarrad Rosson was so kind and detailed He made sure I was feeling confident in exactly what was happening every step of the way Shoutout to Jarrad for making it the best experience possible

Name: A4625
Content: the shirts turned out perfect the price was reasonable  and the website made it very easy to make them exactly how i wanted after i finished my design they sent an email to confirm they were what i wanted  and everything was recieved the day they were supposed to thank you Rush Order Tees for a job well done

Name: A4626
Content: Ive tried quite a few  design your but I always come back to Rush Order Tees They make it so easy and the quality cant be beat Just ordered two more shirts so I think that makes about 12 altogether Im addicted You wont be disappointed

Name: A4627
Content: Please dont order from here The shirts had proofs that were all messed up It took so many emails to try and get it corrected and I eventually gave up Then I got an email saying the shirts were delivered when they hadnt been and weve never had a missing package I call  they did a reprint but I had to send someone to drive to their building to collect because I leave for my honeymoon tomorrow They had to change it to low quality printing to get it done and I no longer would get the tanks I ordered I send the person  he gets there and the building is empty three hours before the closing time I was told He shouted hello a bunch of times and even looked around for someone This took about twenty mins Finally someone comes out and tells him he is not allowed to be in the building that we were instructed to go to My pickup person tells them why hes there and the employee said they would go check He comes out and says another 20 mins After this poor person literally circled the building During all this I was on hold until the call prompted an automatic callback which never came Ill advise anyone  stay away

Name: A4628
Content: I am very satisfied with RushOrderTees When a mistake was made on my order  they immediatley fixed the issue I have used other places  but this Team hands down diliver the best products

Name: A4629
Content: Amazing Seriously the best service  easy to place my order entirely via Chat on their site I had some really crappy image files made in powerpoint  and they were able to use them Several local vendors said they couldnt and needed vector files which I would need help to get They also were great with changes and sending proofs before starting production  and super quick turnaround I will be using them again in the future without question

Name: A4630
Content: My students came across Rush Order Tees over the summer while they were designing their senior shirts this year The website is easy to use and the personal service is great as well One of the greatest benefits is the price I loved that there wasnt any hidden fees and to top it off the prices were the lowest we found Ive already recommended Rush Order Tees to other clubs and organizations at my school and Im getting ready to place another order for myself as well

Name: A4631
Content: The representative from Rush Order Tees helped me design the T shirts for my family reunion  taking in mind my limited budget and short time frame The T shirts were beautiful They arrived on time and exactly as we discussed and designed Everyone was happy My family wore them during the cook out and they looked beautiful in the summer sun I would definitely order from them again

Name: A4632
Content: I got my shirt the print quality was great but I was not happy with the placement so I said something and they made it right I am very happy how things turned out with my sample and think they will be a great fit to do my production runs

Name: A4633
Content: Fantastic customer service and quality I ordered 10 shirts for a family event last Monday  received by Friday Unfortunately the womens t shirts ran small so needed to order 2 more shirts No problem  one phone call on Sunday morning  and the new shirts will arrive by Wednesday That is amazing Its the week before Christmas too The shirt quality is excellent  womens bella is super soft cotton  but slim fit and runs small Anvil more true to size fit apparently Mens premium ts are excellent quality  soft and a good weight Print quality also excellent I highly recommend and will definitely order again Thank you for the great service I spent hours trying to make t shirts at those other sites where you can sell your cool design  but Rushordertees is by far the easiest to navigate  create and order And get actual rush shipping  the other places couldnt rush ship on many t styles  but you dont know that until you get right to the end of the process

Name: A4634
Content: Easy to design  very polite customer service and a quick turnaround  They were very helpful in honoring a coupon voucher that I had misplaced and that had expired by one day when I found it The end product looked great too Prices are very reasonable compared to the same exact design and colors at competitors sites I will be using Rush Order Tees in the future

Name: A4635
Content: Great quality shirts Printing comes out exactly as designed If there is any issue they reprint for you no questions ask They are the best online design shop by far

Name: A4636
Content: I was very happy with the design we received on our SYNC shirts They were a big hit with all that saw and received them This is the second time I have used Rush Order Tees and I am extremely happy with the service we receive I will order again when we are ready for more shirts

Name: A4637
