Content: I cant rave enough about the amazing customer service and talent at Rush Order Tees I had a very last minute special order that was very important to my son and I couldnt find anyone who would do it From my first contact with Mike Callahan  I felt that I found the right place I had the design immediately and the t shirts right on time

Name: A4638
Content: I had them change my design multiple times  sometimes repetitively back to an older version just to make sure that the final was truly what I wanted They were quick to answer questions they were very kind and polite with me and change my design if needed My purchase was also shipped and delivered by the time that had been stated The designs were also very good quality If someone was looking to purchase I would DEFINITELY recommend them

Name: A4639
Content: Not reliable  Placed an order for a specific date of delivery Had to confirm with staff via phone service that hung up on you after holding for a long time Left number and never got a call back  so called the next day  they still confirmed the shipment receipt date Order was shipped on the date it was due and delivery would not be on time A total waste of time and an event ruined

Name: A4640
Content: This is the first year weve had our camp T Shirts done by Rush Order Tees  and Im very impressed They were helpful with design and set up  and turn around time is really fast This is the first time weve had our shirts shipped well before camp Weve used various local companies over the last 15 years  but so far  Rush Order Tees is the best Great price and quality I would caution for group orders  be sure to order enough  because it is a little costly to go back and order a few later

Name: A4641
Content: Great job by the folks at Rush Order Tees I judge a lot of businesses based on what happens if something doesnt go according to plan We ordered 100 shirts that came with a misprint We notified ROT and within 5 days  we had the new shipment with the issue fixed Well done

Name: A4642
Content: My order came but part of the text was missing They responded quickly and replacements are on the way Now thats customer service I will definitely use them again in the future

Name: A4643
Content: This was one of the best experiences I have had with online shopping This company was professional  ethical they required approval for my logo  efficient and friendly The shirts were of outstanding quality So well made and just as I had hoped/designed Thank you Ill be back for more

Name: A4644
Content: These guys are great I needed some last minute T shirts in less than 48 hours and they got everything done fast  customer services was great  the shirts looked great and everything arrived on time I will use these guys even when I dont need a rush order They are that good

Name: A4645
Content: When my custom t shirt arrived and i opened the package  one of the images was smudged and distorted I called customer service and they sent another one quickly and without a hassle Great customer service experience

Name: A4646
Content: Rush Order Tees was fantastic We were able to put our artwork together and order the shirts all in one place The process was simple and the customer service rep on chat was incredibly helpful when i had a question about logo placement Would highly recommend

Name: A4647
Content: Ive never written a review for a service or product Generally speaking  this is out of apathy After a friend of mine was diagnosed with brain cancer  we felt it was important to have some shirts made for when she went into surgery Because of the nature of the surgery it needed to be done fast  so I had very little time to design and have the shirts printed and shipped Rush Order Tees went out of their way to help me have these done quickly  and they look great Geraldine was the customer service rep I interacted with and she was wonderful  compassionate  and very helpful I would definitely recommend this site to anyone looking for quick and quality work

Name: A4648
Content: This is the second Mardi Gras in a row that my friends and I have used RushOrderTees for our custom t shirt needs and I couldnt be happier The shirts are of the HIGHEST quality  designed exactly as requested  and delivered SO quickly We will continue to use them in the future

Name: A4649
Content: I ordered a hoodie from RushOrderTees and when it arrived my whole hoodie was completely changed I ordered red ink and it came basically faded on the hoodie Not to mention they gave me a completely different hoodie than I asked for I called multiple times because my order came about 2 weeks late but I didnt mind because of the outbreak but I had hoped that when it finally came that it would be worth it but that wasnt the case They had apparently ran out of stock for the hoodie I had ordered so they replaced it with a more thinner cheaper quality hoodie without informing me If it was possible to give a zero rating I would This hoodie was  50 and looked more like it cost  5 the most

Name: A4650
Content: If there were an option for a sixth star on this rating  I would give it Rush Order Tees was incredible to work with I experienced nothing but friendly  timely  quality  customer centric service that stood out to me above other vendors My experience proved to me that Rush Order Tees is definitely on top of their game I highly recommend them

Name: A4651
Content: They were easy to work with as my order changed When there was a very minor issue with the order they MORE than made up for it with sending replacements PLUS No questions asked Great customer service

Name: A4652
Content: RushOrderTees was overall wonderful Great service  very specific as to what their rules and regulations are for a custom designed t shirt  I ordered 20 custom shirts with designs on the front and back for my colleges theater club  and they turned out great Just for reference  my colors for the design were black  white and red on a black t shirt  so it was a pretty simple design in the scheme of things I like that you can adjust things to your liking  and RushOrderTees does a wonderful job at keeping a customer in the loop They also have great suggestions as to the placement of designs on shirts The only con is the following some of the shirts had cardboard fibers on theme because there was no barrier inside between the shirts and the box for shipping I wish they wrapped the shirts in plastic  and THEN put them in the box Even still  all the sizes were correct  the design came out exactly as I wanted  the prices are fair  and everyone loved the result Will definitely be using this service again

Name: A4653
Content: The tee shirts came out perfect an online ordering is super easy The sales associates seem unnecessary unless you need help designing your shirt They did not offer any additional price cuts  even though they said they were checking for the best price a couple of times It was the same price the website quoted I found an online coupon code and got a better deal on my own The associate seemed upset when I told her I already ordered; I assume because she did not get the commission or whatever Overall  a good experience and an awesome product we are super happy with  I would just skip the sales people

Name: A4654
Content: Very pleased with our experience We needed shirts fast and I found this company on the internet Took a chance they took our order easily and quickly over the phone and the internet  simultaneously They made our graphic look great and I appreciated the womens shirt style which actually looks good on the women My only complaint was that I had wanted the shirts before my meeting and they arrived the day they were supposed to  but in the evening  after I had already left for my meeting Well I guess that was the shippers fault

Name: A4655
Content: The site was very user friendly  and the chat feature really helped me select the right product for my needs and budget The proofs were provided quickly  as well as when I requested changes Once the product arrived  I was very happy with the quality and would definitely use them again  and recommend to others

Name: A4656
Content: On the night i placed my order  i realized that i made some mistakes on the names I emailed them and the next business day they called me back They were very cooperative  helpful and understanding They corrected my mistake and the t shirts were delivered on time Having not ordered from them before  i did not know what quality the printing would be I was delighted to see it was very high quality I will definitely order from them again Top notch company  top notch product

Name: A4657
Content: Luke was great He understood my concern and provided a quick answer

Name: A4658
Content: Rush Order Tees website is easy enough to navigate My students were able to design their class shirts at an affordable price for everyone We all love how they came out and are excited to wear them during team competitions throughout the school year Great quality shirts  bright colors  fun graphics  delivered in a quick timeframe Good job R O T I look forward to ordering from you once again next year

Name: A4659
Content: I needed 150 t shirts designed and shipped right away  and Rush Order Tees came through I was having trouble with my logo and so I chatted with a representative of ROT and they actually worked on my design for me and came up with the perfect t shirt I was so pleased with their customer service and their prices The shirts came as promised and I couldnt be happier

Name: A4660
Content: The website was very easy to use and my order arrived incredibly quickly considering the circumstances of 2020 Although there was an issue with the printing on the order that arrived  I left a customer complaint and was addressed quickly and very politely I greatly appreciate how customer oriented this brand is

Name: A4661
Content: I needed a small order delivered in four days  and they did it The shirts looked great  and the staff helped me order just what I needed via the instant chat on their website The order was affordable  shipped on time  and service was great I would recommend this company

Name: A4662
Content: UPS apparently did not deliver my order to the proper address although they claimed they did Rush Order without any hassle immediately agreed to replace the missing order Very reputable and reliable Company

Name: A4663
Content:
The total experience was wonderful The t shirts turned out fantastic and everyone loved them This is rated 5 stars BUT
It did get a bit bothersome when sales would call me and text me pushing me to order I was working with one person and was very happy with her I finally got fed up with the sales pitches that I just placed the order and was very satisfied

Name: A4664
Content: Great customer service Thank you team for the quick response and thank you Dana for helping me out on the phone Super nice people all around as far as I can tell I had a hiccup on my order that was partially my fault but they took care of me and the prints do look nice Ill definitely order from them again

Name: A4665
Content: Easy to use website  truly are rush order with quality printing Rare to find a company that also backs up their commitment to customer service I would recommend and use again for future items

Name: A4666
Content: I found Rush Order Tees by a Google search I could not have been happier The shirts were reasonably priced  they were delivered before the date promised and I was even able to add on to the order when I realized a few days later that I missed one The shirts are wonderful quality  the colors in the screen printing was so bright and vivid I can not say enough wonderful things about this company I will definitely be ordering from Rush Order Tees again Thank you for being awesome

Name: A4667
Content: Ordered from here on more than one occasion There was a imperfection only one time and they very quickly fixed and sent out a replacement Overall a very easy to deal with company with superb quality shirts

Name: A4668
Content: RushOrderTees saved our event We ordered 500 hats from another company which took 2 months to come in and even though we had approved a proof  the hats came misspelled So I chatted with Francis from RushOrderTees on a Thursday who assured me 500 hats could arrive that Monday They came exactly on time and were PERFECT  not to mention much better quality than the hats we had ordered from the other company We will certainly be working with RushOrderTees frequently in the future

Name: A4669
Content: I placed an online order and then went through 2 rounds of edits changing quantity  size and adding products with my customer service rep The changes were handled quickly and professionally and I was provided with a final date to make any additional changes without affecting my shipment date Will definitely work with these guys in the future Total pros

Name: A4670
Content: I was looking for cheap shirts that could be ordered quickly Designing my shirts were very easy  and even with a sizing mix up my shirts still arrived before my fraternitys event 5 days after I placed my order Will definitely use them again

Name: A4671
Content: They were really helpful in getting back on my order and said they would send a replacement right away because there was something misspelled They really got rid of my stress as I was so worried as to what would happen with the shirts Its for a club on campus and I couldnt disappoint the members so im glad they were so helpful

Name: A4672
Content: I needed 22 teeshirts for a family cruise that my family and I were taking on June 25th I contacted RushOrder Tees on 6/10 and needed the shirts by 6/21 I had the distinct honor and pleasure of talking with Bria Brown  who not only got me a very good deal on the shirts  but also gave me expedited shipping at no additional cost I had to contact her several times for changes in the order  and she was always so very pleasant and helpful each time She made the process so much more pleasant When I received the shirts  I was blown away by how great they looked My family members absolutely loved them Miss Bria Brown also contacted me a few days after I received the shirts to ask if everything was alright I was so pleasantly surprised by her going the extra mile to contact me Rush Order Tees should be very proud to have people like Bria Brown represent their company Talking about customer service  this pleasant young lady was exceptional I will always use this company for now on and have told friends and family how great this company is to do business with Thank you Bria Brown for your time  your patience  and for making me feel that I was your only customer and my satisfaction was top priority  I will always remember my experience with YOU

Name: A4673
Content: Excellent experience There was a miscommunication between sales and the art department but Karie from the art department spoke to me on the phone and cleared everything up I got my shirts the day they were promised and they were great My client was thrilled with the end product and we will be ordering hoodies and other items in the fall This will be my go to company now for this type of project

Name: A4674
Content: Great if youre not in a RUSH Got a text day before order was to arrive to be told item wasnt in stock Order was 17 shirts  some mens some womens Mens shirt not in stock and cant get in time Asked if we could sub another product for the mens shirt thats outta  stock Answer was yes  but would have to change change the product for the ENTIRE order? Went ahead and cancelled order and we will be t shirtless for our event Will get refund in 5 7 days  so money tied up till then with no shirts not happy

Name: A4675
Content: Great service  called me multiple times to confirm design notes Shirts were easy to design  are great quality and shipped four or five days earlier than stated No complaints at all

Name: A4676
Content: They have the best online custom t shirt maker by far so i spent hours creating multiple t shirts knowing they both accepted PayPal and Visa as payments and they also send overseas But when i asked for a shipping quote everything became dry No shipping quote and no other payments than by wire accepted for security reasons i have never in my internet ordering history been asked to do so not even with motor parts well over many grands in value have i been asked to pay by wire

Name: A4677
Content: Needed custom shirts in a large size and quick  I received my order on time was their when they said it would be I would recommend to anyone very easy and quick The service is unbelievable cant say enough good things about this company

Name: A4678
Content: Nice enough people to deal with as far as placing the order goes The printed shirts were fine but sizing the designs for the shirt was a bit tricky The scale of the shirt image they use for proofs is undersized so your printed design on the final product looks smaller than you intend They have not taken any responsibility for this discrepancy and have not communicated any interest in changing that Buyer beware

Name: A4679
Content: In full disclosure  we were not the greatest of clients We had last minute changes  and funding problems on our end  however  despite this the folks at Rush Order were very understanding  and worked with us every step of the way We will continue using them  the shirts were a very high quality  very durable and the printing was superb  at the right price

Name: A4680
Content: Their guarantee is worthless I wanted a custom shirt for a specific occasion on a specific date The shirt was terribly expensive because I wanted only one shirt   32 32 for one shirt with a photo and one word under the photo I needed it by Friday  on the shipping options there was an option Guarantee delivery by Friday for  21 99 extra Now Im at  54 31 for one shirt delivered by Friday Friday rolls around  late in the day and I start to worry so I log in to track the package and their website actually says that the order is on time for guaranteed delivery on Monday What kind of nonsense is that? I have the email to prove the Friday guarantee  and they certainly took my money I call the tollfree number  nobody answers I called 5 more times over the next hour  nobody there but they wanted me to leave a voicemail Rush Order Tees has poor practices and non existent customer service How can you call yourselves rush order anything if you mess up this badly on a rush order?

Name: A4681
Content: Print was nice  but I ordered one specific brand and also called to confirm that they could get this product Not one of the shirts was as requested I will not use this company again

Name: A4682
Content: Amazing customer service Quick  efficient  and to the point I received phone calls  text messages  and emails to let me know about the progress of my order This really sets Rush Order Tees apart from the rest Would definitely recommend them to anyone

Name: A4683
Content: I ordered a hoodie from this company to give as a gift I am not satisfied with how it came out The image printed on the hoodie was not like the proof sent to me; it is small and looks very faded  not vibrant at all I had higher expectations from this company due to the reviews I read prior to placing my order Very disappointed in the low quality hoodie I received and will not recommend this place to others

Name: A4684
Content: We had a 30th year college reunion  and at the last minute thought a t shirt to remember the weekend would be fun idea We ordered a long sleeved t  with graphics on the front  back and sleeve The quality of the shirt and graphic was excellent  and they were delivered on time We would highly recommend Rush Order Tees

Name: A4685
Content: Great printing on hoodies and customer service is amazing

Name: A4686
Content: What began as a terrible experience  turn out to be a decent one The company started by sending us an incomplete order  then following that by not repsonding to our calls However after speaking to Alyssa in the customer service department  the company has vindicated themselves She contacted us & listen to all of our concerns with the order Shortly after she had a new order sent to our office Mrs Seiders is truly an asset to the company

Name: A4687
Content: What a great find this was I needed shirts to support my son at the NYC marathon I designed the shirt on the website  then chatted with a customer support staff member to make sure I had done everything correctly She was so helpful and gave me a delivery date so I would have them in time for the event They arrived as promised and we were soooo happy with the shirts Thank you

Name: A4688
Content: I ordered 25 t shirts for the Chicago marathon  for the runners who were running to raise money for the non profit Asha For Education I asked for discounts as we were a non profit and the person who helped me get it done for a good cost The designs created are saved for ever so for the next year whoever is placing the order just needs to login and order  thats great The design was mailed for approval and delivered on time Very happy with the service

Name: A4689
Content: Great experience Ordered 12 tees for overnight delivery From submitting my order to receiving the tees only 27 hours passed Will definitely by from again Shirts excellent quality  great chat help and quality work

Name: A4690
Content: Not only did they provide a super great quality T shirt super fast  they called me after I submitted and made some GREAT recommendations for improving my shirt  all at no costs I am so happy with the final product I will definitely use them going forward GREAT job

Name: A4691
Content: Well priced shirts  lots of design options  great customer service They were able to alter our graphic so we could save money on colors and still have it look amazing We received our shirts a full day before they were promised Im thrilled

Name: A4692
Content: Awesome product It was a little harrowing to get the proof sent to my email two days before the product it supposed to arrive  but once the proof was in my inbox  I approved it and it printed beautifully and it arrive ON TIME These are quality cotton tshirts not the cheap ones other places have I would definitely do business with them again Thanks

Name: A4693
Content: These guys are AWESOME Im a director at a camp and we received 700 misprinted t shirts obviously from a DIFFERENT company  Rush Order Tees saved the day and got all of our shirts  correctly printed  and delivered in record timing Why go anywhere else They do it right  for a good price and always get you your shirts when you need them Thank you Rush Order Tees

Name: A4694
Content: It was easy to do the artwork online Thankfully they sent me a proof before printing 1 They did not read my comments so the artwork was wrong I needed them to replace text inside a logo and they didnt do it the first time 2 I was sent a message that a representative would be calling me first thing in the morning because I wanted to change the number of larges and add a few smalls Well  he never called so I finally went on the chat line 3 I was told my order was okd and I would have to pay a  30 restocking fee to change my quantity I did not ok the order and was waiting for the customer rep to call me  their error and 4 they were condescending with me So now I have too many shirts Customer service unsatisfactory The shirts came before they were scheduled and they turned out looking good

Name: A4695
Content: Rush Order Tees went above and beyond This was truly a rush order which we received on time and they helped us with the graphic layout of our shirts They support their customers 100  always able to get a hold of someone Highly recommended

Name: A4696
Content: Excellent Shirts I bought 100 cotton and a few Polyester I like the cotton best for the fit  but the Polyester is nice and shinny and will look new for longer Lettering colors are brighter on the Cotton shirts If you are looking at the pics I posted the cotton shirt is on the right

Name: A4697
Content: I cant say enough good things about this Company I had a special need for some large shirts in a very small quantity in a very short time frame Less than 10 days I Tried many companies before I found Rush Order Tees Henry literally held my hand all through the process to get my shirts to me perfect and on time Was skeptical that it could be done BUT  the day before I needed them they arrived right when I needed them Thank you so much RUSH ORDER TEES and especially Henry You will hear from me again and with less pressure I promise

Name: A4698
Content: Maybe this service is best for logos I got a picture on my shirt and it was not the best quality It looked like I washed my shirt 44 times and the colors faded off It took over a month to a shirt that was not to my liking and I could not wear it on the special day It came a week after I dont think Ill be ordering anything else from Rush

Name: A4699
Content: I needed to order t shirts for the team captains for our effort to raise money for Go Casual for Justice  the money goes to loan repayment assistance for legal service providers Didnt think I had the time to get anything because it was the Friday before the week when we needed to do the fundraising  but I googled t shirts and checked out RushOrderTees Was able to design the perfect shirt on line and then got lots of help from Ian The customer service was outstanding We got the shirts when we needed them and they looked great  and the cost was really reasonable Would certainly use RushOrder Tees again

Name: A4700
Content: Rush Order Tees did an amazing job on my last minute request The user interface to design my product was easy and the selection of products was great I think the game changer for me is the way you are able to move the shirt post production If you have ever had to collect sizes and money for shirts  you can appreciate the option to send a link out to your audience  removing yourself from the middle I will definitely return to Rush Order Tees the next time I or recommend to friends when they need good shirts fast

Name: A4701
Content: Rush Order Tees was a great service Very helpful when calling them about my order and very nice customer service They gave us a discount because of the quantity we placed and kept us informed the whole way through the process The delivery also came 3 days before it was planned to

Name: A4702
Content: They are a company of their word The T Shirts were great and looked perfect Highly recommend Only issue I had was their phone system was not working well and I had to call several times to be able to find someone that could hear me

Name: A4703
Content: Love these guys and gals They got my order delivered to me early I had one little thing I didnt like about a shirt and they rushed to fix it that night and get a replacement out to me ASAP I will definitely be continuing patronizing

Name: A4704
Content: I highly recommend Rush Order Tees I needed a place to get family reunion shirts for a reasonable price I was able to upload my design and get them ordered They arrived the week of our reunion Everyone loved them Well pleased with quality

Name: A4705
Content: I ordered 11 customer shirts for mu travel softball team Upon receipt of the shirts I was extremely disappointed with their appearance After reporting my concerns to a customer service agent they were completely unhelpful and dismissed my concerns Overpriced and poor customer service No thank you

Name: A4706
Content: I designed what I wanted and picked out the shirts I wanted A day later I received an email asking me to approve the proof of the artwork  which i thought was impressive Then I got my 5 T shirts 2 days before expected They delivered  and the shirts were great I will use them again

Name: A4707
Content: Rush order tees has always been very good to me They have several people that contact you and stay up to date with you They really have their stuff in order They did my first order of shirts for my band that I ever did

Name: A4708
Content: I had a great experience with Rush Order Tees The shirts arrived when they were supposed to  and the printing and shirt quality are AWESOME We uploaded our artwork for our family reunion  and we couldnt be happier about how it looks

Name: A4709
Content: Amazing communication  service Simple to use customizer

Name: A4710
Content: I bought around 80 shirts for a camp this past weekend The prices are fair and the shipping was very quick Every person I contacted was professional and very helpful I will definitely be a returning customer for our camp next year

Name: A4711
Content: our hoodies arrived as scheduled  which was good The design was exactly as we wanted The problem is the printing The front of the shirts after washing are almost illegible It is as if the printing was defective The sweatshirt itself is very nice but applying of the design is horrible Basically a waste of money

Name: A4712
Content:
Our order was placed on a Friday with delivery set for the next Wednesday On Tuesday I was called and told the ordered product was not available and they would substitute different shirt and the order would be delivered Wednesday as ordered Order was not delivered on Wednesday  I was leaving town  called and requested the order be rerouted to my hotel for Thursday or Friday delivery The order was delivered to my house on Thursday  I was 6 hours away and the event started on Friday I had another swim team parent bring the shirts to the meet  6 hours away There was one shirt with multiple stains 
Not one employee apologized for their incompetence or offered any compensation for the delayed and incorrect delivery I will never use Rush Order Tees again and will be sure to discourage anyone discussing using the company 
Mediocrity and poor customer service are their two major features

Name: A4713
Content: Rush Order Tees is by far the best place to order quality t shirts I have used them three times now and everytime they offer a great deal and are able to rush my order Quality and selection of shirts/tanks are great too

Name: A4714
Content: As a surprise for a friends 40th birthday I wanted to have tank tops made for her crew I contacted Rush Order T shirts after a bad experience with another company They were professional  fast and the quality of the tshirts was awesome Other sites sell wide not fitted tshirts and tanks These were slim cut and flattering  The girls are size zero to 4  I would highly recommend this company

Name: A4715
Content: Fabulous Customer Service  fair pricing and speedy delivery Along with GREAT product What more can you ask for? Ive used RushOrderTees a few times now  and Ive always been thrilled with each experience Thank you for making ridiculous things happen

Name: A4716
Content: Customer was VERY helpful  reaching out when I needed to add a shirt after I had placed my order The process was quick and painless and my order arrived PERFECT and exactly when they said it would I would definitely order from them again

Name: A4717
Content: Ordered a couple hoodies for my wife and I for our sons football season The sweaters came in a day early which was great the only problem we have is unfortunately a big one The logos on the front of the sweaters were not centered Bad enough another parent pointed it out How embarrassing Tried to call customer service twice however no answer and left a message at one point Hope this gets straightened out quickly as the season is almost over Hate to have wasted money on the sweaters and eliminate any potential for future ordering as we have kids in other sports

Name: A4718
Content: Fast and amazing service Had to call to get a couple more shirts added to my order and they were great help Would recommend to anyone

Name: A4719
Content: Ordered these sweet Ts Had a small issue with shipping in no way the fault of RushOrderTees  Called in to customer service  talked to Mikayla  Mckayla  Makaylay  no idea how to spell that Anyway  she was awesome Provided a solution real fast and saved me some stress and moneys Ill post another review of the product after I receive it But Mikaela gets her shout out now

Name: A4720
Content: Fast  efficient customer service I highly recommend this business

Name: A4721
Content: Great service  on time  product was wonderful We had problems with the quality of the graphic I had submitted  and the staff was both helpful and patient when I finally was able to get the high resolution graphic to them  only four days before we needed them  they produced 45 t shirts of widely varying sizes  all beautifully completed and shipped to arrive at our family reunion on time

Name: A4722
Content:
I ordered the T shirt for the Italian Honor Society and I am very pleased with the help received and the prompt response by the employee The
t shirts are cool and they arrived promptly I recommend this company to other teachers as well Thank you for helping

Name: A4723
Content: Did a wonderful job of printing the tee exactly as I wanted it Loved the fact they have you preview the final look before making up the item It was perfect  my son loved it & now hes planning on using Rush Order Tees for himself Great find & will continue to do business with them

Name: A4724
Content: I purchased tee shitrs from Rushorderes I used their online software to compose my layout very easy I called and placed the order  very easy The next day I discovered that I had ordered the wrong sizes  extra large I called and corrected the sizes and was charged a restock fee  okay Shirts arrrived as scheduled; however they were extra large I called and spoke to Alexis Nemeroff She was very helpful and efficient She corrected the mistake  reprinted the right size shirts  and sent the special delivery I received the beautifully printed tee shirts 4 days later Thanks Alexis I highly recommend you

Name: A4725
Content: Horrible experience dealing with RushOrderTees com While the customer service reps were nice  I paid for quick delivery still came late a week Once I received the package it did not look like the website The image on the back of the shirt was messed up This was such a horrible experience

Name: A4726
Content: Designed Polo Shirts on their site on Thursday and was expecting to have the one week from Monday I just got an email today almost a week after placing the order that they didnt have one size and asked if they could just size down I asked how long till they got the shirt back in stock seeing as I had another week and they said i dont know they couldnt help me any further  I had to cancel my order and am now currently looking for a new place to design a shirt  with a MUCH shorter turn around

Name: A4727
Content: I love the shirts I got for my Leukemia and Lymphoma walk team The picture I uploaded to the websites shirt design template was printed beautifully on the shirts I ordered The template is easy to use and the font options are numerous I will definitely be ordering from Rush Order Tees again

Name: A4728
Content: I completed an order for Native Sons and Daughters of Jacksonville for Tribe of the Year shirts They did an outstanding job The shirts were well made and professionally done I used the clip art they provided and their artists made it perfect Thank you so much you made our girls very happy

Name: A4729
Content: Is there a rating more than 5 stars?? Customer service was amazing  the artwork turned out better than I had imagined  shirts are beautiful and arrived sooner than expected I needed a few additions made to my order and the whole process couldnt have been easier Outstanding

Name: A4730
Content: Best experience ever Lucky enough to win Rush Order Tees contest and had a great t shirt printed for the Animal Humane Society Bottle Baby Foster Program From beginning of design to the end  I had constant input and the final decision on how I wanted the shirt to turn out Rush Order Tees will be the first place I will go when I need to get a shirt/s printed Thanks guys

Name: A4731
Content: We have had incredible results from working with Rushordertees for 2 years now Their customer service and professionalism is second to none  and our family couldnt be more happy with our reunion shirt designs Special thanks to Michael Plotkin  who goes above and beyond to help out with whatever designs were brought to the table Rushordertees is 100 quality If you want something done right  look no further

Name: A4732
Content: Excellant and Fast They go Above and Beyond to Make sure we You are Happy I will use again and again for our business And I can not forget to mention the excellant customer service we had gotten when chatting and calling by phone Thank you to all the wornderful staff

Name: A4733
Content: Class act company with stellar response times regarding a mishap with my order ON THE BALL Customer Service Mistakes happen  how you recover from those mistakes shows the nature of your character Again  absolutely fantastic response time Truly impressed

Name: A4734
Content: Great product selection from which to choose The customer service is also unmatched I had a RUSH order for certain Knowing my deadline  the team called me immediately to work through some options on the art to make sure it would look great and it did I highly recommend them and will use them again in the future

Name: A4735
Content:
So happy from start to finish with Rush Order Tees They are so helpful  easy to work with and ship so quickly
This is the second year that I have ordered our school t shirts from this company and I will continue to do so every year

Name: A4736
Content: I was so good until this new Manager came in Mr Taylor he treated me like I was in the military or some sort He threw clothes in my face instead of talking to me I took that all for 2 weeks and the 2nd week of the last day I just couldnt take anymore so I cried my heart out I am a Temp I am not full time and also I dont like to be treated as if Im a peasant Even some of the printers at belt 2 have an issue with him as well I get along with everyone I never had 1 issue until he arrived Also I would like to add that I think that the owner is an awesome guy and he definitely doesnt deserve the treatment that is given from what I see hes accommodating everyone to make production better new equipment= more production more production= more money more money= you all eventually get to have a rate your comfortable with  Ive never seen such ungratefulness to this degree in my life

Name: A4737
Content: The T shirts we ordered came out looking exactly as our prints I thought it would be difficult because we had a variety of different small prints and colors but it looked great We will definitely recommend this company to others and use them again in the future The only thing to note is most sizes are a little large if you cannot chose between mens and womens sizing except the XXL was a little small for most people that normally wear a XXL Overall we loved our softball tees and the customer service was phenomenal

Name: A4738
Content: Very terrible experience My shirts were only printed with the front design even after I received an e mail confirming that the front and back of the shirt would have a design The associate tried to convince me that the back of the shirt wasnt selected to be printed  which didnt make sense especially considering the e mail confirmation The attempt made by the associate to fix the problem was not feasible due to my time frame The company definitely doesnt live up to its name And they were very presumptuous to offer me a discount when I order from them again I will not order from them anymore

Name: A4739
Content: Love the ease of the website  great tools Super easy to use Was bummed about the sizing however They dont run slightly smaller  they are MUCH smaller than usual sizes I love the quality of the shirts and the printing  but now have three shirts that I cannot use for any of the people that I bought them for I never mind paying for something quality  which these are  but am bummed that I have paid nearly  100 for unusable items Please make up an accurate sizing chart  with lengths  widths  etc

Name: A4740
Content:
They are Terrible They order the shirts you want to print on before even letting you know if they can or cannot do what you are asking 
Had to recreate my design 3 or 4 times because they cant do simple stuff Like they say Finally give them one to do  they try to turn it into a extra order on top of the ones they couldnt do This was Michael 
Then they do the order wrong and wont give a refund Then try to charge ME to fix their wrong doing wouldnt recommend them to my worst enemy Now I have 96 shirts that I might not be able to sell  which was 1600 Yep  it was a big order  save yourself  go to a professional

Name: A4741
Content: Top notch group Most places just print your picture on a shirt which looks amateurish Here they incorporate or blend your picture or design within the fabric adjusting background to give the appearance that design is part of the fabric The end result is product that looks professional but unique Finally they have a large assortment of colors and fabric designs Highly recommended

Name: A4742
Content: Ive ordered from them a few times and Ive always been satisified Their t shirt building tool is quick and easy to learn They are great with making sure your proof is what you expect  and delivery was fast

Name: A4743
Content: High quality product in the exact configurations I wanted at an extremely fair price I needed rush custom t shirts for my fantasy football draft I procrastinated and was in a jam Rush Order got me exactly what I wanted in less than a week turnaround I would use this company again in a heartbeat

Name: A4744
Content: Our shirts turned out awesome They were a great quality and fit great All the little details on our graphic showed up great The shirts arrived in a speedy manner as well We will definitely order shirts again

Name: A4745
Content: Great service and quality of the shirts The shirts were better than expected and sent in a timely manner for my team I will definitely use them again Thank you

Name: A4746
Content: Amazing experience I was looking at other sites and Rushorder were considerably cheaper with better graphics When a question came up with the order they called and text for a return call Upon returning the call the customer service was amazing as well I will definitely be recommending Rushorder to everyone Much better experience than the other the shirt company

Name: A4747
Content: USing the website to design our tshirts and then getting those tshirts in quick fashion was a great experience We ended up a few short in one size and when I emailed the company got right back to me and then called and overnighted the missing one  plus a few extra we actually needed it was awesome service and the tshirts LOOKED great Will use them again for sure

Name: A4748
Content: Truly amazing They worked with me to make sure I would have the best quality image on my shirts Their customer service is extremely well run

Name: A4749
Content: My first graphic faded almost halfway after the first wash  however immediately after I reported this problem I was sent a new order Great customer service

Name: A4750
Content: Fast  easy and convenient Helpful to have people to chat with while designing and ordering the t shirs online The childrens sizes run large but other than that  everything was great Very nice and accomodating We got our order quickly and the shirts looked great

Name: A4751
Content: Felt like a real rush order where the order was not looked at at all of the 2 weeks until the delivery date and then processed so fast that several mistakes happened After not receiving the proof for 1 1/2 weeks I started sending emails and calling  and was told every time I should receive proof the next day  which never happened so I had to call again and again Finally I received the proof 2 days before the promised delivery date The shirts were delivered on time  but with the wrong print color and many print smudges on the shirts which made them look pretty bad An email enquiring about my options about a re print or a partial refund was completely ignored

Name: A4752
Content: I have ordered a total of 20 times in the past 3 years  with 2 more coming love this company Everyone is friendly CONSISTENTLY when you call or are chatting on the website I use no other company for shirt orders and have passed off their information numerous times

Name: A4753
Content: We have been purchasing our company shirts from RushOrderTees for a couple of years and couldnt be happier Both the products and customer service have been excellent We highly recommend

Name: A4754
Content: I ordered t shirts for our Vacation Bible School The service was Great I also received my order in a timely manor & our shirts looked Awesome I would definitely use your company again

Name: A4755
Content: Initially my order didnt come as I expected The lettering on the back wasnt even the same color as the front  and the product I ordered wasnt the same However  I emailed the company after I received it and they told me theyd send a replacement ASAP Great customer service

Name: A4756
Content: Rush Order Tees is the best They are always available to help me with my business needs The service is top notch and the turn around time on products is the fastest I have experienced I HIGHLY reccommend Rush Order Tees Evan and Tim and the rest of the team are friendly  helpful and professional

Name: A4757
Content: Love the freedom the design software gives the user Customer service is top notch After years of searching for a custom t shirt company  I finally found one that I will stick with

Name: A4758
Content: Shirts came out nice and just as I imagine however shipping was very long as I though that Im 30 min away in driving distince I truly thought the shipping would be a lot faster then I exspected when it didnt even get delivered on the day the lady on the phone said it would when I called for and update and tracking number Because of the long time of shipping it has made look for another company to order from

Name: A4759
Content: The program is easy to work with and try different styles until you are satisfied The ease or ordering was great Also the speed of getting my product was excellent and they all look great Will definitely order again from them

Name: A4760
Content: I ordered t shirts for my crew members Im very pleased with the quality of the shirts and the artwork Turn around time was great I will order again Thank you

Name: A4761
Content: Love this place Site is super easy and intuitive allowing you to design your very own stuff from ANYthing Ive had WAY to much fun personalizing one off gifts that are huge hits when they arrive Customer service is REAL  they are caring and they are excellent Highly recommend

Name: A4762
Content: Fantastic service  constant email updates and everything arrived exactly when it was supposed to Exception quality and reasonable price for the T shirts and the printing as well Couldnt be happier

Name: A4763
Content: I had an issue with not being made aware that my black and white photo would show the white as the shirt color Hence my blue and yellow shirts did not look very good I notified RushOrder and they sent the colored shirts in White immediately

Name: A4764
Content: Looking around to get a bundle of shirts for my uncle memorial services Google some places & this one caught my attention  so I went with this  called and spoke to a well mannered women name alyse she helped me & was very patient with me helped in anyway possible  Gave me the best deal she could I appreciate her for helping me with my order  Im very satisfied with these company as a whole thanks again alys

Name: A4765
Content: Superb services Affordable prices I had to made 166 custom shirts for my company for our VP visit I had only a week time They reached out to me due to the volume of the order They gave me a huge discounted price and rush it We received everything on the guaranteed date Great quality I will recommend them to any one Thank you for your business and sense of urgency

Name: A4766
Content: Very helpful customer service both via email and over the phone they were a pleasure to work with Received our order quickly and were very pleased with the shirts

Name: A4767
Content: I over the moon with not only the Customer Service from the get go but the quality of my tee shirts I have a large social group and I ordered tees for one of our events The quality of the shirt and the printing was beyond my expectations Rush Order Tees will be my GO TO from here on out Ellen Foster  Dynamic Professionals  Middletown  CT

Name: A4768
Content: Evan Miller with Rush order tees has exceeded my expectations Buying online can be very difficult Problems did arise  but RushorderTees did everything they could to solve it and more For that I am grateful Thank you

Name: A4769
Content: I will never use another shirt company again Service was awesome Loved the delivery options  we were in a hurry Very responsive to questions They even helped with final design edits

Name: A4770
Content: I thought I had waited to long to make shirts for an event Nope These guys make it so all you really need is a few days The design and order process is super easy And if its not easy enough they have more chat people and phone people than you could ever need They will actually offer to help you before you even ask It was really something I was impressed

Name: A4771
Content: They have great quality Sweatshirts and handle any issues with orders really quick

Name: A4772
Content: One of the best experiences Ive had with any website as of late Order was processed quickly  with ample communication and updates via text & email Product arrived exactly on time  and was great quality Very happy

Name: A4773
Content: Rush Order Tees was efficient and easy to design online All my questions were answered by a Tee Shirt Expert in an efficient and professional manner Our group was very happy with the design and quality of the tee shirts Thanks you Rush Order Tees

Name: A4774
Content: This is my fourth year ordering our team shirts from Rush Order Tees Every year  Im shocked at how good the customer service is It is topped only by the quality of the finished product HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Name: A4775
Content:
Very satisfied Rush order Tees was AMAZING definitely going to keep coming back The website was super easy to navigate and fun to use  the design was carefully gone over and adjusted for the best outcome When I had questions I was able to speak with someone quickly and they answered all of my questions Great customer service The T shirts arrived sooner than expected The T shirts were great quality and so soft I LOVE how they came out They even threw in a couple of towels and a bottle opener I thought that was nice I had such a great experience with this company I have been recommending them to my friends and family 
Thank you

Name: A4776
Content: I worked with Chris and he was awesome The T Shirts were a big hit at our family vacation The quality was great  graphics were just as I thought they would look  and they arrived in plenty of time  as promised Great experience

Name: A4777
Content: Awesome service Had an issue and it was resolved right then and there Thank you so much rushordertees for your assistance and products We will be ordering more soon

Name: A4778
Content:
This company is awesome The customer service is amazing and the quality of the work is great I will definitely do business with them again 

Thank you

Name: A4779
Content: 10/10 would recommend And customer service is great

Name: A4780
Content: One of the sizes ordered had a mis print When I spoke to one of the customer service agents She was more than happy to help resolve the issue  The correction was sent wrong again  and still the agent was more than happy to restore the problem  Customer service is great

Name: A4781
Content: Got 27 shirts for my department at work for Christmas Thumbs up all around for quality and price I was in near constant contact during the whole ordering process and everything went smoothly Got the shirts in plenty of time and we love them and will be able to wear them for years to come Highly recommended

Name: A4782
Content: Very easy and fun to design our own personalized t shirts  and reasonable too Constant contact with me and shirts came as promised early on the day they said they would arrive Would def go with them again

Name: A4783
Content: Could not have been happier with my shirts The design was checked and then sent back for extra verification They made contact with me as soon as I had a question and were able to help me immediately Would certainly recommend the product and customer service to anyone

Name: A4784
Content: Would leave zero stars; however it makes me have to at least leave one star We order thousands worth of merchandise and paid for extra shipping to only receive a partial order and items replaced with cheap versions of another material Customer service was of no help Our company will never use this company again

Name: A4785
Content: I tried another company before i knew of R O Tee s  I wanted to order 6 of the Hooded Sweat Shirts and the color i wanted i had to order a minimum of 6 but what i wanted to do was have 3 saying my pet sitting business and 3 saying my vet hospital The company said i could not do that and that all 6 had to say the same thing and if i wanted to have something printed up i would have to order another 6 hooded sweat shirts which meant about another  300 00 it would cost me I told them there is no way i can do that and would look some place else So i started checking around and found Rush Order Tee s i ordered 6 hoodies 3 with my business and 3 with the vet hospital and what they did was combined both which made the minimum of 6 in the color i wanted  Knowing i can have a company work that will work with me on my orders gives me great pleasure to do business with I plan on ordering some T Shirts with the same logo as the hoodies and definitely will be ordering from R O Tee s Thank you for your excellent service  great products and excellent staff who works with the customer not against them Rick Foster

Name: A4786
Content: I am very satisfied with this t shirt company Rush Order Custom T shirts do care about their customers and will go out of their way to correct any mistakes and will satisfy their customers in every way possible

Name: A4787
Content: I was in a last minute bind  others called back and wanted to trade a half dozen emails  fill out eforms and so on Some said it couldnt be done  but these guys said Yes right away  did a GREAT job  on time with fantastic artwork Oh wait  the fantastic artwork was mine They just did a great job transferring it to the shirts

Name: A4788
Content:
I am the Creative Manger for a finance company  I have been designing and working with numerous vendors for a long time I came across this site by searching for custom rushed shirts at a reasonable price At first  the CSR  lets call him FRED was fabulous  prompt and polite After putting the order in with specific instructions and mock ups  I awaited for the proofs to come my way for approval A few days pasted with no activity  so I reached out FRED for status on my order with no response via email or by phone three times I was able to speak to other CSRs who said they would get the message to FRED A couple days past when he finally reached out to me via email stating  that in order for my order to be processed  I would have to pay an additional cost  70 due to the fact that I added more design then quoted first time around But that was not the case  I sent him specific instructions and mock ups so there was no misunderstandings He stated that I told him that I did not want a certain design when in fact I never did Without going down a rabbit hole  I chalked it up as a mis comminication and said lets meet in the middle  FRED said no That he had me recorded saying what he was referring to  and was not very nice and fabulous as he first was So with that said  i told him that I am canceling the order  I requested a credit on my card with a reference number  to speak with a manger  and a copy of the voice reordering of my conversations He then agreed to wave the fee and continue with the order 

After receiving the goods  I was not happy with the recommended size of the Logo and names that they wouldnt let me change SO  no i will not use them again

Name: A4789
Content: Easy to use design software on site Excellent communication throughout the process The shirts were a great quality  looked just like the proof we were given Shipping was fast and on time Would recommend this vendor

Name: A4790
Content: The site was easy to use and there were plenty of T shirt choices The artists checked the design and confirmed it was good They then delivered the printed shirts very fast Great work

Name: A4791
Content: It was easy to design shirts on their website One of my shirts came with a spot on it customer service immediately took care and resolved the issue

Name: A4792
Content: I needed a tshirt for my brothers first chemo treatment I placed the order on Friday and it was delivered on Saturday afternoon They were so friendly and helpful and mostly kind and considerate words about my brothers cancer and his treatment I am a lifelong customer

Name: A4793
Content: I concur I give Rush Order Tees SIX STARS too Awesome customer service and quality work The t shirts are affordable  comfortable and the reps paid PHENOMENAL attention to detail in getting the graphics just right

Name: A4794
Content: Awesome I ordered some shirts for a family vacation and received them quickly I was able to submit my design and then proof them before they were printed Super easy and quick

Name: A4795
Content: Awesome customer service  awaiting the final product

Name: A4796
Content:
We were behind the 8 ball when we stumbled across Rush Order Tees  2727 Commerce Way  Philadelphia  PA 19154 Not only did they design the layout of the shirts but make the deadline which was literally 1 week from order 

The shirts were very high quality and went over big at our event Thank you so much Guys

Name: A4797
Content: Great They turned a funky old family photo into fabulous family reunion tee shirts Everyone raved about them The website was fun to work on and the people on the phone were very helpful Id use them again  for sure

Name: A4798
Content: Great customer service and communication Site very user friendly T shirts were great quality and perfect for my needs

Name: A4799
Content:
I ordered a shirt from a different company recently and it wasnt right and they offered me a discount off my next order 

I ordered a shirt from this company and theres a slight problem with it and they offered to replace it immediately  no questions

Name: A4800
Content: I am Very happy with their customer service

Name: A4801
Content: Fantastic The online tools to design your short were simple to use and the results were exactly what we needed Also  the ability to determine your delivery date with prorated discount helped get the shirts in time for our team run

Name: A4802
Content: Allyson in operations is the real deal helped handle an issue with an order Did it all in a timely manner with and was genuinely happy to help a customer who just ordered ONE shirt only that says a lot Michael C in customer service was great too Thank you Allyson & Michael

Name: A4803
Content: Bethany and Rush Tees did a wonderful job There are no words to express the professionalism and expertise on our last minute request for t shirts to memorialize our colleague for our Memorial walk to honor her I expressed to Bethany what we wanted and you created a beautiful tee I highly recommend them for Tee service I look forward to our next project with them

Name: A4804
Content: Needed custom logo shirts for our staff and they provided awesome customer service  an accurate order and quality shirts Very pleased with their service and price Thanks Rush Order Tees

Name: A4805
Content:
I live in Hawaii Island so getting this quality in shirt and design is beyond available I worked with the design team  and with my thoughts  their ideas  and the layout  it turned out superb I do Geo Spacial Work Google Earth like work  so the 4 colors turned out  and they pop

PS I also signed up to get a free T shirt from them as part of my order 

That in no way changes this review Konaprojects

Name: A4806
Content: Im the President of Nathans Story  a Childhood Cancer Org and Rush Order Tees was an absolute pleasure to deal with  I had a very short dead line to work with and that was met with absolutely no problems and was above my expectations They required approval for the design and with ease and simplicity made it a snap Rush Ordewr Tees sent a rough to me with explanation of changes and reasons and every thing was fantastic  even called and left a message to let me know they were awaiting my approval on the draft to procedd with print Tees arrived on the date requested and were an absolute hit with everyone Thank you Rush Order Tees for doing such an amazing job  makingadifference

Name: A4807
Content: I ordered some shirts for a group friends and family trip and they turned out great Very affordable pricing and easy design I loved the first group so much I ordered another group and design I will continue to use them for sure

Name: A4808
Content: I ordered close to 70 shirts for my team in the March of Dimes the walk for babies  The staff is was friendly so I have them two stars  Thats the only thing they have going for them though  My shirts came in and everything looked faded It seemed as if they used the lowest quality ink they could find on the market Then the shirt sizes ere all screwed up I dont know if this was a hands mistake or whtlat because that was the brand of shirt But all of my XL shirts were bigger than my XXL shirts This caused a lot of my co workers to be upset and it took away from the walk I will never work with this company again Their mistakes reflected poorly on me

Name: A4809
Content: The rush order team is always ready to help get the shirts done right and right on time Ive ordered twice from them and both were great experiences from design to receiving

Name: A4810
Content:
Unfortunately our order was not properly fulfilled  small mistake with sizes and quantities While it was not a big deal to me  what made it worse was the fact that I did call them and let them know so that they could fix it and never heard back from them 
So just make sure you can take the risk of your order being messed up  cause there is no going back apparently

Name: A4811
Content: This was our first time ordering from them We only needed about 12 tees for a state track and field meet The design process was easy  the cost was excellent and the final product was exactly as we ordered The delivery was also prompt I would definitely use them again

Name: A4812
Content: Super experience I was pleased with the quick turnaround time and quality of order Also they were very easy to work with when I needed to make a change after I had submitted my order

Name: A4813
Content: Great customer service Job delivered when promised Excellent quality Everyone LOVED their unique Christmas t shirt Thank you

Name: A4814
Content: Great service  efficient and helpful  needed shirts in 24 hours on a Friday afternoon  got them on Monday by noon and they looked AWESOME Will use again

Name: A4815
Content: The process of designing and ordering was super quick and easy  my order was delivered a few days early  and the sweatpants I ordered look amazing and are super high quality Will definitely use them for any future needs

Name: A4816
Content: This is about my third time reordering Cant complain Give them an reorder   and easy ordering on the way Good Material on the shirts Great customer service

Name: A4817
Content: Great commincation with customers and truly seems to have customers best interest in mind Only reason not 5 star is because what I recieved what was not the same as what I sent them to make  but they are helping with the situation and trying to correct their mistakes and should be respected for this quality they possess

Name: A4818
Content: This company was very professional and timely in all our interactions The t shirts came when they were supposed to and were of very good quality I will definitely be using Rush Order Tees again for my next order

Name: A4819
Content: I am a coach for a robotics team and we had a tight schedule before the next tournament RushOrderTees was able to deliver the required shirts on expedited schedule The shirts arrived at the promised time I was pleased how the artwork was verified before printing

Name: A4820
Content: Really great customer service The staff is available to help while you design the shirt and they are quick to respond to any other inquiries My order was delivered as they promised

Name: A4821
Content: Unbelievable service Quality of the shirts with our logo was exceptional Delivery was super fast Customer Service the best Ive seen Going to give them the rest of our business

Name: A4822
Content: Great quality t shirts with our company logo Shirts were delivered on time and exactly as requested Very happy with our purchase

Name: A4823
Content: Great Customer Service I sent the wrong graphic and they were able to help me and get the order out on time Tees looked great

Name: A4824
Content: Easy and fun to design on their website with options I wouldnt normally have  printed and shipped FAST Great quality printing and sizing when items received Will definitely use again

Name: A4825
Content: Rush order Tees did a great job with a custom Tee shirt I sold out within 6 hours and had to make a second order I highly recommend the firm

Name: A4826
Content: I had another company delay my order at the last minute We truly had to RUSH the order Rush Order Tees worked incredibly swiftly and professionally to get my T shirts to me on time Thanks so much

Name: A4827
Content: Rush Order Tees was professional  friendly  timely in fact my order arrived earlier than expected  and produced a great quality product for a fair price I will definitely use Rush Order Tees again in the future

Name: A4828
Content: We loved our new tshirts from Rush Order  they came out so great and fast as well I am going to put in another order  they were so great

Name: A4829
Content: Such a great company to order from Their pricing is fair and their customer service is the best Ive received in a long time The quality of their materials and designs are awesome as well Highly Recommend

Name: A4830
Content: Great customer service From online platform to arrival of product Rush Order Tees made the process easy From placing order to receiving it was as stated and on time The t shirts we ordered were perfect Will definitely use again

Name: A4831
Content: From beginning to end I felt like I was their most important customer We are a small business with a small order but you wouldnt know that from the service we received They were friendly  polite and expedient We will give them all of our business from now on

Name: A4832
Content: Great experience This is the first time I have ever used a service like this and they made it so easy Everything was done to the correct specifications and delivered on time I will definitely use Rush Order Tees Again

Name: A4833
Content: Absolutely wonderful experience The price and quality were great  the staff was so helpful and attentive in making our designs  and we got our shirts even quicker than expected Are going to use them for our annual charity walk every year from now on

Name: A4834
Content: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING The purchasing process was easy  the shirts arrived earlier that expected This is my 2nd time purchasing from Tush Order Tees and I will certainly use them again

Name: A4835
Content: On time and as designed We needed shirts for our event last minute because another company couldnt make it happen but rush order ts came through for us The shirts look great and very professional service from beginning to end

Name: A4836
Content: Hopefully the shirt is as good as the customer service to haha

Name: A4837
Content:
I was quite impressed with the website and the prices are not horrific  I like the free shipping And excited I can order through what seems like an American company But yesterday I emailed some questions after hours  got an automated reply from Nathan  thinking that he would contact me today after I replied to that auto last night No reply I called today  I was on the phone with Francis and as he was rushing me off the phone  You can tell he didnt want to be on the phone with me  apparently I was assigned to him when he said he was going to send some pics of my request I thought it was coming and I was sitting there at my computer  2 hours later I called I need this asap and 3 hours later no one answering Still waiting for the pics When I called the third time I got the answering service I guess they dont want my business You dropped the ball on this one fellas Thanks

 Update 2/22/19
I updated this review as they made it right  more than right and I will continue using them

Name: A4838
Content: Very responsive and helpful customer service from Luke L

Name: A4839
Content: Very satisfied with the work of Rush Order Tees We love our new business t shirts and will be placing future orders

Name: A4840
Content: The t shirts were a hit The online creation tools were wonderful I love how it shows you when you are moving out of the printable area The shirts were exactly as pictured To make it all better  delivery came early We came back for a second batch Thank you

Name: A4841
Content: I needed 8 t shirts printed with a custom design and I needed them in a short amount of time Rush Order Tees delivered on the day they said they would and the shirts looked great We were very happy with the turnaround time  quality  and communication throughout the process We will definitely order from this company again

Name: A4842
Content: They were great to work with  and the product they delivered  Polos with front embroidery  was exceptionally good The order shipped ahead of schedule I would highly recommend them to everyone

Name: A4843
Content: My company needed shirts made very quickly Rush Order Tees team responded very quickly to my questions and their design team couldnt have moved more quickly than they did The shirts came in and they looked fantastic The whole process was very fast and easy and end product was perfect

Name: A4844
Content: For the 5th year in a row  we have found RushOrder Tees to be outstanding Our order  submitted late  arrived today  a week ahead of time Every phase of the ordering process is flawless  starting with Kolleen Ryan and all of the others down the line And we love the uniforms

Name: A4845
Content: The artwork is amazing  true to color and print The quality of the shirts were excellent and sized correctly This was my 2nd order from this company They know their stuff Website was definitely user friendly when designing shirt Picture on shirt was uploaded from a website and I copied it The shirt looks amazing

Name: A4846
Content: delivery on time/great product/had a small issue resolved immediately will definitely recommend and use again

Name: A4847
Content: Perfect Shirts showed up on time  in 2 days They even inverted the colors of our logo properly which I was worried about Reasonable pricing for a small order 4 t shirts  Big win with this company

Name: A4848
Content: I ordered a small batch of custom t shirts for a music festival that our family attended I was having a hard time adding one of the shirts that was showing available in the color I wanted but for some reason it wouldnt let me add it to my cart I chatted with someone from customer service and he not only got the shirt I needed but he also created a order with all of the items I wanted and then I just had to approve it and pay for it It was so easy The entire process was easy and they have so many different items available with no minimums that it allows everyone to choose the ones they want They delivered in plenty of time so there was no stress about whether or not they would be on time From start to finish the entire transaction was perfect And the shirts looked amazing Everyone at the festival was asking where we bought them   Highly recommend Will use again for sure

Name: A4849
Content: We ordered celebratory shirts for our first year in business The kind personal note written on the box made our day when we received them The shirts were perfect quality  print  design  and delivery Weve even ordered our SECOND dozen of shirts due to the satisfactory of order  1 Thank you so much We look forward to using you again in the future

Name: A4850
Content: Had a tee that washed the print off and they replaced it immediately Only 1 of the batch did this so the tees were quality Great customer service

Name: A4851
Content: This company was amazing They helped me to complete an order that another company had filled wrong and was unable to fix in time for an event Their customer service was fantastic and they were there to answer questions every step of the way I will be using this company for my needs in the future Thank you

Name: A4852
Content: Always professional and on point always looking out for the customer

Name: A4853
Content: This place was amazing We decided we needed shirts at the last minute for a charity volleyball game Rush Order Tees came through big time They helped with the design  answered all questions  and shirts were received on time for the event They were great to work with  would highly recommend

Name: A4854
Content: Quality products Plenty options for designing Helpful customer service Everything was great  the only thing is they are a little more expensive then other sites  but it doesnt keep me from ordering from them again

Name: A4855
Content: I had a great experience with Rush Order Tees Their team caught a mistake that I had made on my design and helped me to get it fixed promptly and the shirts still arrived ahead of the designated date and looked great

Name: A4856
Content: I ordered 3 zipup hoodies for my boyfriends new shop I got them and they were all blurry  I emailed them and told them and they immediately replaced my hoodies and they look absolutely perfect now Thank you guys so much

Name: A4857
Content: Tees came on time and looked great What I loved most is how easy and user friendly their website was From ordering to delivery everything was perfect Well done RushOrderTees

Name: A4858
Content: I ordered t shirts for all of my staff Everyone is very happy with the quality and looks of the shirts I will order again

Name: A4859
Content: Awesome site I used them first time and was very skeptical ordering on line But T shirts came out amazing I would suggest this company to anyone And I will definitely will use them again

Name: A4860
Content: Absolutely perfect The t shirts were exactly what we wanted  were delivered on time  and we managed to work through a minor issue together I will definitely order from them again

Name: A4861
Content: Super fast shipping and top quality shirts Great customer service  Super satisfied with these guys Will 100 be doing business again

Name: A4862
Content: Always love their work Very quick to get your proof back to you Had a shipping issue this time no fault of theirs and they addressed it quickly Thank you

Name: A4863
Content: I just have to say I am very pleased with Rush Order Tees There was a glitch when I first made my order and they called me and told me what it was with some options We worked it out They went the extra mile to satisfy this customer when they didnt have to do it

Name: A4864
Content: I feel this company is a great  helpful  and professional one Ive used them a few times now in regards to a Volleyball League I run in the summer and winter Theyve helped me with my order  getting it right and in the budget I needed  and a quality I was hoping for Their team works hard and is prompt in getting back to you  which everyone will agree  is very important Especially when time is of the essence Big thanks to my account Rep Mrs Jessica Moss She really came through and helped coordinate everything I plan to use them again in the near future I suggest to all seeking Ts and more + to USE THEM THEY ARE REALLY GOOD Thats my 2 cents anyhow Sammy Ciccolella  Farmingdale  NY

Name: A4865
Content: Poor quality 10 T shirts and 2 hoodies for  300+ Dollars  and so far washer has really beaten up our logo Most likely wouldnt use RushOrderTees again

Name: A4866
Content: High quality shirts Easy to use website Like that there is help with designing and placement if needed Quick delivery and as promised on time delivery Very pleasant people to talk with and work with No complaints

Name: A4867
Content: Amazing customer service and great quality product

Name: A4868
Content: Hands down the best customer service experience I have had in a long time Great follow through and on time Will definitely order from them again Thanks Rush order tees

Name: A4869
Content: These guys are total pros Their design team worked with me every step of the way to make sure the final product completely coincided with my vision I was amazed at their quick response time and willingness to follow up after the job was done to make sure everything was done right

Name: A4870
Content: Great all around experience Very happy with the products i purchased Well definitely be ordering from Rush Order Tees again

Name: A4871
Content: Within 2 days of approving the artwork I received my order extremely quickly Have ordered from them multiple times and have always been so helpful

Name: A4872
Content: I placed a large order The design selections were awesome and easy to create  the customer service was excellent  and my order arrived in plenty of time I highly recommend and will definitely use Rush Order Tees again

Name: A4873
Content: They mean it Short version I was desperately short on time Rush Order Tees said no problem we can get your order there they did and it was EXACTLY what I ordered Wont even look anywhere else  you can choose from a variety of prices and quality to suit your budget  great customer service  easy to use website Thank you

Name: A4874
Content:
For years weve focused on supporting local businesses for our T Shirt needs When one of them stopped providing quality customer service  and another couldnt print more than 6 colors  we had to look elsewhere Despite being a techy and quite comfortable ordering most things online  I was hesitant to go this route for our yearly event If the shirts didnt turn out well  there would be no time to correct it 

I was not disappointed The folks at Rush Order Tees offered as much help as we needed with questions leading up to our order They made it easy to order and the quality of the shirts and printing was excellent We will be back

Name: A4875
Content: Me and my sister ordered T shirts for a family event and they were the hit of the event Our family couldnt believe we designed and got the shirts printed  they kept asking what store we bought them at The quality of the T shirts are great too Ill definitely be using rushordertees again

Name: A4876
Content:
Awesome Customer Service They were quick and work was great
I will be ordering from Rush Tees again

Name: A4877
