Content: Just love the online design application Quality  fast service that delivers on what is promised Ive placed three different orders with RushOrder Tees and will continue to do so

Content: Its in the name Fast services for sure and quality  eco friendly materials masterful art department

Name: A4879
Content: Luke was on on it like butter on toast Quick and friendly

Name: A4880
Content: Everyone was willing to work with me via email and over the phone They had great customer service and  even though there was a glitch in my order  they fixed it beyond my expectations I am a very satisfied customer

Content: Very easy to use website  friendly staff and expedited orders I am quite pleased with my experience with Rush Order Tees  will likely use them again for next shirt order

Name: A4883
Content: The design looked great but the shirts were delivered with spots on them ??? We had to wash for presentation and they abruptly shrunk at least one full size Not impressed with the quality and fabric

Name: A4884
Content: By far the worst experience you can have Their name is exactly what you get  a rushed order The quality is by far the worst weve ever got We dealt with a rep Maurice there who not only got the order wrong  has yet to reply when I ask about missing and wrong items Will NEVER use this company again WAY Overpriced and very poor quality Highly suggest you look to do your business elsewhere if you need quality

Name: A4885
Content:
These guys are awesome Justin worked with me from beginning to end  always answering emails or phone calls promptly  thats called CUSTOMER SERVICE Thanks Justin Everyone ;loved the tee shirts too 
Ill be back

Name: A4886
Content: Perfect and quick Im officially a fan Design was printed as submitted  the shirt quality exceeded expectation and delivery was just as quick as promised

Name: A4887
Content: Great shirt quality Getting the proof for my approval didnt come until the day before I was supposed to receive the shirts  so that was a bit disconcerting  and the design on the shirt is really thick and plasticky  which i wasnt expecting Not sure how they might let us know about that On the plus side  if kids drop food on the shirt it will slide right off Overall  pretty awesome job Thank you

Name: A4888
Content: Id like to Personally Thank  Alyssa Seiders and Gigi Fleurentin   from the Rush Order Tees Team For the Excellent Customer Service and Care These two took a slight misunderstanding and effortlessly took quick action to get me a Order Right out in 7 days for my customers Excellent quality as seen on website Sharp Vinyl Prints  Colors  and materials All delivered in a slick looking box Hats off to Yas Rush Order Tees has all D B Constructions future printing We look forward to doing business with your company for years to come Stay Safe and Healthy Thank You Kindly

Name: A4889
Content: Great experience They helped us work copyright issues and still get a design we wanted Very competitive price and surprisingly fast shipping Definitely recommend

Name: A4890
Content: My order got delayed  and the fine team at Rush Order Tees reprinted and overnighted my order to another city so I could have them for a work event  shirts were great too

Name: A4891
Content: Had to pick up an order from a friend  and was grateful to get tailored help from the ROT team Had one instance of gratuitous re entering information  but that was remedied by another support staff  and everything showed up exactly as expected  and on time Great service

Name: A4892
Content: My T shirts came out perfect Rush order Ts sent me a digital version for me to approve prior to ordering and had fast delivery Thank you

Name: A4893
Content: The old adage is that if you want it Fast  Cheap and Good  that you have to pick TWO With Rush Order Tees  we have gotten all THREE From the simple to the complex  the results have been terrific Great customer service  as well

Name: A4894
Content: I decided one week before that it would be fun to have t shirts for a family gathering I searched several sites and landed on Rush Order Tees I had lots of fun creating the design and the process couldnt have been more simple and direct I received a proof within hours The shirts arrived when the company said they would  they were great quality  and my family loved them

Name: A4895
Content: This is my 2nd time to order from Rush Order Tees and I have amazing experiences both times Their customer service is fantastic and also their products are exactly what we wanted/needed Their turnaround time is phenomenal and I will for sure be ordering from them again

Name: A4896
Content: I was not pleased with the service that I received On my initial call the rep was short and rushed when answering my questions about the size  fit  and quality of the t shirt After designing my shirt before placing my order I called

Name: A4897
Content: Very professional and the printing is perfect Minor issue zipper color and hood string color resolved overnight THANK YOU Ordering more today

Name: A4898
Content: Wow Amazing customer service We had a little mishap with the order and they went up and beyond resolving it Will definitely do business with them again Absolutely amazing company

Name: A4899
Content: If I couldve given RushOrderTees a 0 star review I would have They are by far the worst company I have used to order t shirts The color t shirt they sent me was completely wrong and they refuse to make it right The customer service has been god awful as well Absolutely DO NOT recommend this company

Name: A4900
Content: Simply the best Skip the rest Customer service and quality cannot be beat I have used several other screen printers  local and from the web  Rush Order Tees has the best quality  quick delivery and unbeatable customer service I will choose them EVERY time

Content: The shirts are a little pricey for small quantities  but thats to be expected Great job and arrived just as they said they would Would definitely recommend

Content: I had the pleasure of doing business with Rush Order Tees and my experience was great Their prices were VERY competitive  the customer service was excellent  and the quality of the print and garment was awesome I can tell that the staff at Rush Order Tees is passionate and caring Your order will arrive in time and nicely packaged

Name: A4904
Content: The website was really easy to use The shirts came out looking terrific Turn around time was super quick Pricing was very competitive Id definitely use them again

Name: A4905
Content: My shirts were perfect They were able to get them to me in a hurry when another vendor failed us Prices were reasonable and the shirts were a good quality even at an affordable price

Name: A4906
Content: Quick and easy along with a great product They walked me through the process and ensured a quick delivery We couldnt have been more pleased We will definitely use them again in the future

Content: The coloring is great The service from Thomas was fantastic Only reason 4 not 5 star is I thought they were Hanes shirts not Teezes Will defiantly reorder but would like the Hanes shirts

Name: A4908
Content: Needed a small number of t shirts made on extremely short notice for a bachelor party Design system was easy to use  plenty of options  service staff was prompt and always available if needed  and the shirts came exactly when they said they would Could not have had a better experience Kudos on the excellent service model

Name: A4909
Content: Order all our team apparel from Rush Order Tees Each time has been extremely quick  easy with the products being delivered on time and exactly as expected Very happy with the service

Content: Its alway a pleasure working with this company Geraldine was the customer service rep I recently spoke with she got me a great deal I will continue to use them for our pizzeria work shirts

Name: A4911
Content: Good quality shirts Arrived quickly Great customer service Used the chat feature and received an additional discount I would definitely use again

Name: A4912
Content: Excellent They had the option to take my design and made it to where the white parts that werent colored in were clear or transparent  which made it perfect not like some sticker iron on Very happy with my order

Name: A4913
Content: They delivered on time The product and work is quality The price was great Customer service awesome they helped amend my order without any hesitation

Name: A4914
Content: Just got my t shirts today I absolutely love them I would recommend this company to anyone that needs custom work done

Name: A4915
Content: First of all the customer service gets their own 5 star review I cant tell you how patient and accommodating with me The price on the shirts kept messing up and they fixed it for me every time They helped me with the design and the website was user friendly My agency will be using this site again I will post pictures of the shirts tomorrow

Name: A4916
Content: Excellent site and service Luke L was super helpful

Name: A4917
Content: I love how the sweatshirts turned out They were exactly as I had requested and imagined They are a part of a reveal for this Christmas so I dont know how the fit or wear is but I am very happy initially

Name: A4918
Content: I had a small order of shirts made for a cast of a show and they came out beautifully The whole process was easy to do  from designing to ordering I was a little nervous when it was the day before my guaranteed delivery date and I still hadnt received a proof  but that happened later in the day and the next day I had my shirts the quality of the shirt is great and the print is bright I will definitely recommend this company to other groups in my school and will use them again for my show next year

Name: A4919
Content: Excellent  prompt service  very responsive to a proof tweak Beautiful shirts delivered on time with a great budget the turn was super quick

Name: A4920
Content: There was an error with my order and Alyssa and her customer care team promptly fixed the issue and made everything right They definitely STAND BEHIND THEIR PRODUCTS

Name: A4921
Content: Absolutely will use them again Way better than CustomInk They have so many more options and their website makes it easier to design so you can make EXACTLY what you want They have real people ready and willing to help you in the design process so no mistakes are made The quality of the shirt  the printed ink  and the final coloring are all superb The price is amazing  too No negatives to say

Name: A4922
Content: Delighted Speed and quality were as advertised Moreover  when I raised a minor issue  there were no arguments  no questions Very professional and easy to deal with Will definitely use them for the next batch   Alex

Name: A4923
Content: I have used Rushorder several times twice i had errors  both times it was corrected immediatly th his is why I will continue to work with them because they are quick and corrective

Name: A4924
Content: Beware of buying anything cropped I ordered a large to account for the cropped sweatshirts I ordered since I didnt want them super cropped When they came I actually laughed at how silly they looked I reached out to customer support and am ordering more in a different style at a discounted cost  but they didnt agree how different I felt my sweatshirts fit from model pictured I added my pictures here for you to judge for yourself ordered a large  55 130lbs  Giving them 3 stars for their prompt responses to designs and issues Shipping was also quick  literally 1 day from when I approved the design I got the sweatshirts I would stick to company/event ts if you are ordering from here  that is the only reason i would use them again

Name: A4925
Content: Unbelievable people to work with and they are meticulous in their work Their tees are a name brand and durable My experience and t shirts from them were an A++++ dont hesitate

Name: A4926
Content: Website was easy to navigate Quality of the default T Shirt was high It was not one of those cheap thin t shirts This was my first order and I was very satisfied

Name: A4927
Content: One shirt had a slightly uneven graphic They replaced the order right away Great customer service

Name: A4928
Content: We needed custom shirts for an event and of course  we waited until the last minute to order  Rush Order Tees did an excellent job with our order and it was delivered when promised We got a ton of compliments on our shirts  too Would use again

Name: A4929
Content: Excellent service  great quality Ive used them three times and have never been disappointed with the experience My go to folks for all my printing needs whether its regular time or rush order

Name: A4930
Content:
I wanted 6 aprons for our synagogue kitchen and I chose a custom message Ordering was easy and the prices were excellent compared to other vendors The turnaround was great and I really like the quality of the apron material and the adjustable sizing with the neck and waist string all in one piece I love that I was given the opportunity to approve my design before it was printed And I was able to make an edit to the order when I checked the proof 

The only negative  and its minor  was that I asked for the text to be larger than the proof and I was told the text was at its maximum size  which should have been bigger The text size really was still too small  but its acceptable Overall  Im really happy with my purchase

Name: A4931
Content: First time ordering from Rush Order Tees Communication was great when it came to changes that need to be done with my order I placed a small order and they came out just how I wanted them I will be ordering again very soon

Name: A4932
Content: They were on top of everything  helped me make sure my design would work  adding in toddler sizes  answering emails and getting my order on time for our family reunion I will definitely use these guys again

Name: A4933
Content: I needed shirts for my committee for a conference where we putting together I wanted something that would stand out so our attendees could easily recognize the committee for help and questions I designed our shirts online and then Rush Order tweaked it and it was perfect EXACTLY what I was envisioning The fit was true to size and the colors were vibrant LOVE it The pricing was very competitive; actually lower than most and they were shipped out within a week of my ordering I cant wait to show them off at the Conference

Name: A4934
Content: This was our first order with them  we needed embroidered shirts for a new regional sales rep that would only be in the office for a few days My existing companies dont do RUSH Rush Order Tees staff were really fast and responsive  the quality of the long sleeved and polo work shirts were great and we had them in time for his visit Great customer service

Name: A4935
Content: They were speedy  thorough  and contacted me immediately when an issue arose I couldnt have asked for better customer service and the products look great for our conference coming up in July

Name: A4936
Content: Great service Nice shirts Shipped orders same day for next day delivery

Name: A4937
Content: Great service  very helpful staff answered all my questions  gave some suggestions and made the whole process very easy Will definitely order more from them

Name: A4938
Content:
Loved our shirts
The shirts we ordered for our event look great They dont seem to shrink or fade Sizes are as expected The price was a similar to or less than other companies Im glad we choose Rush Order Tees They were great to work with to get the right art for what we wanted front and back The shirts are comfortable I especially love that they are tagless

Name: A4939
Content: I last minute had to order 35 shirts and get it to me in 2 days Basically impossible  but they did it The American apparel tees are wonderful quality  and so is the screen printing

Name: A4940
Content: We used Rush Order Tees for T Shirts for an important family event  they were super responsive  high quality work and delivered on time Would definitely use again

Name: A4941
Content: Ordered custom shirts for our family with our ranch brand and name I received exactly what I ordered in a timely manner They save your custom order  so if I decide I want more later  I can easily reorder Will definitely use them for any future custom order

Name: A4942
Content: Great help designing my shirts for a convention Wonderful tracking service It was less than 2 weeks from design to having the shirts to give away

Name: A4943
Content: I had an issue with the difference between the proof and the product RushOrder responded immediately with a solution to make it right

Name: A4944
Content: Needed team shirts in a hurry and they got them made and to me before I needed them Good quality screen printing

Name: A4945
Content: Could not be happier  the design came out great and the quality of the T shirt is very good Our team loves them Thanks for the quick turn around and the great communication

Name: A4946
Content: Extremely disappointed with this company  particularly with the service First my order was late  then when it finally arrived  I had to drive 2 hours back just to pick it up so that I could get it to the event  and to make matters worse  my order was wrong Ive left multiple messages during the past week  and no one has had the courtesy to reply back Not a great way to run a business

Name: A4947

Content:
Lets start with delivery  it was 2 days late but I still think it was quick turnaround So great job

Quality mostly I would say the quality was great & The print was perfect except the runoff of extra threads in the middle of the vneck t shirt They were meant to give away and one of my clients asked if they could get one with out this issue they all had the same issue 

Return asked if I could exchange the shirts for ones that didnt have this issue They said they couldnt but would reimburse me for the delivery  I was very disappointed in that But that will cover the tailor costs for repair 

Disappointed but I found my solution I dont think I could order bulk

Content: I ordered t shirts for my grandchildren and myself Most impressive was the number of choices I had regarding design  colors  brands of shirts  etc I used 2 photographs  clip art and text The sizes and styles of t shirts varied  as did the brands Yet  the color of the shirts matched perfectly During the ordering process I contacted customer service I could not have been more pleased with the help and support I received There were two more opportunities for me to check my order before it was filled  so there were absolutely no errors or surprises The final products reached me at the pre stated time in perfect condition These are the best matching shirts I have ever received They are waiting for Mimi Camp time this summer  so I dont yet have pictures of us wearing them Thank you for an outstanding experience

Name: A5025
Content: I really enjoyed my experience shopping with and purchasing tees through ROT I needed personalized Tshirts for my familys reunion What I really liked about the sight was the ease with personalizing your own design A few clicks  rotations  and color changes I had the exact shirt I envisioned Further  I appreciated the sizing options for children  youth  and oversized tees Finally and in my opinion  the best part the price I was not in a rush to receive these tees Because I choose the delayed option  this reduced the price of my entire shipment I was pleased to have purchased personalized shirts for my entire family for less than  10 per shirt If I need a shirt in the future  I will be shopping with them

Name: A5026
Content: We had a great experience making t shirts for our business and race team Immediately after placing our order someone contacted us letting me know that we were potentially over charged a user error on my part they promptly corrected the error and got started on making a sample After sending us the sample to review we made a slight change and they were prompt about this as well The next sample was perfect They emailed asking if it was possible to extend our delivery out by one day totally understandable because we had asked them to make changes and our original order had a small hiccup  We needed them from an out of town race and they were so accommodating Despite the fact that we made all these adjustments they were still willing to stick to the original promised delivery date While attending that race many of our race competitors were inquiring about where we purchased our shirts from and what the cost was per unit After comparing with many different teams we were the most affordable for the shirt type and screen printing service Everyone was so professional and kind we will be putting in our second order soon

Content: Inconsiderate staff who chose to block an EV charging station when there were plenty of open regular parking spots nearby

Content: I had to source 14 t shirts two designs  seven shirts of each for a client in Raleigh  North Carolina for an event in San Jose  California with four days from ordering to delivery Rush Order Tees hit it out of the park From the moment I spoke with their rep online  to the time I was proofing the designs and getting these shirts in my clients hands  I was met with nothing but professionalism  enthusiasm and customer care They took care of everything  and my clients were absolutely thrilled with the direct to garment printing quality and quick turn around These guys guaranteed that they could fulfill this order in the timeframe required  something that other companies like Printful couldnt do Sorry printful  Rush Order Tees just got one up on you Thanks Bria and Jessica for an outstanding job

Content: Good selection and great prices I like that they offer lots of different colours  just wish they had more ladies tshirt options/sizes  mainly even just black ladies tshirts I could only find 2 XL and 1 large black ladies tshirts But wide selection for unisex shirts Also different options for sweaters here as well Their printing services seem fairly reasonable priced  especially if you order over 12 shirts I believe the price is better then

Name: A5374
Content:
Im a coordinator for a company located across Canada With last minute touches to add to the event  one of them that was time sensitive I had to order T Shirts for the attendants 

I spoke with an associate at Tees N More and they were more than willing to help with my order They assured me they would be able to help me any way they could  even with a tight print schedule I have never been so amazed  their courteous attitude  fantastic customer service  and superb quality shirts made such an impact The T Shirts purchased  were given such great feedback at the event  I couldnt have been more pleased to know that the quality exceeded my expectations 

I assure you  in this industry  its comforting to know that they were exactly what I was looking for I highly recommend you work with this company for any printing needs  and I plan on working with them in the near future Thank you Tees N More for excellent quality and service

Name: A5375
Content: I recently purchased 100 t shirts from this company for my business From start to finish this company was amazing Shoutout to Manjit who was extremely helpful during the whole process and went out of her way to keep in touch with me  create and send me examples of designs  send price quotes  etc I picked up my shirts today and they look great

Name: A5376
Content: My fiance and I ordered over twenty shirts for our stag and doe and at first I was very pleased with the service  even though I personally thought the prices were a little steep However  the day of our stag and doe we found out that one

Name: A5377
Content:
I have had too many bad experiences with horrible customer service with this t shirt company Certain things you would expect a professional to know and show in their work are foreign concepts for them 

This tshirt company knows nothing about customer service and dealing with a customer And even at the least using common sense is not something common with this company I only came here because its hard to find a tshirt company in Hamilton I dealt with madjit not sure what her position is in the company  but her body language is like you are bothering her  her tone  her facial expressions to question The last order I did I sent a design and a mock up and they printed the design with the traced line on it When they sent it to me for approval because it was transparent I could see the trace line but you would think out of experience for printing shirts they wouldnt print a design on a shirt with dashes around the font but of course they did and when I called about it I got an angry woman yelling back at me smh

Name: A5378
Content: Horrible face to face customer service Wow  I thought maybe it was me  but after seeing multiple negative customer service experiences  weve decided to take our business elsewhere I walked in to Tees n More for a quote Were a

Name: A5379
Content: Just dropped off a very last minute order as the previous printing company was not making any progress and I was running out of time I came in frassled near closing and the lady at the counter did a full mock up for me  worked with my logos  checked all the sizes Im surprised to see these comments about bad customer service The first thing I did when I left was call my wife and rave about how they took care of me and how relieved I was The price for printing was significantly less than where I was at first

Name: A5380
Content: Horrible experience with this company and HORRIBLE customer service Ordered shirts for a school club and the process was difficult and long I had outlined every detail to the person taking my order and she had difficulty understanding my order When I picked up and reviewed my order at home  I realized I didnt receive anything in the correct sizing and color When I called to discuss my order and why this happened  I didnt receive a single apology and got a very brief answer and was told they will be re done This was a huge inconvenience for me as I live very far away from the location and had to go back to get the order AGAIN They were very inconsiderate and clearly didnt care about my service I will NOT be using this company again  and for any student clubs at McMaster considering TeesNmore  DONT use them

Name: A5381
Content: So I had called ahead asking about the price there was miss communication and I had heard 25  for 2 t shirts the most basic they had and I just wanted some basic text the shirts would have been 10  each at retail price approximately So I get there and the total came to 56 50 for 2 basic t shirts The quality was fine I did not pay attention to the price cause I was in a rush So I come back 10 minutes later and explain to her that I miss heard and was in a rush and did not pay attention to the price  she did inform me that they do not do refunds for custom tees then I said well Im not taking these if they are 56  So she gave me the refund with some serious attitude even though I had apologized multiple times and tried to be nice about She told me that I wasted her time even though mine was just as wasted  and she wasnt doing much to begin with  And the while refunding boldly said I cant believe this in front of me i did not speak out or act rude and even apologized once more I was very displeased with the customer satisfaction and the way she spoke to me i work with customer service and I am a manager at my store I have never nor would ever talk or treat a customer the way she spoke to me

Name: A5382
Content: Not impressed with the level of customer service at all Woman was rude and seemed annoyed at questions being asked Wanted to verify style of print to make sure a previous experience with another company did not repeat itself  and could not be given a straight answer I only wanted to make sure the print quality and options were what I was looking for  being representation of my business and staff I own a service and retail company and would never speak with a potential customer this way

Name: A5383
Content: I picked up my shirts today and they look great

Name: A5384
Content: THE WORST customer service I have EVER encountered by a business The gentlemen I dealt with was OM Dass  I gave him the benefit of the doubt  brushing off his rudeness both over the phone and in person etc He was not helpful whatsoever and makes you feel as if you are an idiot for not understanding the print language Over the phone I had tried to discuss the details of the shirts which he did not read any of the information I had sent over and he was rude  talking over me and ended up hanging up on me when I told him he had bad customer service I have never been one to write a bad review  it takes a lot for me to do so but I have never experienced anything like this

Name: A5385
Content: Great place to pick up just plain t shirts  sweaters  and sweatpants Very fair prices Colours and sizes vary  can find some interesting things in the back shelves of the store as well random homewares socks  etc  It is surprisingly hard to find gilden sweatshirts  so thankfully this place exists

Name: A5386
Content:
Absolutely THE WORST customer service I have EVER encountered I gave him the benefit of the doubt  brushing off his initial face to face rudeness as maybe hes having a bad day I phoned back a week later ready to process our order  didnt happen He had written no relative info down  despite being handed a typed useless quote Long story short  what I think is the business owner ended up hanging up on me and telling me to go somewhere else

Horrible HORRIBLE Business I support local businesses all the way but do not go to this one

Name: A5387
Content: Many thanks  Om Dass This is my second order for our hockey association and were thrilled Great communication  great service  great quality  prompt even early deliveries We couldnt be happier and well definitely be back

Name: A5388
Content:
My first experience with this business brought me back for more when my husband was diagnosed with colorectal cancer 2012 I wanted to make him T shirts with  I CANCERvive printed on high quality shirts He is still wearing these shirts every time we go to Juravinski and everyone loves them Not only it inspired lot of cancer patients but the quality of these shirts stayed the same the printing never faded off and the colors stayed the same which is so rare nowadays when you buy any shirts out
I definitely recommend it to everyone I know

Name: A5389
Content: Words just cant thoroughly describe the poor attitude being shown by the gentleman you give your orders to Rude  short  abrupt and ignorant even reading this wont prepare you for the nastiness youll witness Its almost worth going in to get a quote so you can see what horrid customer service some places are capable of Youre made to feel like youre interrupting his day by being in the store

Name: A5390
Content: Thanks for always being available and able to bring our ideas to life You guys are amazing

Content: My experience with Tees n More has always been grade A satisfaction Ive watched them grow over the years & learn a lot about them  when I had an issue with my order they were willing to go the extra mile Hats off and Koodos 2 teesnmore

Name: A5392
Content: We use Tees N More for all our uniform needs because they are nimble and responsive From graphics assistance on designs for small single team orders  screen printing hundreds of camp tees to designing custom kits for toddlers the team is always helpful  efficient and delivers as promised

Name: A5412
Content: From beginning to end  I was so impressed with Thatshirt The customer service was top notch Their professional expertise really made me feel comfortable through the entire design process Thatshirt assisted me in customizing shirts for my entire team The quality of the shirts and attention to detail was amazing I definitely recommend Thatshirt

Content: Easy order process  received my shirts well before the latest stated delivery date Will be ordering more again soon for sure

Name: A5414
Content: We have done two large orders of merchandise for The Record Player We have been impressed with the variety offered and the quality of the merchandise that has been sent to us The customer service has been great In particular  David has followed up to ensure that we have received what we ordered and were satisfied with the products We will continue to do orders moving forward as the quality  pricing and customer service are excellent

These guys are awesome I ordered my sweaters on a monday and recieved them Friday monday 4 days via ups overall my experience with this company was excellent customer service was great and replied within a timely manner Keep up the great work 
Dan

I ordered shirts that were supposed to be here in time for my event but now apparently they wont be showing up until over a week later than the original delivery date 

Ill update if I ever get ahold of somebody

Great quality

Name: A5420
Content: Have used ThatShirt on multiple orders and have been very pleased The designs I upload are usually done on my iPad Procreate App and the quality and colours have been very vibrant and consistent They have an excellent selection of quality apparel to choose from in a wide range of colours Shipping has been reliable to my site estimated delivery dates  or usually a couple days early I will continue to use ThatShirt

Name: A5421
Content: Listed free shipping in my area  but charged me over  15 for shipping Never responded to my email about it Delivery was not attempted  either buzzing me or leaving it with my concierge Had to go pick up my order I paid  15 for delivery and had to pick up my order

Name: A5422
Content: purchased a few times now sometimes they come really fast other times it is when the order says it would come

Name: A5423
Content: Order arrived more than 2 months after it was placed  and I only ordered 6 things Not a huge amount With no communication for a month about status updates I called a few times sometimes no answer sometimes voicemail eventually I got a hold of somebody who checked my order and never got back to me So I called them back about 3 weeks later When my order arrived it was the wrong brand  wrong colour If youre just going to pick what is closest in stock Whats the point of me taking time to pick from all the stuff on the website The sweaters that did arrive are still nice nonetheless not what I ordered

Name: A5424
Content: Purchased 32 shirts  the quality is excellent Recommending to friends

Name: A5425
Content: Great quality shirt will buy again  Great price definitely worth the money

Name: A5426
Content:
June 21 Disappointing service I have emailed several times to contact someone regarding the status of my order and never received a response I am aware of some delays due to COVID however it is going on a week past the estimated delivery date and the order is still being assembled With  1000+ locked into this order  it is frustrating and difficult to take my money elsewhere with nothing to show for it to sell Will update this review once my items have arrived regarding the quality of products 

Update July 14 After writing the initial review I was contacted that night to address the status of my order I had wonderful communication for about a week with David and received the products the day after they were sent The printing was well done  the designs turned out just how I wanted them There were several designs that I was missing sizes in  or received two of another size instead Some had marks  which i understand will come out once washed but explaining that to customers or having to wash items before selling them is a bit inconvenient I have had barely any communication in the past two weeks now regarding whether I can expect replacements or a refund Quality products but disappointing service

Name: A5427
Content: Got my SO a gift  came a bit late but its very nice

Name: A5428
Content: Always a pleasure ordering from that shirt Quality is always great and anytime I have a difficult print they do a amazing job I also use them for promotional shirts for my business and they have fast turn around times  and very competitive pricing Thanks as always keep up the great work

Name: A5429
Content: The hoodies came out amazing Thank you very much

Name: A5430
Content:
Awful 
Ordered a zip up hoodie and they didnt ship it over a month after the order date and they sent the wrong item  a small childs regular hoodie instead of an adult zip up hoodie 

Ive also tried reaching out to them twice but they ignored both emails 
Currently in process of canceling the payment through visa 

Would give 0/5 if possible Its an absolute scam of a company

Name: A5432
Content:
Have made two orders now and both times there has been an issue with my order Both times one of the items was sent in the wrong colour not even close 
They have horrible customer service and do not reply to emails I have tried multiple times to get ahold of them by phone but with no luck I also ordered the same brand and type of sweater each time but the second time they sent different ones  not sure whats up with that

Name: A5433
Content: Excellent customer service I placed my order and spoke to Dave as I was very right with timing  he expedited the order and got it shipped a week early The quality of the shirts was amazing and the price was so reasonable Would highly recommend

Name: A5434
Content: Ive ordered a few different times in small batch and larger quanity The quality is fantastic and ive been happy with all aspects of their buisness I highly recommend using this company

Name: A5435
Content: I am very frustrated by the costumer service I have attempted several times to contact the company to check on a  200 order my son placed for his school project and havent heard back

Name: A5436
Content: The quality of the sweaters were excellent No complaints there My only issue is the customer service I placed an order at the end of April and my order was shipped to me i believe in 2 weeks Most of the items were correct however two shirts i ordered were incorrect size It took 3 weeks for them to contact me after sending multiple emails and phone calls which they never answer  They responded by email saying they were shipping me the items i need on May 20 It is now June 11 and i have not received the sweaters I have emailed and made multiple calls once again with no reply Moral of the story i placed an order 1 5 months ago and STILL have not received all the items take caution when ordering from this company

Name: A5437
Content: I ordered some hoodies they sent me my hoodies I wear the hoodies I like my hoodies

Name: A5438
Content:
Terrible customer service  I ordered a custom hoodie size S for men because they didnt have it for women When I recieved it the hoodie looked like it would only fit a newborn Called then multiple times and left voicemails with my contact info Never once did they call or email me back Total scam Will make you purchase but wont care about the issues after it 

Update David contacted me after this review via email  however when i sent him an email back there was no response or anything from him anymore Completely disappeared

Name: A5439
Content: Sept 2021  I am missing TWO items from my order that I paid for  Ive attempted to contact them 6 times via email  contact form  and phone Sadly  no response Its so disappointing when a fellow Canadian small business steals from another

Name: A5440
Content: I am extremely frustrated with this company I have now placed my order TWO MONTHS ago and the delivery date said May 25th and I have yet to receive my order I have called and emailed a numerous amount of times  and no one has cared to call back or answer I am extremely frustrated and will never be ordering from them again I have a  400 am order pending and absolutely no idea where it is I will he reporting them if I do not get answers Would not recommend this company to anyone  unless you enjoy being ignored and under valued

Name: A5441
Content:
Ordered a bunch of hoodies for my small business on December 25th 2019 Got charged for it right away and never to this day got my order That shirt does not pick up the phone or call back They never replied to any of my emails I had no choice but to report them to my Visa for fraudulent activity Stay away Here is my order number  11005867 It was placed on the 17th actually Tuesday  December 17  2019
Authorized I tried emailing you multiple times but never got an answer So did you have a chance to locate my order?

Name: A5442
Content: David was quick and helped me out with a very quick turn around  especially given the time of year A very great experience  thank you so much for helping me with my order I will be ordering again in future

Name: A5443
Content: Had a great experience ordering with ThatShirt They made sure my design turned out perfectly on the pieces of clothing I needed for myself and my team They met the timeline we needed and everything even arrived ahead of when we expected it considering the current Covid delays If you need a design printed Id highly recommend this company

Name: A5444
Content:
Do not buy from this brand I think they are out of business maybe? That or its a scam They do not answer phone or email  I have tried multiple times Have been waiting over two months for my order over a month since the estimated delivery  I cant even get a hold of them to cancel the order and get a refund 

Edit a few days after I posted this review I was refunded for my purchase although still not contacted about it  I am not sure if it was because of this review or not because I was not contacted I would still not recommend this store

Name: A5445
Content: My estimated delivery was two days ago for a hoodie I ordered I am still waiting on someone to answer my emails I need the hoodie by this week and still havent received updates

Name: A5446
Content: This place is great Amazing quality  easy to use website  great price and ships super fast My only problem with this place is that the colours of the garments online are completely different from what they are in real life They have a disclaimer saying that it may appear different but every single time Ive ordered  the colours came out completely different from what I expected  for example I ordered that was displayed as a soft green and the color that arrived was a safety yellow Other than that  thatshirt is fantastic

Name: A5447
Content:
I placed an order on September 25th  2018  and I have yet to receive the order Jan 11th  2019  David from sales will not reply to my emails  and my phone messages will not be returned either 

Update The same day I posted this review  Mark reached out to me to arrange a refund Unfortunate situation as a whole  but the customer recovery is appreciated Thank you Mark

Name: A5448
Content: I ordered and paid on Dec 2020 Since then  I sent few email and called to leave message but no response It is four months now and the order is not arrive yet I am not sure they are still in business or not My recommend is before you place an order  make sure you can get response from them

Name: A5449
Content: We cant say enough about the wonderful customer service at thatshirt They did a great job of our small business company shirts  their quality of work is excellent David was so helpful in dealing with any questions or issues we had They truly go above and beyond with their customer service which we greatly appreciate

Name: A5450
Content: I ordered a hoodie as a gift  but due to some circumstances  I had to cancel my order They were very helpful and cancelled it as soon as possible and refunded my money A great company

Name: A5451
Content: DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE They have the worst service  to be honest I do not even think they are a legitimate company They will let you order take your money  but never respond back or answer phone calls there is no information on there end I have ordered in April and I was suppose to get it in May  it is still not in and they refuse to be in contact with their customers

Name: A5452
Content: Awesome company They took such care in making sure that the designs on the sweaters looked good before shipping them out Customer service was A+  Thanks David

Name: A5453
Content:
You get what you pay for

Shirts arrived with multiple quality issues including frayed stitching I attempted to reach out about the issue and did not receive a response 

Very disappointed with the lack of customer service

Name: A5454
Content: What a pleasure to deal with probably one of the greatest business transactions I have ever done Smooth and on time And the shirts look amazing  my staff get compliments everyday on the shirts Thank you so much

Name: A5455
Content:

However I did receive a response back and the customer service was very helpful and gracious

Name: A5456

Name: A5457
Content: I had a set of custom hoodies made for a client for mine just before Christmas and thatshirt was able to get them to them in a timely manner and the quality of print was awesome I will be getting some made for my soccer team this spring Thanks a lot guys

Name: A5458
Content: Thank you for the quick service on the rush order I love the quality of the hoodie Thank you so much

Name: A5459
Content: Awful experience Customer service is nonexistant Supplied me with incorrect shipping information Order elsewhere I was lied to as well

Name: A5460
Content: They caught an error I made and fixed up one of my designs came out mint

Name: A5461
Content: Amazing people with personal approach Good quality goods Very happy with the order for the school team

Name: A5462
Content: Great Quality shirts Superb service  cant beat it Highly recommended

Content: Excellent service and nice shirts at very reasonable prices

Name: A5464
Content: fantastic product so looking forward to the next project

Name: A5465
Content: Very professional Great customer service

Name: A5466
Content: Still waiting No replies

Name: A5467
Content: Great shirts with fantastic service

Name: A5468
Content: Thank you David

Name: A5469
Content: Good quality shirts and the pricing was very reasonable as well

Name: A5470
Content: Fast and efficient custom printing Great quality Highly recommend

Name: A5471
Content:
Fantastic experience with Toronto Tees We had some t shirts done up for a bachelor party  and I couldnt be happier with the end result The process of submitting art online was very user friendly  and the turn around time was super quick  not to mention the quality of the shirts themselves far exceeded anything I could have hoped for from a printshop and the fact that they are guaranteed from cracking  peeling and fading inspires great confidence in their product  The groom was thrilled  and so were we; Id recommend Toronto Tees to anyone  and have no doubt Ill be back the next time I need something printed
 Cheers

Name: A5472
Content: Hey guys TorontoTees Thank you for an amazing final product which was delivered in its appropriate timeline The quality of graphics and garment fitment are simply perfect  this has motivated me to continue my future projects with them The online designer is very easy to use and doesnt feel complicated

Name: A5473
Content: I live in Alberta and I needed 14 Custom T shirts for a wedding I was attending in Toronto Downside was it was very short notice but I was so lucky to find Toronto Tees who made the entire process so easy & affordable I was in contact with Joe who was very friendly and helped us get a great deal & of course T shirts were all ready on time

Name: A5474
Content: The guys at Toronto Tees are all fantastic I had a pretty crazy rush request and not only did they pull through and get the shirts to me 2 days before I asked  they were always open to chat about it and responded extremely quickly whenever I reached out Kyle and the team  thank you for everything Great quality shirts Amazing print quality Great prices The best service If I could  Id rate over 5/5

Name: A5475
Content: While the finished shirts 5 of the same 1 colour logo met my needs and look really great  the process to get them made was less than smooth I ordered 8 calendar days before I needed them but on the day they were meant to be ready based on their order confirmation  there was no word from the shop I emailed and called at the end of that day but the shirts hadnt yet been made but the lovely guy I spoke to said hed make sure theyd be prioritized for the next morning The next day midday I followed up again as there still hadnt been an answer to my email from the day before I eventually got a text that theyd be done by 2pm that day Again  the shirts are great We love them Important that the quality is there of course  but if I can go in and essentially get shirts on demand I think orders that are planned and paid for over a week in advance should be managed and completed more efficiently It seems they werent even started until the follow ups were done

Name: A5476
Content: I placed an order and the process was simple After receiving business cards and the colours not quite matching my request  I emailed Toronto Tees and they assured my design and responded very quickly They kept me informed and the actual delivery date was much faster than the ETA When my shirts came  there was 1 unit that was the wrong size but they didnt give me any difficulty They remade the correct size and even shipping to me as I dont live downtown Great customized service  fantastic turnaround time and Ill definitely order where soon

Name: A5477
Content: Joe was incredibly helpful providing quick replies to my questions Our order came on time and the shirts looked great Our small business will be sure to use Toronto Tees for our next t shirt order

Name: A5478
Content:
Ordered a custom T shirt here with my own design and it turned out great
The online designer was easy to upload and work on and there was a large variety of shirts and sweaters to choose from 
Once ordered it was completed and shipped out to me in a matter of days
Other companies wanted a minimum order but I had no problems ordering just 2 shirts and pricing was good

Name: A5479
Content: Toronto Tees is amazing The shirt material is premium and the printing is very high quality Needed a rushed order for a birthday present and they accommodated it with no issues

Name: A5480
Content: Great quality I ordered a small batch of hoodies and was really impressed with their quality  I wasnt expecting much for the price I also got a call to confirm my text because it was missing an apostrophe  which was part of the design but it goes to show the effort and attention to detail they provide Excellent Design to doorstep was a week  and their site estimated delivery date much longer Ill be using these guys in the future

Name: A5481
Content: Amazing experience Tom was very friendly and helpful I gave him the design and t shirt was ready in less then 5 min Great quality for a fair price Ill definitely use their services again Highly recommended

Name: A5482
Content: I needed printed shirts for Christmas  I placed the order on line I messed up the hue of letting I needed  all to be the same  but 1 was not right  I emailed the owner and told them I goofed when ordering and needed them all the same he was great He responded really quickly and fixed my error and got them to me in time for Christmas Excellent customer service I wasnt thrilled about the pricing  but everything in the world has gone up I guess  and for excellent customer service  its a good trade off I would recommend this business

Name: A5483
Content: I love the Toronto Tees store on Yonge st They are always very quick  professional  and friendly Today  I came in to make a t shirt for the hubby Tom  who was helping me  was so fast and skillful It took him literally 5 minutes to finish everything I was super happy with the t shirt and the price and I also got a coupon for the next print Awesome job Thank you

Name: A5484
Content: Just wanted to say Tom is AWESOME I went there after placing my order because I needed it to be a rush order and they completed it so quickly 10/10 experience Store has great vibes And even though I only bought the soft tees  they have samples there for you to see and judging from that  you can tell the material is really high quality

Name: A5485
Content: HIGHLY recommend Toronto Tees Custom Printed T shirts I ordered a single shirt for a girlfriends bachelorette party and not only was it extremely well made  the team Joe & Jay went ABOVE and beyond to stay late and make it for me They are super professional and the customer experience cannot be beat I designed the t shirt online within 5 minutes and was able to pick up my t shirt the next week You can even pay  5 00 to have it rushed if need be Thank you SO MUCH for the exceptional service Will 100 be coming back

Name: A5486
Content: Attended the Queen Street location Service was excellent Sam was very helpful  patient and polite  answered all my questions and provided all the info I needed to complete my custom tee  notwithstanding they were very busy when I arrived Very positive experience and very happy with the end product Will definitely recommend Toronto Tees to family and friends  and will tell them to ask for Sam  For all the above reasons  5 stars

Name: A5487
Content: The shirt turned out exactly as I made it Quality was great Delivery fast and delivery guy had a great sense of humour Next time I need to do a custom shirt  Ill definitely use this company again Highly recommend

Name: A5488
Content:
Ordered a custom hoodie for my niece for Christmas It turned out awesome and was delivered quickly Would definitely order again

Only problem is that Toronto Tees doesnt have gift cards Would love to buy some in the future if they become available  Great supporting a local business

Name: A5489
Content: I have used Toronto Tees MULTIPLE TIMES and sometimes multiple times on the same job people get a sneak peek and they want in so back to Toronto Tees I go making more with hours to spare They work on the worst deadlines with the best attitudes They are customizable  affordable and entirely flexible with your needs and designs Latest props to JAY  killer customer service  amazing attitude and all round awesome experience giver Thanks Team TO Tees

Name: A5490
Content: Tom was incredible in helping my vision come into fruition with a design that I wanted to put on a golf shirt He perfectly placed it  and helped problem solve issues that my design had Overall it turned out exactly how I imagined it and Tom is to thank for that On top of that  the golf shirts they have are incredibly comfortable and fit extremely well 10/10 service  will go there again when I print another shirt

Name: A5491
Content: I have ordered from Toronto Tees a couple times and they have never let me down The quality of the clothing and print job are so impressive When I had a question  Joe was so quick to answer A+ customer service and A+ quality and A+ timing Thank you Toronto Tees for always coming through

Name: A5492
Content: I was dealing with a previous downtown Printshop and having some issues so I entered this Tee shop with an open mind No need  questions were answered happily by Staff and with easy instructions on how to get my design onto a shirt most likely that same day I went home  designed my shirt and returned the next day  this time Jay helped me  Same great level of service He went over my design  offered tips as to what would work best and why and once the final draft was sent  he said be ready in 10 minutes I will definitely be back to print more shirts for work Prices are great too Thanks torontotees Great experience

Name: A5493
Content: Had outstanding service from Jay at the 527 Yonge Street store He was very helpful with the artwork and colour selection He was very polite with all the clients who came in while we were there The end product of our t shirts was better than we had hoped for

Name: A5494
Content: I had no idea this business existed until someone told me about it a few days ago I was more than pleased by their prompt service I came in with the best resolution of the graphics that I wanted  but Jay  helped me out and organized things properly for my Valentines week shirt Super happy with the time that was taken to help me out today and the finished product which was all done within the 30 min that I was there Thank you

Name: A5495
Content: Very Poor quality You gave me a hat full of lint  with a big iron mark on the beak of the hat Plus the L from Control isnt straight My experience was horrible The other hat I bought was poor too  with letters lifting up after you said it was finished Get a iron and do it yourself people

Name: A5496
Content: The shirt came our great Very vibrant and good quality The only downside is the shirt I selected is extremely see through  Id bring my own shirt next time Pick was easy and the employees were very nice

Name: A5497
Content: Overall great experience at Toronto Tees Joe was extremely helpful throughout the entire process which was done entirely via email Very prompt communication  very accomodating  and fast delivery Will come back in the future for other custom prints Thanks Joe

Name: A5498
Content: Went in hoping to just have a few questions answered but came out with the product I wanted in hand Tom was great to work with  quick  friendly service and helpful with sizing and placement of my desired logo Very happy with the efficiency and end result

Name: A5499
Content: The people at Toronto Tees are fantastic There was an issue when I went to pick up my order but these guys are great  no problems only solutions approach Thank you Tom and crew Ill be seeing you again

Name: A5500
Content: I had a last minute idea and a super small order of three custom sweatshirts  with a very tight window of opportunity for delivery Toronto Tees Joe was extremely responsive  helpful to expedite  and delivered as I had hoped I couldnt have asked for anything more Thanks again Joe  very much appreciated

Name: A5501
Content: The service was easy to use online  from picking the t shirt style  to uploading and design of the t shirt The order was completed well before the window that was mentioned online  which was amazing speed I think it was completed the day after I paid for the order online and the site quoted more than a week before the t shirts would be ready

Name: A5502
Content: Got a tee made today from a photo on the internet Turned out spot on Great tee shirt quality Dan helped me out but his coworker or manager had his hair in a lil bun was great too Super great experience 100 would recommend

Name: A5503
Content: Tom is amazing I wanted to make a change with my order when I picked it up  he fixed it on the spot with me and improved the original design Totally above and beyond Love this place  have always been really happy with the service and quality Woohoo

Name: A5504
Content: Great customer service from Tom & Gus quick turnaround and delivered exactly what I was looking for I was a walk in  but they also have a great online design app for custom projects I highly recommend Toronto Tees

Name: A5505
Content: It was super easy to create the design that I was looking for and my order was ready for pick up a day earlier than promised Plus  the quality of both the final print and the fabric was great

Name: A5506
Content: superior customer service and impeccable use of adobe design programs such as Photoshop and Illustrator Tom was by far the most educated in print editing I always do and always will suggest this establishment to anyone in need of personalized shirts/hoodies/zip up sweaters Theyre amazing

Name: A5507
Content: Very great service and custom prints I had an issue with my previous print and they allowed me to change my design on the spot with no hassle Will definitely be ordering from them again

Name: A5508
Content:
Great experience with Toronto Tees They correct a mistake make that I made by connecting me directly prior to custom printing the T Shirts and I really appreciated it 
I will definitely use Toronto Tees again

Name: A5509
Content: Great customer service  the design tool is very easy to use and the T Shirt I had made came out perfect Im already planning on printing more shirts as nice custom gifts

Name: A5510
Content: Fantastic website for designing your hoodie Super easy and easy to edit if you change your mind about the design Hoodie arrived early for Christmas and was of great quality Highly recommend

Name: A5511
Content: It was amazing to see my artwork on a tshirt for the first time Very glad I did it with Toronto Tees Custom

Name: A5512
Content: Ordered some screen printed ts for my business The quality of the print was great Fast shipping too Thanks Toronto Tees Due North MA

Name: A5513
Content: Very fast and high quality custom print Price was perfectly reasonable given the rush  and though I requested a rush order it came earlier than expected and they didnt charge me the extra for the rush

Name: A5514
Content: Tom is the man They Printed our T shirt in about 7 minutes Super friendly and easy to work with Cant get service like this anywhere else Thanks guys  Ary from GTA MAC REPAIR

Name: A5515
Content: Ordered a custom tee on line for a b day present The delivery date was going to be 3 days after the b day party I reached out and Toronto Tees made it happen I received the tee 3 days before the party Thanks Toronto Tees

Name: A5516
Content: I recently placed an order with Toronto Tees  I was a little confused about the order process as I was messing up the colours But a quick inquiry and I was set straight Love the results

Name: A5517
Content: We ordered the shirts online  paid for regular shipping  and still received the shirts within 2 or 3 business days Exactly as expected per our design We meant to write this review sooner  but can definitely attest to the quality since weve had the shirts for a couple of months now The quality is perfect; they are super comfortable  we wash them frequently because we work with dogs  and the shirts still look like the day we got them We look forward to placing our next order Thank you for providing great quality and efficient service

Name: A5518
Content: Really nice  high quality material for the t shirts  and printed colours come out very crisp and bright I would highly recommend  and will definitely use them again in future

Name: A5519
Content: Placed a late Xmas order but didnt want the hassle of rushing but it was still ready 3 days earlier than expected Great service  loved doing my own design

Name: A5520
Content: Fast  efficient and very helpful T shirts and print quality are excellent Would definitely use this company again

Name: A5521
Content: These guys are the best Ive placed two online orders for shirts for my business  and both came exactly as expected The quality of the product  and overall customer experience cant be beat Theyre easily reachable by phone or e mail if you have any questions  and went above and beyond to get my order completed  when I was the one procrastinating called me on Christmas eve when I hadnt returned their voicemail Never would have expected it but was truly thankful  and impressed  Thank you for setting the bar for customer service

Name: A5522
Content: Fantastic experience More expedient  efficient & friendly than other place Ive gone to The price was also very fair I will be back in the future Highly recommended to anyone wanting to get their custom designs or quotations on cotton based clothing Its also good to note that youre able to bring in your own stuff if you have something you want altered 10/10

Name: A5523
Content:
Highly recommended I went there with my own hoodies Loved the prints on them Made me own designs and they turned out to be amazing
The best part is  it hardly took 5 7 minutes Thanks for everything

Name: A5524
Content: After using another online custom t shirt company who took my money and did not deliver the shirts  I decided to try Toronto Tees based upon the good reviews and I am glad I did The process was very user friendly  and the owner Joe responded quickly to expedite the order to get it to our friend in time for his birthday who loved the shirts  Thanks again for an excellent experience

Name: A5525
Content: This is gonna be one of my new favourite local businesses The ordering process was simple  the prices were reasonable  and the turnaround time was unbelievable Even for someone who is far from design or tech savvy  like me  it was easy to design a shirt based on a TV show we have been binging a perfect gag gift to hang out in during these times Plus  in spite of the current chaos surrounding COVID  my order arrived within a few days  in a lovely reusable tote bag instead of paper/plastic Plus  the shipping was free I will definitely be ordering from Toronto Tees again and recommending it to my friends

Name: A5526
Content: Walked in today with super vague idea The dude was super patient and knowledgeable  heres the end product Fair pricing too Will be back for more

Name: A5527
Content: Fantastic tees  turned out amazing  Jay provided great service with a really quick turn around Would definitely buy again

Name: A5528
Content: Kyle was very accommodating and prompt with all communication We had several calls and emails to talk about deadlines  whats in stock  and what are the best practices Pleasure to work with  dependable  and great customer service If you need to get shirts printed for an event and want to make sure your order gets to you on time  I cannot recommend them enough

Name: A5529
Content: I ordered custom lake hoodies  and we are so in love with them It was our first time designing custom clothing and the site is very user friendly Rave reviews from all of our friends and family Joe was a pleasure to work with  he responded promptly to all of our inquiries  and he made sure our order arrived by the date of our event We will be placing another order Thank you Delhi  Ontario

Name: A5530
Content: Insane Got an art on my phone Less than 10min later I was with my t shirt in the bag leaving the store The guys working here are very nice and helpful Great idea and great service I recommend

Name: A5531
Content: Loved the shirt So easy to order online I will be definitely buying from here again

Name: A5532
Content: This custom tshirt place is absolutely amazing They have digital printing which ensures colors are almost identical to your design resulting in the product being spectacular The employees take the time to understand your needs and deliver an exceptional customer service If you need a shirt printed or an idea executed this place will make sure you walk out with a smile on your face

Name: A5533
Content: I ordered some custom shirts for a friends bachlor party They looked and felt great The ordering process was super quick too

Name: A5534
Content:
The sweater I ordered turned out great 
Used their website to upload an image and did some tweaking and got it made Simple and easy

Name: A5535
Content: I guess it is the best t shirt print service in the city  with their speed and quality The guys are very helpful with solving my problems  helping with my requests Jay and his colleagues acceptedy order which I changed couple times  gave me a good discount and made the order quickly and great I know fromy experience how hard can get a good print in short term but they did great  thank you

Name: A5536
Content: Quick turnaround time  responsive team  good quality printed shirts Highly recommend

Name: A5537
Content: Super helpful staff Great quality My custom t shirt was perfect

Name: A5538
Content: Amazing Service  I was greeted by Jay  who was a really nice and informative rep They were able to get the sweater printed in no time  like 15 mins  which was amazing as I was in a rush Really nice staff and the prints came out really nice

Name: A5539
Content: Placed an order today and was ready within 15 minutes when I showed up Great customer service and happy with the shirts Thanks again

Name: A5540
Content: Ordered a custom t shirt for my husbands birthday with a picture of our new cat and it turned out beautifully Designing and ordering online was easy  and it was printed within days

Name: A5541
Content: Ordered a custom Tee for a friends birthday Tom was really patient and professional in helping me choosing the right sized Tee and adjusting the graphics and text to make it look better I would definitely recommend this place to others

Name: A5542
Content: Tom did a t shirt order for me  he was just the sweetest person to work with  so polite  kind  talented  and his communication was excellent Absolutely will be ordering from here again

Name: A5543
Content: Got 3 hoodies for me and my team Order came on time and looks amazing Worth the price and customer service was super friendly and helpful Would recommend

Name: A5544
Content: This is my second time ordering from TT BOTH experiences were awesome I submitted via their website easy to use my own logo and it was ready by the time i walked there to get it So  super easy  fast and great quality The first one

Name: A5545
Content: Autism friendly Toronto Tees is our new go to for t shirt printing Professional service and great quality tees Will be ordering again

Name: A5546
Content: From the early days when TT opened their doors on Yonge St until today  Jay and the team at TTs are awesome; and the prints are always on point Great quality work whether you buy a single shirt or in bulk Im always referring people to them bc everyone wants to know where I get my shirts done Quality product every time

Name: A5547
Content: Reliable service  good print quality  and easy to interact web interface design  Would give 5 stars if there was more color options on the type of t shirt I selected

Name: A5548
Content: Great tees even nicer people Left my wallet here and wasnt able to pick it up for a few days Retrieved missing wallet and had a great experience with custom tshirt

Name: A5549
Content: Great service jay i believe his name is was so helpful they made a mistake and printed the wrong size and told me to come back in and they will replace on the spot Will definitely be using again I highly recommend

Name: A5550
Content: Best Xmas gift I gave this year Super easy set up They corrected a spelling error I caught before printing Friendly staff on site

Name: A5551
Content: Went in at the last minute before Halloween to get a Superman Tshirt Christian was AWESOME got me set up with a Superman Tshirt and hoodie for a great price Printed both on the spot in 20 minutes Highlllly recommended

Name: A5552
Content: Great service I got exactly what I designed on their website The only downside was the price over  200 for 3 t shirts and the fact that they didnt have womens cut t shirts

Name: A5553
Content: Made a unique birthday gift with the simple and flexible design options The turnaround time was very reasonable; it arrived with plenty of time to spare

Name: A5554
Content: Excellent customer service from the fellas at Toronto Tees  and the quality of the hoodies I ordered were much better than expected 10/10 would recommend

Name: A5555
Content: Great website  easy to use but if you do run into problems they will take the reins and get your order exactly how you want it Outstanding customer service  high quality products

Name: A5556
Content: Toronto Tees is by far the BEST company to print your personal  team or business tees and more They are always amazingly friendly and super professional very high quality products Recommend them highly

Name: A5557
Content: Amazing design to pickup/delivery process Great one on one help via email too Thank you for the great service & help Yes the prices are more than competitive than cooler than off the rack Please support local businesses in Toronto

Name: A5558
Content: The website was easy to navigate The design phase is user friendly The t shirt was delivered as promised  and customer was excellent

Name: A5559
Content: I needed to get a rush order left my Christmas gift to the last minute  and they printed it in 5 minutes for me  thats a Christmas miracle I also enjoyed the positive energy of the staff

Name: A5560
Content: Great service Quick delivery Beautiful t shirts Thank you so much Definitely recommend your services

Name: A5561
Content: Great shirt  great service when I originally requested a quote  affordable prices  fast turnaround time  and great service when I picked it up

Name: A5562
Content: High quality shirt and printing  this shirt will last for years to come Delivery was free and on schedule I wish I had more reasons to order custom shirts

Name: A5563
Content: I ordered a tee shirt and the quality of the fabric felt soft and comfortable  and the stitching was great Thank you

Name: A5564
Content: Excellent customer service I got from Tom today Because of how well my t shirt turned out  I will absolutely suggest their service

Name: A5565
Content: Have to say 1st time I ordered from this business and I would definitely do it again in a heart beat They were efficient  fast and was able to do exactly as I had asked The pictures are on a t shirt front and back of same t Will be back

Name: A5566
Content: I recently had two custom shirts printed at Toronto Tees so thrilled with how well they turned out I entered the store without a mask forgot mine at work  sigh  was one of those days and they werent mean about it just grabbed me a

Name: A5567
Content: Very happy with the experience Product came out just as I had hoped and it was a very quick process 10/10 would do business here again

Name: A5568
Content: Really great store to place online orders The quality of the prints are great as well as the material I was a little bit frustrated about the inconsistent delivery times I had ordered 2 sweaters with a mock up design for an event I was hosting and was surprised with the quick turnaround when the order was delivered the next day With this in mind  I placed an order for 2 more sweaters 8 days go by and still had not received a shipping confirmation I was getting anxious because my event was fast approaching I got in touch with the owner Joe and this is what changed my review He is very dedicated to his business and offers great customer service He clearly communicated the status of my order and ensured my order would deliver before my event I will definitely be a returning customer

Name: A5569
Content: Great experience with shoe and Toronto Tees  ordered 12 shirts initially and then realized through conversation with Joe We could get 25 shirts for almost the same price Joe answered all my questions about sizing  shirt formats  made a great tweak to my band logo artwork to make it appear larger on the shirts  found unusual extended sizes like 3XL and delivered it all across the country 10 days earlier than I was expecting And they look great 10/10 would definitely order from Toronto Tees again

Name: A5570
Content: Amazing Truly Amazing Joe  the owner  helped me order our first batch of T shirts and baseball caps and I have to say the experience was exceptional Joes professionalism and extensive knowledge in the custom printing world had completely made it easy for me to decide between all of the options he had presented The communication from him and from his staff  especially from Gabe  was great from beginning to end We didnt need to worry about a thing as we were confident in Joes expertise He was also 100 accommodating with sampling the products and in adjusting our design We will definitely order from the Toronto Tees Custom Printed T shirts and Face Masks again Thank you for all of your hard work We are impressed with the sheer dedication you and your staff have provided us Thank you

Name: A5571
Content: Ordered a hoodie and a tshirt as a gift for a friend Was worried about the quality of the clothing and how well the print would come out but it came out amazingly Better than my expectations and my friends He lives in the city so it was shipped the next day and arrived the following day Great service  great products Would definitely purchase again

Name: A5572
Content: Christian did an awesome job mocking up my design and having the shirt printed quickly Super quality and shopping experience  thanks dudes

Name: A5573
Content: I absolutely loved the seamless service and the professionalism in getting things printed exactly the way I wanted them I printed a tote bag and a tshirt and it was done super fast I will definitely be printing more with you guys

Name: A5574
Content: Shirt sizing was accurate to measurements provided  fit him perfectly  and he was so pleased to see his preferred phrasing for the age question Hat came out as I designed as well Pickup was simple  though there were so many orders waiting for pickup it took me a while to find my Toronto Tees reusable bag

Name: A5575
Content:
Awesome boutique t shirt shop on Queen West Fun  friendly  professional  and delivered on time Quick response to inquiries and they went beyond our expectations with our order Highly recommend
 T Fix It

Name: A5576
Content: A few neighbourhood guys were looking to create some swag We wanted tees and hoodies with a logo we had designed Because our order amounted to a small amount of garments it was cost prohibitive to go with a screen print as there are usually large minimum orders Not Toronto Tees We got two designs printed onto tees and hoodies and the results are quite amazing The hoodie is now my favourite and the t shirt great The print quality is top shelf as well Thank you TTs for making this happen for us

Name: A5577
Content: Really great place for small or bigger orders  people working there are kind and the prints are really good quality

Name: A5578
Content: These guys are great They took the bad description that I gave them and made a great looking design In total  it took 10 15 mins Great quality t shirt and friendly service

Name: A5579
Content: It takes a week to get a shirt printed This is a disappointingly long time to wait When I picked up my shirts  I asked them if they print the shirts in house They do So it takes no time to print it There is no excuse for a delay after they receive the order Toronto Tees charges a premium to get the shirt fast If you dont pay more  then they make you wait a week for your order This is too long and not right The shirts are expensive enough already The quality of the shirt is average It is a typical Gildan shirt

Name: A5580
Content: I had purchased a baby onesie and wanted it for our gender reveal on Monday September 28th I ended up ordering on a Wednesday September 23rd and received it on the Friday Sept 25th I did not think it would arrive on time but Toronto Tees took care of things so quick they met my deadline which they did not even know of the quality is great and their service is fast I will very likely use them again in the future and recommend them

Name: A5581
Content: I ordered around 60 mens polo custom made with QR code and 20 womens tees with QR Code for our company and expo Came out great Highly recommend for quality work  fast work and fast shipping within Toronto

Name: A5582
Content: Took care of a custom T shirt order for a bachelor party  right turn around and pricing was very fair Thanks guys

Name: A5583
