Content: I ordered some custom hoodies from Toronto Tees and was very impressed The hoodies turned out great I will certainly return for more orders in the future

Name: A5584
Content: Quick and easy design process  entirely online and extremely comprehensive Delivery was quick and personal too I missed the knock as I was on a work call  but when I did open the door a nice canvas bag was left tied to my door handle with my purchase inside It lead me to believe that these products are hand delivered by the employees themselves  as opposed to being shipped via postal services My step son loves the sweater I made for him  hes 13 and just graduated I would definitely order from Toronto Tees again and would recommend you do too  Thank you so much

Name: A5585
Content: Got my sweaters today and everything was exactly what I ordered Great job & thank you

Name: A5586
Content: Was so easy and quick and made an amazing Christmas gift Would definitely order from here again

Name: A5587
Content: Awesome store needed a batman beyond shirt and they did it came out really nice paid  30 for it I may come back for some custom sweaters Workers are also really nice

Name: A5588
Content: Worked with Tom on the shirts for our bachelor party weekend He designed the graphics and text and shared the options with us Excellent service  diligent care  answered our questions  and ready within the hour Would absolutely go back to Toronto Tees Thanks

Name: A5589
Content: This service was easy and quick to deliver and exactly met my needs Thanks I have been using Toronto Tees for several years at Christmas time and the service and delivery couldnt be better

Name: A5590
Content: I had a rush job and was able to get in touch with Toronto Tees and get it done beautifully Great Job Toronto Tees is my go to for custom T shirts Great service + great quality products

Name: A5591
Content: I ordered these rush and Joe totally delivered above and beyond The gear was top quality and it arrived a day before I needed Im already looking a other designs as I will continue to order through Toronto Tees Top notch service

Name: A5592
Content: Absolutely great place Customer service was amazing  and the t shirt was a hit

Name: A5593
Content: Great service  great communication Highly recommended Check the sizing on the website we found the mens hoodies fit large and the womens tees fit small  but YMMV

Name: A5594
Content: Had an order that needed to be done quick Had to pay an extra fee but it was done on time Nice hats Good printing job

Name: A5595
Content: Excellent service  Tom is a very friendly and efficient guy Printed my shirt very fast and ended up looking amazing Thanks again

Name: A5596
Content: We dealt directly with Joe with an order of over 100 hoodie sweatshirts He was very responsive  punctual  courteous  and ultimately delivered the product faster and at a lower cost than other places we had sourced Would highly recommend using Joe because there is a personal touch that you dont get when using other purely online or US sites Also felt good to support a local business during the covid pandemic Thanks Joe for your dedication and help Will definitely use your services again

Name: A5597
Content: I LOVE the custom t shirts I produced with Toronto Tees  Toronto Tees communication  production  shipping and the finished product were exactly what I hoped for THANK YOU

Name: A5598
Content:
Toronto Tees came through for me I had two friends one of them was my wife turning 50 in the same week and I thought a commemorative T shirt would be fun 
The Toronto Tees website was super easy to use and I was able to custom design two completely different T shirts within minutes Even delivery was faster than expected Thank you so much

Name: A5599
Content: Great quality I was running late to pick them up and he dated an extra 30mins for me Very grateful

Name: A5600
Content: Received my shirt earlier than expected and it was perfect I look forward to putting in another order

Name: A5601
Content: Joe and his team are great I designed 50th wedding anniversary sweatshirts for my parents online Joe was extremely helpful during the whole process and ensured the end product was great I will definitely place another order

Name: A5602
Content: Great company  with zero complications Designed my shirt in the evening  used rush service and picked it up the next day Very happy with how the shirt came out

Name: A5603
Content: We ordered two shirts to use as costumes for a show we were putting on and they turned out great Super fast turn around and so convenient to be able to pick it up ourselves We saved a lot of money and got to support a local company

Name: A5604
Content: I had some items made and sent as gifts They have online tools so you can design at your leisure If youre not tech savvy dont worry because the response time for customer service is awesome and theyll help with everything The customized gifts were a big hit  thanks Toronto Tees

Name: A5605
Content: First time customer I uploaded my design just words  no image on their site  picked colours for the words and the T  and picked it up a few days later Husband loved it Would appreciate more choices in colours and style of Ts  esp for women  but I can still work with what they have Am pleased with the quality of material of the one we got Will def be using this biz again Actually  working on a new design atm

Name: A5606
Content: My T shirt was stolen from my mailbox Toronto Tees made us a second for free and personally delivered it to my house in record time Excellent service Everyone I spoke with at the company was considerate and professional  with the goal of making me a happy customer It was not their problem that someone stole the shirt  but they dealt with it anyway I am very happy with the quality of the T and with the overall experience Nice

Name: A5607
Content:
The online editor and the ability to save designs to your profile is very useful  it makes it every easy to compare costs between your different ideas and choose one 

Order came very fast  the shirts fit great and are of great quality  and the printing of my custom logo looks fantastic Will shop here again

Name: A5608
Content: I had a really good experience with this company Their website was really easy to use  and it was nice to be able to try out my design on different styles before ordering The turnaround time was really quick  and the quality of the print is excellent

Name: A5609
Content: Dont do business with these people Got quoted for 14 t shirts online before heading to their location the same day I had purchased blank shirts from a different location I then decided I only needed 9 t shirts to be printed out They tried to charge me  315 00 for printing 9 t shirts for a basic quote along with a black and white photo They dont seem to have no consideration about your situation whatsoever nor does anyone have good team ethics  all they see is a dollar sign Communication is poor and the environment feels sketchy One colour t shirt I particularly had which was sky blue  the guy said he couldnt use the colour even though I seen that colour in their shop

Name: A5610
Content: I had the BEST experience with Joe from Toronto Tees Excellent customer service He was super patient  knowledgeable and very efficient as we went back and forth to design the zip up hoodie I absolutely love the end product as I saw my vision executed so beautifully The product and design quality are top notch I would recommend 100

Name: A5611
Content: After inquiring for 48 hoodies  Joe Taylor owner had been responsive and extremely patient while I had worked out details and designs His services exceeded expectations and we were thoroughly impressed with our order Will definitely be ordering from him again

Name: A5612
Content: The whole Team at Toronto Tees was super friendly and very helpful I ordered a T shirt online using the design tool and it was really easy When I went in to pick up the shirt I wanted to have another custom shirt made for a gift to a friend and the staff was able to make that custom shirt for me right away  it only took 10 15 minutes Good vibes Custom T shirts make great gifts for your pals

Name: A5613
Content: Toronto Tees is great Their website is really easy to navigate and create my tee Not only did my tee arrive very quickly  the quality of the material is awesome and the print is great quality  too Thanks Toronto Tees Ill definitely be a returning customer

Name: A5614
Content: Ive used a couple of online T shirt makers in the past RedBubble  Entripy  others but supporting this classic local business thats been in my consciousness seemingly forever is truly the way to do it Great quality  reasonable turnaround and price Just wish they could handle fulfillment for me

Name: A5615
Content: I had to print a t shirt quickly and have it shipped immediately The entire process from start to finish took less than 2 minutes  and the end result was terrific and arrived in 2 days/right on schedule Highly recommend

Name: A5616
Content: Amazing company  super helpful and responsive to queries Simple to use website  gives loads of options I made 5 designs and compared them all  it was great for making custom Christmas presents Really had the WOW factor too  people were dazzled by the finished results

Name: A5617
Content: Great experience So accommodating and easy interface for design Definitely will be returning

Name: A5618
Content:
Site was very easy to use Staff were very helpful and even called me with suggestions on how to improve my design The shirts were a rush order but they got them done with time to spare All of my coworkers loved the shirts as well 

One thing to keep in mind If you are picking up in person  bring a friend to help or be prepared to personally carry the box of shirts to your car or to transit The staff will not help you Not complaining; I just hadnt considered that when I had parked my car a few blocks away

Name: A5619
Content: I ordered a custom crew neck as a gift and it was delivered slightly ahead of schedule and completely perfect I was so happy with the service and product that I ordered another gift as well as a prototype for my emerging merchandise line The company contacted me to let me know that theyd touch up my logo so that it would print well I am a single mother  entrepreneur  and student  i made the logo myself  so the help with it was extra appreciated I will definitely be printing the rest of my merchandise line with them Thanks so much for being great at what you do

Name: A5620
Content: Love this place They print anything Are quick but patient The guy working there was helpful and friendly

Name: A5621
Content: I did an online order for a family member who lives in Toronto Design and shipping were really straightforward and the recipient really pleased with the result There was a problem with the online payment as I live outside Canada I almost gave up but very glad I didnt Emailed Joe  and an alternative  secure arrangement was sorted in less than 24 hours Great service  thank you

Name: A5622
Content: I placed an order for some T shirts only a few days before an event I emailed and asked if it was possible to have them done in time doubting that it was doable  The reply I got was super helpful and professional  and they made it happen I was very impressed with the whole process their website made things incredibly easy  their team was super helpful  and even though I was a dummy who left ordering to the last minute  their team delivered Great job guys

Name: A5623
Content: I love making shirts for family and friends and have used the services of Toronto Tees for years They are convenient and great even last minute But my most recent visit to the shop on Yonge I found the staff not as friendly as in the past and the slogan  home of the 5 min tee didnt really hold true When I arrived I was the only person in the store and the first guy who greeted me was not too friendly When I mentioned I would like to make 6 shirts  most with simple text  I was told I could not get them all at once  I would need to collect 3 of them the next day I was the only person in the store and it was more than 1 hour til close I was disappointed as I wanted to give them as gifts the next day and didnt have time to wait Anyways I did the maximum I was allowed which was 3 In future I will need to plan ahead better

Name: A5624
Content: This is such an awesome business Jay was especially helpful with making sure my custom design came out perfectly I will definitely be back an I highly recommend printing with them

Name: A5625
Content: Great service  so simple I brought in art work and had 2 t shirts within 5 minutes Staff is helpful and friendly Tshirt quality is excellent Lots of options

Name: A5626
Content: Toronto Tees is amazing I received my shirt today and it turned out perfectly It fits great and the material is light and incredibly soft My design was taken from a downloaded photo that I had them put on the front The quality of the design turned out absolutely amazing and even better than I had hoped Also the service was lightening quick  considering that I just ordered a few days ago Highly recommend this fantastic business

Name: A5627
Content: Great quality and pretty fast shipping Also  customer support was really responsive

Name: A5628
Content: I ordered one custom sweater and was very happy with how it turned out I ordered from another company and the sizing chart was inaccurate and fit way too small Toronto Tees sizing was legit I was happy with the quality of the sweater along with the print My order was ready in just 3 days I requested for curbside pick up knowing that I could risk getting a parking ticket along Yonge St But when I called  they met me at the door ready with my order Super fast and convenient Thanks Toronto Tees I definitely recommend ordering from them

Name: A5629
Content: Great experience Visited the store to check if they could extract a small portion of a picture and put it on a t shirt  and 10 minutes later I left the store with exactly what I wanted What I love about the t shirt is that the print is not too thick and it doesnt look like it would crack or peel I was being helped by Trevor  a wonderful young man/powerful wizard who did his magic to make that t shirt happen Great customer service too  even when he was immersed in the picture modifying software  he managed to be engaging  charmingly funny and deal with my questions Top marks for both service and product

Name: A5630
Content:
This was my first time ordering from Toronto Tees  but not my last
I was impressed with the level of politeness when speaking with them over the phone  prior to ordering online As a brand director at my previous job  I was all about the logo placement and quality of garments being ordered for staff I ordered a custom zip up hoodie for my mom for Mothers Day and within the week it arrived at my house I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of garment and end result of art work supplied Im very excited and cant wait for my mom to wear it I know shell love it

Name: A5631
Content: Five stars for Toronto Tees From my first contact which was via an email  to the order delivered to my house Joe Taylor was excellent He listened to what we wanted  made changes until we were happy and delivered a quality product at a fair price We are going on a family holiday and ordered customized hoodies I highly recommend Toronto Tees and Joe is a pleasure to deal with I could not have asked for better service

Name: A5632
Content: Amazing work by the entire team I had a golf / bachelor party and needed logo hats created with not a lot of time Toronto Tees really delivered Everything was made quickly and perfectly I got a lot of positive feedback on the hats at the party Great communication on the order  very professional  would recommend Thanks for making the party memorable

Name: A5633
Content: Last minute order for t shirts for our hockey team  Tried a few different places but none of them could meet Toronto Ts price or delivery time Staff was accommodating  friendly Highly recommended Toronto Ts 5 stars

Name: A5634
Content: I ordered a small batch of branded clothing for my business The order came fast and I was happily surprised with the quality of my long sleeve white shirts I had a hard time finding a shop in the city that would do custom hats and the team at Toronto Tees did a proper job Will certainly order again and would highly recommend

Name: A5635
Content: Quick service  very friendly and caring owner Great quality hoodies

Name: A5636
Content: I have bought several t shirts from Toronto Tees and they are always great The customer service is awesome

Name: A5637
Content: Okay  Im editing this because I had such a pleasant experience with Toronto Tees  two days in a row I am more than happy with the quality and the service Ethan from the Yonge street office went out of his way to let us know that  in correction to an earlier report that they didnt have medium black tees in stock  that they actually DO have them at the time He flagged me and my old folks down the street in front of the shop and told us the pleasant news My familys fathers day was made all the more memorable thanks to me not having to return a third time for a third order The turnout was fast and the quality is excellent This wont be the last youve heard of me  kind people I will order again

Name: A5638
Content: Great product  great prices  fantastic customer service Highly recommended

Name: A5639
Content: Got my Dad a t shirt for fathers day and it turned out fantastic The site was easy to use and was great to get to control all aspects of the design The product came in a cool reusable tote and delivery was fast My Dad absolutely loved it Will definitely use this company again

Name: A5640
Content: This is now my go to place in Toronto for printing amazing  quick  and high quality t shirts for my company My last few experiences in here with the wonderful team were fun  professional  and memorable I worked mainly with Trevor and Dan  and my designs were quickly printed before I knew it Above all  they actually carefully inspected both of my designs and re examined the printing results  making sure I was happy with each and everyone of them before I left the store I was SO pleased with the two shirts I got for an amazing price  I will for sure come back for my other designs and will also be recommending my friends and family to come to this store Absolutely recommended  and thank you  Toronto Tees for an amazing time and product

Name: A5641
Content: Great turn around Slight hiccup at first but the gentleman that called me explained it was a slight system error and that same day it was sent out and I received my shirt the very next day Shirt quality is great Very soft and the print is amazing Definitely will be making more shirts through Toronto tees Great experience and super nice employees

Name: A5642
Content: absolutely would recommend this to a friend The quality was absolutely amazing and I think price was reasonable as it was a custom shirt It printed exactly the way I had customized it to look online

Name: A5643
Content: Joe and his team deliver high quality custom tees at a very reasonable price Its awesome to wear something you thought up and designed Ill never buy another off the shelf tee again

Name: A5644
Content: Toronto Tees has the best customer service Ive ever experienced  hands down The t shirt I ordered arrived quickly  however  the design came out blurrier than Id hoped Joe had already emailed me to confirm my satisfaction  and when I responded with my concern he responded back within minutes offering a replacement The issue ended up being that the photo I sent was too pixelated They were able to find a better quality photo of the same design and the new shirt I received is of the highest quality Not to mention it took only a few days for my orders to arrive  and both orders were hand delivered 10/10 could not recommend this place more Thank you  Toronto Tees and Joe

Name: A5645
Content: We had a last minute order and Toronto Tees was able to provide same day service for 3 custom T shirts Amazing service and great quality

Name: A5646
Content: Great hoodie comfortable and excellent print Also i want to mention that i ordered a shirt  and there was an issue with it  they were very responsive and replaced my shirt Thats what i call excellent customer service and i would buy from them again for sure And what i really like is its local Support local

Name: A5647
Content: The t shirts look great  but the womens sizing runs small  so be sure to order a size up Tom was great in helping me out with re printing a larger size that fit  so I couldnt be happier  and will definitely be going back Thanks

Name: A5648
Content: Fair price  fast service  highly recommend Great quality tee as well

Name: A5649
Content:
Got the lettering and numbering on my United shirt done here and it was perfect Great staff and I really appreciated the attention to detail on the font sizing and placement to make sure it came out  Oh  it was all done in ~ 10 mins 

COME THRU

Name: A5650
Content:
I always thought Toronto Tees only did one offs in their store location on Yonge St They are even better for large quantity orders 
Even with what Im sure are serious supply chain challenges which come with a global pandemic Joe the owner dealt with our order personally He was on top of our order and our design adjustments every step of the way Toronto Tees got our order of 150 T shirts out super fast and they are some of the best quality t shirts Ive seen or worn 
We will definitely be back for more and would not think of getting them done by anyone else as our business and promotional needs grow

Name: A5651
Content:
Great quality shirts and application of the logo we supplied 

Highly recommend

Name: A5652
Content: They understood my ask perfectly and delivered the items quickly They look great

Name: A5653
Content: Bought some t shirt designs and the kind people at Toronto Tees were so helpful in getting me what I needed Quality of the shirt and print is great too

Name: A5654
Content:
Thank you Trevor for the awesome job you did creating the 70th Birthday T Shirt for me yesterday I really appreciate the extra time you took  your attention to detail  and the quick turnaround to produce the perfect gift for my brothers special birthday I know the shirt will be a big hit at his party this weekend

Barbara

Name: A5655
Content: Awesome service Ordered a sweater with a big image I provided that covered the whole chest so impressed with the quality of the print The image is imbedded into the fabric not on the surface Sweater came within a day of the estimated time  right before Christmas which Im sure is a very busy time Great company

Name: A5656
Content: T shirt came out well and delivered on a timely basis May do additional orders It was easy to create the design

Name: A5657
Content: It was a pleasure doing business with Toronto Tees I had a large order  but they completed it in an efficient timeframe Joe was also a great help along the way He answered all my questions and brought me up to speed on the status of my order I will definitely be doing business with them again in the future

Name: A5658
Content: I recently placed an order online for 2 custom sweaters worth about  90  Soon after placing the order  Toronto Tees emailed me saying they needed a higher resolution image to print the sweaters I didnt have such an image available  so I promptly responded that Id like to cancel the order and get a refund I didnt hear back from anybody regarding this cancellation request After being ghosted for an entire week  I decided to contact my credit card company to charge back the purchase I felt like I had no choice but to do this  since I was getting zero response from Toronto Tees Coincidentally enough  on the day after I called my credit card company  I finally got an email from Toronto Tees saying that the refund would be processed Pretty strange if you ask me

Name: A5659
Content: I placed my order online for curbside pickup Designing was easy and pick up was fast and courteous Im really pleased with how the shirt turned out I actually just placed another order Great job Toronto Tees Shop local guys

Name: A5660
Content: Great quality  fast custom T shirts in Toronto I needed my order rushed for Christmas  I reached out  and Toronto Tees personally delivered it to my place downtown 10/10 Would recommend using anytime

Name: A5661
Content: Great shop  friendly and super helpful staff  Im very happy with the finished product

Name: A5662
Content: Ordered multiple times from Toronto Tees First couple were t shirt orders  then it was for a sweatshirt Always professional and helpful  especially when the logo I sent wasnt going to turn out well as I had sent it They reached out to ask for a higher resolution image and worked with me to get the best print job Amazing and punctual in making and delivering Will definitely order from these folks again

Name: A5663
Content:
Amazing experience with Toronto Tees

I went in on a Monday to get sixty B&W t shirts printed for Friday Dan was extremely helpful and efficient in getting my order set up and completed on time 

The whole way along  he called me to check in with if I was happy with how the design looked and let me know as soon as I could pick up my shirts He even threw in a few extra shirts for me which I was very grateful for 

Will definitely be using Toronto Tees again in the future for any other orders I might have

Name: A5664
Content: I recently reached out to Toronto Tees for a corporate order for t shirts for a staff event The team was incredibly quick with responding to inquiries and was accommodating to every need we had  including design changes  quantity adjustments  as well as a very short turnaround time in order for the shirts to be delivered before our staff event We had approximately 50 shirts printed and ready for pick up in just over 48 hours from finalizing our order Additionally  when I realized I had made a mistake with the quantities in our order  at no fault of the company  my math was just off  Joe at Toronto Tees was quick to respond to my second order request and printed and expedited an additional shirt for us within an hour of me reaching out I received my personal shirt yesterday  and the quality is great  and we couldnt be happier with how they turned out Highly recommend Toronto Tees and their team to anyone needing custom shirts made Thank you again  for helping us pull of the development of these shirts in time for our event

Name: A5665
Content: Bought 2 custom shirts for my son whos 22 He really liked the design and the size of the font A great unique gift idea The turnaround time was only about 2 days as well

Name: A5666
Content: Awesome service  super quick  even before Christmas  and great shirt

Name: A5667
Content: Service was terrific I had an issue with blurriness of images and they were able to fix my file to improve the quality Very happy customer

Name: A5668
Content: Could not recommend this place any more I went in with a bulk t shirt request and Tom was able to have the order completed on the same day The staff are very courteous  helpful  and experienced

Name: A5669
Content: They have an amazing website super easy to find information and design your own clothing My order came fast and was hand delivered with care  the quality is amazing and printed on good quality shirts so I had no problems with shrinking in the wash 10/10 would definitely recommend for any and all printing needs

Name: A5670
Content: My order of 10 shirts with a design was processed and made within a few days  and it got sent to me in less than a week The quality of printing and the shirts themselves seem great  and I definitely would buy from Toronto Tees again

Name: A5671
Content: Excellent service My custom shirt turned out perfect

Name: A5672
Content: This is my favourite place to go for gifts in the city Ive purchased several personalized t shirts as gifts from Toronto Tees The quality of both the t shirts and the prints is fantastic  and the customer service is top notch If youre looking for great quality  service  and to support local business  this is THE place to go Thanks  guys  for always being awesome

Name: A5673
Content: Ive ordered from Toronto Tees twice Both times they were super easy to work with Once online and once in person I even screwed up with the delivery and they got back to me with emails and phone calls just to make sure I got the package Forget about buying on Amazon support your local businesses like Toronto Tees

Name: A5674
Content: Sam was an absolute beauty in helping me get a tight turnaround on a shirt for a wedding Turned out amazing  and super accommodating + friendly Will be back for more shirts

Name: A5675
Content: Put in a custom tee order for mothers day recently  and made a slight mistake on my order The owner ended up contacting me directly to rectify it free of charge  which was very much appreciated The tees were printed same day as well  and my parents loved them Great experience overall

Name: A5676
Content:
Amazing service All my questions and mockup requests were addressed very quick and very professional 
Quality of my products and print work are perfect 
Price  absolutely adequate 
Will recommend Joe and his team to all my friends
Good luck and keep developing your business with the same attitude

Name: A5677
Content: Needed a t shirt order in a very short time and delivered on time for a sports tournament  Toronto Tees got it done and with terrific communication and most kind customer service A place you can trust for sure  thanks for everything

Name: A5678
Content: I ordered a last minute shirt for a friend as a joke and needed it right away The service at Toronto Tees was accommodating and friendly I created the shirt easily online  then called to see if I could receive it sooner than their standard timeframe  and they could not have been more responsive I was thrilled when I opened the bag and saw the quality  it looked better than I hoped Thank you

Name: A5679
Content: Very fast and accurate local printing on products The website was very user friendly and it was easy to come up with a design for our gift Products are sourced from different countries as we got a hat  shirt and free face mask from them i would definitely purchase from Toronto Tees again for any future gift ideas

Name: A5680
Content: My company had a need for custom masks that needed to be delivered sooner than later I was very happy with how quickly they communicated both via email and the phone Really appreciated the smooth business model And the product was as advertised Its nice to do straight business with no surprises I will definitely recommend Thanks team

Name: A5681
Content: I made a last minute decision to order a couple of personalized zip up hoodies to celebrate my 30 year wedding anniversary I was so pleased that they arrived well before the actual date They looked fantastic I would have liked to have had them embroidered as opposed to stenciled  and I would have liked to have had a choice of a heavier material But I am more than pleased with the outcome and will definitely recommend them to anyone Thank you so much Oh and BTW  my husband loved the sweater He thought it was such a clever way to recognize our special day Thanks again

Name: A5682
Content: We absolutely loved our company t shirts and hoodies which we purchased from Toronto Tees Joe was amazing and provided great service  answering all our inquiries  preparing mock ups and sending our order out for delivery with quick turnaround We would highly recommend and purchase again

Name: A5683
Content: Super customer service Also very fast and these guys respond within minutes  My tshirt looks great I had an issue with one of the letters looking scuffed and they fixed me up with a new one without even blinking Highly recommended

Name: A5684
Content: Always the best service and finished products I love this shop and will continue to have cheesy t shirts made for every occasion  D

Name: A5685
Content: Took a picture of a picture and had it put on a T for my boy It was BETTER than expected Best gift ever

Name: A5686
Content:
Ive driven by the store front so many times and have been meaning to try it out for the past year 

Toronto tees Joe was easy to coordinate with  made a sample of what I ordered very accurate and had it delivered to my doorstep for free within 3 5 days Quick and easy 
My co ed volleyball crew loved the shirts and complimented the quality  too heather grey unisex tshirt 
Definitely will be a returning customer Happy to support local business too

Name: A5687
Content:
Needed a last minute order done on behalf of my kids for their step dad and they got it done a lot quicker than others could The tshirt is soft and of great quality  fits perfectly and was very much loved by the recipient 
Communication with staff was quick and easy  and Joe was very helpful along the way

Name: A5688
Content: It was about a week before Christmas and both the lineups for ordering and pickups were long I was impressed with how quick  organized  upbeat and professional the staff remained under those conditions I gave my t shirt as a gift and my friend loved it

Name: A5689
Content: Great customer service Im happy with the results My uploads didnt show up on the website  so I received an email from them the same day and they were able to take my uploads via email with no issues Didnt wait long either Highly recommend

Name: A5690
Content: Long time visual artist & photoshop user I sent these guys a custom image for a sweater that printed EXACTLY as I had envisioned No BS best quality of work Ive seen for a business of this type Well done guys

Name: A5691
Content: My custom t shirts came out better than I had hope for The print came out great  smooth edges  perfect size And they were ready faster than estimated Thank you

Name: A5692
Content:
I was looking for a tshirt for my daughter upon her graduation I saw something I liked but  it was based out of California So I decided to search local and found Toronto Tees I sent a picture of what I was looking for and they matched it perfectly I put an order in and it was at my door within days They really are awesome Very friendly and accommodating Im so glad I decided to shop local Thank you Joe and your team for a great experience 
Linda

Name: A5693
Content: I placed an order and it was ready the same day I designed the writing to go on the front of the t shirt and it was replicated exactly I am very grateful that this birthday gift could be prepared so quickly  efficiently and within my specifications at such a reasonable cost I would definitely order again through Toronto Tees

Name: A5694
Content: I had some custom T shirts printed for my kids for Christmas presents I was very pleased with how easy it was to design the shirts on the website and they turned out FABULOUS Good quality  well made and the print job was perfect Thank you

Name: A5695
Content: Toronto Tees offers excellent custom t shirt services They are super fast and easy to deal with Their online design app is amazing The quality of the t shirts is also great I highly recommend them

Name: A5696
Content: Working with Toronto Tees has been wonderful They were very responsive to my queries They went above and beyond getting mock ups made and providing me with helpful information along the way The shirts look and feel fantastic I would highly recommend using their services My family thanks you

Name: A5697
Content: Loooved the shirts we customized for my friends bachelorette The shirts were exactly as expected And was made pretty quick  in 2 days + I initially paid for a rush fee for the tees to deliver to our home since we were worried about the timing  but later I called the shop to change to an in store pick up The shop owner was patient and helped refund the delivery fee the next day Would highly recommend

Name: A5698
Content: I love the sweater great material and high quality design I made one for my Photography business not only were they fast delivery but when there was an issue with one of my pictures they messaged me and when I responded back the answered within 5 hours Fastest customer service Ive gone through will definitely be ordering from them again

Name: A5699
Content:
I ordered a hoodie with a custom design The print turned out crisp and the colour was spot on The hoodie is also super soft and comfortable Toronto tees is my favourite print shop and I got my item within 48 hours Highly recommend to anyone looking to do prints 

Also the team here really cares  and emailed me about colour and logo quality with recommended adjustments before printing to ensure I got the best quality 

Thank you so much

Name: A5700
Content: Toronto Tees provides a very good service It is easy to design and select your products on the website  shipping is free if you order over a certain number of them  and delivery with Purolator was faster than the estimate promised by 3 business days I ordered baseball hats and mens and womens t shirts  one colour printing black on white The t shirts themselves are good quality and the print quality looks good The logo on the hats was a little smaller than anticipated  but on the shirts was quite large The womens T  which I ordered in extra large looks like a medium very fitted  so I should probably have gone larger with the womens sizing Mens sizing is as expected White shirts are a little more off white whereas the white hats are pure white Overall I was pleased and would order from Toronto Tees again

Name: A5701
Content: I am thrilled with my products I had been having an extremely difficult time finding a company that didnt require a minimum order of six products or that wasnt crazy expensive  and time was of the essence as I needed it for Christmas Thankfully I found Toronto Tees just in time The ordering process was easy and when there was a question/potential issue with my order  they called me right away and they consulted with me You never know with online ordering what kind of quality youre going to get  but after speaking with Trevor  I felt confident that I would get a great product  and I did And it arrived within a week of that phone call Super happy and would definitely order from them again

Name: A5702
Content:
The t shirt was great Even tho they sell Guildan only  the quality of it is decent I havent washed it yet  so dont know if it shrinks after Hopefully it wont 
Image application is amazing It wont come off easily 
Sizing is precise It fitted my bf perfectly 
Turnaround is fast too I placed an order and the next day they emailed me that I can come and pick it up 

Very happy with the purchase

Name: A5703
Content: Best place to get custom shirts done Joe the owner and operator was nothing but awesome and beyond helpful He got my shirts done ASAP and they looked so good Great quality and also super affordable and fair prices You really get what you pay for when you come to Toronto Tees 10/10

Name: A5704
Content: Amazing quality they did a great job and were a pleasure to work with I kept asking questions about the design and the team didnt hesitate to help me They were truly a pleasure to deal with The shirt came within a week of ordering it Where else can you get a high quality personalized shirt in less than a week? I will absolutely be using them in the future Joe and his team are incredible

Name: A5705
Content: Great service My father in law needed shirts made in 24 hours and the Toronto Tees team delivered  This is what he had to say  No issues The boys were surprised and loved your design No problem with the pick up  shirts were ready when I arrived

Name: A5706
Content: Amazing print  high quality  durable and affordable I got great service from Jay and Ill definitely be coming back next time I need a print

Name: A5707
Content:
My online ordering experience was fantastic The order was hand delivered by the team within days 
Most importantly  I made a typo when I designed the t shirts online and I didnt notice I didnt notice it online or in the confirmation email So while Toronto Tees was in the middle of making my shirts  they called to triple check the typo is what I wanted Thank goodness they did They were able to make the correction and my t shirts are wonderful Ive washed and hung mine to dry several times and it still looks brand new If I need t shirts again I will 100 recommend Toronto Tees

Name: A5708
Content: Great service on a customized print job that I wanted I brought in a tank top in a small size that they didnt have  and they printed the image in the position where I wanted it while I waited not long  15 minutes

Name: A5709
Content: Five star experience with Freshly Baked They turned around custom t shirts for a client campaign in 24 hours and delivered it right to my office door

Name: A5710
Content: Customer service was amazing I ordered two hoodies as a gift for my bosses  there was a VERY slight mix up and Jay the manager had everything sorted for me within an hour The quality of the product was amazing i couldnt fault any part of the transaction We will definitely use Toronto Tees again Jay deserves a raise for his customer care

Name: A5711
Content: Extremely fast and friendly service My team has been using Toronto Tees for years  and they have yet to disappoint The quality of the shirts and the durability of the ink is unmatched when compared to competitors I without a doubt would recommend this company when looking for custom printed clothing

Name: A5712
Content: These guys always do an amazing job  I go there to get all my original art printed on shirts and sweaters Ive gotten 7 different shirts printed and 3 sweaters  and theyre always professional and make sure I get the product I want

Name: A5713
Content: The shirts were made SUPER fast and the quality of the work/shirts were top notch

Name: A5714
Content: Nice material and the writing printed on the hoody was perfect It was a nice birthday gift  He loved it Thanks for processing the urgent request

Name: A5715
Content:
Im so pleased with the service I received at Toronto Tees Once I put the order through  the T shirt was quickly customized  packaged  and sent off for delivery Within a few days my sister received her special birthday present She was thrilled with the message & the quality of the shirt A free mask was even included Thank you to Joe & his team I wouldnt hesitate to order again & recommend Toronto Tees to my friends 
Linda Rowe

Name: A5716
Content: Super friendly staff I needed to get a custom T shirt as a farewell gift It couldnt have been more easy Placed the order online and emailed to get it early heard back from Joe the owner in 5 min to come to the shop to pick it up Excellent service

Name: A5717
Content: Fantastic quality and great customer service My friends and I were so happy to see our vision of the t shirt come to be Thank you Joe and all the Toronto Tees staff

Name: A5718
Content: I like this company very much I had a small issue with my last order and they took care of everything right away with no questions asked I was very pleased and grateful They will definitely get my business anytime

Name: A5719
Content: I rush ordered 8 custom baby onesies for an upcoming baby shower last week Not only were they all perfect  but I had them at my doorstep in Ottawa within two business days Kyle even added a handwritten note to the package thanking me for the order Will definitely be using this company again in the future

Name: A5720
Content:
Excellent service  great quality print and tees 

Joe was quick  friendly and even touched up the design to ensure that it printed optimally

Name: A5721
Content: Several years ago when I started my own business I had tees done here and Im still wearing one of them so I knew this was where I would go to get a couple of items with my thoughts on them Service was excellent and Tom who served me gets a thumbs up for being so helpful and fun In our current upside down world we need more people like him I have a lot of thoughts lately so Ill definitely be back

Name: A5722
Content: If you are looking for a place to print your favorite words/photo on a t shirt  this is the place to go I am so happy with my product  Toronto Tees did a great job on my request They have experience and you will be happy with your order If you have any issues  you can contact them  they will respond quickly and effectively I will definitively use their services again

Name: A5723
Content:
The online design options made it so easy and fun to create an original custom tee shirt 
There was a bit of a problem with the finished product but the team went above and beyond to fix it 
I will be sure to use Toronto Tee again and highly recommend them too

Name: A5724
Content: I ordered a set of 10 custom  full colour masks from Toronto Tees just a few weeks ago as a gift for friends The result was better than I could have hoped I worried that the design for the masks was too intricate and that either colour or detail would be lost  instead  the printing came out beautifully with perfect colour and detail  and the masks themselves were also of very high quality Would highly recommend

Name: A5725
Content: We had been looking for a specific shirt from a specific place for my granddads birthday for years to no avail  so we decided to have one made Toronto Tees was awesome I had used them before to make a custom hoody for my husband they were amazing then and amazing now Fast  courteous  and local which is my favourite kind of business Thanks again for all your help Joe and team

Name: A5726
Content:
Toronto Tees provided me with the highest quality and service possible
I am very pleased with the quality of the logo printed on the shirts that I bought Both shirts arrived super fast which impressed me very much I highly recommend this company if you are looking for superlative quality and service

Name: A5727
Content: Not only did my order ship super fast  the prints looks great and come with a wash guarantee  but the sweatshirts were one of the softest  most comfortable shirts Ive ever worn 100 will be coming back with my friends to order more

Name: A5728
Content: Very impressed The baby onesie arrived in a few days and looks better in real life than online It would be cool if there was option to print on the back as well

Name: A5729
Content: I recently used the self serve design tool to create a custom t shirt and was pleased by how easy it was to use I placed the order and it was ready for pick up within a few short hours Fast service  great quality  would definitely use this service again

Name: A5730
Content:
I always thought it would be really expensive to do a small job But theyre actually really well priced  certainly the same cost of any branded T shirts like Roots  etc 

I was very happy with the results and very happy that the fit I chose was as advertised  not super tight  but not the boxy kind most souvenir T shirts are 

Quick to answer questions online and quick to produce the T shirts Ill be doing more

Name: A5731
Content: Id say my standards are pretty high when it comes to custom things  being a User Interface designer Im strongly detail and quality ordinate Coming into a totally busy store  the guys at Toronto Tees still delivered friendly quick service with excellent attention to detail Would definitely recommend their easy and fast customization service

Name: A5732
Content:
The service was great Ordered it at noon and the shirt was waiting at my door when I got home exact quality I was expecting from the previews available online The shirt and design selection are great for a quick and simple setup Will use them again for all my silly shirt needs

Update Ive continued to use this place for other orders shirts  hats and its almost like the service has gotten better Shipping to NS is always on time or early and the quality it great

Name: A5733
Content: My first time ordering from Toronto Tees I did it online and e mailed with Joe A slight miscommunication that Joe was quick to jump on once it was realized which is appreciated I was upset but Joe was patient and understanding The order was reprinted so fast and turned out amazing I HIGHLY recommend ordering from them Great customer service and efficient I look forward to ordering from them again

Name: A5734
Content:
I was doing Family T shirts with Toronto tees  these guys are great
I used there design tool on the website  which was convenient 
There was an issue with pricing  I ordered 5 t shirts  but the price was higher per one than its supposed to be when you do 4+  so I reached out  explained  and was refunded right away 
The T shirts were delivered next day after I submitted the order 
I am very happy and highly recommended

Name: A5735
Content: I walked in off the street  met Evan  we worked on my idea for a sweater which required some development and I am DELIGHTED Evan was so helpful  cool and kind The experience was fast and efficient Oh and I adore my sweater Its perfect Thank you

Name: A5736
Content: I bought a customized sweater as a gift and was perfect in size and as I ordered it My friend said it fit him perfectly and the fabric is pretty soft As well  he received earlier than expected Great job Toronto Tees

Name: A5737
Content: Fast turn around  great comfortable cotton fabric Cant wait to reorder They even customized the print bags  Joe is accessible on phone for any details Gotta love their care

Name: A5738
Content: Making a Special T Shirt order of 1 was as easy and professionally done as it could have been I ordered the shirt with the design I wanted on line then choose to go down to the store on Yonge Street to have it printed while I waited The staff were friendly and very helpful After looking at the design quality and pigmentation we went with another better version of my design They were quick in doing any additional touch up and scaling the design to the front of the shirt that I was looking for After that the shirt was produced and ready within 10 minutes I couldnt have asked for better service Yes I will use Toronto Tees again and recommended them to anyone looking to have t shirts done from 1 to a large quantity By the way the t shirt will be making its way down the Red Carpet at the premiere of JUKEBOX HERO in Toronto

Name: A5739
Content: Great service I called as wanted a shirt made and didnt want to drive to Toronto They walked me through on the phone how to do it online I designed it that night and had the shirt in my hands within a few days Good quality and fair pricing Would def use them again

Name: A5740
Content: I had placed an order for 8 custom shirts  front & back I received my order in a timely manner and exactly to the specifications I had designed online The team also provided a quick and COVID safe curbside pickup The quality of the shirt and printing is incredible and the recipients were very happy with it Thanks again to Joe and team

Name: A5741
Content: Excellent quality 100 cotton t shirt and the graphics turned out nicely and even better than I thought they might The turnaround from online ordering and delivery to my home was quick also I know where to go for a custom t shirt and this is the place

Name: A5742
Content: Had a great experience ordering from Toronto Tees The customer service is brilliant Joe ensured that my order was ready quicker than expected since it was a birthday gift Highly recommend them

Name: A5743
Content: We placed an order through Joe at Toronto Tees a couple weeks ago for Hoodies  Tees  Ball Caps & Toques for our business and they arrived yesterday The process for ordering was seamless  the prices are very reasonable  shipping was quick and the quality of the apparel is fabulous We are super happy with our order and will be placing another one soon Thanks Toronto Tees

Name: A5744
Content: I ordered a set of sweaters two weeks ago and they were ready for pickup the next day Excellent quality  excellent service So good that I sent in an order for another set of items this past week Same quality and service Super great company  SUPPORT LOCAL

Name: A5745
Content:
I had 4 t shirts printed here  and they turned out great and were ready really quickly Staff was very friendly 

There was initially an issue where a couple of the vector files for designs I provided werent displaying properly I added notes to the order requesting confirmation of whether they were seeing the same incorrect display  but the notes got missed and the shirts were misprinted However they had me email the files instead and then they displayed properly The replacement prints were great and ready in no time

Name: A5746
Content: My group and I just recently order sweaters for our team from Toronto tees The staff was more than helpful with getting us a quote right away and had them done and ready and shipped extremely fast Everyone on the team was beyond impressed with the way the sweaters turned out  and they were happy with the prices as well I would highly recommend Toronto tees if you are looking to get print on on clothing

Name: A5747
Content: Fantastic customer service I ordered a shirt charcoal gray  and the font black was too hard to read because the gray was darker in person than on the site There was also the issue of image sizing  once again reality was different from the site submission However  when I contacted them about these issues  they took care of it immediately They reprinted another shirt with the requested changes for me without hesitation The reprinted shirt is perfect Based on the customer service  I would definitely order again

Name: A5748
Content:
My order arrived very quickly but there was a misspell of the text on one of the Tshirts I sent them a quick email and almost immediately received a call from the gentleman at the shop forgot his name  He was very professional and polite and resolved the issue right away and sent me another shirt which arrived with no problems 

I also received a follow up email from Joe who is the owner not to shortly after 

Overall very satisfied with the product and even more with ther service 

Thanks1

Name: A5749
Content: I called with a rush order for a very special gift and they knocked it out of the park The fit was perfect  the material was top shelf  and the digital print made the artwork look deadly They really came through for me at the eleventh hour and Ill never forget it Toronto Tees is the citys finest

Name: A5750
Content: I ordered online which was fast and easy But I got the sizing wrong the womens v neck tees fit EXTREMELY snug  I called and they were quick to offer to reprint since I was unhappy with the order The new sizing is great and the shirt looks amazing Will definitely go back for future t shirt needs

Name: A5751
Content: Quality exceeded my expectations The sweater itself is heavy duty  honestly better quality than some of my branded items The print is super clean and the gold colour looks amazing Will be ordering again  for myself next time this was a gift

Name: A5752
Content: Ive been getting shirts printed from Toronto Tees for years and it has always been a pleasant  seamless experience High quality + super quick turnaround = what more can you ask for in a printing service? Highly recommended

Name: A5753
Content: I needed one t shirt done quickly  < 24 hours and Toronto Tees came through for me I uploaded a design  gave em a call like I was supposed to  explained my situation and voila they were on it and I picked it up in no time It also looked great Thank you Toronto Tees

Name: A5754
Content:
I wanted printed tees for my bday and found them on Google The team was professional and got my tops in a timely manner I was a bit disappointed that they didnt have any of the coloured tees I wanted so I settled with black 
I usually wear medium  but this looks a little small I like the quality of the prints and will definitely use again or recommend 

Update I wore the tee for my bday  it wasnt as small as I initially thought  or as it looked Im in love with it and got lots of compliments Great quality Highly recommended

Name: A5755
Content: Very good and fast service I picked these guys absolutely randomly just by doing a google search last year for a customized T shirt Very nicely done while I was waiting at their Yonge location 100 satisfaction So when I needed another one again this year  I ordered it online with my own design and went to pick it up the next day Good quality T shirts  good quality print

Name: A5756
Content: I have ordered a few custom tees and tanks through other companies but Toronto Tees is my new favourite go to It was quick turnaround and the quality of the tank tops I ordered was better than the others Ive ordered Highly recommend and Im super picky

Name: A5757
Content: Have always had a positive experience when using this company for shirt printing We had them create our staff T shirts with our logo and STAFF written on We contacted them through email and seamlessly designed our shirt through the website Turnaround for a few shirts was only a few hours if they arent busy At the most a day or two Larger orders Im sure would take longer Overall shirt quality is great and lasts long in the wash Great customer service experience

Name: A5758
Content:
Amazing service Would definitely recommend for a neat and super quick print and delivery All 4 of the Tshirts I customized were delivered the very next day 
I just wished they had more products in terms of variety  Thanks again for your great service

Name: A5759
Content: I was thrilled to see the image I had chosen on the t shirt After a bit of coordination  the colours and orientation were perfect Thank you

Name: A5760
Content: 10/10 made ordering large amounts super easy Flexible with their time frames and are able to do rush orders The t shirts I ordered look amazing and are of great quality Would order again

Name: A5761
Content: I ordered some individual graphic tshirts for a family members birthday online from Toronto Tees The next day when i got there to pick them up  the shirts were all ready but we noticed that on the order my fault not theirs  one of the graphics was landscape instead of portrait The staff  especially Trevor  were there to help and fixed it on the spot Great customer service definitely recommend

Name: A5762
Content:
I absolutely love this store I have gotten multiple shirts printed here over the years and the quality has always been amazing The printing on the shirts have lasted for years I have one shirt I made 10 years ago and even after repeated washings  its just now starting to fade a bit 

Their customer service is second to none I ordered a shirt yesterday that was mistakenly done as a pick up when I had ordered it for shipping It was quickly rectified and I received the shirt yesterday evening 

I have even had shirts printed here as gifts Will definitely use them again

Name: A5763
Content: Great team to work with The whole process of getting my T shirts printed was seamless and easy Shirts were affordable and turned out great Thanks for a great experience

Name: A5764
Content: T shirts came out EVEN BETTER than I had hoped My only suggestion would be in the self design process  which would be enhanced if the design image could be bigger Love my T shirts from Toronto Tees

Name: A5765
Content:
Never had an experience like this before;

uploaded the artwork  sent the order through  and less that 24 hours later a brand new  stunningly reproduced graphic t shirt was at my door 
Easy to design the area available on the fabric seems to be a lot larger than other companies  too  which made the decision that much easier 

Stunning work and service LOVE IT

Name: A5766
Content:
I had a relatively small order of 6 sweatshirts and had some of the best customer service Ive received in a long time They accommodated my request of a 2XL sweater with no issues  checked in to make sure the timeline was okay for me to get them and they arrived right on time 

I dont leave a lot of the reviews but that was absolutely stellar customer service and every time I called the guys were courteous  informative and helpful 

Ill be back for sure

Name: A5767
Content: Joe and his team are great They dont just make custom shirts They make amazing memories Where else can you design a shirt that makes someone feel incredibly special Thanks Joe

Name: A5768
Content:
I had t shirts made for my dental office team and also masks All with a new logo Quality clothing and tremendous workmanship 
Good communication during the design and fabrication Joes results were great My staff is pleased

Name: A5769
Content: great sweatshirt  great service I ordered a sweatshirt to be shipped when an opportunity to do curbside pickup came up and they had it printed for me to pickup shortly after I called and refunded the shipping My only complaint is that I wish they had had more sweatshirt colour options the colour I originally ordered was out of stock in S  which wasnt indicated when I intially placed the order  Thanks again

Name: A5770
Content:
Ive ordered a few times not from Toronto Tees and theyve always been top notch 
Very timely on the order time and the quality of the customer hoodies and t shirts are on point 
Pick up is contactless  smooth and easy 
Thank you Toronto Tees

Name: A5771
Content:
Outstanding customer service I recently ordered bulk t shirts from them for a hackathon event and we had many modifications to the designs Always received prompt replies and clear answers to any questions or doubts from Joe We received the t shirts as promised  on time and of very good quality The designs look great and matched what I received on the mockups  
The only slight concern I have was the t shirts turned out a bit bigger in size than expected but considering the material probably shrinks in the wash  it should be okay

Name: A5772
Content:
Amazing staff They helped me get my order rushed and everyone loved the t shirts for our first in person DnD since Covid 
Thank you very much to the wonderful staff  I will definitely be using their services again

Name: A5773
Content: Very quick service and excellent print Love

Name: A5774
Content: I ordered a pre made and a custom shirt very easy to do online as part of my retail therapy and they were hand delivered less than a week later I was pleasantly surprised with the great printing quality and the cute reusable bag they were delivered in The whole experience made me smile so I will 150 be back for more apparel in the near future Would highly recommend

Name: A5775
Content:
They did a great job fulfilling my order They contacted me with suggestions to confirm order details and with suggestions to improve the look Unfortunately  the order initially delivered with missing items and mistake on one item BUT I contacted them and they fixed all the issues/items right away and had them sent out to me immediately and my family loves the matching gear 
Thanks guys

Name: A5776
Content:
Ordered on several occasions  either a cool shirt for myself or a gag gift for a friend Quality of the print is always great  holds up well in the dryer Doesnt feel cheap and plasticy The shirts have a great fit as well Nice quality 

Service  even during the holidays  was super fast same day or next day and super friendly when you arrive for pickup

Name: A5777
Content: I had a custom hoodie made with them and I had something very specific in mind Both me and the person who was gifted with the hoodie lived it The quality of the hoodie itself was 10 out of 10  extremely soft and comfy and also the print was perfectly made to what I ordered The staff was great with handling my request  calling me to confirm details and making sure everything was to my liking I couldnt be happier

Name: A5778
Content: I ordered Indie88 merch through Toronto Tees and its great The hoodie is super comfy and the vintage T is super soft The face mask is comfortable to wear and fits well The quality of the logos on each item is excellent

Name: A5779
Content: We ordered a custom T shirt for a colleague at work The designer tool online was very easy to use It took only minutes to create the custom T shirt The service in the store was awesome There were some flaws with the graphic I uploaded The staff corrected them for me to make the T shirt look better I would definitely go back and have them print other T shirts for me in the future

Name: A5780
Content: Items were made exactly how I wanted and completed in good time Will shop here again

Name: A5781
Content: Great quality shirt Printing is perfect and doesnt wear off Very pleased and great costumer service

Name: A5782
Content: It was very easy to use the website Customer support was there when I needed it Prices and selection were great I would definitely use these guys again

Name: A5783
Content: I am so grateful that I found Toronto Tees I needed masks made for an event and only had 7 days to make it happen Joe was so great  he helped me make sure that the artwork was perfect  had everything printed AND delivered to me in less than 7 days I will definitely be ordering from Toronto Tees/Joe again in the future

Name: A5784
Content: Once again  a great experience We are returning customers  they made shirts for our Christmas Family reunion in December and were able to make us a couple of custom shirts to keep it light while we get through this Communication great and fast shipping We will be back  Im sure

Name: A5785
Content: It was so much fun designing the T shirt on line and having it show up at my door a few days later The T shirt was fabulous  made me feel like an artist which I am certainly not  But the best part was the outstanding customer service I rarely give 5 stars for reviews  but each star was deserved here

Name: A5786
Content: Amazing customer service Cant say enough good things about Toronto Tees

Name: A5787
Content: The image I sent in was in poor quality and resulted in it looking a little faded on the front To make up for this Dan took a new photo I gave him and printed me a second sweater free of charge and looked better than I hoped Overall I am very happy with how the sweater looks and am very satisfied with the customer service

Name: A5788
Content: I had an awesome experience with TorontoTees last week Got a custom printed sweater with the help of Trevor and Dan  they were incredibly helpful with making sure I got a high quality print Thanks very much to you both My girlfriend absolutely loved it Will be back again soon for more prints Cheers

Name: A5789
Content:
Loved the item  its exactly as I wanted printed It only took 5 mins to upload and order It was ready for pick up in 3 4 days which was awesome 

The womens large I ordered fits small but thats not any complaint about the quality of service  just a note for people to order 1 size up

Name: A5790
Content:
This place was great I called and told them I needed something done asap and they got it done within minutes without hassle 

The shirt I designed came out exactly as I wanted it to and the quality was great I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for custom gear

Name: A5791
Content:
Delivery was fast and designing is easy I had an issue the first time  but the customer service was so helpful they resolved my issue quickly and effectively 
I just wish they had more colour options for baby onesies

Name: A5792
Content: These guys are absolutely amazing Got my order confirmed  shipped  and delivered in 2 days  in what is probably a busy holiday season The quality of their products is stellar too  and I look forward to working with them again in the future for any of my custom clothing needs

Name: A5793
Content: Ordered 16 shirts for a bachelor party  they turned out really well and were ready in 4 5 days Staff were also very helpful & friendly Will definitely order shirts from here again in the future

Name: A5794
Content: This company is a life saver I needed printed shirts for a new job opportunity and with Covid 19 it felt impossible to get this done Thankfully I was introduced to this company through a classmate and literally within 2 days of purchase I had my order It was exactly what I asked for and I couldnt be happier Thank you so much Keep up the great work

Name: A5795
Content: Had a great experience dealing with Toronto Tees They helped me with my small order  were super helpful and professional Received my order and it was exactly what I was looking for Im happy to have been able to order online and help out a local Toronto business

Name: A5796
Content: Toronto Tees is my number one choice for custom t shirts I recently had a rush request  and Toronto Tees designed the shirt for me and delivered the whole project very quickly Always a wonderful experience

Name: A5797
Content: Joe was great to work with He replied promptly  was professional  accommodating and worked with me to ensure I was happy with the end product Shipping was quick and were very happy with how our shirts turned out

Name: A5798
Content: I am overjoyed with the service and bulk order I received from Toronto Tees Trevour was phenomenal to work with I came in with an image which I knew wasnt the best quality  but I didnt know how to fix the resolution Trevour did his magic and ensured my teeshirt prints came out topnotch He was responsive over email  extremely helpful and ensured I had ample opportunity to ask questions and make suggestions He made minor edits to the design with ease and then the print was flawlessly delivered My family  friends & I LOVE our tees

Name: A5799
Content: Order 2 t shirts for me and my gf Need it asap because she was flying away Sent them an email and asked for rush request Amazing team and service They printed t shirts and ready for pick up within 2 3 hours after i placed an order Awesome job Thank you

Name: A5800
Content: I needed a t shirt printed in a very short timeframe for a birthday  and they gave it to me in 10 minutes Cool store  great service and they get the job done super fast Also very accurate designer on the website which makes ordering it easier Highly recommend Toronto Tees

Name: A5801
Content: Ordered a swear shirt that I needed last minute You guys were amazing My order was ready in 2 days and the curb side pick up was so convenient and easy The quality of the sweatshirt is so good too

Name: A5802
Content: Gotta say if you are looking for the perfect gift idea  or have an event that you want shirts for  this is the place to get them made They have the friendliest staff to help along the way Each time I have presented my Ideas or asked any questions  they totally worked with me to get the look I wanted for my shirts It is my go to for unique gift ideas  that make lasting memories

Name: A5803
Content: A fantastic experience The shirts feel solid  the printing is bright & beautiful  the delivery was fast Joe was a clear & quick communicator and accommodated all our adjustments Highly recommended

Name: A5804
Content: This is not the first order I have had with Toronto tees Everything is always done quickly and exactly as requested This recent order was printed crooked and they reprinted and replaced very quickly at no charge A great business and treats customers with kindness and respect

Name: A5805
Content: Have used Toronto Tees a few times now for one off gifts Its always a very easy process  both in store and online And Ive always been happy with the outcome

Name: A5806
Content: I get my custom tees done here exclusively Ive had a ton of nerd shirts made here and theyve never let me down with the quality of the prints Theyre local  so well worth the visit and business

Name: A5807
Content: Ive placed two orders here and both times have been incredibly satisfied Both baby onesies exceeded our expectations so I would highly recommend these folks

Name: A5808
Content: Love to support local  and these guys get a solid 5 star Needed fast and affordable tshirt printing  uploaded my vector artwork  picked up my tshirt curbside in a few days  and couldnt be happier The shirt I ordered was a vintage blue  its a really nice lightweight tshirt  super soft The printing was crisp  clean and the colour was even better than I had imagined Will definitely be back for more in the future

Name: A5809
Content: Some of the best customer service I have ever received  and I am in customer service so was really impressed Quick and courteous response times  really fast printing & shipping The quality of the sweaters is wonderful  have washed multiple times already and love

Name: A5810
Content: I have ordered from here twice I had a slight issue with one of my orders which was technically my fault but the manager Joe corrected it and resent me the order within less then 24h Amazing customer service No hassle at all Best tshirt shop in Toronto hands down Super high quality print on the shirts everyone loved them Thanks Joe and team Cant wait to order more

Name: A5811
Content: Ok  these guys do it right From a seamless ordering process  to the perfect production of the t shirt of my daughters dreams  to an easy curbside pick up Not only that  but their customer service is spot on Joe and Tom are top notch people After picking up my order I accidentally got permanent marker on the image on my shirt and they reprinted it for me at no charge Talk about service and generosity I would not hesitate using them and cannot wait to order more from them in the future  Think team shirts  bachelor/bachelorette tees  cool one offs  anything Truly appreciate their service Support local

Name: A5812
Content: Ive ordered a bunch from this store and their shirts are always good quality The prints come out really nice and their customer service is amazing I usually gift the shirts to friends and everyone has loved them 10/10 would recommend

Name: A5813
Content:
Ordered online and was ready for pick up next day Was happy to find parking just right across the shop on the corner Customer service was great  the young guy assisted me to find my order Overall it was good experience 
However  having female clothing rather than unisex would be a better idea cos it seem the hoodie I ordered in Medium maybe a little big for my wife

Name: A5814
Content: These guys are awesome They have helped with our company merchandise and never disappoint They do great work and always suggest help with design  colours and products Just received our most recent order & love the crew neck sweaters  hoodies & tees

Name: A5815
Content:
This is the best custom t shirt place in the city 

I placed my order online and picked it up that afternoon I wasnt happy with the sizing and they fixed it on the spot Ive used them many times an will continue to do so the online design/ordering system is so simple to use 

No complaints from me

Name: A5816
Content: The store opens at 12pm and I arrived there at 11 55am They let me in early which I was relieved with because I had to explain to the employee that I needed 2 of my custom t shirts done ASAP because my Greyhound bus was leaving at 12 30pm  and the tshirts were suppose to be a gift for someone who lives far away This employee went to work right away He managed to finish both of the t shirts at 12 10pm They looked amazing I was so pleased that the employee did a great job in a quick amount of time just to please me I caught my bus in time and the gift made my friend VERY happy Toronto tees is a Terrific store

Name: A5817
Content: Great company Use them every use for my sons birthday t shirt They do a great job and delivery within the city  which has really been helpful through Covid Highly recommend

Name: A5818
Content: I am extremely happy with my experience with Toronto Tees Joe went absolutely above and beyond to help me with the order and he was so accommodating The turnaround time for the order was quick and I picked it up in store When I got home I realized the sizes didnt quite match what I had ordered  and the T shirts were for an event the very next day I called the store  spoke to Joe  and he pulled a miracle and had the entire order reprinted at no cost and ready for pickup same day before the store closed I am so thankful and appreciative I cant thank them enough I will be ordering from Toronto Tees again That was the best customer service experience possible and I am thrilled with how perfect the t shirts turned out Thank you

Name: A5819
Content: I had an amazing experience from start to finish Staff were helpful and polite  my order came fast and was exactly what I wanted I will definitely be using their service again in the future Thank you for making it so easy to order online and receive contactless delivery during these crazy times

Name: A5820
Content: Toronto Tees helped me get an order of 40 hoodies designed and printed very quickly The hoodies and printing were of good quality and the price was competitive Joe was super responsive and helpful I had had an issue with sizing on a previous teeshirt order and a replacement was made for me quickly and cheerfully Ill definitely keep using Toronto Tees

Name: A5821
Content: I wish I knew about this place sooner because now I can make and purchase really amazing  personalized gifts for someone and his equally friendly and helpful coworker sorry  I wish I got your name were both super patient in helping me design a last minute gift for a friend They gave me great advice and tips  and they were also pleasantly fast I was in and out in minutes  which was really appreciated My friend loved his gift and Ill definitely

Name: A5822
Content: Ive had two great experiences at Toronto Tees I first went in last year  where they replicated a custom t shirt design for me and my friend in no time Today  Trevor proved very helpful  friendly  efficient  and incredibly accommodating I would highly recommend this place as they make the process of doing a custom t shirt so much less intimidating Its also very affordable Thanks  guys Will definitely be coming back

Name: A5823
Content: Ordering a customized shirt was so quick and soooo easy to do The image that I submitted wasnt very clear  and they printed a replacement tshirt with a better resolution image  FOR FREE Without me asking Honestly  THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER Delivered to my door beyond happy with my experience  and my amazing T

Name: A5824
Content: Quality of the shirt and print was great I had a large photo printed and the image quality was good Curb side pickup at the Yonge street location was very easy and fast Customer service had a question they couldnt answer live on the phone  but texted me the answer after a few minuets  which was very helpful

Name: A5825
Content: in the current state we are in and especially submitting my order late [of my own fault] before Christmas  Toronto Tees was able to fulfill the order prior to the date for me to provide the gift Being nice and respectful to a company always goes a long way as opposed to being demanding and rude

Name: A5826
Content: Great shirt printing company I came to them with a last minute request for a bulk order of shirts x9 and they quickly provided a mock up of the design  a quote  and even had them shipped FREE of charge all within one day Friendly customer service and quick response via email Definitely recommend and will be going back for all my shirt printing needs Shirt quality is nice too not your typical Walmart cotton t shirts

Name: A5827
