Content: The website was very easy to use  the hoodie was suppose to be ready 3 days from the order date but they finished and had it ready within a few hours I was happily shocked and will be using them again FORSURE

Name: A5828
Content:
This company was amazing from start to finish
Product turned out amazing and it was done and delivered in 3 days Even got a call from the store to let me know it would be a day late which was totally ok considering I thought it would take weeks  Then courier called to confirm delivery
I would definitely order in the future A+++ service

Name: A5829
Content: The ordering experience was very simple  uploading my own design was straightforward and easy Using curbside pick up was convenient; the quality of the printing on my t shirt was excellent  it is a gift  and it looks perfect

Name: A5830
Content:
My younger daughter is the biggest fan of the original Halloween film  and often mimicks a particular line from the movie  so I had Toronto Tees make her a tshirt with an image from the film and the phrase beneath it They did a fantastic job The image I chose  which was blurry on my end  turned out beautifully on the tshirt  and it was prepared in no time The price point is super reasonable too

I will definitely be ordering from them again

Name: A5831
Content: Very friendly Happy to help with design and to trouble shoot over the phone End product was perfect and delivery was immediate about 2 hours after I submitted the order This company is working hard to keep service up during Covid 19 Impressive I will happily drive business their way

Name: A5832
Content:
A bricks and morter store Filled with alot of choice  hoodies  tees  ladies  unisex I purchased a tee They were professional and quick and did a fantastic job It was a gift 
Cant recommend high enough

Name: A5833
Content: I ordered Hawks Hoodies for my teenager daughter and she is so happy with it She likes the quality of print so much You  guys  did a great job Thank you I will definitely come back to order more and will recommend this place

Name: A5834
Content: This t shirt supplier has been my go to for work shirts for my crew for two years now Highly recommend Their customer service is top notch & they complete requests very quickly

Name: A5835
Content: This is my second experience at Toronto Tees and they are great people  easy to deal with I was able to customize a design from their site and submit it online I made a change after I submitted but they accommodated it easily It was ready the next day And the bonus mask is a fantastic addition

Name: A5836
Content:
Hey Joe  the T shirts were fantastic We had an 80th birthday party and the guys were extremely happy with the tees 
I soon will be having my 80th and I look forward to getting some shirts for myself 
You guys were very accommodating and they arrived just in time 
Thanks again  Gerry

Name: A5837
Content: They were done quickly and came out just the way I wanted I was very pleased

Name: A5839
Content:
I requested t shirts for my lab team A simple  one colour  text design  back print Ten tees in various sizes 
I received email notification of my order promptly after placing it  listing all details  and expected date available for pick up 
The team at Toronto Tees exceeded the expected production date by two days; which gave me a lot of much needed time at my end 
The print quality was high  the tees are good quality Gilman brand  and overall  Im happy with my order 
Id recommend this store and use it again

Name: A5840
Content: Needed a rush order done and Owen was all over it Very quick  friendly  responsive and easy to work with Will be using these guys again for my company 100

Name: A5841
Content: Superb service   would have likely chosen a higher quality t shirt fabric had I known  but the price/value is great Will shop again

Name: A5842
Content:
The quality of the print was excellent and this was the only place out of like 10 that didnt reject or question my order when I submitted meme images to be used as personal attire 

Support was also great and contacted me regarding technical issues with the images and allowed me to resubmit 

Production and shipping was also quick  will use again

Name: A5843
Content: Placed my order  had communication throughout  my sweater was finished within a day or two and delivered earlier than I expected High quality  amazing print  images were crisp and colors popped Couldnt be happier

Name: A5844
Content: Great job of executing a difficult design Exactly as it appeared on their design app People on the phone were friendly and helpful and the order was delivered no fuss and quicker than expected Overall very happy

Name: A5845
Content: I am so impressed with the quality of the T shirts we ordered and the efficiency of the service I was a little skeptical using the on line design for the 10 T shirts that we need for an upcoming event It was VERY user friendly and we are all delighted with the end results Would highly recommend Toronto Tees and would definitely come back Margaret C

Name: A5846
Content: I found Toronto Tees online and was thrilled with the design I was able to create But when I went to order  I discovered that shipping to the US was not an online option Once I contacted them by message  they were more than willing to help me out and ship my shirts to the US Im thrilled and cant wait to give them as Christmas gifts to my sons Thank you for going above and beyond to make this possible

Name: A5847
Content: I had a great experience working with Toronto Tees I needed help with an order and Kyle handled it right over the phone  sending me everything i needed the same day I would definitely recommend working with them and support your local businesses

Name: A5848
Content: My hoodie fit comfortably and the material was great

Name: A5849
Content: This place is awesome Had 25 Tshirts made and the process was seamless The quality of the shirts  printing  and communication were fantastic Highly recommend I will be making more shirts with them in the future Thank you Toronto Tees

Name: A5850
Content: Joe and his team were fantastic in terms of communication  time management and over all design and print of our t shirts Excellent customer service and costs The fine print is embedded within the t shirts  increasing the prints longevity and allowing for easy wash Would recommend to anyone who needs personalized t shirts or t shirts for big events

Name: A5851
Content: Great service  attention to detail and flexible with last min additional orders Thanks Tom

Name: A5852
Content: Loved the quality of the tee shirt and the website is so easy to use This is our second order and would highly recommend them And BTW the courier who delivered was hilarious

Name: A5853
Content: Trevor at the Yonge Street Toronto Tees location was fantastic He search all over the store for the colour and size that I wanted He offered to order the product and have it shipped in the next day as the colour and size I wanted were out of stock He was patient as I fussed over fonts  sizing and spacing He made helpful suggestions as I debated exact placement He worked with me to place the messages on the sleeves correctly Once the design was in place  the service was just as fast the website claims Trevor and Toronto Tees helped me create a fantastic surprise for my friend I would absolutely go back and I totally recommend Toronto Tees

Name: A5854
Content: Great service and people Thanks to Tom for turning our Veggie shirt around so quickly

Name: A5855
Content: I waited 2 hrs for 1 shirt Simple design only took 5 minutes good job Found another place that does it for half the price I had even brought my own shirt didnt bring the price down by much just  3 Do your research Almost  40 not to mention paying for parking and the wait If it wasnt for the wait  price and location would have given 5

Name: A5856
Content: I had some T shirts printed All came out exactly as ordered  and they cover my upper body very well The shirts  when combined with a pair of pantalones  provide great overall coverage Highly recommended for walking around during those temperate summer days

Name: A5857
Content: Loved this place I was a walk in and my 3 items were made super fast The staff were so amazing  friendly and helpful Gave me really great suggestions and my items turned out even better than what I had originally planned

Name: A5858
Content:
Ordered one custom t shirt to remember a pet we had to put down Web site had a very easy to use interface with customization options at your fingertips The shirt came in way faster then expected and even sent with a free grocery bag and coupon for another order even though I chose a bad picture  the outcome was perfect I was expecting a cheap look/feel to the shirt and print  but the quality was amazing  good quality shirt and the printing seems to be embedded right in the shirt  unlike others that you are afraid to put in the wash 

definitely will order from Joe again

Name: A5859
Content: Amazing experience with Toronto Tees We ordered customized tshirts and got them the next day They look awesome and Joe was super quick to respond to our emails Highly recommend

Name: A5860
Content:
I ordered 7 t shirts in the same colour but in several different sizes for a bachelorette party I was working on a very tight timeline and was pleased/relieved when the t shirts arrived only a couple of days after the order was placed and the order was fulfilled perfectly 

Once the tees arrived  Kyle helped me out with the printing and did an awesome job He was also a pleasure to deal with He was really patient with me and took the time to make sure that the design was exactly as I wanted it I love the way these tees turned out

The tees are also really reasonably priced and very good quality If youre not into printing  consider just buying them as your t shirt basics In every single colour

Name: A5861
Content: You all never fail to impress The sweaters came out better than expected The fitting is amazing and true to size I recommend your company to my friends and family Amazing everything Thanks again

Name: A5862
Content: Superb service They were extremely professional and I got my shirts within a timely manner They will even give you suggestions if you like on how to arrange the content on the T shirts to make them amazing Id definitely use their services in the future

Name: A5863
Content: I have been to Toronto Tees twice this week and had a great experience I got a ladies t shirt printed the first time and was surprised but just how small and fitted it was  they clearly say this on their website and it was totally my own fault I went back again to get a mens t shirt and spoke with Jay I explained what happened and that it was my own fault and he gave me the 2nd shirt for free It was totally my fault  but he was so good about it and really patient with me trying on multiple mens sizes to get one I liked They have a changing room  so you can try before you buy which I should have done the first time They print the shirt in less than 5 mins and I was really happy with the quality  and its kinda cool watching your t shirt get made Thanks again Jay and team

Name: A5864
Content: My design looks great and the turnaround was quick and easy Hand delivered to my door Will definitely be back

Name: A5865
Content: Great experience Design submission was quick and easy and the shirts ready when promised

Name: A5866
Content: The t shirts turned out amazing It was super easy to communicate with Toronto Tees through email and have everything sorted out within minutes  plus a quick delivery since i didnt have time to pick up the t shirts in person  Highly recommend these guys  theyre really easy to work with and made the whole process incredibly simple

Name: A5867
Content: Needed shirts done asap  stopped by the store and the guys got them done in 20 minutes Highly recommend

Name: A5868
Content: Ordering was a breeze and super customizable The ETD was less than 5 business days from the date of order and they were still done before Picking up was as easy after parking on Maitland  found my bag with my name marked clearly and the order inside The quality is excellent of both the print and t shirts I would recommend against using Clipart images as the resolution is too low and comes out a bit blocky Im looking forward to gifting them to friends Will definitely reorder in the future Thanks Toronto Tees

Name: A5869
Content: Loved this place I worked with Tom and he was super friendly and professional got my job done in less than 20 minute gave me a lot of advice and did a lot to give me the highest quality product I totally suggest working with them they offer great quality sweatshirts with top notch printing

Name: A5870
Content:
Ive had several t shirts mens  ladies  and even baby onesies made here over the past couple years and have always been very impressed by both the quality and the customer service The shirts they use are a great fit  and the speed at which you can walk away with your own design on one is amazing The one time out of several visits that I wasnt happy with the quality of the t shirt  Joe the owner was sure to make it right immediately 
The staff who work at Toronto Tees have a great eye and talent for design and are more than happy to help make your design that much better 
Highly recommended

Name: A5871
Content: Fast turnaround within 2 days for in store pick up  shirt came out as expected Very responsive and great customer service

Name: A5872
Content: Good quality shirts and printing Slight problem with placement of the logo in the back placed left side instead of right  but this did not diminish from overall look

Name: A5873
Content: Ordering custom t shirts from Toronto Tees is always super easy A special thank you to Owen at Toronto Tees for helping to clean up the design on my recent order It turned out great

Name: A5874
Content: Really fast service and great staff They went above and beyond to get me the colour of tshirts I wanted for St Patricks day I was able to design 8 different tshirts in less than an hour on line and picked them up within 48 hours and I could have picked them up sooner Ill definitely use Toronto Tees again

Name: A5875
Content: Toronto Tees was amazing They messaged to correct an oversite from my part and corrected it to make a perfect T Shirt gift Definitely order from them again Excellent quality Thank you Joe

Name: A5876
Content: Service was super courteous and kind from everyone working The tees and hoody are a really nice quality  even after a few washes Did a great job on the screen printing Perfect gift for a woman obsessed with her cat  that can bring his face everywhere she goes  without the smell of litter

Name: A5877
Content: We love Toronto Tees for our employee swag Even on the busiest days  a quick order gets done in record time and the printing never fades even after years Thank you team

Name: A5878
Content:
Ordering the masks for our dance club was a breeze with Toronto Tees Thank you for your friendly  professional service Our questions were quickly answered and they were open to our ideas 

We cant wait for first day of classes to hand them out to all the dancers    Stay safe

Rana on behalf of Club de Ballet Jazz de Buckingham

Name: A5879
Content:
Toronto Tees have been printing tees for me for a few years now They NEVER disappoint This year  I could not supply my own shirt due to COVID measures to keep everyone safe so for the first time  I purchased one of their tees OMG What was I waiting for? Theyre deliciously soft without being clingy  The sizes are spot on  i e an extra large is an extra large 
Their printing work is fantastic And theyre always quick to answer any question 
Highly recommended

Name: A5880
Content: I had a great experience The staff was knowledgeable and helpful I was able to easily design my t shirt using their online tool during my lunch break I headed over after work and tried on a few t shirts  but couldnt find one that suited me im quite picky  so they let me know I could bring in my own I popped over to Winners and found one I liked and then returned to the store My t shirt was printed quickly and I am super happy with the results I would go here again

Name: A5881
Content:
Shirts were awesome and designs were exactly what I wanted Very easy to navigate the site and make the shirts online 

I did ask for the free mask because I had a large order and I never received it My friend had the same issue

Name: A5882
Content: Ordered a personalized T shirt with an old photo printed on it It turned out great Was so easy to design and order online Very user friendly design tools Ordered a basic t shirt and its nice  thick  good quality cotton Order was filled  completed and shipped in just a couple of days Will be returning to make a bunch of silly family t shirts for joke Christmas presents

Name: A5883
Content:
Easy to design on line and it looked great when I picked it up Not sure why it told me on line it would be ready in 3 days cause when I called the day it was to be ready they said it would be done in 15 min And then the next day I got an email and said my order was ready ?
Very happy with the overall product Thanks

Name: A5884
Content:
Yo the people loved my shirt; looks much higher quality than any of the online based shops Ive ordered from Also thanks for sending a quick refund I accidentally placed 2 orders  and was worried Id get hit for both

Top marks  will definitely go back next time the Raptors are in the Finals

Name: A5885
Content: I needed a custom sweatshirt ASAP and was very pleased with the speed of the service and quality of the work Colours and soft fabric options are great Thanks

Name: A5886
Content: Had a rush order that needed to get done for Valentines day They spoke to me on the phone and less than 24hrs later I picked it up Very easy and smooth Will do business with them in the future

Name: A5887
Content:
I had a great experience here Ordered my shirt online  and went to pick it up the same afternoon Staff hadnt made it by the time I got there because the color shirt I requested was out of stock But it was better off  since the logo I had printed looked much better on the darker colored shirt I ended up getting Took them less than ten minutes to have it ready for me 

Had an unfortunate incident about a week or two later I washed the with cold water  and air dried it But the shirt still shrunk I emailed them and the store owner got back to me within five minutes to apologize and offer me a new shirt So happy with my experience  and the great customer service Well done

Name: A5888
Content: I contacted Joe under relative duress I wanted to boost morale amongst family by getting some hoodies printed  we have a daughter who is battling for her future and is undergoing a relatively long road to recovery Joe was a pleasure to work with  very understanding and compassionate Didnt really much to besides sending him the graphic and approving the mock up he sends back We got our hoodies delivered super fast and theyre a big hit at the hospital

Name: A5889
Content: I did a custom online order with Toronto Tees They were very helpful with me  especially as I am not all that great with computers and techy stuff The tshirt and mask came out fantastic  better than I expected Proof that shopping local is better than using the big stores

Name: A5890
Content: Amazing customer service My oder was completed with excellence and professionalism Outstanding job on printing my design I needed my order rushed  so I was especially impressed with the great quality of service and printing Thank you Toronto Tees Younge location staff

Name: A5891
Content: Shirts turned out great Appreciated the quick response from Joe when I reached out with a question Delivered on time thank you

Name: A5892
Content: These guys make the best custom t shirts in the city Great customer service  prompt turn around  and a great product Super pleased with how our t shirts turned out

Name: A5893
Content: Very fast and friendly service Sweatshirt looked great and was of good quality Would definitely use torontotees again for any personalized shirt items

Name: A5894
Content: I am extremely happy with the customer service and product you guys delivered I designed the product and they reached out asking for emails of various photos and designs for a clear image and better product As a result I received a sweater beyond what I expected Thank you for caring about the product you deliver

Name: A5895
Content: Love their service Was trying to do a last minute fathers day gift Got my dad a custom made polo shirt with his favourite badge printed onto it Since the original badge that Ive found on the internet was a little too small and a little blurry These gentlemen helped me to retrieve it and managed to transfer it onto the shirt At the end  my dad loves it Appreciated all your hard works fellas This is the place you have to come for custom design

Name: A5896
Content:
I highly recommend doing business with Toronto Tees They are organized  efficient  and more than fair 

The owner of this company is reliable and personable I emailed my inquiry and got a fast response with examples of what I wanted 

Within a week the shirts were ready  and they were even shipped for my own convenience

The shirts are good quality  and exactly what I was looking for 

If you are looking for custom clothing  look no farther This will be the only place I go to for this type of thing

Name: A5897
Content: Printing and shipping was fast  the design and text were accurate  and were very pleased

Name: A5898
Content: Great professional t shirt printing Staff were friendly and helpful Made my t shirt in less than 5 mins Really good price too and they provided the t shirt If youre looking for a special gift pop into Toronto Tee

Name: A5899
Content: A tiny bit more expensive and a tiny bit longer than your average Amazon order but well worth a unique and customized product from a local company Thank you Toronto Tees

Name: A5900
Content: Initially received my order incorrectly  but Joe Taylor owner was extremely fast to reach out and correct everything He allowed me to keep the already shipped items  and shipped out the new and correct items in less than a week with no additional charges Thanks again guys

Name: A5901
Content: What made my decision to go with Toronto Tees was the fact from the first email they answered all my questions and actually sent mock up work within the day They helped me choose the cut and style of shirt bypassing the Catalogues 100s of choices They had better pricing  better response time than half a dozen other suppliers and printers by far They have a loyal customer for life

Name: A5902
Content:
The Toronto Tees team are super helpful and very quick to assist if you need them I recieved my package quickly and all products are great quality 
Thanks to Joe and his team

Name: A5903
Content: Joe and the team were fantastic to work with They delivered some great custom t shirts  it was done quickly and properly The team was always quick to respond to any questions and was a great help Would highly recommend

Name: A5904
Content:
A+++Great experience Unique gift for my son who was turning 16 Very user friendly website It was very easy and fun to design the custom t shirt Beautiful fonts available I got a navy tshirt printed with gold text Came out perfect 
Great customer service When I paid online  i was given 5 days pick up time But i called to ask that i will be in the area in the evening They got it ready for me in 10min right in front of my eyes 
The only thing that i would have appreciated is more options for the shirt fabric Though the tshirt was soft but felt a little thin I was hoping for a thicker tshirt fabric which can be preserved as a memory after my son outgrows it I would have paid a bit more for a higher quality tshirt fabric I wish they add 1 more options for premium tshirts 
Masks are not good Donot fit the face well No nose wire or ear adjustments Would not waste money on mask 
Highly recommended fot tshirts Cant wait to design another one for my next occasion Thanks

Name: A5905
Content: Amazing Ordered for the first time the other day Realized afterwards that I uploaded the wrong image Sent them an email and Owen got right back to me Friendly communication and very accommodating It shipped out fast and I am very happy with the quality and outcome Thank you Will be back

Name: A5906
Content: Great Experience as usual with Toronto Tees as usual We did a custom sweater with pictures on the back and they connected with us throughout the process to ensure the pictures were of a quality that would print well on the sweater The sweater looks great

Name: A5907
Content: Fast  helpful service Excellent quality shirts and printing

Name: A5908
Content: very fast service  bought a gag gift for a friends birthday and they loved it called with a question and got my answer quickly thanks so much

Name: A5909
Content: I went into Toronto tees with a hope that I would get some tees printed in a couple minutes because I had totally forgot about our staff Christmas gift exchange The guys at Toronto tees helped me print 3 shirts in less than 20 minutes Unbelievable Despite the lineup  I made it through so fast These guys are quick  easy and fun to work with I really appreciate the help of the guys working there Quick and efficient Thanks a lot They loved their shirts

Name: A5910
Content: Received my custom sweatshirt and its great The website is easy to navigate and the shirt is exactly how I ordered it The material is also very soft and super comfy Highly recommend Toronto Tees

Name: A5911
Content:
We have used few companies over the years but we like Toronto Tees the most 
Product was delayed a bit but owner compensated with an extra sweater How nice
The color print is exactly how we want it it and the quality of the garment is top notch 
We will be using you again Joe

Name: A5912
Content: It was easy to use the website and m shirt was done and waiting for me at the store They did a great job and my friend got a good laugh out of it Thanks

Name: A5913
Content: Love the t shirt  and the design looks great Joe was super responsive  and really went the extra mile to make sure my order was perfect

Name: A5914
Content: There was an issue with an order  but Joe and his team were more than accommodating and had amazing customer service I received my order in time with good quality tshirts

Name: A5915
Content:
To Toronto Tees

I just wanted to email saying thank you for the customer service I received A few days ago  I got an order of 4 shirts that didnt come out exactly like I thought they would I got a call for Jay from their store  and I thought he was really helpful and patient hearing my complaints He helped me choose the right colours this time and immediately sent a new order to replace the shirts that I had gotten Im going to recommend your store to other people  and look forward to doing more business with you in the future 

Alvaro

Name: A5916
Content: We placed an order for 40 custom t shirts and Joe did a great job Fast turnaround  easy delivery  and good quality shirts Id recommend Toronto Tees

Name: A5917
Content:
Were happy with the support from the TO Tees team who answered all our questions to help us select and organize our order 

Our new hoodies look great and are keeping our team warm during this very sweatshirt friendly winter

Name: A5918
Content: Absolutely fantastic I researched many places in the GTA and Joe and Toronto Tees comes on top Excellent customer service and amazing quality for my orders Looking forward to this partnership  I will keep ordering for my business here

Name: A5919
Content: I placed an order for t shirts and was met with exceptional customer service Prices were on point and the turn around time was astonishingly fast Needed this as a something little extra  for our corporate meeting Very happy

Name: A5920
Content: Amazing customer service  easy to use online ordering system  incredible turn around time  and great product selection Highly  highly recommended

Name: A5921
Content:
Absolutely the best customer service I have ever experienced
Prompt return of my emails
Customer focused
Helpful
I was Given correct advice re sizing
Order came as expected I cant say enough
Joe gave me the best customer experience Ive ever had

Name: A5922
Content: Great customer service and fantastic results Quick turnaround without compromising on quality If you need just 1 t shirt or several of them customized  there is no better place in Toronto

Name: A5923
Content: The Toronto Tees team was nothing short of incredible in working with us to deliver a bunch of custom tees in a short time frame They were attentive and responded quickly to the number of emails I sent their way The quality of the tees are amazing

Name: A5924
Content: Ive had several shirts printed here  some custom designs that I did in Illustrator  and some just using the fonts available on their website Ive only ever done one shirt at a time  and theyre super quick  takes less than 10 min to get a custom shirt printed Staff have always been nice and helpful

Name: A5925
Content: Great service and quality I ordered shirts from Toronto Tees about 6 months ago for uniforms for our construction company The shirts are great  the printing and fabric has lasted amazingly Will be placing another order soon

Name: A5926
Content:
There is a reason why more than 200 people have given five star review Toronto Tees are Very professional  provide timely delivery  have great customer service and keep their promises 
It was so easy to get the order done   Very convenient no hassle 
Thank you Toronto Tees  Joe and Adam

Name: A5927
Content:
As someone whos not very computer savvy  I was so happy with how easy it was to design my shirts They look amazing  and the customer service is top notch 
Many thanks for making me some awesome gifts

Name: A5928
Content: We were on a tight deadline and Toronto Tees was able to get us the shirts on time The t shirts were awesome The artwork looked exactly how we envisioned it and the shirts were very soft and comfortable Well be using Toronto Tees next time we need customer printed t shirts  and our guests will do the same

Name: A5929
Content:
We are a small hospital in downtown Toronto We needed a small order of t shirts for a special event we are holding to honour our front line workers during the pandemic Toronto Tees were wonderful and easy to work with as we were under a tight timeline They also respected our charity status and we are grateful for that 
Thank you Toronto Tees

Name: A5930
Content: I loved my experience with Toronto Tees From designing online  to customer support and finally delivery Wonderful concept  great team  caring attitude  and no hassle service I loved it

Name: A5931
Content:
Great people  the order fulfilled super quickly and dropped off Quality of print and shirt awesome Really impressed and thankful 

Website easy to use too  thanks everyone  proud to continue to order more in future Thank you again

Name: A5932
Content: I received a custom made sweatshirt my son designed for Christmas and I ordered an Indie 88 sweatshirt and both sweatshirts are great Amazing quality and fit great Great customer service  love this company

Name: A5933
Content:
Wow  where do I start?

I stumbled upon Toronto Tees in my search to get a design printed for my daughter I had a few questions which I submitted online on the site  and was pleasantly surprised to get a prompt reply from Joe  the owner himself Despite not stocking youth sized hoodies  he took the initiative to source them for us Submitting our design on the site was a breeze as it was easy to navigate  even for a first timer The hoodie was printed and shipped out to us very quickly  and we received it much earlier than we had anticipated  to my daughters delight I was a little apprehensive about the print quality because of a poor experience with another company  but I neednt have worried; the quality of the print is excellent  printed exactly as we requested 

What we had  from start to finish  was a fantastic experience thanks to the professionalism of Joe and his team at Toronto Tees He took the time and effort to personally communicate with us  and was accommodating and personable throughout 

Thank you Joe

Name: A5934
Content:
First time having a tshirt customized here and was very happy with the end product 
The staff was very helpful and accommodating 
Definitely will be using them again for next year  as I run the Terry Fox run yearly 
Thank you for a great job

Name: A5935
Content:
I was an out of town customer  I was in from Calgary Colton took care of me with speed and great customer service I forgot one of my branded shirts at home for an event  they were able to produce one within minutes for me Happily  I took their package info for when I expand I know where to order from 

Thanks again for the amazing service

Name: A5936
Content: Highest quality custom shirts weve ever made Weve tried them all  Vistaprint and other online e tailers just do not compare to the precision  interface  customer service and overall quality and longevity of TorontoTees shirts The lightning fast turn around time is an added bonus  my order was done and ready to pick up in no time

Name: A5937
Content: Organized chaos and thats not the sole responsibility of the staff This team does an amazing job of helping people create the t shirt they have envisioned in their mind

Name: A5938
Content:
Great service and reasonable price 

Only printed two shirts but they helped quickly design the graphics and the tees came out nicely 

Noticed they are also good for events like bachelor/bachelorette parties  family reunions or trips  etc  lot of people in store were looking for custom shirts for groups

Name: A5939
Content:
Great staff Purchased a single shirt and it was done pretty quickly 

There are more shirt colour options in store compared to online  All the merchandise was was high quality  and super soft You can also bring your own shirt 

Would definitely go back

Name: A5940
Content: Toronto Tees was absolutely great with my order Quality was perfect  was delivered early and with great customer service Would 100 recommend and use again

Name: A5941
Content:
I couldnt believe how fast they turned around my order I was expecting at least a few days to get my shirts printed but they did it within the hour even though the store was full of customers My family will be very happy to get their shirts before Christmas Their staff were so fast on the computers and helpful with making my design look good  FRIENDLY TO I highly recommend anyone looking to get tshirts printed should go here 
Thank you guys  Merry Christmas

Name: A5942
Content: Great quality shirt  great quality service  arrived sooner than expected  very happy customer  would recommend and be a repeat customer

Name: A5943
Content: Joe helped me out with custom hoodies for my boyfriends birthday He ordered in exactly the colour and style of shirt I wanted and helped me with the design and proportions They were done quickly  are super comfy  and look amazing We get compliments all the time Super simple  professional process all around

Name: A5944
Content: Great customer service  professional  followed the design I made to a tee  and quick without losing quality Highly recommend

Name: A5945
Content: Kyle was an absolute pleasure to deal with By the end  I was left wanting to have a beer with him Answered any  and all of my questions quickly I was surprised how soon my order arrived Support small businesses

Name: A5946
Content: Rapid friendly professional service Great product Quick delivery to another province Recipients were absolutely delighted with the gifts Will use Toronto Tees again  for sure

Name: A5947
Content:
Can i give them 100 stars?? This is my second experience with Toronto Tees and both have been just incredible  one was pre covid19 so I just walked into their store and had a bomb t shirt printed out in under an hour Now with covid 19  I preferred to just order from their website It was super easy to design the shirt and place the order on their website 
They have gone above and beyond to ensure I get the printed goods way before the estimated time I mean  in this current situation I really didnt expect it to receive it so fast This is going to be such a stellar gift for my husband Thank you guys You ROCKK

Name: A5948
Content: We ordered two hoodies for our business  got the order in less than a week and the product is great Our logo came out amazing and had a great experience with Toronto Tees

Name: A5949
Content:
I have been a customer of Toronto tees for over 3 years The quality of the tshirts are much better then the typical high coller  bulky shirt that are often used for custom tshirts I have used the online design and mail delivery as well as going into their Toronto locations Customer service is excellent I am happy to support a company that is Canadian and local to me as well as one that listens to their customers concerns and addresses them so effectively I will continue to use this company for great custom shirts 
Mary

Name: A5950
Content: The sweater I ordered turned out great  the image was crystal clear and the colours were on point  the only thing is I wish the design box on the back was bigger so I could put writing higher up near the hood but other than that everything was fantastic

Name: A5951
Content: Toronto Tees put together a semi gag gift order for me The service was excellent and the final product was amazing  exactly what I had hoped for The delivery was also super fast Thanks Joe and Owen

Name: A5952
Content: Excellent service  dedication  and fast turnarounds  are just a few reasons why Toronto Tees is  1 Joe is passionate about what he does and is an absolute pleasure to work with Every order Ive done has turned out amazing Really great work and I will be ordering more

Name: A5953
Content: This was the 3rd time Ive ordered from Toronto Tees  and every time the t shirts were perfect The service is fast  and their customer service is amazing Thanks again

Name: A5954
Content: So  already before arriving I thought this is a quality place My research on their website was very fruitful All my Qs answered Then when I arrived and talked to Owen  it confirmed my impression  these folks are real pros I was going to bring in my own design/font  but then I thought  these guys are better designers than I am I was right Owen worked me up a great sample right in front of my eyes BOOM  14 64 minutes later it was ready for pickup MY TOP RECOMMENDATION  you will not be disappointed

Name: A5955
Content: I had a rush bulk order with a couple of different t shirt colours and with slight variations to what went on the t shirts depending on the colour Jay was extremely helpful and the t shirts were a great success So much so I had to go back for a few more and they turned that around right away Thanks Jay and team I will definitely use TorontoTees again

Name: A5956
Content: Great quality I ordered a sweater with my own saying through the online store The final product turned out great and the pickup was seamless Thanks for a great sweater

Name: A5957
Content: Toronto Tees is not only just a unique shop where you can express creativity on a tshirt  but their customer service is honestly one of the best i have ever experienced The workers there were very patient and walked through the steps very easy ad convieniently  and the best part is that I got the tshirt printed in SPEEDY time My tshirt was unfortunately the wrong size  so once i emailed Toronto Tees  they replied back as soon as possible making sure that i was happy with my purchase I am a very satisfied customer and would 100 come back again Thank you Toronto Tees

Name: A5958
Content: Sweater for my friend turned out exactly how I pictured it The print is amazing and the size fits great  hes been wearing it everywhere haha Great job guys

Name: A5959
Content: Every time I order a shirt it is done quickly and is perfect Even during the pandemic they are doing an incredibly fast job and my special gift can still be sent out to a friend as I annually do Thank you

Name: A5960
Content: A really cute and efficient place Trevor helped me recreate the design  because I had created it on another custom site He even used photoshop to get it exactly how it was originally Turned out great Good quality and looks awesome Im sure my friend will love his gift  thank you so much

Name: A5961
Content: This is my second tee  always very efficient and good quality Thank you so much

Name: A5962
Content: I needed custom  last minute baby onesies Id seen Toronto Tees in passing and gave them a call to see if they could have the shirts printed within 24 hours They said it was likely so I put through my order online Within minutes  they called me to let me know that the onesie colour I selected online wasnt available They kindly suggested alternatives for what they had in stock and let me know Id receive an email once they were finished A couple of hours later  I received the completion email and I picked up the printed onesies the same day They are the CUTEST things Ive ever seen in my life The staff was so friendly and helpful  So happy with the quality  speed and customer service

Name: A5963
Content:
Bought a tee and hoodie for my son and snuck in a tee for myself These tees are made of the best material soft and durable Made to last
We love our Indie 88 t shirts

Name: A5964
Content: This was the second time I had shirts printed at this store Was very happy with the service The staff was pleasant and the print came out with quality Very happy Lucas gave me a fair price for a sweatshirt I wanted printed He also helped me with a quote for another sweatshirt print I recommend this place for shirt printing needs

Name: A5965
Content: Very happy with my order The two t shirts I had made looked very professional & I loved how soft they were Ill definitely come back

Name: A5966
Content: Got a t shirt and hoddie printed as Christmas presents  they came out great Quick  friendly and professional no problem doing a mock up over emails to see what it would look like Made a great present Thank you

Name: A5967
Content: Ordered a sweater for the first time after seeing a advertisement on Facebook It looks just as great as I was hoping for and fast shipping too If you have any issues they respond quickly and are very efficient Would buy again Thank you

Name: A5968
Content:
I had t shirts made for a milestone birthday  and the final product was exactly what Id hoped for 
The logo colours are bright and fun  and the t shirt itself is really great quality The logo hasnt faded at all after a lot of washing The shirt still looks new Cant say enough good about this place

Name: A5969
Content: I made a small order for my school at the last minute and Toronto Tees set us up hassle free at a great price The turn around was exceptionally quick and the product was above anything we have gotten from competitors I highly recommend Toronto Tees

Name: A5970
Content: This is the third time ive used Toronto Tees and have been thrilled each time One shirt is about four years old and the ink is just starting to show wear now This particular order had a very narrow time crunch and Joe was a big help to make sure i got my order on time Easy use website for my custom designs Definitely my go to shop

Name: A5971
Content: Great product and great service It took 10 minutes to create my design and place my order on the website  and the shirt arrived the following day I would purchase again  and recommend it

Name: A5972
Content: Placed an order for a couple of custom Tees for a Birthday gift They were ready before the date expected and were exactly as requested Excellent curbside pick up arrangement for Yonge Street especially All in all terrific experience

Name: A5973
Content: SUPER great experience  the team is wonderful  really efficient process and completely satisfied with the final products 10/10 would recommend

Name: A5974
Content: We have a t shirt made every year for our daughter at Christmas  and every year we come to Toronto Tees This place NEVER disappoints us excellent customer service  great prices and a final product that satisfies this extremely picky graphic designer Cant recommend this place highly enough

Name: A5975
Content: I had great service from Toronto Tees I received phone help to assist with ordering on line The picture on the tees turned out really well I was actually 7 minutes after the closing time but they kindly let me in to obtain my same day prepared order Thanks Toronto Tees

Name: A5976
Content: This place is great The turnaround time is so fast and the quality of the product and service is amazing I was helped by Trevor and he was knowledge and very friendly Would highly recommend Their prices are amazing too No other place in Toronto can match it

Name: A5977
Content: I am a band director working in public education and I have been working with Joe at Toronto Tees for the past 5 years He has consistently gone above and beyond the call of duty to provide our students with high quality  custom shirts and jackets at a reasonable price His customer service skills are excellent and they have been able to do large orders in a short period of time for us when weve been in a pinch Keep up the great work

Name: A5978
Content: These masks are masks in name only Theres no real protection offered with massive gaps in the top and the bottom No real structure to fit the face  no nose clip and doesnt fit your chin or give you any sense of security Good decoration quality but not worth  24 Would not recommend for protection The guys were great with timing and communication

Name: A5979
Content: The staff were very friendly and knowledgeable about their product We had no problem with dropping alot of money there in 2 days

Name: A5980
Content: I had the germ on an idea for some shirts to share with a few friends to celebrate a long running annual outing First  the online design feature was amazing Then  because I wasnt sure of a few things  like sizes and whether or not to supply my own shirts  the personal touch came into play Joe was on top of the order and extremely helpful I may spend a bit more next time to supply a higher quality shirt But in the end  a great product was delivered to my office  no fuss  no muss Thanks folks

Name: A5981
Content: Great shop for fun ideas Online ordering and uploading my image was super easy I went in for pickup when they opened and the job was done in 5 minutes It was fun gift for my boyfriend Im having another one printed today

Name: A5982
Content: This company offers a great option Sometimes you have a really specific idea for a Tee and cant find it My item came as ordered and in good time

Name: A5983
Content: Absolutely fabulous all around excellent quality  service  speed  price Originally had an issue with sizing of logo and was answered immediately and it was resolved without issue I look forward to shopping here in future and would highly recommend this business

Name: A5984
Content: Great soft tshirts The design turned out great Fast turnaround Overall professional dependable experience I highly recommend Thanks to Mr Taylor and his team

Name: A5985
Content: Had a great experience with this shop I made a sizing mistake on my first online order so I contacted them  explained I made a mistake and they offered me a great deal on my new order Really great service and product 10 mins to make my shirts I will definitely be going back

Name: A5986
Content: Worked out great and they did an amazing print job would work with them again

Name: A5987
Content: It was a great experience Designing the T shirts was super easy online The order came fast  and the quality exceeded my expectations I would use them again and recommend to anyone

Name: A5988
Content: I got a dinosaur drinking tea on a shirt for my wife for our 3rd anniversary and she loved it Shirt looked great and we got a free mask and a nifty tote bag Would absolutely order from there again

Name: A5989
Content: The guys working at the shop were super nice The owner was very responsive when I needed a rush order Extremely happy with my Team Uncle Billy shirts

Name: A5990
Content: Thank you to the team at Toronto Tees for the quick service  with such short notice The personalized tshirt for an expecting dad was very well received He loved it Thank you everyone at Toronto Tees

Name: A5991
Content: Needed to have a tee reprinted and the process was seemless Spoke to Owen on the phone and he took of care of the problem New shirt was printed the following day and delivered the next Even the delivery guy was great The new image is so much better love the shirt Thanks for your help  Owen

Name: A5992
Content: Great service and excellent quality prints Highly recommend going to Toronto Tees We were making a shirt for a bachelorette with two identical cherry graphics on the bust Trevor was a great help figuring out how to best execute the look and the print itself looks perfect

Name: A5993
Content: Toronto Tees was fantastic Great quality  exactly what I wanted  even mock ups to check the font Quick turnaround and friendly delivery Highly recommended

Name: A5994
Content: I am not a person who uses the internet for ordering products but the Covid 19 situation forced me to I found the website easy to use and was surprised at how little time it took for my custom order to be ready Had to use curb side pick

Name: A5995
Content: Take your business here Joe and company helped out my school club with a t shirt design recently Their mock up was professional  communication was excellent  the turn around time was next to none and the quality of their clothing was tops I cannot think of enough superlatives It takes a great deal to motivate me to write a review online let alone an excellent one Theyre deserving of it

Name: A5996
Content:
Amazing experience  fast shipping and excellent quality and assisting with some logo challenges I had
Thanks Joe and team for all your assistance and support  placing another business/corporate order shortly 
Cheers
Nick

Name: A5997
Content: I ordered Indie88 merch which included 3 items free mask and delivery The products are great quality very happy with my stuff great service  thank you

Name: A5998
Content: Wow  Toronto Tees did not disappoint I called to see if I could have my shirt done a day early  as it was a gift  and they were SO pleasent and happy to accomodate When I actually picked it up  I was quite impressed with the quality for the price I would 100 percent use Toronto Tees again

Name: A5999
Content: Have had a few T shirts made at the Queen Street location One didnt come out the way I wanted so they redid it for me Owen spent time with me designing my shirts so that they would come out just as I wanted and am I so happy with the results Will be back for more when the weather gets colder for some long sleeved shirts

Name: A6000
Content: Ordered some customs covid masks here for a sports tournament The masks came quickly delivered to my house  the product looked exactly like I wanted  prices were good Will definitely order again

Name: A6001
Content: Amazing service and staff This is my trusted shop for any custom t shirt or sweater The quality used is lasting and the t shirts are soft and durable Thank you Toronto Tees  You help me out even though I get t shirt sizing wrong

Name: A6002
Content:
Simple  Fast and Efficient

This is the best spot to get your custom design tees printed in seconds Its all worth every penny whether you BYOTees or pick them at the store as long as they are cotton material tees 

Great team and great service Thanks Colton with the speed and great advise on designing the tees You Rock man

I will Defiantly come back for more

Name: A6003
Content: I fully recommend & already have this store Fast turnaround  they always pick up the phone to answer my questions though not so quick through email or FB message  Quality is great  product was well done Very happy with my purchase Only thing is  was quite pricey for kids shirts same pricing as adults  esp with only 10 the graphic so I had to find an alternative for that But great otherwise

Name: A6004
Content:
Joe is great I originally had an issue with one of the shirts and he went out of his way to make sure things were done right 

These shirts have good quality and good fit I look forward to doing return business because the customer service is fantastic

Name: A6005
Content: Easy design process Ordered a sweatshirt and a hat for sample purposes and got some great feedback Will be placing larger order soon Would recommend

Name: A6006
Content: Great quality  speedy turnaround time and wonderful customer service

Name: A6007
Content:
I have ordered 3 times from Toronto Tees and each time they have performed exactly as I asked  at a great price  faster than they estimated

Each time they throw in a free face mask

Name: A6008
Content: Consistently case study worthy integrated omni platform product  sales and customer service model Over the years I still love & recommend this place

Name: A6009
Content: Always great service and quick turnaround with products All the staff is super helpful

Name: A6010
Content: Excellent service They ordered in a special coloured shirt I wanted  and were friendly and helpful during the whole process Actual print time in store was less than 10 minutes Would highly recommend

Name: A6011
Content: Theyre the best Theyre quick  and the quality is superb Ive used their services so many times and have not had any issues Highly recommended for all graphic printing

Name: A6012
Content: joe  the owner  was incredibly fast in all his responses and followed up with me before i even had any questions to clarify my order i had a tight deadline that was met and the shirts came out fantastic theres lots of shirt companies out there but the customer service and care from this place is hard to beat

Name: A6013
Content:
I was in a desperate situation needing a t shirt in 24 hours for my boss for a presentation he was doing I had called several other places and no one could do it on such short notice I was so relieved when I called Joe and he said  Sure  I can do that  and he did The t shirt arrived the next morning and was exactly what I had ordered Both my boss and I were thrilled with the quality of the product and of course  the timeliness with which it was done Thanks so much Joe and team We will definitely recommend your company and will call on you again the next time we need t shirts
Sherra Lee Bridle
Guelph  ON

Name: A6014
Content: Great service Issues with the graphic that I sent but they were resolved perfectly

Name: A6015
Content: These guys are awesome Both Joe and Jay are first class with their customer service Even when a print job doesnt turn out  theyll kindly re print it for no extra charge Big A++++ on these guys I will always go to them for my custom shirt printing

Name: A6016
Content: Very quick and great service Thank you

Name: A6017
Content:
These guys are superb to work with Ive been getting apparel printed and ordered by them for a few years now doing bulk orders as well as one off designs for events Theyre always helpful  easygoing and seem to really like what theyre doing  which is what I like to see when Im doing business with a company 

Toronto Tees goes the extra mile to ensure that youre happy  I can think of one instance where I had given them instructions to do a black on charcoal grey  they silkscreened one and called me to report that the design was too dark/too subtle for the colour of the shirt and we went with a lighter ink It saved me gigantic head ache and a lot of money Aaaand they ended up looking amazing

Name: A6018
Content: Absolutely AMAZING Every time I go in they are great which is why I keep going back Last minute gifts that are perfectly customized are always so much more personal The guys there are so talented and super fast its like watching magic on the screen as they bring together the designs Jordan knocked out the masterpiece today in less that 45mins ~ start of design to finished product Just fantastic and I know itall be a hit Thanks again Toronto Tees

Name: A6019
Content:
No good Employees dont care  dont try to help and act superior I dealt with a very condescending kid named Trevor Tons of attitude  high prices  dont recommend it at all

THIS Took the words right out of my mouth If you plan on getting printed tees do so at another store I sent Trevor an invoice for how much it was quoted in the online store and he refused to uphold the pricing Trevor does not make sure your product is how you want it to be I gave Trevor a mock up on how the picture was suppose to look like the design on the right and when Trevor printed it out it was smaller than what was discussed Also if you look at the alignment between the writing and graphic are almost identical which is not what I wanted The writing is higher than the graphic as seen on the design When I went to ask Trevor about it  Trevor told me he needed the right measurements for the print Why was this not purposed ahead of time? Trevor saw my mock up and said he can do it exactly as it was but how it turned out was in no way what I wanted He did not reach out once to ask about my design and planned to charge me almost the same amount to reprint the pieces he messed up on 

TLDR please avoid  do not recommend 

Update There was no voicemail left  also my name is spelled Jacky Great customer service

Name: A6020
Content: Great service  great quality products Trust the process If they put your logo on the back of your hoodie and it doesnt look centered  theyve already thought about how the hood hsngs My mistake for moving it

Name: A6021
Content: Extremely disappointed Because of there great review from previous customers I wanted to have Toronto tees design some custom t shirts for an event  Drove 1hr payed for parking only to visit the store and they closed down The website doesnt state that neither a message when you call the number

Name: A6022
Content: I received my order within days of purchasing it The hoodie is amazing quality for the price I paid I also received a face mask which I did not pay for Very happy with my purchase

Name: A6023
Content: They were quick to answer any questions I had in a timely manner and were really nice Shirt was for a friend and he loved it

Name: A6024
Content: The shirt I ordered came out fantastic  exactly as I designed it I paid for the express shipping and received it so fast it was incredible

Name: A6025
Content: Ordered custom baby onesys as a present  they were super cute and great quality and the customer service was great  seem like really nice staff

Name: A6026
Content:
I just received my T shirts and Love it  great quality  exact design as I was expecting  excellent attention and the delivery in a very short time 
Very professional work  Thank you  so much

Name: A6027
Content: Needed to make a last minute custom tshirt for a gift Im not tech savvy but it was very easy to use the website and create my custom tshirt Unfortunately my graphic was low qaulity and didnt look right for printing A member of toronto tees called me within a day and notified me of the issue He offered to edit the graphic for me in order to provide the highest qaulity print Within 48h  I had my custom tshirt ready to go And boy did it look great Tshirt cotton qaulity was also very soft I would definitely use toronto tees again  give them a shot

Name: A6028
Content:
i feel sorry for the owner because workers are destroying his buisness i guess its hard to find normal people who have enthusiasm for work and graphic design the atmosphere is terrible  when you walk in you dont even get a greeting its like on cemetery the brat that looks like liam gallaghers rat pet  should be banned to work anywhere 
how hard is to make simple t shirt 
again feel sorry for the owner

Name: A6029
Content: Superb service Joe was very helpful during the ordering process; our shirts turned out brilliantly and were delivered ahead of schedule Highly recommended for great service and fair prices

Name: A6030
Content: Shirts are awesome quality and service was quick  5 10 min tops Staff were solid to work with Thanks J for the help

Name: A6031
Content: Ordered a shirt from this company for the first time around 7pm and I received it the next day early afternoon Very impressive service and delivery/turn around times Will 100 use this company again when I need something made

Name: A6032
Content: I ordered a bunch of crew neck sweaters for the ryerson debate team and they turned out amazing The sweaters are so soft  the logo turned out exactly how and where we wanted Ive already told various other ryerson groups to go check out Toronto tees for their team attire 10/10 recommend

Name: A6033
Content: Everyone was helpful and accomodating Awesome staff and the shirts turned out awesome Highly recommend Toronto Tees if youre looking to get custom printed clothing

Name: A6034
Content: Had a great visit Jay was knowledgeable and helpful I got my present done in quick time

Name: A6035
Content: From making inquiring calls to ordering the t shirt to pick up  it was one of the best gift ideas ever My friends 50th was just that much more special during these times of uncertainty  the t shirt put such a big smile on her face  and mine

Name: A6036
Content: I made a Mothers Day t shirt for my wife here Had a picture of my twins printed on the front After I gave it to her she noticed some imperfections on the print  right on the face  which was kinda bugging her I brought the t shirt back to Toronto Tees and explained the situation They made me a new one which turned out perfectly  no questions asked They made things right Great customer service

Name: A6037
Content: They do an amazing job Ive ordered two very nice custom t shirts They make me interested in making a t shirt buisiness and they can be the supplier

Name: A6038
Content: Great service and quality If you need such services dont waste your time elsewhere

Name: A6039
Content: Super simple process and a great tee The turnaround was literally next day  and the order was ready waiting for me on a table safe pickup when I got there Love this service

Name: A6040
Content: Ive ordered shirts at other places around the city but Im happy I found this shop They are fast and the quality is excellent Looks like a shirt youd buy in a store Not plastic looking Now Im just trying to figure out what to create next

Name: A6041
Content:
Service was amazing I ordered in the morning and it came that same day Definitely will be ordering again

Quality of the clothing is comfy and durable

Thanks again

Name: A6042
Content: I had ordered custom masks from Entripy They kept pushing my order back so I cancelled and went with Toronto Tees I had my masks 3 days later Joe was excellent to deal with

Name: A6043
Content: What a great shop I went in looking to print 16 Tshirts with my original artwork  Great quality for Great price Toronto Tees definitely stepped up Joe is great to correspond with and his staff provide courteous and prompt service If you need custom Tshirts printed for your event  party  corporation or whatever  I DEFINITELY recommend them

Name: A6044
Content: Joe & the Toronto Tees team are excellent Efficient  high quality and always go above on every interaction I highly recommend ordering from them

Name: A6045
Content: Made my perfect Holloween costume with Toronto Tees Thanks

Name: A6046
Content: Need shirts for a fundraiser event my wife was in Dancing with the Stars and needed them quickly Was easily able to build shirt online and was provided various options to have them printed/delivered in time for the event All worked out well and the shirts were a hit Thanks

Name: A6047
Content: amazing service from toronto tees first of all I had a bunch of questions that they answered really promptly  next  the design was printed so nice and clearly on the sweater i got  and the delivery was so fast thank you toronto tees for helping me create an amazing gift will def be shopping with you guys again

Name: A6048
Content: I love Toronto Tees Ive been coming here for several years to print shirts with memes I photoshop to include my brothers face Its always a quick and easy process  and the service is great  30  40 for one shirt is on the steep side  but its worth it for the quality of the tee and print plus the convenience of the on the spot job Lucas helped me out this week and he was awesome

Name: A6049
Content: Had a great experience doing an order of 50 custom t shirts Staff were awesome to deal with and the shirts turned out fantastic I was very happy

Name: A6050
Content: Great service Weve been ordering our shirts with Toronto Tees for years now and still very happy with the results Joes very attentive and willing to help Thanks again guys

Name: A6051
Content: I had a rush order that they turned around extremely quickly faster than they quoted me  They were extremely helpful  friendly and great to deal with Could not be happier I would recommend them to anyone and will definitely use the again

Name: A6052
Content: The shirt I had made for my friends birthday turned out great The tank top is good quality and the printing looks really sharp on it I was impressed with how quick the turnaround time was Thanks  Niall  for doing a great job

Name: A6053
Content: My teenage son loved his custom sweatshirt with his own design on it arrived within just a few days of ordering highly recommend Toronto Tees will definitely be back Great quality great price

Name: A6054
Content:
Super friendly  quick service 
Ive used them twice now to print my designs and will use them again 
My only comment and the reason for 4 starts is that they fade fairly quickly in my opinion but thats probably the case no matter where you go

Name: A6055
Content: I first heard of Toronto Tees on indie88 radio station They had a promo code and decided to order up a tshirt for my partner for fathers day I customed the shirt to a picture of him and our baby Tee shipped fast and got here quick Suspiciously quick Kidding  but it is hidden to be a suprise for him in few weeks Five stars

Name: A6056
Content: We finally made a decision to order T Shirts for guests at our cottage resort  Shorehill in Prince Edward County  Ontario We spent a lot of time and money having a brilliant brand and graphic designed for our new business so it mattered that the rendition on a T shirt was perfect and the shirt it self very soft comfortable One can buy cheaper T shirts at other shops but if you want your clients to wear them often and you care that your brand stays looking good  Toronto Tee is the team to work with Even our graphic designer happily wears the T and we know how particular graphic talent wondermatter can be  as they should be

Name: A6057
Content: Great quality Ordered my shirts last Thursday and they came in Wednesday Joe and his team were really helpful with minor customizations and I really appreciate their work

Name: A6058
Content: I really like how easy was to design it  cost was great and delivery service was very quick and excellent T shirt material looks good I hope its stuff and print will be good after wash

Name: A6059
Content: Great customer service and good quality clothing/designs My order arrived before the expected delivery date which was great

Name: A6060
Content: Excellent quality and turnaround time Had a small issue with where the items were left  but this was resolved very quickly and professionally Very nice to include the free masks and tote bags

Name: A6061
Content: purchased a tshirt for my best friends birthday Honestly wasnt sure how it was going to turn out as the picture I used was off of Instagram  but I was pleasantly surprised when I picked it up It looks fantastic Printing was quick  order was ready for me the next day Will definitely be coming back here in the future

Name: A6062
Content: Great quality shirt both in print detail and shirt material

Name: A6063
Content: Last minute birthday present for a friend Placed the order and after a simple phone call was able to pick up the same day The shirt was great and everybody was professional and very covid aware

Name: A6064
Content: They were super cool I had a special interest in their process so they let me come behind the counter and watch the printing They also chatted with me and were happy to answer all my curious questions I worked with Lucas specifically He helped me with my indecision about colour choices I loved how the shirts turned out

Name: A6065
Content: Weve been a customer for many years and we trust Toronto Tees whenever we need to print new merch They are professional and super kind Glad to have a legit print shop in our city and the only one who prints gold color properly Everyone should get their printing done with Toronto Tees

Name: A6066
Content:
This is my 5th year using this service I always get the greatest service  quick and satisfying The last two years that Ive visited I was served my Jay Hes a great guy and always does a great job on my annual birthday t shirt for my girlfriend Five Stars for Toronto Tees

 Jamie

Name: A6067
Content: I went in to have two t shirts made and ended up getting another 4 hoodies made The quality of their work is amazing The staff is extremely knowledgeable and offered suggestions which was appreciated Would 10/10 recommend

Name: A6068
Content: I needed a large amount of shirts for an event close to the date and they made th entire process easy and smooth They were great with details and communication Joe  the owner  was patient and helpful and even helped me carry the boxes

Name: A6069
Content: Great experience with Toronto Tees Joe was very helpful and I ordered on Tuesday  sent out on Thursday  Arrived on Friday Great quality Love it DBG Blackfriars

Name: A6070
Content: My son adores his new personalised Peter Rabbit sweater Was such a lovely gift Turn around was so quick and great quality Will purchase again

Name: A6071
Content:
I absolutely love that place Amazing quality of print and very very fast service It took 5 min print the t shirt Considering that its almost Christmas now and lots of people looking to print gifts i was not expecting such a fast service and i was presently surprised  
Already printed a couple of designs here and will come again even though its very far for me But its sooo worth it and so much better than any other printing service i tired
Recommend to anyone Amazing place  amazing people working and amazing quality

Name: A6072
Content: I customized a shirt with 8 names on it and each with different a different font The quality of the print was great and the shirt fit perfect I will definitely get another one done The price  38 was well worth it too Thanks guys

Name: A6073
Content: Great t shirt Cute and exactly what I expected

Name: A6074
Content: I was impressed with the attention to detail  kept asking  me the customer  if this or that was ok until perfect Great staff  my companys artwork was perfect  and the price was better than others for the same product Ill be a long time customer for sure Great Job Jay Thanks guys

Name: A6075

Content: I cannot say enough amazing things about Joe  from my first email to him to receiving the tshirts everything went absolutely smoothly The tshirts were EXACTLY what I asked for  the quality of them were beyond my expectations as well I highly highly recommend this place I will definitely be getting more from here Goodbye pay cheques lol Thank you

Name: A6089
Content: They do a nice job of getting the customized logo on tshirts You can do this online and when you go to the store they do it Our T shirt order was ok  we got what we ordered online The Polo shirt order did not go smoothly First of all there was no clear mention of material online  cotton or polyester When we went there they did not have cotton polo shirts It took us 3 trips to their Yonge st location before they could get us our choice It costed extra parking  12  and gas charges let alone fighting the downtown traffic every time So I ended up spending over  20 extra for the polo shirt They mentioned they will give me a break for the inconvenience but the only thing offered was a break for next purchase marketing  Dissapointed with their customer service and their online ordering

Name: A6090
Content: Old school tshirt printing at its finest Its not easy to find a good quality tshirt printing company that also offers tremendous customer service I consider myself luck to have found Toronto Tees When i need quality workmanship and products  i know where to turn

Content:

Made shirts in our hands Colton made our experience at your shop an unforgettable one Thank you sooooooo much  The quality is fantastic Excited to make more of our ideas come to life we will be back I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS SPOT IF YOU ARE IN NEED OF A CUSTOM TEE I tell anyone who will listen Amazing work guys Much love Michelle & Cherish

Content:
I love this place You can have just about any graphic/text printed on a shirt or hoodies  etc  I had a shirt printed with graphics/text and costed  45 after tax 
You can send your design by using their website in store or prior to your visit as long as you remember to save and submit your design from the site 
I got a shirt printed for my brother in law as his bday gift He loves Dave Chappelle and the f*ck yo couch skit so I google searched the image from that skit and added the text 
When they open up your design on their PCs  from start to end its just over 5 min to print 
Quick service and great location just a block south of Wellesley station on Yonge 
Theyve found a regular customer with me as Ill definitely be coming to get more customs done

Name: A6611
Content: Ordered from here several times am very happy with the quality of the printing I had an issue with my artwork in one order and it was resolved quickly They are very helpful and easy to deal with Highly recommend

Name: A6612
Content: I purchased 6 shirts  Mens Performance Polo TT51 Team 365 They informed me that I would have to wait for them to become available I told them that I had no problem waiting  as I am in no hurry I waited two months and was told my order was ready When I opened the package  I realized they substituted inferior quality shirts for the ones I paid for When I spoke with the manager he told me that he is under no obligation to tell me that he substituted a shirt I understand the need to substitute if I was putting a time pressure on them to deliver within a certain time  but if I am willing to wait  a substitution with no warning of a substitution is a classic bait and switch scam When you purchase with this company you have no idea what you are actually purchasing and they couldnt care less When I asked him why he doesnt care about his customers enough to even let them know of a substitution  he said he didnt have time Terrible customer service Edit In addition to my review here  I have filed a complaint with the Better Business Bureau and was surprised to learn that I am not the only one with an unresolved complaint

Name: A6613
Content: So after 4 voicemails  2 chat attempted  multiple unanswered calls and 5 emails  finally I arrive here This company has zero customer service They simply dont care if they have made any issue with their orders I ordered this shirt recently  I finally washed it  cold  and hung dry as usual As soon as it came out of the wash I immediately noticed that the colour of the face was yellow It makes the singer  look sickly Its a black man now with a yellowish green face Its unwearable I have taken a photo of my 3 year old  original version and you can see that the face has maintained his black complexion I asked for a redo on this tee  at  61 shipped this is not a cheap tee to make so I expect  and have received better ZERO RESPONSE

Name: A6614
Content: Ive been using T Shirt Elephant for 6 years now for my yearly race Our runners just love the shirts and hats he makes They are excellent The product and product suggestions/alternatives are high quality Jason is very easy to work with His prices are excellent And hes come through in the clutch for me at the same price and quality when I was delayed getting him my order Were a small not for profit and a small customer  but he really makes us feel like we are special I wouldnt go anywhere else for my Art In Motion 10K/5K/2K race shirts

Name: A6615
Content: I ordered some cotton tote bags for my wedding clients and they LOVED them Very well made  great print  quick and free shipping Will order again

Name: A6616
Content: There are many things which I found great about the whole experience with T Shirt Elephant The selection of a wide variety of T Shirts to match any style and quality The easy to use design process The rapid turn around of the product The high quality of the T Shirts which we selected The great quality of the full colour printing of our logo on the shirts We are thrilled both with the service and the quality of the finished product We will be placing another order very soon Thank you from the Electrical Banana

Name: A6617
Content:
Buyer beware I will say  years ago  this company was great I ordered all my merch from them Until now They made a mistake with my order printed the wrong colour  and the colours in the logo were all bleeding together  It was overall a terrible job They tried to blame me for the mistake Even though I had ordered the same thing 4 years prior and they had done a wonderful job with it This time they got the colour wrong  and it even varies from each shirt Its bad enough that I wont even let my staff wear the shirts because it looks so bad and I pride myself on being a clean  professional business I sent photo evidence of how they messed it up They avoided my emails and calls Finally  I asked for a refund and they said they would reprint instead They dragged that out for 3 months and still have yet to send me a reprint They say Its going out mid next week and we will send you shipping information then and I have received nothing My order was almost  500  they messed it up and refuse to fix it or refund me 
I was trying to get my staff new shirts to wear  and 6 months later I am still out  500 and no staff shirts We are a small business recovering from COVID and this was not a wasted expense we could afford 
I have given them plenty of business and this is how I was treated I sent a complaint to the BBB Hopefully no one else gets scammed Save your money  do not order from them They will rob you

Name: A6618
