Content: I really tried to give them the benefit of the doubt Ive had 2 separate orders with them come in fine and within a reasonable time so I wont knock that I made an order back in November of 2022  and I understand that the Christmas season was approaching so I buffed the time it would take print and deliver a single sweater Were now approaching the end of January and Ive sent multiple emails and chats through their website and have received little response and follow through I eventually received a response to which they didnt even at least apologize for the inconvenience I was offered to be issued a refund or to have it reprinted and sent out the following day I requested  the reprint since I just wanted to have the product as it was a long overdue Christmas gift I have not heard back since  and its been over a week The customer service was very disappointing and I communicated that within my messages Extremely disappointing   70 dollars for a sweater I may not ever receive I dont wish for this experience on anyone

Name: A6619
Content: We use T Shirt Elephant for our T Shirt and Sweatshirts every few months We usually print some very complex graphics and the prints turn out very well every time They are local and the prices are excellent

Name: A6620
Content: A month ago  I ordered 5 t shirts with a one colour design through the T shirt Elephants online system Soon after ordering  I realized I got one size wrong and wanted to make a change to the order It was IMPOSSIBLE to contact the company They never replied to the email and chat  didnt pick up the phone or called back The order arrived 8 days late Needless to say  my size change request was ignored The print quality was OK  and the price was affordable  but their customer service is non existent Not recommended

Name: A6621
Content: The process of ordering and getting proofs to getting our order on time was seamless and easy Jason was very communicative  prompt  and responded to all queries we had Highly recommend for any business looking for any branded apparel Were really happy with the quality of our sweatshirts

Name: A6622
Content: My t shirts arrived and are FANTASTIC I dont know whether or not someone put an extra rush on them as I requested via email to absolutely ensure they made it on time for when I need them  but they indeed arrived plenty early These shirts are for my fathers 80th birthday  which will sadly be his last T shirt Elephant was integral in ensuring we can have as many special elements for my fathers party as possible by making & expediting my order THANK YOU

Name: A6623
Content: I ordered 3 T shirts and 3 hoodies for my boyfriend as I wanted to custom design clothes for him using my artwork The prices are very competitive I did my research and the quality is excellent  they are super soft and have washed really well Delivery was on time All in all this was one of those perfect online shopping experiences I love the tshirts so much that I tend to wear them almost as much as Rob does Cant recommend highly enough

Name: A6624
Content: I went back to T Shirt Elephant after a previous excellent purchase and was not disappointed Great t shirts with high quality colour prints  and adorable aprons  our BBQ competition team will definitely be the best dressed Easy to design  competitive prices Thank you

Name: A6625
Content: Excellent quality shirts and my order was completed with a short turnaround time Jason was very helpful with any questions I had and his responses were always very prompt Will definitely order with T Shirt Elephant again

Name: A6626
Content: The best thing about ordering T shirts here is how user friendly their website interface is Always such a breeze purchasing t shirts here Also their quality assurance has been top notch and consistent 10/10 would recommend

Name: A6627
Content: Extremely happy with the hoodies They came in very quick and are excellent quality We will be doing more business with T Shirt Elephant

Name: A6628
Content: Wonderful business Ive ordered shirts and hoodies from them multiple times The last ordered they shipped in like 4 days Always super fast And the prints come out great

Name: A6629
Content:
I had ordered shirts from here before  and they were high quality screen printed Assuming the same  I ordered some new designs  only to find they were made with heat transfers instead The colours were washed out  and I suspect these will not wear nearly as well as the original order which was screen printed Considering the high unit cost  this is disappointing 

I suspect this is what happens with one off designs  but it should be made clear to customers if that is the case

Name: A6630
Content: We work with T Shirt Elephant regularly for our promotional gear needs They have a great selection of items; the quality of the products and custom printing is always spot on; and the team is extremely helpful when we need advice selecting new products Highly recommend

Name: A6631
Content:
I was pretty excited to be able to make some custom printed items for my wife; she had used your site in the past and they turned out terrific The design process was straightforward and easy to navigate  print timeline was as stated/expected 
I was also advised that a proof would be sent for approval prior to printing; I received none  but as I had left specific notes during the ordering process  I assumed the job was simple enough 
This is direct from your website Proofs  There is no document more important in the custom apparel business than a proof Our designers can create a proof with your branding and message so you can stay professional when submitting art to clients and potential clients; we will ensure your design alignment is centred; We will also try to fix up pixelated artwork or contact you about any issue 
Shipment was where things began to sour The tracking number provided was incorrect  after a week and a half I sent an email requesting the correct tracking information I still havent received a reply But the package arrived   quelle surprise
After inspecting the shirt there were several very noticeable design/print quality issues I called your customer number but was unable to speak with anyone so left a voice message  which has yet to be returned I sent an email clearly explaining the issues  with pictures of the deficiencies Again   no response I tried the  live chat option  but of course there isnt anyone live responding The androids final reply was that someone would contact me I waited 24 hours  again no response from your company I called again  leaving a second voice message indication how disappointing the lack of customer service is I waited another 24 hours  still no return contact This now brings us to this horrible review 
It is unfortunate that my experience has forced me into this action As I explained in my correspondence to you  the one item is to be worn to a Christmas party this weekend; she will still wear that shirt but the shoddy QC from your end will be evident for all to see  and make no mistake  everyone will made aware of your company name 
Word of mouth is an extremely powerful advertising tool 

UPDATE  it has been 13 days since my items arrived still havent received any responses for any of my voice messages and emails 
I have since read a ton of these reviews; shame on me for not prior to making my order But it always happens to the other guy 
How on earth can a company like this stay in business; that would be the day I would let customers have a terrible experience and bash my company like this and do absolutely zero to make things right

Name: A6632
Content: Ordered bulk and wanted rush production and sir Jason did not disappoint me This is my 2nd order with them Great quality and fast turnaround times I recommend this company for everybodys starting their clothing brand

Name: A6633
Content: Hi This is the worst customer service I have ever received I placed my order and requested assistance and edits to my design immediately I emailed and called more than 10 times to get someone to respond to me No response ever; I then tried to cancel my order by phone and email several times  no response I received the shirts with absolutely no edits or changes and they look ridiculous and are NOT at all what I wanted I want a refund  but again cannot get any response The shirts are terrible I would not use this company again

Name: A6634
Content: I get all of my tattoo shops merch printed at T Shirt Elephant The turn over time is great  and Jason is super easy to work with The warehouse is conveniently located in Toronto  making pick up a breeze Recommend to everyone

Name: A6635
Content: Got my t shirt the other day  absolutely love it  good quality  so will hopefully stand the test of time Really like the focus of the company on quality  and although its quite a bit more than I would usually pay for a t shirt Im more than happy to do so for the quality and great service

Name: A6636
Content: Buyer beware Ordered ATC shirts for a staff order to see how this company was at fulfilling orders as we wanted to use a Canadian company We received a poorer quality shirt than what we had ordered and when we contacted them on it they replied that it was in their terms and conditions that they could choose to substitute with other products of equal or greater quality without contacting What a scam this is in my opinion and I wonder how many people have been taken advantage of by this one sided loophole that only benefits them especially when the substitution is of lesser quality and something that we would have canceled if we were informed of the change they made with any notification at all

Name: A6637
Content: This is so confusing  last year  May 2022  I placed an order and the customer service I got was amazing Very fast  super helpful  great price and the quality was excellent Then a few months later  we had another order so I contact them which went fine for the first few email exchanges then as of mid November  nothing I emailed  called  used the chatbot  probably 20 30 times  and nothing Having to re do the entire process with another company was not cool  and Im so confused as to what happened Im certainly not using TE in the future though

Name: A6638
Content: This is an update to my past review; in which I not heard from the company whatsoever about a month after placing my order Today I can say that I have recieved atleast PART of my order from t shirt elephant I am grateful to say thart what was delivered was the largest part of the order and it was well done/ liked by everyone However  part of my order that is missing about  225 worth of product has been very hard to get the company to notice I have emailed and tried their chat bot which is a dead end Even their scoial medias do not allow messaging There seems to be no way to communicate with this company and this is disheartening I definitely will be reaching out the BBB if I do not hear from this company soon on my missing order components

Name: A6639
Content: Great embroidery on toques Ordered 25 toques for my company for the upcoming winter and they came out amazing Shipped faster too

Name: A6640
Content: Jason and the T Shirt Elephant team have been incredible in turning around our orders quickly and with great quality prints Even with last minute orders they have always come through for our team Hockey Helps the Homeless partners with Tshirt elephant for all our volunteer shirts and custom designs

Name: A6641
Content: Custom designed some T shirts for my husband  they turned out amazing so happy with the quality of the shirts and the quality of the printing Will definitely order again

Name: A6642
Content: H A S Marketing & Sterling Screen Printing takes it to another level Amazing correspondence with Jason This shop does full colour process and the quality is world class Super quick turn around

Name: A6643
Content:
I ordered a few different products Order came quicker than expected I ordered 2 different colors of the Gilden 1850 pullover hoodie  navy and white Navy hoodies with white lettering these all came were you could see the navy color coming through and a couple had white spill out were it shouldnt Also the pocket on these were not cut right  one side hand hole was 12 5cm and other side was 15cm The navy color was a poor quality hoodie All White hoodies with Navy lettering were good and had no issues I have phoned company and left message  no call returned I have sent email with pictures  also no response 

Customer service did come through Took a while but replacement product was supplied  and they look amazing  if all products had come like this the first time would have been a 5 star rating

Name: A6644
Content: We are a school in Vancouver BC and buy a lot of T Shirts  hoodies  and other customized spirit wear from TSE Been using them for years and always very happy with the quality and service Very helpful and friendly

Name: A6645
Content: Dealing with T Shirt Elephant is very easy  they have great customer service  always replying to messages in a timely manner They take the work out of the order for you and my end product turned out fantastic

Name: A6646
Content: TShirt Elephant has been my go to for 10+ years Always amazing service  fast when needed and a great price The only place we go to and recommend for merch

Name: A6647
Content:
Customer service was great at first as I had answers under a day to my questions Then  I received my order and the numbers I had ordered and paid a supplement for  were not on the shirts 

I sent two emails about two weeks ago to ask how we could solve this issue and didnt receive an answer yet Everytime I call I go to voicemail Left a message and never got a call back 

I am very disappointed in the service when things dont go as planned

Name: A6648
Content: Quality  fabric type  and garment size were accurately described No issues with photo distortion at all Everything made to my specifications Will be ordering again

Name: A6649
Content: I had a great experience with T Shirt Elephant I got my business t shirts and hats embroidered within just a week The t shirt stamp is exactly as per the PMS colors provided and looks resistant enough for several washes The hats are perfectly embroidered Very satisfied and will do business again Many thanks to William Lima who took special care to this order

Name: A6650
Content: Absolutely loved my experience I ordered a custom design sweatshirt for the holidays about a year ago  which I simply dragged my art onto the design area of the website  and the outcome was fantastic The screen print remains just as vibrant as when I first received it as seen in the photo  and the shirt itself was surprisingly fuzzy on the inside I also plan to order another design for a group of people soon Although the price is a little more than what Id usually pay for clothing  and the shipping takes awhile depending on your order  these are custom designs and you do in fact get your bang for your buck

Name: A6651
Content: We use T Shirt Elephant as our provider for all are T Shirt and apparel Weve worked together for almost 8 years now and theyve been the back bone of our business We are both Canadian businesses  so its been a pleasure to continue to support them

Name: A6652
Content:
This company is a JOKE Emailed and attempted to call customer service multiple times They ghosted on responses once I made a point that their product was subpar and no where near the mocked up design Save your time and money and go somewhere else that will actually respond and take responsibility for their lack of expertise 
Ive used this company in the past for toques when I went to make a second order with a new design again LAZILY they just reprinted my old design again This time they actually took responsibility for their error and sent new toques with my new design 

Should have known to not use them again after that  but here we are Almost  800 lost on a box of merch I dont even want to give out for free because it looks so pedestrian

Name: A6653
Content: Delivered less than the quantity we ordered and paid for Dont answer emails or phone calls to address problems with the order Many items had loose threads and quality is bad Do not recommend

Name: A6654
Content: Terrible customer service We made a team order for hoodies  and the first order came all uniform The next order for new players was placed with the exact same product  exact same layout  was noted that it was to match the original order They sent us a poor quality print and when I got in touch to have it replaced with the same quality as the other hoodies they said it was my fault that the print was so poor because I didnt request a certain type of printing I was never made aware that there were different types of printing  and why would I want a poorer quality print? They said the manager reviewed the quality and said that it was fine It looks completely different from the first order  and looked faded before it was ever washed You can see the difference in the photos One was crisp and one is not The kicker for all of this is that a local company offered the same product with same printing for HALF the price of T Shirt Elephant What a rip off Find a local family owned company to support and take your business elsewhere

Name: A6655
Content: They are very responsive  easy and quick The shirts I ordered came out perfect both times I ordered

Name: A6656
Content:
They did a horrendous job on our shirts and are refusing to get back to me The shirts looked really washed out and our logos almost looked bleached on most shirts The logos that werent bleached were just completely different colours than what we asked for Save yourself the time and look elsewhere for your Custom T shirt needs You wont be able to get a hold of anyone if they do mess up 

Edit Its only fair to share the good things as well The company ended up making it right and sent us a brand new batch free of charge and they look 10x better Thanks for looking out

Name: A6657
Content: Extremely high quality prints and a tremendous selection of apparel Fast shipping and good communication ensure I will use them again I really cant say enough good thing about the company Fully exceeded expectations Dont let my camera phone fool you  the prints and colors are tremendous

Name: A6658
Content: Easy to design  good/quick communication because 1 of the t shirt colours I picked was out of stock Got the order quicker than expected & they look amazing Very happy with quality & customer service at T Shirt Elephant

Name: A6659
Content:
Spoke to them via their online chat app and had a handshake agreement to the timeline in regards to production and shipping  as we were trying to hit a milestone Basically We know it says 20 days  but itll be printed and out the door way sooner Once the order was placed and paid  that agreement disappeared  and even though the conversation was acknowledged  they reprimanded me for even inquiring as to production time and subsequent shipping date 

Chelsea  the person with the title customer service  provided a series of contradictory comments via email in regards to timeline and my original order apparently Estimated Arrival Date means when theyll actually ship  The original chat was well turn this around super quick to we have fourteen days and its only day twelve  so back off When questioned on Day 14 as to the status was told weekends dont count  even though I went by her numbers 

Hell  at one point Chelsea sent me a screenshot of their website that shipping is an estimated timeframe and to tell me it was late because Canada Post was having a tough go with the pandemic Mind you  theyd not even printed the shirts at this point  so super curious as to how it was the postal systems fault?

Long story short  these arrive eventually Three simple white text on black t shirts that cost just over  70 all in Wicked expensive but hey  it was a joke gift of sorts  for a milestone that was already six days past  but was happy theyd arrived 

However  the print job was sub par Thick  undefined edges  paint that allowed for the fabric to show through  and letters that began to flake off when lightly rubbed with my fingers 

Asked for a refund and was told This falls within our acceptable printing guidelines We will not be issuing a reprint or a refund for this This matter is closed 

Are you serious? Imagine I treated my clients like this? Imagine any of us would? A server that brings you hamburger instead of steak and when queried responds with not only this falls within our acceptable serving guidelines but ends with go eff yourself  this matter is closed 

This was not only a fun little gift  but a DTG supplier test run  and man alive lesson learned to run from these folks Theyve got nice branding  a decent online interface and cool packaging  but their customer service is total trash and that end product is an embarrassment 

So youve paid money for a product or service to a level of quality that youd not received  and the people who took that money tell you that not only they think this kind of poor craftsmanship falls within their acceptable printing guidelines but that you cant discuss a reprint  a refund or any other avenue 

This matter is closed 

Wow Both the production time  customer service and ultimately the product itself is just piss poor Whoever screen printed this has little to no talent  or needs to find their manager to walk them through the basics again or just doesnt care Three scenarios that dont work in a payment for skill based business 

Cant recommend giving zero business to T shirt Elephant enough Shop elsewhere

Name: A6660
Content: Quality product  great price and outstanding customer service I placed a large and complex order and there was a slight logo alignment issue with the sweatshirts Rebecca bent over backwards to make sure the reprints were correct  checking and re checking to be certain theyd come out properly They were printed correct and shipped out immediately I cant say enough about how impressed I am with her prompt communication and her attention to making sure I was 100 satisfied Already taking orders for another batch  2 thumbs up for the elephant

Name: A6661
Content: I recently designed two shirts of behalf of a customer Not only did she love the design  but she was also very pleased with the colour and quality of the Gildan 5000 t shirts

Name: A6662
Content:
BEWARE Would leave 0 stars if google let me 

No one answers a phone  an email  returns a voicemail  no matter how many times you contact them They say 14 days for shipping which is a LIE 

Still havent got what Im waiting for  which was time sensitive so dont even need it if it ever comes 

Wish I read these other recent reviews earlier Will be disputing this credit card charge

Name: A6663
Content:
For the last 3 years Ive made multiple orders of around  1000  2500 from Tshirt Elephant 
The first couple of years customer service was great and the product was good and it was always delivered in a timely manner 

This year the customer service has been atrocious I have to say this is the worst customer experience Ive dealt with in my 25 years alive and Im not exaggerating Theres simply no way to get ahold of anyone at the company 

Im giving 2 stars due to past performance being acceptable But its super easy to tell the company is having major internal issues right now Supply chain issues are understandable in this time Customer service issues are a lack of care and/or poor systems 

Working with my credit card company to see if theyll cancel this order so I can move onto another company

Name: A6664
Content: Save yourself the trouble and please dont order from here Calling their 1 800 number will lead straight to voicemail and emails to their orders account will never be returned The 14 day guaranteed shipping is a flat lie and I was only able to get my product still delayed by two weeks from the guaranteed date when I called my credit card to report for fraud The fraud division submitted the report and advised that if they dont respond back within 30 days or something Id get my money back  and only then did I receive my order after 8 days passed When I placed the order for a team baseball hat  it mentioned that all hat orders will be embroidered by default but some complex designs may need to be digitally printed of which they will confirm before printing My design only had a simple  S on it and it came digitally printed Also the wrong hat selection too Now I wish they havent sent this at all so that Id get my full refund back from my credit card but I guess they didnt want to be filed for fraud so they sent my order out of spite with the bare minimum effort using the cheapest selection for the design Hope karma does wonders to the owners and employees of this scamful company

Name: A6665
Content: Amazing I have used these guys for Adult League hockey jerseys for 3 years in a row  and the jerseys are high quality  affordable  and easy to design

Name: A6666
Content: I recently placed a large order for Company T shirts and am very happy with the pricing and quality of the Bella&Canvas prints The team were quick to discuss the design and answer questions about the product via email I placed the order on Apr 3 and received the completed order on the estimated delivery date of April 23 As long as they dont shrink much after first wash  the whole team is very happy with the quality prints

Name: A6667
Content:
Based on all recent reviews  everyone is having the same issue They will be in contact with you until you order They get your money then decide to ghost Really its too bad I have ordered from here multiple times not since 2018 though and never had a bad experience  so the company must be in some trouble 

I made an order a month ago and was supposed to have a delivery last week at the latest 10 emails  and 5 voicemails have not been answered Just give me a refund I will be filing a police report and a chargeback with my credit card  although I feel my  300 is gone

Name: A6668
Content:
DO NOT BUY HERE IT IS A SCAM After reading comments here  looks like i am not the only one who got scammed My story I purchased 3 pro performance shirts 2 designs in total  The 1st design came out good  as expected On the more expensive 2 shirts 2nd design  they replaced my selected design with a different shirt It was extremely poor quality and fit and most importantly a completely different design I inquired with support and all they did was try to offer me 20 off the 2 shirts that were bad 20 off something i didnt choose to buy or want No one ever communicated to me that there would be a design change  as their policy stated The 2 bad shirts are completely worthless Look at the attached pics for what i ordered vs what i got 
Imagine going into a car dealership and paying  100k for the higher end model and when you come pick it up  they give you the  30k model  without telling you anything before you came then offer you 20 off Thats what happened here I will be taking this guy to court so that others wont get scammed again Jason Sterling is the apparent business owner He is on Facebook

Name: A6669
Content:
Please do not order from this place This is my first time ordering from this company and it was the worst 

The customer service is absolutely non responsive phone number  emailing  the chat box  you name it  Dont even bother trying to call them because it will only lead you to a voicemail every time The quickest response I got was through email  and that was from Robyn Atherton who only responded to answer why there was a delay in my order and about my tracking number but this is after I had to email them multiple times for them to respond back 

On top of that  one of the hoodies which had no designs or anything I received was a faulty there was a hole  the finishing was not neat  loose threads  and the sewings were not straight 

Also  when designing the crewnecks on the website  the design I have made were large and it fit the crewnecks nicely But when I received my order the design was wayyyy smaller like embarrassingly smaller which now looks pathetic 

Considering that this place has a 3 8 rating  and that a friend of mine recommended this place to me I was expecting good customer service and the products being designed the way I wanted it to be 

In conclusion  dont order from this place Just dont I spent the last month and this past few weeks working on designing  ordering  and struggling to get a response from the company just for my order to have a delay and for the design to look wack

Name: A6670
Content: My first order with Tshirt Elephant was a bit scary I thought I had been scammed because there was hardly any communication once my order was placed I eventually got my order so I forgave and forgot Placed a second order hoping this time would be better  wrong Second order was far worse I had to send 5 emails asking if they received my payment and still havent got a response Imagine having to beg a company to let you know if your order has been processed I guess they dont want my money I do not recommend ordering from this company The print is decent but the quality of the clothing is awful One wash and the hoodies/tshirts are threading all over the place Non existant customer service I work for a large business local to Calgary and we wouldve consistently placed large volume orders but now we are looking elsewhere

Name: A6671
Content: If I could give a zero I would  extremely disappointed by the zero customer service provided When I made an order for school purposes  there was a slight mistake in the order that we caught immediately after placing Tried calling  emailing and using their text feature for a week solid and never got any response from anyone  despite their claims of having customer service daily throughout the week by phone message  and the automatic reply to my emails stating they would get back to me within 24 hours Never did get a hold of anyone and when I got my order almost a month later it was not what I wanted and poor quality Since I will not charge my students for this I am now personally out almost  300 Will never order from them again Very disappointed

Name: A6672
Content:
I had ordered previously and had a great experience This time when I attempted to order additional matching shirts for the team it was awful 
Knowing my order was from several years ago  and trying to make it easier on the company  I enclosed a copy of my original order and pictures of one of the original jerseys with instructions I wanted them to match as perfectly as possible When I got the new jerseys they didnt match They were vinyl decals instead of silk screenedand and the font was in lowercase instead of all uppercase 
Upon contacting them to ask about a remedy  I was first told they had never silkscreened performance wear and that they matched the jerseys as best they could I then emailed saying that I did have silkscreened jerseys and the font didnt match and this could have been avoided by showing a proof They said they never show proofs for names and numbers on jerseys and i should have verified their methods of printing before I ordered The remedy they offered was for me to sepify what I wanted more clearly on my next order i guess copies of my previous order and photos of the jerseys i wanted mached wete not specific enough There will be no next order

Name: A6673
Content: Ordered  1800 worth of shirts and hats after using this company in the past The logo on the shirts was missing half of the printed words Terrible customer service with slow reply times No reasonable offer of making things right Will be taking my business elsewhere

Name: A6674
Content: These guys knocked it out of the park again This is the third year that the Art In Motion 10K/5K/2K has used Jason and his crew to do our race shirts and each year they have been amazing We added some custom embroidered hats and they were better than I expected

Name: A6675
Content:
I spoke AT LENGTH with Jason who was extremely short in his emails but I tolerated it as it seemed he was giving me a reasonable price Eventually we agreed on a final quote per T shirt I took orders  charged my customers and then provided him with the complete order only to be ignored and ghosted I sent 4 emails Called 3 times and left a voicemail which all went unanswered I find this extremely unprofessional and apparently this customer service rep has done this before as I can see the review before mine went through the exact same experience 

Do yourself a favor and avoid this unprofessional business

Name: A6676
Content:
TERRIBLE SERVICE  product not as advertised  not as promised save your money and buy elsewheres 
While my 2018 purchase went well  this year was quite the opposite Jason was very responsive while we ordered our shirts  but after they arrive  the company is completely silent Our order was not fulfilled in full  we paid for items which we did not receive  and we have heard radio silence from our multiple voicemails and multiple emails since early June I will have to seek refund/re imbursement for items not fulfilled as purchased Wish me luck  LOL

Name: A6677
Content:
I am completely blown away at how well the picture came out  as I did not expect anywhere near that good of a result 

This is the second shirt I have ordered from them  and you can guarantee I will be giving my custom again 

Thank you so much

Name: A6678
Content: The website is easy to navigate and they offer a lot of items The prices get a lot better as you increase the quantities Concerning the product itself During my design process on their website  I made sure that everything was centered However  my order seems to have the print a bit tilted to the left side  writing is not straight like you would expect I made 15x shirts  some are worst than others  but pretty much all seems tilted The delivery time is about 10 to 15 days; which is fairly good

Name: A6679
Content:
Unfortunately  my experience with them on the customer service side has been terrible I ordered 15 pieces t shirts  long sleeves and hoodies  Very satisfied with the shirts and long sleeves However  the color on the hoodies are extremely different from the other items in my order and the print quality is significantly worse 

I immediately contacted them to inform them of my issue and even after supplying pictures of the obvious drop in quality on the hoodies  they refused to accommodate me in any way whatsoever  stating theyre not issuing reprints or any sort of refund/credit on print quality basis 

Extremely dissatisfied  will never order from them again

Name: A6680
Content: I got some shirts for my friends engagement party weekend Everyone loved them They fit so well I love to sleep in mine

Name: A6681
Content: Ordering from T shirt was a breeze  the order came quick and the quality of the product is amazing Will order again for sure

Name: A6682
Content: Ordered some t shirt for Halloween and they came out great

Name: A6683
Content:
Thank you TShirt Elephant for the amazing sweatshirts They came out perfectly and right on time and our team could not be happier Highly recommend T Shirt Elephant to anyone reading this 

Thanks again

Name: A6684
Content: I put it an order of about  3000  t shirts with logos and they were great  although I had 3 speical items that were the wrong items and not what I ordered I have contacted the customer department 4 times and have not received a response back at all 2 emails and 2 phone calls have not been returned After reading the other recent reviews now Im not surprised at all Customer Service doesnt exist

Name: A6685
Content: From ordering to delivery  the process was seamless The website is very user friendly but they also have a chat box if you hit any snags My order was processed right away  and I received it less than a week later The quality of the shirt is great  the imprint looks spectacular and I know my partner is going to LOVE this surprise in his Xmas stocking Thanks to the team at T Shirt Elephant  I wouldnt hesitate to order from them again

Name: A6686
Content: they were nice to accept to print my shirt when I had problems with the website and it had nothing on it because of the error However  when I showed them what I wanted  they simply did it the way they wanted it I sent them a picture telling them exactly what I wanted and they picked a different font from the one in the picture I sent because  they have standard fonts The funny part was that the picture I sent them was a previous order so there shouldnt be any problem getting it exactly the way it was supposed to be they refused to do it the right way and told me to next time order with the font I want Like??

Name: A6687
Content: Was very pleased with our order The shirts and print is excellent quality This was our second time ordering My kids like to make shirts of their artwork and this is a wonderful way for them to do that We even had to contact T shirt elephant to make last minute changes and the response was quick and satisfying Highly recommend

Name: A6688
Content: Really disappointed with this experience Rude client service We ordered 6 matching tshirts for our friends for an upcoming vacation The fit was extremely small Their website doesnt tell you they fit small  so order a bigger size They said we must not be XL and we should have ordered XXL I have never put an XXL on in my life I am barely an XL but these dont fit me They wont do anything to make this right Hopefully they realize that good customer service goes a long way This could have been a 5 star review that helped them attract customers Now  I hope they lose 20 customers over this Buyer beware

Name: A6689
Content: Im so glad Jason Sterling ghosted me and never emailed or called back Thank you We ended up finding another printing company that delivered our jerseys on time  at a lower price  and the most important part  actually responds to correspondences What a concept For anyone else looking for a capable  responsible printer  T shirt Elephant is not it

Name: A6690
Content: I ordered custom T shirts and hats for my company from this place They sent me blank tshirts; without any logos even though I was charged for custom logo printing  I have sent them multiple emails and never received a response I have called their customer service  left several voice messages and have received no response

Name: A6691
Content:
Scam scam scam I placed a  200 order
Beginning of May  it is now the end of June  and I have not received anything and have tried to contact T shirt elephant for over a month I have tried email  phoning  Facebook  Instagram  every way possible and I have not received a reply I filed a report with the Better Business Bureau and I am now contacting my credit card company to Get a refund Do not use this company  it is a SCAM

Name: A6692
Content: I have ordered from this company before and recieved good service but this time I ordered 10 custom shirts over 2 months ago The first time I ordered the shipping status said it was delivered when I was not and when I brought this to customer service they said they would try to ship to a new address that I provided both of these addresses have been used by this company in the last 2 years so I know they work  Fast forward another month and the second shipment said that its been sent back to the sender Very frustrating experience that still has yet to be resolved Would not recommend this company Ill update this review if this is ever resolved

Name: A6693
Content: I have ordered several custom one off t shirts and tank tops through T Shirt Elephant over the last four or five years I am consistently impressed with thier quality  speed  service  and pricing Buying one off shirts may be expensive  but the quality more than makes up for it  even the shirts I have from years ago are in excellent condition  no holes in the fabric  no fading or cracking of the image I will definitely be using them again in the future

Name: A6694
Content: DO NOT USE I recently ordered an American Apparel 50/50 shirt and received a completely different shirt than what I ordered that was of significantly worse quality I needed this shirt for an event and even super rushed the order that charged a 50 additional fee I reached out to the co owner Jason who told me they have the right to switch the shirt type at any time without warning and to check the FAQ next time Not only did I not receive the right shirt but the customer service was extremely poor and non sympathetic despite the companys error I highly recommend you look at alternative companies or as Jason says read the fine print FAQ and if your lucky you will get what you ordered

Name: A6695
Content: It was last minute I needed special shirts done for a memorial I reached out to about 11 companies  all in which said they couldnt do the amount needed  or both sides of the shirt or I had to wait 7 bhsiness days What a shocker Not with this company Thank God I found Jason Jason was exquisite He was understanding and continued to work with me to ensure these shirts would be done and ready Further more when the shirts ran out and we needed more not once but two times in the same night  Jason was to our rescue Such a great company and great staff I dont know what we would have done if it wasnt for the care and understanding of the staff of this company Shirts chosen and designed by me were done to the t on these shirts No errors and nothing altered If you need any shirt for any occasion Stick with these guys They will ensure the job is done right Thank you so much

Name: A6696
Content:
I have had the most terrible customer experience with this company No one will respond to me since I submitted payment Ive sent so many messages I have received no communication about the status of my order  when or at this point IF it will be ready I shouldnt have tried to save a bit of money  and gone with a trusted company 
What is crazy is companies like ours make repeat orders Youre losing so much future business
REFUND THIS ORDER IMMEDIATELY 

Invoice number FD85CCB3 0001
Receipt number 2518 8184
Date paid May 25  2022

Name: A6697
Content: I have never created a t shirt but this experience was made very easy with a step by step simple process I purchased two different styles and texture of shirts  and both were very much to my approval When I submitted the order  they stated a specific date it would be ready  and I believe it was in the couriers hands before that date  so efficiency and being prompt are always a good thing to be associated with a company Overall  I was extremely happy and I believe anyone ordering from T Shirt Elephant will be also

Name: A6698
Content: This Company is completely Terrible DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY  I ordered 4 Tshirts and the quality is Terrible  The custorm Service was extremly rude and they was not going to offer a refund for the t shirt that i am not even going to wear thats how poor the qualty is

Name: A6699
Content: I really wish I read the reviews before purchasing Please beware because this company made me 2 shirts for 120  and they did them completely wrong and the Colours were wrong I sent them an email and they asked me to reply with pictures and then they never responded to avoid refunding me Avoid at all cost

Name: A6700
Content: Super disappointing The colors of the shirts I ordered look very different than the swatch on the site and the quality of the printing is extremely poor It looks like it will come off after a few washes Not good for business t shirts

Name: A6701
Content: I cannot say enough good things about T Shirt Elephant I have ordered small batches of shirts 7 and 9 twice now  and not only have the shirts been superb quality  the customer service ROCKS For my last order  I had a pretty specific request that involved T Shirt Elephant putting something that typically goes on the back of a shirt on the front instead  to save me money Jason Sterling was amazing  responded quickly to my questions  and MADE IT HAPPEN If you need custom T shirts  get them here I promise Ill be back

Name: A6702
Content: We ordered t shirts on May 18  2022 We paid 25 extra per item With a promised delivery date of June 1  2022 We have made multiple attempts to contact someone It is now June 15  2022 Still no t shirts and still no reply to our multiple emails

Name: A6703
Content: I have used T Shirt Elephant for many years now for my TA shirts and they are always great quality  exactly how I order them with the logo placement and delivered timely They have a very user friendly website that allows you to design your items with ease highly recommend

Name: A6704
Content: This is one of the best companies Ive ever dealt with Professional  quick and friendly Loved it A website that is very easy to navigate amazing quality shirts  very customizable Cannot wait to order my next tshirt and HIGHLY recommend it to everyone

Name: A6705
Content: The website and ordering process was great Very easy to use The experience I just had with Customer Service not so much I ordered one shirt for a Toddlers birthday with shipping to Vancouver was almost  60  I received an email that they didnt have the hoodie I ordered and they suggested an alternative which I agreed to It ended up being a tshirt rather than a sweatshirt and I assumed I would be refunded the difference in price  whatever it was They state If any product is out of stock we reserve the right to replace the item with equal or higher quality comparable item which I understand except my replacement was not equal or higher quality When I contacted them asking if I would be receiving a refund  customer service went back and forth justifying why they can keep my money but offered 10 off my next order  The last email from Chelsea in Customer Service said We send substitution suggestion emails out as a courtesy and we are not obligated to do so You were made fully aware of the substitution which you agreed to We are not issuing any refunds or reprints for an order we printed to order

Name: A6706
Content: I had an extremely last minute embroidery need  and Jason and his team at T Shirt Elephant helped me out Great service Wonderful work Cant say enough about them

Name: A6707
Content:
Pros print quality and colour selection
Cons Customer service is so bad its astounding
What I had made  hoodies  long sleeve athletic shirts  polo and jackets

Name: A6708
Content:
Ordered five  various shirts Two garments were not as expected for colour and style  as seen in the product choosing and design process 
Prices are on the mid to high end for low volume printing 
I dont think I would use them as a vendor again

Name: A6709
Content: Worst customer service and products ever I ordered last Nov  After confirming and paying  I was then told they could not deliver on time I asked for money back Nope They claimed they had already ordered the t shirts Really? Thats a super lame excuse for a t shirt company that would sell them as it was pre Xmas rush I asked many times for a rep to call  never happened No replies to emails Design was messed up on our shirts and could not sell them BAD BAD BAD I would give zero stars if possible

Name: A6710
Content:
i ordered from them recently and have been loving it a lot
going to place another order soon

Name: A6711
Content:
EXCELLENT quality  fast turnaround and great customer service I was mistakenly given only part of my order when I picked it up Jason took care of couriering the rest of the order immediately Highly recommended

The above is from my first time placing an order My most recent repeat business order came back looking so good it brought a tear of joy to my eye The colors were super saturated and the registration of the screens was tight

As a side note  the colors from the first order look as vibrant many many washings later as when I first picked up the order

Name: A6712
Content: Great service and communication during and after the ordering process Quick production and delivery Quality and cost are great

Name: A6713
Content:
This company is not even deserving of one star Their customer service is so bad Still waiting several months into my order 
Order anywhere else but here

Name: A6714
Content:
Tried to place an order by email Whoever responds to their orders email address email signature is Jason Sterling  who has a LinkedIn saying this is his familys business directed me to email transfer him money to make a shirt After he received the money he ghosted me No shirt  and Im out  100 

T Shirt Elephant/Jason  if youre reading this  I want the shirt very soon or my money back You have my email

Name: A6715
Content: I have only good things to say about T shirt Elephant I had ordered 3 hoodies in November 2020 One was a gift for my daughters birthday It had a defect in the neck size of the hoodie I had sent an email informing them of the defect Within 12 hours  Robyn had responded to my email and was happy to do a reprint She was very polite and professional I will definitely be using this company again

Name: A6716
Content:
I dont often post public reviews  however I hope my review can help any prospect customers hoping to make a Christmas order around this time 

I placed a small order 7 custom sweatshirts on Dec 2nd last year with a guaranteed date of Dec 22 At the time of my order the website still showed that I could pick up locally  which I was hoping would be my back up if it wasnt delivered in time for Christmas After I emailed customer service to confirm this after my order  I received a templated email saying pick up not available due to Covid I tried calling and the phone was never picked up 

Dec 22 comes and goes  no delivery and no communication from the company I send an email enquiry  and I get no response Christmas comes and goes  and still no response or delivery I try calling  and again  phone only goes to voicemail I finally leave a voicemail January 7th enquiring about my order I get no phone call back  and then finally I get an 2 line email effectively saying sorry  order is pushed to front of queue and will be shipped rush They gave no explanation or acknowledgement that they mustve forgot about my order I presume  And yet still  by January 19th I received nothing and had to follow up yet again They never responded  but eventually by late January I got the order which was anti climatic  as the people who were suppose to get them at Christmas were no longer in the province 

Im not sure if I was overlooked as my order was so small and personal  and not a corporate order  but I was very frustrated and upset by the whole experience If the company cannot handle smaller personal orders  or covid is disrupting the productivity  then they should clearly communicate that with their prospective customers The lack of communication was just unacceptable I even sent an email to customer service after my order was finally delivered  setting out how disappointing the process was and never got a response

Name: A6717
Content: Got the Most amazing shirts from here Was really happy with the out come Highly recommended

Name: A6718
Content: I would give a higher rating for the service and the speed of delivery  however the product itself leaves so much to be desired The shirts I ordered were a better quality material and cut than I had expected  the fit was great However  I came to T Shirt Elephant for printed shirts  so this review is based on the quality of printing The window within which you can design is limited The quality of the printing is fair at best and none of the products I have ordered have withstood the wash I am incredibly disappointed and torn at whether or not I should actually share this product with customers due to the poor quality of printing

Name: A6719
Content:
A small business has been misled by this company thinking they delivered a quality product 

Instead they offer you cheap prints that are extremely low quality 

See photos  this is suppose to be a solid orange and their response has been this fits our acceptable colour allowance Their email response is also below

Name: A6720
Content:
Website was easy to use  but order took much longer to arrive than I was told it should Also 
I didnt get exactly what I wanted I ordered an embroidered toque  but instead they sent me a printed toque and didnt warn me in advance that there were any changes I wouldve appreciated the heads up that my order wasnt going to be what I asked for

Name: A6721
Content: Shipping was super slow and products were very small although they do provide a size chart you must measure and expect to order 3 sizes larger than you normally wear  was pricey as well   55 for a simple t shirt with custom print Offered company chance to help but no offer of support Bottom line dont use this service

Name: A6722
Content: I placed a large order for shirts during the Boxing Day sale event It was a good deal and I was able to conveniently design the shirt online However  when I received the order  the shirts design was in the completely wrong color Chelsea with T Shirt Elephant quickly addressed my concerns and got us another shipment on a time sensitive order However  again this order was in the wrong color Ultimately  we got a 25 refund on our order Chelsea was great to address these concerns However  we were greatly inconvenienced by this process and still have the wrong color for shirts

Name: A6723
Content:
I made a massive order Immediately realized I forgot to enter my promo code for 15 off and emailed them immediately and asked for it to be applied or my order cancelled so I could reorder I was told that nothing could be done and that I could get 10 off on my next purchase I responded by saying that I was a repeat customer and it seemed preposterous that they couldnt do anything about it and asked to speak to a manager Then I got a response that they could give me a refund of 10  which meant they were lying in their initial response 

I would have been a loyal customer for life and would have recommended this company to everybody were it not for this pathetic customer service

Name: A6724
Content: T shirt Elephant was super easy to use and youre able to selected the type of clothing you would like to customize Great selections at affordable prices I was really please with the outcome of my order The quality is good and they printed the logo I needed perfectly Delivery also came really quickly way before my deadline Really impressed with the company

Name: A6725
Content:
I placed an order to print me two shirts that I had designed myself 
I work as a graphic designer  and know that the art was camera ready  in other words nothing needed to be changed to print them 
I selected the apparel that I wanted  nothing special  two grey Gildan shirts 
It took 5 weeks to arrive 
The website does not tell you how long to expect to have to wait  until after you have paid them 
The quality of the print was decent  and the shirts look great I have no complaints about the products My two star rating was entirely due to the utter lack of transparency regarding how long this was going to take Elephant ignoring my email requests for an update I got one notice/ reply to my queries in the five week period 
When the items did arrive  there was no Sorry this took so long email  or any offering of an explanation 
I had a series of designs  for multiple touring bands  and orders in the hundreds that were to follow this first small run/ test printing 
I ended up going with Jak prints out of Cleveland With import fees  and shipping internationally included  their prices are similar  and often less than Elephant I wished to use a CA company  but not when it takes five weeks to print two shirts 
Never again

Name: A6726
Content:
BE AWARE Do not order from them Find and support another local custom tshirt supplier T Shirt Elephant is a Disaster I will be reporting 
The order was supposed to be delivered within 2 weeks as per contract Of course I understand the current situation and I did allowed an extra time for delivery  I was okay with the delay  however there was NO communication  no Order updates  no emails  no messages sent to me about the production times etc It has been a month and no delivery Finally after 1 month the package comes in after I sent 2 emails and 1/2 of the order is still missing Website says the order is completed  but I only got half of the products ordered I emailed customer service three times  tried to chat with them online  and called twice  and I am unable to reach the customer service No one responds to your emails 

Also  QUALITY IS BAD  the printing is very light and not high quality ink  the logo will go away after few washes  Im sure The embroidery is so bad  the thread is pulling already in one of the product  which means the quality of the supplies is low I ordered from other stores before and it was never such bad quality 

DO NOT TAKE PEOPLES MONEY AND ORDERS IN IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO DELIVER

Name: A6727
Content: Quality of garments was good Got 2 sweatshirts A lot of   but good quality I sized my logo and placed on mock up  didnt see where I could add measurement and logos came on products ridiculously HUGE About 4 wider than I had assumed based on mock up You never see logos that gigantic Cant wear  looks so silly Wasnt happy  emailed and all they offered was 10 off my next order No thank you

Name: A6728
Content:
I was able to order only one shirt which was a nice selling feature The other positive was that the shirt was completed and shipped to me within 5 days Very fast service However  there were a few issues 

First  after ordering  I realized I made a small error on what was to be printed As soon as I realized within 4 hours of purchase I sent them an email and tried calling the contact number to simply add an  I tried re calling the number for the next few days and was re routed to some marketing agency and no one answered back My email was left unanswered as well There seems to be no way to reach this company 

The second issue I had is with the overall quality of the shirt I ordered a large  yet the sizing seems to be way bigger than normal The shirt is a little shorter than a normal large but waaay wider It gives the person a nice skinny fat look  which should not be a look anyone is trying to achieve 

Honestly  I can overlook the poor customer service if the quality of material was good I made the initial mistake and ultimately thats on me However  I would not recommend the shirt in terms of quality either Overall  a bit disappointing

Name: A6729
Content:
Website was easy to use  with minimal knowledge of what to do The choices were abundant and very well priced I loved that I didnt have to order a minimum of shirts  just the one I wanted 
Delivery was on time  actually a couple days ahead of the estimated delivery date It was well packaged The product was exactly as I requested  and the sizing was bang on I would recommend T Shirt Elephant to anyone  and will definitely be ordering again

Name: A6730
Content: Designed and ordered 1 custom shirt as a secret santa gift Web site design program was pretty easy to use Price jumped pretty quick from original shirt price when adding designs and did not change when I removed some print  but hey its custom so you pay for that Placed the order and all was good I got an order email that had pictures of my shirt design Problem was email only showed the front of the shirt I emailed customer service about this to make sure they had my back of shirt design as it was not in email They got back to me within 1 day and assured me everything was good The shipping cost seems high to me  especially if you want rush shipping 14 business days time frame that they guarantee for delivery My shirt showed up after 9 business days so I was quite happy about that When I opened up shirt to check it out I was very happy It turned out better then I thought it would The gift went over as a bit hit Overall good experience using T shirt elephant Service and speed was great Cost was a little high  especially the shipping I M O Thank you

Name: A6731
Content: I was thrilled with the custom T shirts I ordered The colours were vibrant and the design was professional The shirt material was also of excellent quality I highly recommend T shirt elephant

Name: A6732
Content: I had a really great experience with them It took a bit longer than anticipated but this is likely because I order during the Canada Post rotating strike The quality of the print is great and our students loved it The shirt is thick and feels like great quality We pre washed them all and they look great Will definitely be ordering from them soon

Name: A6733
Content: Shipping can take some time but IT IS WORTH IT  Great quality and alignment I think it is a fair a totally fair shipping for the the product you get

Name: A6734
Content: So very pleased with the quick and efficient service I received Very good quality shirts and they were a hit at our Volunteer Appreciation Night

Name: A6735
Content:
Their design web app is pretty easy to use and fairly detailed enough to make specific requests on the design and colour So thumbs up for that 

However  came the time when I wanted to place an order  their website went down
Nothing would load  so that wasnt pleasant at all 

I did email them about it and they were quite responsive It was fixed the next day and placed my order with no issues 

T shirts shipped within less than 2 weeks  so that was great The quality of the shirts were great  I ordered 150 of the Gildan Performance Tees  the colour i chose athletic gold was more like a yellow rather than a gold Time will tell if they wash out over time 

One thing though is that their prices are competitive along with great customer service  so that already won me over other companies 

Overall  I had a good experience with them

Name: A6736
Content:
Just received my third order from T Shirt Elephant The t shirts look great and the order arrived early  which was perfect as the projected delivery date was a little too close to the day I needed them for my comfort 

I will definitely order from this company again Very satisfied

Name: A6737
Content: Poor customer service I ordered my package long long ago still havent received it The customer support will not help me further with my issues says its not their responsibility once Canada post picks it up I needed my jackets I ordered for a event They never showed up I was not offered any sort of refund or discount for my time and trouble I payed for a product to be delivered within a time frame it did not arrive The manager then told the customer support   What I have relayed to you is the guidelines that have been provided to me by my manager We have considered this matter closed and we will not be engaging further   DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY You can find more reviews about this company on other review sites

Name: A6738
Content: DO NOT ORDER SHIRTS FROM HERE It is a scam company  they will take your money but the shirts will never arrive They likely paid for the positive reviews on here

Name: A6739
Content: Very satisfied with T Shirt Elephant It was my first time using their services  and I would order from them again I ordered a collection of personalized jackets for a high school volleyball team and they look great I had some issues with choosing sizes during my order online  but they were very helpful in their support to correct the order I was also unsure about the estimated delivery date  as I am on the west coast To my surprise  I actually received them a few days early

Name: A6740
Content: It was easy to design my own shirt  I put in an order with multiple colours  and I received 25+ shirts in about a week Quality of the shirts was exactly as expected and the design came out perfectly They also responded quickly and kindly to all of my questions Would definitely recommend

Name: A6741
Content: I have had exceptional customer service from T Shirt Elephant Every question was answered quickly and efficiently and I loved the final product so much that I ordered more of the same for a different event I would highly recommend them

Name: A6742
Content: I wanted to order from a Canadian company Although quick  in the remarks for the design I asked for writing on the back and the background removed on the picture I submitted I received confirmation with those notes Then my sweatshirt came with neither done When I emailed customer service I was offered 10 off my next order I said this doesnt help what I paid for this order She said you have to read the fine print Some shirts cant be done But you werent billed for writing on the back So now I have a shirt that cost good money that isnt what I wanted Lesson learned read everything on their site before ordering I guess custom remarks dont matter Will never order from them again

Name: A6743
Content: Purchased custom hoodies for my family as Christmas gifts and they turned out better than I could have imagined Quality of the hoodies and the printed designs are perfect Would love to create more designs to purchase in the future

Name: A6744
Content:
Placed my order on may 5th is is may 27th I did not get a confirmation email I had no luck in getting in contact with someone who actually works here 
Who knows if Ill ever get the products I spent  300 00 I am not a happy customer by any means

Name: A6745
Content: I was very satisfied with the quality of the jerseys I ordered The sizing was good and the logos and numbers looked great Two of the jerseys in my order were delivered without the logo  but with one quick email they sent me two new jerseys with the logo to replace the two without  free of charge The only negative thing I could say about this order was the delivery time was a week longer than it had stated it would be when I placed the order

Name: A6746
Content:
I placed my second order with T shirt Elephant just recently and I ordered about 20 tank tops The material and quality of the tank that I ordered was really nice However when I ordered online  I expanded my logo for my business very large on the front of the tanks and received the shirts with the print extremely small and hardly noticeable The first time I ordered  I had placed an order for a bunch of Gildan Sweaters with the logo and they turned out great The printed logo was a nice screen print exactly what I wanted and they were done very well I would order the sweaters again for sure but I was not happy at all with the turnout of the tanks unfortunately The print on the tanks looked like it had been sprayed on and some logos were very clear  others were fading already and not all the same colour 

The shipping I thought took extremely long I ordered the tanks the last week of June and didnt receive my order until really late July beginning of August 

I had spent a lot of money for the tanks and was so excited to receive them as I sell them at my facility Since my last experience  I am a little bit scared to place another order

Name: A6747
Content:
Terrible print quality Avoid at all costs

A proof was never received when ordering and there was no quality control in processing the order The sweaters received were completed in such a poor manner I cannot have my employees in outfit this atrocious

I contacted their support team  who did nothing to rectify their poor quality I want a refund for my product or better quality prints of the same design and quantity 

One star is being generous If there were negative stars this business would take the cake

Name: A6748
Content: Not only are the shirts we ordered fantastic the team at T Shirt Elephant went out of their way to make sure that our shirts arrived in time for our fundraising event Thank you so much team

Name: A6749
Content: I placed an order for about 25 T shirts for a school dance club and I was extremely satisfied with my order The price was very reasonable had compared to several other sites and the shipping was super fast It was expected to be 15 days but I got it a week from my order date I would highly recommend to Canadian customers since you dont need to deal with extra customs/duties charges and longer shipping times I was also happy to see they accept Visa Debit My only critic of my t shirt quality is some loose threads found on a total of 3 shirts in my large order Overall I am very happy and will definitely be ordering from T Shirt Elephant again

Name: A6750
Content: I am pleased with the service and the product I received from T Shirt Elephant Everything came as ordered and the quality of the material is very good I had to call customer service when the shirts did not arrive on the day expected but I received excellent service and an acceptable explanation They were so busy with orders that production got a little behind Understandable when you provide this type of product I was assured of a delivery date before we needed the shirts and they arrived as promised I especially liked the fact that you could order different designs and any color in one order without a minimum number or an extra charge Free shipping is great too Thanks T Shirt Elephant for making our family celebration a little more special

Name: A6751
Content:
I ordered 2 sweaters and received them with defects  completely unusable Unfortunately  the customer service team was not knowledgeable enough to resolve my issue and refused to provide a refund/re print Instead  they asked the customer me to order another set of sweaters at a price 

I understand that process of printing may issues here and there  my critical review mainly stems from their lack of management in their customer service Customer service is incentivized on blaming customers to brush off any issues rather than actually resolving the issues 

As a business owner  my review is in not doing business with TShirt Elephant due to their lack of technical and customer service management 

Regards

Name: A6752
Content: I ordered 100 t shirts for the first time from T shirt Elephant for a local surf event The website was super easy to use  the t shirts came in two weeks and looked AMAZING We are all so happy with them  we will definitely be ordering again The only downside was the price After the fact I was able to find a much cheaper price but I am still very happy with our order

Name: A6753
Content: The graphics turned out very well Wish they would have an option for longer sizes The t shirts were given to some taller people and looked too short on them Many athletes are taller now so offering taller sizes would allow us to use them for future t shirt designs

Name: A6754
Content:
First it was the only company I found that would let me order just 1 shirt 
Second  easy to design and create the shirt I wanted
Third  quality screen print not the sticker style from out of country companies 
Fourth  made and shipped to my door within 2 weeks a week earlier than quoted ;
Issue  my mistake was not reading the material and thinking I ordered a cotton or cotton blend it was polyester  Nothing to do with the company  but not what I thought I ordered 
Over all I would use them again  but read the fine print on what shirts are what material

Name: A6755
Content: The T shirt arrived quickly and as designed so that was good but immediately I felt there was something wrong with the fabric I ordered a 100 cotton T shirt and the one I received is 50 polyester Thats a HUGE mistake/discrepancy and now my husband is leaving in one week for Germany with this family gift  we plan to all sign it for his very terminally ill brother and the quality and comfort of the fabric are important Im not happy about it at all

Name: A6756
Content: The t shirt was very good quality including the image and text It has been washed many times and is still in perfect condition Shipping was also super quick It came before the estimated time of arrival Awesome experience with this company

Name: A6757
Content: The purpose of my review is to let others know about how disappointed I am with the service that I received with their customer service I had ordered sweatshirts with logo for my staff I received the sweatshirts without the logo print When I emailed about my surprise  the response I received was  you should have known that there was no logo print because of the price  with this response Wheres the compassion and understanding there  let alone acknowledging the customer? What kind of core value does this business has? I also realized that the sweatshirts were oversized once which was my mistake that I did not pay attention to the sizing So I asked them if I can return the 6 garments and would purchase a more expensive brand of sweatshirts that fits better for my staff with the logo Apparently I cannot do that The only concern of this company is money and not the happiness of their customers I went to 4imprint ca and was so surprised to see their core value right at their home page which is to make sure their customers are happy with the products But t Shirt Elephant does not care if their customers are not satisfied with the products

Name: A6758
Content: Amazing sweaters I had 2 done for direct support professional and everyone at my job is very excited to order I will be getting shirts done next You guys are amazing Its worth the price its better if you are buying more then 2 but I am happy

Name: A6759
Content:
I have had a very positive experience with T Shirt Elephant They are one of the few Canadian print on demand companies and have been excellent to work with I mostly interact with Rachel who is phenomenal She always responds to me in a timely manner and addresses my questions/concerns I highly recommend this company

Edit I had a great experience with t shirt elephant at the very beginning but customer service and quality control have significantly decreased in the last month or so I received several garments that were printed incorrectly In fact  just yesterday I received a garment that was printed incorrectly for the THIRD time which is mind blowing All my orders were delivered past the estimated delivery date as well

Name: A6760
Content: I ordered aprons and ball caps for an event The ordering process was straightforward including adding and positioning the logo Communication of confirmation and shipping was very good When the order arrived I was very happy with the quality of all of the items I will definitely order again Very good value and service

Name: A6761
Content:
I ordered a sweatshirt and hat I contacted agents over chat to confirm that my order would be fine and shipped out I actually spoke to two seperate chat agents to confirm that my designs were good to go which they conveniently cannot find in their system apparently  I received an email multiple days after my order was placed to tell me the hat could not be made When I asked to cancel my order  which was a suggestion offered by the agent  they told me my sweatshirt had already shipped a while ago and was being delivered I have never received a tracking number or anything to this regard 
The agent told me that I could not cancel my order which is ridiculous I did not agree to pay for half of an order Or pay to ship a single item 
They told me if I shipped it back it would be at my own expense  and NOW the item says delivered but its not here 
This is by far one of the worst experiences I have had with a customer service team

Name: A6762
Content: Waiting on an order for my group that has been in the works for months We were in communication for a while but after we sent the payment and we received no response from the company After four emails from me and at least three from my business partner  we have yet to get a response Down about  1500 now

Name: A6763
Content: I already ordered several items from T Shirt Elephant and I am very pleased with all my orders The quality is amazing  design is unique and creative They also have a great customer service On top of it I am happy to support local businesses

Name: A6764
Content: Turnaround was quicker than what they quoted Silk screening looks great Unit price was affordable with a larger order Cotton was soft Stitching looks great Two complaints Shirts have a slight vinegar scent  which my customers noticed Going to have to wash the order Second complaint is the tags are curled up and kind of scratchy

Name: A6765
Content: Theres two HUGE elephants in the room with T Shirt Elephant their glitched online ordering system and their customer service I ordered a custom t shirt for Fathers Day to say apostrophe in  Worlds was not showing up in the preview box rather  there was a large space between the last two letters  so I kindly emailed customer service to ensure it would be printed properly They assured me they would add a note to the work order  so they clearly acknowledged the preview glitch Unfortunately  I received the shirt and they did NOT include the apostrophe  so it read the exact error I was trying to avoid I emailed customer service to inquire about reprinting  they responded with the following  We cannot guarantee that order notes will be followed after the order is placed All I had confirmed was that the note was added As we printed this to order  we cannot issue a reprint or a refund I then requested to escalate the situation  and was met with the same  repeat response from the same customer service representative Im beyond disappointed  and will be contacting my credit card company to dispute the charge if they continue to deny my requests to speak to someone who could actually help Their customer service deserves 0 stars Get your custom T shirts literally anywhere else

Name: A6766
Content: Excellent customer service Very happy with the print quality and shipping times I did run into an issue with the sizing on the t shirt I ordered not matching the size chart and not fitting  but when I got in touch with customer service  they reprinted the design on another brand and shipped it back out to me for free Happy customer here

Name: A6767
Content:
There were a few things that had gone wrong with my order The guaranteed on time was missed but I was willing to overlook that due to the holidays in order to get a good product into my teams hands Once I received the product I noticed the toques were very small and the color was slightly faded These toques would be good for youth or toddlers but not adults They definitely do not fit adult men and most women I ordered enough toques for two teams and we found that they didnt fit 98 of our employees 

After a bit of back and forth with t shirt elephant they did make this right for us We got a new order of toques in pretty quickly and they fit the team very well I appreciate a company who will follow through to ensure the customer is satisfied with the end product 

Danielle

Name: A6768
Content: I have not even received order yet but the customer service was so awful that I feel compelled to warn others They need to drop whoever is doing their user support They are obviously losing a lot of business due to this This was my first order and I emailed in for an update on shipping only to be told that once the order leaves their facility  it is on me to contact shippers The emails just got nastier and ruder from there Literally all they had to do was assure me that it was on the way I have rarely ever crapped on a user support rep because their jobs are hard but this one really rubbed me the wrong way Just a complete and total lack of any business sense or decorum My first order will be my last now  thanks 100 to Chelsea

Name: A6769
Content:
