The website claims that all orders are professionally reviewed  and that customer satisfaction is guaranteed However  the text on one of my shirts fell outside of the printing border  and I didnt notice There was no warning on the website  and obviously no professional reviewed it Also  the printing notes I included were ignored I emailed the company saying I was not satisfied  and they will not reprint my shirt I will not be using this company for future orders 

They also would not tell me how they honour their policy of  customer satisfaction guaranteed or the  fact that the designs are all professionally reviewed Instead  I was told that my ticket is now closed

Name: A6770
Content: Absolutely fantastic work and quality Ive ordered a few funny shirts online over the past few years and most are pretty disappointing with thin fabric and cheap vinyl transfers Not the case here Heavy fabric that so far is proving durable  and the image printed into the fabric Only 4 washes so far but still looks new I will definitely be a repeat customer

Name: A6771
Content: Ordered 9 jerseys for my basketball team with t shirt elephant for the first time and the overall experience was great Website was easy to use  had plenty of variety  logo was easy to upload  quotes for the total amount was fast and accurate The shipment came in earlier than expected There were a few very minor issues with a few jerseys but customer service got back to my problem super fast and I was very satisfied with how it was handled Would recommend this place

Name: A6772
Content: Wow  simply amazing Great quality T shirts  beautiful bold prints I love em all Above all my shipment arrived way ahead of the estimated schedule time line Just fantastic Great Job My New Elephant Friends  I will highly recommend your service to love ones Thanks so much

Name: A6773
Content: My expectations were met I was happy with the purchase It was on the pricy side for one t shirt when it was all said and done  but ordering 1 custom t shirt comes at a price wherever I looked I received the item on time  and the quality was what I expected The basic t shirt I ordered does fit on the small side  so keep that in mind when ordering Over all I was satisfied with the purchase

Name: A6774
Content: Customer service was not very helpful I had wanted a custom logo on a hat and reached out to them because I was concerned about sizing and whether it would look the same as the online designer Despite assurances  the logo was huge Basically threw a couple hundred bucks away because the hats are garbage To their credit  they know how to redirect blame like pros

Name: A6775
Content: Ordered baseball shirts  expecting to get standard cotton t shirts coloured sleeves/white front and back  Instead I received some cheap polyester shirt that feels like a thicker version of slip material I acknowledge that I should have read the fine print on the fabric when I bought them but it didnt even occur to me that anyone would even make a nylon baseball shirt this isnt a league jersey  It arrived quickly  so that was a good thing However both shirts in the order had a very distinct smell and had to be laundered before we could wear them

Name: A6776
Content: I made an order for 12 shirts for our family for Christmas and all of them arrived in 2 weeks Theyre perfect They even made the artwork look better than what I sent them  cant wait to order more

Name: A6777
Content: The quality of T Shirt Elephants products are reasonable  though not incredible I had issues with shipping it took forever and they sent my shipment in 2 batches  I feel that their price is high for what they do They also were very unaccommodating with helping me with samples Their website is great to see your designs on the product and position them etc Pity about the remainder

Name: A6778
Content:
READ B4 PURCHASE  BEWARE 

My team submitted an order and had an extremely poor experience Their website states that they have senior graphic designers on standby to double check orders My take away from the experience was bad service  hardly any communication/support  and even less of a care for the customer 

1 There were parts of the designs that they double stitched and other parts with a single stitch causing an incongruent image with various parts that were left unrecognizable compared to the original design SOLUTION  Work with your customer 
2 Each item was of different quality Some were better stitched than others SOLUTION  Work with your customer and be transparent 
3 They provided no tracking number and no real notification other than when the order was placed I had to reach out to them to get an update on my order SOLUTION  Work with your customer and/or provide the tracking number 
4 I reached out with a very fair email seeing what can be done No more was offered other than we did our due diligence and cant be held responsible for the design  heres 10 off Im asking for customer service  not an excuse to close off my inquiry SOLUTION  Work with your customer 

For less than 20 items  it took 2 and a half weeks to ship to me  no option to pick up I live 5 minutes away from their location Thought itd be great to have a supplier next door Absolutely not  do yourself a favour and continue to support companies who emphasize the customer experience 

Sorry for the lack of pictures  I am not posting a design that I am not happy with

Name: A6779
Content: Our hats came on time and in the correct quantity Shipping was fast and the quality is also very good The only criticism is the design is a little smaller than we thought when designing it  but it is understandable that it will not be the exact same as the digital mock up Overall our team is super happy with the custom hats We are warm and looking fly

Name: A6780
Content:
Had a horrible customer service for my order 
Obvious print quality inconsistencies through out the batch and very cheap looking dtg printing Had notes sent before printing to make sure i get good printed shirts  but came to me with some looking worse than others 

When i contacted requesting some sort of help for the issue  they said my order quality issue was not significant enough for them to do reprints Very disappointing to receive half of the order looking faded  and now i have to deal with their poor prints

Not worth my money and time trying to support this company

Name: A6781
Content: Ive had 4 different sweaters made and all of them have been amazing Easy to use site  quick free shipping and great quality products T shirt Elephant is my go to for custom orders

Name: A6782
Content: I ordered three shirts with separate designs The turned out great and were received days ahead of the expected delivery date Their support chat service was extremely helpful as I was developing my order Will definitely use T Shirt Elephant again

Name: A6783
Content:
They had sent me one of the shirts I ordered in the wrong size and once I spoke to them about it they fixed it right away We were on a very tight schedule since I needed the shirt three days from when they had arrived at my door  but they reprinted one right away and I received an email from a customer service rep saying that they had hand delivered the shirt for processing and it would arrive at my house the very next day 
Amazing customer service  great quality shirts  and I can definitely say Im impressed and would like to order from them again if I needed to Great work and thank you for being so awesome

Name: A6784
Content:
Over the years  weve ordered products from Tshirt Elephant  and had great experiences with the longevity and durability of the prints Ive always been quite happy with the large selection of clotting However  this year Ive ordered a few items  and while most have been ok  the most recent purchase failed expectations The lightweight hoodie has been washed twice using the recommended wash temp and always inside out to reduce wash wear and in just one month the screen print has begun peeling off small pieces in certain areas While I do expect standard wear fading  cracking of screen product  I do not expect it in one month  and certainly not peeling I ordered one shirt earlier in the year  and have not had any of the same issue with that one  so I will chalk the new problematic one to a random bad batch Even though I emailed the company about the issue  their claim is that it was not a significant enough issue  and is standard wear  and no replacement or refund would be issued unless it was a more significant wear issue 
Based on the previous products I would absolutely recommend T Shirt Elephant  for quality and service  but based solely on my most recent purchase and issue  I will not recommend  and will be looking locally next time for my future orders

Name: A6785
Content: Just bought ~ 800 worth of sweatshirts Name placement was horrible  instead of on a sleeve  it was on the bottom of the back in huge letters Names and roles were printed on one line instead of 2 like in the preview Also  some sweatshirts backs were missing Shipping was delayed and customer support is trash The date they give is the date they ship  not the date you receive I was asked to write this review by an email from the horrible company DEFINITELY would NOT recommend

Name: A6786
Content:
I had the worst customer service from Chelsea R I ordered a 17 sweaters that was 70/30 and 20oz and instead I received 17 sweaters that were 50/50 with an extremely lighter weight Their policy says if the sweater is out of stock then they have the right to substitute it with a sweater thats of equal or higher quality which what I received was not the value of the sweaters were different as well The one I ordered was around  18 and the sweaters that I received were around  12 

I would ask specific questions like Can I have the link to the product I received and that would be ignored I also brought up the specifications of the sweaters and that was ignored I also asked if I could speak to someone of higher authority and that was also ignored 

I used to order sweaters for Ryerson University student groups through T shirt Elephant and I will not be anymore Overall my experience was horrible

Name: A6787
Content:
Placed my order on April 9th Its now May 21st and  even after contacting customer service  I STILL havent received my order Hopefully  when it does finally arrive  there are no quality issues That would just be the icing on the cake 

Update on June 13 Received my order the first week of June Today  I got a canned response  from the company  about how shipping delays are out of their control However  when I initially contacted customer service  in May  it had been a month since I placed my initial order They hadnt even printed my items yet Hmmmm  do they blame that on Canada Post too?
In terms of printing quality  its so so Out of the 4 items ordered  2 have excellent printing Unfortunately  2 of the prints are of poor quality red colour is faded with streaks running through it

Name: A6788
Content: Great quality printing and shirts including an eco friendly cotton  Easy to use website where I could create my design myself Very good price  with a helpful low minimum order Friendly interactions with staff when I had a question about shipping

Name: A6789
Content: I dont have any negative words to say Ive ordered two customized shirts  both with very high quality images Ive also ordered several plain shirts  all of which have been shipped promptly Im very impressed with T Shirt Elephant Customer Service also never failed to get back to me when I had questions I highly recommend this company and I for one will continue buying from them

Name: A6790
Content: We ordered  900 in company hats  on April 20  2021 Not only have we not received any product  they have not answered emails or phone inquiries for over a month We would like either a refund or the product but at this point any kind of response to our attempts at communication would be a start

Name: A6791
Content: I custom designed an printed jerseys for a slow pitch team The design studio felt intuitive and in no time I designed a jersey that looked so good that I couldnt fathom ordering anything else I called in a few times  and the staff were fantastic Each time they were able to help and guide the process  and went above and beyond Shipping was quick Shirts are very high quality  and the printing turned out great

Name: A6792
Content: I received my first order yesterday and was very impressed by the quality of the t shirts Expected shipment date was two weeks but was shipped and delivered within one Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for quality custom apparel

Name: A6793
Content:
New customers  beware of the misleading shipping/delivery times and return/cancellation policy on T Shirt Elephants website Ive now lost  80 on a product I can no longer use If this happens to you  based on my experience  customer service will not care I also got the impression that they will likely not clarify these items for future customers as Im sure the deception gets them additional sales like myself 

On the shipping/delivery times  I see multiple reviews here saying that the delivery time on the website is misleading  yet the business has done nothing to fix it I unfortunately didnt see these reviews before I purchased and it caused me to order a product that I expected for 2 week delivery it even says 14 day delivery in my order confirmation  but after reaching out directly to the business I found that the product will only be printed in 14 days  then it will deliver eventually thereafter 

On the return policy  despite the return policy explicitly stating they will consider cancellations due to order error on a case by case basis  they will not Even if their misleading advertising was the cause of said order error Once I pointed this out to the customer service rep I was corresponding with Chelsea  she said that actually this statement only applies to errors in design imagery Why is that not explicitly mentioned on the website?

Overall  wouldnt recommend purchasing from them This business doesnt care about its customers and is willing to intentionally deceive them for extra business

Name: A6794
Content: I ordered 4 custom jerseys from them for  71 each and they shipped us a different jersey from what we ordered When I called them they said they have a policy that states they can ship you the next closest item without contacting you if they couldnt get what you wanted I had to fight them for a refund and in the end only got 50 back You shouldnt have to call a company to confirm if they have a product that they say they have on the website

Name: A6795
Content:
Funny experience  ordered 4 shirts they shipped two Took 4 weeks to complete half the order they rushed the completion to get me the other two shirts to cover their mistake A few weeks later ordered from spreadshirt They completed a 55 T shirt order and they were delivered in ten days with zero rush fees Will I order from t shirt elephant again? No  there are far better companies to order from 
I was satisfied with my order however Hence the 3 stars  but comparatively sub par

Name: A6796
Content:
1 paid  177 express shipping items never came  no one notified me either  they refunded me the shipping costs after i called 
2 took 2 days for them to tell me that they had 9/10 jerseys one was a not for the sport i needed
3 went from Scarborough to the west to physically pick up 9 jerseys took 30 mins to find my jerseys when i got there 
4 they placed the order for the missing jersey the same day i went to pick up the 9  i later had to come back to the west end location to pick up a single jersey 3 weeks after i was supposed to get my entire order 

Nothing wrong with the jerseys or the people that are working there but they offer 0 compensation for the headaches  not even a credit for future orders  i had to email and call to get answers I would have appreciated something other then a sorry sir through email

Name: A6797
Content:
T shirts arrived one day later than tracking originally stated  however it was still earlier than expected  before 14 days 

They are great Sizing looks good Colour and printed artwork is great 

Will definitely place another order in near future

Name: A6798
Content: Great products Some items were twice as much as my usual supplier though  American Apparel Tank Tops Would love to be able to see where the price breaks are before designing and asking for a quote Love that mixing colors is an option So easy to upload the design Quick turnaround times too Request for the review was poorly times  as the items were not scheduled for delivery for another week  but over all I would absolutely use them again  and I have already recommend T Shirt Elephant to a few people Planning our summer order now

Name: A6799
Content: I ordered some company logo shirts During the order process I was emailed saying stock of my selected shirt was not available and they would offer a rotation of a similar product I agreed On delivery of the product I relized the rotated shirt was not of similar quality and style If you do a basic google search you can compare the stiching and fabric weight Obviously I didnt check that closely when they offered the rotation as I took there word for it So now I am stuck with a bunch of low quality shirts They are 2 oz less on fabric count Its not even a close rotation I dont get how they can just say we reserve the right to rotate as needed I reserve the right to not except sub par quality But I am expected to pay over 500 00 for this? So disapointed I have ordered from them in the past with good results

Name: A6800
Content: I am SO pleased with the professionalism and excellent experience I had with T Shirt Elephant I run a film production company located in Regina  Saskatchewan  Canada and we just wrapped on our Feature length film Mercy As a way of thanking our crew for doing such a fine job on the film  I thought it would be nice to order them in some good quality shirts I spent several hours calling local businesses to try and find someone who would be willing to do a quality job for a reasonable rate one that fit into our budget  I was not successful I therefore spent an equal amount of time searching online and came across T Shirt Elephant I was totally amazed how EASY it was to place my order on line and all the wonderful options I had  plus the VERY affordable rate they offered as well Needless to say  I received the order within the amount of time I expected it to arrive and the shirts are very good quality  durable shirts and best of all  the logo I had them place on the front of the shirt was positioned exactly as I requested and the picture they placed on the back of the shirt with the words I required was clear and positioned just as well THANK YOU T Shirt Elephant for your excellence

Name: A6801
Content: Very satisfied with the quality and service Arrived a week early from original fulfillment date Will order more Thanks T Shirt Elephant

Name: A6802
Content: The good news their shirts are beautiful and very easy to design The bad news they charge way too much for shipping; I know its automatically calculated  but it seems ridiculous to charge me  12 50  then send it as lettermail for  2 95 Then  when I had an issue with the product  I simply asked if I could order another one but pay less shipping Instead they gave me a discount of 10  which obviously did not cover the shipping costs Im disappointed and going elsewhere for more reasonable prices and better service

Name: A6803
Content: everything was great a few loose threads but thats ok  they easy pulled out and on one of my hoodies  its dark grey and the letters are black and it looked a lot more visible on the template than in person

Name: A6804
Content:
Buyer Beware

There wasnt a zero rating  otherwise thats what TShirt Elephant would get from me 

I ordered online  uploaded my logo and had proof my order had the logo When I ordered the products they appeared blank 

I immediately contacted customer service I have in writing they were going to correct with logo and give me a price on embriodery 

Then I dont hear anything from Chelsea from customer service so I ask for an update I get no reply I email again and she tells me they are sending blank items with no logo 

This was the biggest Canadian shopping disappointment

Name: A6805
Content: Love the shirt good quality  however customer service experience was terrible No one would answer my questions or help me I had a problem with shipping Contact method wasnt the best Order the clothing sure suggested but customer service isnt the best so you can face bad problems with that

Name: A6806
Content: The size charts were WAY off  and so we sent them an email with photos proving it and they denied that that was their size chart even though it was their size chart?? So now I have custom shirts that are pretty much dresses and they wouldnt exchange or refund us at all Definitely dont recommend using this site at all Fix your size charts And fix your exchange policy

Name: A6807
Content:
I placed an order beginning of June and received my order early mid July When the order came there were multiple issues with the prints on the shirts One was poor quality printing  some had what looked like dried glue on it that doesnt come out in the wash  and another had the logo noticeably lower than it was ordered 

I reached out to them to voice my dissatisfaction and  after a number of emails back and forth  they agreed to re print the problem ones Fast forward to September and a number emails sent no replies still no t shirts I was then informed that the employee I was originally corresponding with no longer worked for them I was told that my shirts would be ordered and printed 

Enter November Still no shirts I emailed them and asked about the status It appears as though they were never added to the to print stack and still werent printed They have now been printed and shipped and are scheduled to arrive next week 

I figure 2 stars is fair as the shirts that that were printed were great  but there were far too many little issues along the way to highly recommend them I love the selection and the price  but waiting almost 6 months to get the proper shirts is too long Will likely be taking company orders elsewhere in the future 

**UPDATE** I want to be fair in my feedback so heres an update I got my reprinted shirts and they are exactly what I was hoping for when I originally ordered the shirts Great quality prints on awesome shirts All of my issues were addressed quality  and location of prints  Hopefully others will have better luck getting what they ordered the first time

Name: A6808
Content: I am very pleased with the quality of the t shirt as well as the design I am still waiting on my second shirt from my order as something got missed with my order However I was very happy with how easy it was to get the situation fixed and how quickly they responded back from my email They were able to give me a couple options on how they could help to make it right Things sometimes happen but I truly believe that it makes the world of difference on how you get treated or the follow through from company It will either make or break whether I would order again or not I will for sure order from them again in the future

Name: A6809
Content: I ordered jerseys for one of my teams 31 people and the order came out just how I wanted In my experience the costumer service was very helpful and would respond to my questions in less than 24 hours The delivery came on time with all jerseys accounted for I would defiantly order from this company again the next time I needed custom t shirts or jerseys

Name: A6810
Content: I ordered 25 t shirts from T Shirt Elephant and although I didnt receive all of the t shirts I ordered  the customer service was really great  very understanding  and promptly fixed the mistake The rest of the t shirts came 6 days 4 business days later after I had notified customer service The t shirts are good quality and Im sure Ill be ordering from them again in the future

Name: A6811
Content:
Positive 
 user friendly website
 decent quality fair prized t shirts
So so 
 delivery time as promised  but slower than others we have used
 print quality is fine  but again not at par with another company we have used Colors in particular are a bit dull  but overall nice 
Recommendations for improvements 
 It would be nice to separate/pack shirts individually or least organise them by color/size in the package 
I think T Shirt elephant needs a bit of extra touch to really shine 
Hope this review is of use

Name: A6812
Content: I ordered 22 shirts They were done  shipped  and at my door within 2 weeks All shirts were true to size and the design and print were perfect Ill be ordering again real soon

Name: A6813
Content: I purchased an order of tank tops with my business logo on it a few weeks ago When the order came in the mail  I immediately noticed that the quality was fantastic however the colours printed on the shirt were not the same as my business logo I contacted them right away and they looked into the issue and made me a completely new batch of shirts The shirts came in today and I couldnt be happier Not many businesses would go above and beyond like this for their customers Im very happy with the level of costumer service and quality of the product Thank you T Shirt Elephent

Name: A6814
Content:
My experience so far with T shirt Elephant has been great; packages arrive a few days earlier than estimated  the t shirts and other items I post my design on looked great and exact  its flexibility in how you would like to pay for your things  and the great customer service 

The only thing thats keeping it from a full 5 Stars are the spike in prices for when you put on a design onto an item  and its lack of variety of said items in its inventory 

Other than those  its a great site to work with

Name: A6815
Content:
I was asked to leave a review before receiving the product which is a little strange so I cant review the product itself yet but I can review the service so far The website states 14 day free shipping however I had to still pay 12 50 in shipping fees for some reason and have yet to receive anything It has also been almost 14 business days  I live in Montreal and not too far from where the company is located and because I had to end up paying 12 50 in shipping even though the website says otherwise  its very dissapointing to wait this long for a single shirt after paying 12 50 for shipping when it was and still is advertised as free Really hoping the shirt ends up being worth the trouble 

Update The shirt finally arrived on the 14th business day after ordering and I absolutely love it  great quality and was worth the wait however their customer service has been awful All attempts to receive an answer for my problem above have been ignored and forgotten about even though the same 14 day free shipping is still on their website Because of that  the shirt ended up costing me twice as much as it would of having ordered it from somewhere else all because I was scammed out of free shipping The lack of care and response shows me they dont value the smaller customers as much as they do bigger companies and corporations Good product  bad customer service With the shipping issue my single shirt came to over 50  and although its nicely done  that is absurd pricing and I can get the same thing done anywhere else for cheaper all because I was charged 12 50 for free shipping Make sure the stuff you advertise works and if it dosent  dont ignore your smaller customer complaints for weeks Just because Im only ordering 1 shirt now dosent mean I wont want 100 one day and based off how much Ive been shown your company cares about these kind of issues I would definitely get them done somewhere else I need to know I can trust the company should something end up going wrong youve had a month to reply and nothing so ultimately a good product but uncaring customer service I will be going somewhere else next time that advertises promotions correctly

Name: A6816
Content: Excellent service and the product quality is amazing I will definitely be printing more of my designs using T Shirt Elephant in the future

Name: A6817
Content: T Shirt Elephant does not stand behind their products They take no accountability for ensuring the posted sizing charts reflect actual sizes As a result  I received my order where sleeve length was 2 5 inches shorter than published sizing T Shirt Elephants response was that they take no accountability for garment sizes Would encourage T Shirt Elephant to reconsider their approach to customer satisfaction and ensure a more reliable supply chain

Name: A6818
Content:
Got 9 basic T shirts with 1 line of text across the chest  for around 14  each The website was a bit badly designed for this because you had to go back and forth from the design board to the cart to estimate total prices 
I chose the cheapest black T shirt for this design so it is pretty poor quality in terms of thread count thats on me  However I did expect the printed text to turn out better/more opaque Also the printed text is crooked as in slightly diagonal across the chest on one T shirt 
I received the order about 2 5  3 weeks after ordering which is pretty much the time frame they said  So if you order from here  make sure you arent on a tight deadline

Name: A6819
Content: Was very excited to receive my first order until I opened it and discovered that the sizing is all wrong I immediately emailed the company with my issue and was very impressed with how they handled the situation I look forward to receiving the new t shirts in the near future and if they fit properly  Ill be ordering more in the near future

Name: A6820
Content: This is the first time Id ever order a set of shirts and Im  very please with the quality I ordered 18 black baseball shirts with a full colour logo and names on the back Im please to say the logo on the front is not an iron one and it is very soft to wear The sizes run a bit large they are unisex but Im super please that I was able to use this Canada company as they gave me a great product  in my price range  17 a shirt  as well as amazing shipping time

Name: A6821
Content: I happened to see a blank that I thought was perfect for my etsy store Im always hesitant to purchase from some place that Ive not heard of before because Ive been scammed HOWEVER tshirt elephant had something I really wanted so I ordered it The shirts arrived in record time Customer service is super friendly and helpful and the quality is way better than anything Ive had printed before

Name: A6822
Content: I ordered a few t shirts for my new business venture I emailed them after placing my order to ask them to ensure everything was centered They were more than helpful and the shirts look great The shirts came earlier than expected and the quality is amazing I will definitely order from T Shirt Elephant again

Name: A6823
Content:
I used T Shirt Elephant to order jerseys for a softball tournament  and I couldnt have been more pleased with the experience 
I procrastinated and left placing the order to a point that T Shirt Elephants 14 day shipping guarantee would have had us receiving the jerseys on the day we left for the tournament I was super happy to have the shirts arrive a few days early
The quality of the shirts were beyond what we expected  the entire team was super happy with the jerseys we received The jerseys were comfortable and we looked good at the same time
The product we received from T Shirt Elephant was convenient  affordable  and of great quality
I have since recommended using T Shirt Elephant to others and I will definitely be using T Shirt Elephant many more times in the future

Name: A6824
Content: Really awesome web tool compared to competitors Variety of high quality shirts at reasonable cost even if it is low volume order Quick and helpful  responsive staff to settle concerns And to top it off very reasonable turnaround time to get the shirts to your door on time Will use this company again for future orders indeed

Name: A6825
Content: First time designing and ordering custom shirts and it couldnt have been easier The hardest part was figuring out what I wanted as they offer so many great design ideas My small custom order of ladies tank tops was shipped in less than a week and the shirts were perfect The whole process exceeded expectations

Name: A6826
Content:
The customer service was beyond what was expected They were amazing The t shirts were beautifully done and the cotton a very good quality They arrived very quickly 
I wanted womens v neck and they fit rather small If I had it to do again I would order a size larger because I am past the age where showing every lump is attractive

Name: A6827
Content: I ordered a custom t shirt from them on Dec 21 2019 for a gift  they say they shipped it Jan 06  as of Jan 17  still have not received it  they told me to contact Canada Post  I asked them to Print another one and I would pick it up  they told me they would not do anything for me They didnt even offer to print another one for a reduced price They said its not their problem Unbelievable  55 And embarrassment

Name: A6828
Content: I absolutely LOVE T Shirt Elephant Their professionalism  helpfulness  quick on delivery and quality of printing is exceptional We have been working with them for the past 4 years and love them dearly Wouldnt give my business to anyone else

Name: A6829
Content:
I had ordered a t shirt as part of a campaign I was provided with a delivery date for my t shirt  but when it did not arrive I reached out to Customer Service via email I was told my order was never processed due to a glitch in the system I was told that my order was re processed and would be shipped out rush and that I would be provided with tracking information 

I never received an email containing tracking information I reached out once again via email regarding my order and was told that they are unable to track my order because they entered the tracking information into their system incorrectly and could not provide me with a way to track my order 

Since my re processed order could not be found  my order was re printed and shipped once again I finally received my order 1 month after the expected delivery date and after several emails and phone calls with the company 

The t shirt that I received was also printed incorrectly The front of the shirt was the correct design  however the back of the shirt had the wrong design I chose not to reach out to T Shirt Elephant regarding the misprinted shirt since it took nearly a month of communication with their customer service to get the one I received 

I probably wont be ordering anything from them in the future

Name: A6830
Content: first order used their tshirt designer and they didnt print the backside for whatever reason i attempted to reach out but customer support blamed it on me and offered a pathetic 10 percent discount on my next order Cant say ive enjoyed my experience with them and wont be using that discount anytime soon

Name: A6831
Content: I received my uniform articles today from t shirt elephant While I was not happy with the duration of the process and shipment taking so long  I quickly forgot when I opened up the package Great quality material for my jersey polos and hoody The logo is super clear and bright Definitely ordering from them again in the near future  Highly recommend these guys

Name: A6832
Content: I have never experienced such IRRESPONSIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE We had a terrible customer service experience with this company and we will not be ordering from them again We placed a large order which they 1 delivered to the billing address instead of the shipping address  and claimed no responsibility 2 some of the merchandise had incorrect printing so cannot be used and ONCE AGAIN the company has taken 0 responsibility We were very clear that our order was the first in a series of repeat orders  and they gave us 0 responses We will place all future orders with another company that actually cares about client services  AND  we will highly dis recommend this company to our colleagues

Name: A6833
Content: Placed our first order of shirts for our gym with T shirt Elephant and we are very happy with how everything turned out Online design and ordering process was easy to go through  shirts arrived earlier than expected and the quality of the shirts we ordered and print quality turned out great We will be ordering again soon

Name: A6834
Content: I loved the quality of the shirts Customer service was fantastic My email inquiry was replied to within the hour Also  my order arrived a week before the predicted arrival date I will definitely use this company again

Name: A6835
Content: Great experience to order our shirts for our annual event We had a bit of a hiccup this year  but was handled well and look after right away Great products  and customer service with Chelsea was wonderful We will be back next year

Name: A6836
Content: I bought what I thought were premium tshirts and when I got them I was disappointed that the shirts were very rough  ichy and had a strong chemical smell I tried to wash them but they didnt get softer I was disappointed with the quality of these products  will not order again

Name: A6837
Content: Horrible service I will never use this company again My order arrived weeks after the original estimated delivery date The artwork on my order was done in the wrong colour and no one will communicate with me I have called and left several messages no one answers their phone

Name: A6838
Content: Weve ordered from this company twice now  and will be again soon We love the quality product and the fast delivery Our last order was an order of polo shirts and they are fairly small to size so Im not sure if they are going to fit our staff

Name: A6839
Content: Website was easy to use and created my custom T shirts Great that they let you buy in small amounts as not everyone wants 250 shirts Delivery was quick and shorts are good quality I would recommend them to anyone looking to make custom t shirts

Name: A6840
Content:
Early on we had great customer service as we set up our store with T Shirt Elephant Then when we had some problems they stopped responding to emails  never answered calls  etc Were still trying to figure out why we were told an order of 4 had 3 items listed in our payout  why were missing over  100 in payouts  and other annoyances that we simply dont get responses to There are some clear managment issues I Well be migrating away from this company 
 

Original review 

I work for a non profit and T Shirt Elephant has provided outstanding customer service  from the ability to choose both low cost and ethically sourced apparel items to Rachels incredible efforts to make our products look great and be available quickly Ive worked with various on demand printers and drop shippers  and I cant recommend T Shirt Elephant highly enough

Name: A6841
Content: Received our tshirt order today Exceeded my expectations to say the least  the colours and print quality are great and the shirt quality and material were higher than I anticipated for the low price we paid Delivery was more than a week earlier than order stated I would recommend and order from here again

Name: A6842
Content: Great selection of garments  excellent review process and super fast shipping We ordered 100 shirts with front  back  and side arm printing It was all done correctly and shipped on time Very happy

Name: A6843
Content:
I had a bad experience with this company I ordered 20 black t shirts with a pocket size design in the front They ship to PO Box addresses through Canada Post  so I proceeded to do that Unfortunately Canada Post went on strike Instead of letting me know  this company proceeded to ship my package with UPS UPS does not ship to PO Box addresses  I had to solve the issue and pay for the change of address 

Once I received the t shirts  the company had messed up two of the sizes We ordered an XL and XXL t shirts but the XL t shirt was larger than the XXL and the XXL was the same size as a M t shirt Also the logo on 3 t shirts were faded I contacted the company  as usual they were very quick to answer and after a few email exchanges they agreed to send us back the proper size for XL and XXL but this did not come without them putting the blame on their t shirt supplier Which is unprofessional because T shirt Elephant should be the one doing quality control and making sure that what they ship out is correct  this a service that theyre selling 

Once they agreed to ship the two t shirts  I requested that they send to a  normal address to avoid the PO Box issue and they confirmed with me that they did A week later  my package said that it had arrived but I got no package Fortunately we tracked down the package  and guess what  it was sent to the PO Box address before This was too much trouble for 20 t shirts

Name: A6844
Content: Order a custom t shirt with text and made an error in the original ordered Then I sent an email to customer service less than an hour later  within 10 minutes I sent the email No response Multiple emails and calls over the next several days no response Called the customer service line several times no one answers due to covid But several emails later still no answer Instead they sent the wrong order and the new corrected ordered  charged me for both and the new one looks 100 years old after one wash Absolutely garbage company Terrible customer service Terrible product Dont waste your money

Name: A6845
Content: Ive ordered twice from them and had a great experience both times Shirts came in a day earlier than projected Customer service was great both times too Thank you Rebecca  I recommend to anyone in Canada looking for a local T shirt company  you wont be disappointed Thanks T Shirt Elephant

Name: A6846
Content:
I have placed a few orders in the last couple months and all of them have come out great They have a great online design platform that is easy to use and you can design a shirt with no experience previous 

The shirts were made and shipped out within a couple of days  and shipping took a couple days at the most within the GTA 

They claim that you will have the shirts within 14 days  but I didnt wait any longer than a week on any occasion

Name: A6847
Content:
Anyone up for some class action? Terrible customer service

Before ordering I emailed the company and explicitly told them I would not place the order if it took 14 days In writing  they said it would only take 7 days I received my order 2 months later Well past the birthday I needed it for I made a complaint and they refused to offer any kind of refund or even a discount Then they would not let me speak to a manager and just started ignoring my emails Cant get thru by phone What a Mickey Mouse company

Name: A6848
Content: Ordered 14 t shirts for some friends and they showed up way quicker than expected Because of the price i was a little skeptical on the quality that I was going to receive but once I opened the package I was very impressed with the quality The logo on the front was done exactly how I wanted it and was not put on cheaply like some other t shirts I have received from other companies

Name: A6849
Content: I have ordered custom tshirts for my dad for Christmas two years in a row now and am always impressed and satisfied with the amazing quality I will use this service again and again

Name: A6850
Content:
Unfortunately I have to give 1 star  the printing is amazing and done exactly the way I ask and the girl in customer service was also very nice and patient with me 

The problem is the size and the quality of the sweatshirt  I order an XL mens because Im 59 and Im a fit person  but it fits a little tight I find and the arms are not long enough also after wearing it only one day I started getting fluff balls all over the sweater and underneath the arms  I really hate that  when I contacted again the customer service I told them about it and the girl said that I didnt wash it properly  its funny because I didnt wash it I wear it the same day i got it and i never wash it yet

Anyways i guess its not there fault for the clothes  maybe they should change manufacture  but the printing and the look is amazing

Name: A6851
Content: Just received my order yesterday Superb service and quick turnaround Me and my wife both love our shirts I found their service to be the most worth it for no minimum orders Definitely would use them again

Name: A6852
Content: Customer Service was excellent Prompt replies to emails and they were very helpful in editing our image Jason was wonderful to work with We ordered black t shirts and the quality and price was great Would definitely work with this company again

Name: A6853
Content:
Fast service/ turn around time  and fair prices But poor quality 
First batch did not have the correct colour/ saturation on the prints which were corrected and reshipped The new batch has a slight size variation from the size on the print but nothing to complain about 

Ive been wearing my product before the release and only after a handful of washes the print is falling apart Contacted customer support/ management but they advised that there was no issues

Name: A6854
Content: Ive ordered employee uniforms from T Shirt Elephant twice now On both occasions  the service has been seamless from start to finish Much more affordable than my previous supplier for good quality uniforms Free Shipping is an added bonus 5/5

Name: A6855
Content:
You email me and want me to write a review when the item hasnt even been delivered?
Sure  here goes 
I placed an order hoping it would arrive by Christmas T Shirt Elephant said Delivery Date of December 19 I thought hey  thats enough buffer that itll arrive by Christmas 
But they MEAN that THEY deliver it to Canada Post on that date Its now December 30 at the item wont arrive until tomorrow 
If you want to be honest with your customers  it should read Estimated Shipping Date 
Who knows  maybe eventually when the item arrives itll be worth the wait 
But seriously  how difficult is it to write Estimated Shipping Date instead?? Youll piss off fewer customers 

For Emphasis ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE

Name: A6856
Content:
One might think it reasonable to assume that the method of shipping chosen by T Shirt Elephant would have the best interests of the consumer in mind 
Based on my experience  this doesnt appear to be the case Because they chose letter mail there is no way to track shipping As a result  the package hasnt been delivered and their response is sorry  cant help you My suggestion then? Dont walk away  run away from T Shirt Elephant

Name: A6857
Content: I am very pleased with the quality of the customized apron I ordered from T Shirt Elephant I ordered it in the first week of December  but unfortunately it was not delivered in time for Christmas and arrived on December 31st It was for my son and so we were a little disappointed with the delay

Name: A6858
Content:
Poor customer relations I had a webstore setup through them to sell my t shirts to my clients online  which took countless hours to create  only to discover a few months ago that they took it down or closed it without informing me When I reached out to the support staff I received no response 

Also  there were many many print issues throughout the process which has led me to believe this is an amateur company with lack of knowledge  support and quality control Avoid

Name: A6859
Content: I would definitely recommend this company My shirts looked exactly the way I designed them I chose a style for running which was a very comfortable and light fabric I also received it sooner than the estimated shipping date which was a really nice surprise

Name: A6860
Content: Jason and team at t shirt elephant are amazing Quick  efficient and incredibly knowledgeable Jason has gone out of his way to make sure our product was delivered quickly and to the hugest standard Highly recommended

Name: A6861
Content: Ordered shirts for my baseball team  awesome jerseys Came on time with customer numbers on the back Would recommend

Name: A6862
Content:
I recently ordered nine shirts from t shirt elephant with one of my drawings printed on them and I was very pleased After having received my order and seeing the quality of the print I immediately ordered more The shipping is fast  the prices are great and the quality is good

Thanks T Shirt Elephant  I will continue order more products from you

Name: A6863
Content:
Cant say enough great things about my experience Ill keep it short GREAT price Bought 17 shirts X2 for baseball team Received proper sizes  and  s Design was perfect FAST SHIPPING communication was great When I sent an email  I had a response right away Quality is also great I will be back yearly for new team shirts  and will be adding hats  hoodies also 

Thanks guys

Name: A6864
Content: I recently ordered a custom printed hoodie Both the quality of the hoodie and the quality of the print were excellent The order arrived earlier than the estimated date they provided There was an issue with the location of the print When I wrote T Shirt Elephant about it they responded in about 2 hours After a brief and professional conversation over email they offered a suitable solution Overall it was a good experience  but be cautious if you have a critical and time sensitive order in case a reprint is required

Name: A6865
Content: Very disappointed with the service Was suppose to receive something prior to Christmas and it hasnt even been printed yet I had lots of options and would have liked to be informed of delay When I asked for a refund they said no as they had pulled the hoodie and just continues to say they were trying to keep safe I get it  but again  I should have been informed that was the case prior to completing my order

Name: A6866
Content: I used T Shirt Elephant to order custom hoodies for my volleyball team I found using their design tool fairly easy and like the pre made templates The price was reasonable and our orders came ahead of schedule The only reason I didnt give 5 stars was because when I was given the computer generated quote  I wanted to confirm the price with a person so I could be certain of cost before asking athletes to purchase  and found there to be a price discrepancy Overall though  I was pleased with the quality of service and product  and will most likely use them again

Name: A6867
Content:
As long as there are no issues T Shirt Elephant offers great services However in case you have an issue like in my case where a jersey for hockey team was incorrectly printed; you are being sent on a wild goose chase  hence the two star review Customer Service over the phone will tell you need to send an email as they cant deal with it ?you are CUSTOMER service?  These emails are getting lost apparently as miraculously two of my emails to the same address I have sent all other inquiries to didnt make it to their inbox very strange So here I am running out of time as I need the jersey reprinted until the end of the month 2 weeks out and since customer service doesnt feel responsible and emails are getting answered sparingly; I have little hopes to get this issue actually resolved Hoping T Shirt elephant improves their grade of customer service  learn something from e commerce giants like walmart or amazon 
UPDATE 
changing this to a 1 star review for several reasons 
 none of the above has been rectified  same issue with an order from October 22nd has still not been resolved 
 Im not getting any answers from customer service other than well ship it when ready or we are really busy all I want is an updated shipping date 
 meanwhile Im still getting promotional emails from t shirt elephant  trying to increase their overall order volume  WHY? they are not able to truly satisfy the customers they already have and want more volume?
Conclusion Im buying new hockey jerseys for several teams every year and will not try t shirt elephant again

Name: A6868
Content: Received received my first order The logo I had printed onto a t shirt was an odd size and the T Shirt Elephant software handled it perfectly I am very pleased with both the service and quality of the product

Name: A6869
Content: Was really impressed with how easy the software to design the shirts was Also they made an error with my order but when I contacted them about it they were quick to admit the mistake and send me a corrected order still in time for my event I was very impressed with the customer service to fix my issue

Name: A6870
Content: Totally ordering again Ordered two Gildan hoodies both with a large printed image on them AMAZING quality Fits a little small but not by much I am generally a size small in tops but I like huge fits and so i ordered an XL which seems to me like a large so I would order a size up if you are ordering true to your own size I live in Canada but after the order had shipped my package came within 3 days

Name: A6871
Content: We have ordered from T Shirt Elephant a number of times and never have a complaint The tanks and tees are always great quality and our event participants love them We also love that we can purchase any quantity and any size at a GREAT rate which is sooooo important for a small charity like us Thanks T Shirt Elephant

Name: A6872
Content: They are very slow in returning emails and they have made several errors with my orders Twice they let me down on important orders that I needed and was promised would be delivered by a certain date I let several mistakes go  but I reached my limit when my last order was missing one item and after 2 months I still havent received a refund or the missing item  even though I followed up about it several times On the plus side  I have been happy with the quality of items I have received I wont be using them again

Name: A6873
Content: Ill start by saying that T Shirt Elephant has the best customer service that I have come across in a long while Special thanks to Rebecca who promptly fixed a slight design error on my last order The quality of the t shirts as well as the finished product are excellent I definitely give this business the highest marks and would/will recommend them to anyone that needs any kind of t shirt design

Name: A6874
Content: Ordered 2 custom hoodies from the Redwood Classics line SO IMPRESSED The cut of the hoodie is awesome  really well made and great quality The print job was excellent I am really happy and will definitely be ordering again So pleased to support a Canadian business and supplier

Name: A6875
Content:
The website is really fun to work with 
There is also a huge selection of apparel 

I deduce 1 star for an error on my order  albeit a free reprint was promptly ordered when I emailed them 

The customer service was fast  courteous and easy to contact

Name: A6876
Content:
Ordered clothing for my business November 22nd  in time for their Christmas orders I was given a two week delivery time It is now one day until christmas  and the order is still in transit This means that many of my clients will not be receiving their orders they had put in  in plenty of time

Ive never left a bad review before  and hate to leave one but this is my second poor experience with T shirt elephant

Name: A6877
Content: This is my second time ordering from T shirt Elephant The first time the product was over two weeks delayed  with no contact with the company possible as they do not answer the phone at all and rarely return emails When I did get them to respond back  they had misplaced the order and only began production because I had kept emailing However  my brother had a good experience with them  so I decided to try with them again I have placed an order and am currently in the midst of once again trying to get a hold of them in regards to the submitted logo and whether the image quality is good enough for them to work with Again  no email response  phone rings until the voicemail tells you to email them Going to have to cancel the order directly through my credit card rather than deal with them

Name: A6878
Content: Great jersey quality  full colour logo print and prompt service I couldnt find any other site that was willing to print less than 12 jerseys and in full colour let alone an affordable price  Id highly recommend this company

Name: A6879
Content: WOW I had a really really tight deadline I called them to discuss the issue They said it was a non issue And they managed to ship way before I could even start thinking of maybe somehow become stressed ;  We ordered 2 jackets for roughly 300  and were worried about the print and design quality wed get after seeing results from other companies  Opening the box  we were just so amazed Best customer support and printing quality

Name: A6880
Content: This is company runs out of a big factory that produces tshirts for several other companies If you are ordering a one off  I am sure you will fine But buyer beware  you likely wont see the same quality product twice Their customer

Name: A6881
Content: I placed my order then was told that shirt was not in stock This took 3 days to let me know Then I picked another shirt and they were delivered on time except they were all adult size when I ordered youth I brought this their attention and although they fixed the situation the second batch was shipped and did not arrive for the basketball camp All they did was apologize and give me 10 off next order Weak

Name: A6882
Content: Huge waste of money and financial blow to the charity they were ordered for Ordered large order of hats for a charity to help fundraise First off  their website falsely advertises 14 day free shipping Turns out  this does not refer to their shipping at all but production time as told in an email from them AFTER it was too late to upgrade shipping time  So our order did not arrive on time for the event Beyond missing out on sales at this event  the hat quality is very mediocre Parts of the writing are completely illegible  and you can barely tell what the design is At around  20/hat  one would expect much better quality that something that looks like it was purchased off Aliexpress for  5 I contacted the company prior to ordering on 3 separate occassions to make sure the design would turn out well  and that I would change it if it was too detailed On all three occassions I was told it would turn out great Contacted T Shirt Elephant prior to writing this review  and they said they would do nothing unless threads were loose despite the hats not even being legible Save yourself the risk and order off Aliexpress or Alibaba   at least you wont be losing 5x the investment when the quality turns out mediocre

Name: A6883
Content: T Shirt Elephant helped my company with all the questions we had Sade  the customer service representative that helped me with my order  was very helpful and patient with my questions We are very pleased with the outcome with our order It was an added bonus that they were completed and delivered two weeks before the expected date given Thanks for everything T shirt Elephant Definitely ordering from you again

Name: A6884
Content:
NO STARS

Ive never had such poor and dishonest customer service My merchandise was shipped out but stolen before I could receive it Canada Post confirmed to have reimbursed TShirt Elephant for the products and shipping and after a solid 6 months of communications they have yet to reprint  reimburse or act in any way that would make their client not only happy  but actually have the products paid for in hand I do not recommend TSHIRT Elephant

Name: A6885
Content: The shirts were produced great but shipping and customer service was pretty bad I ordered 8 different products and spent a fair amount of time and money on these designs They told me I would receive the shirts by Dec 26 and I received them 2 weeks after that When I talked to them  they just told me that they had a lot of orders so couldnt get to it My opportunity to present these gifts was gone by the time I received them and I am pretty disappointed

Name: A6886
Content: Very prompt replies from the shipping department; be careful to check your junk mail as they may put a hold on your order if its a big one they will ask for a copy of your credit card and license to be sent before proceeding  They do not call you to advise you of this hold Despite this hiccup  I asked for a delivery date and my order was received well before this Product is of good quality; I received the wrong colour but the company was very fair in finding a resolution Overall  some improvements could be made but I am happy with the overall experience

Name: A6887
Content: Used T Shirt Elephant to create custom gear for our team I found them very helpful every step of the way and they delivered us a great product

Name: A6888
Content: Great customer experience The front end web based ordering system is streamlined with friendly and intuitive UI/UX Superb customer service  I had a few extra shirts to add the day after placing the order I called and a representative immediately picked up  said no problem to my request  and the extra order was immediately processed The shirts arrived nearly 2 weeks earlier than quoted and the print quality is great Both orders arrived together in the same box and there were no errors in the quantity or type All 30+ people who placed orders are very happy with the final product One minor improvement they could make would be to include easy to find sizing charts on their website  but all product codes were clearly identified so it was easy to find them externally Would definitely recommend T Shirt Elephant to anyone ordering custom printed clothing items in the extended Golden Horseshoe

Name: A6889
Content: I was extremely pleased with my order and the service from tshirt elephant Needed some themed shirts printed for our Greys Anatomy viewing nights and the group loved them Will be re ordering when Survivor starts back up

Name: A6890
Content:
This had the potential to be a 5 star review and me not reccomending promotique ca over them 
I had 2 issues with my first order 
 1 As you can see in the picture I ordered Royal blue tshirts Although they are nice shirts they are far from the royal blue pictured on the site When I emailed to tell them they sent me replacements at no cost  awesome When I got the replacements  they were the exact same There response this time was sorry they dont look like the picture on our site but thats them so  problem not solved 
 2 I ordered the missy fit ladies t shirts for ladies of my gym to workout in Being workout shirts the last thing I wanted was a heavy shirt I recieved the shirts and they feel like theyre made of burlap  the tag says heavy cotton The problem is that it doesnt say heavy cotton anywhere on the shirts page I just checked again now Their solution to this was to tell me they cant dont want to do reprints or refunds due to customer error 
At least the sweaters I ordered were nice 

To whoever reads this from T shirt elephant  I would be happy to change this to a 5 star review if you at the very least reprint the ladies tshirts on something lighter 
I have spent thousands of dollars with Promotique and will have to go back them if I cant trust your website and customer service

Name: A6891
Content: Hi there I just received my order by mail today The logo design was a bit lower than I expected I wanted it a bit closer to the neckline Also  for the sizes  I ordered a medium in maroon from the same The Authentic Company T shirt Company Ladies dry fit style with my schools name and volleyball logo a few years ago but was smaller than the one I got today Perhaps it shrinks in the wash? Anyways  next time I will have to order XS and S as well as fix the positioning of the logo

Name: A6892
Content:
Ive ordered these shirts before The ATC baseball jerseys are great quality 
I wasnt super happy with the print this time though The colours were faded and not the right tone 
It would be good if there was an extra proofing step before they are manufactured

Name: A6893
Content: Awesome company The site is so easy to use and customizable Price was also the cheapest around  no other company even came close to be honest Order arrived exactly on time Unfortunately  one jersey had light ink stains on the front  however after emailing right away  I was offered to be sent a new one ASAP Great customer service  definitely recommending to all

Name: A6894
Content: DO NOT order from this company if you expect quality customer service I placed an extremely large bulk order for apparel that was printed horribly  not to order  with particles visibly trapped underneath the vinyl When I reached out to ask for help getting it fixed  I was told they would not reprint or refund my order or help in any way What I am stuck with is completely unusable and my small business is now out thousands of dollars in the middle of a global pandemic

Name: A6895
Content:
A family member has placed an order for a few hundred bucks Ordered in mid November with estimated shipped out by Dec 4th which was supposed to be in time for Chanukah Of course they charged her Still waiting and its Dec 10th No one will answer the phone  despite the number on webpage being the way to contact them according to their website Havent responded to emails about timeline after a token initial 1st email response  now theyve gone dark  Wont respond to Facebook Wont call us apparently because they are working from home during COVID guess they are too busy to figure out how to block their number on their cell phones to call from a private number  This reeks of being shady If youre a big big order maybe theyre fine If you have a small order they take your money and forget about you until well who knows? Id like to give them the benefit of the doubt and believe that this isnt a total scam Id like to believe that  as I scramble to find an alternate Chanukah gift for my soon to be dissapointed 6 year old We chose them because they are local Big mistake Better to choose someone reputable 

I guess their other reviewers  most with conveniently one or 2 or few other Google reviews  think otherwise Shady One person wrote about buying their entire T shirt collection from them For that persons single only review Oh yeah  that sounds legit  esp for a custom printing shop I mean  who doesnt buy all their T shirts as custom prints  right?? Beware of these guys If I were you  Id consider shopping elsewhere As for my family member  well  2 more days and then were calling VISA what a headache

Name: A6896
Content: Will never use again I was told by a live chat rep that if I placed my order prior to December 5th that I would arrive in time for Christmas I went ahead and placed a single order on December 3rd and Today is December 30th and I have still received nothing An email was sent out on the 19th saying it would arrive in 2 4 business days  and Im still sitting here waiting Extremely disappointing that T shirt Elephant doesnt stay true to their promises and shocked that they have prompted me to write a review before I have even received the product

Name: A6897
Content: T Shirt elephant is amazing They sponsored our non profit event and provided complimentary t shirts to volunteers  attendees and speakers Jason was very helpful and responsive to the design we wanted The prints on the shirts were high quality and items were shipped within a few days Definitely highly recommended

Name: A6898
Content:
Do not order from this company My entire order of shirts were missing their designs After multiple attempts  customer service was sporadic on their responses  and relatively slow They claim that they are Canadas leading source for custom apparel  but based on my current experience  this doesnt seem entirely truthful 

I was eventually able to get into contact with customer service  and after shipping the original misprinted shirts back to the company  the issue was mostly resolved The corrected shirts were still not a direct match to the order

Name: A6899
Content: A thoroughly positive experience  from the design and ordering process right through to delivery The website was intuitive to use for uploading a personalized design  and there is a very good choice of good quality products Customer service responded quickly and efficiently to questions  and I was really pleased with the end product when it arrived

Name: A6900
Content:
I decided to give t shirt elephant a try for printing company logo t shirts The prices were reasonable and you can buy small quantities The two stars were given because when the pre paid order arrived  they didnt ship most of the order When I checked our account on their website  they had closed out the order indicating it was complete 
The bottom line is they didnt notice they hadnt completed my order and when I contacted them to fix it  they were extremely casual about the mistake and fixing it 
Lastly  I tried calling to get some information prior to placing the order  but the person answering the phones barely cares and sure didnt try to make it easier to do business Still waiting for the forgotten portion of the order but the shirts that did arrive are fine

Name: A6901
Content:
I have ordered several times through this site I think 6 times all together and have noticed a substantial decrease in quality in my last couple of orders My most recent order  a set of black sweaters with white and pink lettering for my rugby team was a huge disappointment The ink used to screen the lettering on is translucent so instead of white and bright pink the letters are grey and sad pink There was clearly no quality check before printing them or sending them out because you only need to glance at it to see they look like trash I was offered no assistance by T shirt elephant to remedy the situation as it is not a printing error  they dont cover poor quality I guess 
I wont order from this company again and I will be contacting my friends to retract any previous recommendations I might have made So much for supporting canadian businesses Very disappointing

Name: A6902
Content: A big thank you to TE and Rebecca in Customer Service We ordered 50 hats and 50 T Shirts The T Shirts arrive very quickly and were perfect The hats experienced a delay HOWEVER when they learned about our Customer Event  TE rallied to ensure we had the Hats before Event Great value and great Customer Service

Name: A6903
Content: T Shirt Elephant is fantastic In August  I was approaching our huge annual  charity fundraiser  and less than 2 weeks away  our original t shirt vendor fell through Jason quickly provided a quote and confirmed he would be able to have our t shirts ready within the short turnaround time colour  brand  print type everything the other vendor said they couldnt do  T Shirt Elephant quickly confirmed they could  The T shirts looked fantastic  and dealing with Jason was super easy and stress free In addition  shout outs to the wonderful  and helpful nature of their team when I arrived to pick up the t shirts  I had some car trouble Jason took time out of his work day to help me with the problem  and found a co worker who generously lent me his CAA card to call for help I sincerely appreciate this companys professional abilities to provide quality products/services to their customers  as well as their friendly  personable attitude and approach to how they treat their customers I will definitely refer other people to this great company

Name: A6904
Content: I ordered two types of shirts  one of them I was not happy with I tried to ask for information on returns on many occasions but have not heard back Now I am stuck with shirts I do not want I will not order from you again

Name: A6905
Content:
How is T Shirt Elephant still running as a business? I ordered 2 sweaters with a very simple logo It was literally just a word with a black border around the font Im not a graphic designer so when I put the logo on the hoodie in the design  I zoomed in and saw that there were white pixels outside of the black font I emailed their customer service to ask them to make sure that the white pixels be removed  as well as the space in the letter O of the logo to be empty  so that the colour of the hoodie is visible in that space I was vaguely assured that their designers will review the design before it goes into production So I agreed and thought since this is a professional business  they know what theyre doing Low and behold  after receiving the order  the logo is exactly what I didnt want The space in the O still has a background  and there are pixels around the black font The font of the logo was supposed to be white but its a grey distressed shade of white Clearly  their designers didnt review anything and just printed the logo as is in an off white font 

I emailed customer customer service with their reply about the designers checking the product before production and was told the order falls within our acceptable print guidelines and there will be no refund or reprints Even though they advised me that they would review the design to make sure my requests were fulfilled There were no emails sent to me asking if it was ok to print  or that they werent able to remove the pixels 

Lesson learned  dont have faith in a company with so many bad reviews You would think giving a company your business and money would warrant some kind of respect during a pandemic but they dont care at all DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY

Name: A6906
Content:
T Shirt Elephant used to be my go to for printing shirts and sweaters  but has since gone downhill by a landslide 

I first ordered from them a few times  printing my own designs on t shirts and hoodies I appreciated their wide selection of products and the quality of printing was quite good  even after multiple washes As others have stated  shipping times are a little misleading but it never bothered me too much at the time since I was not on a deadline and/or would order early enough that it would still get to be on time despite delays It was odd as some orders would arrive REALLY early  or quite late There wasnt much consistency in this department 

What really got to me was when I started a webstore with them  at first  things were going great as the staff took their time to explain how this would work  answered all questions  and communication was open at all times However  after partnering for some time and with some changes in their staffing  orders for clients were getting misprinted so I had to personally reorder it for them for reprints time consuming and annoying  and eventually  the person who was on their end just stopped replying emails completely I literally have been chasing them for my commissions from Aug and Sept of 2019  which are STILL NOT PAID TO ME RIDICULOUS The last email they sent me was to say that they are changing structure and how the webstores work  and that theyll update all the webstore owners which is a lie as this was said at the end of 2019 and I have still not heard from them Ultimately  closed my shop because I did not want anyone else purchasing my designs and them have more commissions being owed to me At this point  it looks like Im never going to get paid for those products with MY design and theyve just pocketed all the money

Name: A6907
Content:
I created apparel for our academic program Website wouldnt process if billing and shipping is different Customer service had asked me to send shipping address by email They sent it to the billing address anyways and told me that they cant do anything about it because there is no guarantee that the address change would happen We are a team of students who had to move a 32lbs package across Montreal 
Customized names were printed at a different location as we requested through the website and we have asked about it in previous emails We had a print on the back which is the default place for the names They didnt even bother to double check with us when they claimed that they didnt see the request through the website

Name: A6908
Content: We ordered 27 custom tank tops for a group trip from T Shirt Elephant and they turned out great There was one hiccup with 1 tank not having the nickname on the back  but they were very quick to respond and provide a new tank top free of charge and shipped in time for the trip The pricing is very good and shipping was fast to Vancouver  BC I would highly recommend using these guys and will be using them again down the road

Name: A6909
Content:
Brutal  brutal  and brutal Is the only word to describe this companies operations and the customer service they pretend to offer 

This is the first time as a business owner that I have ever considered writing a review and on that note congrats to T shirt elephant 

From the first step of trying to redeem a 20 code that was guaranteed on all future orders  on a combined order two years prior between family members to the last on receiving sweaters that fit two sizes less then what they were supposed to fit has made this painful To make matters worse it takes 3 4 days to get a response over email 

When contacted about the sweaters being to small I was presented with a Gildan measuring chart and ask to send in pictures with a tape measure I have done this twice and it clearly doesnt Match the measurements on the chart I am asking for the XXLs  only 6 of them to be replaced with the actually size sweaters and the rest of the  1200 order I will live with I am now receiving no response and will be leaving this review up until my order has been resolved 

Do your self a favour and avoid unnecessary headaches by finding a different distributor with a solid review base unlike this one 

Carson

Name: A6910
Content:
I am extremely happy with my recent order
It was processed extremely fast and the quality of the t shirt was impeccable Will definitely be ordering from you in the future

Name: A6911
Content:
My Eve Online corp ordered 18 t shirts for an event in August  front and back printing with the front in full colour  2 colour text on the back  in their lightweight budget t shirt All 18 shirts with the same print no custom names 

First off  the shirt quality is amazing I was expecting much flimsier t shirts Second  the printing looks great Everything was exactly as specified  and the shirts were at the door in like a week tbf  I live within a couple hours of the location they were coming from  but still 

Incredibly happy  and pricing for the size of the order was significantly lower than what we had been quoted from other printers I will definitely be coming back for future clothing printing needs I cant comment on customer service because we didnt have to use it

Name: A6912
Content: I made multiple orders over the past few years and spent a lot on merchandise I liked the idea of ordering from a Canadian company The quality and service used to be top notch but has been steadily declining in the past year and dont even think about opening up a webstore It takes months to get set up and if you ever want to add any new products to your store it will probably take another 6 months to a year I tried adding hoodies for the winter season back in September and they still havent been added After multiple follow ups and promises from them to add products to my webstore they have totally stopped replying to my emails I do not recommend

Name: A6913
