Content: I ordered 3 black shirts and 2 white shirts I provided the same resolution design for all the shirts only the only the designs were two different colours One for the black shirts and one for the white shirts I have to say that while the white shirts looked really good the quality of the image on the black shirts where terrible and at  30 per shirt I would expect better quality I dont think I would attempt another order and its sad because otherwise my shopping experience was good aside from the end result of the black shirts

Name: A6914
Content: Ive ordered from T Shirt Elephant a couple of times and Ive been really happy with everything I had one shirt come in that was not the same as how it looked online so theyre sending replacements with another base t shirt  nice customer service I would recommend them

Name: A6915
Content: We ordered sweats for our company and we couldnt happier The quality of the shirts and printing was exactly what we ordered The only downside is the delivery please  please consider using a courier Canada Posts online tracking is not accurate

Name: A6916
Content: We placed an order for 20 pretty detailed shirts to get shipped 3500km away and I was super happy with the level of customer service and speed they had in getting our order to us

Name: A6917
Content: I have made several orders for uniform polo shirts with graphics I have found not only are the sizes accurate  but the materials and the graphics are not only a very high standard  but they hold up very well to daily wear and washing

Name: A6918
Content:
The system to creating your our custom shirt is fast and easy I LOVE THE OPTION OF DOWN LOADING YOUR OWN ART CLIP ART WORK THE BEST IS YOU HAVE AN OPTION TO REMOVE WHITE BACK GROUND ON THE ART WORK I dont think this option is on many other custom t shirts websites Plus love the option that I can create my design and then I can use it on more then one type of item  shirt  hoodie etc  it simply switches for you so you dont have to start from the being 5 STARS ALL THE WAY I created 12 shirts for our family Christmas gathering from kids XS to adult XXL all with same design
Sandra from Canada

Name: A6919
Content: I ordered a couple T shirts and jacket with my business logo on them I was very pleased with the quality of the clothing  and the speed in which it was delivered Ive already placed another order for more products because I was so happy with my first purchase

Name: A6920
Content: T shirts were great; unfortunately as soon as I submitted by order I realized I made a mistake with my size distribution list I emailed the company immediately to try to fix it and they responded a number of days later after 2 follow up emails from my end basically saying I was SOL We do not amend orders after they are placed Would have appreciated at least a little flexibility Human error happens

Name: A6921
Content:
I am very happy with the product I had t shirts printed for a rec soccer team
great colour choice and we used a soccer print T shirt Elephant had It was perfect 
I was happy to place the order and receive them 10 days later Great quality
Highly recommend

Name: A6922
Content: T shirt elephant is  I had my worries about how the quality would be on the prints for each shirt and the sweater I ordered It looks as if I bought it out of a store Looks amazing I havent washed the shirts or sweater yet So Im worried they may shrink or the picture may come off slightly but reading others reviews  it all seems pretty good Ill definitely order again Already have custom shirts sitting in my cart that Ive created Might be going a little crazy now with the design

Name: A6923
Content:
Very poor service  my orders were
never completed because they kept on forgetting things I first emailed because I had only initially received half of my items After emailing  I eventually received another package of what I thought was the rest but was unpleasantly surprised to see they had still forgotten part of my order I emailed a second time and requested the rest of the order but it still has not come a month has passed since I ordered the items I did not receive any compensation for their order mistakes  I was just met with an offer of a 10 discount on my next purchase Unfortunately  I will no longer be doing business with them and they have lost me as a customer I was very displeased with their lack of service and organization

Name: A6924
Content:
Very pleased with my first shipment Product turned out great Only issue I had was shipping as the carrier said I would have it by a specific date after it had originally been shipped I ended up receiving the product about 14 days after original shipping date which was the intended shipping length 

Overall happy  and will be back

Name: A6925
Content: Awesome and easy to use design platform Ordered the t shirts for a bachelor party with a pretty tight deadline and I was reassured that everything would be ready in time Rebecca Mattina  the customer service rep  was amazing at ensuring that the order would be pushed along and get to us on time Her communication with us was amazing and definitely was a huge reason this review is 5 star Would order again

Name: A6926
Content: The product I received looked just like I wanted it too and was produced very nicely The article of clothing didnt look cheesy and was comfortable There was also no difficulty in the ordering/delivery process Will definitely be ordering from here again

Name: A6927
Content: Ordered items for a team party  but needed a few days earlier than the scheduled shipping date Customer Service team was able to help deliver the order earlier Much appreciated Quality items and tool to customize was easy to use Great experience

Name: A6928
Content:
Great Experience I was in a bit of a rush to get some T Shirts for a stag I was organizing and Sade from T shirt Elephant really came through for me When I ordered  the expected delivery date was three days after the event I was organizing I called up T shirt elephant and got Sade in customer service on the other end She really helped me out and got my order to me just before my event without paying the extra  200 in shipping The shirts were a hit All the sizing fit as expected and the quality was top notch After shopping around online I found T Shirt Elephant was one of the cheapest and easiest to use The design tool was also very simple anyone could use it 

One thing I might recommend in the design tool and this is really grasping at straws here is to make it so within a single text box you can have multiple colors As of right now each text box must have only one color designated to it For example if you have a three word sentence on the back of the shirt and you want to use three different colors you would have to create three text boxes and line them up manually I still managed to make it work even with this limitation it just ended up taking more time  but the shirts still came out great 

Thanks Sade and thanks to the staff of T Shirt Elephant  you guys rock I have already recommended your company to friends

Name: A6929
Content: I looked at quite a few online shirt stores before I selected Shirt Elephant Price was what drew me to order from them They have the best prices online that I could find by quite a margin Once I made my order using their fairly simple design tool my order was shipped in a day or two and arrived 4 days before their estimated date Using this company was a great experience and I would recommend to anyone

Name: A6930
Content:
Great quality  a very warm tuque The embroidery is immaculate Cant recommend highly enough 
Ill be ordering a cap in the spring for sure

Name: A6931
Content: Ive ordered three hoodies from there website Each one i designed personally  and t shirt elephant helped my designs become alive on the hoodies Excellent material as the inside is soft and comfortable Delivery is super quick as well My order came within two weeks which was way before the original eta Overall a great place to order clothing from

Name: A6932
Content: Absolutely the worst company to deal with Messed up the order and despite 7 emails no reply Shame on you I have also reported them to better business beureau and will be contacting police against these fraudsters

Name: A6933
Content: I think the jerseys are pretty decent quality but had a little bit of troubles with the customer service There was a mistake on my order that the system did not recognize the number 0 for one of the jerseys  so the jersey showed up as having no number I had emailed them about this  and after a few days I got a response from one of the girls saying she would look into this and get back to me Anyways  never got a response and when I received the jerseys the issue wasnt addressed at all Would have just been nice to know rather than find out on the spot when I already had the jerseys Also I had put as a note on my order a concern and I never got a response about any of those concerns Overall  shipping and sizing of jerseys were good but customer service could have used a little more work

Name: A6934
Content:
I didnt feel like a valued customer at all  it took them 52 days to ship my order And I got no reason as to why it took that long All in all  I wouldnt recommend t shirt elephant for your companys merch
They do decent customer service But theres always room for improvement

Name: A6935
Content:
I like the lay out of the website  it is stream lined and easy to use I was having issues in chrome browser so had to use firefox 

I picked out a more expensive shirt  it was soft and fit to size  unfortunately the seam started unraveling after first day of wear In the end it was a waste of money so that really made me sad that the quality wasnt there even when I invested money into it That may not be the companys fault and was more the brands fault but perhaps the quality control just isnt there

Name: A6936
Content: Placed an order for T Shirts  only to pick them up and see that the designs were cropped from my original uploaded PDF and one of the designs were flipped backwards I was surprised because the design studio had the right design  but the checkout picture had a slightly cropped version of that If youre ordering from here be wary that the design studio may crop your design After a rally of emails with Rebecca  she was nice enough to give me a 20 off the next order and correct the flipped jersey to the correct design Hence the 2 stars  but I still needed to reorder all the other shirts because I desperately needed the shirts I am disappointed and poor

Name: A6937
Content:
The quality of the first order was great  but graphic
placement was a bit sloppy I placed a second order including instructions and the delivery was perfect Customer service is robotic  with templated replies  but they are efficient and that made me happy too Definitely will use again

Name: A6938
Content: Excellent quality of fabric in the tee shirts I ordered There was some shrinkage in some of them but I wash I Warm water and use a dryer No pilling and they hold their shape No issues with ordering on line and receiving my order I havent found better quality or price anywhere else

Name: A6939
Content: TShirt Elephant was quick to respond to my order request and was quick to produce and deliver my order Jason was great to work with I will definitely order from them again

Name: A6940
Content: im so happy with my sweatshirt it was a bit of a one off thing and i wasnt sure what to expect but it came quickly and exactly the way i designed it i only read the reviews after and was a bit skeptical but i couldnt suggest ordering from here anymore

Name: A6941
Content:
Customer service was good to deal with Helped out with my needs right away Shirts themselves we also good Prints turned out really well 

Had a small issue with the color of the prints and they were accommodating

Name: A6942
Content:
Dont bother using them if youre buying a few shirts 

The order manager has no sense of customer service to try and move up your order with sufficient lead time They are always over whelmed with orders or busier than usual whether you follow up one day  one week or one month after Expected arrival within 14 business days and its been over a month and missed gifting this item on time 

Im still waiting for my order  and am seriously wondering if they even shipped it via Canada Post 

Take your business elsewhere and avoid the headache

Name: A6943
Content:
One of my hoodies came without a logo  but customer service was quick to respond and refund me for the missed logo So  overall  my experience with T Shirt Elephant was positive 

Im not sure I find the actual quality of the hoodies to be worthwhile  though Personally  I thought I paid plenty for the hoodie + print  but the quality of the hoodie I got here is probably one of the worst hoodies I own Its already getting fluff  even though Ive only worn it a couple times And the cuffs are too scratchy to wear without a long sleeve underneath 

While Im very appreciative of receiving quality service  receiving quality products seems a bit more than my price point

Name: A6944
Content: Great fit Very pleased with the material Will buy again

Name: A6945
Content: I got a custom logo put on a youth fleece sweatshirt for my son Its nice but the size small youth fits like an extra small so I recommend going one size up Also it was  60  so I expected the quality to be a lot nicer

Name: A6946
Content: I ordered 2 sweaters for nearly  100 They shipped the items to the wrong person and I got someone elses I returned the other persons with the shipping label they provided but I never got mine It is nearly impossible to reach them right now because their office is closed due to Covid 19 even though customer service emails can be answered remotely They never followed up to make sure we recieved our items after THEIR mistake So I am out money and have no product It has been months The sweaters were a gift and now obviously they are very very late Useless customer service Oh but theyre still taking orders on their site you just cant contact them if they mess up like usual

Name: A6947
Content: This was our 1st order from T Shirt Elephant On November 21  2019  we placed an electronic order from Victoria BC for 4 white aprons with recipes printed on them We searched a couple of places  but T Shirt Elephant was one of the best prices for what we wanted  which was actual printing on an apron not a sticker  or any kind of stick on product  First we filled out the form to see what the final cost  including shipping was Once we determined we were OK with that  we decided to place the order The online ordering was pretty good for someone who has never done it before We had multiple color options and we had to provide our artwork for printing We were advised our order would be delivered by December 11th  but it showed up 1 week early on December 4th The quality of the apron was very good The printing of the recipes was about as good as it could be  as our artwork could have been a little better very old hand printed recipes scanned at 600dpi to a pdf file  We were very pleased with the entire final product and the process If we ever need something printed again as Arnold Schwarzenegger would say  Ill be back Thank you very much

Name: A6948
Content: Having major problems with this company Placed an order just 3 days ago  the artwork will not print properly as I need to supply a new artwork  I intended to cancel the order because I do not want that artwork printed as is and I have no way of expanding the image They are refusing to cancel the order  I have to do a credit card charge back unfortunately Dont do business with them  they are not customer service oriented

Name: A6949
Content: Ive ordered hoodies from them twice They are really soft  comfy and look amazing with our custom logo Shipping is super fast and always arrives early as well

Name: A6950
Content: The online ordering and configuration tool were simple and straightforward to use I was given email update as my order was confirmed created and shipped What arrived was better than I had hoped for Thank you for making one thing Im life easy

Name: A6951
Content: Although customer service responded quickly T shirts are very poor quality & extremely small child sizes for womens T shirts The shirts I ordered are virtually unusable & a few did not arrive so I had to ask for a credit I would not order from this company again Looks good online but product I ordered was very very poor

Name: A6952
Content: My daughter was very pleased with the hoodie that I purchased as a gift for her for Christmas I ordered it rather late so I didnt expect it before Christmas and I received it on Dec 26 th She loves how soft and warm the fleece is inside the hoodie I would definitely buy from this company again

Name: A6953
Content: Just got my 2nd order of custom Tees from them the design which I modified from the 1st order turned out perfect this time 1st order I located it a little too low my fault entirely Their design program works well has a few glitches like any software but once you get familiar with it it works I also like that you can save your designs for future T shirt quality is good and great price if you order 12 or more

Name: A6954
Content: We have ordered sample order of the prints from them 3items to check the quality and size The prints as promised arrived in 14days and looked great BUT we tried to order the remaining 10 items  and when we were told that the minimum order is 12 Its a joke We did the sample order but we cant finish the remaining? I would never work with them again and would never recommend them to anybody else

Name: A6955
Content: Thanks for the my new t shirts to upcoming Christmas Its sooo originally designed  perfect quality and arrived nice & quickly Ordering was a simple & pain free process I like it very very

Name: A6956
Content: The printed logo on the black hoodie looks amazing The fabric weight of the hoodie was less than I expected; I wanted a heavier hoodie but its hard to tell from the site what I was ordering Im for sure getting another  just heavier this time Delivery was fast too  awesome biz

Name: A6957
Content:
I was super excited to find an incredible + affordable apparel printing company within Canada I needed to get some custom shirts made for an upcoming event that I am hosting I placed my order on March 7  2016 so that they could arrive with plenty of time prior to my event on April 7  2016 

As of today  March 31st  my shirts have still not arrived Im in Calgary  and my shirts were said to arrive within 2 3 days after they were shipped out on March 14th After calling into customer service  I was told that since the packages are shipped out as letter mail that no one would even be able to find the missing parcel I was told to contact Canada Post to see if they could help me 

I leave for 5 days for my event where I was hoping to have had these shirts for  and Im super disappointed that Ill now not have any customized apparel seeing as mine are lost somewhere between Toronto and Calgary 

I absolutely love supporting and being able to support Canadian companies  but its just such a bummer when this happens  and the customer service doesnt do anything to resolve the problem

Name: A6958
Content: Well  its convenient enough but they could use some lessons from Amazon on communications Immediately after submitting my order and shirt logo  I noticed a mistake in the logo I immediately called and went to voicemail Next call  2 minutes later I got through to someone and she said to send in the corrected logo by email  which I immediately did The order was processed faster than my expectations and shipped several days earlier than promised But  they used the wrong logo Pricing was fair  delivery was fast  but communications sucked

Name: A6959
Content: Very satisfied with my order Purchased company logo hoodies which were nice quality and well printed Received quicker than expected Would order with this company again All positive

Name: A6960
Content: The proportion on you design page are not how the product turns out Very disappointed on how all my garments turned out The color option you display on the design page are far from the colors on the final product

Name: A6961
Content: Love my hoodie I ordered The print was good quality apart from the little specs of fabric in it  anyway overall very good Definitely going to be coming back once my other designs are in

Name: A6962
Content: My experience with this company was great If you tell them exactly what you want  they will ensure to follow suit My tshirts came out great and what I love the most is that you dont need to place a minimum order unlike other companies The customer service was also amazing

Name: A6963
Content: When the scheduled delivery date came and went I followed up  they said they would look into it 5 days later I had heard nothing  so I followed up again  they said they had lost one of the items that I ordered They would ship the other items and refund the one they lost I cant use them again  there are other companies offering similar services who deliver on their commitments 2 stars because the item that I eventually received was quite good

Name: A6964
Content: Terrible customer service Would have my emails ignored for days before I received a brusk and rude response Ordered nearly  1000 in sweaters crewnecks  hoodies  zip ups from this company and the first estimate they sent had the complete wrong numbers  colours  and sizes so I corrected them and they made the changes only for us to receive the order one week after the expected date because the embroidery machine was down because the company was moving locations Finally received the order and it was all good except one product I ordered was not sent at all and when emailing the company they have yet to respond to my request for them to send it Truly suggest ordering directly from a larger and more well established company  personally will not use their company again

Name: A6965
Content: I had a dozen shirts tanks + t shirts with a logo The logo print was good  and it was super easy to do online The actual process itself was so simple  and the delivery was great Unfortunately  after one wash following directions of being inside out  I have noticed the logo already beginning to peel off in little sections on the various shirts  which is a bit disappointing

Name: A6966
Content:
Loved the shirts we ordered  they were exactly what we were wanting  

We also received them within the timeframe given  which was great 

The only thing that would have made it better was more colour options We ordered the baseball Ts  but only had the option for a white body with a choice of colour for sleeves  Wed ideally liked to have had black or grey bodied Ts with contrasting coloured sleeves If this is something you could incorporate in the future  that would be wonderful

Name: A6967
Content: I received a shirt and the logo wasnt as big as I wanted it I emailed and they were super helpful and sent out another one at no charge so fast Very impressed with the service and the shirt Thank you so much Will buy again

Name: A6968
Content: Ive used T Shirt Elephant a few times and have always found their service and quality to be first class Most recently  T Shirt Elephant printed shirts to celebrate a friends engagement with very short prior notice The shirts were delivered early and turned out to be a perfect way to mark the occasion I will definitely be coming back for the next time T Shirts are needed

Name: A6969
Content: Love LOVE the sweatshirts I ordered recently from T Shirt Elephant While these are for a personal fam jam project  as a designer I have pretty high expectations  and they were definitely met I feel confident moving forward using T E for larger orders and recommending for client work

Name: A6970
Content: Very happy with my experience with T Shirt Elephant The shirts came out perfectly and I had a wonderful customer experience Will definitely work with them again

Name: A6971
Content: T shirts and mesh back hats are great The knit skull caps toques were extremely small though We purchased a whole bunch for adult employees but ended up giving it hem to our nephews They are more of a toddler size

Name: A6972
Content: Shirts got here a couple days sooner than expected Everything was exactly as I would have hoped Will be ordering again Thank you T shirt Elephant

Name: A6973
Content: Good quality jackets  great customer service who responds quickly and answered all of my questions Very reasonable prices and our order was received ahead of time We will definitely use T Shirt Elephant again for our swag items Love that they are in the GTA too

Name: A6974
Content: I love love love their designs/tees I own so much of their product the vast majority of my closet are t shirts and I cannot get enough Would highly recommend checking them out for holiday shopping

Name: A6975
Content: Kind of a negative experience  I tried to make a design on a toque  but when it was delivered part of the design was left out When I asked about it I was told that it didnt fit the specs set out on the website This is fair  but why not tell me that  instead of sending a product that has a changed design Overall good quality and fast delivery  I just wish that did not happen /

Name: A6976
Content: Super easy to work with the website and designing your own clothes Customer services responds quickly Always satisfied with the products we have ordered  and since it is Canadian the shipping is very quick

Name: A6977
Content: Although ive bought t shirts from a designer that uses them and liked the t shirts  this succesful designer whomi know well tells me there are supply inconsistency issues and they need to find a new place to use I tried to get some of my own designs online with elephant and customer service was poor to non existent  promises broken  and my design never went online in over four months Obviously this was not good for my business and i should not have trusted them to come through Secondary issues include total lack of support of online services such as shopify  poor y thought out web design  etc

Name: A6978
Content:
Not sure why there is a discrepancy between google reviews and review by Yelp and Facebook I wish I read the reviews before I ordered from them The order page says 14 business days  but when you actually get a confirmation email it is actually 14 business days for them to ship out your order  then they can blame it on any body Do NOT order from them if you need your order in less then 3 weeks time without paying for the extra rush I am sitting in regret right now  and not sure what I should do  as my order will most likely not arrive by the time I need them A very Costly and embarrassing mistake 

Just an update  I have changed my rating after contacting them and they have arrived before deadline

Name: A6979
Content: We recently decided to put together a soccer team and quickly decided lets get some shirts made so I started googling places and came across T Shirt Elephant The site was super easy to use which was a nice change from some other sites I had looked at I placed the order on the Tuesday night and my order arrived the next week Thursday I was so impressed with how quick they were  plus the quality is excellent and exactly what we wanted for soccer comfortable & light weight The print turned out better than I had expected so I will definitely recommend T Shirt Elephant to anyone and use them again in the future Thank you sooo much D

Name: A6980
Content: Very unhappy with their professionalism and customer service I had put in an order and approximately two weeks later on Thursday  February 27  they emailed me saying my order was ready for pick up I went to their location on Friday  February 28 at 2 30pm still within their operating hours only to find that their receiving/shipping door was locked and there was no one in the visitors office front door was also locked  I waited about 30 minutes  hoping maybe someone was on break and would return At about 3 00pm  there was still no one so I sent them a detailed email expressing my frustration with the process I also tried calling the number they provided multiple times and there was no reply on the other end On Monday  March 2  I decided to call them before I drove there to make sure they were actually open when they said they were Again  no answer on the phone line I called twice  with about 30 minutes in between each call  I decided to go there anyway since it was on my way home  and thankfully I was able to pick up my order this time I received an email after picking up my order saying that they were closed on the Friday because of a work event Totally understandable  but it would have been nice if there was some sort of notice or warning that they would be closed on Friday Even an automated recording on the voicemail stating that theyd be closed on Friday  February 28 would have been nice but as I called  their voicemail was still dated back to the holidays in December making me a bit more skeptical about this company I received no form of accomodation for my troubles and they clearly dont seem to care about customer relations

Name: A6981
Content: This was my first time ordering custom online and it was amazing Shipping was super fast Came in 1 day By far the best online purchase experience I have ever had They made my hoodie perfectly as I request

Name: A6982
Content: it is now May 14 order was made March 7th Found a FLAW in one shirt so had to reprint order is all YOUTH sizes when we had ordered Adult been dealing with this company for quite a few orders and always good dont now what has happened always double check order before going to pay not impressed looking for new company

Name: A6983
Content: I ordered t shirts and paid for Tshirts +  65 postage to have them delivered to New Zealand in June I never received them and also random small transactions started appearing eg Amazon Prime Canada so I had to cancel my cc When I contacted them and demanded a tracking number Rebecca Mattina their staff just said shell look into it and I never heard back No apologies  no sense of urgency despite payment having been taken 3 months ago A daylight robbery of a place

Name: A6984
Content: A joke of a business Ordered 45 sweaters from these guys  they forgot to make an entire size That was 21 sweaters out of the total 45 I drove down to their office to sort it out since they never answered the phone  they made me wait 1 hour while they searched These were supposed to be gifts and were quite time sensitive Christmas around the corner  The woman then told me that they would refund the entire order since they had nearly forgot half my order I was disappointed but agreed I went out and found someone that could do the job for the remaining 21  but had to charge more since I needed it the same day I figured I wouldnt be in such bad shape financially since T Shirt Elephant agreed to refund my order A couple days later I received an e mail from T Shirt Elephant that all they could refund was the sweaters I didnt get Not a sorry for screwing up my order and making me run around days before Christmas They didnt even offer me a future discount Live up to your word  scummy move Would give 0 stars if it was possible

Name: A6985
Content:
My whole softball team is thrilled They couldnt stop talking about how nice the shirts were during our first game wearing them  yesterday  We ordered shirts from T Shirt Elephant after price comparing at many other websites  we found their prices the most reasonable and loved the idea of supporting a Canadian company 
The shirts are excellent quality  even better than we were expecting  and they look great Value is high  the website is intuitive  and we are all happy campers Thanks TShirt Elephant

Name: A6986
Content: I was very pleased with the service I received from T Shirt Elephant I custom made a shirt for my boyfriends birthday  and it arrived within a week and was of excellent quality; the colors were very vivid and the finished product looked just like the preview of the shirt I had seen after I finished designing it It is one of the cheapest websites Ive found for custom clothing I would highly recommend it

Name: A6987
Content: Always great service  good communication throughout the entire process The lead times are very reasonable  they turn around orders quickly Fast  reliable and good quality products A great company to deal with

Name: A6988
Content: Ordered 2 t shirts from them They are super soft and the print is great quality The e mail said I would get them in 2 weeks and I got them in 4 days instead Great service  will buy from again

Name: A6989
Content: The shirts are high quality and they look great I have had some trouble in the past with how quickly the orders are completed but the last couple times have been perfect I will use this company again

Name: A6990
Content:
Update 2019 07 09
Following my 2* review  I finally reached customer service and they fixed the situation about the missing shirt Despite the delay  they deserve at least 4*  for they have the best website to customize your image and shirt Ive experienced so far  and they offer a fast delivery And please  dont try to explain why you didnt notice my first email Just tell me that this situation has allowed you to identify an important issue in your customer experience and that Ive given you the opportunity to fix it Still  I received a very polite response 
          
Im overall satifisfied with the ease of use of the website and the fast delivery However  I tried twice to comunicate with them  including once about a missing shirt  and I didnt get any response from them Fortunately  we ordered extra shirts and didnt absolutly need it  but we paid for it

Name: A6991
Content:
Got the email to review before receiving the product Understandably at this time that there are mail delays  however the website does not indicate shortage of staff  and processing delays So far  not impressed with this company Will revisit once the product is actually received in the mail 

Placed a second order 2 months later never received Keep using mail delays due to ongoing COVID circumstances Revise to deal with the issue at hand  that the order is lost and they will not refund money Thieves

Name: A6992
Content: T Shirt Elephant is my go to online store for getting customized shirts in a jiffy The user interface was extremely intuitive and when I had to make a last minute change to my order  their customer service rep was friendly and helpful and got me the updates I needed I would recommend these guys to anyone who likes A+ quality with A+ service and reliability

Name: A6993
Content: Such a sweet and easy spot to order a T shirt printing quickly Really easy to explain what needs to get done & phenomenal customer service Ill be using them again for sure

Name: A6994
Content: Very impressed with T Shirt Elephant for their quality  t shirt selections  fast turnaround  price and most of all service I placed my order on Dec 4th but I made an error online with my shirt selections I called in and spoke with Sade who quickly and easily made the corrections and the order was shipped out on Dec 9th I have already recommended them to friends and will be ordering more shirts from them in the future No minimum order too

Name: A6995
Content: This is our second year using T Shirt Elephant for our convention The quality has been spot on both years and the price is excellent The one issue that we did have A wayward fingerprint on one of the shirts in the ink was quickly fixed with a replacement tshirt Will certainly be ordering again next year

Name: A6996
Content: The quality of the shirt is fantastic  although the logo press wasnt the greatest One of the three shirts had a smudge in the logo A bit disappointing from a QC prospective The time to fulfill the order was extensive as well  but to be expected during a pandemic

Name: A6997
Content: My order was taking longer than expected but my concern was attended to promptly by customer service in a professional manner I love the products Got 4 hoodies Theyre very well made and I will be ordering again

Name: A6998
Content:
The guys are cracking me up  I dont think they ever heard of customer service in their life  first I ordered T shirts that were not clearly labeled as youth however they are youth size as soon as I realized their system mislabelled the T shirt type  I contacted support via email So no reply After a day I called them on their phone line which is included in the order email and phone got dropped twice Then next day I left 2 voice messages  and been calling about 9 times in the last week about updating the order 

Finally Friday I was able to get a hold of the customer support  and the woman told me that apparently even though they have orders email thats listed you cant reply to that email even though you have to email with a new email  and system automatically closes it otherwise Also their phone number does not work properly for receiving voice messages  also the line where it says 

 up to 14 business days 
Est Delivery Thursday  July 4  2019
 Note This date refers to the shipping date Final delivery will depend on the shipping location 

right below it saying the date about which is delivery date apparently is just a shipping date which is counter intuitive and just confusing 

And the reason for that apparently is their system does not allow to change it  so they themselves dont know how to update these messages 

So finally after week they said that manager will call me back 

So in short 

* Very very bad customer support you cant even call it customer support
* No replies to voice mail and 2 emails send 1 hour after order was placed
* Confusing and incorrect statements in order emails
* Misuse of labels on their products for shirt sizes
* No proper ticketing system for handling customer support requests
* Always busy and queued up with customer print requests  so if you need anything on time they wont delver  I have to adjust corporate event now for 20 people because they did not deliver 

On the side note I should have ordered locally and not bothered with out of province company  would have saved a lot of nerves 

Suggestions 
1 Create a *proper* ticketing system  its time to move on from the 90s for using email as communication like Jira or ZenDesk or whatever 
2 Please put someone to call or reply to customer feedback *dont ignore your customers  and say that you are too busy to pick up a phone
3 Focus on improvements and not fake reviews on Google to counter all the bad Local reviews

Name: A6999
Content:
I ordered two of a graphic that I intended to be samples for a mass order 
Glad I only ordered two They are not awful  but it looks like a spray stencil not screen printing one of the graphics was a little off centre but nothing too bad I would make a sample again but not order bulk

Name: A7000
Content: Always great when I receive a creation back from T Shirt Elephant Their work is always exactly what I ordered and well done too

Name: A7001
Content: This T shirt gave me the confidence to apply for my new job Thanks elephant t shirts

Name: A7002
Content:
Just put an order in for 200 t shirts We had them quickly and done right 

One particular style of shirt was out of stock  the communicated with me on options for my order which was great Will order again

Name: A7003
Content: I order shirts monthly from T Shirt Elephant and I am always happy with the results Print quality is fantastic  much better than the other shops in the city I have used in the past

Name: A7004
Content: The shirts came promptly and were of very good quality The pinting had left a smell of vinegar  but I assume this is due to the technology and it washes off My logo was a bit bigger than expected based on the online tool for ordering  so I was a bit surprised by that  so be careful and probably you need to size  online  your logo a bit smaller than you intend it to be printed

Name: A7005
Content:
We order 10 shirts  and the quality is good  the price is great  the delivery is fast  and our logo super nice 
But Oh boy The shirts stinks And they were not folded  just a big bunch of tshirts throwd in a box 
Overall  the smell and folding  I can do something about it soooo Ill keep doing business with them

Name: A7006
Content: I just took delivery of my new custiomized Markham Machine NHL calibre hockey jersey and it is a beauty Excellent quality I strongly recommend that anyone looking for customized jerseys look no further than T Shirt Elephant Next time I need an order made I will be vsiting their web site again for sure Thank you T Shirt Elephant

Name: A7007
Content: DONT DO BUSINESS WITH THEM I order ONE sweater and they messed it up It took more than a month to get that ONE sweater and they were gonna send the right one but with faster shipping which was like 2 weeks So I get the second sweater and they messed it up AGAIN There customer service was slow and not professional I had to wait another 2 weeks for the THIRD sweater and finally they got it right and I asked for a refund which the agreed to giving it to me and I have not received a penny back from them I asked why I havent gotten it yet and they claimed that I needed to talk to my bank about that???? Really unprofessional and disorganized

Name: A7008
Content: I was super impressed with T Shirt Elephant and would recommend their services anyone Great selection of designs  awesome quality and came to my front door quicker than expected Love this and will be ordering again

Name: A7009
Content: great experience with t shirt elephant the site is extremely easy to use customer service was quick and easy to get a hold of shipping is super fast if your in the GTA area received my order within a week of placing it would definitely use them again

Name: A7010
Content: I received my t shirts today from t shirt elephant they were exactly as ordered which made me very happy its all online sales is how I did mine so I didnt speak to any staff or anyting and it worked out fun even though I made a mistake on my order I still received it I accidentally clicked the hold for pickup button and they realized the mistake and ship me more t shirts anyway the only concern I had was the price was a little high

Name: A7011
Content: Flawless experience The product was exactly as ordered There was some confusion as to the exact placement of art  and a speedy back and forth email foray resolved the whole thing Package arrived exactly on the date promised  so I was able to coordinate picture taking for Christmas Will gladly use again Good job

Name: A7012
Content: Very happy with the quality of the product looked just like the pics My only complaint would be that I needed to start another whole order for an additional shirt which meant another shipping charge even tho I had only placed it a day beforehand Otherwise great company

Name: A7013
Content: I designed cute nurse t shirts for my work and I love them So happy that shipping was free because I hate paying for shipping Cant wait to post them on Instagram

Name: A7014
Content: Ordered over 3 000 kids t shirts for a work initiative and T Shirt Elephant gave us the best price and service of anyone Very happy to support Canadian and have personal contact throughout the whole process Great quality t shirts and great printing

Name: A7015
Content: My experience with T Shirt Elephant was amazing They provided us with discounts for our t shirt purchase for our annual event both this year and the last The communication for the creating and design process was smooth and effortless Jason was amazing wonderful to work with I would definitely recommend using T Shirt Elephant

Name: A7016
Content: I was looking for AA Tri Blend Track Shirts and this was the best price anywhere  about  14 each I was suspicious because the price was so good  but T Shirt Elephant has a physical location in the GTA  and the shirts are authentic AA Shipping took about 2 weeks  pretty good considering pre Christmas order date Unfortunately cant comment on the screen printing services  but Im 100 ordering blanks from here again

Name: A7017
Content: Dont expect much from this company The quality of the hoodie materials is decent but the printing is horrible Some printed blurry with very low pixel and it was just printed on the hoodies  just like how printer prints papers with color Not even a sticker or threads over the surface Quite disappointing Will not use the site again

Name: A7018
Content:
Ordered a bunch of shirts  and they look great I was concerned about the screen printing because my design had many colours in it  however it turned out great 
I had asked for athletes numbers to be added to the sleeves  which wasnt done No additional cost though  so just a mild convenience

Name: A7019
Content: I ordered my shirts on Sunday and they came the following Friday less than a week  They were very affordable and the quality is amazing The resolution of the design is very good and the printing is high quality

Name: A7020
Content: I am pleased with the quality of the the work t shirts with logo Not as much with the beenie Its feels loose  the lip curls out and up and it doesnt keep my head as warm as I would like Overall though a positive experience

Name: A7021
Content:
T Shirt Elephant was amazing with my first order They were very fast to fulfill the order  and quick with all of my questions about the process 

The products are of a very high quality  and I would recommend them to anyone looking for a local option for marketing materials

Name: A7022
Content:
Very bad I ordered 2 years ago from us and service was okay  price was good  quality was good 
Now  its just went downhill Almost 2 months to receive my order  service were non existant  quality was okay 

I was litteraly stuck with them on one hand  they were having delays and order was not processed yet; on the other hand  they didnt want to refund anything and cancel the order 

Make yourself a favor and order from somewhere else They are not worth your time and money anymore

Name: A7023
Content: Every time I order any merch for my band through TShirtElephant I am always amazed and very happy The quality is perfect  the placement and look is always what I imagine for it to turn out Ive had them print everything from hats  hoodies  shirts to cinch bags and I have always been pleased Outstanding work

Name: A7024
Content: Incredibly disappointing After browsing for awhile and being directed to this site  I was somewhat excited that I could customize the merchandise Did just that and ordered a few weeks before I was to go on tour I even laid down the extra  100 to have it expedited Now Im on tour  no t shirts Called them 3 times and whoever Chris is  never answers his phone Pretty sure Ill never use this company again and look for something in Montreal instead Im so frustrated its taking a lot of willpower not to drop F bombs in this review Elephant indeed More like an elephant in the room Terrible

Name: A7025
Content: Screen printing was not centred on tshirts and hoodies No quality checks to confirm printing would not bleed together

Name: A7026
Content: Ive just received my hoodie It came quickly which I found really nice I think my only complaint is the smell It smells like new clothes but also kind of sour? and the hood of my hoodie is super bulky style choosing error on my part but nothing a couple washes couldnt fix

Name: A7027
Content: I ordered 22 personalized soccer jerseys for my team The order arrived in less than 2 weeks and the jerseys are perfect The fit and the material is great My team is loving them

Name: A7028
Content:
First things first the shirts i ordered are great  Iam wearing one right now at work and my customers think the quality is great I always try to buy local when ever possible and your web site made the designing of my shirts so easy So i will be using you in the future for more stuff to make my pizza shop stand out from the rest One small issue is the sizing chart  now that i know you use the gildan performance line of shirts i
will order 1 size up next time 
Thanx great products great service 
Patric PizzaOne

Name: A7029
Content: I was so surprised When I opened the bag it was like magic The printing was so clean I did my best to edit on the computer and when it came in the mail it looked fantastic If you need any printing done  go to these guys I get so many compliments on my sweater that everyone wants to buy one Thanks again

Name: A7030
Content: I ordered 2 tank tops  for the first one I followed the size chart provided and it fits okay  the other style didnt have a size chart provided so I ordered the same size as the first one and it is way too small and I wont be able to wear it I called customer service to inquire if I had any options and she kept insisting that I follow the size chart provided even though there wasnt one provided I would suggest ordering from a company that provides all the information on a product  especially when they dont offer any return or discount options  as I was very disappointed with my first order and experience with this company

Name: A7031
Content: The employees at the T Shirt elephant are a pleasure to work with They are professional and want you to have the best experience you can The printing was crisp and the sweater is soooo comfy I looked at many t shirt design companies before choosing this one and Im so glad I did Great Quality  Great Service

Name: A7032
Content: These folks are awesome Circumstances had me needing to get new buttons asap and Sade was wonderful I contacted them Monday around 4 pm and by 5 pm had things ordered  Tuesday morning proof was sent first thing and 24 hours after I approved that I had them at my front door And they look great Great price Great product Great customer service Great turn around time Simply GREAT Totally have confidence in using them  hannah maria

Name: A7033
Content: Somehow lost my order? Then didnt start a new one until a week after I had contacted them Took a month longer than the  guaranteed shipping date and they offered no compensation The bags came after 6 weeks and they were so thin I could see right through them Do yourself a favour and do not waste your time or money on this company

Name: A7034
Content: Love the tank top I ordered as a birthday gift for a friend Wish I would of go one for myself It came 5 days earlier than expected The only thing is the size seems a little smaller than what I would of expected so hopefully it fits her

Name: A7035
Content: Without actual sizing guides its really hard to know what size will fit That said  the product itself is good quality  the printing it great The sweater is just on the small side

Name: A7036
Content: The process took over a month to get a set of team jerseys for baseball The wording on the website was very deceiving Once we received our jerseys we had 5/14 that had the wrong number on the wrong sized shirt The quality was good  but time and accuracy was poor

Name: A7037
Content: First time ordering embroided hats  online  without talking to someone So I was a little nervous Adding my logo to the design builder showed my logo was off center  I was worried I would end up getting off centered products When my shipment arrived  every hat was flawless Amazing Trust these guys

Name: A7038
Content:
Very excited with the quality of workmanship and the t shirt as well The manager of T shirt Elephant went the extra mile to ensure my t shirt arrived on time a day early and it was exactly what we were looking for 
Thank you for the wonderful service

Name: A7039
Content: I was very pleased with the customer service we received We received the wrong colour jackets in the mail  and the team at Tshirt elephant were quick to right the matter by printing and sending us the right colour Thank you for being a great company who stands up to mistakes made and corrects them

Name: A7040
Content: Submitted my own design and totally impressed with the workmanship thus it is with hope that my 12 year old Grandson is going to love it Also the quality of the T shirt itself is impressive To conclude ; since sizing and styles vary I might suggest to take such into consideration based on its purpose as well as its fabric content i e  100 cotton may shrink when laundered/heat dried  For example  as this t shirt is to be worn for night wear I chose his exact sizing L 14 16  he has a slim build and a fabric blend of 50 cotton & 50 polyester otherwise I may have gone up a size

Name: A7041
Content: First time got t shirts of some other company   Second time they sent inferior tshirts not what I ordered Emailed numerous times and they never reply Never am i ordering through them again

Name: A7042
Content: I made an order about a month ago for 80 mixed youth and adult t shirts with T Shirt Elephant  with two different screen sizes In our invoice  it was agreed that we would get 2 different screen sizes and they even drafted a mock up for us of the two sizes However  when we received it approximately 2 weeks ago on August 10th  I opened the box to find that all the screen sizes were the same I have left at least 4 voicemails and numerous emails to T Shirt Elephant asking them to acknowledge the mistake and make amendments  but it has been 2 weeks since the first attempt at contacting them and I have yet to receive any reply August 28th  We ended up being forced to start our event with the wrongly sized t shirts and are very unhappy that not only was there a mistake  but also because we feel like we have been ignored for the past two weeks from the seller At least a third of our t shirts were made with the wrong screen size DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM They were nice at first but they made a mistake and they are NOT owning up to it and are flat out ignoring me

Name: A7043
Content: Ordered sweater from here and they turned out fabulous The names were exactly where I wanted them on the back and they arrived before their expected delivery date which worked fabulously Glad I ordered them from here Would recommend to any Canadian looking from custom clothing

Name: A7044
Content: The size of the XXL sweatshirt was the size of an average Large in mainstream clothing brands Dimensions of products should be posted  and T Shirt Elephant could have helped me out a great deal by being familiar with the items they are selling and making customers aware  if not of the actual dimensions which is prefereable  at least that the XXL I was ordering in this product was a comparable to a Large in other clothing lines Not a great job on this one

Name: A7045
Content: I had a terrible experience every step of the way with this company The communication was poor  they couldnt process my American company credit card  my order was late  and t shirts arrived with stains and discolourations I would not recommend  and I will not be purchasing from them again I would give 0 stars if possible

Name: A7046
Content: Good print quality on the shirts Great customer service and they respond within minutes of an inquiry The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is the actual t shirt quality The Anvil t shirts they were printed on were a bit cheap feeling and smaller than normal fit Personally  I would use different t shirts

Name: A7047
Content:
PROS 
 my order is exactly what I wanted and looks great
 Customer Service is supper friendly  patient and knowledgeable
 Great prices

CONS 
 Poor communications with clients  my order came in 6 days late  and that was after I was nagging them to give me updates on my order 

Overall 
Great product and great prices But they need to work on their communication with their customers and inner workforce

Name: A7048
Content: On the day I ordered the shirt I also ordered a shirt from China I received the shirt from China with free shipping a week before the one from T shirt elephant which charged 12 99 to ship from the country I live in I understand the shirt was probably made to order but when it was finally shipped it still took a week to arrive which is unacceptable when you are charged that much to ship a t shirt I suspect this tactic is used to make the shirts look cheaper than they are

Name: A7049
Content: The quality has only gone up for the printing from the first order Sadly this most recent order showed me how good the quality I wanted vs the quality I received on previous orders

Name: A7050
Content:
Its always stressful when you order apparel and gear for a group which I do a lot of  but the quality and the turn around time was amazing I think the best part though  was the customer service I asked a bunch of questions and got quick and accurate responses by incredibly friendly and helpful people EXCELLENT company I will be a repeat customer  guaranteed
Very highly recommend

Name: A7051
Content: Ordered sweaters and polos for my construction business with specific details and was very pleased with final product Logo is crisp  materials were of high quality Will be using T Shirt Elephant again in the near future

Name: A7052
Content: T Shirt Elephant is a great company to work with Quick  competitive rates  and good customer service Had a shirt come in with a stain on it  brought it to their attention  and theyre getting another shirt sent no questions asked Would definitely recommend them to friends/family

Name: A7053
Content: My T shirts arrived early  not as I designed and printed on the wrong shirt Impossible to get in touch with the company through email and calling I wrote a complaint email Tuesday then they sent my this review  now hoping I will be heard I would like my order corrected or a refund One star for prompt shipping

Name: A7054
Content: The design tool was super easy to use  I loved the variety of shirts to choose from  I received my product quickly and I am thrilled with the quality of the image All that and I thought the price was great Ive already recommended the company

Name: A7055
Content:
The design tool was easy to use and had great features I was able to share my design ideas with my crew and get feedback We are already thinking about our next purchases I also agree with another reviewer that hats would be a great option as now I need to look to another company for this 

Cheers

Name: A7056
Content: Some minor logistic hiccups before the Tshirts were made but it was easy to get back on track and once they worked on the shirts is was only a few days before they were in my possession The shirts look create The design on the shirts matched the only design exactly Ill definitely be ordering more shirts from T Shirt Elephant

Name: A7057
Content: They were amazing from start to finish Website was easy  customer service was impeccable We ordered a bit too late and after exchanging some emails with Rebecca they got them shipped out 2 days early and we got them in time for our show  they look awesome

Name: A7058
Content: Custom ordering was a breeze with the intuitive website interface The end product was amazing and the T Shirts are top quality Shipping time was very reasonable Couldnt be happier

Name: A7059
Content: Product did not arrive on time T shirts were without a back graphic and trying to have it rectified became exhausting Very overpriced and very poor customer service

Name: A7060
Content:
After paying nearly  100 for a tshirt birthday present over a month ago  I still have nothing I have made multiple attempts to Tshirt Elephant via phone  chat and email and not an answer on a single one Im giving up on this company VISA will get their money back 

Save yourself the irritation and birthday disappointment and order from the screen printing lady down the road

Name: A7061
Content:
Just wanted to leave a very dissatisfied review for T Shirt Elephant
I received my order of 5 tees and all were warped on the front to the point that my logo looked unprofessional The sizing also did not match what was on the site When I emailed with pictures  instead of apologizing and resend the order that I spent a fortune on shipping on  they said  all we can do is giving 20 off future orders knowing full well I was unsatisfied and wouldnt NOT be returning I have a huge base of colleagues that also need branding and shirt designs but rest assured there have now not only lost my business but also that potential clientele Be warned

Name: A7062
Content: The shirt is good  fits well and seems to be good quality My only major compliant is the time to deliver They indicated it would be quite a few days but I thought they were just being cautious when in fact they were even longer than they said This was supposed to be a gift but was way too late Seems to be a production issue here somewhere

Name: A7063
Content: Received the shirt yesterday Very good communication re order and shipping The shirt looks great  exactly as ordered  and is very soft This is a gift Im sure will be much appreciated

Name: A7064
Content:
We ordered some long sleeve customized baseball tees with T Shirt Elephant for Get REAL Queens and loved them

Great design and ordering system  great quality and quick delivery 

I will be ordering from these guys again

Name: A7065
Content: Horrible experience start to finish Phoned 2 days before my order was supposed to be delivered  they had not even started printing it yet Was told it would be rushed out to me  but it has not arrived and now nobody will return an email or voicemail  after over 20 attempts at contact Have since had to dispute the transaction with my credit card company Have since found another Canadian option that beat their price by  100 for the exact same product And they answered their phone

Name: A7066
Content: Very happy with T shirts and hoodies I ordered last month ~ look awesome ~ excellent quality ~ customer service was very responsive ~ washed the tshirts in cold water and they still look great ~ turnaround was quicker than expected ~ Very impressed with the company so I will be ordering again in January

Name: A7067
Content: I ordered a dozen personalized aprons for our company function and Rebecca was amazing to deal with My order was received in a week and they look amazing Thank you so much Definitely keep you top of mind for future orders

Name: A7068
Content: Received the T shirts a day before predicted arrival and they were exactly what I wanted I got the cheapest shirt they had and its still pretty good quality Very impressed

Name: A7069
Content: Ordered Dec 26  arrived Jan 8 I am 60 miles from sender I ordered extra large Label says extra large but Tshirt is smaller than all other xlarge tshirts I have and is unwearable

Name: A7070
A7071
Content: Tshirt was good quality  material is nice and soft The only reason its not 5 star is that it takes a bit of time to deliver  however  it did arrive a few days before the estimated delivery date  which was great

Name: A7072
Content: Not trustworthy  would not pay commission back to not for profit registered charity Teddys Outreach Foundation Initially provided excuses for months of delays until finally stopped responding Perhaps they are crooked or sloppy  either way they should be avoided at all costs

Name: A7073
Content: Ordered two womens medium sport shirts The actual printing is fine  but the shirts were massive The sleeves went down to my elbows and Im usually a large  We are swimming in them Not at all what is pictured on the site Waste of money

Name: A7074
Content: Bought the RING SPUN TEE and Im happy overall However  the negative it seemed like the logo I desired on my shirts was centered on the website however  when they came in they were quite a bit off A little frustrating but not the end of the world Again overall happy with the quality/print of the shirts

Name: A7075
Content: T Shirt Elephant was the perfect way to design some hoodies to celebrate good memories of our challenge as a family to swim in all 5 Great Lakes this summer We liked the fact that there was no minimum and the kids had fun designing the hoodies online They did a good job and the order came sooner than expected We will use their services again in the future and tell others about them

Name: A7076
Content: Online ordering was super easy Great quality of products Delivery came 2 weeks early I am a very satisfied customer and will be ordering from T Shirt Elephant again

Name: A7077
Content: print nearly disintegrated all together after one wash pretty disappointed  have ordered several times from t shirt elephant before and have never had this issue lost almost all color saturation

Name: A7078
Content:
Well worth the price Great quality sweatshirt and the decal was better than I had expected
The site is very easy to use Love that you can upload your own pictures and that theres the option for creating single items

Name: A7079
Content: I ordered a custom hoodie as a gift It came better than I ever expected The decals on the front and back are great on the front I asked for the faded or worn look  I got standard shipping was a tad pricey but Canada Post so  it came a week early which was just what I needed Right on time for the bday I choose the Mens Fruit of the Loom hoodie in Small and its a great fit for a female that wears Medium I feel the Mens selection for hoodies is better than the Ladies and thats the only reason my rating isnt a 5

Name: A7080
Content: Received a printed apron as a gift from T Shirt Elephant and it was perfect Love this product from a Canadian company The site was user friendly with so many options Will use this again for future gifts and prints

Name: A7081
Content: If I could give this zero stars  I would I was hugely dissatisfied with my custom T shirt order I had ordered for my son for a Halloween costume because he has sensory issues and cant wear a typical costume I gave it at quick rinse and the artwork faded so badly you can barely see it Huge waste of time  money and we have no Halloween costume now

Name: A7082
Content: T shirt and graphic turned out great  Received as expected  with only a minor delay due to COVID 19 measurements in place Not the first time Ive shopped T Shirt Elephant & Im sure it wont be the last Would definitely recommend

Name: A7083
Content: After I placed the order I realized I was entitled too a first time customer 10 discount I immediately called but they refused to give me that discount retroactively Now they are asking for a positive review

Name: A7084
Content: My order was for just one single T shirt as a test run The shirt and printing quality were both fine however the 3 week delivery time was terrible Sorry wont be a Return Customer

Name: A7085
Content: Very disappointed they dont seem to care much to have good customer service Hard to get a hold of on the phone or via email First time ordering and 60 of my order was printed incorrectly i notified them they credit me 15 and re issued the items almost two weeks later after countless calls and emails only to be told they are very busy I was made to feel because my order was small compared to the large daily orders I was ignored When I received the reprints this week there is still issues Not impressed

Name: A7086
Content: Great speedy service Ive ordered from these guys twice already and got my shirts faster than I thought I would They look exactly like how they were designed online Would definitely order with them again

Name: A7087
Content: Very good quality as usual My only concern is the colors were not exactly the same as my photo the orange turned more red than orange but overall Im satisfied

Name: A7088
Content: Okay experience I needed shirts printed for a KS fulfillment and the printing was subpar  white had leaked around the design and made it look messy and unprofessional Disappointed by how they look  but I had to go ahead with a short deadline and will have to send these along with an apology to backers

Name: A7089
Content: Just received the shirts and the DTG printing quality is amazing My order got shipped out on Wednesday and was received the very next day So happy with how everything turned out and will definitely be ordering again

Name: A7090
Content: Creating the t shirts images was easy  plenty of choices of t shirts  fabric  etc  to choose from  rapid delivery My only reason for not allowing 5 stars is that the t shirt size guide may induce error  as mine were L and I barely fit in both models  whereas normally I am a medium to large person  fitting loosely in a size L Otherwise  great experience  will play again

Name: A7091
Content:
Shirts were exactly what I asked for They came in half the estimated time I was impressed with how quickly they arrived but more than anything I love the ease and simplicity of the site Ive been searching for a site like this for a while 
Only criticism is I want to order hats and other merchandise that they dont offer

Name: A7092
Content:
Absolutely abysmal customer service Dealing with Chelsea was a nightmare that I dont care to revisit for another second of my life Refused to give me a quote for my order unless I manually setup the order myself to the point of getting to the checkout page  Upon explaining that what I was seeing seemed wrong  I was again informed that I could only get a quote through the page Im trying to get t shirts for my business staff  as well as for resale so trying to plug in 50+ t shirts/etc into the system just to get a quote is a brutal thing to tell potential customers to do 

Will not do business with this company I dont like talking to a wall and having someone absolutely disregard everything Im saying to them I strongly suggest the same of you 

Edit I asked a few times for a quote from your people You were given a list of specifics  sizes  and I even offered to make the design in your design tool You refused to help me and told me I had to use the online tool for a quote I told you I was seeing discrepancies in pricing and things werent working out for me with your tool and still you pushed me to the tool There is no confusion here I wasnt looking to place my order  I was looking for a general price for my order without having to spend an hour putting in each individual item 

Customer service here needs work when they dont even admit to their faults when negatively reviewed

Name: A7093
Content: I printed some Ts for my blog  Indie Trendsetters My design was pretty ambitious and I was worried that they wouldnt be able to do it or the Ts would end up not looking great Turns out they did just a spectacular job  the print was clear  the online representatives were really friendly and supportive they answered all my beginners questions  and the T shirts arrived on time I honestly couldnt be happier

Name: A7094
Content:
Refused to let me know how long my order woudl take after being several months late and then refused to cancel my order The entire process with their customer support has been terse and snarky 

Order took several months to arrive  I wish I could review them 0 stars

Name: A7095
Content: High quality Logo printing  fast e mail response times  really good quote system that is accurate They missed printing 4 out of my 27 hoodies but customer service responded fast and dealt with the problem in a timely and excellent manner

Name: A7096
Content: I rarely ever order things online but Ive had this gift in mind for my boyfriend for a while now I took a chance when i decided to go with T Shirt Elephant  and Im ecstatic to say how happy I am with my final product I ordered a custom hoodie with a logo  and got my order within a few days  faster than I expected THANK YOU

Name: A7097
Content: BEWARE This company has a messed up return policy as they processed my order as a blank T SHIRT and then tried to get me to reorder with the design I requested to begin with so they can scam me twice Customer service is rude as hell and isnt actual CUSTOMER SERVICE New customers theres alot of other reputable companies that will value your business Thank god I didnt process a large order Yikes

Name: A7098
Content: Items on shipping slip not in the bag  print quality was extremely disappointing Even after contacting the company to say items were missing  the reshipped and certain items were still missing Cost was inexpensive but will never order again from this company

Name: A7099
Content: I comparison shopped all over the net for the company that would get my 50 hoodie order  and T Shirt Elephant had everything I was looking for Best prices  products  selection  turnaround  customer service  and Canadian Im thrilled with my hoodies  thank you so much

Name: A7100
Content: Great experience and great product I was searching for a company to make one custom hoodie and I absolutely love it The website was easy to use and I received my order in a timely manner The customer service was also very good

Name: A7101
Content: This company is a scam Submitted & paid for order  2 months later no shirts  no updates  no emails returned  one bogus message about saying in might have been a shipping error in the same message they also said it hadnt yet shipped  Its a scam I dont think this company actually makes anything  it just charges your credit card and probably sells the info I feel badly for trying them out  please heed the other reviews here and dont ever go near them

Name: A7102
Content: Ordered shirts for our band and they were about 2 weeks late showing up Opened the box and the logo is about a 1/3rd of the size that was submitted Emailed back and forth half a dozen times and was basically told too bad and thanks for your money We Have dealt with tshirt companies before and never have had this arrogance from the so called customer support Never again would I place a order from this clown shoes of a company You are crooks

Name: A7103
Content:
Order experience was good I would recommend that this business integrate proofing prior to press to ensure they get it right Our order had an error which couldve been caught prior to press run 

Customer service on our order was great They handled with utmost professional approach Well done

Name: A7104
Content: Bad experience with t shirt elephant The colours printed were completely wrong  and the graphic had a weird white border around it A quick QA step on their end could mitigate things like this They have agreed to reprint the shirts  so will update my review based on those results

Name: A7105
Content: The program for making the t shirt was super easy to use There are lots of options The product arrived exactly when predicted They had get there in time for christmas options I am super satisfied with this site and I will use them again

Name: A7106
Content: I love coming here to say great things about great people Too bad this is not one of these moments T Shirt Elephant has low quality product  poor execution  bad quality prints  unskilled staff  and the worst customer service ever They basically do everything wrong and when you complain  they say its your fault Makes me sad I feel sorry for them

Name: A7107
Content: Very happy with our first order with T shirt Elephant The quality of the print is good and the t shirts we picked are very soft Will order from you guys again

Name: A7108
Content: The products received were as expected  and the order came in reasonable time But due to a mistake in the stores website some products I ordered were not available This was disappointing Further  they refunded only the value of those products I did not receive and not the tax on them And they did not adjust the shipping cost Overall  if I knew these products were not available  I would not have placed the order at all

Name: A7109
Content: t shirt elephants products did not disappoint and arrived in a timely fashion Their customer service went above and beyond when I realized I had forgotten to order an extra shirt Highly recommended

Name: A7110
Content: Ordered Dec 17 2020 Date of completion was supposed to be Jan 6 2021 As of Jan 18 2021 nothing When I contacted them  just got the run around Very poor customer service Just wanted to know approximate delivery date and where my order sits in the Q I respect the delays during Covid  but communication is awful I will not order again Beware if you need anything expedited or have problems I wish I could have picked 0 stars

Name: A7111
Content: My custom t shirts look great Excellent communication and reasonable turnaround time Recommended

Name: A7112
Content: I ordered 7 T shirts Everything was fine but the sizes run small so one shirt was not useable  unfortunately Otherwise the quality is great and everything was as ordered

Name: A7113
Content: Our performance baseball shirts are better than expected The unisex sizing was great for men and women Great price  quick delivery and a quality custom shirt

Name: A7114
Content: I love the shirts from here the colour and picture quality its really good The shirts also stand up to a lot of use and washes  with a little bit of wear My only thing I wish I would get is a picture that covers the entire front to the shirt When making the shirts in the template it shows that its what Ill be getting but when they arrive its just a larger picture in the middle

Name: A7115
Content:
Terrible customer service and delivery services I got a shipping confirmation email nearly a month ago which said it would arrive in 2 4 business days It didnt so I reached out to customer service and still havent heard a reply back That was a few weeks ago

I just want my shirt man

Name: A7116
Content:
Used them to start a business since they are in Canada and didnt want the hassle of borders and exchange 
They dont do any checking of images you send in  they just print them regardless of how digitized they are when they are blown up They reprinted and resent this at no charge but they do not review your image as they say they do 
They are very criptic with their pricing and wont tell you full costs unless you get on the phone with them 
They are very slow to repond to emails and more often than not they dont answer the question so typically I had to call 
It takes them 2 weeks to print a shirt then they ship it This is print on demand it should be days not weeks 
They messed up commissions constantly and everytime you get a statement the amounts differ I am still waiting for payment from their error I spent numerous calls trying to sort out the right numbers 
You always have to call them in order for them to actually do anything 
I have moved to a new supplier who can perform the way they say they will 
Stay away if you are trying to run a business

Name: A7117
