Content: Dont waste your time/money  this company is a joke The worst customer service Ive ever experienced We ordered tshirts for a baseball team under the impression that their 14 day guarantee would hold up Dont let their fancy website and positive reviews on their own website fool you after thet 14 day guarantee passed  we contacted the company and it was virtually IMPOSSIBLE to reach anyone Always goes to voicemail  emails un returned  left messages on every single extension at the company with not a single return phone call I lost track of how many voicemails and emais we left We were finally able to get the companys attention only by inquiring via their contact us form on their website  we anonymously asked how long shipping would take for a new order  and what do you know  they answered right away  only then did they give the explanation that the shirts werent here because of backorder from their supplier When they finally did ship the shirts over a month later there were 4 shirts missing and 2 were the wrong size and the quality was less than desirable  and our ball season was essentially over Do not waste your time/money on this company I could go on and on HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT/WASTE OF MONEY

Name: A7118
Content: We ordered 14 I think ball shirts  the sleeves are a bit long  next time I would size down I sized up according to the chest in the size chart but they came on time and look great Great price

Name: A7119
Content: The website was very easy to use and it gave me a lot of options to customize the shirt The product showed up ahead of schedule and it was exactly what was shown to me in the preview The process was seamless and I look forward to doing business with them again

Name: A7120
Content: the sweater itself wasnt too bad  however I specifically wanted my print smaller and it came out larger than expected the print wasnt as opaque as i wanted it to be and just looks cheaply printed on Overall not bad but just not worth the price

Name: A7121
Content: Ordered a number of items from Jason at T Shirt Elephant He was extremely professional and I would highly recommend him/his team The items received were fantastic Thanks again

Name: A7122
Content: I received 6 polo shirts today for a corporate event I cant imagine anyone doing a worse possible job than these shirts The logos are ironed on labels that appear to have been printed in someones basement on a  50 printer and then irregularly ironed This is despite their website stating clearly that they never use iron ons I could not possibly be more disappointed I could have done a better job myself Still waiting to hear about a refund

Name: A7123
Content: Order a printed hat but logo was not printed correctly  I designed the hat with a bigger logo and placed to the right of the hat but they centered it and logo was small  I contacted customer service but they refused to fix the problem all they afford was 10 discount what a joke  Its a good thing I didnt place a bigger order as I just wanted to try them out but I would not order again  Save yourself the head ache and order from Vista print better customer service

Name: A7124
Content:
Very impressed
I did not have the time necessary to do the job but Client Service told me they could deliver within my deadline And they did Even 3 days earlier that promised 
The T shirts were of good quality  the picture that I supplied was really well reproduced 
Being of advertising background  I am VERY fussy 

Will definitelly used them again 

Paulette Arsenault of Montreal

Name: A7125
Content: Great customer service Went above and beyond on my order Fast shipping  competitive pricing Very high quality print on sweaters Thank you and I will be ordering again

Name: A7126
Content: We recently bought and named our boat and wanted to design our own sweatshirts with the boat name The process was very easy and the sweatshirts were amazing Cant wait to be using them on the boat

Name: A7127
Content: I have used T Shirt Elephant for the past 3 years for an annual event They are incredibly customer focused and responsive Their online store works flawlessly and they truly care that the customer gets what they want  when they need it

Name: A7128
Content: the sweater and print was all good and i love it the only problem is the color of the sweater was different then expected online it was safety green hoodie but when i received it  it was more like a highlighter yellow i still like it  its just eh at first bc i was expecting the color online

Name: A7129
Content: Great company Great product The sweatshirts made awesome staff gifts for Christmas Thank you again  So glad I DIDNT go with amazon

Name: A7130
Content:
I am not happy at all The first shipment arrived with no logos on the shirts I was guaranteed the shirts would be printed and arrive the first week of September and they may arrive on the 11th 
I have been offered a 10 refund  but this is not acceptable 

Pat Larre

Name: A7131
Content: Ordered customized quarter zips Great price and fast delivery Customer service is super responsive Highly recommend for bulk orders  custom designs  for school clubs and teams

Name: A7132
Content: Great website to design my product Helpful staff Small error on one of the shirts and the staff quickly and without hassle sent a corrected product Very friendly I will be ordering again from TSE

Name: A7133
Content: I had a great experience designing my custom hoodie using T Shirt Elephant The pricing was good and the delivery was quick I will definitely use them again for my next custom design project

Name: A7134
Content: Ordered polo shirts for my bowlers online and they were everything I hoped for I was very happy with the service Definitely will order from T Shirt Elephant again

Name: A7135
Content: Our package got stolen and they are less than cooperative in helping us get replacement shirts Some of the worst customer service Ive seen so far and its hard to get a hold of them Dont make the same error we did and get your business somewhere else

Name: A7136
Content: aka has marketing aka sterling screen printing 6+ years working with screen printers and have never experienced such a poorly managed company  they have been holding our goods hostage for over two months no one will respond to you  via phone or email sent couriers direct to get our goods from them  refused to give them to us save yourself a gigantic  months long  unmistakable headache and go elsewhere

Name: A7137
Content:
Was quite disappointed with the service here as I did not receive any notifications that my order arrived and had to follow up with an email for them to respond that they were sorry I didnt get an email and told me my order was ready At pickup  I was instructed to go through a side door and I walked through the door to find an incredibly filthy factory and had to ask some random guy standing around nearby to get my order 

In terms of the quality of the product  it was to my satisfaction and no complaints but wholistically factoring in their lack of customer satisfaction  I probably wont order here again

Name: A7138
Content:
This was one of the worest experiences of my online purchasing experiences 

No sample sizes given and no actual photos of the product on the website only computer generated ones 

Printing was done wrong several times wrong colour  missing our logo 

It took over a month to rectifiy the situation and during that time the initial sales person either quite or was let go At this point I was unable to get a hold of anyone via phone I was told only e mail communication woud be permitted 

There are other Canadian online options that are available that I would recommend using over this company 

Unsatisfied and an overall very disappointing expereince I would NOT recommend using this company if you want the job done right

Name: A7139
Content: Product is good quality and pricing was reasonable Could work on their communication a bit They were supposed to send an email when it was finished but I never received one The product just showed up one day

Name: A7140
Content: While I was really happy with how the purchase hat looked  the hat itself is super uncomfortable  so much so that it is unwearable I raised this with customer service and they offered a 10 discount on my next purchase I think replacing the hat would have been more appropriate Unfortunately  after spending  46 on a hat and it being unwearable  I dont expect to purchase from them again

Name: A7141
Content:
It was my first time ordering custom printed t shirt Im very satisfied with the quality and the whole process 

Will order from them for now on

Name: A7142
Content: Quick service  good selection of product  accommodating customer service  theyve done well for us I just wish they had a wider selection of ink colors for some of the printing  didnt quite match up with our logo colors

Name: A7143
Content: The shape of some of the t shirts didnt fit at all even though it was the same size as the other the rest Poor quality product  no exchange possible  no refound  had to wait about two months before receiving my order

Name: A7144
Content: Managing an online store through T Shirt Elephant has been amazing  their efficient and knowledgeable staff are prompt to respond to any requests  leaving minimal work for the requesting organisation If you are looking for a seamless process ordering merchandise or beginning an online store for your business  I highly recommend T Shirt Elephant

Name: A7145
Content: I placed my order on May 27th with a projected delivery date of June 14th My item wasnt even shipped until June 18th and the Canada Post tracking is estimating that my order will not arrive until the 9th of July I can get shipment faster from overseas

Name: A7146
Content: Graphics were well printed  clear & with precision ATC womens t shirt was excellent quality cotton Overall  I was very satisfied I will definitely use T shirt Elephant again

Name: A7147
Content: I have ordered twice from T Shirt Elephant and i have been very happy with both orders  shirts come printed the way I imagined and hoped for and they usually ship very quick especially within Canada  will be ordering more from them for sure

Name: A7148
Content: Just got my shirts in the mail The print is amazing however  the XL shirt was obviously smaller than the medium shirt it looked like a small  Emailed customer service and since the shirts werent personalized  Im out of luck The solution suggested by customer service was give the medium to the person who fits into a XL and the small XL to the person who wears medium Yes  because someone who needs an XL can wear a medium size shirt

Name: A7149
Content:
I wish I could rant and rave about the service I received however I cant 
I would like to support Canadian Business as well as some of the other reviewers however I work in Customer Service and this company does not have it 

I sent several emails and left 2 voicemails with no response It felt like the company was saying we dont need your money 

I see that many people got great service however my order fell through the cracks and would not recommend t shirt elephant

Name: A7150
Content: Great customer service and a great product which allowed for lots of creative  individual touches at a good price I was given a estimated arrival date for my order which was unfortunately not accurate However when I emailed to inquire about the delay  they rushed the order to me Thank you

Name: A7151
Content:
Product was decent  website not a great experience 

The confirmation email with size and numbering info was formatted in a way that obscured an error I would have caught had it displayed properly 

Ended up with 2 useless jerseys  partly my fault  partly theirs Very annoying

Name: A7152
Content: Ordered 30 shirts 16 hats Shirts the distress effects was much worse than the website made it look Hats arrived 3 weeks after shirts Was lied to about the status of hats they said UPS error originally Will not use them again

Name: A7153
Content: I ordered some hats at first to see if they were any good  but when the hats showed up I was very disappointed I had No Rest screen printed on the hats  and all except 2 were printed noticeably off center And on one of the hats the e was just a mess that didnt even look like a letter I gave them a second chance and ordered some shirts  but again the screwed up The design was again off center and even lopsided on some shirts

Name: A7154
Content: I had a pretty detailed print made on a hoodie It was pretty bad  I was expecting better shipping is fast not impressed with the product however

Name: A7155
Content: Not fast at all It has taken 20+ days for 2 tank tops that have a design they already had on file from my purchase last year and I still havent even got a shipping message yet

Name: A7156
Content: Ordered zippered hoodies Smaller sizes are good fit but the x large hoodie is very baggy in the body Material is great and the hoodie itself is very warm I would order a large hoodie in hindsight but am concerned about the arm length

Name: A7157
Content: Made my order of 10 hoodies with prints on the back  front & sleeves The material they used was so garbage that out of the box the print was already all cracked on the sleeves I own several different hoodies and these guys by far have the cheapest material Not flexible Still waiting from a response from Jason Staff seems to be ok

Name: A7158
Content: My wife and I have been looking for years for a specific hat Since her birthday was coming up  I decided that since I couldnt find the hat she wanted  Id have one custom printed The quality was great and my Wife absolutely loves her new hat

Name: A7159
Content: This place is a scam I ordered embroidered polos  they came very late  and were not embroidered When I contacted them they first told me I must have ordered this wrong because you have to call in to order embroidered polos Then she said she double checked and they do not offer embroidered polos I went back on the website to double check I triple checked I checked for the fourth time Yes  this website is telling me I am ordering embroidered polos When I go to the check out it states embroidered polos I got the run around from 3 different emails who all ended up being the same woman in the end  and I sent screenshots of what the website was showing me the woman just kept asked for more screenshots I mean its your own site  look for yourself SCAM

Name: A7160
Content: Easy transaction  super fast service Only down side  the t shirts were bigger than expected Maybe a grading ought to be included in the item description

Name: A7161
Content: We are very pleased with the quality of T shirt used The process from ordering to shipping was very quick Thank you for the great service

Name: A7162
Content: Incredibly fast from computer to doorstep  easy designing online  very great price level  and excellent feedback when i emailed their customer service Love the sweaters and will definitely be using t shirt elephant again soon

Name: A7163
Content: I ordered some shirts for my store  the website it pretty user friendly  but when my shirts arrived they were REALLY small  Im not sure who they are going to fit???? they are SO small I normally were a medium and the XL fits me Very Disappointing

Name: A7164
Content: Dont waste your time or money Zero customer service Waited over a month for nothing to show up No updates or anything either

Name: A7165
Content: Excellent clothing company Order arrived on time  and did not take very long High quality hoodie and excellent design Overall satisfied with my order

Name: A7166
Content: I order merchandise for my cannabis company regularly from T Shirt Elephant  we order toques  and hoodies and they always come out perfect Love ordering from these guys

Name: A7167
Content: Had an excellent experience with the customer service site of Tshirt Elephant I had a serious of super prompt and helpful interactions while working on resolving an issue I was experiencing Tshirt quality itself is good too I would highly recommend using this company

Name: A7168
Content: I purchased 3 shirts  im very happy with quality of shirt and the writing on back looks amazing  Undortanatly my logo looks horrible and very old and worn out  Sad to say i dont think ill be a returning customer as it looks as if i have had it for years now  I thought with the price and reviews they would have came out much better

Name: A7169
Content: SO HAPPY WITH MY SWEATSHIRT For Christmas I wanted to give unique sweaters to my family with different images I was nervous that the images may come out blurry  but they were so nice and clear  even the writing came out clear Just a note that Large is large ;

Name: A7170
Content: I am very happy with my order The quality of the T Shirts is excellent Ordered on a Sunday afternoon  and it arrived a week later

Name: A7171
Content: Well in short  my experience with T Shirt Elephant was an absolute breeze  it could not have gone any better I was able to work with the same agent with all communication  and she knew exactly what I needed I was able to go in to their office and try on a range of shirts and pick out the one I liked best Easy Peasy

Name: A7172
Content: Wow In a word? Outstanding Quality of cotton tees excellent Super thick Resolution on graphics superb  I used good sized png art files per a web forum recommendation  Came out great And shipped in less than two weeks Ill be doing this again Thanks  T Shirt Elephant

Name: A7173
Content: Ordered a t shirt almost 3 weeks ago  and I have yet to receive it or see any trace of it Whenever i asked about it Ive only been told they dont have any more information 45  down the toilet thanks T shirt elephant

Name: A7174
Content: Not impressed with the print quality ordered two of a graphic and while they are not awful  the prints look like a spray stencil thatll likely fall apart in the first wash I would potentially make a sample again as delivery was quite fast

Name: A7175
Content: Pleased with the product and a very fast turnaround from the date the order was placed to the order arriving Jason was available when needed and always responded quickly Thanks team

Name: A7176
Content:
I ordered a tshirt for my boyfriend  a medium Gildan shirt is actually fairly large The white print on it was also very patchy  with numerous tiny holes that let you see the black shirt underneath Furthermore  the print did not reach to the edges of the shirt like it was displayed on the computer 
This design was actually a duplicate I made for my boyfriend as the one I got him last year from pmall was starting to show wear and tear I will not be buying a shirt from here again  go to pmall  its cheaper and ready in a few moments no need to pay for shipping

Name: A7177
Content:
A huge thank you to everyone at T shirt Elephant Ill definitely be coming back with future jobs Thank you so much for the quick turnaround and your professionalism These shirts are going to sell like hot cakes  And will be raising funds for my friends family He lost his life during a special effects test Warren Appleby was a stand up guy and amazing boss  The Special effects and film family has lost a great leader these shirts are going to help the healing in our close knit community I have perma smile on my face right now
Thank you

Name: A7178
Content:
I received the jersey prints for our team and they arrived very quickly  The printing on them is great quality and the jerseys are also high quality 

Definitely recommend t shirt elephant

Name: A7179
Content: Awesome customer service  great prices Shirts came in under budget and almost a week sooner than promised I will happily use T Shirt Elephant again for our next event

Name: A7180
Content: Really good quality items I had a bit of a hard time getting the design to fit in their dimensions because the website is clunky and confusing I gave feedback about this  But once I received my items  and in record time  I was so pleased Will definitely be back for more Thanks

Name: A7181
Content: Excellent experience  great product  Im wearing my shirt right now Its so soft and fits perfectly It shipped quickly and I received it just yesterday Thanks guys and keep up the great work

Name: A7182
Content: This company punishes people with their unfair cancellation policy I totally understand that business moves fast today  but I find it hard to believe that ink to shirt occurred in less than 5 minutes Very disappointed that I was given no consideration and simply told tough Stay away unless youre perfect

Name: A7183
Content: I wish I could give them less starts I have tried to contact them multiple times about a botched order

Name: A7184
Content: This place doesnt reply to emails/phone msgs If you have a good experience all is well if you have a bad experience they tell u to shove it Ordered ball shirts  numbers on the back were the wrong colour  2 showed up with no numbers at all and when the FINALLY answered back they said too bad so sad You are taking a chance with this place if you order from them Also pay attention to the negative reviews and they are Canadas leading option as they claim lmao

Name: A7185
Content: Amazing Customer Service  a lot of attention to details Easy to use website  High Quality products Quick Delivery Will defiantly be only using T Shirt Elephant from now on Thank you Team

Name: A7186
Content: The new embroidered new era snap back caps were done nicely  and the shirt order were good quality Ordering from a few provinces over  the turn around was only a couple weeks Thanks T Shirt Elephant

Name: A7187
Content: print quality is good however shirt sizes run quite small; there was an error on 2 shirts of 4 that I ordered; they offered to reprint and when I asked to have them printed on a size larger they couldnt accommodate; seems kind of silly when you are trying to correct a problem

Name: A7188
Content: I decided to try out T Shirt Elephant for my schools spirt wear and when the order came in I was amazed with the quality of the long sleeves and sweaters The quality came out 100 times better then we ever imagined I definitely recommend this company

Name: A7189
Content: The order came on time despite I made a mistake on the address They managed to change it on time and I got a pretty awesome quality t shirt the quality was beyond expectation  no visible pixels or anything like it

Name: A7190
Content: I had five t shirts made for my grown kids I hate to admit this but they were used in the making of t shirt quilts There were missing shirts representing events in their lives  especially my daughter who never keeps anything It was so easy to use the website  even for a 70 year old I was able to save and upload images from the web  eg my sons high school logo and size the words and images to fit the 12x12 requirement for the quilt They arrived more than a week before I was expecting them and they were beautiful  I couldnt believe how a crest I uploaded was so perfectly reproduced It was so hard to have to cut them for the quilt but now that I realize how easy they are to make and how well they turn out  I will be making some to actually be worn

Name: A7191
Content:
Easy  fast and affordable 

My main criticism would be that the design does not appear to be scaled on each t shirt Maybe it would be helpful to have a preview the design on small medium vs large or have an option to scale to fit the size of the shirt

Name: A7192
Content: The shirts I ordered are of a good quality and they arrived when expected They fit a bit larger than I hoped I am happy with the experience thus far

Name: A7193
Content:
took them 3 weeks to tell me they couldnt copyright make my project

Hi James  sorry  we cannot print copyrighted Visual Content or IP that does not

Name: A7194
Content:
Please make sure to include The Youth size on the same line as the size 
As  I had made a very costly mistake selecting XL thinking it was adult size  I dont know how I made that mistake but it was done Now I have a wonderful youth size XL hoodie that cost me 100  Thank You

Name: A7195
Content: I order a long white sleeve shirt with a custom design I made on it  upon receiving it it did not have the design on it  it what just the blank shirt without the design on it If someone is reading this I would like to either have a refund or the design that I asked for put on the shirt please

Name: A7196
Content: Not impressed at all I paid  50 00 for a tshirt that was really poor quality I didnt expect extremely high end  but this was a light grey tshirt that was very see through The tshirt also had a smell to it  I dont know if it was the ink from the logo but I wasnt impressed at all I will try to find another company going forward

Name: A7197
Content: Hoodie came out great My friend says its super comfy and she loves the yellow colour Customer service was great at answering questions I had

Name: A7198
Content:
Impossible to contact this company Send emails  no response Leave voicemail  no response 

Just needing some basic customer service

Name: A7199
Content: This order was received in a timely fashion and everyone likes them I made a mistake in some numbers for sizes and T Elephant has been wonderful in helping me get them on time Rebecca has been wonderful in walking me through what I had to do

Name: A7200
Content: Great service Created our shirts online using Elephants software and got them quicker than date quoted Definitely will use again

Name: A7201
Content: ordered a crewneck and hoodie and the quality is great and the shipping was SO fast i will definitely order again from t shirt elephant in the future

Name: A7202
Content: Great options  great service  super fast turn around and product exactly as ordered Missing a star as the images impressed on the t shirt are creased and wrinkled due to shipping More careful folding could have mitigated this Thanks

Name: A7203
Content: Great quality with awesome customer service Ordered shirts for a fundraiser for my young niece diagnosed with AML and they delivered without any worry and even arrived earlier than expected Thank you so much Will be sure to recommend to others

Name: A7204
Content: I was impressed that staff contacted us for a higher resolution photo and that they edited the background from the photo I sent so it worked better on the clothing I ordered The clothes are high quality and shipment was fast

Name: A7205
Content:
I ordered some t shirts for my apparel brand samples Musclechino 
T Shirt Elephant were fast on the delivery Plus the shirts turn out amazing 

Thanks
Musclechino and The Condo Trainer

Name: A7206
Content:
Customer service gives courteous responses but dont actually do anything  I was advised my order was rush delivery guaranteed Wednesday June 6th  did not show up They then advised no worries will for sure ship out today It did not 

They then said they apopologize and will Ship out Thursday It did not 

And then on friday no one is available to chat  email or take a phone call  absolutely unacceptable and my order is useless since I needed it before the end of this week Terrible service  would avoid at all costs

Name: A7207
Content: Second time using them  excellent prints My wife couldnt have been happier with her new hoodies Easy to use  solid selection  fair pricing

Name: A7208
Content: Their screen printing wears off over time and the customer service is absolutely terrible They forgot to send a shirt and I was told they would make another and send it 6 months later havent heard a word from them and havent received the shirt

Name: A7209
Content:
Terrible customer service I placed an order in early August which was expected to arrive by September 9th By the 16th I still hadnt received anything so I contacted the company They told me that it was going to print immediately meaning they completely forgot my order and was rushing to get it done now after nearly a month of waiting  and that I would have it by the following Tuesday Well the following Tuesday came and went and nothing received 

Eventually cancelled my order with nothing received

Name: A7210
Content: I needed 500 neon tank tops turned around quickly for a weird party I was throwing and the Elephant got me them very quickly and for a better price than anywhere I could find online or in the city I just got my order and the shirts look great

Name: A7211
Content:
I ordered 4 prints on clothing there with 2 different graphics On the website you can size and move the graphic to be appealing 

First 5 weeks after ordering  still no news The provided ETA by the company overdue I write them and a week later it arrived 

Then 
Its a very cheap iron on print 
They used one of the graphics on all of the pieces of clothing Not the second one 
And to make it super cheap and easy for them they used the same size for all of them 
Completely ignoring the provided design from their design website
This looks horrible 
I also chose a  used washed out look for the graphics as it works well with the 80s look  but this was also not applied 

I wrote a mail to customer service that this is unacceptable work and they are not replying to me I remind them every week and Its been 3 weeks of them ignoring me 
And those 4 pieces of clothing cost me 200  and I got the cheapest laziest print 

UPDATE
After 4 weeks they got back to me  offering me to reprint the shirts with the wrong signature design They double checked with me that the sizing and placement was correct Which was a very pleasant interaction and lead to nice and correct shirts 
With the last experience I change my one star rating to two

Name: A7212
Content: Im so happy with the shirts I ordered Everyone was so professional and answered back to any concerns in a timely manner Thank you so much for everything I will definitely be using you guys again in the near future

Name: A7213
Content: I had a small order of 4 t shirts The interface to see the design on the t shirt before ordering was very helpful The turn around was quick And the t shirts took great

Name: A7214
Content: The quality of pants were great and the print came out amazing great colour as well but I dont know if I miss read the description of the track pants but even the cheapest tracks you buy at walmart have pockets and these one from T Shirt Elephant did not have any pockets Very disappointed about that

Name: A7215
Content: I ordered this t shirt well in advance of my event  and was told it would arrive by May 5th It is now May 12th  and it is apparently arriving on May 19th 3 days after my event Zero stars wasnt an option

Name: A7216
Content: I have been ordering for the last 4 years Always very pleased with finished product My crew love wearing the shirts

Name: A7217
Content: Order delayed and landed about a month late because of covid  the order was not a rush  Happy with the product  Hoodies and beanies  A bit more communication would have helped  just an update would have sufficed during the delay

Name: A7218
Content:
Products were great Customer service was excellent I needed the shirts very quickly and they came through for me I would definitely recommend their products and service 

Greg O

Name: A7219
Content: Ran out of one item offered a switch which they called a free upgrade to a completely different item with a lesser price point Missing items  items shipped werent ordered Contacted and only response was I approved the change My other concerns were not addressed at all

Name: A7220
Content:
The online API for making custom shirts is a complete mess
I spent a total of 3 hours for what shouldve taken 30 minutes  AND they got my order quantities and design specifications wrong

Name: A7221
Content: After receiving a poorly printed shirt and a wrong size shirt 0/2 I contacted the Elephant in the room They quickly reproduced the shirts correctly in size and quality Satisfied customer now

Name: A7222
Content: Shirts were as ordered  at a fair price given that theyre custom Id order again

Name: A7223
Content: price was awesome  order came in time  picture quality was awesome and they even went through the trouble to improve the resolution on our image when it was too low Sweaters look awesome an are super comfy

Name: A7224
Content: This place is ridiculous and has the WORST customer service I have ever encountered Ordered a shirt in April and still havent received it They havent even shipped it  even though it should have been shipped weeks ago They wont even respond to my emails anymore Avoid this company at all costs

Name: A7225
Content: This is my second time using T shirt Elephant and I am not only impressed with the easy to use software but the quality of the shirts good pricing  good shipping  will be using again

Name: A7226
Content: Customer service is a little hit or miss But after several attempts the response once good once initiated Paid for express service and that was received

Name: A7227
Content: Custom T Shirt looks really nice Medium fits allot smaller than the average size M  Company were unwilling to adjust or help out

Name: A7228
Content: My first experience was better than expected same as the quality of my tshirts The only thing is that it runs way to big for the size Other than that it was great from designing it to delivery

Name: A7229
Content: Terrible service Order may 20th and still havent recieved my item Asked for rush they said no I get no status updates on my order and I finally got that it shipped June 5th Still havent gotten it The mail service is not that behind as Ive gotten things from other places that I ordered later But apparently theres no tracking info Will no order again

Name: A7230
Content: Just would like to add they were fast to respond  confirm technical details  reassure delivery before our event and stand behind they products quality and replace if necessary  Very Happy

Name: A7231
Content: Ordered in November  this was a replacement and printed incorrectly for the second time Missing orders and no reply from emails since early December Great products when printed correctly but lacking customer service and communication

Name: A7232
Content: I use T Shirt elephant for all my projects Great quality sweatshirts  great quality printing and great customer service Thanks for always making my vision come to life

Name: A7233
Content: Okay  so I live on Canadas west coast & the shirts get shipped to me from somewhere in Vancouver I think  and anyways  they took ONE DAY to get to me ONE DAY Ive literally never had anything delivered that fast Anyways  Im just super stoked & pleasantly surprised  so THANK YOU

Name: A7234
Content:
Just got my shirts and they look good and fit well 

The screen printing came out crisp just like I ordered 

I would order from here again

Name: A7235
Content: I love the clothing options and the control the site gives you over the final product It leaves no doubt about whats going to be made The final product in my case direct to clothing printing on cotton was fantastic

Name: A7236
Content: Made an order and two weeks later I got an email asking me to change the product because it was sold out A week later  a new email for the same reason Took forever to get my order Pretty satisfied with the quality though

Name: A7237
Content: Absolutely brutal service Had an issue with a product the company said they would fix then nothing happened and cant get any further response Such bad business

Name: A7238
Content: The tshirt I ordered wasnt available so I was contacted and offered an alternative that I am incredibly satisfied with I was taken care promptly and I would do business with the company again in a heartbeat

Name: A7239
Content:
Excellent costumer service 

I had a problem with my order and when I told them  they sent me a 15 code with which to be honest I wasnt really happy with The thing is that when I bought another shirt  they sent me a second one for free and this was the absolute best thing ever 

Excellent compagny

Name: A7240
Content: Website easy to use  price reasonable  and the ability to order just one shirt was nice Just wish the quality of the shirt itself was better  not a nice soft cotton

Name: A7241
Content: Ordered a gardening apron in denim for my daughter in law It is well made and the personalization looks amazing Would definitely recommend

Name: A7242
Content: After a small delay due to a printer problem from a power outage it was shipped out and arrived sooner than expected Pleased with the product and definitely plan to order again some day

Name: A7243
Content: Good products  you exactly get what you order Great and quick responses by customer service Design wasnt as good as I thought it would be but It might be because of the pictures I uploaded werent very good quality Overall I would order again

Name: A7244
Content: Initially I was going to give the place one star because the placement of our design was incorrect However after getting a hold of the team  they rush ordered more shirts in the same colour  even resized them because some were too small  re printed them asap and ensured the placement was where we wanted I know it can be hard to get a hold of customer service but they just moved and are settling in  so if you live in the GTA  it might be worth it to visit their north york location Raitherm Rd

Name: A7245
Content: Shorts ordered but the mesh fabric makes them almost transparent Contacted customer services and they told me there is nothing they can do based on their return policy

Name: A7246
Content:
Great price  great product They promised we would have our shirts in before our race and they absolutely delivered

Wouldnt hesitate to buy from again 

Thanks for everything

Name: A7247
Content: I had a rather complicated design that needed to go on dry fit style shirts and I asked a few other companies if they can do it Everyone but this company said no They were championship shirts for a bunch of kids who did something amazing Thank you so much for making it happen

Name: A7248
Content: Great company I was easily able to design my own product  and the shipping was QUICK Im a teacher  and needed apparel for my school programs I would highly recommend this company to schools in need of t shirts/hoodies

Name: A7249
Content: extremely high quality work This is my third order with them as of this review Outstanding work if I say so myself Highly recommended if youre into making some designs for yourself or to sell

Name: A7250
Content: Its a great cheap custom printing site If you are looking for a super small order less than 6 they definitely do that which can be hard to find and if you want bigger than its even cheaper and delivery was like a weak early which was just great

Name: A7251
Content:
Products shipped quickly as was very impressed with the quality of the items 
One of the designs ordered was out of stock  but I was quickly contacted by them and the issue was resolved

Name: A7252
Content: The customer service is very rude and bad in service and answering calls about the placed order it took more then 60 days to delivered the products ordered and prepaid But the quality and workmanship is good

Name: A7253
Content: Website is great  very easy to use  easy to upload your own images I wasnt super impressed with the accuracy of the stitching on the hats i ordered Very expensive at  65 a hat  so I expected more I guess

Name: A7254
Content: Although we were missing one shirt when they were delivered  Chris was quick to remedy the situation and shipped the missing shirt express I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for custom printing

Name: A7255
Content: Once ordered two hoodies that were not as good as I expected  I wrote to them  they were super cooperative and shipped me good ones without charging anything more Great customer service and great quality

Name: A7256
Content: Ive used T Shirt Elephant for many years and have always been blown away with the service and quality of each of my orders I would highly recommend them to anyone and everyone

Name: A7257
Content: Jason answered all of my questions in a timely manner and was there to help me every step of the way with my order We love our tees

Name: A7258
Content: The biggest mistake Ive made in business so far  was trusting this company with mine They promised the world initially  but  might be good  but at the cost of poor quality and terrible customer service I hope anyones experience with this company is better than mine  but I would recommend you look elsewhere

Name: A7259
Content: I designed a hoodie for my boyfriend and he was really happy I was satisfied with the work too The hoodie is good and warm material and design was exactly what I wanted it to be Thank you

Name: A7260
Content:
Would give them zero stars if I could Ordered shirts  they took 2 weeks longer than expected  and there is no one operating the company Tried contacting them to seek help  zero response 
DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY Not even sure if they still exist

Name: A7261
Content: I have shamelessly bought my entire t shirt collection from T Shirt Elephant I cant get enough of the unique designs Will wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone and everyone

Name: A7262
Content: Ordered tshirts for my bachelor party and they turned out great The ordering process was very easy especially putting names on the back Tshirts came on time  boys looked epic in the shirts

Name: A7263
Content: BEWARE They will hold you hostage even if you try to cancel your order 15 minutes after you placed it I wish I could give this place 0 stars Save your money and go to your local promotional supplier instead Low quality work from low quality people They ruined Christmas for my team

Name: A7264
Content: My shirt arrived and I love it Its big on me but thats my own fault because I think Im bigger than what I actually am lol Would definitely order again

Name: A7265
Content: We ordered merch and they printed it wrong They are holding our money hostage and they will not pay us back

Name: A7266
Content:
The worst quality shirts I have ever gotten Customer service refused to fix the problem and has purposely pushed communication so that she can clock out and go home for the day Extremely unprofessional company and terrible products 
This needs to be fixed

Name: A7267
Content:
Great products  fast shipping  great customer service 
Had an issue with a couple of sweaters in my order  they re printed them and sent them out to me very quickly

Name: A7268
Content: Not at all service friendly Very unsatisfied with product Faulty t shirt Picture came off after one washing The entire picture crazed Looks terrible  unable to wear Cheap product Never again purchase from this company

Name: A7269
Content: Printed out the exact shirt I wanted  which was pleasing As well it was shipped out quite fast Overall Elephant T Shirtis a good company for a good price

Name: A7270
Content: Was a little disappointed in the design process I was hoping for embroidery on the jacket I ordered but it came with a heat press Product was fine but there was a lack of communication and execution of process

Name: A7271
Content: Great quality  easy to design online and fast and free shipping Ive compared many companies for my custom apparel needs and this one is by far the best

Name: A7272
Content: I was hesitant to use this service due to several negative reviews  however I was extremely happy with the price  quality  and speed of my order I didnt receive a shipping confirmation  so the package was a bit of a surprise  but other than that everything was great

Name: A7273
Content: After hours of combing the internet and comparing many quotes these guys are always competitively priced Ive placed several tshirts/hoodie/hat orders with them now and I have consistently been impressed with quality  speed and customer service

Name: A7274
Content: I ordered merchandise and it was printed wrong My money is being held hostage and they are refusing to reimburse me

Name: A7275
Content: Product itself was good but shipped a week later than stated when purchasing without any notice Customer service was short  unclear  and unfriendly from first interaction on

Name: A7276
Content: Very professional and accurate Order was affordable and arrived promptly withing the expected shipment time I recommend T Shirt Elephant to all my friends

Name: A7277
Content: So user friendly  creative  fun  efficient  fair pricing and hyper fast delivery they announced 4 weeks and it took only one Very happy with the result  almost exactly as shown on the computer  which matters most Ill be back for more  thats a fact

Name: A7278
Content: Really disappointed with my order Ordered an XL as a gift and when it came it barely fit a medium Sizing chart wasnt something I found during my order Even then I expect an XL to at least be close to fitting but its tiny Ill be looking somewhere else for my custom work

Name: A7279
Content: Great customer service  great people  great product Highly recommend for your custom t shirt needs Online t shirt creator really easy to use

Name: A7280
Content: Ordered a hoodie for my son Love the quality of hoodie and they delivered it to us because they were a day late on order Great customer service and quality as well as price

Name: A7281
Content: Sadly  my order was delivered a lot later than it shouldve been  and was extremely expensive  but the end result was a product that was exactly as I had desired Im enjoy wearing it

Name: A7282
Content: Came very fast and is a soft  warm sweater Only default would be that the words on the front came slightly faded but other than that very good quality and will definitely be ordering soon

Name: A7283
Content: Overall happy with my large order but was disappointed to realize my sweat pants didn t have any pockets?? The fabric isn t heavy  that s basically what I wanted something light

Name: A7284
Content: Very nice quality printing with accurate colours and sharp definition Shirts are great quality and the website lets you pick from many options for shirt brands and styles Highly recommended

Name: A7285
Content: It was so fast and exactly what I ordered Unfortunately I was having a crazy day and mistakenly ordered youth shirts when I needed adult shirts but the product was great

Name: A7286
Content: We ordered hoodies with the logo on the front upper and on the back The hoodies are great They look good and are very warm and comfortable Totally recommend T shirt Elephant

Name: A7287
Content:
Ordered shirts for my business They sent the wrong design 5 weeks late and they wont respond for me to return them Im personally going to drive from Ottawa to Toronto next week to return them in person 
Ryan R

Name: A7288
Content: My first order of hoodies came fast & were great  the t shirts & hat took months & we were disappointed compared to the Hoodies

Name: A7289
Content: Easy to use design area  I uploaded my file and sized as required and placed my order Delivery was to be 14 days however  it arrived several days earlier than expected

Name: A7290
Content: Be aware that the size you order will show up 2 sizes small than the actual size Ridiculous Plus the  24 for the short and  12 for SLOW shopping makes this purchase nothing but a regret Dont waste your money folks

Name: A7291
Content: I appreciate the quality of material  prompt shipping and the fact that the shirt was color fasted before it was delivered to us Thanks so much for your great work

Name: A7292
Content: You guys did a fantastic job It turned out exactly how it looked in the online design centre and delivered prior to the expected time of completion A lil pricey with delivery charge but quality work Well done

Name: A7293
Content: I just got my order  the shirts I ordered were awesome I also had the best customer service experience ever with Rixa  they answered every question and concern I had when I first placed my order and made sure that I was going to get my order on time and it came early thanks so much guys

Name: A7294
Content: Ordered t shirts for a bachelor party Online design options were easy to use Final product looked great and delivery was fast

Name: A7295
Content: horrible experience good thing i didnt order my 200 shirts right away Will find a better place that treat their customers better and take the time to do a quality print They sure didnt

Name: A7296
Content: I ordered two custom made crewneck sweaters and they turned out fantastic The sweaters were even shipped earlier than expected I absolutely love this company

Name: A7297
Content: Excellent service I ordered three shirts  chose my own font  etc They arrived earlier than expected and were perfect thanks so much  Bev

Name: A7298
Content:
Great quality shirts/jackets and top notch printing on the material

Name: A7299
Content: It was easy to design and choose product They are fast and even message to make sure of one of my choices as it was the wrong color Fast shipping as well Thank you

Name: A7300
Content: Made a special order for team jerseys  and although there was an initial error  they were quick to fix it beyond expectations The quality of work was also very good

Name: A7301
Content: I placed an order on Jan 21 and didnt receive it until March 4th after paying  15 00 for shipping Turns out they knew my order would be delayed and didnt bother to contact me until I reached out to them twice via email

Name: A7302
Content: This company has the most incredible customer service We had a few issues totally on our end and they couldnt do enough to help us Ive used them a few times and tell absolutely everyone to use them aswell Couldnt rate it higher

Name: A7303
Content: I had a old black and white picture of our band of 35 years ago It was not the best quality black and white print copy I asked for a black and white  It came in as black and white contrast the faces a little grey It was fantastic and more than I expected Though black and white high contrast  you can easily tell who is who Some of the our equipment and back drop came out well Thank you

Name: A7304
Content: Ordered a couple shirts and they are good quality They arrived pretty quickly too Would recommend

Name: A7305
Content: Ive used T Shirt Elephant as a screen printing company for several years and theyve always been reliable  even during the pandemic I will continue to use them for years to come

Name: A7306
Content: I was VERY disappointed with this purchase The product which arrived was NOT the same as the product which I designed  and T Shirt Elephant was NOT helpful at all in resolving the issue I will NOT shop here again

Name: A7307
Content:
This team is awesome Had an issue with my most recent order lost count  contacted them and they had it resolved in Two days What great customer service 
I will order again and again and etc

Name: A7308
Content: The design site was easy to use  the price very reasonable with no minimum order limits  the order was completed  shipped and delivered well within the time frame and the quality is great Thanks

Content: T Shirts were decently done for qaulity but shipping and management was horrible I waited almost 2 months for my tshirts Would never buy from here again

Name: A7310

Name: A7311

Content: False advertising on website Not 100 made in canada not made in canada at all Also was weeks late shipping  and had extremely poor customer service Design also didnt match what we ordered  it wasnt far off but a good business wouldve told the client thered be a noticeable difference All around horrible experience

Name: A7313
Content:
The customer service is very good and the delivery was fast

Content: Website is awesome Makes it easy to order Fast delivery and the shirts are great Bored with t shirts? Make your own Its so much fun wearing something original

Content:
Spent over  800 on shirts and some of them didnt include the entire logo missing letters  So much for you guys varifying on your end 

Wont be ordering from you again

Content: AVOID I ordered 4 hats and 4 t shirts early Dec I still havent received the hats and Customer Service is now ignoring my emails This is currently in with credit card fraud department

Name: A7319

Name: A7320

Name: A7322

Name: A7324

Name: A7325

Name: A7327

Name: A7328
Content: Where is the  negative star I am beginning to this this web site is a SCAM It has been 1 5 months now since I ordered and paid    but have never received anything  but headaches from this place Customer service is a total joke BEWARE of this site

Name: A7332

Name: A7333

Name: A7339

Name: A7340

Name: A7341
Content: Fantastic High quality product and seamless design My order took just over a week to ship instead of the estimated 2 weeks

Name: A7342
Content: Unfortunately Google does not allow me to give a 0 This company does not know the meaning of customer service They take your money and then do nothing to fulfill the order in a timely manner Would never use them again and am telling everyone I know about their poor service

Name: A7343

Content: Although mistakes were made in the design process these should have been caught by quality control eg black text on a black shirt or white text on top of black text  Unfortunately they were unwilling to remedy the errors

Name: A7347
Content:
I have used T Shirt Elephant 4 times now  and every time my expectations have been surpassed Great product for an even greater price

Keep up the great work

Content: Great service and awesome looking tee They were great even after the recipient didnt check her stupid mailbox and the shirt was sent back thanks so much

Name: A7352

Name: A7353
Content: Great product  easy service to design my own shirts and fast turn around and delivery I will be back again

Content: One month 70 Dollar order No shipping notice or anything Scam company

Content: Ordered what I thought were youth sized hats  ended up with a toddler hats Customer service was not helpful at all I do not recommend anyone to use this company

Name: A7358
Content:
First order went well Second order was a mess  would not answer phones  did not return phone messages  order was shipped to the wrong address  shipping department does not communicate with customer service  mistakes in order Would give 1 star but full refund was issued 
Will be finding another company in the future

Content: Ive been trying and trying to get a hold of this company for over a month now to ask questions about a large order Id like to place and I havent heard back from them No emails  no return phone calls apparently Dave is always away from his desk  no response at all Going with someone else

Name: A7360

Name: A7361

Name: A7362
Content: good price for the crewneck sweater that i got customized  fast process of my order  got it in only 2 3 days by post to Quebec Comfy shirt ;

Name: A7363
Content: Excellent service Was very happy with my sweatshirts and the design was exactly as I expected Will definitely be ordering more

Name: A7364
Content:
This was my first time using T shirt Elephant
and am very happy Easy to use site and good quality for price point and fast delivery 

Thank you

Name: A7365
Content: Shirts are good Living in Australia was a slight issue as I had to email the designer to work it if  and how  the product could be sent Australia

Content:
great quality print  I actually got a picture of my dad on a shirt for his retirement party and the graphics turned out great  exactly how i wanted it and fast shipping 
Thank you

Name: A7368
Content: Im very happy with the hoodies that I ordered with them The website was super easy to use Their customer service is just AMAZING

Name: A7369
Content: My nephew loved the one of a kind T shirt  I designed for him Thank you for doing such an amazing job during this Pandemic

Name: A7370
Content: wish i could give it a zero  the service was horrible and overall jason was completely rude we had several questions and he left us waiting for weeks for a reply  not to mention that their phones never seemed to work yes the price is decent and the print is decent but for the service i will never be coming back to this place and i hope you guys heed mine and the other warnings and steer clear of this place

Name: A7371
Content: Sent an email and called in regards to changing order before it was shipped  but no one got back to me The order was shipped as the original order  I wasnt able to make any changes as the customer service is lacking

Name: A7372
Content: Bought the Liberal Tears shirt and Make Trudeau a Drama Teacher hat Awesome products Liberals are triggering all around me while I sip my beer in pure bliss Thanks T Shirt Elephant

Name: A7373
Content: I was really excited to get our logo done on sweatpants  however after receiving them you could clearly see where they ironed on the logo and see the edges that were starting to peal off I contact support but never heard back

Name: A7374

Name: A7375

Name: A7376

Name: A7380
Content: I ordered some shirts and a hoodie which arrived on time Good quality shirts Would buy from them again for sure

Name: A7381
Content:
Sizing was terrible Biggest XLs I have ever seen

have not received my order was supposed to arrive May 7

Content:

Name: A7410
Content:

Content: Very friendly and very helpful in helping us customize exactly what we wanted

Content: Love this store There very helpful with all my special orders Very friendly

Content: Quick and easy Got the banners I needed done in no time

Content: Ask for Terek he was awesome and fast Good Quality Work

Content: Great fast quality work Will recommend Thanks fellas

Content: Excellent An fast service shirts look amazing

Content: Quick return  great product Thank you

Content: Very good thanks for eveything you did for me

Content: Great place and they do a great job
