Name: A8584
Content: This store is your best option to print t shirts for any occasion  excellent service  promptness  quality materials and unbeatable prices I am very happy for all your excellent work Look no further  this is the best option for any occasion

Name: A8585
Content: The store keepers are very helpful and attentive They are always willing to help customers in the best way Highly recommended for any job

Name: A8586
Content: very good and fast

Name: A8587
Content:
I decided to make a branded tank top day before my trip to Disney I called the stores in downtown  and was told  we dont offer the same day service I was shocked 

T ShirGuys came to rescue I brought my own tank top They finished the job in less than 30 minutes The staff is super knowledgeable and nice I am extremely happy with the outcome and cant wear it in sunny Florida

Name: A8588
Content: We ordered swim team hoodies last few years They are thorough throughout the process  really easy and quick to communicate  reasonable  and the hoodies looked amazing  swimmers LOVE their hoodies Thank you

Name: A8589
Content: T shirtGuys is the best place to get your desired t shirt From the moment you enter at the store you find a place full of good energy and an adorable staff  the music and the atmosphere make you feel really comfortable The service is incredible  the result cannot be better They help you with everything  if you only have an idea  like I did They do all the design and print it on the same day Thanks for running this amazing place

Name: A8590
Content: Great experience Very quick turn around time on the hoodies I needed some printing done on Despite the photos not being 100 ready to process & print  Chris helped to prepare and finalize the artwork in order to properly print Great service  will definitely do business with Chris and co again

Name: A8591
Content: I walked in without an appointment asking for a custom t shirt that I needed made in the next 30 minutes Even though the owner was swimming in orders  he completed the order in 7 minutes and it was perfect Friendly service  and really care about making the customer happy

Name: A8592
Content: Had a terrific experience ordering custom t shirts here Connor was super helpful and the sample shirt looked so great that we got twice as many orders as expected The prices were also very reasonable Highly recommend

Name: A8593
Content:
I am incredibly thankful to Chris and his team because they went above and beyond to solve the issues I had First  I needed an express order and they delivered it same day They helped me make my scrappy graphics look better Then  the size I ordered didnt work  so  as soon as I paid  they sent me a new one  with the right size working late hours 
T Shirt Guys is the kind of business you want to work with The quality of the shirts and prints are good Also  theyre professional  reliable and friendly

Name: A8594
Content: If you want a t shirt  this is the ONLY place to go I had never had an image that I wanted to print onto a t shirt until recently I brought in my thumb drive with image The owner must have spent 30 minutes with my wife and me  carefully adjusting the color  deciding on the size of the image on the t shirt and of course fitting us perfectly The final product is exactly what I wanted The t shirt was made as we waited and the cost was less then we had anticipated Thank you TSHIRTGUYS CA Paul Hart

Name: A8595
Content: T Shirt Guys especially Joanna did a great job on our order There was a small issue that they quickly resolved Great customer service The shirts are comfortable and look great I will use their services again in the future

Name: A8596
Content: My team and I had a really good experience with T Shirt Guys We were helped by Ellen  who promptly responded all our inquiries and was attentive to our order The order was quick  accurate and the shirts were printed with premium quality

Name: A8597
Content: Definitely will recommend T ShirtGuys to anybody that asks I had a last minute order for my friends birthday and I reached out  with my fingers crossed Not only did I get my order the same day; they also waited until I arrived I was running late because of the extreme weather  As a Graphic Designer  its sometimes difficult to find people that will execute exactly what you asked for but the team at TShirtGuys made sure everything was what I wanted and more You will not regret giving them your business I surely will be back 20 thumbs up

Name: A8598
Content: The saying goes Good/Cheap/Fast pick two but I have to say T Shirt Guys delivered all three Made team shirts for our Don Valley Junior Mountain Bike gang and they were top notch the kids loved them

Name: A8599
Content: I am happy with the end result the service was really good as well Ellen was there to help me since the moment I got into the store and was very clear and helpful with the options and the possible ETA I would definitely would get my t shirts with them again

Name: A8600
Content: Their shop is no longer on Logan Ave They have moved to 554 College St  near Palmerston I found that out yesterday  the hard way Google reviews is not up to date Click their website As for quality etc  these folks are great I have no connection with them other than as a customer Twice now Would go again for sure

Name: A8601
Content: I had an absurd request to get a shirt printed in a few hours for a concert Jenny was beyond fantastic to deal with and made it all happen Highly recommend this place

Name: A8602
Content: These guys did a last minute job for a shirt that I needed for a 70th birthday  and they totally went above and beyond and delivered something that was even better than I originally had on order through Amazon Amazon let me down which gave me the opportunity to support a local business instead Lesson learned  just support the local business first   called and spoke with Jenny to discuss some embroidery work I needed done and was running out of time due to a weird situation with the first place I thought I had lined up She verbally confirmed embroidery was something they do and told me to come in the next morning They moved so it was a solid 30 minute drive from me but thats ok i needed the work done When I arrived I was very disappointed to hear that embroidery is NOT something they can do I was so clear when I spoke with Jenny about my needs so I dont understand where this went sideways A warning to anyone else caught in the same situation because although the owner is pleasant enough  he really didnt seem to care  ·

Name: A8603
Content:
I needed a tee made for my husband with very little notice for a special race he has coming up this weekend Several other places I called around to turned me away because they couldnt print just one  or they couldnt do same day  or they wanted an arm and a leg to rush the order Not to mention most of the people I spoke to were really rude 

Jenny was so accomodating and kind when I called in a desperate panic They were able to print it the same day at a reasonable rate When I went to pick it up I was met with warm staff Plus  the tee quality was amazing and exactly what I asked for I had such a great experience I will definitely be back Highly recommend

Name: A8604
Content: EXCELLENT I ordered a printed tote as a birthday gift and at first they didnt have my colour choice  but recommended a different colour It came time to pick it up and Jenny was completely honest and mentioned that the guys didnt like how it turned out They went above and beyond and reprinted it on a different tote and offered me both products And this is why we SHOP LOCAL Ill definitely be back when the time comes

Name: A8605
Content:
I had a very important gift request for a colleague who has been working with homeless men for 37 years and was retiring I went to the T Shirt Guys and made a request for the next day 
Katherine was incredibly helpful and accommodated my overnight request My colleague was incredibly happy with his gift and it meant a lot to me to be able to give it to him 
My experience with the T Shirt Guys was incredible The service was fast  helpful and of quality They were very friendly and I felt like I was important I would recommend them highly

Name: A8606
Content: I needed one t shirt for my 30 year highschool reunion I submitted the logo we were using for said reunion through their website and designed the shirt the way I wanted it customized The end result? I couldnt have asked for something better The shirt and print quality are excellent and the it took less than a week for my shirt to be ready Im so happy with their work All my classmates are so envious as they used a different service to print their shirts Most impressive T shirt guys

Name: A8607
Content:
T shirt Guys were absolutely amazing From the moment that I contacted them with the requirements of my order  the staff was extremely helpful Robyn worked hard with me to make sure I was able to get what I wanted and within my budget 

The product I ordered 10 tank tops were done ahead of schedule and came out AMAZING The quality is fantastic and the font was exactly as pictured 

I only have amazing things to say about this place Theyre definitely my go to for custom shirts

Name: A8608
Content: The T Shirt Guys were great They responded quickly  were professional and the shirts turned out perfect When I sent them my design  they responded with some advice on how to make it look better on a shirt Even though  it was only a very small order  they still seemed to really care that it turned out right

Name: A8609
Content: We had a fantastic experience with the T ShirtGuys They were able to complete our complicated order despite multiple changes to design  quantities and shipping locations Robyn was amazing about following up with phone calls and emails throughout the process  and went above and beyond to ensure that the all t shirts arrived at the events well in advance of our deadline The t shirts themselves were beautiful and well received by participants across the country We were very pleased with both the customer service and the product  and look forward to working with them again next year

Name: A8610
Content: I called the T Shirt Guys today to inquire about adding a name and number to the back of a hockey jersey I needed it done today  eeek They were very helpful on the phone and also in person when my husband took the jersey in to have the work done Thanks for the fabulous service

Name: A8611
Content: Im highly satisfied with my experience with T shirt Guys Recently Ive purchased a custom made shirt for my sons birthday and it turned out Ive made the best decision contacting their team The shirt looks awesome CJ was super helpful and treated me so well throughout the process of choosing the right size  font  colours and so on Im very very satisfied and definitely recommend T ShirtGuys What a great collaboration of talented artists working with great professionalism Very happy

Name: A8612
Content: Wonderful Company to work with  they got back to me so quick and the turn around was within hours They let me order 1 top which I have found through this process is not very common at the price in which I purchased Great quality In the

Name: A8613
Content: What a wonderful experience I had with the T Shirt Guys I ordered a sweatshirt via email  on very short notice They were extremely professional and contacted me instantly I received communications from them throughout every stage of production  of my one sweatshirt  Not even a large order When I picked it up  they made me aware of some irregularities and offered to have it remade  with a higher quality sweatshirt so the print would turn out better  at no extra cost to me Sarah was the person helping me  and she could not have been more friendly  professional  accommodating and wonderful She was a pleasure to deal with from start to finish I picked up my remade sweatshirt this morning and it is literally perfect I should also mention I have used them in the past for large orders for my business and I was equally impressed It was the owner Chris that helped me at that time He is absolutely lovely as well I never think to write reviews  positive or negative But my experience was so great it deserves to be put in writing Thank you T shirt Guys

Name: A8614
Content: Love working with the T Shirt Guys Recently purchased our 5th custom shirt order with them and  as usual  the service and end result were outstanding Ellen was awesome to work with and they got the job done last minute to meet our deadline They even went out of their way to make convenient pick up for us We will continue to use T Shirt Guys  they are amazing

Name: A8615
Content: The T Shirt Guys were amazing to deal with The customer service was first rate  they had our order ready in a few days in order for us to have the shirts for my sons birthday and this just 2 weeks prior to Xmas when Im sure they were run off there feet Not only that but the quality of the shirts is excellent and I got to shop local  which is always a bonus Will definitely be back for more and will highly recommend them to others

Name: A8616
Content: Ive ordered Tees from the T shirt Guys twice now  and both times I was incredibly impressed with the customer service  quality  and reliability of the company My order was always completed by the date promised When selling the Tees  Ive received countless compliments on the quality of the shirts I ordered the Gildan 100 cotton  The team is very pleasant and accommodating; Steven was especially great to work with I will definitely be going back again

Name: A8617
Content: This was absolutely the easiest process with the BEST product outcome Love Love Love the end product which was a gift I have tried some other places for custom printing  and have never been this satisfied Everything was perfect

Name: A8618
Content:
Working with T shirtGuys was an absolute pleasure I had a complicated graphic I wanted to print on a shirt and they worked so hard to make sure it happened They delivered the shirt to my house free of charge and it looked fantastic I was a bit disappointed that the graphic was not printed exactly where I wanted it on the shirt so I sent them an email to let them know and to thank them for their effort Knowing all businesses are suffering during this time  I was not expecting the following they printed me a new shirt and delivered it to my house at least a half hour drive from the store  free of charge They went above and beyond to make a customer happy
They were super friendly  very easy to work with and replied very quickly to emails I was very impressed with the quality of the soft and ultralight cotton shirt So comfortable After this positive experience  I would not go to anyone else besides T ShirtGuys I I look forward to using them in the future and would highly recommend them to anyone and everyone It would be a mistake to not use them for your T shirt needs

Name: A8619
Content: I came upon T Shirt Guys from the overwhelming positive reviews and they did not disappoint From the get go  when my print order was just an idea  Ellen provided very detailed information to help me decide on how I would like to print my shirt  Besides the great quality of the shirts and the printing  interactions with Ellen made working with T Shirt Guys a standout experience She is patient with follow up questions  and is always friendly and informative She kept communications open before the printing process so that I was clear on costs and also during production when designers had questions about my image files When there was an edit needed to translate digital to print  she called with solutions and was also open to dialogue with me and to adopt the option I was most comfortable with Besides the great quality of the prints  the collaborative experience Ellen facilitated was beyond expectations Highly recommend printing with T Shirt Guys

Name: A8620
Content: I ordered a t shirt about a week ago and today I finally picked it up It looks awesome  the colors look great and the quality of the print is really satisfying The service was fast and the price was acceptable Staff is very nice at the shop I will recommend T Shirt Guys to all my friends Thank you

Name: A8621
Content: Just had a small order of 2 shirts for a Christmas present and when I went to pick them up the shirts look great but unfortunately one was printed on the wrong type of shirt  I had specifically asked  and paid  for Bella & Canvas and it was substituted with American Apparel  I immediately emailed them and got a fairly short response that they use the two brands interchangeably and I would be refund the  2 difference I realize this is a small problem but I specifically asked for and wanted the Bella and Canvas shirt and not thrilled that they would use a cheaper  by  2 but still shirt that I would have paid more for had I not noticed the swap The printing is beautiful and the service was quick and friendly but I wont be able to recommend this business Maybe attention to detail could be something to work on in the new year

Name: A8622
Content: Fantastic quality  fantastic service They drove a shirt all the way across Toronto for a Mothers Day rush delivery  free of charge  and the shirt was sensational  I wouldnt expect this once the pandemic is over  but they were really amazing  and I will 100 work with them again The T shirt Guys made it very easy to support local businesses Thanks

Name: A8623
Content: T ShirtGuys is awesome I did two separate  small quantity orders with them in 2018 and both turned out excellent I think their pricing is quite reasonable for quality  professionally made custom t shirts I ordered small quantities both times 1 or 2 t shirts only and it was under  40 per shirt  which I think is very reasonable considering its custom work Ellen handled my orders both times and was extremely communicative  helpful and friendly And the most recent time  I needed rush service for which I paid  10 and they turned around my custom order within 48 hours so I could send it out in time for Christmas All around excellent service and quality products here Highly recommend Thanks T ShirtGuys

Name: A8624
Content: Did an order of 36 pieces and couldnt have been happier The team accommodated my needs and I was very specific in my request and they were able to meet our expectations Quality on the garments were better if not the best weve seen compared to the other places in Toronto We will be doing our printing here from now on and only have great things to say about T ShirtGuys The team is really helpful  spent a lot of time answering my questions and giving me great recommendations Customer service has been superb 

Name: A8625
Content: Weve worked with TSG for the past 8 months printing for our independent Canadian apparel line Their attention to our business needs and dedication to quality work is unmatched They also happen to be a sheer pleasure to work with Theyre experts in production and we often lean on them for advice in realizing our creative vision We honestly feel that they care about our business and our customers  a quality hard to come by in other production partners we tried working with Support this business Theyre the real deal

Name: A8626
Content: Over the past couple of weeks  I have had the pleasure of working with T shirt Guys on multipole rush orders Every order was completed on time and sometimes much earlier than requested The quality of the printing is impeccable Ellen and the t shirt family are fabulous to work with

Name: A8627
Content:
T shirt guys has the best customer service I have ever seen We were really intrigued by the printing process and they showed us how it was done 

Really glad to support this local business  they really accommodate and put in the extra mile Our sublimation print turned out great thanks to Steven    We will be back for more

Name: A8628
Content: The T shirt guys are AMAZING to work with We had a a large  last minute order that they managed to complete ahead of schedule at a very affordable rate They have been so helpful and exceeded our expectations I strongly recommend them and will be working with them in the future

Name: A8629
Content: If youre looking for the best possible people to get your job done right  look no further T Shirt Guys are the best company out there for all your apparel needs  this is the 3rd time Ive come to them with a project and the results speak for themselves Huge supporters of front line workers I could not ask for a better result 11/10 would recommend

Name: A8630
Content: Great customer service  Ellen was the one in charge of my order The staff there is really friendly I went there to get some t shirts printed  and the t shirts were supposed to be ready in 5 days  but it only ended up taking 2 days for the t shirts to be ready for pick up The t shirts turned out

Name: A8631
Content:
T Shirt Guys were great I had sent them a email with a custom shirt I had in mind I had also explained in my email that I had gotten t shirts made before from other companies and really didnt enjoy them based on quality They were able to help me pick a colour for the shirt where the photo I wanted would show up great I really appreciated this 

They were very fast to respond easy to get a hold of

Name: A8632
Content:
I had a great experience with T Shirt guys They helped me print 15 shirts for a party The party guests loved the quality of the shirts and the T Shirt guys staff were all great and lovely to work with Would recommend
Shout out to Ellen  Robyn and the nice guy who always greeted me at the door

Name: A8633
Content: The customer service is fantastic I ordered 2 custom printed sweaters and they turned out nicely As someone who is in service This service was exceptional

Name: A8634
Content: T ShirtGuys were nothing short of amazing The pricing was very fair  turnaround time on a tight timeline was all I could have asked for and they kept me up to date with my order status from start to finish Personal shout out to Ellen  thank you for walking me through the process and for your kindness and professionalism Do not go anywhere else for your T shirt needs  best in Toronto

Name: A8635
Content: The sign of a good business is when every single person you chat with is genuinely helpful and easy to talk to On top of that  the quality is awesome and their response is fast I was initially going to use another company to have shirts printed but their customer service won me over and put my mind at ease Highly recommended and will definitely keep going to them for future needs

Name: A8636
Content: I have used Tshirt Guys several times over the years and have always had a great experience They have printed on hats  t shirts  hoodies and technical performance jackets  and have had great results each time I was particularly impressed with my most recent experience there as I was a bit pressed for time and they came up with a fantastic logo and had a dozen jackets printed for me well under the deadline that I needed them for Always friendly customer service too

Name: A8637
Content:
Very very happy with the Tshrt Guys and Ladies 

We had a job to do  in a huge rush  with some special requirements Even though wed never done business with them before  they and specifically  Ellen was super responsive  helpful  and accommodating I was in a beggars cant be choosers situation but when I stepped foot into their shop I knew I was in good hands Really impressed with their diverse capabilities and options got lots of ideas for next time  and Ellen helped advise me on how to do this better and cheaper next time  and will definitely be using them in the future

Name: A8638
Content: Great place I had a rush order for a single shirt No design or really any sense of how I wanted it to look except not wanting vinyl letters Everyone was great in helping me figure out my options  and Ellen was particularly accommodating of some after the last minute changes I wanted Will definitely be back

Name: A8639
Content: I really enjoy getting things printed here The staff are really friendly and positive The whole atmosphere in the store is very homey and I really like that I love their quality output too Every time that Ive gotten something printed by these guys  it turns out exactly how I envisioned it to look Theyll constantly be in contact with you to make sure that you get exactly what you want and I really appreciate their patience with me since Im so specific Overall  Im glad to have found them and will 100 be going back with my next project

Name: A8640
Content: Simply the best My Husband is very finickity and had only the vaguest concept of what he wanted Im not sure how  but the Staff worked through the process in detail to suit him and gave us the simply best tees ever at a great price  And such a great logo Thanks Chris et al

Name: A8641
Content: This place is fantastic  I needed to print a shirt for a gag gift  and Ellen was very helpful She even had the designer improve the design to make it better quality  totally went above and beyond Of course I left it to the last minute but they did a rush order for me and the shirt was ready in 1 business day So impressed

Name: A8642
Content: I had a mishap with another company  and called t shirt guys for emergency help I needed an order within 24 hours  and had the best experience I could have hoped for Ellen was so kind and patient over the phone  took my order exactly as I needed  and had everything ready in a few hours with no issues The apparel came out perfectly So so happy and thankful for this Made an otherwise embarrassing situation into a fantastic one Thank you so much

Name: A8643
Content: I had to get uniforms made with a very tight turn around time The staff were very patient with the many questions I had and always gave very helpful and informative answers promptly They were able to meet my short deadline and my uniforms turned out perfectly I highly recommend the T shirt Guys for quality as well as great service

Name: A8644
Content: My experience With T Shirt Guy was quit amazing Their service was top quality They assist me with my beautiful ATTRACT design Clock Logo T shirt  if you go unto their IG page youll see all their amazing work I cant the staff enough  working with Robyn was the best Thank you again T shirtguy

Name: A8645
Content: Most places I visited gave me a few minutes at best when I walked through their doors  but the T shirt Guys gave me all the time I needed to discuss my needs And it didnt stop there Their support continued through every step of the process The staff is great at developing a personal relationship with the client Plus  I couldnt be happier with the print job they did on the T shirts I ordered

Name: A8646
Content: Just placed a big order 300 shirts  nearly as many sweaters  Ellen was patient with us as we figured out what would be best for our needs design  colours  materials  Wrangling that many people wasnt easy but Ellen was patient  helpful and even anticipated our needs by contacting suppliers ahead of time to make sure our different order choices would be possible This review could never clearly show how helpful she was

Name: A8647
Content: From the moment I began communicating with The T Shirt Guys I knew I had made the right decision I worked with Katharine who guided me through the whole process and now we have the perfect t shirts for our film festival I will definitely work with The T Shirt Guys again and I highly recommend them for personal or professional designs

Name: A8648
Content:
They did a great job with the shirts My team liked the final product The only advice that I have is that they should provide more specifications about the kind of image/logo that they need to be print in the shirts 
They also expedite my order and I highly appreciate this service Cheers

Name: A8649
Content: I had an amazing experience with T ShirtGuys and more specifically Ellen The crewnecks I ordered turned out just how I wanted them and everybody was happy with them The order came quickly after I ordered them and the two way communication was quick and helpful  Ellen was always there to answer my questions Would definitely order from here again

Name: A8650
Content: They are really great  they designed the t shirts just the way I expected to be and they did a really great job Even though I needed the shirts urgently  they were able to make the shirts within 24 hrs Also  their customer service was really great

Name: A8651
Content: Not only are the T Shirt guys talented  theyre also a really fun bunch of people Always love the results I get from this uber talented team I got the shirts I ordered in 2 days  and just in time for Christmas  thank you Steven Oh man  what time is it at Kathys right now? Highly recommend this place

Name: A8652
Content: Steven is very helpful and patient to provide me very clear instruction & friendly reminders to order the T shirts for our company We are all very happy with the products The production is efficient and great quality Delivery is on time Thank you again for your help

Name: A8653
Content: I experienced such great customer service with these guys The first day I walked in to figure out the details of how to get my custom shirts made for my company  the gentleman out front helped me out for 3 hours answering all my questions and telling me things to be aware of I was in there that long because I wanted to understand and process all the details and I had a lot of questions Not once did I feel rushed to make my decisions I also needed the shirts done in a timely fashion  and they definitely pulled through They are knowledgeable  passionate  and very honest I would totally recommend these guys if youre needing your t shirts done

Name: A8654
Content: I was looking to have an odd shirt printed in a shirt time  I contacted the T shirt Guys  and after providing some simple text  their creative wheels spun and produced EXACTLY what I was hoping for Great  great job by these guys I wouldnt hesitate to recommend and/or return I cant wait to gift the shirt this weekend Thanks for all the awesome work and the quick turnaround time

Name: A8655
Content: Fast  friendly  professional service from the moment I walked in with questions to when I picked up my order a few days later Shirts came out exactly as I wanted them and the team stayed in touch through the process to manage expectations on a tricky tone on tone print Good price breaks on higher quantities Highly recommended   Ill be a repeat customer

Name: A8656
Content:
Ive been using the T Shirt Guys for a few years now and they never disappoint The quality is great and so is the turn around time 
Ellen  youre the best Always so helpful and friendly Ill be back for more

Name: A8657
Content: They did an excellent job on a short notice All is professionally done they way they present themselves  their customer service  the flow of the work; the final product  the quality of shirt material  and print The only thing to improve would be if the T Shirt Guys would offered free express delivery I had to pick it up  If it is on a short notice  you will also have a rush fee

Name: A8658
Content: Chris and his team were so accommodating to me Even during everything that is going on in the world  they still delivered incredible service and did an amazing job with my order I am so happy to have found a company that makes it so easy + accommodating Highly recommend

Name: A8659
Content: T Shirt Guys were super fun  relaxed and professional to deal with Lovely sales staff helped get everything set up effortlessly  and made some really thoughtful suggestions to achieve the best result possible I had a kids sweater and tshirt made and they came out looking perfect with just a few days turnaround Im going back

Name: A8660
Content:
Very happy with the service T ShirtGuys provided After being let down by another supplier  I was surprised and delighted that T ShirtGuys were able to fill my larger order quickly  with great quality and at a very reasonable price 

I wouldnt hesitate to recommend them to anyone looking to get some t shirts printed

Name: A8661
Content:
As a student run course union supporting over 500 students within the Creative Industries program at Ryerson University  there was a lot of pressure to deliver professional and affordable merchandise for our 2019 2020 school year Lauren was extremely helpful in ensuring all of our questions were answered and concerns addressed Emails were always responded to in a timely manner  and communication always clear and direct We also appreciated Laurens thoughtful recommendations and suggestions along the way

From screen printed t shirts  crewnecks and tote bags to embroidered caps and beanies  T Shirt Guys exceeded all expectations and truly brought our design to life The design came out perfect on all garments  and Lauren and the team at T Shirt Guys were friendly and accommodating throughout the entire process Thanks to Lauren and T Shirt Guys all of our students wear their merchandise with pride

Name: A8662
Content: T shirt guys has been doing a great job printing high quality t shirts with a quick turnaround for our new brewery They have been very responsive and easy to work with Much appreciated

Name: A8663
Content: Just picked up my bulk order from them Very compensating and very patient workers I really respect their work and hope this business continues to help young entrepreneurs like myself succeed in the business world Anyone who needs custom hoodies and t shirts  go to these guys  they are amazing they do not disappoint

Name: A8664
Content: Awesome experience Ellen helped me minimize the cost of my order  made slight modifications to my design for me  had the order finished ahead of schedule  and the shirts look great Will definitely be using them again in the future

Name: A8665
Content: Walked in and was greeted by Steven He was super helpful and friendly with making sure everything about my order would go smoothly He answered questions enthusiastically and gave his opinion in terms of sizing for the designs which was super helpful I would definitely come back if I have other t shirt designs to have printed

Name: A8666
Content:
All I can say is Clint and the team are magicians or used to be Great customer service from start to end  exceptional quality  delivered rush order and great end result Ill certainly be going back again 

Keep it up lads

Name: A8667
Content: Ive been using the T Shirt Guys for years Every order has exceeded my expectations Always very satisfied with the quality and turnaround time of my custom shirts and the fantastic customer service is a plus

Name: A8668
Content: I use T Shirt Guys quite often for work  and they have always been incredible to me They are incredibly easy to work with  return emails quickly and every order has always been on time I cant recommend them enough

Name: A8669
Content:

Content:

Content: Working with T Shirt Guys was such an easy and great process Katherine was wonderful when it came to answering my questions and ensuring that we received the product that we envisioned Will definitely work the team again

Name: A8673
Content: It was a pleasure having the opportunity to visit T shirt guys on Logan Street I was greeted with open arms and very welcomed by their frontline representatives I was able to find quality selection and work with a knowledgable staff especially Joanna who took my order over the telephone and promptly responded with my order Joanna and their team has gone above and beyond to ensure quality of service  knowledge in the printing industry and working with fair cost and quality control I look forward to my next visit at T shirt guys

Content: The T shirt guys definitely deliver Great customer service Joanna was great  attentive and professional i will be doing business with her again The Designers did an amazing job on the custom shirt i wanted

Name: A8675
Content: The store manager and her team did an amazing job helping us get a custom t shirt It was our first time doing anything like this and they answered all of our questions quickly and with patience Highly recommended

Name: A8676
Content: Very last minute I called these guys up to have bachelorette tanks made They made the process so easy  quick and inexpensive The tank and print quality exceeded expectations and they were ahead of schedule I will 100 use them again and highly recommend to anyone

Name: A8677
Content: Very happy with the service I received from the T Shirt Guys Ellen in particular I made a last minute request  and they were able to fulfill my order quickly and the shirts turned out beautifully

Name: A8678
Content: These guys were able to accomodate my quick turn around needs Excellent quality of t shirts and printing The clients were thrilled with their t shirts I will definitely use them again Thank you to the team at T Shirt Guys

Name: A8679
Content: Always a great experience Chris and his staff have come up with some super designs and paired them with quality products that my clients love Not just logo wear  these are cool tees that people will want to wear all the time Highly recommended

Name: A8680
Content: We had a wonderful experience with The T Shirt Guys Casey was easy to reach and answered all my questions promptly The whole process was quick and easy We love the finish product and look forward to placing another order

Name: A8681
Content: This is the THIRD time Ive come to T ShirtGuys for my t shirts and tank tops Whats amazing is that on top of the fact that they do such good work and they always try their best to give you the best deal out there  they still manage to blow me away with the level of customer service they provide me Ive been with them for over 2 years now and I probably see them once a year and yet  I still truly feel like a valued customer  not just a random walking in from the streets I tell all my friends and clients about them and theyve all been very pleased with their projects as well I would never think about getting my stuff printed anywhere else

Name: A8682
Content: Ordering through T Shirt Guys was a top notch experience From a quick turnaround  to wonderful customer service and a product that was above and beyond expectations  I couldnt recommend this company enough 10/10

Name: A8683
Content: Ive had a positive experience working with T Shirt Guys This is my second order with them and both times I had no issue getting what I needed I own a small business and love being able to support another local small business I would certainly recommend this company to friends

Name: A8684
Content:
If you are looking for a fast & good service as well as high quality results  dont think twice T Shirt Guys is your choice From a single shirt for a birthday present to the promotional products of your next campaign  they will be there for anything you need 
And if you are even lucky to deal with Ellen you will go home with a smile

Name: A8685
Content:
I have worked with a lot of T Shirt companies both nationally and internationally and I can confidently say Ive never received such amazing customer service I worked with a Customer Service Rep named Tara and such an easy process from start to finish 

I highly recommend The T Shirt Guys the next time you need customized designs or printing

Name: A8686
Content: We order a t shirt for our boss last day  I called the t shirt guys it was short notice n the pull through to have it ready for us The t shirt really did impress our boss she loved it and they did an amazing job Thabk you T shirt guys I will definitely recommend you guys in any near future orders I have I will be using you thank you for amazing job

Name: A8687
Content:
Ive had the pleasure of working with the T SHIRT Guys a number of times and each time for 200+ item orders of multiple sizes Each year I create and design a personal thank you gift for my cast and crew This is a good number of people and each year more are added as this has become a sort of tradition over our 13 seasons of Murdoch Mysteries The team at TSG are very good at sorting out your art  setting up  adjusting and prototyping They have lots of options and the service is always friendly even if Im a noob and give them impossible timelines 
Thanks for another successful run of shirts again this year Katherine 

Yannick Bisson

Name: A8688
Content: Staff is helpful even though they could use more help at times to deal with all customers Got a damaged shirt in my order They gave a credit for the damaged shirt and made a replacement shirt free of charge Quick response via email from employees Good experience overall

Name: A8689
Content: T Shirt Guys have an amazing design staff  knowledgeable sales team  and top notch production crew who are able to accomplish whatever projects you put in front of them One of my favourite things about TSG is that they are always looking for new products and methods to offer to their clients  and there are many more exciting things to come For all of your printing needs  T Shirt Guys is my recommendation hands down

Name: A8690
Content:
This team will work with you to help you obtain the best possible results Im so happy with our finished shirts  I would and do recommend them to anyone searching for a high quality clothing printer 
Give them a chance  their selection and print quality cant be beat

Name: A8691
Content: T ShirtGuys have helped us for numerous events over the last 4 years small orders to large  we always trust them to get our shirts ready on time so no one is disappointed The job is done well  on time and priced right

Name: A8692
Content: Amazing  attentive customer service Came here to get t shirts printed for a memorial for a friend who passed away and they made sure the design and outcome came out exactly to our liking The owner Chris went out of his way to get the best results and was more than compassionate about the situation Would come here again

Name: A8693
Content: Great overall knowledge and end product Our T shirts look great I would rate them 5 out of 5  however we have not had our T shirts long enough to determine how long the ink will last Stay tuned for a possible future update

Name: A8694
Content: Walked in and received immediate and helpful service They recommended sizes  styles and provided quick turnaround on images drafts This is the 4th time weve used T Shirt Guys we will definitely use them again

Name: A8695
Content:
My service provider was Ellen and she was fantastic Good communicator  met timelines  Good listener I am so pleased with my order and will recommend the TShirt Guys to others 
Darlene

Name: A8696
Content: The purchasing of our orders of t shirts and aprons was a simple and enjoyable experience due to the efficient and cooperative staff at The T Shirt Guys The order was ready quickly  the quality of their items is tops  and the pricing is reasonable Thank you Guys See you next time

Name: A8697
Content: Leave a deposit and pay the rest when you get your shirts They inverted my logo and its taking longer than they told me it would take to fix I trust that these guys are really good at what they do  and mistakes happen  but just be cautious Safe bet would be to leave the deposit down and pay the rest when you get your correct shirts Im sure I will shop there again once its all done and made right

Name: A8698
Content: Not only was I in a rush to have a couple tshirts made  but I also wanted a specific printing style Plus  I didnt have time to make it into the store so this was all done over the phone I went into the store a bit nervous because I couldnt pick exactly what material I wanted  but was pleasantly surprised with my order The TShirt Guys did an amazing jod at providing me with as much detail as possible about my order before hand and even sent me draft mock ups of the placement of my text and image that was going on the TShirt I would recommend them to any one looking to purchase custom apparel and I will be going back for future orders Thanks again

Name: A8699
Content: Poor customer service Staff did not help clients in order I arrived before someone else and he was helped before me  And then I placed an order and paid and found out the next day that they didnt have the colours I ordered The stock was fine when you placed the order  sometimes we run into an issue where the stock depletes in within the hour That is out of our control as our supplier is a major Canadian garment provider Our apologies  but it does happen  all we can do is try and switch colours to an available option I only ordered 2 toddler t shirts and would expect they would put these aside when I paid Or at least provided some kind of discount since they were not able to provide what I paid for

Name: A8700
Content: Our basketball players and coaches love the championship sweatshirts we got Ellen was great to work with and answered our questions quickly and thoroughly We will be back to order more  when we win again

Name: A8701
Content:
Fast and efficient Got my shirts done in less than 4 days

Only complaint is that they wont keep my credit card on file so I can order from them faster

Great job guys  see you soon

Name: A8702
Content: My late mother in law had a wonderful shortbread recipe and baked it every holiday To honour her memory I had decided to have permanent copies of the recipe printed With the help of the T ShirtGuys  particularly Katherine and Steven  I was able to create the best Christmas gifts ever I worked with Katherine just under 2 weeks My original 12 year old  typed copy was formatted in a new layout; three different font sizes and font styles were chosen  and 23 lines of text were perfectly spaced over the 18x26 area of a cotton tea towel I brought in 5 tea towels of varied quality and patterns to be tested and used for printing One minor adjustment was made in the first printing and all remaining results were successful In the end  17 tea towels were printed with  Helens Christmas Shortbread recipe I dont imagine this was a huge order for the T ShirtGuys but it was a very special order for me  near and dear to my heart I feel that Katherine and Steven put as much care  effort and thought into my small printing needs as they would have with any bigger project The people who received these early Christmas gifts were quite touched  as one family member said   Marking the first Christmas without Mum was so right and enshrining one of her loving annual traditions in a pretty tea towel  ahhh  Thank you T ShirtGuys Thank you Katherine and Steven It was the most gift giving fun for me  ever  Jean Simon

Name: A8703
Content: Had my pets picture printed on a pillow   I love it

Name: A8704
Content: We have used T Shirt Guys for several projects and are always happy with the customer service and the quality of the product It is especially nice that you can do small orders at a reasonable price

Name: A8705
Content:

Content: I ordered some branded baseball T shirts for work and they look awesome Service was great and timely and I love supporting local businesses Highly recommend and would order from them again Great price too

Content: I absolutely LOVE T Shirt Guys Ive ordered from them several times now over the last couple years and I couldnt be more happy with the quality of the product and the service Cant wait to do business again Thanks

Name: A8708
Content: It was effortless easy and pleasant My first foray in branding my business onto T Shirts and Julian made it fun  simple and affordable They have an outstanding selection and I received the help I needed from the entire team to make it all come together beautifully Thanks T SHirt Guys

Name: A8709
Content: Had 3 shirts printed out about a week ago and the customer service was great They are also really quick to respond to emails and when they make a mistake they are quick to fix it Thanks to Casey for helping me along with my order

Name: A8710
Content: I was very happy with the communication and end result of the T shirts for my business The quality is amazing and it was done super fast I am sure I will use them again

Name: A8711
Content: I have used the TShirt Guys a number of times and each time their service has been impeccable They are friendly  helpful and were able to manage some fast turnaround times for me Very easy to deal with  I would recommend to anyone

Name: A8712
Content: I called just about every shirt printing company in the GTA and nobody could print the shirts I wanted The only ones who could do it were the T Shirt Guys Great customer service combined with quality work equals an overall great experience For me  theres no other place Id go to get this type of work done

Name: A8713
Content: Ellen and the staff at T Shirt Guys were very friendly  helpful and accommodating to the many requests + inquiries that I had for our staff t shirts and hoodies Their responses to e mails and telephone calls were prompt Thanks for all of your help As Arnold would say  Ill be back

Name: A8714
Content:
The owner is rude and abusive 

I had them confirm for my quote  twice  that I was going to go through with the order on the condition that the shirts were made in North America After I paid for and received my shirts  the tag said they were made in Bangladesh 

Clearly  they made a mistake which I was willing to overlook as long as they remedied the situation They offered a refund  but I was shocked when the owner then had the nerve to start an argument with me based on his feelings about the situation and yell at me over the phone for his mistake claiming that I was trying to scam him because no one could possibly expect to have a shirt printed for  30 each from North America which  by the way  I have already found at a different store for  32 each  American Apparel  He then proceeded to tell me how wrong I was to want shirts made in North America in the first place His behaviour was nothing short of rude  abusive and completely inappropriate towards anyone let alone his paying customers There are plenty of other options in Toronto

Name: A8715
Content: Amazing service Very helpful Very pleased with my shirt design and purchase Will be going back for more

Name: A8716
Content:
Three rounds of short run orders and these guys were gold Special shout out to Ellen especially for handling my chaos like a pro
Super pleased with both the quality and service 
Will be back

Name: A8717
Content: I have worked with similar companies in the past and T Shirt Guys really stood out Very impressed with the professionalism of the team I worked with  the speed of creation  and the quality of the product  not to mention the price itself I highly recommend

Name: A8718
Content: Fantastic quality products  quick turn around time and overall top notch customer service Shout out to Katherine for going above and beyond to get us the stock we needed Highly recommend TShirt Guys

Content: I had a last minute order for a baseball game T shirt guys were attentive  professional  and managed to fulfil my request in a short amount of time Ellen had empathy and cared about my satisfaction Thank you for your patience T shirt Guys

Name: A8723
Content: Our event was a huge success thanks to the help of the T shirt Guys Their high quality prints added a playful element to our staffs uniform and brought a smile to guests faces as food was served

Name: A8724
Content:
What a Motley Crew
I love how I wanted to print stupid shirts for a gag and needed 8 of them and they directed me to a route that would be quick  easy and very low budget What a bright shiny place with a cast and crew that will make you laugh then offer you a freezey in the summer or a cookie when its cold 
I stopped in a few times over the years and its forever changing and growing 
I love how they have 3 clocks side by each with toronto  hamilton and someone named Cathy all with different times 
There are a couple of really cute dogs that I was welcomed to bring my Max in to make friends with 
Everyone is always warm and friendly Often with a side chat about what someone else suggest they all have a great eye for design and will help you make the most out of your branding 
All in all this has been my go to shop for all my cafe merch

Name: A8725
Content:

Content: Super prompt and efficient service Will definitely order again

Name: A8796
Content: Great service  great selection and great talent I would recommend this company to anyone

Name: A8797
Content:
Bought a custom large canvas for 220  Paid in advance Told me it would take 2 weeks to get 2 weeks turned into 3  3 into 4 and everytime I contacted them I got the runaround that it was almost ready and theyd call me soon 

A full 31 days after I had given them my money  I went to the Atwater store before being told it was ready but at Eaton Center store but after getting there the employee told me they didnt have the frame Asked for a refund and the employee had to call someone who I figured was the manager We agree to a refund They have to send it by email transfer though for some reason 

3 hours later get a call telling me my canvas is ready and I have to come pick it up I tell the woman I already agreed to a refund and she just hangs up without a word 

5 days later I call to see whats up woth the refund and that I want to talk to a manager I get the runaround and a promos that the manager will call me back within the hour 8 hours later  no call  no text  no email 

I consider my money now simply lost AVOID AT ALL COST they will scam you wihout a second thought

Name: A8798
Content: Very lovely service  it didnt take him long to customize the hoodie I wanted  it was awesome

Name: A8799
Content:
I was super excited to get my custom shirt There was a new employee who helped me was very helpful The shirt took about 20 minutes to print 

When I returned there was a heavy set man who I assumed was the manager or the owner He was so disrespectful He acted as if he was doing me a favour by being there He was so bad I considered taking my money elsewhere but I had already paid and knew this guy wasnt the person who was going to help me get a refund Maybe that was the reason for the attitude? He knew I had already paid so I would just have to take it 
On top of the terrible treatment  the shirt started chipping within a few weeks So  the service was terrible  the product was over priced and the quality was ultimately lacking GO ELSEWHERE

Name: A8801
Content: Loved these customs clothes for my Podcast Service from Armias was A+ Couldnt be happier  will be going back for more custom clothes

Content:

Content: I was in charge of placing orders for our Elementary Schools Pink Shirt Day Kindness shirts I chose to place our order with Xfinity Media based on the many good things people had to say in the reviews as well as their solid online presence Im so glad I did  they did not disappoint in their production of the shirts Communications were timely  customer service was fantastic and everyone was very excited to receive their orders A very big thank you to Gurnoor and his team for their precision in ordering and production  I would definitely recommend their services again

Content: Incredible place with terrific service  attention is given to the details Really nice genuine people and super fair with the prices A wide variety of apparel and items to choose from Professional and diligent when it comes to their craft I would definitely recommend Xfinity Media for your printing and apparel needs they make for great gifts

Content: Came across this company while walking by and noted the number down Must say that Gurnoor is exceptional to deal with Promptly replies to email and or phone calls Everything was explained to me and a detailed copy of the invoice was always provided Tshirt prints were always done in a timely manner and he even showed me the quality of the shirts prior to the order Weve used this business a few times and wont be going anywhere else Its nice to see great customer service and attention to detail being provided throughout my experience Thank you for helping us

Name: A9122
Content: Superb customer service  from the first moment we got in touch to picking up the end product it was a very pleasant experience He was quick to respond to my emails and the turnaround time for the mock up was very prompt I would definitely use them again if we need to put in another order of t shirts and other swag items Thank you thank you

Name: A9125
Content: We ordered shirts for a group trip from Xfinity Media and we were very happy with the product The quality of the shirts was excellent and the design was exactly what we wanted We placed the order very last minute but they were ready on time and better than what we had expected Would definitely go back to order more products for next time

Content:

I ordered merchandise for my team for our upcoming film  and not only were the results high quality and comfortable  but the process gave me a piece of mind that one needs with large or small orders 

I was able to walk in with any requests  to check up on the order  and call for any questions I had The owner loves to explain the work and makes sure his customers are absolutely satisfied 

Expect nothing less than excellence

Name: A9130
Content: I used Xfinity Media for two different groups at my secondary school that I am staff of I chose Xfinity BC he uses Champion products and I knew they would be good quality I really enjoyed my experience with Xfinity BC Gurnoor took his time helping me design the two different designs It took a while but he never rushed my thoughts  fonts  colour choices and I always agreed with his experienced advice which was so helpful too During the order process  he kept me updated on when the hoodies would be ready When I picked them up  I was extremely happy The colours we chose were vibrant and even better than I expected All the students loved them as well I am so pleased with everyone working at Xfinity and will be using them in the future for sure

Content: I had gotten a custom printed hoodie for an anniversary gift and it was absolutely amazing Not only was the print itself perfect  the hoodie seemed like it was good quality  especially with how reasonable the price was I had communicated with them a few days in advance and they seemed very very focused on customer service I would absolutely use their service again  100 recommend

Content: Amazing service The joggers and hoodie set that I got made were very well done  high quality and truly the best customer service Barbara was super flexible and went above and beyond to make sure that my custom Christmas gift was done on time and with a smile Thank you  thank you  thank you

Content: The t shirt I order was indeed ready the next day and I came out looking absolutely fantastic The printing quality is excellent and the shirt fits like a glove I absolutely would recommend ordering from this company

Name: A9252
Content: NextDay Tshirts literally took my last minute order for Halloween and had it ready the next day I was thrilled with the customer service  timing and the outcome Price was also reasonable My son had his first Halloween in a cute custom onesie that wouldnt have been possible with NextDay Tshirts

Content: Excellent service The owner is very communicative and helpful I had a t shirt with transfer on front and back made The production was quick and high quality Beautiful presentation of the final product

Content: Such an amazing experience  I would give more than 5 stars if I could Barbara is phenomenal from the speed of delivery to her kindness and accommodation we reached out last minute to get 55 shirts done for our event with all of our sponsor logos and assets Barbara got the shirts done in time when every other store we reached out to said no and they looked awesome  we got so many compliments on them Would highly recommend and we will be using her service again for sure

Name: A9255
Content: We contacted Next Day T shirts based on just looking for a local place to order t shirts for our Childhood Cancer Awareness Month event at McMaster Childrens Hospital It was luck that we called this place first as the experience was better than we could have hoped for Barbara was happy to work with us and was caring enough to give me suggestions on how our design could be improved so the t shirts would look as good as possible our original design was not very clear  She was quick to respond to calls and e mails and was able to make our large order in time for our event The shirts were organized and boxed at pick up and she offers payment options online or in store The shirts were so fantastic great quality shirts that we ended up needing to order about 15 more and she was able to make them for us very fast The shirts really made our event They showed a staff that was dedicated to our patients and it made the families so happy We were able to order t shirts for all our patients as well and many parents were touched and the kids were THRILLED I know I could have ordered shirts online  anonymous  from a business far away and had them shipped in but the end result would have been different Barbaras investment in wanting to ensure our shirts were as nice as possible and dedication to making sure we got them in time made the difference Those shirts really brought together a team of staff and patients to show that we are strong  united and dedicated to fighting childhood cancer EVERYONE SMILED THAT DAY I really credit Barbaras involvement for this Will definitely ONLY go to her shirts from now on

Content:

Content: I was looking for a company close to Oakville that had the capability to edit a picture and print the edited picture onto a hoodie I had requested that they isolate one part of the picture to print on the front and then have the entire picture printed on the back Im so glad I chose Next Day T shirts Barbara was absolutely wonderful and I am so very pleased with the result I highly recommend you take any projects like this to them You wont be disappointed

Content: As a birthday present to myself I commissioned some artwork for a hoodie/t shirt & shopped around for a local place to get the printing done at Next day T Shirts was amazing to work with They patiently answered all my questions They worked to ensure that I got the shirt design & colours that I wanted Their prices including shipping costs were very reasonable  & they got the order shipped out in a very timely manner The printing is very well done Good size Properly centred Seems pretty sturdy Im thrilled with the results

Content: I was extremely happy with the partnership and service of Nextdaytshirts ca It started as a small order of 16 Halloween staff shirts and ballooned to an order of 64 T shirts with a short turn around time 8 days  Not only did they accommodate my large order  but they enhanced my design and everyone wore their shirts with pride Thank you very much Barb for the time  effort and hard work that went into making our staff Halloween shirts a reality I definitely recommend your family run business that cares about their customers  Thank you‘½

Content: I have used Next Day T shirts twice now On both occasions I was in a last minute pinch and they were very responsive  getting the job done on time The shirts they use are high quality  as well as the print It has held up very well through numerous wash and dry cycles I trust they would handle a large job as well as my two small quick orders Barbara was very personable and I would recommend Next Day T shirts to anyone

Content: I can only say positive things about my experience with Next Day T shirts  Barbara was a great help when it came to design and preparation  we had a situation that required an immediate order and they came through with an even better than expected results I will be promoting this small family business to everyone I meet Thank you again Barbara  your team and yourself out did yourselves and you all deserve the 5 stars given

Content: I am very new to Hamilton and not quite familiar with the local shops around town When my boyfriend surprised me with a proposal on my birthday I was very short on time to get him something special in return for his birthday the very next week Barbara at Next Day T shirts was the only person in town who would accept the project on such short notice Not only did Barbara take on the project  she did it fast and with a smile It has been a very long time since I have received such EXCELLENT customer service and it was highly appreciated And for that  Next Day T shirts will get 100 of my work in the future and will ALWAYS get my referrals Thanks again Barbara My fianc LOVES his custom t shirt almost as much as I love my diamond ring

Name: A9286
Content: TERRIBLE experience We put in an order on Wednesday for a T shirt which was planned as a birthday gift for the weekend I provided an example of what I wanted  paid in full immedy and then made arrangements for pick up Despite the company being called Next day t shirts the earliest available pick up time was Friday We agreed to a 1pm pick up and I confirmed twice  explaining that I had a meeting at 2 15 in Burlington I arrived to pick the shirt up at 1 40 and was told that they were still working on the mock up of the shirt It hadnt even been started She gave me a line about only receiving the example a few minutes earlier  perhaps she thought she had spoken to someone else on Wednesday  but as I was the person who placed the order AND sent the example  I knew I had sent it straight away I also knew that we had firmly agreed upon a pick up time and that she was aware of my meeting I left to pick up my husband to give them more time to complete the shirt When we returned 10 minutes later  my husband went in and found that they were not even working on the order She lied again  saying she had only receive the example image 2 minutes earlier  and then made a fuss about apparently not knowing I had a meeting and it being difficult to print on a dark grey t shirt  so it wasnt reasonable that I would expect it done two days after the initial order Long and Short  the shirt looks okay  and they DID give me a refund for the trouble  but honestly  the whole experience was awful and it isnt worth it to me to give them anymore business

Content: Our business has placed a number of orders with Coastal Reign in recent months Most recently to have a number of vital booth assets printed for an upcoming conference In a short timeline leading up to the event  our contact at Coastal Reign Jeffrey has produced exceptional service to listen carefully to our needs  provide various solutions  quotes  and mock ups to ensure we can feel confident and rest easy knowing that our  1 printer has everything covered We are excited for the next opportunity to work with Jeffrey and his team at Coastal Reign

Name: A9354
Content: I LOVE the sun hoodie that they made for me The texture feels nice and breathable The print on it is just the way I want it to be Also  the staffs were very communicative and helpful Would definitely recommend Coastal Reign to anybody who wants to get their design printed
