Content: Amazing customer service I had a rather urgent request and the Coastal Reign team came through BIG TIME with a rush order for me Strongly recommend this crew to anyone interested in buying printed swag/merch

Name: A9356
Content: Overall very good communication throughout the printing process The prices are reasonable too  especially when making bulk orders However  there is room for improvement The text printed on the back for black shirts have weird misprint or ink residues from other shirts and it really affects the aesthetic appeal of the shirt Without it I would give a 4 5 5 star  but I can overlook this glaring mistake

Name: A9357
Content: I have just received the 15 bags I ordered for our Christmas Family Reunion They look great  just as the design Anson sent me I know everyone will love these Thank you

Name: A9358
Content: Outstanding service This is our second order of hoodies and the kids in Fiddelium LOVE them Great quality and super fast service

Name: A9359
Content: Ive worked with Coastal Reign on numerous occasions and they never disappoint From communications  to mock ups  to quoting  to delivery Every part of working with Coastal Reign is seamless and easy The quality of their materials and their printing + embroidery is perfect I would recommend Coastal to anyone looking for their services every time I am asked I look forward to working with them again soon

Name: A9360
Content:
Summary making mistakes in printing  no product quality control  slow turn around very reluctant to do proper customer support 
I online ordered embroidered zip up hoodies and printed t shirts with my company logo and year number The year number got printed with a wrong font for both zip up hoodies and t shirts  making them look different from the web preview 
At least  the year number was properly center aligned  so we accepted them If we havent  they would have to re embroider  which we thought would cause too much trouble for them So we were simply being nice which we regret now 
However  the year number on the t shirts were shifted left so visibly  so we asked for reprint via the companys email customer support channel The customer rep asked me to drop off the t shirts to the shop  and then they would reprint them right away When I pointed it out that it was an online order  thus issuing a return shipping label is the correct process  the rep finally gave me the shipping label But getting the replacement T shirts took more than a week  so right away means more than 1 week? When I contacted the customer support again while waiting  I was told that the garment had to be ordered  so there is the delay  so printing shop doesnt have any garment in stock? Finally we received the replacement T shirts  But this time  one of them had a sewing issue When I contacted the customer support about it with pictures attached below  the rep said now I have to pay for the shipping because it is uncertain if its the defect from their ship The reasoning is because I did not contact them promptly after I get their replacement shipment  Yes  the T shirts were sitting in the original packaging for 30 days since I received them  and the only thing I checked right after receiving the t shirts was if the logo and year number is properly printed Ive ordered many T shirts and hoodies for my company  and this was the only online company that made this many mistakes and had poor quality control and customer support Maybe Coastal Reign Printing is okay for offline orders  but definitely not ready for online orders UPDATE After reading my review  someone in the company contacted me and offered free return shipping as well as partial refund However  I had to decline My reasonings were  I tried and failed to resolve this issue via their customer support channel already  which made me waste enough time  if I accept any refund after leaving a bad public review  that would make my review as blackmailing  which is not how I do business

Name: A9361
Content: I had a FANTASTIC experience with Coastal Reign I worked with them for about 2 months on a tote bag design and there was a lot of back and forth mostly me being indecisive haha  The entire time they were so patient and accommodating They made it so easy and a pleasure to work with 100 would order again from them

Name: A9362
Content: High quality items  our account rep was amazing to work with Items arrived quickly and were better than expected

Name: A9363
Content: Just received our promotional hats from Coastal Reign They look amazing and our exactly what we ordered The staff were easy to deal with and the order was done and delivered with a quick turn around I will be using them as our exclusive representative for promotional gear going forward

Name: A9364
Content: Ive been using Coastal Reign for a few months now and am quite happy with the clothing and print quality I always try to look for a company with great customer service and communication when printing clothing and Coastal Reign has been great at both They state clearly the expected pick up time so there are no surprises when an order is ready Minor thing Ive found is that around 1 of 100 shirts may have a bit of ink smudged somewhere from the screenprinting process causing the shirt to be stained a bit From the large quantities of clothing Coastal Reign prints out you should also expect some lint Otherwise  very happy so far and will continue using for my business

Name: A9365
Content:
Anson was very helpful and responsive 

They have fast and Professional service  great designs and high quality items Highly recommend

Name: A9366
Content: Anson and the whole Coastal Reign team absolutely killed it for an order of hats my team had on rush order No only did they beat their suggested deadline by 5 days but their customer service was second to none and the quality was of the final product was great They are very knowledgeable about what will work and what wont  and get back to you right away with useful feedback Id 100 recommend getting custom printed apparel here

Name: A9367
Content: I ordered 250 pieces of Face Mask/Neck Warmers for the company I work for and Coastal Reign did a fantastic job The material was really good and stretchable  so it can fit anyone Product delivery was completed in timely manner even during COVID 19 I would definitely recommend this company

Name: A9368
Content: I first heard about Coastal Reign when I was in high school playing ultimate Back then it was really cool getting sublimated prints for ultimate jerseys and although I am not sure where my ultimate team ordered their jerseys  I looked into Coastal Reign products when my dance team needed team apparel The order process was easy and streamlined  and process time was fast As I moved into university and ordered more apparel for clubs I am involved in  I discovered that Coastal Reign website updates made the entire process extremely user friendly  as I am able to calculate cost directly on the site without even contacting reps for quotes  and it even lets me design my product as well as customizing This speeds up the ordering process immensely Every single order the Coastal Reign artists helped touch up my artwork for free and I cant be thankful enough Shipping was also free of charge when I ordered over a certain amount it wasnt too hard to reach that amount  This also solved my problems converting from USD to CAD sometimes for US printing sites Other local printing companies that I have worked with do not often put taxes  discounts  and shipping costs into consideration when I ask them for a quote  and Coastal Reign definitely delivers on time and their products are always fabulous My favourite printing company to work with as they have great customer service Receiving the big turquoise box in the mail always puts a smile on my face

Name: A9369
Content:
Editing my review from a 3 star to a 4 star 

Originally had errors with a recent order that were fixed by Coastal Reign  which I very much appreciate I dont want a negative review to be stuck on their page  as Ive had far more positive experiences with the company in regards to large mask orders My only hope is that quality remains with all aspects of production  communication remains clear with future orders and that they are open to making corrections to any issue with an order promptly 

Thank you so much for the hard work and for providing a service that is highly valued in these times My own customers have been extremely satisfied with the masks theyve received that contain my own designs  and I really hope to continue providing more

Name: A9370
Content:
This is an amazing printing business that deserves to be recognized I have been using Coastal Reign for several projects now for our business and have always been impressed with the results We have ordered hoodies  t shirts and long sleeve shirts with our custom logo several times now The customer service is 5++ stars 

They offer many choices for clothes depending on what the price range is  so if youre wanting to go super high quality or on budget  they make it possible every time Additionally  this is a great business to use if youre looking for a smaller quantity of items as they offer discounts usually once you purchase 3+ items

Name: A9371
Content: I had a small order 3 items with a special image that needed some attention So  not a big company with a logo ready to go and hundreds of items Yet they were great dealing with my special request  gave me individualized attention thanks  Anson  and perfect results This was a birthday present and though I missed the date by a few days I contacted Coastal too late  it took about 2 weeks for the whole process  it was really worth it Everyone is so happy Thank you  Coastal Reign

Name: A9372
Content: Customer service went over and above Thank you so much for your help with design and the beauty of production This was one of the easiest school grad hoodie orders I have ever done I really appreciated the double checking of name spelling before going into final production Super fast delivery as well Thank you so much The kids LOVE their hoodies

Name: A9373
Content: These guys are amazing They will work hard to get exactly what you need done Working with Clay with custom stuff was a dream; Ive used them 4 times in 3 months and everything was perfect Highly recommended

Name: A9374
Content: I ordered 50 custom laser imprinted mugs The customer service team was very helpful with making the design work and answering questions I felt the cost was fair and the mugs were done timely I did receive 2 broken mugs  but considering they were shipped across Canada  I dont feel this was Coastal Reigns error My 4/5 star rating is because I felt the stock/prices online changed a lot and I had to adjust my plan a couple times Overall I was impressed and happy to support a Canadian company

Name: A9375
Content: The team at Coastal Reign really went above and beyond to help us achieve our vision This is our second time working with them and as usual  all our expectations were met in regards to competitive pricing  production timeline  final product  and overall experience The team guided us through the process and helped us consider things that we didnt account for  so that was incredibly appreciated Will definitely recommend Coastal Reign to other Festival partners

Name: A9376
Content:
Exceptionally disappointed with this company 
I ordered t shirts for a film shoot with the rush option They didnt inform me until the day the shirts were supposed to be ready that they wouldnt be ready Now Im stuck trying to come up with a solution I asked if there was anything they could do like put the design on another t shirt but they had not options and Im just out of luck

Name: A9377
Content: Efficient communication and detailed in making sure our design needs were met I appreciated Tylers quick responses and specifications on what he needed from me Would definitely order once again  products looked great and customer service was friendly

Name: A9378
Content: We were very pleased with support that we got during the design phase of our little project Anson and company helped us along whenever we ran into technical challenges The final product is fantastic  just what we were looking for We will use Coastal Reign again Thanks

Name: A9379
Content: Great customer service  we had a really short turnaround time for our order and Coastal Reign was able to make it happen  we even got our order earlier than expected The products are fantastic and high quality  the embroidery for our logo is awesome and the fabric of the garment is super soft I hope well have a need for Coastal Reign again

Name: A9380
Content: It was a great experience working with Coastal Reign  friendly staff and nice environment  Might be a bit hot in the summer haha Nikki was very patient with me with all the weird request/questions The final products are very close to what I wanted  the silk screen printing comes out very nice on the black shirt

Name: A9381
Content: Amazing service I ordered a few t shirts and hoodies with funny pics of our golden retriever on them  and I LOVED the result But the best part was how Jeffrey the guy I was dealing with made sure that I got one remaining t shirt  and he had it couriered to my house so that I could get it to a dear friend on time for Christmas Super nice guys from start to finish Im always excited to support a business like this one Ill be back

Name: A9382
Content: Ordered a wide selection of products apparel  custom stickers  lanyards  and tote bags  Sherina was able to help me source the exact product I was picturing and made it a reality Order was processed quickly and all items were perfect Super happy with the communication from their team  Will be ordering from Coastal Reign again

Name: A9383
Content: Great customer service; I was emailing with an employee for 4/5 days trying to nail down the design and items I wanted He helped me nail down the best product and decide between a vinyl printed image and embroidered one  giving pros and cons for both I asked for a guarantee that the items would be delivered by Feb 17 as I needed them for Feb 18  and I was guaranteed barring any new shipping delays  the package would be in hand on Feb 17 I just received the package Feb 11  a full week before I was expecting it My only issue was the sizing description for the pants/sweats were not helpful  there were no waistband or inseam measurements for the products I was looking at which made it hard to discern how big the items would be

Name: A9384
Content: The whole experience went super smoothly and their customer service was fantastic They responded really quickly to emails and kept us updated throughout the entire process The final product has incredible detail and quality I would highly recommend ordering custom embroideries from Coastal Reign

Name: A9385
Content: Great job We were order 100s T short for our employees and they are working really fast and understand how we need Thank Jeffrey

Name: A9386
Content: Clayton and the Coastal Reign team have made our softball team jerseys for a number of my teams Each time  the experience and product has been phenomenal We always get compliments from opponents and friends Would highly recommend them if you need apparel services

Name: A9387
Content: We ordered shirts for Vancouver Green Electric The request has been handled quickly and effectively Generally  a very nice experience Would definitely recommend the company

Name: A9388
Content: Completely and extremely satisfied with this company I was designing and ordering the grad sweaters for my class and not only do they have very sensible prices  but they are fairly quick and good quality Everyone loved the design  fabric  embroidery  and price Shoutout to Clayton for helping me so much He answered very fast and was very helpful This company was very easy to talk with and they keep you updated throughout the whole process of your order Any questions that I had they had an answer I would totally recommend to go through Coastal Reign if you are looking for a company to print your designs They have a wide selection to choose from and will do their very best to make sure you get what you want If I could give them more stars I definitely would because they deserve it

Name: A9389
Content: If you want amazing customer service  this is the place for you I wanted to put my artwork on a a couple of shirts & they were so accommodating and did not make me feel like my order was too small to fulfill I wanted screenprinting for my artwork originally and they explained to me why it would be better to go with something else without talking down to me which I really appreciated They even sent me an email to see whether or not I wanted to switch to screenprinting and broke down the price for me without any pressure Everything was done in the time they said it would be and now Im just waiting on them to arrive Will come back to update when I receive the shirts in hand

Name: A9390
Content: I ordered printed shirts and embroidered hats from Coastal Reign and I am so happy with not only the results  but the communication Their team was exceptionally friendly  very accommodating  and their prices were very fair Two small notes one shirt had part of the design slightly larger than the mockup  but it still looked great so I am not at all disappointed And the hats I had initially chosen were out of stock  but they swiftly let me know and offered a cheaper alternative I will definitely order again if the need arises

Name: A9391
Content:
Had issues with the printing sizes being out of proportion  contacted Coastal Reign to address the issue 
Manager Eddison Ng offered me a reprint of the hoodies as it was not the standard the company is comfortable with I agreed to give Coastal reign a second chance Received reprints of the hoodies Ive ordered  specs where exact to originally designed There are slight color diff from the side sleeves more white the front and back faded white  Overall  im having mixed feelings about the print However  im able to say that manager Eddison Ng is very professional and helped me through the slight hiccup

Name: A9392
Content: This was my second order from coastal reign this year to order a larger batch of t shirts for my research team I accidentally approved a mock up of the shirt that wasnt exactly what I wanted  so I called and they were able to fix the mock up for me before it went to print Then  when the shirts had shipped they emailed me to say they forgot to print the back so they reprinted the order and shipped it overnight and I got twice the shirts I was very impressed with their customer service and the shirts look great  my crew was so excited they thanked me 3 times

Name: A9393
Content: We ordered merchandise for our school group and were extremely impressed by the quality  speed of service  and experience Ordering was very user friendly as someone that had not previously ordered custom merchandise It was actually so pleasant that we decided to reorder from them again Great company

Name: A9394
Content: My absolute favourite printing company I ordered my first crewneck merch bulk order from Coastal Reign  and the attention to detail was incredible  they were perfect I got the Gildan Heavy Blend with embroidery and screen print on the back Everyone who has received them loves the amazing quality Thank you so much Clayton  Nikki  Boaz and Oley Youve been awesome and I cant wait to come back

Name: A9395
Content: Coastal Reigns service is absolutely exemplary They were quick  friendly  and helpful throughout the entire process from design to execution I had a very complex embroidery design and short timeline  and they were able to deliver ahead of time  and kept up the constant communication through every step Everyone on the team is extremely kind and understanding I would highly recommend Coastal Reign for your custom clothing needs

Name: A9396
Content: Took over 2 weeks to make 2 sweaters initially  was told itd be 3 days The sweaters themselves are a decent quality The print was not good on the first order However  Eddison over at Coastal Reign didnt miss a beat when I expressed my displeasure He personally took care of reprinting the sweaters and couriered them to me all within a couple days This company is eager to please and aims high for customer satisfaction I am very pleased with their problem solving skills and standards I recommend this company as they are striving to grow and build an excellent reputation Thank you

Name: A9397
Content: I am fairly tech savvy  Id suggest higher than average  but found the iterative communications via the website less than optimal This is why I am not giving full marks When you are designing something on a timeline and there are disclaimers about delivery dates  sometimes it is easier to just talk to a human In the end I did and everything was handled to my satisfaction The product arrived sooner than expected and was absolutely as I had hoped

Name: A9398
Content: We ordered over 300 T shirts in 2017 from Coastal Reign The owner and his assistant were helpful  polite and caring since the first time we met them They were also efficient and organized The layout was done quickly and the tees came out perfect We received all the orders well packed and correct The quality of the shirts was superb soft & comfortable at an affordable price I would recommend Coastal Reign to anyone

Name: A9399
Content: I looked for so long to try and find a place that would print individual designs and Im over the moon about the results from Coastal Reign The quality is better than I anticipated and they helped me fix my design before they even began Their customer service team was amazing in answering all my questions before I purchased 100/10 If youre thinking of getting anything printed do it here because they are THE best

Name: A9400
Content: I had website troubles while ordering  left a voicemail at the help line at night  the next morning had multiple people call to help me sort it out Even had a website developer phone to ask for feedback on the website use Excellent customer service  really above and beyond Excited to see how the products turn out

Name: A9401
Content: Coastal Reign has been excellent to work with and has fantastic customer service We purchased several jackets with embroidery and our order was completed sooner than expected  arrived promptly and our staff are happy with the product As a non profit organization  they also offered us a discounted rate which was a nice bonus We would highly recommend ordering through them

Name: A9402
Content: Working at one of the leading financial institutions  we have placed multiple orders with Coastal Reign The quality of the products  the delivery time and customer service were really great I have been contacting Clayton for all our orders  he made the process super easy and has always been extremely helpful and friendly

Name: A9403
Content: Took about 5 days to get it which was pretty fast turnaround However  the custom print was much smaller than I expected and so I was a bit disappointed with the overall look UPDATE Coastal Reign went above and beyond and redid my design exactly how I wanted it the first time The print itself is very detailed and the sweater is a nice material Would recommend them

Name: A9404
Content: I ordered about 50 T shirts for a family event just before Christmas Coastal Reign impressed me at every step through the process The end result was I received exactly what I ordered  right on time The quality of the shirts and the printing on them exceeded my expectations The price was amazing too The thing that impressed me the most though  was the high standard and professionalism of their customer service I will order again from them next year and will actively promote them to anyone that might need shirts for a special event Tyler and the crew are awesome

Name: A9405
Content: Purchased 10+ embroidered crew neck sweaters and my whole family loved them The embroidery was done very well and the sweaters finished ahead of schedule Will definitely order from them again The support team was definitely helpful in setting up the order and they answered all my inquiries within 1 business day  even during the busiest of times Definitely recommend Coastal Reign for your custom clothing needs Amazing quality for a really good price

Name: A9406
Content: Great customer service and product I wanted an apron with a custom logo and was overwhelmed by all the options I wasnt aware logos came in so many ways to be affixed Jeffrey walked me through all the logo options  different aprons with availability and timing to ensure I was able to get the product in time for my friends birthday I would definitely go back

Name: A9407
Content: Had a great experience with Coastal Reign They take care of you from start to finish  have quick turn around times  great designs and fantastic support They made the whole experience very easy Would definitely go to them again the next time I need printing Special thanks to Nikki for her great customer service

Name: A9408
Content: Coast Reign provided amazing customer service with our order They were extremely responsive to my emails and always responded within 24 hours  if not sooner Their pricing is also reasonable and the quality of the printing was good I would definitely use them again for future orders and recommend them to others

Name: A9409
Content: My school program has ordered custom hoodies and tote bags from Coastal Reign I really appreciate how you can design your own items and also get support from the design team Great customer service from Sonya and amazing products My students love their gear

Name: A9410
Content: I recently did a order for 24 custom hoodies for our student union through Coastal Reign Not only were their customer service representatives so helpful through the process  the hoodies all came out perfectly The hoodies themselves are very soft and the embroidered work on it is very well done The pricing and shipping of the hoodies were also very reasonable and came quickly within 1 2 weeks  I highly recommend them for any type of customized hoodie purchases

Name: A9411
Content: The customer service at Coastal Reign is incredible Clayton was extremely helpful when I was choosing the product that I wanted and was very accommodating when I wanted to use my own design Additionally  the products are of high quality with a quick turnaround time I was very pleased with my experience

Name: A9412
Content: Just received my order and the sweaters were perfect The process of designing and ordering was super smooth  The staff was great and quick to respond when working out the final design

Name: A9413
Content: Best customer service experience to date I made very high demands of the Coastal Reign team and they surpassed all expectations I ordered 20 T shirts for a corporate event and stated that I needed them within 5 business days as a super rush order The team had them ready for pickup within 3 business days Amazing quality product and customer service Will be a repeat customer for sure

Name: A9414
Content: My screen printed shirt order shipped earlier than expected and the quality is great Will definitely be using them again later this year

Name: A9415
Content: Coastal Reign worked hard to get my order to me as scheduled  in spite of small snags and setbacks that I had created for them Also their online calculators make the pricing process transparent and fast to calculate

Name: A9416
Content: I ordered hoodies for my class and I was very impressed Not only was the quality of the embroidery and the screen printing very good

Name: A9417
Content: Amazing staff and quality of print is exceptional Printed complex design front  back and sleeve possible  Will use again for future

Name: A9418
Content: Coastal Reign provides exceptional customer service and they really go above and beyond to get rush orders done I am extremely happy with their responsiveness  quality of the print  and help to put together the order Their website is intuitive and clear I highly recommend them for any sort of printed clothing need  whether it be for your sports team  your company  or just for fun

Name: A9419
Content: We ordered about 250 custom printed masks from Costal They did a great job answering my questions and ensuring that the final design matched my comps exactly Shipping took just 2 weeks from sign off to delivery

Name: A9420
Content: Provided great customer service and helped us design our t shirts Company has a very easy and simple process to order shirts that is quick and efficient We ordered athletic shirts for our company and the material feels great especially when were always moving around and being active The print looks exactly what the mock up was like Will definitely be referring friends and ordering from the awesome Coastal Reign team again in the future

Name: A9421
Content:
Coastal Reign was easy to work with and able to produce our custom garments within a matter of days Very happy with the end product and would highly recommend to others 

Thank you to Clayton for answering all of our questions and providing amazing service

Name: A9422
Content: The tumblers we ordered were perfect The customer service was excellent  and our large order came in time despite the time crunch Would order from here again

Name: A9423
Content:
Great service Their customer service rep Nikki reached out to me and made sure I was satisfied with every step of the process from print mockup to delivery 

The prints are very high quality and have no signs of fading after a couple of washes The shirts and tanks fit very well  they arent boxy and loose and are true to size 

Thanks for the speedy delivery of these shirts Coastal Reign Ill definitely order again if I need more custom printed shirts

Name: A9424
Content: I ordered with Coastal Reign for the student conference I am organizing  and was pleasantly impressed with my overall experience with the company Right off the bat  they were able to accomodate to our tight budget as a non profit and responded quickly to all emails Not only did shipping take just a few days  and final product was of high quality for both the printed crewnecks and embroidered hats we ordered  Im sure our delegates will love them as well

Name: A9425
Content: Coastal Reign did a great job with our order Really fast response time from Kyle and Tyler  quick production  and quality They have comparable prices to their competitors  but produce a much higher quality product Will definitely use them again

Name: A9426
Content: Hats are decent quality  embroidery of logo was well done and delivered as promised Thank you

Name: A9427
Content: Outstanding service I get responses from the team very quick  everyone is very helpful  especially Jeffrey I have never printed anything before but Jeffrey made the entire experience very easy and managment and quick The products came out very well and I needed to put in another order right away

Name: A9428
Content:
Found this place by accident while looking to have shirts made Ended up ordering 7 hoodies The program was easy to use we did call for help with one image  the staff were very nice and helpful 
The hooded arrived earlier than expected and are great quality Will definitely use these guys in the future
Great to deal with

Name: A9429
Content: We recently ordered some corporate polos for our team and the shirts are fantastic Coastal Reign is easy to deal with  responds quickly  and their product is priced well I wouldnt hesitate to order from them again

Name: A9430
Content: I thoroughly enjoyed my experience working with Boaz and the Coastal Reign team Our garments were very affordable They were very patient with all of our garment changes and timeline changes We got customization done They said they dont print special characters but they specially drafted it up anyways I thought that was really considerate The printing and processing was all very fast and efficient We put our order through quite late but they still made our deadline One of the representatives delivered it to us and we got them just in time

Name: A9431
Content: Very pleased with our products The customer service was great  Anson was a huge help in ensuring we got exactly what we were looking for The turnaround time was super quick and efficient

Name: A9432
Content:
We decided to go with Coastal Reign because of recommendations by others I had ordered around 450 t shirts for an event and this was by far the best quality t shirts I have ever ordered Eddison and his team were super accommodating to last minute changes to the designs we wanted He made sure everything was done on time and up to standards 

I would definitely recommend this company for anyone looking to print

Name: A9433
Content: Coastal Reign did a great job with some tank tops I ordered for a bachelorette party The only reason for the 4 stars is they lost my initial email order When I called them to follow up  they were able to expedite my order so it could arrive on time Everyone loved the shirts

Name: A9434
Content: I would like to thank Eddison  Boaz and the rest of the Coastal Reign team for their AMAZING service I purchased 2 custom embroidered caps and the finished products were exactly what I envisioned Their entire team was very friendly and knowledgeable of all of their products  and they were able to present a beautifully designed mock up very quickly I was very impressed with their strong communication and competitive pricing They even gave me a free complimentary hoodie with my order for Christmas I wont be shopping anywhere else for custom print clothing and embroidery from now on Thanks again

Name: A9435
Content: Great product  fast turn around Ordered screen printed fabric masks  loved being able to make a smaller quantity order for these End result is very sharp  the print looks amazing Only qualm is the mask is very one size fits all  they tend to fit a bit big I think this would be a great opportunity to maybe offer Ear Savers as an additional customizable product  if we can slap a logo on them and offer them along side mask sales  it would accommodate a larger spectrum of sizes I would love to order these from Coastal Reign  too

Name: A9436
Content: Ordered baseball Ts for our entire office and they turned out great Thanks for your speedy service and excellent product

Name: A9437
Content:
Working with Coastal Reign was quick and easy 

Coastal Reign provided us with an enormous amount of selection at competitive prices Eddison and his team worked very fast to get the order back to us They listened carefully to our designers instructions  and was able to bring our design to life The designs were spot on  and the look of the shirts turned out amazing By far one of the best shirt printing business that we have worked with Keep up the awesome job

Name: A9438
Content: Coastal Reign saved me after a failed Etsy order for a bachelorette party They made eight custom sweatshirts on a one and a half day turnaround without question or hassle and comparable pricing  The whole process; design  production  and pick up was seamless and the service was unbelievably helpful I will definitely choose them again in the future instead of ordering online

Name: A9439
Content: I was not very good at ordering the first time but their patient staff understood what I wanted This black hoody looks striking with bright yellow text while wearing a black motorcycle jacket Its exactly what I wanted

Name: A9440
Content:
We used them for some custom printed fabric face masks 

While I think the height of their masks is a bit short coming in at 4 75 compared to the 5 25 5 5 I see at other vendors  the quality is fantastic  and the design/approval process was quick and easy 

When I had an issue with shipping  caused by the carrier  they were extremely quick to respond and offer a remedy even though they werent in the wrong 

I will be using and recommending them for other printing projects in the future

Name: A9441
Content:
Website was easy to use and quick to design my products Customer service was also great The print process was a little longer then Id have hoped for but it worked out good 

All around super happy with the process and the final product

Name: A9442
Content: The service here at Coastal Reign is phenomenal Nikki has been very patient with me by ensuring all my requests are fulfilled The shirts I received exceeded my expectation as well I will definitely be doing business with them in the near future Cheers

Name: A9443
Content:
Randomly  I found this place after a couple other option fell thru or they were just crazy expensive A Coastal Reign employee was quick to respond and provide a quote The turn around time was very quick and arrived safely delivered to my office I couldnt be happier with the way our flannel shirts turned out for my moms 70th Birthday Ski Trip I will be definitely using them again 
Greg Keith  Owner Dueck Auto Group

Name: A9444
Content: Nikki & Eddison were fantastic customer service They worked patiently for months with me and business order  and once the final order was placed it was received within days and the final product was fantastic quality Recommend Coastal Reign for any of your clothing order needs

Name: A9445
Content: I used Coastal Reign to print team sweaters and they were awesome They went out of their way to make sure everything went as smooth as possible and had a incredibly fast turn around time From the day I ordered to the day I received the sweaters was 6 days I would definitely recommend using coastal reign to anyone looking to do custom apparel

Name: A9446
Content: Amazing customer service so so happy with how our orders turned out HUGE shoutout to sherina who helped us throughout this whole process & made sure everything was what we wanted  thank you sherina will definitely place more orders in the future

Name: A9447
Content: We ordered T shirts from Coastal Reign Printing for our event that had a very tight deadline and Coastal Reign was incredibly accommodating and tailored to our every need I highly recommend this company and would definitely work with them again in the future Their prices are very reasonable and their customer service is excellent The quality of the t shirt is also well made

Name: A9448
Content: I used Coastal Reign Printing for the first time recently to get some t shirts printed Eddison was very responsive and flexible which was very important to us since I was placing a last minute order I would definitely recommend their services and will absolutely use them again

Name: A9449
Content: My family has been dealing with Coastal Reign since they were founded and we have nothing but great things to say They always respond promptly  their products are flawless and of great quality  and their staff are some of the most genuine people I know Shoutout to Boaz  Eddison  and the real C Dub

Name: A9450
Content: I recently placed an order with Coastal Reign for a group presentation  and the shirts came out perfectly I was extremely impressed with how well done the screen printing was Boaz got back to me very quickly with all the questions I had  and provided me with all the information I needed They also got the order sent to me in Ontario well before the date of my presentation I would definitely recommend Coastal Reign to anyone

Name: A9451
Content: Where do I start  Coastal Reign is my go to company for printing anything and everything I recommend them to everyone I know Clayton is so patient  caters and listens to my every need  as if we were old friends Dion is also a gem She answers all my questions thoroughly and informatively Their service is amazing and their products are just as amazing You get above and beyond what you pay for Never not a 5 star experience

Name: A9452
Content:
The team is very easy to work with  great service  amazing quality and quick turnaround time Weve gotten t shirts printed and caps embroidered 

Theres a wide selection of products to choose from to accommodate any budget Will definitely continue to order from them again

Name: A9453
Content: Coastal Reign went above and beyond my expectations They were able to accommodate our shorter than usual deadline  able to increase the quality of some of our logos  and their customer service is absolutely incredible If I ever need custom T shirts again  Coastal Reign is definitely the first place Ill go

Name: A9454
Content: This year I placed a rather large and complicated order with Coastal Reign We ordered hoodies  sweatshirts  t shirts  soft shell jackets  and sweat pants all with different logos in different forms  from screen print  to embroidery  to applique  Coastal Reigns customer service was incredible They were not daunted by our complicated order and did everything they could to support me through the process They responded to all my inquiries very quickly They met with me in person at a location of my choice to originally discuss options for the order  they converted original artwork into a great screen print design  and they got my approval in every step of the process font  embroidery colour  design size and placement

Name: A9455
Content: This company was SO great to work with I had trouble with another company closer to me but they couldnt figure out my image These guys made a great suggestion and it was simple The t shirts are AMAZING And comfy Everybody loves them They shipped over the holidays  and it arrived in time  like they predicted  even with holiday stoppages YAY Im re ordering more of them Id go to them again in a heartbeat

Name: A9456
Content: Ive ordered from Costal Reign multiple times and they are wonderful to work with They are very responsive and its always a pleasure to work with them

Name: A9457
Content: We recently ordered a fairly large number of hoodies and crewnecks from Coastal Reign  which represent our companys new logo From their super swift replies to our inquiries  to the great prices  we were very pleased with our experience Thank you Coastal Reign team

Name: A9458
Content: I originally had a problem with the shirts but Clayton from Coastal Reign was able to fix the issue with ease I have full confidence that Coastal Reign Printing will do whatever it takes to make you satisfied

Name: A9459
Content:
Amazing customer service  quick responses  and high quality 

Recently ordered jerseys from this company and customer service was fantastic The quality of the shirts were supreme and the price was quite affordable compared to other competitors Not only did this team respond quickly to any inquiries and questions  they even delivered our jerseys within a couple days of ordering Overall  a great customer experience and would definitely order from them again

Name: A9460
Content: I am extremely happy with my experience ordering from this company Employees took the time to call me to ensure that my logo was placed in the perfect spot and communication was fast and clear I really appreciate the service I was given and the FAST delivery Thanks again Coastal Reign

Name: A9461
Content: Boaz and his team did a great job with our company order We had some polo shirts and hats made up for our staff and not only do they look great  but he was able to accommodate a couple of last minute changes before we had to distribute the items I would definitely recommend Coastal Reign Printing

Name: A9462
Content:
The outstanding performance and excellent customer service I have received by Coastal Reign was far beyond my expectations I am a student at UBCO and I placed a very large  meticulous order of various items and logos for each All the clothing and accessories I received were of top quality  and completely on time with my deadline Boaz and his team is are superstars and will not let you down With free designing  free delivery  a huge selection  and amazing customer service  Coastal Reign should be everyones number one choice in this industry

Thank you Coastal Reign  Tanya Fraser from UBCO

Name: A9463
Content: We love our Coastal Reign t shirts We ordered the jersey t shirts for our soccer team They were made exactly like the mock up provided Jersey material is perfect for sweating and good quality Excellent and quick service Thank you  Eddison and team

Name: A9464
Content: Weve been doing business with Coastal Reign Printing for a couple semesters now From our first set of crewnecks to sweatpants and recently tank tops  theyve been super efficient and precise with our order Were always able to get sample sizes before placing our final order and the quality of their products are amazing Thanks again for supporting our school club guys~ Youre doing an awesome job ^_^

Name: A9465
Content:
I recently ordered 60 hats and 100 shirts for my club Given the complexity of our design and our tight deadline  I was not quite sure what to expect Whatever expectations I did have  however  were blown out of the water by Boaz and the Coastal Reign team Throughout the entire process  they worked tirelessly to ensure that we were satisfied with the end product 

Ultimately  if you ever need any merchandise printed  I would highly recommend turning to them They produce high quality  competitively priced products  and are incredibly helpful and professional from start to finish Without a doubt  5 stars

Name: A9466
Content: We ordered our corporate t shirts and polos recently Coastal Reign helped us a lot to get the best quality shirts at the best timing Excellent service  outstanding qualities and reasonable price We will definitely order again

Name: A9467
Content: Oley and team were timely in their responses and very helpful The print I received initially was more faded than the example provided  and when I realized this after picking it up the team offered a full reprint and to ship it out to me at no additional cost Very happy with the end result Thank you

Name: A9468

Content: Overall positive experience I dealt with Nikki  she had a very vibrant personality and provided excellent customer service The products received met my exact expectations Will do business with them in the very near future

Name: A9493
Content:
Ive ordered from Coastal Reign a few times over the last year and their product/embroidery is overall decent Their receptionist/sales girl is fairly new She was mostly helpful with me on my orders There are a couple of things that  to me  lowers the rating They are 

1 They dont have a designated parking area  at least at their old location Not sure with the new one I had to walk a few blocks to get to their store Not a huge deal  just thought it would have been slightly more covenient if they had at least a couple spots for their customers Their storefront is limited and feels a bit under equipped wanted to touch and feel the materials for design purposes 

2 I was given an invoice/quote that had an item at a certain price and upon calling to confirm an order in the new year  the price had increased astoundingly; close to 50 without any mention on the website or through email I also wasnt given any  well give it to you at your invoice price either  and was told that bigger orders 100+ items would retain the old pricing My orders are usually 10 20 pieces at a time  not 100+ Before  I would get the reasonable prices on 10+ items  so that increased to over 10x as well That would mean I would have to order over 3 thousand dollars worth of merchandise just to keep the current pricing Not impressed with this move 

Given the nature of all this  I realize they are a fairly new business However  it has been frustrating dealing with the lack of clear communication on pricing Overall  I am generally pleased with their product and embroidery Its their customer service communication and pricing arrangement is what keeps them at 3 stars Othewise I would have given them more

Name: A9521
Content:
Edit 
I brought some literal and metaphorical receipts so please look at the photos 

                                                   
For context on this review we used Coastal Reign for 7 months  spent over  7 500 over 11 separate orders We switched suppliers a few months ago and tonight my business partner and I sat down and looked at our sunk cost for apparel costs over the last 6 months We almost quit running the shop after Christmas because it seemed impossible to make money at this lol turns out its totally possible as long as you dont use Costal Reign for your printing?

Like honestly  I want to cry but I want to laugh because I cant believe we stayed They were incredibly rude to us every time we called  misprinted multiple orders and the their turn around time is like a month and a half *unless you pay a rush fee*

If you stay long enough you realize the 10 rush fee is part of the business model Its dishonest and even when you pay rush theyd just drag out the process  change the expected by date sometimes by WEEKS and suggest a 25 rush fee 
We spent almost 1 grand in rush fees and complimentary products for clients whod waited over a month for back ordered products Its astonishing I also cannot stress enough how rude they were to us on a regular basis Some of these friendly reviews seem suspicious  they ask you to scan a qr code and leave a review after every order and the running joke with my team is like lol theyll regret asking that if we left an honest review after this

The reason we switched was because they misprinted up an order 10/25 shirts were off centre by almost 2 inches We didnt bust out a measuring tape to check before mailing them and then we got dragged online by a customer When I called to ask for reprints the guy who answered said  Im gonna let you in on a little secret  the most successful brands who users do their own quality control like bruh  what?

HOW MANY UNSUCCESSFUL BRANDS DO YOU WORK WITH MY DUDE??

If you think youre getting a good price call a few other shops because youre really not One of our first orders we spent almost  17 per piece for a one colour print on an ACT everyday cotton t shirt because they bake the set up fee into the order Heres the other thing you realize if you shop around  thats not normal With Coastal Reign the price never *really* lowers Were paying almost half the price now and the quality is better  turnaround time is 2 weeks and the people who work there are not mean 

I feel like I need to talk to my therapist about why I hate myself enough to have tolerated their behaviour
